links_reviews_text: Love the look of this top- cute and flirty with the open shoulders and extra detail in the sleeves plus a nice print for fall when it's not too cold yet!!

This was more flattering than I thought given that I have broad shoulders. I unbuttoned the neckline a lot so it was more comfortable. FYI the buttons are insanely hard to undo... took me forever. Length of this is a bit cropped. I tucked it into high waisted jeans.
Love love cold shoulders.... looks great with skinny, loose or tucked in, would re rent again!

links_reviews_title: I couldn't get past the arms...
links_reviews_text: I almost didn't wear the blouse because it came with two of the neckline buttons missing and buttoned off-center. There was also too much fabric on the arms for my taste and ended up wearing the blouse with a sweater over top.

Amazing!! Perfect for date night and worn again for a night out at work conference in Vegas. Detailing on sleeves is beautiful and buttons can be undone to show a little more chest. For the date I work tucked in the front and Vegas (because I was beyond bloated) I work untucked and it hid the belly. LOVED THIS SHIRT.
Fun date night top

links_reviews_title: Super Cute Top ... Day to Evening!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this top! Received many compliments - paired it with a casual pair of jeans and it transitioned easily from an afternoon baseball game to an early dinner with friends. Fits great; runs true to size. Lightweight fabric ... will definitely rent again!

This top is one of my favorites. I wore it 3 times! Each time I hot several compliments. Couldn't tell if it's navy blue or black. Cold shoulder and flowey sleeves make this extra flirty. Paired with white jeans and also blue jeans and booties. Love!!
I loved this top and would definitely rent again. I wore it with jeans for sightseeing. Loved the sleeve details.

links_reviews_title: Tredy but still comfortable for everday life
links_reviews_text: A little shorter in the front but perfrct for a front tuck

This top is really cute! I wore it to work and out to happy hour aftewards. You can button it all the way it to the collar, or wear it unbuttoned like I did. The cold shoulder cut outs get a little tight depending on how youre moving your arms, but otherwise it fit true to size and has a really pretty floral print.

Really liked this top. I thought it was super cute. It was very comfortable. I appreciate the neckline on this top. The bare shoulders is also very cute. I thought I would be cold but that is not the case. The top is true to size and I really liked it.

Floral and ruffles, what more do you need? This top is functional for various types of events. You can wear jeans for a more casual look or event dress it up with slacks or a skirt! I love the ruffles on the sleeves, which adds more dimension to the top and cold shoulder is always a flattering look on all! Love this top and it's essential for the upcoming weather change!

This was on the small side, I went with the 4 which was perfect, but still on the short side and a little tight around the shoulder area. I wore with a tank under so the length was fine, but I wouldn't have been able to wear if I was going to be active in any way. It was fine for a dinner out with friends though!

I pretty much knew when I saw the size prescribed for me on this blouse that it would be too small through the shoulders and bust. The blouse is beautiful and it was too tight to my back shoulders. I have an athletic build so I just have to in the future make sure I adjust size might trade it in for larger size because it really is pretty.
Versatile for work or fun.
Cute, but fit a little too snug on the bust. Ended up returning it

links_reviews_title: Rented for every day wear, and it looks wonderful with blue or black denim
links_reviews_text: Looks beautiful on!

links_reviews_title: Really pretty top. I loved it and wore it with a pair of white dressy jeans.
links_reviews_text: Fit great! Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Loved the sleeves! Such a fun add.
links_reviews_text: A little tight in the shoulders but overall, fit well.

links_reviews_title: Simple sexy. The fabric and flow are so feminine. Works with jeans or dress pants.
links_reviews_text: Soft fabric, beautiful draping on the sleeves. The small print on the black fabric gives the shirt just enough pop and color to pair it with a variety of bottoms. The slight ruffle on the sleeves gives it a feminine touch and subtle movement. I wore it to work, to a picnic and out to dinner with friends.

links_reviews_title: Went to a wine lunch & wore with white jeans. Felt very fun & light.
links_reviews_text: Flowy without being too big. I tucked in the front and loved the neckline too.

I loved this top but it was too tight in the chest! I was disappointed that a larger size wasn't available so I didn't get to wear it. The colors and the detail are so pretty. I usually wear a medium, but the material had no give and I couldn't really get it down over my bust. I'll be watching to rent it again in a size that fits.
I was surprised am 8 fit because I have big shoulders and lats but this fit perfectly. Lots of compliments and wore with jeans and booties
Good not great
If you're a top heavy girl, be warned this shirt is going to be super tight on your boobs
such a pretty top, i wore it with the top few buttons undone for a more casual look. It was a bit small in the chest: size up if you are large busted
Nice top. Fit as expected.
Will rent again for sure
Fit well

links_reviews_title: Just the right amount of fun
links_reviews_text: A little boxy in the fit, but looks great with skinny or straight leg pants and great with shorts/skorts. Soft, flowy material and I got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Pretty blouse for daytime or night
links_reviews_text: Arms a little snug

It was a little tight across the shoulders, but that will only be a problem if you are planning to raise your hands over your head at some point, like a concert or running screaming from zombies, maybe. But you'll look super cute while doing so.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't wear it yet, will update when I get a bigger size :)
links_reviews_text: It's a beautiful shirt but too small, I will try again in a bigger size. I usually wear a 12 in tops, but will try a 14.
Wore it two times while I had it Comfortable and cute

links_reviews_title: Rent this for a cute top to pair with jeans!
links_reviews_text: Rented this to have for a fun top to wear on any given weekend! Went to dinner with friends and it was perfect with some distressed jeans & wedges! Comfortable, girly & a little pop with the cold shoulder makes is a great top to wear winter through summer. I would rent this again
Love this. Bought it. Super cute.
This top was the perfect length. Wore it with jeans and some cute shoes to a date night bar. Lots of compliments and just the right amount of shoulder!!

Wore this for my niece's First communion. Was easy to wear with a racer back bra and comfortable. Not so much my style but was great to give it a try. Looked cute with black pants and heels but you could dress up or down.
I found this ran a little small and tight in the arms, but it was fine. Cute, but nothing too special.
#1960'sThemedBirthdayBash

links_reviews_title: Perfect Shift Dress for Bridal Shower!
links_reviews_text: I was skeptical of how this dress would look because of all the detail and material which can often make you look larger. It turned out to be thee PERFECT number for my bridal shower. I had to go with the smaller of the sizes because it runs big. It is a heavier material but once on you can't really tell. The length was perfect for me and I'm 5'3. It is hard to zip up by yourself so have someone handy. I also took it to the cleaners to get it hard pressed for my event. I paired it with a really tall heel & cute clutch and it was truly a hit!

Wore this for our family photo shoot. Pretty dress... But not the brightest white (can't go too much into detail as my 1st post was clearly deleted as a result). It's really short and very tough to iron. But definitely served its purpose!

Wore this 7 months pregnant for my 40th birthday party and would definitely rent again (even not preggo)! There is plenty of room but does not feel like you are wearing a tent. Super stylish the way the fabric folds in layers in the front. I love this dress! (Usual size 4, currently 5'6, 145 lb pregnancy wt)
Very oversized which I LOVED! Hope to rent again

links_reviews_title: absolutely in love with this dress!!!
links_reviews_text: I wore it for my sorority's recruitment week and it was a huge hit! So many girls loved the dress and I wish I could have kept it! It was super comfortable and I absolutely loved the pockets! I would definitely recommend if you want to look dressy but also still be comfortable!

I rented this for my Bachelorette Weekend in Vegas. It was super comfy, and very unique. This would be great if you like a statement piece, I made the joke I looked like a giant napkin. It wrinkled quite a bit, but overall I was happy enjoyed wearing this dress.
Hides my baby bump

links_reviews_title: Wow! Found: Happiness in a dress!
links_reviews_text: I love everything about this dress. It's deceiving looking online as it looks like a shapeless white dress w ruffles. It's actually a gorgeous statement dress that made me happy all day. As other reviewers shared, be mindful of the wind--I wore a red lip and several times had to catch a ruffle from blowing into my lipstick! I will say I had to iron it and afterwards it didn't look like I had but it didn't take away from the appearance. It's very short but made me look Meggie than I am. Constant compliments (husband said he didn't "understand" it & that I looked like a cupcake! I wore it nevertheless and when he saw me later in the day, he said it was incredibly attractive on!). Love, Love. Fav rental and wish I owned it!

Loved the look of the dress but very wrinkled! 100% cotton. The dress looked worn. The ruffles in the front were frayed. I am 5'2" and the dress was short! It was perfect for me but I can't imagine someone with long legs. I got a lot of compliments so that is why I gave it four stars but I was disappointed on how worn it looked and how hard it was to get the wrinkles out.

This is a super beautiful and fun dress - chic, whimsical, and dressy. Fabric is not exactly what I’d expected from the pictures: the main body of the dress is a thicker, almost canvas-like material, while the ruffles are similar but feel a bit lighter. A nice detail is that the ruffles are raw-edged, with a hem stitch inside of the raw edge to keep it from fraying - adds a nice extra bit of texture and elevates the look. Will arrive a bit wrinkled and flat, which looks ok, but the shape is really special if you take the time to re-steam it before wearing (my pic is right out of the bag, not steamed). Also has pockets - although only one is really usable since the other is underneath one of the larger ruffles. Fit: not fitted overall so you can go up or down a size without it making much difference. It is quite short, although for me because of the overall modest/covered nature of the shape it balanced out fine. A few quibbles: the arm openings are a little tighter than I’d preter - a lower cut would be more comfortable. Also, the zipper is super short, so you have to put the dress on over your head - it would be so nice, especially with a white dress, if you could step into it rather than dragging it over a face of makeup.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for engagement photos and it was SO COMFORTABLE!
links_reviews_text: Alright, so I ordered 2 sizes. One (the 44) was the right fit, but the bottom had been cut off...like literally the hem wasn't there. I don't know what happened to it before me, but it was all jacked up and was way too short (I'm only 5'2 and my butt cheeks were hanging out while I was standing straight up). I had to wear the 46, which was too big, but still looked good!
Perfect little dress for a casual party. Pair with flat sandals to show off your effortless style and let people wonder how you do it!

Super cute babydoll dress! Fit is overall roomy so size down if you like a more streamlined, shorter look. From the side view it does look like a bit of a tent due to the silhouette and the ruffles so I may not wear this for the beach portraits on vacation as I intended. Very easy to wear, not at all as short as I expected (I'm 5'7" and would wear this comfortably without fear of bending over!). Material is thick so it's more structured than I thought which will be good for windy days, but may be a bit hot in really warm weather. Overall don't hesitate...this dress will flatter most figures and is just adorable on!

This dress was great for a hot day in TN. My only issue is it arrived terribly wrinkled. I ironed the ruffles and steamed the rest but it was still not perfect. Got a lot of compliments regardless and did enjoy the cut /pattern.

I rented this for a fun work event. I had rented other options, and didnt think this would be the winner. Once I put it on I realized no other dress would compare. It was comfortable it was flattering and it was effortless. I barely even needed to do anythinf else. I just were diamond studs and nude stilettos. The party had a national act DJ and I slipped into a pair of vans when it was dance time and could still pull it off. It's versatile and I received a ton of compliments. I love this dress!!
loved the extra drama on the dress was perfect for the sun
Fit is true to size, easy fit. I was afraid of the length being too short, but that was not a problem at all! Super cute dress!

I wore this to a brunch with the girls and it was everything. Very Carrie Bradshaw in the opening scene of SATC the movie. It's very A line so when you're taking photos don't do it straight on so you don't look like a triangle. The ruffles on top are the perfect bit of "extra" so don't also overdo it with accessories and loud shoes. The dress speaks for itself. Loved it and the material felt like a thick linen so it was heavy enough for a rooftop on a slightly cooler day. - Nicole Santa

I rented this dress to wear to a fashion show, and I was absolutely pleased with it. It is fashionable, comfortable, sassy, cute, practical and everything else wrapped up into absolute designer perfection. Ruffles do flap in the wind, so double sided tape under the ruffles would be helpful. The pockets on the dress are a nice added touch.

links_reviews_title: This dress was definitely not something you see every day and I really liked that.
links_reviews_text: The dress does run rather large and I ended up pining it tighter with some double sided tape but over all the dress was a huge hit. I wore it to my bridal shower and got many complements!

links_reviews_title: Surprisingly sexy dress - but get double-sided tape if wearing outside!
links_reviews_text: I was worried this dress would wind up looking like a pile of discarded tissues but it was actually totally cute and sexy. Got tons of compliments, even from strangers. It is short so may not be work appropriate everywhere, but for me it was a great day-to-night piece. One small problem: if you wear this outside, bring double sided tape, because the slightest breeze will blow the front ruffles into your face! (See photo.)
Felt amazing in this dress, so fun and flattering. Note, it wrinkles fast, put on write before you need to wear.
Way too short for me. But cute tunic looking

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for my son's baptism.
links_reviews_text: I was about 2-3 months pregnant and this hid my early belly, looked chic and it HAS POCKETS! It was perfect. Arrived a bit wrinkled (as you can see in the photo) but looked great once I steamed it.

links_reviews_title: Great Dress! Loved it so much, I wanted to keep it!
links_reviews_text: This was a hit! I received lots of compliments and the dress was really comfortable to wear. It is a bit thick with all of the ruffles, but overall so glad I chose it! I loved it so much I wanted to keep it! Best part about the dress was that it had pockets!!!

I rented this for my son's graduation. This dress is absolute perfection. It's unique, beautiful, comfortable & flattering to any body type. And it has pockets!!! I didn't want to send it back. The material is fabulous- not cheap or flimsy at all! I will warn you that the ruffles attack your lips when the wind blows, though. Red lipstick wearers- beware! Lol!

I wasn't really sure about this dress in person bc of how baggy it seemed but went with it anyway. Got a good feedback about it at the event. Pictures with it were hit and miss though. There's no waist definition for a dress like this so if you're not skinny and tall it feels like a risk to be honest. It would be helpful to have to actually dimensions of the dress before renting. Oh

LOVED this dress! Wore to a charity event requiring white attire and it was a hit. I received a ton of compliments and felt gorgeous. The unique design was a head turner. I'm normally a size 12 and the 46 was roomy but worked well. I'm 5'5 and it hit just above the knee.

links_reviews_title: Made me feel like art! Wore to Easter brunch date at Chateau Marmont Hotel in West Hollywood.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Great if you love your arms and legs and not so much your midsection. It really is special and would be great for an art opening, any place you want to stand out and be special, I recommend. I wore red/orange open toed heels and carried the Anya Hindemarch bag from RTR, the one with the construction worker on it.

links_reviews_title: I love the ruffles and fabric.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my son's high school graduation. It was a hit! The fabric was not heavy and the ruffles gave it a fun flair. I received many compliments on this dress. The fit was perfect. It runs large so, I wore a size 4.
Loved this dress. Very comfy and roomy with the cutest details.

links_reviews_title: All-time favorite dress! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: There are not enough words to describe how amazing this dress is! The fabric is a very heavy cotton and there is a pocket! The ruffles are so feminine and there were plenty of them yet I didn't feel swallowed up. The length on me at 5'5" was a few inches above the knee. The bodice fit perfectly and there was so much room to move and it was extremely comfortable. Yet it is so fashionable. I will wear again and do not want to return. LOVE this dress!!!
Little big.. order a size down

I loved this dress! I got to wear really fun shoes while the dress remained simple but fashion forward. It was extremely comfortable because it was light and loose- not tight on any area of my body. I thought this dress would be very short so I originally planned to wear pants under it, however I did not need to as the dress was a modest length.

links_reviews_title: So adorable!! High fashion but comfortable and relaxed!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress!!! I rented it for a trip and I got so many compliments! It is a very relaxed, easy to wear dress. The shoulders are true to size, but the body is very, very loose. If you are small in the shoulders, I would recommend going down a size, maybe two. It also has pockets!! The fabric is a high quality poplin: like the material or a white button down shirt. The ruffles actually lie pretty flat, so they aren't taking over too much. It's pretty sheer, so make sure to wear nude undergarments. I definitely would rent again!!

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately it was too wrinkled to wear. I did not wear it. Love it though.
links_reviews_text: I didn’t wear it.
I wore this to my baby's dedication and got tons of compliments. It was the cutest little fit! It did require steaming because it came very wrinkled.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a museum gala.
links_reviews_text: A truly unique dress; it fit the funky vibe of the gala I attended. Love the pockets! The dress arrived wrinkled so I had to iron it. I'm 5'2. The length was perfect as it showed off my legs.
Beautiful show stopping dress!!
Gets options for tall girls. So flirty and well fitting.
Great dress, very comfortable, backless so a little sexy. I wore braless for a beach vacation and got a ton of compliments.

I absolutely LOVED this dress. I went a size up to be careful/comfortable, and it gave it an even flowier feel. Easy on and off, fabric is light and airy. I'm 5'9" and the Long almost skimmed the floor when I wore sandals. It was perfect for the island wedding I attended. Would definitely purchase this gem.

This dress was beautiful but the top didn't fit at all. Not being able to wear a bra was difficult and the sides gaped wide open. I had to use fabric tape to keep the sides down. I got a lot of compliments and enjoyed wearing it but I probably wouldn't rent it again because of the top.

links_reviews_title: A little long but amazing colors
links_reviews_text: Very nice dress. Wide open back so I wore without a bra. Straps are adjustable but I wish I got the 6

links_reviews_title: Great dress - rent it for a summer party or wedding!
links_reviews_text: Super comfy dress. I am tall (5'10") and wore it with kitten heels and it was great. You cannot wear a normal strapless bra due to the beautiful but low-cut back. I taped my boobs (watched a youtube video) and it totally worked and I was fine all night! Highly recommend for a summer event.

I usually wear a 16 but that wasn't available, so I went for a bigger size and not a smaller one (just in case I would rather have it bigger than too small). It fit awesome with a strapless bra. I did have to pin the dress to by bra in the back (with the help from my husband. And he didn't stick me ha). It was a good length for my 2 inch wedges. I got so many compliments. It was very comfortable and would definitely recommend!!

This dress was gorgeous for a summer wedding! The back is so open that you definitely can't wear a full bra, but the fabric was thick enough that I got away without one. It was a little long for me - I am 5'3" and wore about 2" heels and I had to carry the dress when I walked - overall - WORTH IT!

I am 5"10 and 182 lbs and the 10L was perfect . I am small on top but wider hips and this fit perfect . It's a bit long so if your not tall or wear heels it might be too long. It was sexy and classy . I would wear again!

I love everything about this dress… Except the length. It is ridiculously long! I am 5'5" and I could not deal with wearing gigantic platforms, so I put a hand stitch in the front to hem it a little… Which worked brilliantly! It's a really comfortable fit, and sexy open back and flattering ruffles. So many compliments!

The dress was perfect for the Florida heat! I loved the fit. I only needed to use fabric tape on the side boob area because it could get flappy. I received so many compliments. Would definitely recommend!
This dress was amazing!! So comfortable. Great fit. I received so many compliments and felt great all night. I have a large chest and I am 6 months post partum and this dress helped me feel amazing!

links_reviews_title: This dress is amazing! So flattering and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: This dress is so gorgeous, fits perfectly without needing spanx or anything underneath. You can't wear a bra with it but it doesn't need one. It's perfect! #PerfectEasterDress

links_reviews_title: Absolutely perfect dress for a beach wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was everything I wanted, and I got so many compliments on it. Not only was the dress beautiful, it was comfortable! It does run a little small so I sized up but I could not have been happier. Perfect for a wedding on the beach.

Wore this dress to a high school friend's wedding. Felt like a mini high school reunion and felt like I would have won "best dressed!" You can wear this dress without a bra, but just use some fashion tape for the sides.
I say it runs big because I was able to size down. The day was hot and humid and this dress withstood the elements and was so fun to dance in. 100% would recommend

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and received lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: It poked out a little on the sides under my arms, but wasn't super noticeable. This dress was comfortable and forgiving, long enough I just wore flip flops (I'm 6ft), and was sexy yet fun and also a bit classy-perfect bridesmaid dress for a Hawaiian wedding!
Vibrant colors and flows beautifully. They didn't have my first choice in size, so I had to wear the 16. It was so big! Think my original size would have been perfect.

I sized up in this dress and it worked beautifully. Very comfortable and I didn't need to wear a bra. If you have a smaller bust you likely will need a bra. You could even skip the spanx in this dress :)
Loved this dress. Very light and airy. Went braless. The back is so fun. The ruffles were flattering (to hide post-partum belly).

links_reviews_title: Had a wonderful time wearing this to a friend's wedding!
links_reviews_text: Perfect length for flats (my preference), and overall easy to wear. Definitely need a stick-on bra or pasties, and I could've benefited from a hint of fabric tape while dancing around, but was definitely fine without it. Felt totally comfortable the whole day, and paired it with a simple sweater for coverage when it got chilly.
Perfect for us pregnant girls - I was 34 weeks and wore a size 12. It fit perfectly, wasn't constricting anywhere. Great colors, very comfortable

This was the perfect dress for an outdoor July wedding! So many compliments on the back cutouts. The RTR pictures truly don't do this gorgeous dress justice. You won't be disappointed. I wish I could buy this dress!

This dress fits true to size. I am 5'8, 175 lbs, wear a 10. The 10 R was perfect. I wore flat sandals. The back of this dress is gorgeous, low cut, crisscross straps. I did not wear a bra. I used A LOT of double-sided fabric tape to hold down the side boob area - you will definitely need this. I received a ton of compliments on the dress all night!
Perfect dress for vaca and with adjustable straps it ran true to size.
The back is the best part!!

links_reviews_title: So comfy, beautiful colors, and lightweight material makes this a perfect summer maxi dress
links_reviews_text: The dress fit very well! It can be adjusted on the back to make it a higher cut or lower cut. It was the perfect length on my 5'8" frame. Lightweight breathable material was nice for hot summer weather. I would've purchased it if it wasn't out of my price range!

This is the best dress I've ever worn!! It fit my hourglass shape perfectly. I'm 5'10" and wore the 10L with heels. Was perfect! The cut was sexy...not too much side boob. It moves great when you walk. It's super versatile too! I wore it out for a "day date" lunch w my husband and friends then again for our anniversary dinner. Absolutely love it! I'm really wanting to buy this dress!!

I wore my regular size (0R) and was 23 weeks pregnant. The dress is super flowy & light. Perfect for summer. I got so many complements. I'm 5'4" and the regular length just skimmed the floor with 4" heels. However, you NEED fashion tape for the sides to avoid showing too much up top.

Beautiful print and loved the layered look but the 16r was too long for my 5'3 frame even with two inch heels. Made for someone at least 5'6. The back has adjustable straps which is great but the chest area has too much fabric and left excess material (which is what I point too in the photo). Others have commented on this problem too.

I wore this to dinner and a show and it fit the bill. The top fluttered out on the sides and -even with fashion tape in place - I didn't feel comfortable wearing it without a cardigan. The back is low and it could have been a little bare in the theater anyway. Otherwise the fit was great. It's quite long, so wear your heels!

links_reviews_title: Dress is WAY cuter in person and on. I wore for a wedding and received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I am glad the stylist in store recommended I try it on. I thought it ran a little large. I wore the 10 and probably could have gotten by with and 8. I am about 5'9 and ordered the long. I'm wearing at least 3 inch heels in this picture.

links_reviews_title: Used it for a Mexican wedding!
links_reviews_text: Was a great dress. Perfect for the event! A Mexican wedding. Got a lot of compliments
So fun and fresh. Little small in chest area so be warned if you are bigger up top
Gorgeous colors and easy, breezy, flattering fit! Easy to pack!
Perfect fit with even some room to spare. Fit flowy and comfortably. Great colors very easy to wear and dance in. I wore a mid-height heel and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: I felt gorgeous and got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, hid my stomach really well and I felt super fabulous!! The fabric on the side under my arm, by the breasts, puckered a little but it didn't bother me as much as I thought it would. I had to order the 14L since the regular length wasn't available, it worked out okay but I had to pick it up off the ground all night. I was even wearing 4 inch heels.

I felt so fun and breezy in this maxi dress. I got tons of complements.It's perfect for a summer wedding or summer cocktail attire. I'm 5'4". A size 4 was a little too long to wear flats. I recommend sizing down. I'm usually a 6, which as too big on me. If you are between sizes go with the smaller size. I did use fashion tape to minimize side boob exposure, plus the sides of the cups didn't lay perfectly flat, which I think because I have a large cup size. You can't go wrong with this great pattern and low back.

links_reviews_title: Great summer dress for day party or Cinco de Mayo/Derby party.
links_reviews_text: Was a tad big - could've gone with a 2R - Very flowy and feminine - nice material, etc. Had to wear platform wedges for the length as the straps do not adjust.
This dress is soo stunning in person!!!! It is comfy too, but make sure to make the straps big when you're putting it on, then tighten them. You will love this dress!

I love this dress! It fits TTS, but may be a little short if you're 5'9" like I am! I wore this to a 1 year old's birthday party, and then wore it again to work! I love this dress and pretty much everything shoshanna I will definitely rent this again!
Dress is comfortable. It's a good option on a hot day.
Dress was much shorter than I expected. The thickness of the fabric and the cut in the waist really accentuated my hips in not the most flattering way. Not a great dress to wear with flat shoes.
Very much a barbie dress! I loved it - cut very well.
Wasn't flattering on my short frame - felt that it just made me look wide.
Very flattering and romantic dress. Super cute. Comfortable
Very cute dress. Like how it sits on me. Is short, but not super short. Great for summer outdoor get togethers. Can dress it up w/heels or down w/flat sandals.

links_reviews_title: I felt great in this dress! Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: LOVE this dress! It's not something I would usually wear but I liked it more and more the longer I wore it. Lots of compliments. The skirt has a great swing and some good weight to it. Will definitely wear again.

This dress has way too much fabric and is also weirdly short. The combination gives off an odd vibe. It's not a going out dress because it's too drapey and bulky. It's not a church dress because it's too short. Not a fan of this one.

links_reviews_title: This dress is awesome and I want to own it.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fabric and colors that fits really well and looks expensive. Could be dressed up or down.

links_reviews_title: It's so frilly and fun! The elastic waist makes it very comfortable too.
links_reviews_text: Lightweight and forgiving, I loved it!
The fit is awesome and it is stretch so super comfortable!

links_reviews_title: It was a great print and color for a night out on vacay.
links_reviews_text: Had to size down. Was so comfy and cute!
Cute dress, but too short for me (and I am only 5'4).
Perfectly shoshanna. Easy to wear with flats or heels, lunch or dinner.
I wore this dress for brunch with girlfriends, to a birthday party, and on vacation to Nantucket! It was just so comfortable and easy, while also looking put together
Definitely would have been better off in the size 8, but I couldn't pass up the opportunity to wear this. The only downside is that it is very short.
Didn't wear
Flirty, fits well,
This is a very cute dress, great color, but was unfortunately too short so I could not wear it.

links_reviews_title: I didn't even wear this. The fit was so off. The torso is so small the waist comes up to your chest.
links_reviews_text: Looks frumpy even on a 5 foot 6 , 120 pound frame.

Ordered this on a whim for my formal and it turned out amazing. I'm tall so the regular was a little short with heels but not too bad. Really nice material that has a bit of a texture so it spices up the plain black look. Perfectly fitted up top for a small bust.

links_reviews_title: B.E. A. S.H.E.R.O. Foundation.org annual fundraiser was epic
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly on my 140lb, 5'10 frame
I could have maybe went with a large because in my busy area it was a little too big... the fabric felt great and had just a little stretch to it...
Fit great and was flattering. Only downside is I couldn't wear a bra but there was good support in the dress and I never felt like o might pop out.

This dress fit beautifully! Perfect length with heels. Love that the zipper/back goes all the way up in a racerback so the front stays put and is very flattering. The material has a subtle texture to it making it look very high quality. I got lots of compliments!

RTR accidentally sent the wrong length of this dress (regular instead of long). Customer support was amazing in getting me a few other options in time for the event, but I ended up wearing the regular length as it hit high enough to look intentional. The dress runs true to size and is a nice heavy material.
Very flattering and the material feels very high quality.

links_reviews_title: When you look like a million bucks, you feel like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: The top part of the dress was a tad loose, but that is due to some recent weight-loss and going from a C cup to a B cup. The fit was great and the dress was very comfortable. I can't even count how many compliments I received wearing this gorgeous dress!
True to size, great fit and structured fabric
The dress was extremely comfortable, easy to move in and material was perfect. I have a small chest so the fabric pointed out a bit near the seam in the chest, but other than that it was perfect

links_reviews_title: Got many compliments and absolutely loved the look of it!
links_reviews_text: I am 5 4 about 110 and it fit great. Little long but I wore heels and it looked fine! I wore this dress to a black tie wedding and absolutely loved it!
Fit great, very forgiving in problem areas and didn't even need a bra!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments! Is so simple and classic, yet so stylish.
links_reviews_text: Fits properly everywhere. The sinch in the waist allowed it to give me shape, but the bottom part wasn't too tight it showed off my curves perfectly. Also, loved that it wasn't too tight around the areas on the sides where it had the slits. Nothing was bulging out.

links_reviews_title: This dress was great for a black tie event!
links_reviews_text: Came into rent the runway the day before a last minute black tie event and luckily found this dress! The overall fit was pretty good. For me the top was a little large but was able to pin the shoulders so the top was more fitted. It was slightly long but I'm only 5'0 so that was expected and with heels on it wasn't as long as I expected. Got tons of compliments, would definitely recommend!

I liked this dress a lot however I felt it was big in the stomach and chest area. I did not fill in the chest part therefore there was a lot of gapping. I had to use two sided tape to keep it from exposing me. Made it for sort of an annoying night trying to keep myself covered.

I wore this dress to a black tie gala. I probably should have ordered a size 4 but I managed to squeeze into the size 2. The length was perfect and I didn't need to wear a bra and stayed in place all night.
Fit perfect. I think if you don't have the right sized boobs it could be funny in the bust, but I thought it fit me perfect. It was the perfect amount of classy and sexy.
Fit a bit loose but made it comfortable and allowed me to eat w/o looking bloated in the gown! The thicker fabric was forgiving of body bumps so I was able to wear it w/o undergarments.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress; a little sexy while still comfortably covered up!
links_reviews_text: I should have sized down, instead of up. (But I was feeling bloated when I ordered, so what can you do?). The dress was noticeably loose, and a small probably wouldn’t have dragged on the ground so much. But all in all, very comfortable. No need to wear a bra, the girls were secured simply by the way the bodice is constructed.
Sexy and classy, wish I could keep it! It did run a little long but that didn't bother me enough to not wear it since it fit perfectly everywhere else!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! It was simple, but sexy. Got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: It was slightly big in the top, but I just wore plunge neckline stickies and it solved the issue. Material has a slight texture that I didn't see in the picture, but it's beautiful and adds a little more interest to the dress. Would wear again for sure!

I'm petite at 5'0, 112lbs so I was hesitant to rent a long dress for my husband's Doctor Prom. Once I got a hold of some fashion tape, the dress worked out great! I wish I had a better picture of this dress. I had a lot of compliments! One thing, it's a slim fit (I wore my normal size of small as the x-small was tight on my hips).
Dress was great! Would order again for sure. Only issue was it's not exactly made for a straight and narrow bogey. Got some "wow"s though

Fabric has a light texture that makes it feel more luxurious. I thought I would be an XS but the dress is fitted through the hips/butt and the XS turned out to be too small for me! I was glad I had gotten a size S based on prior reviews. It fit perfectly! Gorgeous gown that looks and feels amazing!
The dress fit like a glove, super comfortable, sleek and fancy

links_reviews_title: Very flattering! I felt so beautiful!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful, sexy and fit like a glove in all the right places.
It wasn't my favorite. It was fine. Fit well. The "WOW" factor is not there. I wasn't super excited about it as I have been with all others I've rented.
Dress made me look and feel beautiful.. the small fit but didn't feel as comfortable so I sized up to the medium and was so glad I did.
Beautiful dress and I received lots of compliments. Bust ran a little big and because of the cut you can’t wear a bra. Great dress if you have curves. I’d rent again.
Only negative is the length, very long!
Dress was super soft and comfy. The boobs are kind of pointy but that's just the style of the dress. LOVED wearing this.
This dress fit beautifully and hugged all the right places! I would rent this dress again!

This was my back up! My boyfriend voted for it over the others, because it is a show stopper. My top is smaller than my hips so I had to be careful nothing popped out of the top. I used silicone sticky bras from Target to cover/lift a little. You can’t see the side cleavage from the photo, but it’s definitely there. I would rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Made me feel pretty even while pregnant
links_reviews_text: I was 18 weeks pregnant and wanted to be AE to show my bump so I didn't just look "fat". I went with the small because it was tighter in the bust even though a little tighter elsewhere. But it fit great and looked great. I am about 5'7" and was able to wear with heels in the regular length and changed to flip flops and I didn't step on it. The fabric is pretty thick so it stays in place but does have some stretch to it. I loved it and felt great in it!

I ended up going with the medium over the small due to the small being a little tight on the hips. I don't have much for a chest so it was loose up top, had to wear a sticky bra. The fabric does make your boobs look pointy but once you get past that it is a beautiful dress! I received a lot of compliments. It was my first RTR and I will definitely be using them again!

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Received a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a formal dinner and dance. The dress was comfortable to wear all night and dance in. The length was perfect for me to wear 3" heels. The top was a little loose on me but nothing a little tape couldn't fix! Overall it was a great dress!
The dress was not flattering to me in the chest area.

links_reviews_title: The perfect sexy black dress for a classy/relaxed attire wedding!
links_reviews_text: The dress was a hit! It fit great (minus being a little loose in the bust...better suited for a D cup. I’m a 36c.) Other than that is was super comfortable and flattering. I received lots of compliments and felt beautiful!

I was worried it would be too low cut but given how small my chest is it didn't seem gratuitous. I should have gotten a long length but it wasn't available at the time of rental. Also, the bust is sewn so there are pointy darts. For someone with a fuller chest it would probably fill those out and they wouldn't look so pointy. Overall a great dress I would wear again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect cross between elegant and sexy!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I received so many compliments. The fit is pretty true to size. The top ran big on me (at the shoulders) but it worked! I would rent this again in a heartbeat!
Rented this for a gala and wish I had gotten more pictures of it on that night. Received so many compliments and felt really good in it overall. I'm almost always a size 8 and this 8 fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress! People were telling me I looked gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: The fit was form fitting and perfect. the straps were a little big and kept falling off my shoulders but that was the only negative feedback I have. I loved that the fabric had stretch to it. I would absolutely get this dress again for another event!

links_reviews_title: Received many compliments on this dress! This was my first time renting from Rent the Runway!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect! I rented this for a wedding and would definitely rent again! I loved the open shoulder concept. Very comfortable and it wasn't to short for dancing.
Loved this dress! Lots of compliments, I should have steamed the bottom hem.
I was afraid from some of the reviews that it would be too small but I would say it's true to size. I wore a strapless bra. Super comfy material. Just perfect!!
I rented this for a company Christmas party. It is true to size, and fit so comfortably! I received many compliments all night- Highly recommend!
The v cut back is sexy, and the booty is accentuated with slit. Sleeves are so fun and arms look skinny! Might be overly tight for muscular/bigger arms!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but don't order size 14 issue with hem
links_reviews_text: Could not wear because the hem was bunched up. I had tried 12 under my unlimited program and the arms were a little snug so I ordered the 14 for a special event thinking it would fit perfect. So disappointed!

Wore this for a women's conference as I was the volunteer at registration. It was tighter than I expected but great dress and I got some many compliments due t the fun sleeves. I would definitely size up!

Ordered both the 6 and 8 for a late afternoon-evening wedding in Monterey, CA. The material is so forgiving that I could have worn the 6, however personally chose the 8. It's a great, thick material and accentuates all the right places. I wore with a nude studded heel (thanks to the Bride!!) but this could easily be worn with a black strappy sandal or a pump. I would DEFINITELY wear this dress again.

Unfortunately, I was unable to wear this dress because the straps were way too long and the back of the dress under the bum was droopy and bubbly around the seam. I am happy I was able to order a free second choice because I wore that dress and was very happy with it.

Loved loved loved this dress! I got so many compliments about how classy it was! The sleeves are definitely dramatic and make a statement. It is a thick fabric and lined, so it was quite warm, but very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Great and a good mix for a formal work event
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress. Fit well and was a good mix of formal, and work appropriate, as I needed for a formal work event.

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress! You really should try this one!!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a dinner party, and it did not disappoint!! The sleeves were fun, but did not get in the way! The fit was true to size. The material was comfortable, and had a nice weight to do it! I received many compliments all evening!

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove! A gorgeous dress with elegant lines --I got compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. Extremely comfortable and perfect for a winter wedding.

links_reviews_title: It was an amazing dress ! I received so many compliments ❤️! Love it
links_reviews_text: It was a great fit for me ! However, the arms can run small ! Things to consider

This dress fit like a perfect glove. The sleeves were dramatic. I wrote this to a wedding in Wisconsin in February and was so happy that the material was heavy enough and comfortable in colder weather. Would rent this one again.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel beautiful and allowed me to express my true style.
links_reviews_text: The fit of the dress was great. I am self conscious about my arms and was able to show my shoulder while covering the parts of my arms that I don't care for. The only negative item was the length of the strap was a bit long for my personal taste but was easily fixed with fashion tape.
True to size. The fabric was thick, perfect for a winter wedding. I received so many compliments. I'd absolutely rent this dress again. The sleeves added an extra, unexpected flair.

links_reviews_title: Fun spin on a cocktail dress
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! The sleeves make it different and fun at a cocktail party
Dress is of high quality and looked Great! However straps kept falling down so had to use a necklace in back to tighten straps.

links_reviews_title: Classy and sexy dress but uncomfortable and straps kept falling down.
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing this dress for a work party. It looks very nice but again difficult to find a bra that works with it. I ended up wearing it with an adhesive bra so the back strap wouldn’t show. This is what made the dress so uncomfortable. I ended up fighting with the straps of the dress most of the night as they kept falling off my shoulders. I only wore it for 3 to 4 hours so it wasn’t too bad. I didn’t realize the back was cut as deep as it is. If you don’t have to wear a bra this would be a very comfortable dress however, the that is not possible for me.

I really liked that this dress covered up my arm flab. Sleeves were fun and weren't too tight as I feared they might be. Dress seemed a little tight because it got all twisted up when I put it on. Only wore it a couple of hours but felt confident and classy in it.

This dress was made from a heavy material that will keep you warm and is forgiving where you need it. I opted for the 0 instead of my normal 2 because it bunched around my waist and wearing the 0 I could get away with not wearing a bra. Tight but stretchy material that allows for dancing and fun! :)

links_reviews_title: Great winter dress - a few flaws
links_reviews_text: This ran true to size but was a bit snug. I could've gone up a size for a more loose fit bit then the back and straps were too baggy. The hem had a little bubble to it (like someone had used the iron tape on it before and it wouldn't quite go back to normal). The straps fell on me often but my shoulders aren't very big.

The arms were a little snug on me, but I'm a weight lifter, so that wasn't a surprise. The size up (10) did fit better in the arms but the waist was too loose so I went with the best fit in the waist. No need for spanx as the fabric was thick. My husband loved this on me.

This was an awesome dress. Covers up while remaining sexy- the material is thick and good quality- I couldn't have been happier! The back is a bit lower which really shows off your shoulders and upper back. I received a lot of compliments. Only drawbacks- I have muscular arms and had problems raising my arms above my head. Bit tight through there. I wore the 4 over the size 6- I'm generally in the 4-8 range in sizing. I highly recommend this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Be a celeb for a night!
links_reviews_text: I seriously felt like a celebrity for a night. Great fit, very comfortable and the most compliments I have received on an outfit. My husband took one look and said: "you might have to buy that one!"

I wore this dress to my work gala. I loved it and wish it was in my wardrobe! It is a super high quality dress. For very well. Was simple and elegant with a bit of flair with the sleeves. I got a ton of compliments. You do have to be careful with what you wear underneath. A tight dress slip worked very well. But when I tried it on with other types of shapewear it was super clingy and didn't hang right. I loved it though and may rent it again!
I found this to fit true to size, it's comfortable too.

I wore this to the Save the Children Gala in NYC. I received a lot of compliments on the dress. It was easy to move around in and sit for a long period of time. It is a great dress if you are tall (I'm 5'9") - the proportions are perfect.

A little tighter in the tummy than I normally prefer, but love the look of this dress, so bringing with me on vacation to wear for my wedding anniversary date night. Sleeves are awesome. Heavy fabric.

I ordered this dress in 2 sizes and was right between the two, so I chose to wear the size up. It was so comfortable and fit well. I got SO many compliments on this dress! It looked great for a fall wedding and the material was thicker than it looks, so it kept me from feeling cold while outside at the reception. My only complaint was that, since I wore the bigger size, the straps across my shoulders were loose. But it wasn't anything that a little fashion tape didn't fix. I also loved that since the neckline of the dress was so high, I didn't feel like I had to wear a necklace! I just wore some dangly earrings and didn't bother. As someone who HATES dress shopping/dressing up, I loved that this dress was fancy and fun, but didn't require me to do much additional work to look "put together."

This dress is very flattering. I do wish I had used wardrobe tape to hold up the shoulder straps. As seen in the second photo, they slip down, decreasing the cuteness of the neck/shoulder detail. Great rental which garnered many compliments.
I wore this for an event and felt beautiful and received so many compliments! So comfortable too!

I loved this dress! The material was thick and super flattering. I received so many compliments and felt amazing all night! The back comes down a little low so I wore a stick-on backless bra and it was perfect!
This dress is very flattering!
This dress is super flattering, fits snug but not spandex looking. Sooooo many compliments! I loved loved it! Would definitely rent again!

I wore the size 14 for a good fit in the bust. I am a full 36DD. I thought the sleeves would be an issue but they were actually the coolest part of the dress. The dress was warm enough for a wedding on a Boston Pier.

links_reviews_title: Elegant, sophisticated, and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: I give this dress a 10/10! The fit was impeccable, the fabric was just stretchy enough/clung in all the right places, and I felt sexy without being overdone. I wore this to my 20 year high school reunion and received many compliments! For my first RTR experience, it went great.
Cute together. Little midriff shows

links_reviews_title: Pink linen and white lace perfection!
links_reviews_text: This top is perfect for a warm afternoon out! I wore it with the matching skirt and loved it! The top would be perfect with some high waisted white pants, I may keep it so I can wear it again. It fits well but is definitely cropped. Must rent ladies!

Fitting true to size, I love this off the shoulder top! The detailing is so cute, and I could wear with any white or denim bottom. The quality is not as good as the price tag suggest, but i would definitely recommend for anyone who wants a pop of color and likes showing off their shoulders! I wore it with a nude strapless bra and it worked great.

Very girly girl top....I ended up wearing it 4 times! Mainly worn with 9" high rise skinny jeans. For day outfits worn with denim shorts or skirt. Need to wear a nude bra because of top neckline cut outs. So many compliments! It's definitely a crop top and I had narrowed bottom options in that I needed to wear my highest rise in order to eliminate showing midriff.

Cute as can be, but did not feel juvenile or shabby chic - just the right amount of adorable. Sized up so I wasn't worried about too-tight elastic or too much middriff. Fit nicely - comfy and pretty. Made it an outfit complete with the belted skirt. (Though, I wish these simply came together so I was not 'spending' two of my unlimited slots). Wore the ensemble in Santorini to match the sunset. Completely loved it. If it weren't 55 degrees at home, I'd be keeping it for another wear or five!
This black blouse with interesting feathers on the sleeves was comfortable, classy, and chic.

links_reviews_title: It had such a great fit! People could tell us was designer. Wore it for a work event!
links_reviews_text: People could tell it was designer. Since I wore to a work party I didn't dress it up much. I think it would look so great tucked into a skirt
Tighter across the chest and shoulders so size up. Arms are a little long but that didn't bother me. The details on the sleeves are absolutely beautiful. Love!
Gorgeous detail in the embroidered sleeves. The sleeves run a little long and small across the chest, but material is comfortable and great quality.
Heavy fabric, beautiful design. Too warm for the inferno in SoCal even at night or in AC as it doesn't breathe and I got too hot trying it on.

I really like this top and was able to wear it to work and to drinks in the city. The sleeves are VERY long and covered half my hand which is the style and is very pretty but I had to flip them up when eating or typing to get them out of the way. The sleeves have plenty of room but the top is not super long and if you are broader in the shoulders you might want to size up. I would rent again, I received a lot of compliments!
Just didn't quite fit right. Sleeves were very long

The sleeves on this shirt are crazy long. Even with the cuffs rolled my hands barely peeked out. It didn't fit like on the model, and I'm fairly close to her size. Rented for a work event and ended up wearing a black T-shirt because there was no way to wear this and maintain use of my arms.
Amazing and glam shirt. Dressed down with black jeans. So many compliments

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear just tried it on Sleeves are too long
links_reviews_text: The sleeves are way too long Didn't wear just tried it on and it looked very funny with such long sleeves. Otherwise the material is very nice and the shirt is very fancy

Wore this for work and felt dressy, but not overdone. I could see this being really dressed up though as well! Quality piece and beautiful detail on the sleeves and loved the neckline. Yes, the sleeves are long, however all you need to do is cuff them and they look perfect. Fits true to size - great piece.
Wore this to work, wonderful statement piece

links_reviews_title: I wore this with a flowered Prabul Gurung skirt to a holiday party.
links_reviews_text: Interestingly, while I felt like the skirt I wore with this was the most interesting part of the outfit, I got more compliments on the top. It fits perfectly and true to size.
It was way too big for me, but I wanted to try this style to go with black leather leggings. Oh well! It was nice quality.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing it.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves are too long for my arms.
This is the cutest top ever. Worn to dinner for my birthday and got so many compliments. Will be renting again. Got a 12 originally but the arms were super long. The 10 was perfect.
Great but very long sleeves
Sleeves were too long. Size was a 14 and fit well in some ways and terrible in others. Did not wear.

This dress - one word SHOWSTOPPER. I wore this to a Gala and it didn't disappoint. A little long on me even with heals but I made it work. Keep in mind there's plastic boning to keep it up. So be ready for good posture!! I didn't want to send it back !!!

I rented this for a wedding when I was 32 weeks pregnant. I usually wear a size 10/12, 36D. With pregnancy I was a 38G. So had trouble finding a dress that fit my busy without making me feel like I was wearing a trash bag. This dress is a thick, stretchy fabric but well made so lays well. It hugged in the right way and was super flattering. I got so many compliments.

I chose this for a fundraising dinner that was "Black Tie Optional." This dress is not restrictive at all. The material has some give to it so sitting isn't uncomfortable. I didn't even have to wear Spanx. I would suggest wearing 4"+ heels with the Regular length if you're 5'4" or shorter. I wore a strapless bra with this and felt that the neckline was very appropriate. It was sexy without being very revealing. Tasteful cleavage I call it. In every day clothes I'm a 14 but I always go up to a 16 in formal wear b/c I have fairly broad shoulders + a fairly large chest and this was spot on for me. The neckline and sleeves have a silicone on the inside to help keep them in place. I didn't have to fidget with the dress at all. It stayed perfectly in place. It's a show stopper for sure. So if you don't mind getting lots of eyes looking your way this is the dress for you.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on the dress.
links_reviews_text: Great option for busty ladies. I was able to go without a bra even with my large bust (40G) as there is boning in the dress. Material falls nicely except for the zipper—it puffs out at the base of the zipper. It wasn’t very noticeable to others but it bothered me.

I absolutely love this dress! I don't usually wear red, so I ordered the blue as a back up but didn't even end up trying it on. The best part is that it was so incredibly comfortable! The fabric is luxurious and I felt like a star at the Hollywood Bash charity gala!

I am 6 ft and always have a hard time finding long enough dresses. So glad I got this as a back up because my primary dress was too short (go figure!) I wore it with flats and the length was perfect! I also had so many complements! This dress is absolutely beautiful, fits very well and was comfortable all evening. Highly recommend; you won't be disappointed!
I am 5'2" 125 lbs and bra size 32 DD. I felt like this dress showed just enough cleavage. No bra needed. It was very comfortable and easy to dance in. Didn't want to send it back!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a gala or black tie event!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful. I have large tatas & this held up the girls up without a bra wonderfully! Very comfortable dress with boning that helps shape the dress.

This dress has some stretch to it which made for a perfect fit. The process was so easy and nobody else had the same dress at the event. I received compliments on the dress all night and I was very comfortable.
True to size-was just a little long for me!
Beautiful dress, very flattering. This was my backup dress but my husbands preferred choice. Worn for Christmas party.
The fit was nice and snug in all the right places. It surprised me how beautiful it looked considering I am plus sized!

I am 15 weeks pregnant and needed a dress that would compliment the bump! I had so many compliments from people all night and felt so confident in the dress! Reading reviews of other moms-to-be really sold me on this gorgeous number! Perfect for any formal or holiday party!

Beautiful dress. Well constructed. I'm typically a size 4. I'm 5'4" and with 4 inch heels the length was perfect. The boning in the dress kept it in place all evening. It has a little stretch to it which make is very comfortable. I will definitely rent this again!
I ordered two different dresses, similar style. I am glad I did. I liked them both but this one was conservative as I was looking for a gown for a church benefit. It was very flattering as well!

I LOVED this dress!! I love that the fabric is thicker, so perfect when it's cooler outside. It is TTS. And i feel like this dress would look fabulous on all body types. This dress made me feel like Julia Roberts in Pretty Woman, which has always been my dream. What's funny is that this was my backup dress and it stole my heart when i put it on. Don't hesitate to get it!!
I loved how it had a stretch fit! Really hugs your body and brings out your curves! I loved this dress!
I wore this as Maid of Honor. It was stunning! Perfect for a Hollywood glam look. I felt like Julia Roberts in "Pretty Woman."
The fit was great! I was concerned that it would not work well with curves but it did!

The dress fit like a glove and was the perfect length. Glad I got the long as a regular would have been too short with heels on (I'm 5'8.5" barefoot). The lining around the hips and bottom is stretchy and gave easily so I could move, dance and breathe freely. The shoulders stayed put thanks to a rubber-ish lining. Loved the color, too! Felt like the belle of the ball!
Perfect for an hourglass shape. The red is stunning and stands out in a sea of black and navy. Loved, loved, loved this dress so much.
Love this dress! Beautiful, slimming, classy, sexy, and bold. Also not uncomfortable!!

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel absolutely amazing!! I was getting complements all night!
links_reviews_text: It hugged my body perfectly. I didn't need to wear a bra with it and found that the dress was structured really well. It was about 5 inches too long, but I was able to temporarily take the hem up using hemming tape purchased on amazon with no damage done to the dress. This dress is so classic and just stunning in person, and the color is really eye-catching. I wish I could own this dress and would absolutely order it again!
I wore this for a red gala charity event. I recommend slimming undergarments. I got a lot of compliments and was pleased with the dress. I went a size up from normal to avoid pulling.

links_reviews_title: I was unable to get my second size but they sent a different gown option so that was a helpful touch
links_reviews_text: Dress was gorgeous, received many compliments and felt beautiful.

I wore this for a black tie wedding & it was an absolute hit! The dress has multiple layers so I didn't feel the need to wear shape wear. It hugs you in all the right places with just the right amount of stretch! A perfect fit for a curvy build.

This dress is STUNNING! I am 5'6" and wore heals and rented the petite dress. I would definitely recommend the petite dress if you are a similar height. The dress never felt like it was going to fall either. Honestly I felt like a million bucks. The only thing that was annoying is that one of the supports kept poking me in ribs (but with a quick adjustment, it was an easy fix).

I wore this to my friend's wedding in Sydney, Australia. This dress was movie star gorgeous. It's sexy without being vulgar. It gapped a little bit on top, but a couple of pieces of Hollywood tape fixed that. So many compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and flattering, lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: The 4L and 6R both fit but the 4L was just too long so I wore the 6R.
It has built in spanx material which was super nice! It fits snug but it's a stretchy kind of material so it was really comfortable all night long. I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, got lots of compliments. Very “Pretty Woman”
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress, if you’re over 5’7” get the long. I was ok in flats or barefoot but with heels it was a little short. Very comfortable and stretchy. Fit like a glove. Didn’t have any issues with it sliding down or anything either.
I wore this fabulous red gown to a black tie wedding. It was very comfortable and absolutely gorgeous! Quality material, highly recommend. (I'm 5'7", 125 lbs, pants size 4, 32DD.)

I was so relieved that this dress fit me and that it came in petite sizes, I am 4’ 11 3/4” and have a large bust (34G) and was worried that it would be too long or wouldn’t fit my boobs. It fit perfectly though and I was able to go without a bra and still feel comfortable. I also wore 2” heels and it was the perfect length. It was a stretchy material as well so it was comfortable to sit in and easy to use the restroom in (lol). The sweetheart neckline was very flattering and the color was a beautiful true red. I got so many compliments and I loved how I looked in this dress, would definitely recommend it!! Thanks RTR! ❤️
Fit perfectly & made me feel so elegant, like Julia Roberts in Pretty Woman! Highly recommend this dress!

Wore this dress at 32 weeks pregnant and felt great in it! I wore a size 6 pre-pregnancy and went up to a size 10R in this dress to accommodate the bump. It was fairly comfortable, but a little less so when sitting down. I had one issue with the boning in the dress around the neckline bending in an odd direction and exposing the inside of the dress slightly, but it wasn't very noticeable. Overall, I was very pleased with my RTR experience and this dress!
Fit is true to size. I wore a size 4

This fit like a dream. No shapewear necessary - great thick stretchy fabric. I'm 6'0" and size 6 pre-pregnancy. The 6L fit beautifully and was stretchy enough to accommodate my bump (18 weeks with twins) and weight gain. I wish I'd also had the 8L just for comparison's sake. Would definitely rent again for a formal occasion.

links_reviews_title: Julia Roberts' Pretty Woman moment in this dress! Felt like a million bucks. It's so flattering.
links_reviews_text: I joined RTR for this occasion and had my eye on this dress, but in royal blue. The blue option was pretty much always unavailable through my unlimited membership (so frustrating), so I tried several other dresses. I found a few really great options, but none of them seemed like "the one." I finally decided to try this dress, unsure if red was appropriate for a summer evening (black tie) wedding, or if I even wanted to stand out that much in a sea of LBDs. The moment I put it on I knew it was the one! I'm pretty curvy, busty and still carrying some extra baby weight (2 years later). This dress did wonders for my figure. It was flattering without shapewear, but even more so with. It made my mom bod look like my pre-mom bod. The neck line (on my small shoulders) was so flattering. I received SO many compliments throughout the night and they continue rolling in on my photos. I was able to eat, drink, dance and feel totally comfortable all the while. The length, in 3.5 inch wedges, was almost perfect on my 5'4 frame. The front of the dress did graze the ground and I did have to lift it sometimes to avoid tripping. I'm happy to say that apparently red is very appropriate year round. There were a few other women at this very formal wedding also looking fab in red, but I still loved my dress the best. My only real issue was one that had been mentioned in other reviews of this dress and the royal blue option - there is sharp plastic boning that has managed to puncture the dress in some spots and if/when it works its way out while you're wearing it, it will STAB you in the torso or back! Fortunately, this happened while I was trying it, so I was able to work it back in before the event. Otherwise, it would have been a real pain - literally! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS DRESS, especially to those who've ever wondered what it's like to feel like Julia Roberts in Pretty Woman. "I liked it so much, I almost peed my pants."
This was my back up dress for a friend's 50th birthday gala. It fit so well that I ended up wearing it! The fit is true to size and fit like a glove. This dress made me feel so glamorous.

Pretty woman vibes all night long! Loved this dress! I received so many compliments, it was crazy. Definitely hugs your curves and smoothes them out. It's made of a heavy, stretchy material that really helps suck you in, and also has boning around the rib cage, so it provides some structure. I wore the 8L, and I'm 5'8. Perfect length with a 3 inch heel even. I am a 34DD, and I did not wear a bra, probably couldn't have fit one even if I wanted to! But the dress had plenty of support, so it wasn't even an issue. I would normally have rented the 10L, but it wasn't available. The 8L worked out better than I could have imagined. Seriously felt like the belle of the ball! Will definitely rent again!
This was a great dress for going out in NYC! It is very short-great for showing off legs! The only issue is that it is a bit big on top.
Comfortable, stretchy, swanky! So many compliments.

Wore this to a night out in Boston for cocktails and a concert. I can't describe just how amazing this dress is, but it dropped jaws and made me feel like a sexy Mortal Kombat rockstar. The leather is supple and almost has a stretch to it, the waist band is wide and comfortable, making the cut incredibly flattering. The length is perfect for mid thigh (5'7"). Only concern was the deep V neckline, I wore a black plunge bra that peeked out here and there accidentally but wasn't too much of an issue. I definitely would rent this again and recommend it if you want instant outfit confidence.

This dress fit just fine but the bust area is big. I'm a 32DD so I would have expected to fill it out. I didn't need up wearing it but only because I liked my other dress a little better. It's a great dress for a party!
This dress was a huge hit and made me feel very sexy. One tip - it gets super short with the slit, so I wore solid briefs underneath to keep everything under wraps

links_reviews_title: Sexy dress but not too revealing
links_reviews_text: Sexy dress

The material of the dress was amazing. The cuts and shape were unique. There are shoulder pads, but I thought they worked with the dress to add some structure to the shoulders. It's not a showstopper or a wow dress, but I loved it. It was a little tight getting it over my head to put it on, so I'd recommend doing hair, eyelashes, heavy makeup after the dress is on. Also, it's not the easiest dress to get out of. It's not hard to get out of, but if part of your plan for the night involves sexily slipping out of this dress, that will be a challenging task. It runs big in the chest, but I was able to adjust it with a couple safety pins to connect the bottom layer to my bra to keep it in place.

I was really excited about the idea of wearing a $1300 leather dress, since it isn't something I'd usually wear (at least not without RTR Unlimited!) I was worried the 4 would be too tight in the hips but it worked. I didn't find the cut super flattering though. It was way too big up top, so I wore a black bandeau to cover my chest. I'm not tall but it was plenty short on me.

Luxurious soft thick leather quality zipper up the side. Not a lot of give a touch snug in the ribs. Gives illusion of hour glass figure. Forgiving dress. A little open/loose in the chest but worked for Vegas. Comfortably short for a petite. I thought about sizing down for the upper 1/2 but it wasn't available to try on
Great sillhouette. Nice fabric: great statement piece. Good price
Fits like a glove.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't feasibly wear this dress to an event due to the unusual structure.
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful and comfortable. However, a fatal flaw is that there is way too much room on the upper level. Even if my bust was large enough to sufficiently fill out the top, I don't think I'd be able to get it on in the first place (because then it would be too difficult to slip on through the waist). Unless I'm missing something beyond the partial side zipper, the ratio that would suit this dress wouldn't be able to get it on in the first place.

links_reviews_title: Very cute, a little tough to get on
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress when I tried it on! Unfortunately, I didn't get a chance to wear it, which is actually ok with me. I had a hard time getting it on since there is no give. I wish the zipper went a little higher. The top is very wide, so anybody with a small bust would need to wear a bralette underneath. I did have a panic moment when I tried to take it off and realized it wasn't going to be easy.

The shoulder pads weren't properly sewn in so that was odd, and the waist was sort of crooked which made it very unflattering. I also thought it would be a little bit lower cut and all the fabric around the neck was too much. Bummer though, so I didn't wear it.

This leather dress is a 10/10. The leather is so soft and supple. Very easy to dress up or down, just an overall great piece. I wore a 36 (US 4). The bottom half fit me spot on but the top as a little loose- I always wore with something underneath. I think a 34 (2) would've been too tight on the bottom but perfect on top.
Was to small on 36B/-29" waist-39" hips, I couldn't zip up side, I probably needed 38, material feels like luxurious leather, but no stretch & waist i think very restrictive , will try it in 38

links_reviews_title: This dress was comfortable and stunning.
links_reviews_text: The fit is snug but comfortable. The zipper does get stuck, but with a little patience and wiggle it will zip up. I would rent it again, as I received a ton of compliments.

This dress was gorgeous, sexy but sophisticated. Beautiful high-quality fabric and detail. I would gladly rent this dress again. Perfect for a formal affair. The fabric does not have a lot of give and you will likely need help zipping up the back.
I did not end up wearing. Too much cleavage for my comfort and to keep the eyes talking to my face

Rented this for a coworkers birthday party and it was perfect! Received so many complements. Definitely a lot of cleavage if you have a larger chest, but the mesh makes it a little more modest. The top is also pretty tight, so you feel very secure. Didn't need a bra, but did wear spanx to smooth out my tummy and thighs.

links_reviews_title: Easy fit, easy comfort. Perfect for our annual extended family holiday photos
links_reviews_text: Its a surprisingly forgiving enough fabric. I usually run XS in the top so I ordered the 2 and it had enough room for the hips where I'm normally a 4.

links_reviews_title: Perfect balance between comfort and style!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress-- it fit a little big, floated off my body a bit. But nothing to be concerned about. Wore it without a bra and was surprisingly comfortable. Would definitely wear again if the occasion presented itself!

links_reviews_title: Loved this! It was so flattering. Classy but sexy at the same time. Tons of compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Lined, so everything stayed in place. Did not need a bra. Would have preferred it a tiny bit shorter but still thought it was a perfect choice for the event.

I'm glad read the other reviews on this dress and sized up because the 8 fit well, and a 6 would have been too small. I love the length of this dress...I'm not super into dresses to hit much above the knee, and I like that this plunging neckline has some mesh over it to create a little bit of modesty. I went without a bra here and as someone who has naturally saggier breasts (always have), I think I can pull this off without any pasties, etc. The mesh around the neck is a little bit scratchy but not enough to make me send it back without wearing to my event. I expect to get a lot of compliments on this dress.

Loved this dress so much! Everything from the details of the flowers and piping, to the color and fit. Got so many compliments - it was flattering on my curves and was the perfect length. I would say that it does draw attention to your chest, so take note of that if you're wearing it to a work party, etc. You won't regret renting this one!

Very pretty dress, a bit too open in the front for my taste so I tried it with a bandeau. I decided not to wear it because it was soooo scratchy at the neckline. It was almost painful. It's true to size and a very nice fit.
Hugged all my curves and flaunted my chest. Sexy with class!
Felt very sexy and eye catching while still being appropriate for a work holiday party. Went braless and was still comfortable.
Rented this for a holiday work party. This was the perfect dress for the event; it is a touch sexy but still classy.

links_reviews_title: Loved it but had a hole in mesh
links_reviews_text: Stunning dress and will rent again so I can wear. Mesh had a hole in it. Shame on me for not checking before needing to get dressed. I am a 32 dd and 6 was a bit large in top so I would rent a 4 next time
Fit was perfect and slimming. Very good quality with gorgeous details. I got compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved the dress. Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: A little too low cut for me

This dress definitely looks better in person than it does in a picture. The fit is very flattering especially around the tummy or mid section. I didn't wear a bra with this dress, and it was actually very comfortable not to. The fabric up top was thick enough to not have to wear pasties either! I was extremely sad giving this dress back mainly because of how well it fit. From this picture, you can't see the front very well, but it was a beautiful dress overall. Many many compliments!
Very flattering and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to Day of the Dead event.
links_reviews_text: Badgley Mischka always runs small for me so I ordered a size up from my usual and am glad I did. This dress was perfect for the event. The details on the chest are really pretty. I didn't wear a bra with it and everything stayed put - if you're larger chested though, it may be an issue.
A little long but I'm 5'2 shh. Not a lot of give in the top. Got complementes all night would kind of want to keep it.

I loved wearing this dress. It shows a lot of cleavage, but it felt classy because it has a high neck and the cleavage is covered by transparent black mesh. I did not need to wear a bra, as the structure of the dress supported me well.

links_reviews_title: I felt awesome in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Dress was a back up and I was VERY pleasantly surprised at how much I loved it!
