Fit was perfect and true to size, the material felt elegant and expensive, and just enough cleavage to be sexy but not over the top. I love the flower details on the top and the mesh around the zipper in the back. I got a TON of compliments, felt comfortable, and 100% recommend this dress!
Dress runs small. I usually wear a 2 in dresses and this was a 4 and I could just zip it up. You also need a plunging neckline bra because the front is mesh/see thru.
Hubby's mouth dropped open after 18 years when I put this dress on. So well made and stunning!
Too much side boob for me (and I'm a small B cup)
Sexy but still classy!
Cleavage shows. Fitted on top, loser on the bottom. Great dancing dress. Everything stayed in place during the tango.

links_reviews_title: Decided to return. Should have sized up.
links_reviews_text: Dress is cute, I just needed a bigger size.
Love this dress. I will be ordering it in a size 8, the 6 was a bit too snug. Lovely details.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Wish i ordered a larger size
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. Wish i ordered a larger size

links_reviews_title: A perfect blend of sophisticated and fun for a work event.
links_reviews_text: This fit perfectly. As a shorter woman, I was concerned the skirt would be too long but it fell just right. The top is covered enough to make it work-party-appropriate but fun enough that it fit the glitzy theme.

It's hard to find a dress that looks this perfect and structured that is so incredibly comfortable to move in. Everything stayed in place, and yet the skirt is a comfy, stretchy material and the top was not restricting. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: I felt sexy but also covered and secure.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. Low cut neckline was sexy but still made me feel elegant. I was told I looked stunning from multiple people. :) The neck mesh does get itchy as the night progresses, especially if you dance.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress. Loved loved loved it. I ordered 1 size larger than I normally wear and it fir perfec
links_reviews_text: Stunning dress. Loved loved loved it. I ordered 1 size larger than I normally wear and it fir perfect.

I can be up to a 12/14 in my hips and the skirt fit but the top was too small for my larger bust. I'll rent this again but have to get multiple sized to see the correct fit. It's a beautiful dress, flattering and well made.
Beautiful design and cut. Too busty to make this work without having to wear a cover up, which would have defeated the purpose of wearing a sexy dress. Ultimately did not wear.
Fit perfectly
It has a great fit on top so that you don't need to wear a bra (i'm a B-C).
Too tight in the bodice.

Rented this for a party/date night. I have hips and a long torso and the fit wasn't that great and the dress kind of puckered. Wasn't super obvious with the black material, but it wasn't the best fit for my body type. I'm a 34D and it didn't really make the girls look that impressive despite the great deep V. I am 6ft tall and the length was perfect for a party dress- not too short.
This dress is gorgeous! Definitely don't get the long though unless you're super tall! I'm 5'6", wore with heels and it still swept the ground with the regular length.

links_reviews_title: Great dress but as others say it's a lot of fabric!
links_reviews_text: I'm tall and it was still long enough where I had to hold it up when I was walking around so maybe not the best for shorter and smaller people. Really nice piece though, considered buying.

links_reviews_title: Fits nicely but a lot of fabric.
links_reviews_text: Fits nicely but a lot of fabric. I'm 5'8 and couldn't wear it without heels. Print color & everything else was great, had just hoped to wear with sneakers.

This was a lovely dress for my baby shower. I wore it in a petite with 3-4" chunky heels (I'm 5' tall), which allowed it to just skim the ground. Third trimester belly surely helped with the length. The only things to note is that the side zipper was tough to close at the seam of the dress, and the neck cut out is much more revealing if you have a large chest (during pregnancy, I'm a 34 DD). I wore a black bra which was visible at times but tried to choose something lacy and pretty that looked intentional. I couldn't figure out a nice way of safety pinning it closed.

links_reviews_title: Cute overall but feels like a lot of material
links_reviews_text: If you are under 5'8" do not get the long version. It feels like a lot of fabric and easy to get tripped up on. Nice, modest dress, wear with flats or heels. Would recommend.

links_reviews_title: Size down and use a belt.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs large. Size down and cinch it up with. Belt to give shape.

links_reviews_title: A friend is building up her photography portfolio and asked me to wear something romantic and flowy.
links_reviews_text: I am between a M and L, but my options were L and XL. The L was pretty loose. The fabric felt great, but it was heavy, and it added more weight to my body. I am chubby but I looked pregnant. The color was great, and I think a M might have been better or some more cinching at the waist. If you're thin, this will probably hang right. It was very comfortable though the pattern gorgeous.

This dress was great for two events. I'm 32 weeks pregnant and it was perfect one size up. I'm tall and the long was still quite long even with three inch heels. I could have worn the shorter option if I wanted to wear flats or a lower heal.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and pretty. Could be dressed up but worked with converse.
links_reviews_text: Just hit the floor without dragging on 5'9" in flats.
The fit of this dress was perfect, it was so breezy, was kinda long but I managed. I LOVE this dress would definitely rent again.

Hosted thanksgiving this year and this was a perfect thanksgiving dress! Was plenty long on me which is great, fit great and loved the floral print/colors. I wore it backwards with the tie open so it was low cut bc I liked the look better but eventually turned it back around bc my chest kept showing when I'd bend over or sit down and got tired of holding it down to avoid exposure lol. But both sides of the dress are great! Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a night at the theatre.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 8 or medium I could have easily worn the small in this, there was plenty of room. I read the reviews and they said the dress was long, but dear God this dress is loooong! Be prepared to step on it, get tangled up in it and carry it. I wore 3 inch free people wooden clogs with it and it was still long. Aside from the longness I loved this dress. There is a very flirty peep area for cleavage and I got a ton of compliments... On the dress not my cleavage. It is very flattering and comfortable. Great with a jean jacket or black sweater.

I used this dress for a Kentucky Derby event and loved it! It covered what I wanted it to cover, while still showing a waistline and having that fun slit in the chest area. It is long for sure - I'm 5'6" and wore high heels and it still grazed the ground. But very comfortable and tons of compliments and I would definitely rent again!

I wore this to my friends baby shower. It was a hit. I'm 5'10". Definitely a looooong dress with better fit on tall girls. Short inner skirt. Long outside layer. Deep v cut in front was a little too much cleavage for me but oh well.

Ugh, I just love this dress so much. It flows and looks beautiful. It does run a little large and it's definitely long. This might be a tough one if you're not tall. I'm 5'8" and it was too long for me.

Rented this dress for just a day at the office. It's very comfortable. The fit is true to size however it is long. I'm 5'8" and wore flats and it was dragging on the ground. The material is pretty light so it flows nicely when you walk. I had to pin the front because it opens pretty low but that was no matter. I'd recommend this dress if you want to look good with zero effort.

Dress was good overall, it's really only fitted in the ribcage area and the bottom is VERY loose. Great if you are hourglass or pear shaped....probably not great if you carry your weight in your stomach. The only negative is that it was REALLY long, I'm 5'8 or 5'9 and even with three inch heels it was still hitting the floor, so certainly take that into account. I also was surprised with the cutout in the chest area, maybe I did not look at that photo carefully enough, or maybe it was just more open because I am a DD (added a photo to clarify) but that was worth noting as well. Overall great item, lots of compliments, material is nice as well.
Big full Dress that stands out
Such a pretty dress! It's also very comfortable and light. It is fitted at natural the waist and there's comfortable room for hips.
I've worn this dress twice and each time I get SO many compliments. It fits so well, flows as you walk, and is super comfortable. I never want to give it back! Love Love Love.

I'm 5'3. I would have to wear 4 inch heels to be able to wear this dress. I was very disappointed because it's really pretty in person. The sleeves are slit so it is nice and airy. There is also a keyhole front and a slit on the back. I really wish I would've worked for me
Way too long and too much fabric; I would size down. Even with heels it was way too long.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress however, at 5ft5 it is impossible to wear unless I wanted to wear 3-4 inch heels.
links_reviews_text: This was lovely however, only if you are taller than 5ft8 or love wearing 3-4 inch heels. It has a lot of fabric. This isn't a bad thing simply depends on where you are wanting to wear this. It looks like a lovely day dress but with the length, fabric it is not realistic to walk around in all day. This is an event dress that calls for a dressy yet casual vibe.
5'9 150 lbs not athletic or toned. Dress was perfect length and flattering. Wore with flats.

Wore this during the end of my second trimester and it was the perfect waistline for my bump. The length does run a little long (even though I got a petite size) but is doable with the right shoes. The tie-neck can get a little snug if you're wearing this for maternity (as your bump pulls the dress forward) but all in all, it was flattering, comfy, and worked really well for the occasion.
I'm 5' 3" and the dress was about 6inches too long. Couldn't wear it even with my tallest heels.

links_reviews_title: Elegant and casual at the same time
links_reviews_text: I am a tall person and the length was perfect. Got lots of compliments in this dress. It is very comfortable and the amount of fabric and weight of it give it a very nice movement.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Brunch or Baby Shower Dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is just beautiful. It's both casual and dressy all at the same time. I rented a long version and at 5'7 I still had to wear 3 inch heels (and the dress still skimmed the floor). There is a beautiful slit in the back, pleats down the front and flowy sleeves. Although it sounds like a lot for one dress, it all just works. The whole dress is flowy, so although it's a lot of fabric, I thought it was still flattering.
I should've waited for the MR size because I was tripping over the length all day. Overall great print and flattering, just too long.

The dress is very cute but for much taller girls. I'm 5'5 and a few inches were on the floor, so I was afraid I'd step on the edge and trip. It's also not ideal for maternity if you don't have a long torso - the slit in front was saggy and sad. I also tried this dress in Small and had both of the same issues. I'm 25 weeks pregnant and by no means tiny - i usually wear size M.
I m 5'0' and ordered XSR and I could not wear it because it was too small. quality looks nice.
Looked great. Works very well on a tall woman.

First off, I learned the hard way that the tie portion is the back of the dress and the small slit goes in the front. I spent half the morning at work wondering why my barely A cups were busting out, now we both know. Being a tall girl, the regular was PLENTY long enough for me in flats. If you are tall and plan to wear heels, get the long version if you want your feet covered. It was a little tight in the bust area for me but fit perfectly everywhere else. I carry a weird amount of fat in that area so your results may vary.

links_reviews_title: Loved so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing, I loved it so much I purchased it. However, it did require hemming bc it's VERY long (I'm 5' 7", and even w 3 inch heels it touched the ground). The material is beautiful and the skirt moves beautifully.
a little big, but loved it

links_reviews_title: Elegant but hard to style down
links_reviews_text: Very long on my frame. I wore with flat sandals on a dinner day with my boyfriend. It was cute, but a little prissy. I thought is could throw my hair in a top knot and it would be casual, but it didn't come together
Good overall. Very long but tied the bottom in a cute way so as not to trip.
Loved this dress. It is a little long, but so chic and fun! Got so many compliments and felt very comfortable in it.
Loved wearing this dress for my Friday work wear.

Love the fit of this dress- so incredibly flattering. Really a show stopper. Length is very long (and I am 5'-9") and hard to walk up the stairs in. Still would rent again in a heartbeat... may even buy this one

Wore to a fundraising gala and it was perfect. Slightly baggy in the hips, but would've rather had that vs. too tight. Material was flexible and comfortable. Great fit for being smaller chested. Loved the length for a classier look. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Fit was perfect!
links_reviews_text: #nflhonors #Super Bowl 2020

links_reviews_title: It’s really flattering and elegant. Great for an evening outdoor wedding!
links_reviews_text: It’s definitely body con so I 10/10 recommend wearing a spanx underneath to make everything look smooth. I fluctuate between a 10-12 but I wore the 12 so I wouldn’t be uncomfortable after eating and drinking all night.

Fit was perfect up top but a little baggy in the hip area. I would have preferred the tightness from the top all the way down. Thick material. I'm 5'8 and found this dress to be a bit long for me. If you're on the shorter spectrum I wouldn't recommend it.
Thick material. Comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Back up to the back up
links_reviews_text: The original dress that I ordered didn't make it in time so the RTR rep overnighted 2 outfits for me. Thank you!

links_reviews_title: Amazing midi dress for a black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: The dress was so elegant and form fitting. Perfect for an ocean-side black tie wedding. I'm between a 4-6 dress size, but decided to wear the dress size down. Definitely felt a little tight at times and couldn't wear Spanx, but looked great. It's great for an athletic build, especially if you don't have big boobs (I'm a 36B/34C).

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments! Comfortable, classy, clean and fun. Perfect for a black tie optional event.
links_reviews_text: Wore size 4, a little tight on my hips but the 6 was too big. Never had to pull it up on my chest like other strapless dresses. Paired it with black drop earrings and hair back, it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: It was a great dress for a wedding I attended.
links_reviews_text: The dress didn’t roll over like others said it did. I am 5’4 and wear 4” Sam Edelman high heels with it which makes me at least 5’8. I fluctuate between 124-128 lbs and my bust is a 34C. I felt sexy all night. It’s tight on my hips so peeing is pretty hard but not horrible. I loved the elegance. I would love to rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great simple but stunning black dress!
links_reviews_text: This was a replacement dress for a wedding. The only reason I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5 was bc of the fit in the bust. It barely zipped up over my chest and I felt pretty squeezed into that part of the dress. The top constantly flipped down , so I was pulling at it a lot through the night. And it was a little big through the rest of the dress. But, all in all it was a beautiful dress and I did receive many compliments. Just be wary if you have a fuller bust.
The dress was so comfortable and has a nice, quality fabric. It was perfect for a summer wedding, would definitely recommend!
Wore for my college graduation photos
Great LBD got any event! Great material and perfect fit! Would def rent again!

Love this dress! Was perfect for a work gala, but this dress could also be dressed down with the right shoes/accessories. Got tons of compliments and felt super comfortable in this dress. Definitely recommend!
Great dress and fit perfect. I received multiple compliments.

links_reviews_title: Great quality, body hugging dress with minor flaws
links_reviews_text: I range anywhere from a 2-6 in dresses, and the 4 fit great so I would say this is true to size. The fabric is nice and thick so you can tell it's good quality and sturdy. The only thing that really bothered me was the neckline sometimes flips out so I had to be weary of that all night.

links_reviews_title: The Amazing wedding and dancing the night away!
links_reviews_text: This dress is Great! I highly recommend. I am curvy so it fit just right. The top part kept curling up ( hard to describe) but that's because I'm small on the top and large on the bottom. Otherwise such a great selection! And black is timeless! Just rent it already! Lol
Loved the dress. The hip area was a little large but no one took notice to it besides myself! The top fit perfectly! Perfect length, very elegant!
Fits a little snug but I loved the length (I'm 5'9") and get cute. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: This was a great dress absolutely loved it, felt very confident.
links_reviews_text: I am 1 1/2 months postpartum and am not back to my normal size yet, so was looking for a forgiving dress. This dress fit great huged all the right places and disguised the post baby belly. The material was nice and the overall appearience of the dress was like new didn’t notice any wear and tear. I am usually a size 2 in pants/shorts and 4 in dresses. I went with the size 6 I wasn’t able to zip the 4 over my breasts so for larger bust sizes that may be an issue. I had difficulty zipping the 6 over my bust as well but I got it zipped and it was comfortable no slipping down. Overall loved the dress.

links_reviews_title: PERFECT DRESS! CUTE, FLATTERING, WELL MADE
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my school's homecoming and it was perfect! My school has strict rules about dresses, but this one met all of them! It hit at a perfect length and was beyond flattering. This dress is also very well made! The only thing is that i could've sized down so the top didn't fall as much, but it really wasn't that much of an issue!

links_reviews_title: Loved everything about this dress except the top rolling down!
links_reviews_text: This was actually my backup dress but I loved the look of it so much more that I wore it instead. I felt that it covered areas like my tummy while accentuating my shape. I did have quite a few issues with the top rolling down to show the underseam of the dress, so I ended up pinning it to my bra which helped a little, but by the end of the night I gave up trying to fix it. Overall a wonderful first RTR experience and I will definitely be getting more!

Loved this dress, wore it to a wedding in late November. Very flattering fit. I am smaller on top so i did feel like I had to keep pulling the dress up as it would start to slip down with all the dancing I was doing. Other than that it was great.
I love this dress. The picture is actually the same dress in blue. I have rented this dress twice. One thing to remember is this dress is tight and does some to mid shin length on a 5 ft person

links_reviews_title: This dress was elegant and stylish! I felt so comfortable in it at a blacktie optional wedding!
links_reviews_text: Great fit! Ran a little but bigger than most dresses, but still close to size.
Great dress, but hips fit a bit weird.

links_reviews_title: The material was very good quality
links_reviews_text: Got loads of compliments. Was pretty snug but the quality of the dress was great .

links_reviews_title: Love love love. I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely fantastic — great fit, very comfortable, extremely flattering. I am 20 weeks pregnant, so the fabric allowed for (and fabulously highlighted) my bump. I wore this dress to our friends' annual holiday gala, so it was perfect for a festive occasion and takes to many styles and accessories. This is a great little black dress.

links_reviews_title: Work holiday party rental. Great dress but I am 5'4" so it was a little long.
links_reviews_text: Great fit a little tight in the bust.
This dress was a nice choice for an October wedding. Because it's a classic black dress, it was easy to dress up with a nice leather jacket and some statement jewelry. Got many compliments!
I've actually rented this dress in a couple different colors because I absolutely love it! Fabric is soft, it's comfortable and it hugs all the right places.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress, it was so comfortable and very flattering!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit me great, I am usually a 2 but the 0 was perfect. The material was thick but comfortable. I wasn't bothered at all by the strapless neckline - it stayed up all night. I felt great in it and got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Felt Sexy & Got Tons of Compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit as a midi on me which I anticipated and liked about it (I'm super petite!) and since I am large chested, the zipper was a smidge snug to pull up but was fine once it was on! Fabric is super comfy and thick enough that it's forgiving. Pop over top was super flattering since I by no means have a flat stomach. Loved the dress but the only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because the top part kept rolling over to reveal that rubber grip that typically holds it in place. Not visible in pictures but annoying to look down and see all night. I didn't have dbl sided tape so I'm not sure if that's a solve and again, I'm large chested so it may just be my body type causing this.

links_reviews_title: Felt amazing for my first formal event post-partum
links_reviews_text: Snug but stretchy and forgiving material!
@wedding
Very pleased with this dress, stylish yet comfortable!
Got so many compliments on this dress. Loved the length!!

links_reviews_title: Classic black dress but a little snug on top
links_reviews_text: I got a ton of compliments on the dress and overall it was very comfortable and made me feel good. I had to size up to wear the 6 because it's pretty tight in the very top. It cut across my chest and that was a little unflattering at certain angles. Also, the zipper is on the side under the top flap so it's hard for one person to be able to get the dress on. Try and have someone else zip you up in it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect LBD! I received a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I read the details of the top folding over but I still went ahead and rented the dress. I did have issues with the top folding over, but not as much as I expected. It was a great fit and I would rent again! All my friends were asking if they could borrow it sometime.
The only con was the rubber elastic kept showing.
This dress was so flattering and fun. High quality, thick fabric. The hem line makes it easy to fit any length person!

links_reviews_title: Renting for a Alice In Wonderland Gala
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing. The high low hemline worked perfect on my 5'2 frame. It has POCKETS and was so much fun to wear. The colors were vibrant and the weight of the fabric was ideal for a cool spring evening in Michigan. I'm usually a 14/16 but the 18 fit nicely without having to worry about exposing too much. I got so many compliments and look forward to using Rent the Runway again.
This dress is beautiful! I love the color, one shoulder, high low hem, and pockets!! I received a lot of compliments and loved the way it felt when I walked. It really is a lovely gown.

This dress was adorable. I'm 5'11" and 165 pounds. The size 14 fit when I typically wear a dress size 12. I'm a 36 DD and around the top was a little big without a strapless bra. I wore the bra and it was fine. The zipper was almost impossible for me or my husband to zip up. It gets stuck in one place and does not budge. Allow time for added patience! Perfect for a rooftop wedding! The back flows as you walk and move. I received tons of compliments and questions about where I got the dress.
Worked perfectly over my growing belly. Received lots of complements and very flattering.

The dress was so gorgeous! I wore this for a wedding in DC in February. The blues were just like they look in the photos. PROS: pockets!!, the one sleeve was fun and sexy and flattering to my chest, the asymmetrical frame gives the chance to show off whatever fabulous shoes you're wearing, and the fabric is a little heavier so I was comfortable temperature-wise. CONS: the 6R was slightly tight in the ribs for me, but the 8R was too baggy and made me look like a box. I wore the 6 because my husband said it made my figure look sexier :P. other con was that the back was slightly too long for my height, meaning that I had to lift the dress in my hand when dancing so I didn't step back on it and fall on my @$$, even with 4" heels.

links_reviews_title: Looked great got lots of compliments on the dress!!!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'8" tall and about 200 lbs, this dress in a 14R fit like a glove. I loved it. I didn't wear a bra under it as I am not super big in the chest area. I did wear heels for the ceremony but those came off at the reception. The only issue without heels was walking up and downstairs but that didn't happen much. The only bad part about this dress was the zipper and clasp. It was hard to even get it unzipped when the dress was on the hanger and my husband had a hard time when he was zipping me up. I got compliments all night long on the dress and everyone asked how was my experience with RTR, and I said so far so good. It was so easy. I would have liked to get the dress a couple more days before I needed it as this was my back-up dress as the originals did not fit. But I think this was the better dress to wear for the Florida wedding. Would rent again

LOVED the color! Im between sizes so I ordered the 12 & 14. Ended up wearing the 14 since it was in better shape, slightly too big but worked with a strapless bra. I received so many compliments on this dress. It was very comfortable and very well made. The hidden pockets are a great bonus.
Perfectly flattering fit, fun to spin, subtle yet statement color, great experience in this winner! Plus the pockets are an instant win.

I wore it for friend's wedding. The material feels comfortable and breathable, which is good for a very humid setting! And I love the pockets it came with - easier to store my phone and purse when I hit the dance floor. Got lots of compliments, especially with the train style of it. Without the scarf, it has an amazing one-sided look! Definitely would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect gown to accommodate my 14 week baby bump for a work Gala.
links_reviews_text: I received lots of compliments and especially loved that it had pockets. I searched specifically for maternity friendly looks and it worked perfectly for me.

links_reviews_title: Dress fit like a glove and I got a million compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: Fits perfect. The only concern I had was that the zipper was tough to get over the seam, but had some help from a friend on it.

links_reviews_title: SO PRETTY. Runs small if you have big ribs!!
links_reviews_text: Oh my gosh this dress is just beautiful. I got so many compliments. If you do have a big rib cage however, please size up. I normally wear a four, but I wore a six. I got so many compliments!! If you do have a big rib cage however, please size up. I normally wear a four, but I wore a six and this dress. I honestly could have stood to wear an eight, as it was a little bit tight around my ribs. Anyway the dress was so pretty it didn’t matter and I was super happy with it. It’s like a dream! ♥️

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect and I didn't have to go shopping at the mall to find it.
links_reviews_text: Dress fit great!! It came on time and return process was super easy! Thank you!!!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and it has pockets!!
links_reviews_text: The top of the dress fits snug so I needed to go a size up in order to zip the dress and the zipper was a little tricky you will need an extra pair of hands to zip up. Other then that it fit perfectly and it was super comfortable, loved the pockets and the color I received so many compliments I would definitely rent again!

This made me feel like Grace Kelly. I loved the way it moved when I walked. Like other reviewers I had trouble zipping it up and needed help. It is quite tight through the ribcage and the zipper sticks a bit. I almost sent it back but then realized I could zip it with help. It's worth the effort though - really stunning!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress - Pretty in pictures but glamorous in person.
links_reviews_text: This dress is absolutely lovely. The official photographer at the event called it "the dress is the night." I wore it while working the event and was comfortable the whole time. IT HAS POCKETS which made my job so much easier. I felt very glamorous in the dress, while still looking professional. It fit very well. I was concerned about it dragging on the floor but the length was perfect. (I'm 5'4 & wore 2.5 inch heels) The color is more vibrant in person than shows up in pictures. Recommend!

links_reviews_title: Stop searching and reserve this dress NOW
links_reviews_text: Runs tight through the ribs, but also made me look thin so I loved it. Neck line was high so I felt comfortable without a bra and a no side boob! I've never had so many compliments in my life. The pictures and on the hanger don't show you how beautiful it really is. I would rent this 100 times!
Loved this dress! The fit was perfect and was super comfortable.

10R fit true-to-size. Loved the high-low, gorgeous color combination, and felt completely relaxed in it the entire time. I'm 5'3" so the back of the dress was more like a mini-train on me, but I didn't have any issue with it!
I wore this for a friends son's wedding. The dress fit perfectly and I got A LOT of compliments on it.

Getting the zipper over the middle band was quite tough, needed two friends to help get me into this thing. Being 5’3” I accept that most dresses will be long on me, but I wore ridiculously tall wedges and it still dragged a bit. Quite a few people stepped on me. The fabric is soft and thick enough in the chest area that I wasn’t too worried about showing off the ladies without a bra. YMMV.

links_reviews_title: Stunning color, so comfortable, and it has pockets!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It fit so comfortably and covered problem areas of tummy and hips. I loved that I didn't have to wear a bra with it due to padded cups sewn into dress. It had pockets, which was amazing for keeping phone and lipstick handy. The color was phenomenal and I got compliments all night. I felt beautiful in it!

Fit true to size. Slightly large in the bust. Perfect length so that it was long enough, but not dragging the ground. When you walk, the gown flows behind you. Received so many compliments from friends and strangers.

links_reviews_title: beautiful dress, so flattering, helps hide the belly, great color, and has pockets!
links_reviews_text: Runs small -- I needed to size up to be able to zip up the back (and clearly dress is worn a lot, zipper was very difficult to get up!) Other reviewers felt they didn't need a bra but I actually didn't think there was enough support to go without. High-low is great, and still long enough at its short part that you don't need to be worried while walking or sitting. Pockets are great! fit my phone and lipstick and neither fell out. Incredibly flattering dress, and I got compliments all night. I would absolutely rent again.

Fit like a glove and was so comfortable to sit/eat/dance in all night. Made of elegant, high-quality material. I'm 5'0 and wore 5.5-inch heels and the back of the dress still dragged a bit but it gave it a majestic train feel! The hi-lo in the front was perfect for not tripping on it. And of course, the pockets were a game changer. I could fit my phone, cards and lipstick so no need for a clutch!

This was my back up style and I loved it so much I did a wardrobe change during my event! I just couldn’t return it without wearing it out lol. Length was a bit long for my height and I would sometimes step in the back up my dress (somehow), but it wasn’t too bad and manageable. Would absolutely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fabric & style, runs small in the bust
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful. I wore my usual size 4, but the bust was very tight on me (I am size 34D). When you walk, the dress fans out behind you, making for a more dramatic effect! Overall loved it!

I wore this dress for a black tie wedding, and it is one of the best dresses I've ever worn! It was so comfy, but still super elegant. I received a bunch of compliments on the dress, and had so much fun dancing in it. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!

links_reviews_title: So comfy! Flattering and fit perfectly
links_reviews_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress. wish it came in more colors because i would absolutely rent it again! It was very comfortable, great length even though im short and only wore 3 in heels. It has pockets! the material is on the thicker side so I wouldn't recommend it for an outdoor wedding if its going to be warm. The zipper was a little hard to get past the waist seam and the dress was very fitted around my rib cage. I actually wasn't able to wear a bra with it, it wouldn't have zipped, however this actually wasnt an issue. I NEVER don't wear a bra being 34F and i felt totally secure in this dress. there are thin pads within the front lining of the dress and some boning on the side so it actually was amazing without the bra. if you're large chested or have a larger rib cage, or definitely want to make sure you can wear a bra, i would recommend sizing up, or getting the larger size as your 2nd option. The 14 wasn't available so I cant attest to how that would have fit. 100% would recommend renting this dress!
I'm obsessed with this dress! Very elegant and super comfortable! It runs true to size. I wore the 4R, I'm 5'5" and wore a low heel. The back of the dress was just touching the floor.
Rented this dress as a backup and ended up wearing! Loved the fit and the colors!

links_reviews_title: It is elegant but comfortable. The style was perfect for a wedding. And it has POCKETS!
links_reviews_text: fit great. I have a larger chest and it was snug enough i didn't have to wear a bra. I'm 5'4 and the drag dragged slightly even with a heel.

This dress was gorgeous! It fit perfectly and was so comfortable. I didn't need a bra or spanx. I received so many compliments, was able to dance in it and felt beautiful all night. I am 5'3" and it's a tad long in the back, but it fell perfectly with heels. Rent this dress!!!

I wore this for my work's Gala, and it was perfect: tasteful, stood out from the black dresses, very well-made, and even had pockets. Since I was part of my work's Gala planning committee, I was running around doing various tasks throughout the night. The pockets were a lifesaver holding my phone and keys, and I could easily move -- and even run -- in this dress! It fit true to size, and I am glad I could wear heels or else the back would have dragged behind me all night. It is a glamorous yet comfy dress, which is a perfect mix! Plus, another guest arrived wearing the exact same dress, which was hilarious! We both loved that it had pockets and of course had to take a picture together!
Loved the color and style! Was a bit tight on the top, and a bit long for my 5'4" height. Got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress, colors are beautiful and the high low fit was perfect. Loved this dress!
links_reviews_text: Length was perfect, fit a bit snug at the top. Material of dress is pretty thick so did get a hot at reception(dancing). Beautiful dress!
True to size. Dress is heavier than I expected. Loved the flow too it. I'm 5'5 and with 1 inch heels dress was just touching the ground in the back. 34-C and 130lbs

links_reviews_title: I was told several times it was the best dress of the night!! So flattering and comfortable, too!
links_reviews_text: This dress for so perfectly I didn't even have to wear a bra!!! And the color was so beautiful!!

This dress was a show stopper! Perfect for a summer wedding. Sassy hi-low style, one shoulder strap that provides a good bit of support, boning that provides structure, and pockets to boot! Great for dancing.
I really loved everything about this dress. I'm 5'4" and weigh 120lbs. I feel that I could've done a size 2 for a tighter fit, but the 4 was very comfortable. I would definitely recommend this dress!

For true to size, I tried both strapless and one shouldered and liked it much better one shouldered. It stayed most of the night, but being petite the shoulder did slip down sometimes. I rented this for a fundraiser where the theme color was yellow (Ewing's Sarcoma cancer ribbon) and I definitely stood out in a good way being the only person in this color. I got compliments from so many strangers! I felt great!

links_reviews_title: A bright, colorful outfit, perfect for a late summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: The fit was lovely, and the flounce top was perfect for some fun. Definitely the perfect length on someone as short as myself, it came to my mid-calf, and it looked great. With pale pink heels and a blush purse, it was so lovely. It moved perfectly, and even though it was a snug fit around my hips, I had no problem dancing the night away.

links_reviews_title: Great color for a fall wedding
links_reviews_text: 2 fit great on the bust but was too tight on my hips. Ended up wearing the 4 but opted to wear a strapless bra to fill out the top.
I got so many compliments on this dress all night! I seemed to be in between sizes (in between the 6 and 8). I ended up wearing the 8 so I could be more comfortable. Definitely worth renting!

I loved this dress so much!! The color was gorgeous, the fit was fantastic, (although the 2 probably would've been even more comfortable), and it stayed up all night dancing even though I have a small bust. I wanted to keep it!!

I wore this dress for a wedding and it was so perfect there was another guest wearing the exact same dress! The color is beautiful and really stands out. I absolutely loved this dress, I just wish I felt more confident in it.

It's hard to know how big your tummy will get as you progress through your pregnancy so it was nice to have a dress that stretched to fit my bump. I would recommend this dress for small bumps (under 20 weeks). The color is absolutely stunning. One note - make sure you have really flat underwear. A few of my detailed pairs showed through the dress.

I received so many compliments on this dress. It's the most gorgeous yellow and looked so great with my tan. I paired it with dark green statement earrings and added more color with a red lip. The dress ran really small so I used my size backup as I'm normally a size 4. It's a bit difficult to walk in to the pleating at the bottom/mermaid style but overall it was a great dress.

links_reviews_title: Sexy and Vibrant and Sure to Stand Out
links_reviews_text: I was on the hunt for a sunflower yellow dress and this ended up being perfect. Wore to a rehearsal dinner for a friends black tie wedding in Boston. It was beautifully form fitting but didn't bunch up. I am an A/B bust and ended up wearing without a bra bc it was perfectly snug. Loved! Would rent again.

I've never wore a dress of this style, or color, so I was a little nervous about this order. I ended up really loving the dress! I ordered a size 10 with a backup size 12, and ended up wearing the 10. It was a little tight, but it was also that time of the month, so I was a little bloated. I tried the 12, but that was definitely too big! The only reason I didn't give a 5 star review was because both dresses had defects. The seams on both sides of the frilly part of the bottom of the 10 were loose. Since that part wasn't tight, it wasn't noticable during wear, which was good! The 12 had a small stain at the top near one of the arms that looked like it could have been a blood spot. My hair wouldn't have been long enough to hide it if I wanted to wear that size.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit like a dream!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing! I am so glad I got the bigger size (one size up from what I usually wear). I am 5'1, 120 lbs, am bigger chested and this dress fit like a dream. So comfortable! If it was mine I would gave gotten it hemmed towards the bottom to make it a little tighter but it was perfect for this event. Would totally recommend!!! I was nervous since I don't wear bold colors but this marigold color complimented my tan skin and height beautifully. Got compliments all night!!!

I've never received more compliments on a dress before! It was a beautiful color and fit like a glove! I typically wear a 10 but ordered up knowing this was going to be a tight little number and I'm glad I did!! Hugs all the right places!

links_reviews_title: Classy and sexy-highly recommend! Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a 4 in pants and this fit true to size /a little tight. Although my boyfriend said it didn't look tight, if you want to breathe a little ,size up to the 6. It feels restricting at first but if you're looking to feel elegant and not go too crazy, this dress is perfect.

This dress was perfect for my friend's August wedding! I received so many compliments and it was stretchy so I was able to dance all night long! The top tried to fold over when I tried it on so I used fabric tape on the day of the wedding and had no issues. Such a fun dress!
Loved this dress. Got so many compliments!

For a bigger chested girl, i am always hesitant to rent dresses that are typically shown on flatter chested models. Glad i read the reviews on this one, the material did stretch enough to fit in all the right places! RENT THIS DRESS IF YOU WANT TO BE COMPLIMENTED BY OTHERS :)

links_reviews_title: I wish I could rent this again!!
links_reviews_text: For perfectly with a pair of spanx underneath... ha but I've never received more compliments on my outfit EVER. This dress was perfect for the wedding 10/10 would recommend. Wish it wasn't yellow so I could get away with wearing it again!
Loved the dress and received compliments about the style and color. For someone who has a 34DD bust, I had to size up one size to fit the dress. Wish I owned this piece!
LOVED THIS DRESS!!!!! I'm usually a 4 but so happy I received a 4 and a 6 because the 4 was quite snug lol

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress and felt like walking PR for RTR. Highly recommend!
links_reviews_text: Both sizes I ordered (4 and 6) were a bit too big in the bust area, but not so big that I couldn't make either work. The 4 fit better up top, but the torso/leg area was a bit too tight, and I wanted to have some sort of room to move for comfort and dancing, so I wore the 6. My husband did have to be on watch for the back falling too low, but that didn't happen often. Overall, I felt really great in this dress and loved that I was able to wear something I wouldn't typically choose to buy for myself. The fabric is thick, and it was 90 degrees and very sunny, so needless to say, I was a wee bit hot and sweaty, but the sweat didn't show through the fabric, however it did wrinkle a bit, as you can tell in one of the photos. The dress, with the addition of shapewear, was a bit difficult to get in and out of when going to the bathroom (it was a small stall).

links_reviews_title: Wish I could have kept this dress!! Got so many compliments on the color and it was flirty and fun!
links_reviews_text: Reviews were super helpful. I got a size 4 and 6 - wound up wearing the 4. It fits true to size. Did not need to even wear a bra - it was supportive and comfortable! (I’m a size 32D)

links_reviews_title: Felt like a million bucks in this stunning mustard dress!!
links_reviews_text: I cannot say enough about this dress or Rent the Runway. Each dress I rent is better than the last, and this was my favorite rental by far!! The color really stands out! The 6 was a little snug in my hips, and I knew I wanted to dance, so I went with the 8. I didn’t have any issues with the zipper, as some reviews said. I had to wear a strapless bra, because my girls need the support, but that is just my body. The fabric is thick and has a little stretch, but not too much. I decided to wear it with the 1 shoulder, which I thought was a little more flattering. You will NOT be disappointed with this beauty! I can’t wait for my next fancy event so I can rent another beautiful dress!!! 💛💛

Well, I now remember why I don't wear form-fitting dresses, but thought I would try something different out anyway. My pooch was unreal and we were drinking beer at the wedding, too. Was still a gorgeous dress, though. It fit very well and I wasn't hiking it up all night long. I loved this dress; just wish I wasn't so self-conscious about my pooch.

links_reviews_title: The color! Such a beautiful golden yellow. Stood out well and didn't wash me out.
links_reviews_text: Ended up wearing the 10. I have a broader rib cage and the 8 just couldn't quite get up there. 10 fit well - with a shaper underneath. This dress doesn't hide anything. Great color and length, and was a bit easier to move in after wearing it for about an hour or two before my event.
I received so many compliments all night !! But I found the dress to run small.

I absolutely love this dress. The yellow the perfect shade, and the shape—to die for. The bottom half runs a little small, so I had to size up from my normal size (which made the top a touch large, but nothing dress tape cannot fix). I received so many compliments all night and would definitely rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Loved this deess for a summer wedding!!
links_reviews_text: Dress has a little stretch in the body of it but not in the top. I am a tad bustt so I wore the 8 instead of the 6 for that reason. Very flattering and the color was the perfect warm yellow. I got tons of compliments all night
Got tons of compliments. Not that stretchy though but loved this dress
This dress worked out great! I was a little nervous since the color was so bold but it looked great and I got so many compliments! Would highly recommend and definitely rent again.

I liked this dress because it was form fitting but the material is thick enough to where you probably don't need to wear Spanx or a bra though I did wear Spanx. Didn't have problems with it slipping down but the hook on the side did dig into my side and left a mark, that was the only downside! It is fairly restricting so if you plan on dancing at a wedding and really cutting a rug you may want to get something else. Also FYI, I also expected it to be a bright yellow but it was more of a mustard-though I like that color too!

links_reviews_title: Glad I got a back up size
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress but glad I got a size 4 as a back up. I'm typically a 2 but even the 4 was a little snug. Nice, thick material. Loved the color. Perfect for a summer wedding.

I received sooo many compliments on this dress! Tight fit, but not too restricting. I am very petite, but do have some curves so I felt this dress was super flattering for me. Only downfall was the elastic on top did continuously flip over throughout the night, but it wasn't very noticeable since the inside of the dress was all yellow. Even when it flipped, the dress still stayed up and in place.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful night, with an awesome dress!
links_reviews_text: I’m so glad this dress lived up to my expectations. It was amazing. I wanted a dress that would feel fancy and a bit sexy for a city wedding. The fabric is thick and resists wrinkles, the color was beautiful and the cut was flattering. It hugs ALL the curves so I suggest spanx for sure. My only complaint was that the top of the dress, where there is a rubberized edge to keep it from slipping, it kept flipping down. Not a huge deal but I had to adjust throughout the night.

links_reviews_title: I got compliments on this dress all night long!
links_reviews_text: I was afraid this was going to look frumpy on me because I’m so petite (5'1''/105lbs) - but I LOVED IT! The material was thick enough to add structure and an hourglass shape (that I don’t naturally have) but light enough that I was able to comfortably wear it to a summer wedding. The only con is that if you decide to wear it one-shoulder as I did, you may find yourself adjusting the strap from falling down. It’s also hard to lift your arm up very high because the fabric does not stretch that way. So if you’re planning on dancing all night long, maybe wear this as a strapless dress. Same with the bottom - it doesn't stretch so if you're short like me, you may have trouble getting into a car.

This dress fits pretty true to size. The smaller size fit better but it was unavailable, but the stretch and shape of the dress still worked really well! I tried on 3 of the different colors and loved them all, but the yellow was awesome!

This dress is outside my usual comfort zone but I felt confident and secure in this dress bc of the fit and fabric. I loved the bold yellow for a California beach wedding and the longer length actually worked with my shorter height.

I loved wearing this dress! I got so many compliments! I couldn't wear a strapless bra with this dress, because it was too snug on top. I also wore my backup size (2). It fit perfect without the bra though. I recommend this dress! #Gorgeous #Yellow #Wedding
The dress was AWESOME. sometimes the top tried to fold over in the front but aside from that it was perfect. Definitely felt amazing and received so many compliments all night

This dress fit like a glove! I didn't have any issues with it falling down while dancing. I got a lot of compliments. It does show all your curves so invest in some spanx if you don't want to feel super self conscious!

links_reviews_title: Rent this if you want to be CLASSY
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a black tie wedding and felt glamorous. You should, too!

I wore this to an evening outdoors wedding. Overall- I LOVED this dress. The colors are so different from any other dress and the deep v chest is really flattering. As for fit, I'm 5'10- the R was the only one available but I do wish I could have gotten the Long- it hovered about an inch above the ground w/o heels. I usually wear a 4 for tops and an 8 for bottoms, so picking a dress is always a bit tricky, but overall this dress fit great.

Compliments all night! Normally a size 8 but only the 10R was available and it worked great! I was able to wear a strapless push-up bra to fill out top. Since the Long was not available, I wore flats and the length of regular was just fine. One of my favorite RTR rentals!
Everyone loved this dress. Fit like a glove. I'm 5'11 and the long didn't touch the ground but it was fine.
Although a little snug in the waist, I loved it! It is a very delicate dress.

links_reviews_title: Finally had an excuse to rent this!
links_reviews_text: I have been wanting to rent this dress for so long, and I finally made it happen! The lace overlay was gorgeous, and the pastel colors were so much fun for an outdoor spring wedding! The neckline is unique and so flattering. Like other reviewers mentioned, the waistband has no give; however, there was plenty of room in the hips. Having a more athletic build, I had difficulty filling it out. I would have rented a smaller size if it had been available. The length was perfect with 4 inch heels, so I would say it's on the longer side. I got millions of compliments on this dress! Overall, I loved it!!

Loved this dress!! Definitely for hour glass body type. It was a touch too big in the hips for me when standing but made it comfortable to sit in. Can't wear a traditional bra but the sticky ones worked because the material is thick. Very long, I had to wear the highest shoes I own. Received sooo many compliments on it and it photographed very well. Absolutely loved wearing it.

I wore this in my sister's wedding. I had a last minute freak out because they didn't end up having my usual size in time for the event. I'm pear shaped, normally a size 6 bottom and size 4 in dresses. I had them send the size 2 along knowing that most likely I would have to wear the equally beautiful but not quite as stand-out back up dress. It was a miracle that the 2 fit me and I felt like a star all night long. My only gripe being it's easy to trip over/ get your heel stuck in the intricate lace bottom, so maybe wear a wedge heel.

This is a very pretty dress. The floral detail was nice, and the underlayer match my skin tone which is very pale. I ended up not wearing the dress because it was heavy and long and I wanted to move easily. For an event where I plan to sit more or Stanmoore I would definitely read this again

links_reviews_title: I loved wearing this dress! I received so many complements at the event & was sad to return it!
links_reviews_text: This dress fits very true to size. It is extremely high quality and the length was perfect on me (I'm 5'4 and wore the 4P). It also has ample room in the chest and I did not need to wear a bra with it although you could if desired.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit perfectly and I got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: My heels very easily slipped through the lace and would get caught. I would recommend a chunkier heel to avoid this!
I rented this for a wedding where I did a reading. I was 3 months post partum and this really fit nicely and highlighted my assets! I felt super sexy and got loads of compliments!

The dress was perfection. The length was ideal with a 3 inch heel (I had ditched my uncomfortable shoes by the time we got around to taking a picture). As other reviews suggest, there is a tendency for the heel to get stuck in the lace. There is plenty of breathing room and the dress can easily be dressed up or down. The quality of the lace is impeccable. 10-10! Heads up; despite the oranges, colors are certainly more spring than fall.

This dress is a bit less flattering than I had hoped for my curves and short torso (the middle seam hit in a bit of an off spot), but overall it was spectacular and I got lots of compliments. A special dress!

links_reviews_title: This is amazing. So unique. Almost comfortable. I can't wait to wear this on vacay!!
links_reviews_text: True to size. A little long on me

I didn't get to wear this dress because it was way too big on me (especially on top) but it's a gorgeous dress. I was considering using fashion tape but it was heavy and I didn't want to worry about it falling off all night. I'm usually an 8-10 and go for 10 when there's no give in the fabric and when the notes say to go up for a backup size. However, notes were not on point for this dress. There's tons of reviews saying how big it is so trust me, SIZE DOWN. Colors are beautiful though!

links_reviews_title: I wish I could own this dress forever!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. It fit like a glove, and I got so many compliments. The cinched waist really helped accentuate my curves and made me feel beautiful. It was perfect for the event. I'm 5'4'', so it was a bit long. Be prepared to wear heals if you're a petite lady.

I wore the 0R, I did need to pin the neck tighter as it was very long for me as I am 5'3 but I made it work. Despite those issues it looked amazing and I received a lot of compliments! The band on the waist is tight and does not give. After eating and drinking I felt squished haha! I have a very small waist as well. I went with the 0R because the 2R would have been too large on the bottom and the neck as where as everywhere else. Just know the waist area is tiny due to the band.

I ordered a 6R and 8R for my back up size. I only tried on the 8R. I'm very curvy and the zipper was really troublesome with no assistance. But once I got it on I felt amazing. Compliments all night. Hold the hem of the gown while going up or down stairs as heels can get caught in the lace detail. Definitely a unique and beautiful guest dress :)

This dress was great except the waist I'm a 2 but I have a big rib cage so it zipped but was tight. I got to a of compliments. Only drawback is your heels catch in the lace so you have to be very careful when walking otherwise it was so pretty

Loved the way this dress photographed and received many compliments throughout the night. Would've been better if the bottom wasn't already ripped in the back but the lace is super fragile and hadn't held up well to a previous renters heels. Wear wedges or go without heels with this one.

This dress was perfect for a formal summer wedding! Pros: BEAUTIFUL colors, flattering fit, one of a kind! Cons: the layers of lining got a twisted as the night went on, but on the plus side the most outer lining layer stayed put so nothing showed. Fit: I am smaller on top and curvier on bottom, so the 10 fit great on bottom and I easily safety pinned the halter closure to take it in a bit. I am 5'4" and wore short (1.5'' inch) heels and the length was perfect. This was my first RTR experience and I absolutely loved it! This dress was wonderful! Would definitely recommend.
Perfect length, wore 5 inch heels and it didn't drag at all. Lace is divine. Color is gorgeous. The zipper is definitely tight in the ribs but the rest of the gown flows.
Amazing dress that was comfortable, elegant and a true eye catcher!! Loved it so much

links_reviews_title: Felt comfortable and confident all night long!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing! It was high quality, stunning, and very different from what I'd usually wear. I was in between sizes though. The 6 fit well but it was loose on the top (can't adjust the halter). The 4 was perfect on top but the waistband was pretty tight.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a formal spring wedding
links_reviews_text: This is my fav RTR dress ever! I was nervous that it would be too long or too low in the front but I wore 4 inch heels (could probably have worn 3 inch heels just fine) and the front dip was no problem at all. I wore a regular strapless bra and everything stayed tucked in well. The ribbon at the waist is not forgiving and may bother some. Also, a stiletto heel can occasionally catch the lacework, so perhaps a delicate sandal with bit wider heel would make for the best shoe. I loved this dress so much and was sad to return it!

Everyone loved the floral lace - very appropriate for cool May wedding. Only con was the length, but that's my fault I'm short & there's really no hemming tape or safety pins that can hold this up- heavy material. Overall favorite rental

This dress is amazing and I absolutely adored it. You will for sure stand out in a sea of black dresses. The length was perfect, and it was very flattering. The only con is that the ribbon was a little tight, so where I usually wear a 0, the 2 was wayyyy more comfortable. Order up for your backup!

This dress is great, comfortable, flattering, eye-catching. A couple of words of caution. It is a bit long. If you are on the short side, plan to wear the highest heels you have. Also, the built-in sash in the waist is not forgiving. Having said that, I loved wearing it and loved how I felt wearing it.

I loved this dress. Wish I could keep it. It was so flattering and unique. I reviewed so many compliments all night. The top buttons around the neck were a little loose but that was from wear and tear from multiple rentals I am sure. I should have got a 4R because I had some gap in my back but not much. I just loved the dress! Oh, hard to wear a heel though because the lace, so I wore a suede wedge which was okay for spring. Rent this...you will not regret it!

I received so many compliments on this dress! It is such a flattering cut. I was told by numerous strangers that I looked like a mermaid. The colors are so unique and the lace is done beautifully. I'm between a size 6 & 8, but the 8 fit much better. I'd go a size up if you're in between.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful views in early September right outside of Denver, CO. Dress was perfect.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly. I recommend maybe a wedge because my heels kept getting caught in the lace at the bottom.
This dress was perfect for the summer wedding I attended! The fit is super flattering; got lots of compliments!
LOVED THIS DRESS!!! I'm 5'3 135 lbs and the 4R fit like a glove.

This dress was perfect for my cousins summer black tie wedding. It was shapely without being super low cut and the halter wasn't too tight. The dress was pretty heavy but the lace made it pretty comfortable. I felt like a celeb!
Very beautiful, I felt like a million dollars wearing this dress, it was so comfortable and fit so perfectly. Without a doubt you will be the star of the show wearing this gown! I loved it.
Loved the fit and comfort, great lace fabric. This a bit long though and if you have pointy heel at may get stuck at times. But over all loved the dress
This dress is incredible. 6L was prefect as I am tall, wore flats and have a small chest. Even prettier in person.
A gorgeous dress with unique, heavy lace! I wore this for my birthday dinner with my husband. It fit wonderfully, and true to size.

Loved this dress! It was perfect for a formal summer wedding. Definitely more form fitting than what I would usually choose but it hugged my body in just the right spots. I ended up putting lightly lined cups in the top of the dress to give my chest a little lift but otherwise it worked well for my body type. I have a wide rib cage and am between sizes right now. The 8 fit me well and wasn't too tight, however, it was on the shorter side length wise. Only downside was that my fiancé got caught on my dress a few times on the dance floor so be aware that the lacy material gets caught easily on buttons and shoes.

Fun casual sweater with a unique texture. Sleeves are VERY fitted, make sure you have skinny arms! I sized up to medium and it fit just right. I wore to a Christmas dinner and got lots of compliments.
Well made, adorable top. Arms were a bit snug but as most mentioned they loosen up after you've had it on. High quality. Would definitely rent again.

This top is great! The material is great- heavier than I originally expected which came in handy on a chilly night. I got a ton of compliments. The midsection was looser than I would have liked, so next time I may try a smaller size. Overall, a classic piece that paired with dress pants, jeans and a skirt. Versatile and sophisticated.
The arms are really tight, however, it's not uncomfortable once you get it on. Form fitting, but not super tight in the torso. I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Great twist on a classic top
links_reviews_text: I tend to be an 8/medium in tops and the large fit well. This top showed the perfect amount of skin to be modest enough for a family dinner but still exciting. The material is textured which also adds some interest but is had to see in the photos. Great top!

links_reviews_title: LOVED IT. I wore this every chance I got.
links_reviews_text: This sweater was so comfortable and adorable and fashionable. I didn't get that many compliments on it, but I felt like a million bucks. It's super cozy and stylish. It was true to size. If I lived in a colder state I would've purchased it.

links_reviews_title: This top is a great choice for feeling sexy, yet still warm in the winter!
links_reviews_text: I loved how structured the material was because it gave me a great shape. Was a little tight in the arms at first, but I didn't notice it after the first 10 min. Would rent again!
I really like the texture of this top. One small negative was that the sleeves are a little on the tight side, while the bodice is looser. I didn't mind it though and wore more than once.
This is the second time I rented this great sweater. Fits great, wonderful material and the cut is flattering yet conservative.
I'm not sure exactly how this is supposed to fit but the way the large fit me made the top look dumpy. I'm by no means a small woman and a large should fit me just fine but this top just seems wrong.
This piece is very stiff and tight to get into, but comfortable and quite flattering once on.
I'm usually a size 8/10 on top and the arms on this were too tight for me to comfortably wear, while the body was loose.

Wore with jeans for a concert, love the shoulder cut out. The material is stiff and it's not very form fitting, so it didn't look as sexy as I was hoping. Good enough to wear but probably won't rent again.

I didn't wind up wearing this piece, simply because the weather turned warm and I felt it was more appropriate for colder temps. The sleeves are unusually tight while the body is somewhat bulky. Check out the photos posted by others because there is really nice detail to the material, which you don't necessarily notice on the RTR model.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this top because of the fit.
links_reviews_text: Sleeves, especially wrists were incredibly tight compared to the rest of the top.

The material is very weird - super thick and it had an odd shape. This shirt was too short for my long torso. I couldn't wear it. I was so bummed because I had planned to wear this for a rare evening out.
well made and the arms are very flattering

links_reviews_title: Was going to wear for work/casual work event.
links_reviews_text: Fit well in the arms but the shoulder gap was larger than expected and did not lay flat. Stomach/waist areas a little large. Sturdy material.

links_reviews_title: Nice sweater, I got multiple compliments when I wore it.
links_reviews_text: The material is very tight, it was really tight on the arms and not super comfortable. It was good for date night but not so much for wearing all day
Easy fit, comfortable yet dressy enough to wear out
The arms were tight but not too tight. The fabric looks like it would stretch but it doesn't. Unfortunately, the stomach had no shape but I do have a smaller waist for a size large.
Tight in the arms, thought it was too long, thicker material than I thought.
Fit is a little boxy

This top runs a little on the small side. I normally wear an XS/S and I could fit into the XS, but it was really tight. I didn't end up wearing it. It also has a pattern detail that's not visible in the pictures, just an FYI if you're expecting a plain black top.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but the sleeves were VERY tight
links_reviews_text: I ended up just wearing this for a flight - I had originally planned to wear to my sister's bachelorette at a hockey game, but the sleeves were way too tight to be comfortable. (And I have tiny wrists...). This was my first time trying a cold shoulder top, and it was very flattering. The material was nice and thick, and felt high quality. The knit detail was pretty. It wasn't right for me overall, but I could see this really working for others.

Not my thang. The fabric was stiff. I'd say, this runs small. If you have a long torso ( like I do) you probably won't be into this top. Unless you are REALLY into your belly and want to show it off at the same time you show off your shoulders. If you are a bit short and you don't care about uncomfortable fabrics rubbing you tight against your skin, you should rent this ASAP.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear. I did not like the way it looked on me
links_reviews_text: nothing special

links_reviews_title: Ran too small - did not end up wearing.
links_reviews_text: I liked the idea of this top but the sleeves were sooo tight I could barely get it on. The rest of it fit fine but the sleeves were extremely uncomfortable and I felt like I couldn't move my arms. I had planned to wear it to work but couldn't imagine being that uncomfortable for 9 hours so I sent it back to make room for something else.
Loved this sweater and the detail in the material. Very cute!

links_reviews_title: Could not wear it -- too small.
links_reviews_text: Couldnt wear it because it ran so small. The fabric is not stretchable.

I generally wear a small but prefer roomy medium in sweaters and this was snug, particularly in the arms and I'm not large or muscular. Beyond that the material was very odd, not soft in the least and quite the opposite of a natural fiber. Sending it back unworn.

The arms fit tight and are hard to adjust. My arms are pretty toned and I had a hard time getting this sweater adjusted on my arms and it felt tight, but it was cute and I like the material. It was a little short on my taller frame. Good for a very petite frame.

I was really excited about this too but definitely let down by the fit. The arms and shoulders were really tight and the middle was really lose. Not flattering at all. The material is also very stiff and not comfortable.
Sleeves are much too tight, but rest of the sweater fits comfortable (I have skinny arms).
Short
This top is amazing! I recommend it for Fall or Winter due to the thick knit fabric, but I wore it to a friends' dinner, and then to work -- you can wear it for any occasion!

This is such a pretty alternative to a plain shirt! It has a great weight to it which is perfect for cooler weather, and at 5'8 I love a top I don't feel like I'm always tugging down. It's rather tight on the sleeves but not in the midsection. Would rent again!
Snug but flattering

I was a little surprised bu the fit of this top. Quality fabric but an odd cut. The arms were nicley fitted but the belly/waist area had so much extra. I felt like it made my midsection look heavier due to the thickness of the fabric that all sorta gathered and bunched around my waist when I sat down. It felt a little frumpy for my body type.
Wasn't my favorite! But still cute and fun! Good material and versatile. Wore it out to a concert.
Absolutely loved this dress! My favorite so far! I rented this for a formal Valentine's Day party and it was perfect. Very fitted but sucks you in! Runs a little small but overall excellent RTR pick!

First I ordered a Size 10 . unfortunately it was too small around the bust I almost cried but RTR was ON IT . They sent me a new dress the NEXT DAY. I was so pleased . This dress is sexy and it hugs me all the right places .

I got so many compliments in this dress! I wore a strapless bra under that worked really well. I am normally a size 8 and went up to a 10 based on reviews. I will say that the dress is quite restricting through the legs so be careful

I say this fits true to size, meaning for Likely. I wear a 4 in this brand, similar to Elizabeth and James- one size up from my standard. Dress fits perfect, color is a gorgeous red and material is thick and keeps everything feeling tucked in.

This dress was gorgeous! It was out of my comfort zone, for sure, but my husband begged me to wear it. I'm a pear shape (32" bust, 40" hips), and it worked, but it was definitely hugging my hips! I got tons of compliments about how it accentuated my small waist and the color was popping!

This dress made me feel like a knockout - I got so many compliments! Great quality and stunning color! It does run small (I'm usually a 4-6) so I ordered the 6 and 8. 8 fit better in the bust but on accident I ended up wearing the 6 the night of the wedding and it worked fine! Be careful getting in and out of cars as the slit doesn't allow for much movement!
Perfect length for a work Christmas party while still being flattering

Dress definitely runs small- I am a classic 4 in dresses and sized up. Word spanx to smooth my silhouette (the dress is CLINGY) and didn't need a bra for my 34 C bust. Word to the wise, though- people could definitely tell when it was cold in the room- so be aware of your headlights situation. Wore to an upscale cocktail party and felt like Jean Harlow. Rent it and prepare to get a lot of attention!
The color is vibrant and beautiful. I love the stretch in the material. It holds you in where you need it to as well.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress! Classy yet sexy. So many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering fit. Stretchy material hugged curves nicely.
Fit like a glove. Super comfortable.

I rented this dress for a family wedding and it fit like a dream! I didn't want to take it off because it looked so good. I received so many compliments and it was comfortable all night! I'm pretty sure that this is going to be one of the dresses that I purchase.

You will feel great it this dress. I wore it on a very hot day and felt very sexy wearing it. It's a bit tight in the ribcage so I think sizing up would be good if you're not sure or have a larger chest. Loved the color. Fun for a day.

I loved this dress so much! When all the other guests started changing into comfy clothes to keep the party going, I stayed in my dress because I didn't want to take it off. It was so comfortable, this fabric, great length, and so so gorgeous. I got tons of compliments on it. Definitely definitely size up though or else it might be too tight to sit down. I'm normally a 4-6 and I ended up wearing an 8. Honestly, I might have been more comfortable in a 10, but I liked the fitted look.

links_reviews_title: Felt amazing in this dress!! So comfortable!

links_reviews_text: This dress seriously fit me like a glove. I wore a size 6 and it wasn't tight anywhere and was so comfortable all night long! It was sexy yet classy and the color was amazing. Actually thinking about just buying it!

The color had a little extra pop than the average red which looked amazing on and in pictures. The material provided just enough elastic to look good on my curves but not enough elastic to take over for the 99 and the 2000.. Also, if you are and/or bigger than a C cup & not going for the "Big Boobs McGee" look - I'd highly advise against this dress. I'm a DD but the cleavage in my picture isn't an accurate reflection of the actual cleavage shown when moving around.

I don’t usually wear form fitting dresses but I wanted to change it up and I’m so happy I did! The dress made me feel like a star and was perfect for a semi-formal wedding. It does run tight - but that’s why you want this dress! I’m 5’ and 130 lbs and would have preferred to wear a six but the straps were too long. Even the 4 the straps were longer than I’d ideally like but it fit like a glove! I work spanx underneath to help stop the thigh sweat and I was able to dance comfortably all night! Definitely would recommend!
So many compliments!

I ordered this as a back up dress and didn't end up wearing it but will definitely order it again for another event. This dress is definitely sexy and hugs all your curves!!!!! This dress literally fit me perfectly (32in waist, 44in hips)

links_reviews_title: The dress was a great color for a Fourth of July weekend wedding.
links_reviews_text: The reviews were true about the dress running small. I usually wear a 4 and sized up and the 6 fit me. I wasn’t able to close the 4 in the back, but the 6 fit perfectly.

I was really paranoid about how tight this dress was going to be but with a pair of spanx, it was amazing! I felt so hot! The only issue is that the bottom was a little tight so to bend over to tighten my shoes, etc., I needed to hike up my skirt so it didn't rip. Overall, I loved it!

I absolutely love this dress. It fits well, it's classy but still sexy and fun. I had enough support that I didn't need a bra and that's amazing. My only complaint is that it runs small. I wore my backup size (6) and it was still a little tight in the rib cage. So I would totally recommend this dress but definitely go at least one size up! I probably should have gone up two.

I wore this dress for a party at a country club. Very sexy form fitting dress.. got tons of compliments. The only thing I would say is if you have a big chest the dress is very form fitting in chest area. My husband loves this dress and I would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: I didn’t end up wearing this dress but i absolutely loved the fit of it. sexy but classy
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove and ran true to size. However the straps were alittle to large and without much of a chest it would of needed some tape to keep the top up. However i loved the length and how it hugged all the curves.
Dress fit is very tight around the legs and made dancing tough. If you really like to get down, I'd pick a different dress. Otherwise, a showstopper all night!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Originally rented this dress for the rehearsal dinner but this one went better with his dress whites than the other dress did so I ended up wearing it to the wedding with a shaw. Very tight fit, but that’s what I prefer so I liked it. Size up if you have a larger busy like I do, I could barely zip it to the top. The color is gorgeous and the fabric is thick but breathable. I wish I could have kept it I was so in love!

This dress fit my figure well! Not too tight across the hips. A little looser up top but no gapping. I wore without a bra. I love the bright red color! I wore this to an outdoor wedding and it did not show any sweat. I do think it was a little formal for the "rustic" wedding I went to, but I loved it and would rent again!

The dress was a knockout, but it DEFINITELY runs very small. I usually wear a 10, but even the 12 was tight. The color was amazing & it did show off my curves. My husband LOVED it & even wanted me to buy it. It helped make my Broadway birthday celebration a night to remember!
I wore this to an event at Carnegie hall and it was definitely a showstopper! Highly recommend

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful! The cut and fit of this dress was great!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful and hugged me in all the right places. I (165lbs, 5'7, 36B) wore a size 10, which was a bit snug. I would have probably gone up a size for a little bit more room, but I was still comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Great for standing, less so for dancing
links_reviews_text: Great dress for pictures and standing/sitting, but moving around and especially dancing was hindered by the fit.

I felt soooo glam in this little red dress! It was super flattering on too. I worry about finding things that fit me. It was small, but that worked for me! I'm short and it was midi length. Would definitely rent again!

It was very curve appealing. I got compliments all night. The fabric stretches with you so you don't have to worry about ripping. The size 4 fit but was a little snug and the 6 was more comfortable for a night of too many cocktails!
