This dress saved the day as the original one I rented didn't cut it. RTR saved the day when they sent me this dress, and another backup (which I LOVED)! You definitely get noticed in this dress!

This dress fit like a glove, outlining all the curves. The dress is my favorite combo- its high quality but also fun with the vibrant color and flattering shape. Wore it to a graduation formal- the length made it more professional and the snug shape made it hotttt!!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress, got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Wore this red beauty for a fraternity formal event. My date and I killed the game in our red ensembles! I wish I would have ordered the 0, the 2 fit fine but I over estimated how much weight I had lost in recent months. Love RTR!!! Dress was snug around my busy (perfect fit) with a little more room around my hips. I was looking for a super fitting fit but dress was slightly (ever so slightly) too big.

Loved this dress! Very thick material, stayed nicely. I did have to go up a size, it fit snuggly. I am used to having to wear a bra but didn’t have one that wouldn’t show under the dress. However, I was not uncomfortable at all. The dress held me in place and looked great!

This dress was amazing! Love the cleavage, the length, the way it hugged my curves. Nice material, did not ride up. Easy to wear. Wore simple jewelry and makeup, simple shoes, as the dress spoke for itself! Wore shapewear and invisible bra inserts. Run small for its size, I normally wear a size 0.

links_reviews_title: The dress was great, got a lot of great compliments. Definitely recommend.
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 4 and the 6 based off of the reviews saying that it ran small. I was unable to wear the 6 because the dress that I received had a large stain right in the center of the chest. Luckily, the 4 fit well and I didn't have to worry about the 6.
Beautiful top, but wasn't great for my C cup chest. It was very tight across.
I love this top! Cute, comfy, true to size. Great for date night with my husband.

The colors are so beautiful and this is the perfect shirt for going out in the summer to a nice dinner. I paired with white jeans and received many compliments! Fits true to size, has a zipper on the side!
All that cloth did nothing for my figure. Need a strapless bra. Did not wear.
Fit great. Comfortable
Perfect fit and very flattering! I'm holding on to it for a while and might buy it.
Very flattering w capris or pants. Great for day to night. Just throw in a black sweater or shrug & your covered for vacation dinners.
I wanted to love it and picked it for a girls brunch. Odd fit for my body. Very snug across the chest. Sent it back without wearing it
Loved loved loved this!
It fit nicely. I have larger bust and this shirt complemented my shape.
super comfortable
I wasn't able to wear this to the party (my flight was delayed by 3 hours) but it looked very edgy and sexy on me when I tried it on!

links_reviews_title: I love the versatility of this top.
links_reviews_text: I wore it for a dressy "date night" but could easily have worn it with jeans. It was a bit low cut in the chest area but I was able to manage nonetheless. It runs slightly small - I wore an XL and typically will wear a L and sometimes M, depending on the cut.
I wore this for a classic rock outdoor concert. It felt groovy and fun!
I don't have much in the way of shall we say bust? So I should probably have gone a size down.

I have an hourglass shape and this wasn't the most flattering. There's a lot of fabric in the midsection/waist that made me look thicker than normal. The cut made me think it would accent my hourglass but it really just made me have less shape than normal. The colors also weren't great...sort of washed out or maybe faded. Couldn't wear with black pants (my plan) so went with jeans instead which made for a much more casual look than what I intended. The length was great on my super long torso though.
This was comfortable and cute top, can be dressed up on down!
The material bunches a little bit in the chest area but it's not too noticeable and generally, it's a flattering top, light and flowy.

links_reviews_title: not a good fit for me
links_reviews_text: drape too long

links_reviews_title: This dress was super flattering and perfect for a gala.
links_reviews_text: I felt super confident and got many compliments.
I wasn't sure of my exact size so I ordered a 12 and 14. The 12 was too small but the 14 was comfortable. The material did not have any give.
Dress was a little tighter in the hips and looser in the shoulders but overall great dress. I loved the length!

links_reviews_title: High quality material and construction, fun flare
links_reviews_text: Ran small so wore a size larger, was tight in the ribs. Felt great even at a hot wedding!

links_reviews_title: I love this dress! Feels sexy without being too showy
links_reviews_text: The neckline is just right and the lace stops it being frumpy as it is quite long.

I loved this dress and wanted it to fit perfectly. Unfortunately it was snug in the hips and I had to keep tugging it down. The picture isn't great but the bottom of the dress is so lovely. If I were standing still all night I would have given five starts.

links_reviews_title: Dress is better looking in person than in stock photos.
links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress with great detailing. Perfect for a wedding. I did initially have trouble with the zipper and so did my husband. I would rent this dress again though.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for attending bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: Enjoyed wearing this dress to my friend's bridal shower! I got several compliments and loved the lace at the bottom & neckline detail! This dress was very form-fitting. I'm currently around 150lb, 5' 4", 34B. I felt like I should have worn shapewear to keep my midsection in check since it hugged all the curves. There was also some strange gapping in the upper back area, as if there was too much fabric there. So overall it might work better for a different body type, but I still had a great time wearing it!

I rented this dress for a work awards event. It was the perfect little black dress. The cut and length was very flattering, and the lace detail added a fun element. My dress arrived a little wrinkly through the mid section from shipping, but the lighting at the event was dark, so you couldn't really see it. I'm sure a light steam would easily have fixed it. What I loved most about this dress is the length - it elongated my body and hit just below the knee (I'm 5'5). I wore a 6 and found the fit true to size. My backup was a size smaller, and while it was more fitted in the waist, it was a little tight around the hips.
This is the first time I rented a Draper James dress and I was really pleased with the quality and the style. The bottom skirt design really makes this dress unique

links_reviews_title: A great party dress! Wore this to an office holilday event and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Dress is true to size. I am a standard size 12. As you can see, I am no skinny-minnie. This dress was snug, but not too snug. Wore it with Spanx to smooth out the "bumps" and I was still able to dance with comfort. Great dress and I'd rent it again in a heartbeat!

I'm usually between a 4 and a 6, so the 4 was a little tight around my backside. I have an hourglass figure, but thanks to Spanx the dress worked out. If you're between sizes and bigger on the bottom like me, I'd recommend going with the larger size. The fabric has a little stretch and is thin which helps in a form fitting dress like that. I really loved the lace detail and the scalloping on the neckline.
The dress fit well, I'm a size four and it fit perfectly. I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my brother's rehearsal dinner. Beautiful dress, even at 6 months pregnant :)
links_reviews_text: This was a beautiful dress that definitely ran a little big. I am typically a size 2, but was able to fit in the size 4 being 27 weeks pregnant with no problem. I received many compliments and just loved the shape and material.
The dress was super comfortable and fit well. The lace detail on the bottom was the perfect touch. Only con was the dress hit mid calf on petite frame (4’11).
I got so many compliments and loved everything about this dress, should have bought it
The dress is very pretty and everything runs true to size except the hip area. This is extremely tight. I went up 2 sizes and if you have any hips then it will not fit.
This dress is simple but elegant. The lace bottom and small scalloping feature around the neckline was perfect. It was easy to add jewelry, high heals and I added a mink stole and was done!

I usually were a size 8, but this dress is a bit tight in the chest. I'm glad I had the larger size because I loved how classy, sexy and dramatic this dress is. recommend! I would buy it if my life included more occasions to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Ended up not wearing this dress for the intended event.
links_reviews_text: Giving this dress 2 stars because the fabric had no give at all, and I had ordered the largest size available (14) so there was no backup size for me to rent. Luckily, I found a dress in my own closet to wear for the event I rented this dress for.
Fit very well, and was comfortable, too!
Fit great,I found the dress twisted a bit with movement - so would end up having to readjust often, but if not dancing would probably be fine? It may have interacted weird with the Spanx :)
I wore this for an awards dinner at work! It was perfect and I felt so beautiful in it. I'm 5'3" 125 lbs and the 4 fit well.
It was an ounce too big for me. I'm usually a two, sometimes a 4, but in this case the 4 was too big.
Wasn’t happy with the waist area. Too big.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! So flattering! I didn't want to send it back!
links_reviews_text: fitted.

The fit was good, not tight at all and really comfy to wear chaperoning a high school dance with my date, the assistant principal. The lace at the bottom and v-neck line added style and class to this LBD. Professional and present.
I wore this dress to a reception at a convention and it was super cute and flirty!! Would definately rent again!!!

links_reviews_title: It was a wedding for a friend.
links_reviews_text: I was super excited about this dress, but unfortunately it didn't work out for me. The dress is really lovely, though I found the loops at the neckline to be a little "frumpy." Overall the cut was nice. Length was longer then I expected. It looks like it hits the model in the image at her knees, but the lace definitely hits below the knee (more midi-length then knee-length). I'm not a tall person, so midi lengths tend to make me look even shorter. My biggest issue comes from sizing. I have not quite figured out the sizing aspect of RtR yet. This was my 3rd rental and it was the 3rd time I couldn't wear the dresses I selected due to size issues. Each time the dresses have been MUCH smaller than I expected (even though I practically memorized and agonized over the size charts on each dress I selected). This time I opted to go 1 and 2 sizes up from what I normally wear and we got much closer with the sizing. However, the 8 was just a bit too snug and I was swimming in the 10. I ended up wearing something I had in my closet.
Great fit. Not too short or too low cut neck line.

Easy to dress up or down, and easy to pair with accessories. I was in-between the 6 and 8, but went with the 8 so that I had more room in the hips (the waist and bust was a bit large here). The lining kind of stuck to spanx when I tried the 6. Also, lightweight which is a plus!

links_reviews_title: Dress fit great. Received a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Trim at hem and neckline was very worn and discolored.
Loved the dress; I wore a size 2 and it fit perfectly. I wore it to an office function and it was the perfect combo of dressy but not too fancy.
Very cute little black dress. I thought it ran a little large, but that made it even more comfortable. I liked the little pop of lace on the bottom. Added something special.

This was an emergency backup dress that I had sent to the hotel after my initial dresses failed. I ordered it on a whim, not really thrilled with the online picture. Even seeing on the hanger I was unimpressed. However, once on, it fit so beautifully and the lace on the bottom is fantastic. Hugs the hourglass figure great, but you have plenty of movement with the flared lace that I was completely comfortable all evening. A simple but fun little black dress!
The dress was beautiful and looked just like the pictures. I did not wear it because it was my back up choice and I loved my first choice that I didn't need the back up.
Not a good fit, I was expecting it to be more fitted
Gorgeous! So flattering.
Very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Rented for a cocktail party as a back up dress and loved it more than my first options.
links_reviews_text: I am 5' 4" and it was to long for me. Other than that the dress was beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Bridal Shower cancelled by COVID but bride still shines.
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress for my bridal shower, which unfortunately was cancelled due to CVOIDafter this dress already shipped. Since I already spent the money, my maid of honor insisted we due a virtual shower and dress up. This dress is heavy, and has a blue under layer, like the other reviews have noted, but it is beautiful! If I was wearing it out, I probably would've streamed it or ironed it. The bottom is asymmetrical with extending pieces of fabric that could look wonky if not laying in place

Beautiful dress, not typical which is what I loved. Has a slight blue shimmer inner layer. Absolutely perfect for my #BridalShower . Received slots of complements but the best part is just how absolutely comfortable it was. This was definitely a #Win

I wore this dress for my bridal shower and I didn't want to take it off! It fit really well and was a very flattering cut, and I absolutely love how it photographed! The shimmery blue detail underneath was so fun too! And I got sooo many compliments!! If you're at all on the fence about this dress, rent it! You won't regret it!!

I rented this for a graduation in the South and it is adorable. I sized up and am happy I did, as it was a little tight around the hips. The zipper goes all the way up in the back but i was able to get it on and off by myself without issue. Not sure I'll rush to rent again but cute for a special occasion!

Heavy in that good high quality way. Slighter shiny under layer making it a bit smarter than it might seem. Nice fit. 3/4 length with that low ruffle hem, which might not be the best on shorter ladies. I felt like this needed to be worn with some quite high heels to get height to make it look elegant. Would consider buying.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my Jack and Jill wedding shower. Received so many compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: I was suppose to receive another dress, but due to an issue I received this dress instead. And I am so glad that happened! This dress was perfect. The fit is spot on, fit like a glove! The lace is beautiful and the underneath lining is a magnificent blue silver metallic color that does not ride up. The dress material is heavy, but I felt super comfortable in it. The sleeves can be somewhat restricting, but that was during the clean up time after the party where I was lifting and moving a lot. I love this dress. I felt like a modern day, elegant and fun Victorian woman.
Comfortable dress with tons of flair. I just might buy it!
This dress is amazing! Pictures don't do it any justice. The silver and blue lining adds to the intricacy of the dress. Definitely a winner. You won't be disappointed. I received tons of compliments.

I wore this dress for my bridal shower. It was a good fit without being too tight. It was easy to dance in as well. The most amazing part of the dress was the blue shimmery mermaid fabric beneath the lace which made the dress even more interesting!

links_reviews_title: The material at the bottom made it the best swirly dress! Danced all night!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful and fit like a glove. Felt like a country music star!

links_reviews_title: Wore for my bridal shower. Looks and feels expensive. So pretty!!!
links_reviews_text: Wore the smaller size, even with a large chest.
I absolutely love this dress. It made me feel like a million bucks!

I wore this to my summertime bridal shower and I loved it. The lace is really unique and the silver lame slip underneath is really fun. When you try it on, just be sure to pull down the silver slip part so it's not bunch around your waist. The silver slip doesn't hide flaws well. Dress was very comfortable. I'm usually between a size 2 and 4 (I'm probably around 133lbs right now) and the 38 fit perfectly. I got a ton of compliments from the ladies at the shower. Highly recommend.
The fit was great. The lace is gorgeous and adds drama. The dress under the lace can creep up when walking quickly, so needs to be pulled back down, but wasn't terribly inconvenient.

links_reviews_title: Oh my gosh!!!!! Stunning! Looks like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Beautiful quality and metallic blue lining. Wore this to my bridal shower. Got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Loved the detail and sleeves on this dress.
links_reviews_text: The one negative is there seems to be an excess of material when it comes to the lace overlay.
A little tight but so beautiful!!! Shimmery grey blue underneath. Zipper back.
This dress is beautiful and true to size but it is see-through
I rented this as an option for my bridal shower, but didn't end up wearing it since it was very much see-through!
Beautiful dress but runs small.
The sleeves and high neck make this dress hard to wear. If it was a keyhole or deep v neckline, it would balance the sleeves. It looked great from the side, but very frumpy from the front.

links_reviews_title: Kinda looked like little bo peep
links_reviews_text: Granted the dress was too big (in between a 2 and 4 usually and sized up) and the dress just looked super awkward. The sleeves were very puffy, the dress did not have much shape, the under slip was like an icy shiny blue which was unexpected, and it was see through. Just not what I expected!
Ran very big
I didn't wear it. Very disappointed. Color was not like the picture and more greenish. Zipper didn't even worked.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress, too fancy for our party
links_reviews_text: I will definitely rent this again! It's SO fun and gorgeous. You can't tell in photos but the underlay is actually a nice metallic shimmer.
The dress is fabulous. The layer underneath is a subtle sparkly blue fabric. Will be sizing down and wearing for my bridal shower!
Amazing dress. I would wear it again. Comfy.

links_reviews_title: I loved this but made shoulders look wide
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous fabric, High quality, but boxy in shoulders

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful dress that compliments the body.
links_reviews_text: NA

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Underneath fabric is actually silver & has more sheen than pictured. Shows curves!
links_reviews_text: May almost be on the smaller side
It was loose in the waist but I have an hourglass figure
It fits great!
This dress lacked stretch and the lace was a bit too "hard." The lace is cream, but the sheath is an iridescent blue.
Be advised, there is a very noticeable silver/metallic underlay beneath the lace-- this was not apparent to me from the pictures
Dress ran small on top, large from hips down. I did not wear- dress wore me, rather than me wearing the dress.

This dress was super beautiful and perfect for my occasion! The slit in the middle was a nice surprise because it elevated the dress in a whole new way. The only thing about this dress is that you don't really have a lot of range of motion because the slit is so restricting in terms of what you can do. So would not recommend this dress if you're planning on dancing after or doing anything that requires a lot of movement. Overall, love the dress though!

This dress is so flattering but runs small! I normally wear a size 4, ordered a 4 and could barley it up. ended up wearing it for a photo and changing into a different dress for the event. I would definitely order again but in a larger size.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a wedding, nice fit and flattering. Hugs all the right places
links_reviews_text: Fits well, a bit tight in the chest

I wore this dress for a black tie wedding and it was a hit! It hugged my curves so well. I am usually an 8 or a 10 in dresses but after reading the reviews, I decided to order a 10 and a 12. Ended up wearing the 12 because the 10 was pretty snug. Only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because it was a little hard to sit in.
Great fit and very flattering! Wore for a night out in Vegas. Not a lot of stretch but holds you in just right.
The perfect LBD! Super comfortable. Cocktail length fit

links_reviews_title: The dress made me feel absolutely beautiful! Loved it and will recommend RTR to friends
links_reviews_text: It fit perfect! The fabric was thick but comfortable and stretchy enough to the point you don't feel like you're going to rip it if you bend too far to one side
In case you're wondering how dressed up for a wedding to get...this is the perfect go-to dress.

links_reviews_title: My mom & I attended the Celine Dion concert in Vegas. We both LOVED our dresses!!
links_reviews_text: The dress was very tight, even for my tiny mom. She didn't want to what anything for fear it would fit even tighter.
I have a larger chest and this fit great - it looked classy and sexy! The dress was super comfortable and very flattering.

I was really excited for the dress, and glad that I ordered a size up after reading the reviews. However I have a very "stick-straight" body type so I have no hips at all, and unfortunately this dress ended up being baggy in the hips area. It fit like a glove in all other areas of the dress, but I did not end up wearing this dress because I did not want it to be loose in the hips. If you have a curvier body type, I would recommend.

I loved this dress! It hugged l, and smoothed out, all of my curves. I'm only 5'2 so the bottom of the dress came down to the middle of my calves, so it was perfect for a black tie optional wedding. It was sleek and formal without going overboard - as a plus one that's what you want!

links_reviews_title: Low key, Sexiest dress I've ever worn.
links_reviews_text: This dress was definitely out of my comfort zone. I worn this back in November to a wedding. It was snug but fit like a glove (see what I did there). But hands down so glad i wore it becuase it was perfect. On the more scandalous side but perfect.

links_reviews_title: Like most of LIKELY, runs small, but this dress is KILLER
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress -- photos don't do it justice. Material is thick but stretchy, the stitching on the top and the back straps make this LBD a bit more interesting. Be ready to turn heads, rawr!
This dress hugged every curve and was just a little too small, so really squeezed everything in. It was very comfortable. Would definitely wear again.

Wore this for a wedding (nothing wrong with a LBD for a June wedding!) and it was perfect. Pretty darn comfy for being so fitted, and truly did fit perfectly in all the right places. Love the length and the little slit in the middle for an extra oomph.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved the dress -- with one tiny problem.
links_reviews_text: The dress fits great, but don't go small on the size. I thought I could squeeze into a 4 but couldn't breathe. Had to go with the 6. Overall I got a bunch of compliments, but don't expect to spread your legs. No really! One wide step and the slit in the middle ripped more. I had to pin it even before the wedding to avoid flashing anyone. Once we secured that, however, the night was great.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress is thick and a bit stretchy. Lots of structure. It definitely runs a bit small. I have a small waist, larger legs and booty and broad shoulders. It really fit me (in a size larger) like a glove. Did not wear a bra. Slit was sexy but not too high!

This was my "revenge" dress I wore to a friends wedding and WOW. The reactions I got while wearing this dress made me feel like a million bucks. I will say, it is VERY fitted and does not give so I would size up for a backup especially if you have a booty and larger bust. However, the material is thick and smooths everything out to accentuate those curves. I will probably be buying.
Great combination of sexy and classy. I wouldn't recommended if you're bustier. I'm 34c and any bigger the dress would have been a tad inappropriate for the occasion.

links_reviews_title: Sisterhood Of The Traveling Black Dress!
links_reviews_text: Let me tell you about this little black dress. It came perfectly on time and looked very basic on the hanger, but once you slip it on, it transforms you into a HOTTIE! I mean VAVAVA-VOOOOOM! The dress looks FABULOUS on. The size 8 fit me, but I decided that breathing was essential for my evening and opted for the size 12. They didn't have a size 10 available for me that weekend, which was a shame because the 12 was a little to large on me, especially in the bust area and the straps. However, I loved the dress so much and never felt so good in my skin. It truly made me exude confidence. It was simply perfection! Enjoy! Xo C
Fit perfectly, alittle right in the legs but overall the one I wore to the wedding
I'm not one for black dresses at weddings. It this fit was amazing ! Definitely shows your figure and the bust can be a tad revealing depending on your bust size.

This is the perfect little black dress! It fits like a glove and hugs in all the right places. I will say it runs small!! I haven’t worn a size 10 since I was pregnant-but my husband had to squeeze me into the 8! That being said-it was still comfortable and flattering and I was able to go braless:). I’m not sure how the 10 would have fit? Instead of ordering a 6 and 8 probably should have ordered 8 and 10. I am 5’7”, 148 and an athletic build. Received many compliments.

Like others have said, this dress fits very small. I wear a 2/4 normally and the 4 was comically small. The 6 was even pushing it and I had to say a few Hail Marys when zipping it up, but once on- IT WAS AWESOME! I probably would have worn the 8, had it been available. It was tight in the ribcage but loose in my hips (I'm pretty small bottomed). I would rent again for another event definitely. Material is stretchy just enough to give you some movement.
Someone called me an "Amazonian goddess" in this dress so... I'd say that's a success! It's definitely fitted, but there's a little bit of stretch. I'm a 6-8 on top, size 12 on bottom, and wore a 10.
Decibels runs small, but if you love your curves this is the dress for you. Definitely have to wear nubra if your bust isn't perky. Will rent this dress in every color when I can!
This dress hugs you in all the right ways and makes you feel sexy and confident. I love it. Also I'm very full busted and I can wear this without a bra and feel comfortable!!
True to size but body conscious. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed. Would buy this dress in a heart beat!
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove but comfortable. I could dance all night in it! Would rent again for sure!!

ALLL week I was running around trying to find a dress for my cousins wedding. I would go to store after store try on a zillion dresses and hate them all and then BAM I remembered @renttherunway. Went online and read reviews of tons of designer dresses, in half an hour I rented this dress and a jacket. So super simple. Dress fit perfectly and I felt like a million bucks!

links_reviews_title: Form fitting, sexy, but modest length
links_reviews_text: Very snug. If you need more room in the chest consider going up a size or choosing a different one. Works well with an athletic build. My only complaint is the bottom is narrow. The slit up the center tore just from walking and sitting - I hadn't even danced during the reception yet before it tore. Otherwise beautiful dress. Loads of compliments!

I'm in between a 6 and 4, I can really wear either. After eating and drinking before the event, I went with the 6 to be safe ;) it fit great! Likely dresses always suck you in in all the right places. It was incredibly flattering and I got compliments all night long!
Paired with shapewear and a stick-on bra for a sultry look. This dress is a real head turner! True to size.

links_reviews_title: Doesn't have to be short to be sexy!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, it does run small - but worked for me. I have a small chest, not sure how large breasts would work in it. No bra. It is nice thick fabric, felt like a million bucks!

links_reviews_title: Sexy dress, a little big in the top & small in the bottom for me
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress and it was definitely sexy as others have mentioned! It was a tiny bit big for me in the top and very tight on the bottom (I often have that problem for my "pear" shape). Thank goodness there was a little stretch to the fabric. It's not my favorite dress I've rented from RTR but it got the job done.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering on a curvy figure, lots of compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear an 8 or 10 so took the advice of past renters and order two sizes up, the 10 and the 12. The 10 fit great though I could have filled out the top better in an 8. 4/5 stars only because the slit in the front is a little sensitive so you have to be very careful (i.e. getting into cars and sitting) so I wouldn't recommend if you're going to need a lot of movement in a dress. Otherwise this was perfect for my med school formal, was very flattering, and as always the RTR experience makes it so easy to return.

It runs true to size, material is thick and supportive enough you don't need a bra however if it is VERY cold you may need some pasties. I just decided to roll with the it. Great for dancing, eating and walking around. Loved it and actually wore it twice because my other dress didn't fit.

Wore this for my boyfriends graduation party at a banquet hall. It ran a little small and the zipper kept getting stuck but other than that I loved it. Its a very basic black dress but it fit like a glove and acted like spandex in all the right places. Got so many compliments.
Received so many compliments on the dress and color, very comfortable easy to wear.
I loved the rear ruffle of this dress and the bouncy sleeves. The color was pretty too. I got lots of compliments, and it was fun to wear.
Great dress for work, super flattering, comfortable and unique. Easy to zip alone, lots of compliments!!
Loved this color for a spring workday! The dress is flowy, comfortable, lines and great length for petite girls. Would definitely rent again
wore this dress to church on Easter Sunday. It's a lovely color, very tasteful, and the flowy cape makes it unique. nice, light material too!

The color of this dress was so pretty, and the fabric had a nice heft. It didn't wrinkle from sitting at my desk all day the way I worried it would. Definitely would be good if you're going for a '30s or '40s vibe. I think the top was supposed to be blousier, but I have a large bust, so the fit of the chest part was off (too tight) on me.
Rented this for an engagement party and got a lot of compliments! Totally unique cut, beautiful light mint color. Modest enough for a family affair but short enough for lots of fun and dancing!
Definitely fits well, but wasn't super flattering on me.

Lovely color and material for summer. I wore this to work. I'm a pretty true 6 and sized up to an 8. It was for sure too big but I wore it anyway and still received tons of compliments. I'd say this runs TTS. Definitely recommend for work or daytime event in spring and summer!
Didn't realize the cape back until after I ordered. And the middle of the dress laid awkwardly. Not for me

links_reviews_title: Pretty & simple for a nice event
links_reviews_text: Pretty dress for a warm weather occasion. It's a rather simple dress, not a stand-out piece, but perfect if you just want a nice, easy outfit for a formal event. I'm usually a 6 but got the 4 in this so that it was a little more fitted in the mid-section, but be careful because it is pretty short (I'm 5'8").

links_reviews_title: Too tight in the stomach and too big everywhere else
links_reviews_text: There was a band around the stomach area that was so unflattering
This dress looks better on, and I love the faux-cape in the back. It is super comfortable, and I would definitely rent again.
perfect for work

links_reviews_title: Nice color, flowy fabric, elegant dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my brother’s graduation yesterday (outdoor ceremony, 90 degree heat in the southern US). It was a really stand-out dress: flowy fabric, quite beautiful and very elegant. It felt like something a princess would wear on a tour. My only gripe was that it was a bit baggy in the bust and shoulders (even though I wore the smaller size) and that the fabric is a bit stifling (really traps heat) since it’s polyester. However it was very nicely lined (I wore nude undergarments anyway though), pairs well with pearl jewelry and a tan. Overall would order again.
I liked it. I'm a big fan of club monico

links_reviews_title: true to size, comfortable, lovely color great for graduation
links_reviews_text: very flattering dress fits true to size. very comfortable wore it for college graduation. loved! i am 5'8 and 140 pounds and a 6 is what i typically wear and it was perfect. I have an athletic build.

Dress itself was great! I'm always happy to fit into the smaller size too. It was super comfy for family pictures and very flattering. Larger size had lipstick stains on it so am very glad I didn't need to wear. Seems like RTR is spending less time on sending clean dresses as my back up dress also came to me super stained. I've learned my lesson to not rent light colored dresses from them anymore.

links_reviews_title: Cute outfit. Perfect for graduation ceremony
links_reviews_text: Love the color
Fit TTS and was a lovely color, but the cape like back was more comical than elegant due to the excess fabric
The top of the dress is pretty, but it's not the most flattering around the middle.
I normally where a 10 and the Large JUST fit. I have a small chest, and this dress did wonders for me in that department.

This dress is so pretty and I really wanted it to work...but as you can see from the photo, it is not for large chested ladies. I tried without a bra and boob tape but it just didn't look right. If you have a small chest this might work for you!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful lace detail that needs to be sized up if you have cleavage !
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to shrine visits for a family wedding and was thoroughly impressed with the formality - however! The chest is more gaping than expected and is best suited for a size up if you're larger in that area.

links_reviews_title: Cute for photos , bridal shower , etc
links_reviews_text: Runs big
Wore this for a winery wedding in Santorini. This. Dress. Was. Perfect. Quality and detail were perfect. The cutouts and fit added some sexiness. Photographed phenomenally.

I rented this dress for an event with a 20s theme. It went perfectly. I received a ton of compliments. It's low cut so I opted to wear a bodysuit underneath to cover up some of my boobs because I was at a professional event. The dress fit my curves pretty well and is pretty unique. This is a great dress and far from a basic beige dress! I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great dress can be casual with a denim or more dressed for affair
links_reviews_text: Nice flattering dress..I recommend a size up if you have broad shoulders . I have small curves but it makes me look like I have curves..if you like to feel. Feminine this is a great dress
Amazing fit. Shows just the right amount of cleavage. Felt gorgeous. There is NO give in the fabric. May run an inch small. LOVED this dress and so did my Sweetheart.
Such a pretty dress! Hugged all the right places. Sexy cut and flirty lace. Fit true to size! Tons of complements - rent it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my bridal shower, and it was a hit! It is perfect for a bridal shower.
links_reviews_text: Definitely can't wear a bra with it. I wore breast shapers and it worked. But it really is gorgeous. I initially had chosen this as a backup dress but when I tried it on it was the clear choice.
Just adding a better picture to my previous review
Breezy and perfect for summer!

links_reviews_title: Breezy! Edged it up for Easter.
links_reviews_text: When I ordered this it was supposed to be 84 and sunny on Easter Sunday but by the time it got to me the forecast changed to 60s and overcast. Alas, such is the law of the land when working with RTR and SoCal weather. I was able to edge this up a bit with black boots and a black vegan leather jacket and I thoroughly dug the look! The jacket kept me warm enough luckily, as this dress is basically holes so you will feel the air come through for sure. I think it was made for someone taller than me--I have a long torso but the bust felt like it was long on me, if that makes sense. I ended up wearing a white bra under it that showed a bit for my own comfort (meeting family on Easter was not the time to show side boob or catch a nip-slip) but under different circumstances and with excellent posture at all times I could've gotten away with it sans bra. The waist is not stretchy so if you are bigger than a 25,26" waist I would say go bigger than the XS. That said, it felt sort of big in the chest compared to the tightness of the waist, but I only noticed it when sitting down. Gorgeous dress though, definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: My husband was obsessed with this dress on me❤
links_reviews_text: It fit me like it was made for me.
Bust was too tight, waist was loose and unflattering. Hard to get in and out of, all for me to never wear it
This dress runs small, but if you're willing to show off the goods, it's very sexy and feminine!
Great fit

links_reviews_title: Couldnt zip the dress up in a large, the xlarge was too big.
links_reviews_text: Very long dress. Lots of clevage. I could see this dress being worn with boots for a country photoshoot.
Great dress, fit like a glove. Rented it for a party but it looks like a dress for a guest of honor (shower, rehearsal dinner etc)

The dress is flattering and a little more gold than the picture shows. However, this was a good thing. The only thing to point out is that the bottom ruffle is shear so you can see your legs. Also there is a open lace band around the waist that shows bare skin.
Loved everything about it. Was just too roomy in the bust and sleeves.
None
Too form-fitting in the hips to be flattering on my shape, but I loved the detail in the skirt and sleeves.

I rented this dress for my high school reunion. I decided not to wear because it was a little too low cut for occasion. I absolutely love the dress. It's unique and so feminine. I will rent again most likely for another occasion.
Love the slit to the shorter layer. Classy but still feeling sexy!
The dress fit true to size. I am 5'7 and didn't have any problem with the length of this dress. Very comfortable for a long night of dancing! #formal

links_reviews_title: The color of the dress was perfect for a late summer/early fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: The dress was slimming and structured great! It was a bit short in the front where the layered slit is but I am a tall so it was more noticeable on me. I received many compliments on the dark color as well, it was perfect for a cocktail wedding dress!
Great dress. Great quality. Loved it
Wore this out to a wedding. Definitely lower cut than the picture shows. Length was good for a shorty like me, could be too short for anyone taller than 5'2.
Fit just a bit big which I was surprised by. The unfortunate thing is it doesn't photograph well. The open spot is cute but when you pose for photos it gapes open and is not very cute

This dress is a large in the bust area so I had plenty of room for a bra (perfect for larger chested women). The flap over the skirt area makes it super flattering and comfortable. Only down side is that it was very short when I was sitting down.
It's almost like a deep purple. It's gorgeous. Super comfy and original
So cute! VERY flattering and comfy. Highly recommend for a party
I loved this dress! I wore it for a fall wedding and loved the asymmetry to the dress. It was flattering and comfortable and the color was gorgeous. Will definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Made me feel beautiful and comfortable!!
links_reviews_text: Usually wear size 8 and am a 36d bra size. I got the M and L and ended up wearing the M. Loves the color, cut, and fit. Very flattering and forgiving of the dreaded muffin top! Highly recommend!! The back zips but there is a little give with the fabric on both sides. Very well made!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a wedding and it looked beautiful! the color is absolutely beautiful!
links_reviews_text: The chest area is a little big i was in between sizes small would have been too small and medium was a little big
I am obsessed with the detail, material, and color of this dress. It is so flattering and will most likely be staying in my closet. Love love love!

links_reviews_title: Had a celebration dinner at a high end restaurant.
links_reviews_text: This dress came in at the final hour, but was perfect for the event. Was a little exposing up top, I am a 34D/36C but I made it work. As in other reviews, dress was a little short and rode up when you sat down,
It was sexy and fit perfect.

I absolute loved this dress. I am a usual size small and it fit me like a glove! It does go down a little low so I had to make sure to keep it up throughout the night. Beautiful color. Would definitely recommend this dress

The only reason I didn't wear this dress was because the "slip" part that shows under the outer layer of the dress was too tight and rode up. Instead of laying flat like in the photos, it was made of a thinner fabric and wouldn't stay down. The color was beautiful, but the straps were also a little long.
This was a great dress for a fall wedding. This dress is flattering for shorter girls with curves. It may be a little too short for those with longer legs.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit perfect! This was my first time trying rent the runway! Will definitely order again!
links_reviews_text: It for perfect all over!
This dress was perfect for a rehearsal dinner. It was super comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: cute but right in the top
links_reviews_text: i wish this wasn't so cleavage-y on me! gorgeous color and unique design though

links_reviews_title: It's a very nice dress, but slightly too big.
links_reviews_text: It's a very nice dress, I wore it for a date night. The only thing is it's slightly too big that my bar was showing at times.
Very nice dress, could have been tighter at the waist

links_reviews_title: This was a dress for my 40th birthday party - all white!
links_reviews_text: This dress is hands down one of the most beautiful cocktail dresses I've ever worn. It is slightly shorter than I am used to but I'm tall-ish. It had a low back so note you'll have to wear it with a low back bra or adjusted one, but it didn't need a slip underneath. Made my 40th birthday party perfect!
I rented this dress for my engagement party and I truly felt like a bride-to-be! I loved he lace and open back. The dress had plenty of room for my hips and booty. It was perfect for my pear shape!
I rented this for my bridal shower. It isn't my favorite RTR dress, but I felt very bridal. Everyone liked it and it was comfortable.
This dress was beyond comfortable. I got so many compliments and didn't have to worry about how I looked in photos because everything was covered

links_reviews_title: Nice A-Line Cut Was So Flattering
links_reviews_text: This was one of three dresses I had for my rehearsal dinner, and I ended up wearing this dress. I used a pull-up/push up sticky bra that's been advertised all over Facebook, and the bust of this dress fit's tight enough that everything looked okay. That bra is not so great, but if you are wearing a clothing item that is fitted over it the sticky bra, it can be good for an opened back style that you want to eliminate straps for.. This dress was tight in the bust but had a very flattering A-line to it. I received many compliments on this dress and WOULD wear it again to a rehearsal dinner but would not recommend it as a "second look" dress because the arms are tight and would limit your ability to dance party as you should at your wedding!

I rented this dress for a pre-wedding event at our church. It fits true to size, not much support in the bra. The dress has beautiful details. I'm 5'3 and wore 4 inch heels and it was just long enough.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my beach elopement and I felt both comfortable and like a princess.
links_reviews_text: As was shared in a lot of the other comments, this dress fits true to size except for the shoulders, which run very tight. I am athletic and have "yoga arms" and I could not lift my arms beyond shoulder height in this dress. Luckily it was my day to order other people around anyway! The dress was lovely but could have used a dry cleaning before being sent out - it smelled a bit funky so I had it cleaned myself.

Marchesa is my favorite designer on this site and this dress did not disappoint. When I showed my finance he immediately labeled it "the special dress" and I think the dressed lived up to that label! The lace was so elegant, classy, flirty, and just gorgeous. The fit was perfect. Runs true to size. I did not notice any tightness anywhere. Great length - not too short but a little sexy. The empire waist is forgiving but I did not think it was boxy on me. Loved loved loved!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress for a bridal shower!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my bridal shower and I have to say, it was a huge hit with everyone including myself! I was nervous since this was my first ever rental from RTR, but everything was smooth and easy. Based on reviews, I ordered my standard size 6 and a backup size 8. When the dresses arrived, I tried on the 8 first and it did fit well enough that I could have worn it; however, the 6 fit better in my chest area (small-chested) and I chose to wear that size to my shower. As people have mentioned, it is tight in the arm area if you try to raise your arms above shoulder height, but that was not an issue for me since I wasn't planning on raising my arms for any extended amount of time. I also was able to wear a strapless bra, and just tucked the back down into the dress--no problem! Overall: beautiful dress, great fit, TONS of compliments all day long :)

I ordered the 4 and the 6 since I wear a 4 in pants (and they are big on me) and a 4/6 in dresses because I have broad shoulders. So I wore the 6 and it fit perfectly! I wore this for my bridal shower and received so many compliments. I really felt like a bride-to-be!!! So happy with my first experience!
I was very excited to wear this, but I felt that it looked better online than it did in-person. I sized up since the arms were tight in my usual size.

links_reviews_title: So romantic, you can't help but feel like a princess!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my wedding rehearsal and dinner. It was very girl and romantic and fit perfectly though I think it would be tight in the ribcage and bust for some.

This dress fits true to size. It could definitely be worn without a bra, even with a 38D bust. It has no give but still allowed for food to be enjoyed. I loved that it's off white and not long. I got compliments all night and loved how I looked in it for my wedding day!

I love this dress! The fit was true to size and the cut is very flattering. The only knock on the dress is that you cannot wear a standard bra because of how the back is cut. You have to wear a low back bra. Very pretty though and was perfect for a date night out with my husband for my 33rd birthday.

The dress was great from the start. I was worried it would be too long on me since I am less than 5'0 but heels fixed that. Everyone complimented me on my dress and it was the perfect dress for my bridal shower :)

Wore this for my Wedding Shower. It's very pretty. The cut out isn't super low, so it doesn't reveal any "back rolls." The sleeves are kind of stiff, so reaching my arms up required a little work (lots of hugs and greetings), but nothing too uncomfortable. Overall, great dress! I'm 5'6" and 175lbs, apple figure with 36DD.

I am 38D/DD, 165lbs, 5'4'' and usually wear a 12 but I felt much better in the 14. You have to wear a low back bra (I bought the strap thing from RTR what pulls your strap down in the back and it worked perfectly). It fit so well and wasn't too revealing for me. I loved it!

This was a sub for my original backup dress, so ultimately my third choice that I had to go with at the very last minute. It felt very Bridal and is a very pretty dress. It runs true to size but it is definitely short (I am 5'5"). Also you can't wear a regular bra with this so I wore the stickies and being an A cup it looked a little lacking because the fabric is shaped for at least a B. However I still loved the dress and it felt very delicate and bridal!
The dress was delicate with the beautiful golden lace yet sturdy. Everybody loved it's fit on me. I usually wear size 10 so I was glad to have gotten extra fit!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! The picture doesn't do it justice
links_reviews_text: I was really amazed when I saw the dress in person it's stunning and has a vintage look my only issue is that the top fits weird I'm a D cup and it made my chest look flat and I didn't like how tight it was in the arms but aside fine that it was nice
Fit true to size but a little stiff in the shoulders. I was able to wear a strapless bra no problem. I got tons of compliments and it photographed great!

I wore his dress for my bridal shower and LOVED it! It was PERFECT for my "be our guest" themed shower! Although I think people are always required to tell the bride she looks great I'm pretty sure they meant it because this dress was amazing!

As some people have mentioned this dress is tighter around the shoulders and sleeves so I had sized up to accommodate that fit. The dress is beautiful, but the empire cut waist was probably not my favorite look. At times i felt like i looked a little wider than I normally do. This is by no way a fault of the dress it is more of dressing for your shape. It did not hit me in the right places as I had hoped, but it still looked beautiful.

The dress was great for the rehearsal dinner. It was beautiful and fit great. I could see it had some wear-and-tear from previous uses and stretched a bit. Even so, I received many compliments and would recommend it.
The cut, the fit, the lace - this dress was everything.

The dress fit beautifully especially for a mom who has a little loose skin left over from a twin pregnancy. The dress was flattering on the figure and covered up that I wasn't too thrilled about. Love the dress and my overall experience with RTR.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my bridal shower and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: The material was nice and the sleeves did not restrict.

This dress is a classic beauty. I gave it a 4 instead of 5 stars because of the fit--tight around the shoulder and chest area, and shorter than I expected. Overall, the dress is stunning, and the fit didn't affect me moving around the dance floor.
Wore this for civil marriage and loved it. Very flattering! Thinking about renting again for wedding party.
I wore this dress to my bridal shower. I ordered a size 10 (I'm also 5'7) and it fit perfectly! I got so many compliments on the dress! I couldn't have been happier!

The shoulders were a bit tight, but I expected that based on other peoples' reviews. I think this dress is best-suited for smaller cup sizes (I'm a 34C and it fit like a glove). I wore this dress to my elopement and couldn't have picked a better choice!
Love the neckline and the little sleeve in this dress.

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful at my rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: This dress is a looker! I received a lot of compliments about the dress - the lace and the back of the dress especially. I didn't even try on the 2, as the 0 fit perfectly, and no bra required. As other reviews stated, it is a little snug when you raise your arms, but this didn't affect the evening. The threading on the dress is more silver than I thought. I wore nude strappy stilettos to keep the look soft. Very happy with my rental!

I wore this dress for my bachelorette party in Charleston the night of the Derby! It was perfect for the Derby and white for the bride to be! Very comfy! The bust was a little small and kept hiking up which I had to keep adjusting my strapless bra, but fun to wear!

links_reviews_title: This dress was absolutely gorgeous! Wore it as my second dress on my wedding day. LOVED IT.
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress. I rented it for a back up to my wedding dress and I was SO thankful that I did. It was almost 90 on our wedding day, and I couldn't wait to get out of my big heavy wedding dress into this little beaut. So many compliments and love love loved the fit. Highly recommend it.

links_reviews_title: An intimate wedding ceremony with only our closest family members at an historic inn restaurant
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great! Many compliments! Very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my NYC wedding and absolutely loved it!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect and was great for a petite frame like mine. I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for my civil wedding
links_reviews_text: As a B-C cup, the chest area was a little big for me. I had to use a nu-bra to fill it in.
Fit well, we had to fix the bottom in the back, shows off legs but not boobs! I was very happy with it!

Really cute skirt! fabric and construction quality was nice, its lined and the pieces are cut well. Could have fit my hips slightly better but I was wearing it with a big sweater so didn't really matter.
Wore this to my friends bridal shower. So cute and fun! Asymmetrical cute was flattering on my curvy figure.

I wore this on a couple of occasions. It's great for a dressed down look with a denim jacket or for the office. I received so many compliments. Seems like a versatile And flattering style for many body types!
Loved the skirt, it was made well in terms of fabric and fit , very comfortable and didn't wrinkle easy.
XL fits like a 10. I paired with a tee to make it more daytime casual. Gorgeous material in person. Love the slit detail and asymmetrical hemline.
Was big on me

Pro: great, high waist fit around waist, nice material, pockets Con: there is a strange sewing line that runs horizontal at a mini skirt length. That sewing makes the skirt look really strange. This is not really a con by the color of the skirt in real life is much brighter

links_reviews_title: Love the silky material, the color and the cool asymmetrical shape
links_reviews_text: Fits pretty true to size, the slit on the leg makes it more flattering and adds a nice touch. I wore this to work with a white top similar to the picture and I felt fun and feminine.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't find anything that went with it
links_reviews_text: The skirt itself was really cute. Fabric, length, color, fit was all great. I honestly just struggled with matching it with a top. I didn't like anything I put on with it. So I didn't end up wearing it this time. I may rent again if I see a top that I think looks good.
Such a cute skirt! Very high waisted. Great lining inside
Great to dress up or down
Not the most comfortable, but so stunning that it was worth the minor discomfort. Strangers asked to take a photo with me, that never happens!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for tall, straight figure
links_reviews_text: Love this dress. The outer layer comes to may knees (I'm 6'0"). The base layer is a few inches shorter, which adds an interesting detail, but does not make the dress inappropriate for any function. I felt completely comfortable wearing it, and I tend to be a bit shy about showing any thigh at all. I don't know how this dress would work on a shorter person. It's very long in the torso and length. Wish I could keep this one!

links_reviews_title: Great fitting dress, felt very elegant
links_reviews_text: Fitted but not tight. Doesn't show stains or bumps. Just felt great!
This dress is beautiful! I think this dress can withstand the changing trends over time and wouldn't mind owning it. It's simple, classy and elegant.
So many comments! Felt like a million bucks!
It was very flattering. Loved the detail.
Ran small. Ordered a 14 and 16; 14 fit like a glove, and 16 looked way too big. 5’4”, 170-180 lbs.
Fit in all the right places. Very elegant

links_reviews_title: Great dress fit work & cocktails- lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I am usually a size 2-4, but since my hips are so much wider than my waist, I sized up to a 6 and since the fabric doesn't "give," the 6 was great. The dress was big in the chest/waist, but I don't think other people could tell!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to an award ceremony and absolutely loved it.
links_reviews_text: This dress was such a hit! It's a classic, form-fitting dress. The high neckline is absolutely gorgeous. It's also surprisingly comfortable.

Rented this as a back up and I couldn't have been happier! The lace wasn't itchy or hot for the humid summer. The dress laid beautifully! I wish it had a belt to really cinch that was it but the cut provided great accents of hour glass shape! I could have gone down a size but it was still a beautiful dream!!

I rented this dress for a formal event in church. It was perfect, I got a lot of compliments on it. It was a little longer than expected, but I didn't mind. Size 4 fit perfectly: I am 5'6'' and 132 lb. I loved it and was sad to let it go.

links_reviews_title: Dress fits super nice.It looks better in reality than in pictures. Would recommend!
links_reviews_text: Body hugging, no stretch, runs true to size. Fits tall people like me excellent. The only downside was the whole renting experience. They sent me a damaged item. Looks like their team is not inspecting items, and think people will still wear the dress with a hole the size of a tennis ball...luckily they were able to replace, but as a first time user I was a bit dissapointed.
Flattering on, has an overlay of lace flowers and then lined under the lace. So pretty!!

I rented 16 & 18 since reviews said to go up a size. Glad I did!! Dress runs smaller because the fabric has NO "give". I received tons of compliments on it - I would definitely rent it again... Hubby likes it so much he asked where he could buy it (until I told him the retail cost!).

links_reviews_title: Classy and conservative but still trendy and different
links_reviews_text: I initially ordered the 8, but couldn't get it to zip my chest. I'm 36DD.no stretch at all. 10 the zipped perfect but was a little big in the stomach. Overall, was very pleased how this came out
It is a tight dress. I sized up according to previous reviews and it was perfect. Typically I'm a 12 in pants and dresses. I chose a 14 for this. Absolutely loved it!

links_reviews_title: Loved this beautiful dress. Was perfect for a 50th Birthday party at the Magic Castle.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and high quality lace, very heavy in a good way.

Perfect fit on me (I'm 5'7", a US14 in non couture fashion/Torrid/F21 etc) and so many compliments! I felt beautiful & a bit like a late 1960s-early 1970s Barbie doll / Goldie Hawn! If I didn't have so many upcoming medical expenses, I'd purchase it so fast! I might have to rent it again when my finances are looser so I can do just that actually! Another win from ML, but definitely know that all dresses by ML are junior sizing so you must size up at least one size if you are at all curvy (& not even plus size curvy, just in general, curvy) but it's always worth it. Such romantic, feminine pieces that manage to have an edgy feel to them still somehow. I chose to not wear a bra with it as it's structured enough to look and feel best with no bra and I am not a small busted woman saying this- I'm a 36D/DD (depending on the bra maker for the most part!) and felt very supported without a bra and suffered no aesthetic appeal with this choice.

Pros: broad appeal, would work in a lot of situations with multiple audiences. Cons: ML's dresses run small, especially through the hips in the fitted dresses. That's true for this dress. Other notes: it's not an exciting dress, I could see it for a night time summer party or event where it's warm out and you want something a little different, but for what I was looking for it didn't do it.

links_reviews_title: Classy but not quite as pictured
links_reviews_text: I sized up in this dress after reading other reviews. I might have been happier with the smaller size, but there is no stretch to the dress at all so it would have been a close thing. That said, it was big at the waist so I felt somewhat shapeless in the waist but didn't have a belt that worked. I didn't get a full length shot, but included the picture of the neckline to show that there isn't as much contrast at the neck as I was expecting from the picture. I was pleased but not thrilled. Fun for a date night at the symphony but too plain for the holiday party I had originally planned to wear it at.
This dress fit perfect and I felt fabulous and classy.

This dress had "Mad Men" vibes to me -- classic understated-sexy. I wore this during a friend's 40th Birthday weekend for dinner and dancing at a resort, but I feel like it could really go anywhere, depending on how much you want to dress it up. The cut was very comfortable, although it has zero stretch, so you'll probably want to size up for your backup size. I was able to wear a nude regular bra with straps and it was practically invisible even in person, but that might only be because I'm so pale that my skin AND bra matched the ivory on the dress. Standard strapless would work best. Fabric is substantial (though somewhat stiff) and will camouflage lumps/bumps, etc. Probably would've been a better dress choice for an event without dancing -- the texture of the dress didn't bother me until we started dancing, and then it rubbed the underside of my upper arms uncomfortably. Great dress to flatter an hourglass! I'm 5'10, 170ish, 36 F/G, and measure 42-34-42 for reference.

This dress fit true to size, although I usually do size up a bit for ML dresses. It was a little more flower/daisy looking in person than I realized in the photos, but everyone seemed to love it. It's a flattering dress as well.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: This runs small in larger sizes. I normally wear an 18w and the 20w was just a little too tight so I went with the 22. Gorgeous dress. Lighting in my photo is off--it's pure black and white. Very well made and so comfortable. I did not need a bra.

I rented this to wear to work. I wore it with a cardigan over it because I did not want bare arms. It did kind of ruin the detail of the sleeves, but it was still cute. I am wearing flats in the picture, but I wore basic black pumps most of the day. This dress maybe ran a wee bit large, but close to true to size. It was a long dress and may be too long on short girls. It was very professional looking.

I ordered one size up based on the reviews and it proved to be too large. I wore it regardless. It was very comfortable and received some compliments. The lace looks nicer in person. It fits true to size, don't order up.

This was an okay dress that had some good and some bad qualities. Definitely didn't knock me out and i wouldn't rent again. The shape wasn't great. Had to order a 8 so it would fit bust but then it just hung on the rest of the body. Wore a belt to give it some shape. The lace on the collar wouldn't stay standing so I gave up on it after awhile. I would just give it an "eh". Nothing too special.

links_reviews_title: Date night at the Orchestra - beautiful lace and fit!
links_reviews_text: Worn for a date night to the symphony. Dress and lace are beautiful. I usually go between a 6 and 8 - went with the 8 in this dress and fit like a glove. There is no stretch to the dress, but was very lengthening and elegant.
I ended up not wearing this but it's a very pretty dress.
Too long for petite 5 ft woman. Just didn't fit right but otherwise lovely dress

links_reviews_title: perfect dress to go from work to out.
links_reviews_text: lovely dress. lots of compliments and very flattering.

Was so excited to get this for a wedding and sized up per reviews. The size up still had a two inch gap to zip over my boobs. Material has NO stretch and is very stiff and itchy. If you are busty, I'd skip this one. If I had sized up two sizes it would have been to big everywhere but the bust.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress, needed a larger size
links_reviews_text: It was pretty but I should have ordered a 10 instead of an 8. 8-10 is my usual size range so I would still say it is probably true to size, but it's a snug fit. I could have worn it if needed but I chose the other option. I thought this was prettier on than I expected and I liked the lace at the top. I would consider getting this dress again for another occasion.
Read that the lace had no give and sized yp to a 16, which i am grateful for. Dress is LOVELY. Received many complements.
The dress magnificent, cute style and great quality lace.
The perfect dress for any occasion

links_reviews_title: perfect for summer bar mitzvah in nyc
links_reviews_text: easy to wear / travels well /

I think this dress would have been best for maybe getting portrait photos taken, because the detailing at the top is just so beautiful. However, overall, it felt a little boxy on my body. It doesn't really accentuate the waist area for hourglass shapes. May be better suited for other body types. I did get many compliments on it though. It's much more of a "pretty" dress than a "sexy" dress.

This dress was beautiful! Fit perfectly! Customer service was amazing when I accidentally ordered for the wrong date. The only downfall, I didn't get to wear it! The party was canceled due to dumb Covid-19 virus. I'll order again if it gets rescheduled after all this!!

links_reviews_title: It was comfortable and made my curves look great.
links_reviews_text: I love the length. At 5'9 it is difficult for me to find dresses that hit at the right length. This one was perfect!
Perfect classy dress for so many occasions- has some stretch so it's super comfy!

I'm typically a size 8-10 and this size fit perfectly. I wore it for a Valentine's Dinner date with my husband. It's not often that he focuses on my outfit, but this dress definitely grabbed his attention! Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: All the compliments received about how beautiful the dress was
links_reviews_text: I was very self conscious when I tried on this dress as it is low cut (my girls aren't used to being this exposed), it was one of two choices for my company's Holiday Party in late January I must have tried it on 2 - 3 times before deciding to wear it. The dress is heavy, lined (good for winter weather), the sequins were scratchy under my arms. I had to have the coat check lady zip it up the rest of the way as the zipper was stiff and unmovable in parts. As soon as I walked into the Holiday Party I received compliments on how beautiful the dress was and how great I looked (some people even gasped - I only wear pants to work)! I have lost 37 lbs since the last Holiday Party and wanted to show off my hard work - this dress was perfect for that! I am 5' 10" and the dress came to just below my knees - was the perfect length. While wearing it I didn't notice how heavy it was and the sequins scratching under my arms didn't bother me since I was basking in all of the compliments received. If you rent this dress you will feel beautiful, very confident and know you look your best. I did not wear any shapewear as the dress was very fitted. I will definitely rent from RTR again for next year's event!

I absolutely loved wearing this dress. The Small fit my chest (34B, narrow shoulders) but not my hips (size 6) so I went with the Medium and taped the chest down. So many compliments on the subtle Art Deco style, as I wore it to a 1920s themed work event. The underarms didn't scratch a bit but I didn't notice it after about ten minutes. As a bonus, I could zip it by myself!

Absolutely loved this dress. I felt good all night. It's both sexy and classy for a formal work event. Only negative is the dress could be scratchy against your arms if you're not careful. I would definitely rent this again.
Great dress, received compliments all night!!! Only down side is that i needed help getting the dress on and off (which included going to the bathroom)

This dress is beautiful! It fit like a glove and showed off all my curves. I thought the bust was super tasteful even though it showed more than I normally wear. The only con was my arms got rubbed a little raw from the sequins. The length was perfect and the slit in the back added an extra pop.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for New Years Party.
links_reviews_text: The zipper may have been broken. It was hard to grasp to zip up. I needed assistance from my husband who used pliers to zip it up.

Loved this dress! I wore it to a NYE party and it was very glamorous with all of the beading and fit my hourglass shape perfectly. I am a size 12 and wore the Large. I received several compliments during the night. The neckline is a little low and shows off the girls without being inappropriate ( I am 53 years old and didn't feel uncomfortable with the amount shown) and you can wear a bra without anything showing. The dress is a little heavy due to all of the beading, but you can still dance and move in it. This dress would be great for any formal event or a mother of the groom. I felt beautiful all night and would definitely order this again.
Runs true to size. This dress was a knockout. Looked absolutely fantastic on and hugged in all the right places. It's low cut in the front so be warned that the girls will be on display.

I rented this for a NYE party. I thought it was sexy but she appropriate -- gone are my super short and strappy little dress days! It was very form fitting and felt a bit small, but there is a good amount of stretch. It is extremely low cut. I'm a 32 B 1/2, and you can see how much it put my cleavage on display. I thought it looked just risqué enough without going over board. If I had a bigger chest, i may have been uncomfortable in it, though. I needed assistance zipping it up.

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove and surprised to like the sequences
links_reviews_text: This literally made me feel glam! Perfect for a dinner date night out and still felt comfortable to sit in. True to size.

I'm size 8, 145, and could fit in both the small and medium. I chose the medium to be more comfortable, and wore a low-cut black bra with the dress. I sprayed a flexible bandage on the underside of my arms to protect against sequin rub.

links_reviews_title: Fit perfect and felt like a million bucks!

links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove and had give so that it was super comfortable to sit or dance. Rented it for a friend's fancy 50th birthday party. It's true that the zipper is very difficult and you definitely cannot zipper it yourself. Other than that, it was awesome! Would definitely rent it again.

links_reviews_title: I was getting compliments all night long!
links_reviews_text: This hugged in all the right places and fit perfectly! The only issue I had, was by the end of the night my under arms were irritated by the sequins.

links_reviews_title: I felt slim , sexy, & covered in this dress ! Loved it ! I would like to buy it ! Covers all the fat
links_reviews_text: Boobs out , but I was ok with it , LOL ! I wore spanks underwear underneath:)
Didn't end up wearing it bc it was my backup, but it was gorgeous and high quality. Hit all the right curves and made the girls looks amazing!
Fit awesome I used xxl. I have a large busy so I picked the looser size got lots of compliments

Really a nicely made dress. It is heavy but I found it very comfortable. Could wear my bra with no issues. Looks best with a higher heel shoe due to longer length of the dress. I typically wear a 12 in a dress and the large was perfect with a little wiggle room in bottom half. I am narrow hipped. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, lots of compliments all night. A flattering neck line and hit my curves perfectly.
links_reviews_text: A bit heavy (warm) - maybe best for cooler seasons. As with any sequinned dress, a little scratchy under the arms by the end of the night, but not terrible.
Very nice dress everyone loved it!! I received compliments all night long

Loved it, but selected a different dress for a fundraising event I was attending. This fit well, hugged curves with no spanx needed. It was very heavy, though. The sparkles were subtle enough to be very classy. I'll keep this in my cue for future events.

This was my backup dress, but when I tried it on I could not believe how flattering it was. It's pretty supportive so I only needed light spanks underneath to smooth out some edges. I was comfortable and confident all night. It's a little low cut, but not inappropriate. Well, depends on the crowd I guess. ;)

links_reviews_title: Got SO many compliments on this dress. Saved me when I gota last minute black tie optional invite!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'6 and 125lb and this fit me like a glove. I did need a low cut push up bra as the neckline plunges pretty deep, but thankfully I already own one! The dress has just enough stretch to be super comfortable and form fitting, I loved it so much.

Pros: sequins! Well constructed and tailored. Cons: cut is lower in the chest than appears in photos. The sequins rub under the arms. I rented this for a semi-formal charity gala and I think it was perfect. I thought the length would be a little odd for someone my height (5' 4") but with heels it worked well. I ordered a MR and LR and ended up going with the MR with some shapewear underneath. Dress worked well for my straight body type; it may be tight in the hips for someone with a curvier shape.

links_reviews_title: Love the length, comfort, and style.
links_reviews_text: Great dress. A stand out. The stretch was enough to hide problem areas but hug the right areas. Comfort and stylish with sparkle to make you stand out. I particularly love the length. It hits below the knee. Not too long but not too short. I went with the large because it was more comfortable in the hips but i wasn't able to "fill out" the top but you couldn't tell there was extra room. You'll have fun in this one.

This dress is everything I needed it to be for a wedding reception. I did not have the proper bra (or courage to go without) so you'll see the black material in front. I wore the large and I'm a true 36D. The dress was roomy in the top and back. However, the medium fit great in the top but my thick thighs were not having it. Had the dress had a little bit more stretch, I could have pulled off the medium...but there's nothing sexy about not being able to walk or dance at a wedding reception. But this is a constant problem for me...so if you're hour glass or well endowed, follow the fashion rule and get dressed for the largest portion of your body and let the rest fall into place (if tailoring isn't an option).

links_reviews_title: Fun night out for charity event.
links_reviews_text: Nice and thick dress so holds everything in. Zipper a little tight. It is scratchy under arms because of sequins, but that's also just the deal with dresses like that so I expected it. I'm tall and curvy and it had plenty of room which was nice.
Great dress! Very showy dress which I'm not used to but got a ton of compliments. Only 4 stars because the sequins irritated my arms a lot but it was still an amazing dress!

links_reviews_title: Fabulous dress, sparkly but not over the top.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is heavy and stretchy so it was very comfortable - the arms were slightly scratchy with the sequins but not enough to really notice once it's on. It's pretty low cut in the neckline but it is below the knee so I didn't feel too bare. I got compliments all night. It might not be great for summer as the fabric is heavy but I'm always cold and was not in this. Zipper is a bit stiff and you might need someone else to do those last few inches. Seemed to run true to size. Snug on me, but the size up would have been too big. Recommend this highly!

links_reviews_title: This dress was simply stunning... elegant and classy!
links_reviews_text: This dress fits like a glove, it is a full sequence dress so it's a bit heavy and some may find the sequences under the arms a bit uncomfortable. The dress has a bit of stretch so sitting and dancing was no issue. It's a stunner! I received a lot of compliments and felt very confident in it! Rent it!!

links_reviews_title: Would buy it if I could. Very elegant and flattering.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. This is my first experience with RTR and loved it. This was my backup dress and i am so happy I chose it. It it's very flattering for a curvy body like mine and super elegant. I got many compliments during this event. Would love to buy! The only thing is that under the arms can me a bit scratchy due to the material.
Well made.

I wore this dress to a New Year's Eve party. It was a hit! I got compliments all night and felt completely gorgeous. It runs small. I usually wear an XL (size 16, maybe 14) but ordered an XXL in this and am glad I did. It fit like a glove. I would live in this dress if I could.
This dress is perfect. The medium fit like a glove. I'm 5.4 148lbs 36C and didn't have the wear any shapewear or a bra. I felt like a million bucks and would totally rent again!!

I ordered an XL and an L as my backup size. Keep in mind I rented a dress just 2 months ago and ordered the same sizes in another dress and had to wear the XL. That being said, a) the dress runs big (it is very stretchy) or b) I lost weight since. Regardless I was able to fit the L easily and think I could have worn a medium if I had ordered it. Definitely size down for your backup. The material is thick, heavy and had a good amount of stretch so I found it to be super flattering on me without the use of shapewear. The dress hits below the knees and to the top of my calves. For reference, I'm 5'9" with long legs.
