The neckline was very deep and showed a lot of cleavage, but I was able to wear my regular bra with it. The sequins didn't scratch at all and the dress was super comfortable. I got so many compliments all night. Very happy with this rental.

I wore this to the opera in Venice during winter. Needed something sexy, classy, and weather appropriate. This fit the bill. You'll have a good amount of cleavage but the length offsets that well. At 5'4" it was halfway down my calf. I'm a 34D and the XL was very roomy on top but manageable. The main problem with this dress is the sequins. I had SO MUCH RUB. I think it's because they're so tiny. They're just like little knives in your under arm. I won't rent this again. BUT if you need it for just a few hours and want to stun, you can make it work.

links_reviews_title: I wore it to my friend's semi-formal! It gave me an incredible confidence boost!
links_reviews_text: Pros - fit was true to size. Cons - can be a little bit of a hassle to zip up It was an amazing dress overall and will definitely keep you warm!
Loved this. Got so many compliments. Rarely do I find a dress that fits me like a glove.

links_reviews_title: Pretty Warm but not too heavy
links_reviews_text: Pretty but not a standout dress Easy dancing

links_reviews_title: Subtle glam, but a little baggy in the sleeves.
links_reviews_text: This dress was a very pretty blue velvet and it felt very festive for our holiday cocktail party. The fit was pretty true to size (I'm typically a size 6 and the medium was a good fit), but the sleeves seemed oddly baggy. There is a puffiness to the shoulder, which I knew obviously from the picture, but the whole sleeve felt like it could be tighter below the shoulder puff. Not a big deal overall though and I received lots of compliments, particularly on the color.

links_reviews_title: Slight puff shoulder and very elegant look. 1940s party and I felt amazing!
links_reviews_text: Loved the material (thick) and the fit. Beautiful dress
This was a hit at my holiday party and it was very flattering for my petite curvy figure

I ordered a Medium and Large thinking it would run small and possibly be too tight/short. I was wrong! It is sized true. The small would be perfect. Length was 2-3 inches above my knee. The sleeves do have a slight puff near the shoulders and the dress will keep you warm as it is slightly heavy. I plan on renting it in the future.

links_reviews_title: Renting a dress relieves the stress of what to wear. It always comes on time and is clean.
links_reviews_text: Great fit! Velvet kept me warm and I loved the design so it showed off my waist.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress! It was so flattering and comfortable, I got compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: It fit very well and true to size. The length was perfect; not too long and not too short. If I had to find one problem with it, I thought the sleeves were a little long, but it was not an issue at all. Would recommend for any fall/winter party or wedding!

Fit well on the bottom (I have athletic legs) but was a little loose up top. It plunged too low to wear a normal bra and had too much loose fabric on top to get away with pasties with the deep plunge.

Material and quality are excellent. Fit around my bust which can be difficult at times, but I'm narrow in the hips and it was swimming on me from the bust down so I chose not to wear it and exchange it. Thanks to the Concierge team!
Short so wore with stockings
Wore this for my sisters engagement party, looked elegant and cute. The neck line is a little low cut, but nothing a pin can't fix! Super cute, definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Who would have thought of a GRAY dress looking so BEAUTIFUL!
links_reviews_text: I love this trendy dress by ELLIATT! Running true to size with a little stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works for A to C cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this style. At 5’3”, the length is mid thigh on me. The dress is amazing in person. Pair with black heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

I wore this dress to my mother-in-law's wedding. It was comfortable, chic, classic, and so pretty. Good length on me (I'm 5'3"-5'4")-- it was more low-cut than I thought but not revealing or inappropriate

links_reviews_title: Makes Me Look SO WIDE ugh
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to like this dress but unfortunately it did the opposite of wonders for my waistline. The dress creates this broadness from the neck and shoulders that just doesn't taper properly. Though it technically fit I couldn't wear it out. Thank U, Next.

links_reviews_title: Unique dress that gets a lot of attention!
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress for a pre-holiday windup. A little challenging to get into but once on is very flowy, flirty, and fun. I felt very pretty in it and received many compliments throughout the evening. Would highly recommend for a cocktail party or a slightly formal event.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Perfect for a party/dancing!
links_reviews_text: Definitely shows some cleavage, but I wore it to my work holiday party and didn't feel uncomfortable. Great dress, received many compliments on it throughout the night. Really fun and comfortable to dance in! I went with a size L- the M was too small with my DD chest and a little too short.

I wore this for a graduation party. This dress would have been ok if it wasn't for the low neckline and weird ribbon around the waist. I ended up having to wear a thin shirt underneath to prevent showing too much (and I'm not big chested at all). I would've worn something else if I had time to order another dress.
perfect fit! It was perfect for the holiday party

Wore this to a philanthropy event & it was a nice dress. It was a little big in the bust so I had to fashion tape it to make sure it wouldn't show anything, but I'm also a 34A. Would recommend but wasn't my all time favorite or anything.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments and fun to dance in
links_reviews_text: Need no bra or low cut bra but gorgeous wore with stockings in winter adorable

links_reviews_title: Worn with pants look really cute. Was a little to short for me, being up in age.😊
links_reviews_text: Love the fit. Very sexy

links_reviews_title: It looked like I was wearing a cape
links_reviews_text: I'm a petite person and the top part made it look like I was wearing a cape. I am usually between XS and S. I wish I ordered the S instead because the XS would not zip up. I couldn't wear it due to the small size and have to return. Did not wear.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a Maryland Democratic fundraiser. I wanted a formal -but not TOO formal - dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress runs small. I usually wear a size 8, or a Medium, and this dress fit me best in a size L. One of the salespeople at RTR also noted that the dress ran small. Beautiful, comfortable, simple, and flattering! I wanted to upload photos, but RTR's website is acting glitchy. On me, the dress looked much like it does on the model in the photo.
Nice fabric, very nice dress

links_reviews_title: Big in the chest area, unable to adjust with waist tie
links_reviews_text: Too big in the cheat area, the ruffles were overwhelming for my body, but the steel gray color was pretty and something different. Probably a great dress if it works for your body type
As with every piece of clothing I've ordered this month - this is too short . I am 5'7"- I don't consider that overly tall. Beautiful otherwise

links_reviews_title: Could not fit over my chest to even put it on correctly!
links_reviews_text: I was so excited for this dress and when I pulled it over my head I could not get it over my boobs. I tried multiple ways and just couldn't make it work. The fabric also looks cheap in person. Not like the soft flowy silk it looks like in the picture.
This dress fit really weird for a large. It was really short and really deep cut in the chest. I couldn't bend over or even move too fast without flashing people. I did not wear it to my event.
I wore this for work and received so many compliments. The fabric feels great and the design is lovely. Will likely rent again.
Great for curvy ladies as it accentuates in all the right spots!
Fit nice just with a different option.
Love the dress. This dress runs very small.
I thought this was a wrap dress. It's not. Nice material.

I rented this dress for a cocktail event and it was super cute! I ordered a size up because I was worried about the length of the dress. The dress was the perfect length, but was a bit large on the top and showed a lot of cleavage. If I wore this again, I wish it were smaller on the top, and the length stayed the same. I would recommend this dress for a winter or fall cocktail event, the color and the fabric would not work well in the summer or spring.

links_reviews_title: I actually wore this dress out after the wedding! This was my alternate.
links_reviews_text: It was shorter than it looks in the pictures.

links_reviews_title: I rented a large. I am 5’1” and 152 lbs. I couldn’t get this on!
links_reviews_text: The zipper was stuck and it was a very tight fit, didn’t even get it on all the way.
I though that the style would be forgiving, but it was brutally tight. It's very pretty but I couldn't even get it on!
A bit too casual for the formal black tie ball, so I went with another dress.
I'm shorter and it just didn't proportion well

links_reviews_title: The customer service at RTR was excellent!! I will definitely use RTR for future events!
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress, it was a little tight in the rib area and kind of big in the chest.

links_reviews_title: Material is very thick and drab. If you are tall and have a shapely bottom, too short.
links_reviews_text: Based on the picture I assumed this would be light and flowy. Instead, it the material is very thick and drab. I'm 5'8, 155 with large hips, rear, and bust and narrow at the waist. For those at this height and with a shapely bottom, it might hit right at your bottom. For those with a narrow waist and small hips, the hidden pockets in this dress make this an unflattering fit. Big hips with this fabric and pockets made for a very strange fit.

This is a high quality dress. The fabric is luxuriously soft and sexy. The ruffle neckline is very feminine and flattering. I did have to pin it at the chest. The small would have fit better but the medium worked.

links_reviews_title: I love the material of the dress! It is flirty but very classy and girly.
links_reviews_text: It fit well. It is snug through chest and looser on hips. It is a lower cut top than appears in picture. Overall loved this!
Was a cute dress but the neckline was lower cut on me than in the picture and it would have been too low cut for a work related holiday party.

links_reviews_title: By far the best dress I have worn from RTR!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a formal gala and completely fell in love with it! Honestly determined to buy it. I'm 5'2"/34C, and the 4R fit perfectly. The fit is flattering, and I received tons of compliments! Pros: Gorgeous, fits like a glove, beautiful detail, felt supported with no bra. Cons: I'm petite and it runs a bit long, so I used fashion tape, but it was very manageable.

I wore it without shapewear and still felt it was flattering, the red top distracted from my belly/bloat. At 5'3 I wore 3 in heels and the dress was still a bit long. I'm small chested and it fit my top perfect so I'm not sure how it would fit a larger chest.
Very flattering!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a formal event
links_reviews_text: Very form fitting but also flattering because the material is thick in the waist area. It was a little snug in the chest but I liked that it wasn't too revealing (as it was a work event).
Really loved this dress I rented for a wedding. I ended up sizing up because it was tight around the bust area. Super comfortable and enjoyed wearing it all night.

links_reviews_title: Made me look great while also super comfortable
links_reviews_text: This dress was great, it was a little big around me in the chest area (i'm a 32B) and I did have to wear a bra with it so it wouldn't fall down and give everyone a show while I was dancing! Other than that, this dress was sooo comfortable and super stretchy. I had enough room to sit and eat without feeling stuck and too tight in my dress. Wore it all night long
Super flattering. I’m a bit bustier and don't like showing it... this dress hid it all and made me feel like a million bucks.
Very comfortable fit with no need to wear a bra. Love the simplicity with an interesting touch of red color.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a black tie wedding at the plaza!
links_reviews_text: Dress hugged in all the right places while still giving me good mobility.
Looks awesome, runs a smidge small, so I ordered one size up!

This gown is absolutely beautiful. It runs LONG. I am a hair under 5'10" so I ordered a 2L, and even in 3.75" heels the front dragged the ground slightly. I am 125lb 32D and very straight and slim with really no curves, and it was a touch big in the hips and bum but not noticeable to anyone other than myself. Overall it fit beautifully. I am normally a 2 and ordered the 4 as a backup but didn't even touch it. I could possibly have gone down to a 0. The embroidery is gorgeous and a fun statement. I felt it was unique and sexy but appropriate for our military ball. I would definitely recommend!
I felt amazing in this dress. I got so many compliments. The material was soft and flowing. I usually wear a 12 but the 14 was more comfortable and fit snug in all of the right places.

This gown seriously hit me in all the right places, and I got so many compliments. It was a bit snug, but I think a 14 wouldn't have held the girls up as well. Length was perfect too with a 2-3 inch heel!

links_reviews_title: Elegant and comfortable for a formal occasion!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, and received many compliments on it as I wore it to a black tie event. The dress itself is very flattering and gives you a bit of an hourglass shape. The only thing I wish is that I ordered a size down as the top with a bit big, and oftentimes I had to pull it up, especially when I was dancing. Overall, I loved the dress and the red popover on top made the gown stand out! Size down if you want a tighter fit!
The tailoring of this dress was figure flattering and perfect! The dress stayed up all night. However it was rather long (I'm 5'2") and it made dancing a little hard.

I loved the fit on me and was comfortable all night. The dress is prettier in person (the embroidery is very nice) and I almost wanted to buy it (truly fit like a glove). It is form fitting, but I never felt uncomfortable in the dress.
Very flattering and fit true to size! Super thick material, hid all bumps you might be worried about. Had plastic caging around the chest area, so no bra was necessary!

Dress (size 4R) fit me perfectly - I’m 5’7” and slim/small chested. I normally wear a 2 or 4 in dresses. The boning in the top held the dress up, and the ruffle gave the illusion of a bigger bust. Comfortable and easy to wear. Loved it!

I loved this dress! It was very comfortable, easy to sit in and did not wrinkle. There is boning in the bodice so it has structure to hold it in place - I wasn't having to pull it up all night. The fabric is body-skimming but not tight, and has a bit of stretch. I love the sheer floral popover - it shows a hint of your figure underneath and is just an interesting detail. I got so many compliments! One thing to note that I wasn't aware of from the images and reviews - this dress has a bit of a train - which in my very-crowded event got stepped on a couple times. So it may not be great for dancing unless you want to hold the dress up. I am 142lbs, 5'-5" and wore 3" heels, the 6R was a perfect fit.

Loved this dress! Compliments all night and very comfortable for strapless. I'm 5'10 and wore the 8L and the fit was really good... it was actually almost a little TOO long which never happens! Great dress for taller frames for sure! So fab

Being 6 months pregnant made finding a flattering dress for this gala a bit of a struggle. This dress worked perfect for me! Tons of complements and I felt confident in it. I will say if I was any farther along, it would have been too tight but it had enough stretch for where I am now. It is my second pregnancy so I am bigger than I was at this point with my first.

Beautiful dress with gorgeous stitch work on the top and comfortable, flattering material throughout. The fit itself is flattering too. I got tons of compliments! Material is great for dancing. I had to get the L due to availability, and it was probably a little too long for me - I'm 5'9" and had on ~3 inch heels. Otherwise, it was an excellent pick!

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove and I got compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a December black tie wedding and loved it! The material is super stretchy and thick. I'm normally a 12 but wore a 14 in this. It's super tight so if you're worried size up

Okay.. really beautiful dress but it runs so large up top, I was pulling it up all night! I am an A cup size, so maybe this dress is better fit for someone with a bigger chest! The material is warm and stretchy, plus it hugs curves very elegantly. Overall, I recommend this dress because I felt lovely, but make sure you've got good fashion tape to keep it up!

I loved the way this dress looked - elegant and form fitting. It was a little bit long, even for tall ol' me, but for the most part there were no hem tripping problems in my heels. Received compliments all night long - at an event with no shortage of gorgeous dresses! 10/10

I needed a dress last minute and the Georgetown location came through! The floral overlay made it so that I could go bra-less without having to worry, which is RARE with a 34DD chest. There was some ribbing through the top that I could feel but that's what you get with ribbing. Rent this, you will love it! I wore 3.5" heels and the length was just right.

Very glamours, I'm 5'5 and this dress was only available in long so I ordered it and I wore 4'in heels and it was still kinda long... but this dress fits great! I still have my baby weight and this dress made me look great! I wish I could of stayed with it.

This is a lovely dress: the detailing in the red embroidery on the top draws the eye upwards, and the way the skirt lays and fans on around the feet looks super classy. If you are tall, beware: you need a long. A few recommendations: the bottom is lined but might require spanks, definitely a thong (vpl). The top closes tightly under the arms and has a clasp above the zipper to secure it. However, the top did slide down a bit on me during the evening - perhaps something that could have been solved with a better strapless bra (and which may not be a problem for those with bigger chests). Overall, a high-quality, lovely dress.
Beautiful dress. The designer runs small so make sure you size up! Wish I could've used it but had to go with a different option
Gorgeous gowns for formal Mexican wedding but too long so I returned
This dress was really stunning in person. The only problem was that it was a little short. I had to wear the bigger size just for length purposes, but that made it a little big on top.
Beautiful gown. It was perfect for post baby body as it's shape was flattering, only issue was the top showing more cleavage than I was comfortable with so I had to wear a shawl.

Gorgeous gown!! I wanted to wear this so badly, but even with 3" heels it dragged on the ground about 4 inches. It was way too long, sadly. The fit everywhere else was perfect and I didn't need a bra.
This dress was stunning. Lots of compliments. The only downfall was that it was a bit short on me. Even though I order a long

This dress saved me. I ordered another dress for a wedding that looked terrible and this was my last minute back up. The fit was very flattering and hugged all the right places. Really ended up loving this one!

links_reviews_title: Loved it!!! So comfortable, yet sexy
links_reviews_text: I'm tall, perfect length with a 2 1/2 in hell
Back up dress, ended up not wearing it but would rent again for a future event.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, unique, and very stylish dress....looked awesome!
links_reviews_text: Good fit...great length for me (5’ 10”) when wearing a 3” heel—-but could have been tough to pull off by a shorter woman.
The dress was very pretty and flattering but the boning in the dress wasn't very comfortable

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit. Plans changed so I didn't wear it as intended!
links_reviews_text: Long in length.

This dress is extremely well made. Not too heavy, perfect for any time of year. The color pops so get ready to turn some heads your way. I am in between a 4 and a 6. I wore the 6 as the 4 wasn't available and probably would have fit better in the 4 as the 6 was a bit loose. I accessorized this dress with cool tones and a modern, sleek hairstyle and loved it!

Beautiful color, especially for summer. Was very form fitting through the butt and hips. I had extra room in the chest and had to use fashion tape to tape the dress up so it didn't look like the material was sagging. Absolutely loved the back of these dress. Sassy and classy!

" WOW, you look amazing!" ... "OMG. I love your dress!" That's all I heard when I wore this dress to a spring church wedding. Fit: I usually wear a 0-2, and I had to wear the 2 as I felt the 0 was too snug for the event. Order a size up! Although the dress is more of a midi-length, wearing a pair of heels balanced it out. Color: Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful spring color! Not too bright or distracting, but it enhances every skin tone. Great fabric on the inner lining and exterior. Arrived on time, clean, and pressed. Overall, the best RTR yet. I look forward to finding another event to wear this to! Wish I had remembered to take a better picture.

If I had more formal affairs to attend, I would purchase this dress. I used this as my bridesmaid dress and i received so many compliments! It was very flattering and made me feel confident and comfortable. I would absolutely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: loved this dress! so comfy and flattering
links_reviews_text: I wore this as a bridesmaid for my bffs wedding and it was perfect. super comfortable for dancing but very classy and sexy. got compliments all night! the material is thick and high quality and fit like a glove. I'm usually either a 2 or 4 depending on the dress but the 2 was perfect, slimming but just enough stretch. I'm 5'6" with a long torso and shorter legs and the dress was a little longer on me than on the model.

This dress fit perfectly and was very comfortable, easy for me to zip and fasten myself since I wore it for a work event while traveling. Silver shoes complement it perfectly, but I had a last minute issue with mine. Loved the color! The darts were a little weird but it was a very cute fit despite that. I needed two sets of petals since you can’t wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a mother/daughter photo shoot; it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit very snug and supportive, but comfy. As you can see from the different photos I posted, it moves with you, and gives freely in all the right places. It looks great when standing with it hanging straight, but still keeps it's charm when you're bending and moving. It's a solid thick material, with a lining, so you feel protected and don't feel like you're revealing anything. The only con I had was that the design of the breast area made me look like I had nips, but it could be worse than that. I would rent it again. I'm 5'5", 115lbs, 34D, 33 hips.

links_reviews_title: The structure of this dress is so flattering!
links_reviews_text: The color of this dress is so beautiful in person and the fabric just looks expensive. This is one of those dresses that the fit is what makes it stand out. The top is tight though ladies! I wore this for an outdoor wedding in Florida. I would've been much more comfortable in an 8 and I'm definitely a 6 (closer to a 4) normally. Overall I wasn't super comfortable in this at all because of the size but it looked amazing lol. My husband kept telling me how great I looked all night. Very bombshell and very sexy!

beautiful color, didn't need to wear shape wear or a bra because of the thick fabric, straps are not adjustable but I didn't have a problem with them digging in to me. great length to be classy but still young.

Rented this for a friends wedding. It was actually my back up dress after my first dress was unavailable to ship last minute :/ and my second pick was soo snug I didn't feel comfortable wearing it (cinq a sept- pink Luna in 10 and 12)...this was the replacement I picked for my unavailable dress and it worked out great. Rich color and heavy (but not too heavy) fabric. It had a decent give to allow for some thigh and booty as I am very much a pear. However I found the top to ride up against my neck because my 34c wasn't enough to fill out the top. This was mitigated by wearing a strapless bra and a padded stick on cups. I can't complain as it gave me a true hourglass figure. I literally got danced for hours and while I was not dropping it to the floor, I was gettin down I felt pretty unrestricted. I wore spanx but not sure it was necessary with this dress. The weather ended up being cooler but I felt comfortable with the thick fabric and brought a shawl that I didn't need. This dress is perfect for girls that got a little extra in the trunk and if you're full on top you could get that hint of side boob in an otherwise modest but sexy dress. However it is fitted through the waist so I'd say top heavy, hourglass or pears can rock this one best.
This dress was such a bright beautiful blue. Christian Knows how to dress a woman and makes you feel great! I wish they had a 12 available but the 10 fit just right with the help of my spanks.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments and my husband loved it :)
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I received it last minute after the original dress I ordered had a broken zipper. I ended up liking this one better! I received compliments all night and the back and neckline is beautiful! Since there aren't as many pictures posted from the back, here is what it looks like. I normally don't like teal, but it looked beautiful on. 10/10 recommend.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit so well and the color was amazing.
links_reviews_text: I thought the dress fit pretty true to size. I wore and moderate heel and the hem hit just where a pencil skirt would. I got compliments all night on the dress and I felt amazing in it. I would absolutely rent this one again!!

Loved this dress! It was not too tight with room to dance the night away. I got so many compliments from other guests on the color and the style! It's a thicker material so it shouldn't leave lines or creases from wear however since I was at a beach wedding it did the opposite. I would definitely recommend this dress. It's sexy but classy and the color is fantastic. The only other thing was the length of the dress but honestly through some heels on and that's no longer a problem!
I love this color and the fit was perfect! I got so many compliments all night long. My husband told me how great I looked more this night than the day we got married!
I loved everything about this dress. Received many compliments all night & it fits like a glove

links_reviews_title: Really enjoyed wearing this dress but the fit for my long-torso was not great.
links_reviews_text: I was glad I followed other ladies' suggestions and ordered an 8 as my backup size when I'm usually a 6. The dress material was thick, super comfortable, and well lined. I have a long-waist so the dress kept developing a fold over my stomach (you can see it in my photo) that I felt like I was tugging at all night. I also think this dress would be more flattering on someone with a larger bust size than my B-cups. The dress also hit perfectly below my knees so it may hit at an awkward length for women shorter than 5'10".
Color is wow!!! Very tight in med section, but comfortable fit and the length was very classy!! I'll rent this again for sure

Perfectly tailored, versatile, fit like a glove and TTS -- the perfect dress! It could be dressed up or down for almost any occasion. The only downside for me was having to wear stickies instead of a bra.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress - darts look like hard nips tho
links_reviews_text: Amazing dress, great, sturdy material, fits in all the right spots. However, the darts on the chest made me look like I had hard nipples all night. Otherwise, I got a ton of compliments and loved the color

I wore this to a wedding in Miami. The color was stunning, the open back was very pretty, fit was perfect. My only compliant was it was a hair too long. I am 5'2 it hit me like mid shin. I think it would have been pefect if it hit at the knee. Other than that it was very pretty, form fitting, sexy but classy. Another great rental!
Great dress for a wedding! It was a little past my knees, but didn't look frumpy or conservative at all. The back is beautiful! I got compliments all night, and was very sad to return!

Wore this to the rehearsal dinner for my daughter’s wedding. Dress fits well, accentuates curves and is a great color. Material is thick enough to hide figure flaws, and fully lined. It doesn’t have a lot of give in it, so I wouldn’t wear it to a dance party. I’m 5’4” about 127 lbs, with an hourglass shape.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress, but a little awkwardly long for a 5'4" person like me
links_reviews_text: Great dress but a little long. Might use hem tape if I were to rent again

This is a beautiful dress that I received lots of compliments on. My only complaints are the neck came up way too high on me and was uncomfortable and the seams at the bust line were very noticeable. You can wear a strapless bra with the dress which helps to push the seams out. I would recommend ordering one size up.

links_reviews_title: I felt great all night in the flattering fit and fun bold color!
links_reviews_text: Dress is fitted but forgiving showing off curves in a flattering way. A little big for me around the bust area with slight gaping under armpits so if you are very flat chested maybe consider sizing down.
EVERYONE loved this dress. The fit and fabric are perfect. And the lines and silhouette create a classic, understated elegance. Perfect for a country wedding.

links_reviews_title: The color and fit is amazing!
links_reviews_text: The color on this dress is fantastic! I received so many compliments from people this night as well as later from social media. The material is nice and thick and very supportive. It's a well made dress that is just really flattering on if you have an hour glass shape. I highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a California wedding.
links_reviews_text: The color is beautiful! I got tons of compliments that night. The dress runs true to size. I'm tall so the length was great on me and hit just below the knee. This dress was super comfortable. I didn't have to pull at it all night or anything! Definitely would rent again.
I liked that this dress wasn't too "clingy" and was comfortable for dancing. The bust/clavicle area is rather large, I don't think it would be flattering on someone with narrow shoulders.

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for a wedding, light, comfortable
links_reviews_text: The dress fits true to size, it has some give to it so its very flattering on! I love this dress it was fantastic, I got compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: I got a ton of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'5" and it was a little longer and looser in the calves than I would have liked but overall fit very well!

I loved this dress. I wish I was a little taller would be my only complaint but the length still looked good and lower mid calf. I didn't even have to wear a bra and with the Illinois humidity that was GREATLY appreciated. Loved the color, the fabric was so nice.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color! Perfect fit! I received lots of compliments on this dress. Very flattering!
links_reviews_text: I purchased a stick-on strapless, backless bra to wear with this dress and I'm glad I did!
Perfect fit, comfortable, beautiful color. Might be a little long if you're not tall. Tons of compliments. "Hot!"
The dress definitely runs small so size up. The 10 was a little too big in that the straps were too long but i was able to safety pin them into place. Very flattering cut and color.
It fits true to size. It was a hit everybody gave me compliments. Super classy.

links_reviews_title: Wore as a Maid of Honor
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great, albeit a slight folding that occurred in the front waist area. I wore this to my friends wedding as her maid of honor and got compliments all night. My dress did arrive with a stain on the breast but it was light enough that I could hide with with flowers during the ceremony and no one noticed it anyway (I hope). I danced for hours in this little number and I'm sure you will too. Looks great if you have built shoulders.

I received this dress after the first dress I rented didn't fit right. I can range in size from 6-10 depending on designer. I wore this dress in a 10 and only needed a little help with the last inch of zipping! Overall loved the fit, received tons of compliments, and felt comfortable and confident all night.
This dress felt and looked like a million bucks. The neckline hits really high and while I'm usually a pretty true size 4 it did feel really tight by the end of the night. Size up for your backup.
The sequins can itch a bit as they rub your arms because there is no lining. Otherwise really great top!

links_reviews_title: Fun sparkly little number, perfect for Vegas
links_reviews_text: Good fit - snug yet comfy. Perfect amount of sparkle and looked super cute with black faux leather leggings.
Loved this top. Fit well and perfect length. looks great with jeans. Would rent again
This was a fun and cute top. It wasn't itchy or scratchy at all. Actually really comfortable for the material!
Cute too and fit well!
Super fun shirt that can be worn casual or dressed up! Perfect for a day of shopping on vacation in Vegas. Wore it several times, work, upscale brunch & a family birthday dinner!
I ended up buying this as thought it could be a good staple piece. Very flattering and mostly comfortable. It is a little scratchy but I liked the top enough I'm willing to over look this

I rented this for a bachelorette dinner. It was fun and I got a lot of compliments. Top a little uncomfortable. The shoulders kept riding up on me but since one petite a size up would have been too big in the chest.

Got so many compliments on this top. I wore the medium, I'm 5'6 145 lbs and it fit perfect. If you are my size and have bigger boobs (C or up) would recommend the Large. The shoulder area never rode up so didn't have to worry about fixing all night. Wore it for my friends bday outing :)

links_reviews_title: The material is great quality and fit is perfect
links_reviews_text: Wore it with black leggings and a strapless bra. It was prettier in person, I wish it blinged up in pictures more. I am 8/10 but wore the large. Lined.

links_reviews_title: Love this shirt. If I could buy it, I would! It never slipped off my shoulders and fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: long enough to cover the top of my velvet pants, sleeves were form fitting and the shoulders never slipped.

I loved this top so much! I was going to a fancy dinner with girlfriends for my birthday and it was perfect. It never falls from your shoulders and fits great! I loved how sparkly it was - I got a lot of compliments. I wish I could have kept it forever!

I rented this top for a New Years party and it was perfect! Fit true to size, can dress up or down (I wore with black skinny jeans and black flats)...and the sparkles were beautiful! This top was comfortable and the top part didn't budge around my shoulders. Love it!
Fit true to size and didnt creep down the shoulders at all. Looked great for my holiday party outfit.
Sad I could not attend the event I rented this for. Will rent again!
Stayed in place. I was able to move my arms freely without adjusting this top.

Wore this shirt in Vegas and I received so many compliments on it. I felt very comfortable in it, I have a bit of a muffin top but it was not noticeable at all with this shirt. I would definitely recommend and wear again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for girls night out in NYC
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing the large, but could have worn the medium as well. Just a bit more comfy in the large.
#glam
It was short, not too short though. I liked it and got was perfect, have rented other things I've liked better.
Nice multipurpose shirt. Its easy to dress up or down. The sequin was slightly ichy but nothing unbearable. Loved how the sequin came out in photos.

links_reviews_title: Great shirt. I ended up wearing the medium.
links_reviews_text: It was flattering & pretty comfortable. The sequins came off quite a bit and were all over the floor by the end of the night. But got lots of compliments and will definitely rent again.
Beautiful top. Very flattering. Does run a bit tight on the armpit area, and a bit itchy because of the sequins but not too bad. I paired it with leather leggings and it looked amazing!
I rented this top to wear nye and it was perfect. It fit well and I felt great in it.

links_reviews_title: Xmas party perfection! Watch out if muscular arms...
links_reviews_text: I rented this for husbands boss ' holiday party. Was the perfect amount of sparkle. Tiny sequence. I was not itchy. Top stayed off shoulder & did not ride up. Warning was a bit tight on my more muscular arms but I could still lift them... plenty of room at waist & has a bit of stretch.
Absolutely loved this top! Its the perfect combination of classy and sexy. My only complaint is that I had to pull it down and reposition the sleeves several times.
Perfect for the holidays!!! Wore with black avery pants from banana republic and black heels! So happy with the rental!

links_reviews_title: Great top to dress up jeans!
links_reviews_text: The top was true to size. I chose the S as it fit better in the shoulders - no need to adjust like other off the shoulder tops. It was a great choice to dress up jeans for a fun party!

links_reviews_title: I want to purchase this shirt after wearing..... It can be dressed up with black pants or jeans.....
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect and slimming. I added a pair of moto leggings and it was great for a work Vegas night out.....

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an office holiday party!
links_reviews_text: Wore this top and some jeans to my office holiday party!! It was perfect. I wore the small and it is a true to size fit.
I wasn’t as impressed with this shirt in person as I was online. The sequins appeared dull and not as fancy as I’d hoped. The shirt also runs pretty small in my opinion.
The elastic on the shoulders is tight and the sparkle is minimal. Not too flashy.

links_reviews_title: This fit well, did not slip off of my shoulders and was not ichy!
links_reviews_text: This shirt fit well, did not slip off of my shoulders and was not ichy! Loved it.

links_reviews_title: This shirt is comfortable for being all sequined.
links_reviews_text: The shoulders fit very well for a narrow shoulder person

links_reviews_title: Wore to a concert with a leather jacket and it was great.
links_reviews_text: Ran a little big, probably needed the medium and not the large.

This looked great on the hanger, but unfortunately was way too small. I'm usually a small in blouses but definitely should have gone for a medium, if not even the large. Couldn't wear it, but I would rent again in a larger size.
If I could buy this shirt, I would in a heartbeat!! Fit perfectly! So many compliments! Will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Loved this top! Sexy and flattering.
links_reviews_text: It was very comfortable. I sized up because I didn't want it to be too fitting around the waist and it was perfect. I didn't have to adjust the neckline as everything stayed in place. I would definitely rent it again!

My first RTR was a bust. I didn't wear any of the outfit. But this is a pretty top. I just didn't feel the off-shoulder thing that night. Or the sequins. My bad. It fits well and I might even rent it again for a holiday event.
Wore it twice- once to a party and once our to dinner. Looked really nice. Flattering and sophisticated.
I usually look great in elevator drop waist dresses but this hits higher on the mid section and I didn't find it flattering. It also accentuated my broad upper body. Didn't wear.

I had high hopes for this one but I didn't love it. Stretchy around neck and waist made it very comfortable. However it was not at all flattering. I have a fairly straight figure and it made me look like I had really big hips and belly. I'd imagine it would look better on someone with more of an hourglass figure.

links_reviews_title: Not a good look for me
links_reviews_text: Nothing about this worked. I think the shape of the dress is probably best suited for pear shaped or those smaller on top. Didn't work for me. Also the lining/slip definitely runs longer, otherwise I would have kept it to get one wear out of it before sending back. A bit loose in the middle at the waist for me too.
For a shoshanna it was big - I had ordered a 2 shoshanna 2 weeks ago and couldn't zip it. Bummer.
Liked that this was girly without being overly twee. Fun print and neck didn't bother me as it did for some others.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for work or play!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress. I did feel like it didn't flatter my mid section as much as other things, but I felt good in it nonetheless. Love the neckline on it.

links_reviews_title: So cute and fun, a little short
links_reviews_text: I'm usually between a 12 and 14, hourglass figure, 36G, and this 12 was a good fit but a little bit short. I loved the cut--you do need a racer back or strapless bra, but it was so fun! A little too short for me (I think this one got shorter with dry cleaning--the slip was actually longer than the skirt).

This is a really cute, comfortable dress. Flattering and easy to wear. I received several compliments. The only negative is that the neck area was a little scratchy, but not too bad. Runs true to size.
This fit perfectly. I'm petite and short waisted, so I didn't have the same problem other reviewers did. Comfortable for a night out!

It's more stunning in person. Also it looks better in person than this picture. Although, the fit was off for me--there was extra room or fabric in the chest which is unusual for me in a 6. The elastic high neck was uncomfortable and the tag is on it as well which made it itchy. I eventually got used to it but I was happy I wasn't working late as I was done wearing it by the time I got home. So I took a star off for that. Otherwise it was light and comfortable on a hot day.

links_reviews_title: Wore to an Architectural Foundation tour of Tijuana MX, colors blended with vibrancy of the city.
links_reviews_text: Light weight, great for business or fun. A little tight around the neck, left one button open for comfy fit.
length is perfect and dress is light weight.

Great length, nice qualty, very confirtable, light and airy. The only reason it didn't get 5 stars is that it fit high on my waist, hitting me in not quite the right spot. I am a 4 or sometimes 6 due to broad shoulders/wide ribcage and this fit TTS. I did not have a 4 to try, only a 6, and the fit was good if not slightly large. Plenty of room around bust and hips and the length was modest and comfortable for sitting. (I am 5'8")
Was super comfortable and fit well, but wasn't wow'd by it.
Cut cut at the neck, but otherwise just ok all around.
Loved it and got lots of compliments!
This made my bust look smaller and Mia section look bigger than they are. I wore it anyway, but probably wouldn't recommend or rent again.
I've rented this a couple times. Love the comfort and style that is versatile between day and night.
I didn't find this to be flattering and the blousing fell strangely. I paired with a jean jacket which made it look okay but without the jacket I didn't like it.
Pretty flattering, would say it just draws more attention to your bust than other garments. I'm 5'9", and it was long enough on me, so I was happy with it!
The skirt was so fun to dance in but the top was really large. Could have probably taken the 8 or 6. Super light and great for a summer wedding.

links_reviews_title: Great work dress for hot summer day
links_reviews_text: Versatile dress. Only wore the one time to work. My husband loved the dress but I found it a little boring and forgettable, though it was cute and I did receive compliments at work too. I liked the high collar. Kept me warm in a cold office building @ work.

links_reviews_title: easy to wear, nice for work or party.
links_reviews_text: Wore to day time party and a bbq. cute but nothing super special.
Beautiful print and easy to wear. I have a 33 inch waist and thought the dress made me look a little bit wide. If you’re looking for a swimming dress this may not be for you.
Loved the dress, but it was a little to high waisted for me. All say I felt like it was at an odd spot.
Wore this to my graduation. Loved it super flattering cut and perfect length to show leg but still be appropriate for a family and school event!

links_reviews_title: just ok, cute, comfortable, but not extremely flattering.
links_reviews_text: thin elastic waist band, hits in odd spot, not flattering
Fit great
Not a great fit if you don’t have a small waste.
Pretty dress but didn't work for me. I have broad shoulders and short torso and the dress was not flattering on me. Very comfortable and nice float fabric.

links_reviews_title: It was great day dress for any occasion
links_reviews_text: Extremely comfortable and super cute. It was a little high wasted but still work fine.
Great fit that can be dressed up or down. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Such a fun dress, I didnt want to send it back!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so comfortable and easy to wear. I would recommend it for any warm weather vacation or summer event. The color and pattern was beautiful, the fabric was soft and not see through, and the style was flattering.
Super cute dress, I wore several times before I sent it back. Comfortable and was work and fun appropriate!
I added a brown belt and a denim jacket. So cute and fit perfectly!
Cute dress, just didn't like the way it looked on me
comfortable and cute
Very cute dress and loved it with a denim jacket. Only downside was the RTR "tag" was in the fitted turtleneck portion so was uncomfortable on my neck. Fun summer dress.
Cute dress and received tons of compliments. I did have to undo the top bottom as it did feel as though it was choking me throughout the night. My hair covered it so all was good.

links_reviews_title: So comfy and flattering, but neck part is a little tight
links_reviews_text: This dress is so soft and comfortable. Great color and feel. THe only negative was that it was right around the neck. I have a small neck and it was tight on me. Made me feel a little claustrophobic.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! I think I'll buy!
links_reviews_text: Obsessed with this dress. Everything about it was perfect. I wore it to a rehearsal lunch for a wedding and got so many compliments! It was pretty tight around my ribs, but I have wide ribs. I just sucked it up for the evening, lol. Great fabric - no steaming required. Perfect length. Loved the adjustable straps and leg slit. So flattering! Did not hug my belly at all. Just a note: the little tie between the boobs isn't adjustable.

I decided to go with the large because of the reviews. It was a little big in some areas but luckily wasn't tight anywhere!! You don't have to wear a bra which is very nice! It does have a short slip underneath which is nice so you can't see through. The slip made it a little sexier and got soo many compliments all night! Will totally rent again!!

This fit perfectly! I thought it would be a tighter fit and I'm so glad it wasn't, it was so flattering. Hugged in the right places but left room for dinner and dessert :) I also loved the colors, perfect for a warm fall day. I would definitely rent again!
Such a comfortable dress! A rented it for just a casual weekend but ended up buying it! You can dress it up or down.

One of the best things I've gotten from unlimited ever and I have been a member for almost 4 years. Perfect for an hourglass shape. Runs very small. I wear a 6-10 based on how fitted the hips are and the XL fit perfect. Zero stretch Fabric was great and didn't wrinkle. I wore with flats but you could definitely dress it up. Will probably buy this.
I loved this dress so much I bought it. I'm only 5ft tall so it's rare for me to find a dress like this that fits well.

links_reviews_title: so many compliments!! and uber comfortable!!
links_reviews_text: i didn't want to take this dress off!! the slit was sexy but not obvious. i wore this dress without a bra with no problem. it fit my boobs well without hugging by stomach. it probably hit my lower leg a little more than I thought it would so maybe a different fit in someone shorter - but loved this dress so much. It's a polyester feel- it looked like it would have been more cottony but looked great and was super comfortable. I wore it on a day trip to Sedona, a date night to the botanical gardens, and to lunch just because.
Fit well, XS fits closer to a 2 than a 0. Only bummer was that the chest didn't cinch at all.

I loved having this addition to my closet! I wore it several times and always felt sexy and fun. It's a pretty thin material and the lining is short, but for a hot day it feels great. Fit perfectly true to size. It was kind of a weird length when not wearing heels, but maybe that was just my height. Highly recommend!!!

Fits snug in the waist (I am between a 24-25), hit a little below my ankle (I'm 5'4), and adjustable straps. has a cute cut out but is not overly sexy - felt comfortable wearing it to a summer family party and got lots of compliments! Comfortable, easy to pack, and will definitely rent again!

Due to the reviews I thought this dress would not work out, but I loved it! I'm 5'3" and 120 and the XS fit perfectly. Very lightweight dress, slip is snug but I didn't think about it once while it was on so it definitely wasn't uncomfortably tight
Fits well, adjustable straps.
It was a little tighter on my hips than I expected it to be, but still comfy and easy to move in.

The dress was a bit tight around the chest. I suggest sizing up because of that. The small peep hole in the middle was really dainty and I loved it. Really, my husband was the only person who noticed it which I thought was perfect. Wore this to a mothers day brunch!
This was so flattering on!! Adored the neck line, not too revealing. The length was great with flats as I'm 5'4. I paired with a jean jacket as well.
Loved the way this dress fit!

links_reviews_title: Waiting to wear it in Texas
links_reviews_text: It's a little tight around the hips - love the pattern and would size up next time

I wanted to love this so much! Print, color and quality was great. Keyhole was cute in chest area.I ordered a large based on reviews of it being too small. I should have just got the medium because it was a little too big and hung weird. The dress was too large and an awkward length because I'm only 5'3". Looked nothing like the model on me.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to love this dress
links_reviews_text: This dress just didn't work for me. It fit very odd. It was big and boxy. The dress almost felt like a weird windbreaker fabric. Unfortunately it just wasn't flattering on me.

This fits true to size, definitely needs a taller shoe if you're short, the length felt awkward on me with flats. The fabric is slightly stiff, but it's brand new so I'm thinking it will probably soften up with a few wears. I am going to wear a knotted t-shirt over it one day to dress it down.
This dress has a very inflexible skirt underneath the main skirt that rode up all day. Top fit fine on 32B with no bra.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, a bit casual, runs big!
links_reviews_text: Got this as a back up dress, great service, beautiful color, would rent for a less formal event than a mountain wedding, definitely rent down a size.

Loved it so much I bought it. I'm 5'6", 36B and pretty rectangular and it fit perfectly, not too tight but with enough structure to flatter really well. Wore it with booties and a long sweater for fall, would be great in summer too. Had to have it.

links_reviews_title: I loved the length and design of this dress! It was so fun to wear too!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a musical and what a beautiful fit and length. I am 5'4" and am a 36B/34C. I wore a strapless bra and found the Small fit best. The description says this is black, but was more of a dark gray/gray navy looking color. I wore it with a black balero, but it didn't clash. Would absolutely rent again!

links_reviews_title: It was great! Almost bought it.
links_reviews_text: It fit so perfectly and was very form fitting and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress to wear to a formal wedding in September.
links_reviews_text: Fitted bodice with flowy bottom. The slit was a nice fun touch as well as the hole in the middle. Was easy to move in as well. The dress is a dark dark purple with pink/beige details. The straps are adjustable as well. I wore a sticky bra with it and was perfect all night. Wore minimal jewelry, block heels, and added a cropped black jacket when traveling from location to location. Was a different dress than I am used to wearing, but I really liked it.
Rent this it's perfect

links_reviews_title: pretty dress but somewhat awkward fit
links_reviews_text: breast area was baggy in the center, so did not look very flattering

links_reviews_title: Sized up and still too tight in hips, NOT for curvy girls
links_reviews_text: The top part fit fine, but the dress is very straight-cut. Does not stretch. Made my curves look like a box. Sending back immediately.
The fit was perfect and the length was great for me at 5'3". I also couldn't believe the top fit my chest so well, at a 32F that's not common.
One of my fav from RTR
Flattering maxi dress. Comfy and stylish
dress is pretty and cool
Elegant, comfortable dress. The high slits kept it youthful.
I LOVE this dress. The fit was perfect, it was sexy without being too revealing and the fabric was the best part of this dress. Very well made - I think I will be purchasing!

The zipper gets stuck on the back seam, so you have to be able to slip in for most of it. Also, if you are shorter (I'm about 5'4") this is more of a maxi style (which is cute). Overall, because I couldn't get the zipper to fully go down, I would not get again because taking it off over my chest without the zipper was a challenge.
A little wider in the waist than expected but overall a great fit and fun dress

links_reviews_title: I got compliments and second looks on this dress all night. Looks great on my curvy figure.
links_reviews_text: Great fit.
Idk, just wasnt great on the top. The fit wasnt as flowy bc of the slip. really liked the pattern and ended up wearing under a jacket

Don't be fooled by the A-line: there's a slip beneath that is quite fitted and short. The skirt is just sheer enough to show a sexy silhouette of your legs and the short slip beneath, and the high leg slit takes this dress from a run-of-the-mill fit-and-flare to a sexy party dress. MR was just the right fit for me. Loved the pattern.
True to size, but this was not my size. Fun. Heavy material
High quality fit and dramatic detail

Exactly as everyone said- runs small! I could barely slide the medium over my almost non-existent hips. So glad I had the large as a back-up! Fit perfectly! I'm 5'0" so the length was great, would've been short on a tall gal. Got endless compliments on this all day. LOVED IT!!

Wore this to a rehearsal dinner. Many compliments. This dress has no stretch and is a little narrow though the hips making it hard for me to step into, so I pulled it over my head to get it on. There is room in the chest area for boobs which was kinda unfortunate for me since I lack in that department.
Loved the detail of this dress. Snug in the bust if you are full chested.

Size up is solid advice, especially for room in the chest and for length. Man is this a short dress! I was uncomfortable doing anything other than standing, but it did look cute, and I wanted to feel confident...I just wasn't. And sitting was just obscene...my bottom wasn't covered, I feel quite certain. This is a definite "do not bend down, take the stairs, or raise your hands" kind of dress. But it is adorable otherwise, and the fabric is heavy enough that it doesn't blow up in a breeze easily. Would be super cute on a petite frame.

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Lots of compliments on the unique lines and patterns and the material was comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I got a medium and a large, full expecting the medium to fit but I had to wear the large. It was very snug around the bust line.
Loved! Flirty and fun! Expensive material, lots of compliments, very short!

I rented this for an outdoor party. I paired it with red strappy sandals and later with flat sandals and I felt it looked just as cute. Very versatile with great details. The neckline goes up pretty far so being a bit on the busty side, i felt it make my boobs look really low on my body. I am usually a small but after reading the reviews, i sized up. Really glad I did because this dress has the potential of being short.
Great fit
Pros, the material was very good. The dress is adorable. Cons, it was very short.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress in Turks and Caicos and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The material is thick but fits great and very true to size. Definitely recommend wearing high heels or wedges

This dress is perfect to wear for an outdoor Spring or Summer wedding. I haven't sent it back yet because I'm so tempted to keep it! I love how fitted my RTR Alexis dresses have been, especially for someone with a very petite frame. Definitely recommend this dress!
Got this for Christmas in Florida. Got so many compliments from strangers on the sidewalk. The train on the side is just enough to make a statement. The fabric is adorable. Overall highly recommend!
Loved this dress! Was so fun and flirty for our casual welcome party before our wedding! Definitely glad I read the reviews, runs small. I wore the large and typically wear a size 6 (5'4).
For great!!!! Wasn't too long either! I'm 5' and it help perfectly. Too cute!

I loved this dress so much! I wore it for a wedding in Florida and got so many compliments. The fabric was thick and the dress runs small. I typically wear a small or medium and the large fit me perfectly
I enjoyed this dress. It might run a tiny big small. The a tail is a cute accessory.

links_reviews_title: My date who never comments on my clothing said "That Dress was fire!"
links_reviews_text: Pros it did not accentuate my lack of derriere, It was lady like yet stylish/sexy without trying too hard. I received many compliments as i usually do in my RTR threads. The fabric is thick and does not stretch so be honest with yourself when you choose sizing. It ran true to size in fact it was my best RTR fit to date. The only Con is that I didn't have any other "EVENTS" to show off this dress. Hopefully something will come up before its time to give it back. I'm thinking about buying this one.

links_reviews_title: Compliments all over the place!! Super FUN standout dress!!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress & had been waiting for it, for a while on my Unlimited....it was worth the wait as it was remarkable, unique & very fun to wear. I wore the medium with zero room to spare, it fit like a glove & was a major challenge to get the zipper up. No room for a bra, which thankfully I did not need it holds you in tight. The fabric is heavy, almost like a linen sunbrella so it could be a nice transitional fall dress, depending on accessories, the pom pom details on the shoulders are super cute & not over the top. One other very important note....it is SHORT, I am 5'4" it hit me pretty high up in back....like don't bend over, short. Thankfully the ruffle is a cute distraction. Awesome dress if you are not afraid of short and to stand out!!

links_reviews_title: Loved loved this BUT RUNS SMALL!!
links_reviews_text: To give you an idea of fit, I'm 5'1" and measure 34x26x34 @117lbs but the SMALL was TIGHT, as you can see in the photos... I might rent it again in a medium just cause it was that cute!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments as usual (when I get RTR dresses)! It was so cute and had a lot of personality!
links_reviews_text: I probably could have used the 4-6, but it wasn't available for my dates so I crossed my fingers and ordered the 2 and 8, they both fit, but since the material is so thick (feels like upholstery) the 8 was very bulky and I squeezed into the 2 just fine. I'm 5'8" and it was short, but not enough to bother me too much.

This dress fabric is thick and of very nice quality. The dress runs tight up top, so if you are chesty, definitely size up. I ended up wearing a gold waist belt with it to make my waist more defined, that's the only down side of sizing up. I got many compliments. If you rent this, you will not be underdressed to the party, I guarantee that!

links_reviews_title: Fits so well and so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It runs SO small but I read all the reviews and knew to order up. It is so cute and the material is very thick and so flattering!

Wore this to our local Tomato Arts Festival and loved it! True to size but it has no stretch so if you are in between sizes go up. The only con was that the dress came with a few snags in it, but they were hardly noticeable during wearing. So unique and felt expensive.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun dress! Had a blast dressing up & dancing.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a Gwen Stefani concert in Vegas! Thankful for the reviews about fit, I usually wear a M/L or 8/10 in dresses, and have a full bust (DD+). The XL fit perfectly, even a little tight at the chest. Length didn't bother me, I am 5'4 and wore undershorts underneath so I didn't have to think about it while jumping & dancing. The cascade is a great detail, very different. I felt great & like I stood out from the crowd.
Dress ran super small and barely covered my butt. The ruffle felt like a tail and it felt like I was wearing a costume. Did not wear.
Fabric doesn't have stretch and flattens chest a bit but overall loved the style. Got a lot of compliments on it. Fabric was a little heavy

links_reviews_title: Heavy dress but beautiful even in the summer... very thick and can be hot.
links_reviews_text: Thick, beautiful, heavy, great for special event
Cute dress but very, very short
Super thick fabric that hugs all the right places. True to size and super flattering, it was amazing to wear and would highly recommend

links_reviews_title: Runs Small, But such a nice dress!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a small, but the large was key to the fuller bust- it does run small all over though, so don't let ordering a larger size deter you.
Its small in the armpit holes and around the chest. If you have large breast go a size up. I couldn't wear a bra with this because it was so tight. Overall perfect!
Very tight around the bust, short but so sexy!

links_reviews_title: One of my best rentals ever
links_reviews_text: Thick, comfortable material. Not too hot, though- I sat for over an hour outside in 75 degree weather for a baccalaureate mass in it and was fine. Got more compliments than I could count and many people asking me where I got the dress. The fringe of the sleeve and long ruffle on the side give this dress so much personality. I wore the medium and it fit perfectly- not too tight at all in the chest (32DD) or stomach. I do have a long torso and I think that made this dress work so well on me.
Fun and flirty. Wore to the Kentucky Derby.
Rent this! Casual loved it
Absolutely love, thick material, fits great
The dress is well made, with great details

links_reviews_title: I loved how flirty it was. The material is thick.
links_reviews_text: I ordered the mediim and couldn't zip it. Large was snug but it worked.

This top may not be flattering in pictures but it was really comfy to wear. The box pleats and print give it visual interest and it hides any tummy flaws. I also wore it with a jacket and it was great layered underneath.
This blouse was so comfortable, great for a hot day!
Beautiful colors has almost a blush vase with spatterwork colors. Very light weight and breezy. Decided to not wear as it wasn't figure flattering- (would be great to hide a belly)
Flowy colorful top. Easy to dress up or down.

The colors are very pretty. The top is very flowy. The large was the only size available so I went with it over a medium. The arm holes were very big and I could fit a 9 mo. Bump under it if I had one. The annoying part as seen in the pic is this weird flap inside the arms that can peek out.
Didn't wear. Just wasn't flattering

This was the perfect shirt while I was feeling a little fluffy after a few days of not eating well :) Loved the splatter print and how flowy it is. Great everyday top - especially if you want a break from fitted clothes!

links_reviews_title: Loved the lightweight fabric and pop of color. I wore it to work and got several compliments!
links_reviews_text: Loose flowy fit and beautiful colored print. Got a bunch of compliments!
This was a great no fuss top! It was a great fit for my frame! I wore it twice, once to work and once to dinner. Would for sure rent again!
Beautiful colors and flows on a hot day, looseness hides figure though. I'm grateful for RTR letting me try out the style, no buyer's remorse!

I'm naturally pretty broad, and when I first tried this on I felt extra wide - it's just really flowy and not exactly form-fitting. However, after I put a jacket over it to give me some shape, I totally fell in love with it. It's such beautiful fabric and pattern for a great everyday look.

links_reviews_title: So cute I had to buy!
links_reviews_text: Loose fit but flattering even though this is not the best photo. I wore it twice and got so many compliments that I decided to buy it. Wore it with jeans and wedges.

links_reviews_title: Out of the box and flowy
links_reviews_text: True to size. Flowy and fun. Can dress up or down!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable top for a night out
links_reviews_text: I didn't really care for the pattern but it was really nice not to have to try on multiple tops for a night out. That's why I love RTR!

This tank is very forgiving on the stomach but having 36Ds even with a sticky bra cup that's flat I still felt like it made my top look large/wide. Perfect though for a hot summer work day and beautiful colors!

links_reviews_title: Sexy and cool for the summer heat! Perfect dressy top to upgrade your everyday to classy/chic!
links_reviews_text: I'm typically a size 4 on the top and the small was perfect on me. It also was great on the length. If I had gone smaller in the XS, (which I think I could have because the arm holes are roomy), I think the seaming in the front wouldn't have fallen so beautifully because it would have been a tad too snug. I'm glad I went with the small. So many compliments! Bright and a great pop of subtle color - so vibrant! The cut is really sexy for sculpting the neck and arms which is a bonus!
So light and comfort perfect thing to throw on w jeans!

VERY fun and flowy top! I usually wear more fitted tops to highlight my narrow waist but this was too fun to pass up. Colors are bright and artsy so I didn't feel like I was wearing a baggy garbage bag. I may have worn this top a few times. Sshhhh. Wish I could buy! Be careful in the wind though. This top definitely revealed some tummy with gusty conditions.

I wore this to work and also out to a bar while celebrating at a bday party. It's a very flowy shirt and I sized down (it was still roomy), but it looked nice. The only thing that was tricky was finding a bra that didn't show (straps and near the arm holes). I'd def rent it again!
The print is super cute and the fabric is light and breezy. It is definitely shorter than I thought it would be, but definitely fun to wear!
Wore on the weekend with jeans And to work with a blAZER. VERY flowy. Pattern was very pretty. Would rent again

I am 5'4", 200lb, 38C and rented the L. This top is a simple trapeze cut and does not cut in at the waist at all. Basically, however far your boobs go out is where the rest of it will fall so all of you will look however wide your chest is. If you're looking for easy casual fit, you can definitely wear as -is. Its a fun top just know its not going to be slimming. I wanted a little more shape so I belted it. Because of the cut, it does run a little big - I think someone who was maybe up to a size larger than me could still comfortably wear this size.

Great shape... Just a well-designed, bright, fun spring to summer top! This will be cool in the summer. Plus you can eat all you want in this flowy, pleated piece. I wore it mostly with white jeans but it would also pair well with blue or black jeans or leggings. I also wore it with my navy blue suit a few times for work. It also looked great under a black leather jacket that I rented from Rebecca Minkoff. Rent and enjoy!

links_reviews_title: This top is fun and super comfortable
links_reviews_text: I added this top to my cart because it looked fun. The print is beautiful and the cut is super comfortable. It is such a versatile top. I wanted to rent an XS but it was not available. The small fit fine. It seemed slightly large but looked great with some skinny jeans.

very beautiful, fun tank that can be dressed up or down depending on your event. Of course, lots of compliments on every RTR item that I wear. Loved all of the colors and can pair with multiple options (skirt, shorts, pants, jeans--all multiple colors). Runs big as this XXS fit perfectly for me in the armpits, but still have plenty of room everywhere else. Would have loved to purchase this one as it is so versatile.

links_reviews_title: Great with skinny jeans and heels!
links_reviews_text: Very, very flowy. Almost too much with my large chest. Makes you loose your waist and flat tummy. Great pattern.

links_reviews_title: The fabric makes this pretty top really stand out
links_reviews_text: I really really love the style and fabric of this top. The print is very colorful and eye catching. It would be great for a causal office, going out, or everyday. I tried it with black skinnys but it looked best with jeans. It needs to be worn with a racer back style bra or strapless due to the cut of the arms. I usually take a small or medium in tops. The small was unavailable and previous reviews said this ran large so I opted to try the XS and it fit OK, but the small would have been better because the pleats would have fallen better through the bust and I think the length might have been a little longer. I will definitely rent again when the small is available.

The colors are really cute for spring and summer. Top is very flowy. Almost to the point of being too big. I would probably size down to a small if I got again. I wore with a leather jacket and boyfriend jeans and ballets for a cute cool spring outfit. This top would be great for someone who is self conscious of their midsection since the looseness would hide any pouch without looking obvious.

I struggle finding tops that fit me on RTR since I am petite. This top is a perfect fit in the armpits and length. I ordered this through my unlimited plan and wore it 3 times before I returned it. 1) paired with skinny jeans and red heels 2) paired with a white pencil skirt 3) tucked in and paired with wide legged jeans and platforms. Just love this top!

links_reviews_title: Pairs well with jeans and shorts - colorful and fun
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, loose fitting and easy to pair with multiple bottoms. Really unique print, edgier than a floral, It was fun with jeans for a beach adventure and could e worn for virtually anything. Well lined yet light weight so it's good for warm weather. I only gave it 4 stars because I personally don't find the shapelessness of it that flattering. But it's feminine and versatile and a good casual choice as part of my Unlimited Membership selection.

The perfect tank for a getaway vacation! You can wear this tank with a standard bra with comfortable room in the bust. If you're looking for a back up size I would recommend sizing up if you can. The pattern on the shirt isn't too bright or overwhelming with I liked. You can pair this top with a classic pair of light wash straight leg or boyfriend jeans!

links_reviews_title: Flows beautifully- pairs well with jeans
links_reviews_text: There was a bit of a tug of war going on to hide my bra straps beneath the top. There is a beautiful pleating detail on the front and back of this top that is not obvious in the photos. I felt pretty in this top.
Perfect little flow on this shirt. Loved the colors and cut on the shoulders. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: It was too big for me, I would need a small next time
links_reviews_text: Liked the style
I accidentally ordered this in a Large (normally I wear a Medium). This tank was gigantic on me. I think I would have liked it if I had ordered a size smaller.

Not a flattering top. It was too boxy and billowy - I looked lost in it, but a smaller size would have been too short and even more boxy. I'd pull the back down to make it look better, but it wouldn't stay. Unfortunate- the pattern was cute!
Perfect shirt to throw on with a pair of jeans or shorts and be out the door. The colorful pattern makes it fun but the flowy nature makes it easy to wear on any day.
The print was nice. The arm holes were way too big for me.

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing this shirt
links_reviews_text: It was much boxier than I expected and it didn't flatter my body.
The pattern is cute but it was a bit too boxy / flowy for my taste. Worked for work with a blazer.
Sophisticated but fun and young

links_reviews_title: Classic LBD with a super fun twist!
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress and got several compliments on it. I will say it was extremely fitted throughout, especially in the best area. If "the girls" are larger I would suggest going a size up for the backup.

links_reviews_title: Wish I could keep it forever!
links_reviews_text: A quirky take on the LBD! As long as you heed the advice of others to size up, you will be good to go. I am usually between a 4 and 6 but after reading the reviews ordered this dress in sizes 10 and 12. I could have worn either an 8 or 10 in this. The 10 was form-fitting, but not too tight. The sleeve and neckline are super fun. People complimented it all night long.

links_reviews_title: Great LBD for a night out.
links_reviews_text: Super cute take on the LBD. It does run V small so size up a couple if you have boobs. Wore this out dancing and my bf loooooved it. Very snug fitting with little give

Brand runs super small. I am usually size 2 and went up to a 6. Great dress. Works well for large bust. A little short but was perfect for a NYE party. Maybe not for a family wedding. Comfortable,not itchy, slight stretch in skirt so you can bend. Sleeve a bit long for my short torso but fashion tape held it up. Great dress got lots of compliments!
Wore to 2 holiday parties 5 months pregnant and looked cute on a belly but would be perfect without since it has a slight stretch. Very comfortable and the long sleeve is gorgeous!
Dress was super fun and cute for a night out in Vegas for the Lady Gaga concert. It was super snug. I really should have gone with the size up.

links_reviews_title: The price, quality and ease of returning the dress
links_reviews_text: I was in a rut trying to find a last minute dress for a formal work event. Thankfully I found out Rent The Runway had a local pop up shop where I found this dress that was the perfect fit!

This dress is perfect for that sexy night out on the town when it starts to get a little chilly. I wore it a second time in a dinner date and the zipper busted at the table & I (a stealth ninja) used the black napkin I requested so I wouldn't get lint on my dress to hide it until I could put my coat on. It worked hahaha! I still give this dress 4 stars even though it failed me, because I felt so beautiful in it!

This dress was definitely a "little black dress"! Loved the style but honestly it was so tight - even after going up 2 sizes.... I am normally a four and this is an 8. I had to call RTR to order me another size which was disappointing. Lovely dress but definitely small and uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: cool & interesting but size up a full size
links_reviews_text: great quality and cool style; surprisingly wasn't super short (I'm 5'10 and was expecting it to be super short given the model pics) - it is short for sure, just not as super-short as I was expecting. but it didn't fit either -- too tight, so didn't wear. i'm always a 10, would def. need a 12 at least in this.

I wore this out for New Year's Eve and loved it! I didn't get any pictures, but the fit was perfect (I'm usually in between a 2 and a 4) as it was tight, but I could move and still be comfortable. I definitely recommend this as a fun cocktail dress for any event!
I'm more curvy than the model shown. The length barely covered my rear end. The sleeve was tight. I think if you are tall, stick thin and leggy, you could rock this. Didn't work out for me.
Couldnt wear this despite sizing up. Youll need to size up at least 2 sizes. Soooo tiny.

I wore this gown for a Mardi Gras Ball in New Orleans. It was absolutely stunning. Perfect for the occasion. I felt like royalty. It's perfect for hourglass shapes. The material does have stretch so very formfitting. I should have gone one size up to a 6 for a little more stretch in the chest area. This dress was extremely comfortable! I'm still getting compliments three days later!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous & Comfortable Dress for Mardi Gras Ball
links_reviews_text: I'm short and usually wear a size 4 petite. I rented sizes 2 and 4 regular after reading reviews. See pics for length on my 5'2" frame. I guess it could have been slightly shorter but I prefer my dresses longish. I'd purchased some fashion tape hem tape but didn't feel the need to use it. It's super stretchy, so you can easily go down a size, possibly two. The sequins weren't scratchy in the least and it was the most comfortable dress I've ever worn!!
