I recommend wearing a good strapless bra. Use some fashion tape to attach the dress to it so it won't show. This was my first experience with RTR and it won't be my last!!
I wore this dress to a Great Gatsby formal affair. It fit like a glove and was so flattering. I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Perfect formal gown for the holidays.
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable, flattering and lightweight. Compliments all night!
Fit like a glove! Loved it! The R runs a little shorter than I would have liked so did have to change me heel height.

I'm 5'6, 140 lbs and the 2L was perfect...was concerned about length based on other reviews so I went long and I'm glad I did. This dress is stretchy so it was very comfortable - - I got compliments all night long!

links_reviews_title: My rent the runway experience will be unforgettable because of all the compliments I received.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit was perfect!
Perfect for my company Christmas ball
Ran true to size, thick forgiving fabric. Wish I had worn a bra. Made me look flat chested without.
Fit perfectly and was the ideal length with heels. So many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Wish I could keep the dress
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress as a bridesmaid's dress (the bride has very loose guidelines) and fell absolutely in love with it. I got 2L and 4L, and while I'm normally not a size 2, the smaller one was the better fit. Undergarments were a little challenging to navigate with the neckline so I went braless. The dress is very forgiving, very slimming, and all around gorgeous. The length was perfect with 4" heels. I got compliments all night long.
The entire bridal party looked fabulous

links_reviews_title: I received SO many compliments and I was literally glowing the whole day!
links_reviews_text: I rented this as a bridesmaid dress for the bride’s rose gold ombre theme and was initially a little worried it would be too flashy for a bridesmaid dress. However, it ended up working beautifully and photographed really well. It’s not so tight that it’s uncomfortable but just the right about of stretch where you can move. This is my third time renting a Badgley Mischka dress and they always fit so perfectly. Only issue was my updo was low and kept getting caught on the sequins on the top part of the back of the dress. Another tip is don’t stand next to someone else who’s wearing sequins (I kept getting tangled with another bridesmaid’s sequins dress Haha).

links_reviews_title: I was unsure what size would fit. I was amazed that I was able to add a second size with no charge.
links_reviews_text: Get the long fit. Had to tape inner lining to shell because it would fall out. Fit my body perfectly. So many compliments. This was my maid of honor dress. Bridesmaids wore burgundy.

links_reviews_title: Golden!! This dress is a stunner!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my husband's graduation party- it was a formal event for graduating medical residents. I was (am!) 20 weeks pregnant and 193 lbs, 5'8 and a size 12 was quite roomy. I think this dress runs a little big- my only wish is I tried a size 10 bc then it was be more snug and supportive. Wearing the dress loose is not advisable it will shift off center in the back, and the top part will expose your chest! Nevertheless I looked and felt like a star the whole night and got complimented by everyone who saw me. I recommend light jewelry and neutral stilettos. Cannot recommend this dress enough!! STUNNING!!

So my friend decided to have us rent our bridesmaid dresses for her wedding. I panicked due to having to order online without trying it on. I ordered a 20WL and 22WR. I was freaking out that they wouldn't fit. Due to being a more curvier woman I ordered larger sizes expecting it to run small due to the mix reviews. I was able to have my dress delivered to the hotel and it arrived in a cute tote. When I finally tried the dress on to my surprise they ran larger. I ordered the 20WL and being only 5'7 it came to my ankle, which was disappointing. It was also larger in the bust area which was surprising with my 42 DDD bust. I tried on the 22WR and found it to be a tad shorter then the prior dress and even larger throughout the dress. Overall the color and fit was very flattering. The slit in the back allows you to move and even though the materiel is thicker the dress is pretty light weight. Some simple body shaper will do the job and I would wear shorter heels if you want the dress to be longer.

links_reviews_title: It was my 60th white & gold bday party and I wanted a gold dress and my guest wore white.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size and was very comfortable. Everyone was amazed and complimented me the whole night. I was truly the queen of the affair.

This dress was super comfortable and I got a lot of compliments on it! The material was stretchy and the dress itself wasn't long so I was able to wear "gladiator" sandals and have my feet be comfy all night. The material didn't run underneath my arms, the only downfall is that if you plan on wearing your hair down, it'll get stuck to the sequins, but other than that, it was a PERFECT dress for any occasion.

I’m typically a size 6, always have been. Just in case, I got a size 6 and 8, but I really could’ve fit into a 4, as well. The dress is stretchy and forgiving. I’m 5’8, bust size 36DD/DDD, 145lb and an athletic build. I didn’t wear a regular bra for fear that it would peak out the sides (that drooped slightly lower than expected) but I was able to wear a strapless bra, and it was perfect. The dress was gorgeous, and better yet, COMFY! If you’re thinking about getting it, get it. You’ll feel so confident and look beautiful :)

A beautiful dress, and very comfortable. However, I did not end up wearing the dress becuase it was too long on me (I am 5'4" and I wore 4" heels). Also, if you have any tummy, it will show through the tight fit.

What a surprise and a showstopper! I actually rented another sparkly, gold Badgley dress but the 2 fit was not a match for my bust. This little gold number fit like a glove. Perfect for smaller gals with larger chests. This dress accentuated my waist and the halter style showcased all the hard work I've put into my arms this spring! This was my first rental and I received the backup style as a freebie with order. I received so many compliments and felt great about the way I looked! Thanks RTR!
Fits like a glove Very light Easy to walk and dance in

links_reviews_title: I felt like a gold statue.
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit. The lining was very comfortable and the sequins did not itch. Figure hugging comfortable and flattering. Great dress for a black tie gala

links_reviews_title: I attended a formal event with 800+ other people and felt like a queen!
links_reviews_text: This gown fit like liquid gold! It accentuated my curves wonderfully. I would recommend renting this gown to stand out in the crowd. I did and I received a ton of great compliments. This was my first; however, definitely not my last time using RTR!

links_reviews_title: The right amount of sparkle for NYE!
links_reviews_text: This was my first time renting from RTR, and I have to admit I was slightly nervous about fit and length. I am typically a size 4 and at 5'9'' without heels on I knew I needed a long. I ordered the 4L and it was PERFECT! It looked custom tailored and fit like a glove! I got compliments all night! I loved it so much I bought it!

Size worn: 2R Height: 5'4" Weight: 141 lbs Athletic build Ordered 2R and 4R Very comfortable and length perfect for my height; most dresses are too long on me. Got compliments all night. The dress really stood out! Didn't want to send it back.

links_reviews_title: Loved it; great dress. Fit was true to size and the rent the runway process was easy and went great.
links_reviews_text: Cut was flattering and the dress is surprisingly light.
The fit of this gown was perfect! It was a little long but the heels I wore helped.

links_reviews_title: Feel Like a Movie Star in This Gown!
links_reviews_text: This beautiful gown was a head turner, and I immediately fell in love the moment I put the dress on. It fit true to size and was comfortable to wear. I received a ton of compliments. I would highly recommend for a formal occasion.

links_reviews_title: It is a high quality dress! The sequins did not irritate my skin and it was very comfortable
links_reviews_text: It is a long dress so make sure you’re okay wearing high heels. I’m 5’2 but I’ve never gotten so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for New Years wedding
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. Elegant and stunning. I'm short and it fit well with heels on. No issues at all.
I wore for a performance

links_reviews_title: I looked like a goddess. COMPLIMENTS FROM STRANGERS
links_reviews_text: I wore it for 1920s themed company holiday party and it was so freaking perfect. I seriously think I was the hottest girl there with the dress. It was classy and sexy. However, it is form fitting, so it doesn't do much if you have a belly or flat butt. It was also pretty long and my high heels of 3 in kept it from barely not stepping on it throughout the night. I was so sparkly and loved the dress! Got nonstop compliments from friends and strangers. Definitely go with deep red lipstick and hair updo for it. Sequins were very high quality.
Super comfortable, smooth inside like a glove! Got tons of compliments.
Took a poll and picked the other dress but this was a close second. Needs heels that are high so it doesn't drag.

links_reviews_title: pretty dress thats well made. nice color. shape hangs strange. Not good for curves/tall girls
links_reviews_text: sorry I didn't get a good standing photo but... I had to rent a gown for a gig. this is the one the client chose. It's really well made and comfortable... and very shiny. those are the pros. now the cons. I'm usually a size 6-8 Ive got bigger hips though but usually an hourglass shape works on me... this dress hangs very weird... in that it hugs you really tight at your hips... if you have hips... and was very loose fitting from the waist to the shoulders. ( I actually had to "pin" in on top so it wouldn't show my chest) so it doesn't hug in the "good" places... just in the bad ones :( bummers... Also one other con... I got an 8 L and I usually dont need a "long" I'm 5'7" ... but with any kind of heel the long isn't long at all. It chopped right at the ankle.
Runs a bit large wish I would have gotten the zero but still super flattering and was perfect for my event

This dress is my favorite dress I have rented from rent the runway. It was absolutely stunning and super comfortable. I wore a strapless bra with it and 2 inch heels and it was the perfect length. The only other thing that I would mention about the dress is that it is not very forgiving in the midsection so keep that in mind when renting. Overall, it's a head turner. I wish I could keep it!

links_reviews_title: The gold sequins are so much fun, this dress is amazing!
links_reviews_text: Great fit

I rented this dress to attend a gala in Vegas. I went for the old Hollywood look. This dress helped me nail it. I felt like a celebrity. I received compliments all night. The dress hugs the body. I am small chested, so I was able to get away with not wearing a bra. It was easy to move and dance in. I'm 5'9 and I wore low heels - the length seemed perfect to me. Not too long but not too short. Again, this was with low heels. Only down side is that the sequins did scratch my underarms a little bit. But it wasn't overly annoying for me. I would highly recommend this dress if you want to feel absolutely fancy and turn heads all night.
I think this dress really works on an hourglass figure. If it's too loose it might get frumpy. It turns heads and the color pops on camera. The top was just a tad baggy on me.

I'm an Unlimited member and this might be my favorite dress I've rented. Flattering, feminine, professional. (It hits above the knee but my phone is at a goofy angle). I wore it to present at a conference and it was so easy to wear!
Nice dress but the back was a bit puffy and when you lift your arms the whole dress shifts upwards so best for when you don't need to be too active.

This dress was more lightweight than I expected. I rented it for Christmas Eve and wore with black tights but it felt a little off with the weight of the fabric and embroidery. I'm between an 8 and a 10 and wore the 10. There was room in the hips and the waist is elastic so I think I could have sized down to the 8 and it wouldn't have been as blousy in the front.
Maybe I have a short torso? It definitely looked bulky about the waist, and didn't do anything for my figure.
Loved it! Got so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress with a flattering fit
links_reviews_text: This dress changed my outlook on the color red, it was classy but fun and easy to wear. I received a lot of compliments wearing this number :)

links_reviews_title: Love the color and lightweight material. Perfect for summer!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my friend's bridal shower. It was a unique style and loved the red color. It was lightweight which worked to my advantage for a September shower in which I was running around helping with set-up. I wore with nude heels. I would definitely rent again. It was a great length for a short person!

links_reviews_title: My husband said I looked like a little Valentine (worn on Valentine's Day)
links_reviews_text: I received so many complements on this dress! I wore it to the casino on Valentine's Day & several women came up to me to tell me how much they love the dress. Only thing I would warn is if you are tiny in the shoulders like myself it might create a little bunching in the back. I kind of pulled it forward and that seemed to help. Otherwise I felt very fashion forward & sophisticated #loved
Wore this to Christmas Eve dinner with family. Fits nicely and hit at right spot on my waist to make it flattering. Comfortable, not too tight. Really pretty color and pattern. Great dress!
Length was perfect especially when I'm pretty short! A little tight in the bust area but nothing that prevented any movement. Perfect for Christmas Eve!
Perfect for a company Christmas party

Love the dress and received so many compliments. The color really pops and the fun detail in the front makes it flirty. It's a great length too. I wore it for a work event but could easily go out on the town or go with tights for more conservative look. Great fit!

links_reviews_title: Cute, but tight and see through on top
links_reviews_text: It was cute, but the top was tight and see through. I ordered a size up. It was still kind of snug. Not good for busty women.

Great red dress; got lots of compliments on it. Ordered up a size to have more room to sit comfortably, move and dance as this material has no stretch. It still fit close enough to be flattering since the material is light and flowy. I happened to find a perfectly matching nail polish: Essie #536 "geranium".
LOVED everything about this dress. The color, cut, length...Perfect for a wedding!

links_reviews_title: Loved it, but definitely runs small!
links_reviews_text: Really cute dress, great for showing off a small waistline. I wore it in the winter with tights and it worked well. Definitely size up!

I rented this dress for my engagement photos. The fit was great and the color made me feel beautiful. It's a little tighter around the waist than I thought it would be but it ended up still looking and feeling great.
Fantastic flowy, light dress. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a birthday dinner and LOVED it. Would rent again
links_reviews_text: Love this dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved the look, but couldn't dance or sit in this fabric
links_reviews_text: I love how the dress fits, but it could only work if I was going to be standing up for my event. I couldn't lift my arms above my shoulders before the sleeves cut into my arm painfully. There is zero stretch to this fabric. Sadly this won't work for an upcoming wedding.

links_reviews_title: This dress is very versatile! Its great for every day or dress it up with a long necklace and heels!
links_reviews_text: A stylist at the Topanga location picked this dress for me! I loved it. It was very comfortable and I got multiple compliments!
The fit is incredible and gives plenty of room for an hourglass figure. I love the ruffle design because it is unexpected, interesting and adds a feminine touch. So comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful flattering red dress, sticky zipper
links_reviews_text: I'd read the reviews that this ran small so I was grateful that I'd sized up. It is a very flattering dress on an apple like me and even gave me a nice waist. I'd love to buy this dress. The design is a sheer overlay in some parts with small sewn star/flowers. The red color is gorgeous. Maybe it's just that it still seems so new. The zipper is very hard to zip up. I could not do it myself and my boyfriend had trouble as well. So even though I was renting it through unlimited I decided not to buy it due to the zipper. Lovely dress though.
Love the color and it's lightweight. Had tons of compliments. For me, the waist band was a bit snug. It is also oddly see through. I am wearing a nude bras but it looks like I'm wearing a dark one.
Comfortable and flattering Can be worn w regular bra Paired w nude heels

Rented this for a wedding. It was perfect with the Pink Sachin + Babi earrings I also rented. I'm very busty and am typically a 12, but had tried the 12 on in the store and realized I needed the 14 for my bust, honestly I could have gone up one more size in the bust however the bottom of the dress would then be too big. Got a ton of compliments on the outfit.

links_reviews_title: My sister is getting married and moving to London, so wore this to her proper English Bridal Tea!
links_reviews_text: My inaugural RTR choices were a total bust. In a panic, I called and the stylist and she was unbelievably helpful - in fact, when I rent again I will call first and consult vs just ordering online. We looked at options together online and came up with this incredible dress along with a back up. I usually wear anywhere between a 10 to 14. Got this in a 16 and 18W. The 16 was perfect. I have an hourglass figure, a 34DDD bust. Literally the only dress I have ever worn that 'de' accentuated my chest, despite having a high neckline! The ruffling in the front creates a gorgeous silhouette that is light and airy, the band at the waist accentuates an hourglass figure and shows off our great curves. Loved this dress so much that after my sister's tea planned a night out with my husband and boys for a dinner downtown. This dress is beyond beautiful and comfortable. Can't wait for the next excuse to RTR!

Beautiful color! Super cute dress great for a work event or even work! It does run small so I recommend sizing up for your back up size. You are able to wear a regular bra with this dress which makes it comfortable! I stand 5 ft tall and this hit me mid thigh, so consider the length if you are taller. However, beautiful dress over all!
Love this dress so much. Great fit, makes me look smaller , great color, so many complements! I would buy it if it wasn't almost the same price as one months of RTR!

links_reviews_title: Super cute and love the color
links_reviews_text: This is a great fit, great color, people loved it!
Wore this to a conference and went for my higher size (usually a 4 when I want more form fitting). Got lots of love on the look and it was really comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Such a cute dress with wedges or heels.
links_reviews_text: It was a bit tight along the waste line and the zipper got stuck but overall was beautiful color and looked great and slimming on.
I rented this for a holiday party. I didn't end up wear it simply because it was too cold for the shirt sleeves. I ended up wearing a different dress.

links_reviews_title: Such a beautifully detailed, feminine and delicate dress!
links_reviews_text: I'm between a 0-2 and wore the size 2 and it fit perfectly! It does fit smaller than other Monique Lhullier dresses I've worn. I wore this to work and to a bridal shower and got tons of compliments. It's a dress I will absolutely rent again as you can wear it more casually or dressed up. This might be my favorite dress I've ever worn!!

links_reviews_title: . I have broad shoulders and sized up two sizes. Loved everything about this dress.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for an event I wasn't able to go to but I loved it very much. It is a little short but not too short. Unfortunately I didn't have any other events but I will definitely rent it again. I have broad shoulders and sized up two.
Got this for a communion. It was comfortable and light weight. Very flattering. I would rent again.
The color is gorgeous and so is the fabric. I was so disappointed by how tight the waist was, and that there was absolutely no stretch. Im an apple, so probably good for more houglass shapes.
Beautiful color, but other than that it was very basic. Extremely thin with very little structure.
This dress was cute but bunches weird in the boob area.

links_reviews_title: IT was an ok dress. photos looked amazing but a little old on
links_reviews_text: Color was very pretty but it was a little like old fashion with the lace
FEMININE AND CLASSY. LOVED THAT THE OVERLAY LET ME GO BRALESS!
I didn't end up wearing this because it wasn't what I expected from the pictures. It's a lot of material and pretty heavy and long. It was not flattering for my 5'2" frame.
so chic, material is a bit heavier and not as casual. Was great for a dinner night out on vacation. The silhouette is flattering and I loved the strap details.
Very cute and flirty dress I wore to a breast cancer awareness event. The dress fit true to size, but it is very see through. Lots of compliments!

Very pretty dress....perfect for my occasion. I found it ran a little small in the hips but that is my problem area. The length is perfect...not too short, not too long, and material is lightweight Received several compliments.

links_reviews_title: Love the color and fit; fun dress for work.
Perfect for my daughters college graduation!
links_reviews_text: This dress is a keeper. True to size. Elegant. Classy. Sexy in an understated kind of way. Material is breathable and held up during lots of sitting. A bit sheer so keep that in mind but the compliments were constant from a wide array of folks.

links_reviews_title: Stylist Review: this was a great dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a great dress for vacation. The color was really amazing in person and loved the ruffles. The fabric was a little light and showed a little more than I liked but for vacation and as a dressy casual dress it was perfect. It fit exactly as described. You will probably be wise to wear spanx with this one.
Amazing Dress! Received lots of compliments. A girdle/spanks necessary if you want to smooth out your fupa but it's not needed.

links_reviews_title: This dress was great for work and then to wear out at night.
links_reviews_text: I am only 5'1 so I had to wear it with heels since it hit me at my knees, I think if you are taller it will be shorter so sandals would have been cute. I also have a large bust for my type so I sized up so it wouldn't be too tight.

I'm usually between a size 2 and 4 and the size 4 was the right size but it's tight in the waist, especially after a meal. The fabric is light and shiny and is not flattering to the stomach area. If this is an area you try to conceal, this is not the best dress for you or maybe you should go up a size or two so the dress will be looser. It's a very feminine dress. I got a couple compliments from women but the dress is nothing too special. I wouldn't rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Frilly but fun. A little see through
links_reviews_text: Lots of ruffles, but the material was pretty relaxed so the ruffles hung well and weren't too obnoxious. In this photo I'm wearing a dark grey bra and you can definitely see hints of it through the dress. Theres a semi sheer top layer and a plain pink slip underneath. Overall a fun dress.
Beautiful fabric. It's nice and light for summer. I will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Way too tight. Did not wear
links_reviews_text: I ordered this in the 16 and it was way too tight. I could barely breathe and did not wear it out.

This dress is a great color. True to size for me on the hips but a bit too big at the shoulders and sleeves (you could see my bra- the ruffles covered that mostly, though). However, I'm a pear shape so if I had sized down, it would not have fit my hips. Not a perfect fit but worked well for work and I felt cute in it ;)

I love this fun dress! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress which is awesome. The pattern on the dress is amazing in person and the ruffled sleeves make it unique. Pair with nude heels and a nude clutch to complete your outfit!

You'll get compliments all day. The dress is flirty and feminine. The fabric is light and perfect for a hot summer day. This is of the most comfortable dresses I've worn in a while and I would consider renting it again. My legs are long and the length was perfect but it might feel a bit to long if you have shorter legs.

I wore this to a trade show where my company was premiering a new, exciting product. Well this dress was so cute that when I posted photos of the exhibitor booth on social media, all the comments were about the dress and none about my product launch! The 8 fit perfectly, hugged my curves without being tight, and was comfortable. I will definitely rent it through Unlimited again!
Loved the dress! Fit perfectly & just fab/unique for huge work event with elected officials/dignitaries. I received compliments all day!

links_reviews_title: This dress is so much fun! Romantic, but modern enough for work.
links_reviews_text: A little tight, but true to size. It is a very light-weight dress, fun and flirty. Highly recommend - but maybe order a size too large.
It fit me perfectly enhanced my curves and complemented my hair
I almost didn't wear this bc I'm not used to skater style skirts but the pink polka dot is super cute. Chiffon material
This dress is so horrible, I could only wear it about a minute before peeling it off. I LOVE pink , fluffy , puffy, ruffly, etc , but this looks like a clown costume. The fabric is thin and cheap.
So small don't think 3 sizes up would have fit
The material is incredibly thin and light. Might be nice on a hot summer day but feels like it could rip with how thin the fabric is. It's not stretchy. Didn't end up wearing.

links_reviews_title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE! Great fit and material. Perfect for a Kentucky Derby party.
links_reviews_text: Great shades of pink.

The fit was perfect and hugged all the right places. Little too thin for February but will probably rent again for spring/summer. Not too cutesy, just super fun and easy to wear. Did use spanx underneath to smooth everything out so I could wear it and not think about it.
It ran small and was completely transparent.
It fit overall, but was tonight in the hips and loose in the bust. The fabric was thin. It was just overall unflattering.
Tight in hips

links_reviews_title: A little loose in the chest, a little snug in the rib cage.
links_reviews_text: It was just a bit snug under the boobs and I didn't want to deal with being uncomfortable so I didn't wear it. If I sized up, my boobs would have drowned. Would likely be a good fit for someone really thin with big boobs.
Great cut and great style. I matched the dress with red shoes and it was a winning pair.

Love this lightweight dress that's flirty and so feminine. It runs a little tight in the waist. I had to be really careful about my undergarments since it's a very fitted dress. But I got so many compliments!
I want to own this dress (after I lose about 5lbs). It fit like a glove, but the silk is so thin, I could see a little tummy bulge. I'm going to rent it again after a month of ab work!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress but go up in sizing!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 2 and this was tight around my chest (and I'm small chested), waist and hips/tummy area. I think the 4 would have been perfect and will rent again. Material is lovely and flowing with a bit of a sheer striped appearance not noticeable online. Pretty sure Monique Lhuillier can do no wrong!
Cute

links_reviews_title: Adorable print and fabric was lovely. Unfortunately not flattering for my body type.
links_reviews_text: Tight in waste
The dress is cuter in person. I wore it both out to a Sunday lunch and Friday family dinner. Cute dress.

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing this dress because the fit was not flattering. Also fabric is very shiny.
links_reviews_text: Fits very tight through the chest.
Pretty summer dress. Light and flouncy. Tight around the belly though. And the upper torso is a bit long. Maybe my body fit is not compatible with Monique Lhuillier's pieces
Couldn't zip at the widest part of my back. Runs small, but not terribly. It was close. Material didn't seem forgiving had it zipped.
Tried it on.. not too hard since I have 4 kids and no patience for clothes :( but it seemed short in the back. Thick legged mama didn’t look good. Thanks anyway!!
This Philosophy Di Lorenzo Serafini dress is beautiful but runs small... The lace sleeve is anice touch but very fragile. I still wore the dress for a girls night out and made it work.

links_reviews_title: Difficult to Wear - But Still Lovely
links_reviews_text: I decided not to wear this for my event because it was not comfortable & the fit was awkward. Absolutely need to size up, especially if you're a C cup or larger. Also the lace inset was very thin and felt fragile. You'll likely need help with the tiny snaps along the left shoulder & up the neck as they're very small. I love this designer, but this just didn't work for me.

I rented this for a Cher concert. And after reading the only review saying it was a size too small, I sized up one size. As you can see in the photo I was able to get it on, however I panicked thinking I might not be able to get it off. Tight around the shoulders and needed assistance to get it off. The lace on the arm was way too tight to wear comfortably. Otherwise, it's a great dress! Silk material so it's pretty thin and wouldn't be good for colder weather.

links_reviews_title: This dress is thin and runs very small in the bust and shoulders.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, elegant design but ran too small. I will try again in a larger size!

The material was very nice, but the fit did not work for me at all. The lace sleeve was very restrictive, and I was too concerned about tearing it to wear the dress all night. Meanwhile, the midsection was too large and so the fit was not flattering.
Could not fit over my chest

But it was inhumanly small. I normally wear a size 4. I was thinking about sizing up with previous experience from this designer, but I couldn't even get this over my head fully! Was this a case of worn and dry cleaned too many times? Felt more like a 00 than a 4!

I ended up buying this dress because I loved it so much. I am normally a 0-2 and I ordered the 2 which fit me well and gave me a little wiggle room. I probably could've gone down a size but that would've made it tighter. Depends on the look you're going for. I wore this to a work event and an engagement party so it's very versatile and classy.
Can't go wrong cute, flattering and easy. Fits nice, the 4 was in "ok" shape. Neck lace was stretched out but besides that it was great. Love the color

Gorgeous dress, very comfortable, but definitely snug in the waist so if you're between sizes go up. I like the dress because I felt like it was sexy and respectful at the same time. Good length for shorter women. Might be very short on someone tall.

I loved this dress, I wish I had a picture without the jacket, it was very flattering but very short. I had seen the reviews but since I have a short torso despite being tall, I thought I'd be ok but I definitely had to wear tights to make this more decent!

This dress is AMAZING. I wore it for a rehearsal dinner. It was a little short for my 5' 7" + 3" heels, but as long as you're aware it's a non-issue. The quality of the lace feels less stuffy than most "lace" dresses and the detail of the dress in general is just fantastic.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and elegant! I got a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like a glove. My only complain was the zipper in the back was hard to maneuver. The material was thick and kept getting stuck, but with patience I was able to get it up and down.

I got this at the RTR store in NYC so had the luxury of trying two sizes on first. It runs a little small, but looks gorgeous on. I got tons of compliments, and am very happy with my first RTR rental!
Birthday Shoot
This was the perfect dress for Rodeo with some leggings and cowboy boots! It looked very fresh and Texan.

Wore this for Valentine's Day (also rented this Tory Burch purse!!!) and it was perfect :) also super cute for a sorority formal or any nice event! The lace detailing was beautiful and I felt so fancy!!

This was flirty and cute dress for my girls dinner to celebrate my birthday. I wore the 4. Typically wear a 6 but the 6 was a little large in the neck and bust area. Dress was pretty comfortable. Your arms a little restricted by the sleeves but it didn't bother me much.
The shape is so flattering and structured! The red is more red-orange than a deep red. It was perfect for my Valentine's Day date.
Beautiful dress, but made for petite individuals. The body of the dress fit decently, but really just too short to be appropriate or comfortable. Also, the top sheer, lacy part came a little too low.

links_reviews_title: LOVE this dress. Fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous lace and a pretty shade of red. Fit perfectly and so fun to twirl around in! The back is a little bit open and so cute.

links_reviews_title: This dress is so comfortable and fits so well!
links_reviews_text: Hugs in all the right places. Do not have to wear a bra. Runs a little big. Short in the back but overall a wonderful dress!

Went with a size up from what I typically wear based on the arm design. It ended up working out because it fit perfectly in the bust. Waist was a little big, but overall a fabulous dress. Expect several compliments! ;)

Loved this dress! The lace was gorgeous, fabric was thick to cover tummy troubles, and the shape was very flattering to show off curves but still looked elegant. I loved that the top was conservative (wore to a wedding in a synagogue) but still sassy since it was see through. I recommend sizing up so you can raise your arms more easily and safety pinning the collar in the back so it stands up. Otherwise perfect wish I could keep it!

This dress felt very festive, and I liked the style of the collar. The material was softer than I anticipated, which made it comfortable but also more casual. I probably wouldn't have worn it for a wedding but instead, a fun night out or a more casual event.

links_reviews_title: I wore this on my bachelorette in london and it was STUNNING! So many compliments gorgeous...
links_reviews_text: Perfect.

Pretty color, great for the wedding I went to, GREAT quality (more than others I have rented), would recommend to someone to rent. Only advice would be if you are not comfortable with your midsection, I would not rent this. It does show and outline your figure through your stomach and is NOT lose fitting (if thats what you're looking for). Was not my favorite fitting dress overall.

Wore to special dinner event, and I got so many compliments from both "young and old" people. It has a good mid thigh length and a nice open back to add a punch of style. It was a bit big compared to other dresses but not too much. Overall a great dress to stand out in. The color is a bit more burnt orange than red. Fun dress for sure!

I rented this dress to take photos for my website. I'm happy I was able to try it on in store because my normal size would've been too big. I tend to have to size down with certain brand names. I absolutely loved how it looked on. You just may need someone to help you get in and out because the zipper does get a bit stuck.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for birthday wine tasting!
links_reviews_text: Fit absolutely perfect- very flattering theoughout the body. Dressed it down with a leather jacket and black booties to give some edge. Ruffle sleeves and high collar added some flair.

Great fit. The design of this dress accentuates your waist and gives you a pear body look. Loved the lace but it is not stretchy. The skirt part is flowy and I felt it was kinda short even though I'm super short, so tall ladies beware!
Fits true to size. Neck doesnt hold as stiff as original model/ a little worn, but otherwise im super happy!
Beautiful fit loves the lace on the top and the back

I rented this one specifically for a Lana Del Ray concert. Lana literally had the same dress on in black with a different neck line!! But anyways, I felt pretty in it and it fit very nicely. Raising my arms all the way was difficult but was not an issue the entire evening.

So pretty! This dress runs very true to size and has no stretch at all, so i'd size up for the back up size. It's also fitted at the natural waist. A strapless bra would work best, due to the lace at the top.

This dress is gorgeous--absolutely loved the details, the quality, the color, and the top half (sleeves and neckline to die for) of the dress. The only reason I did not give five stars is the bottom of the dress is not the most flattering. There are a couple different tiers/layers of fabric at bottom, and the effect of such is that it looks a little bunched. Still a stunning red dress, just would have preferred there not be the different tiers of fabric at the bottom.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Party-Unless you want to eat haha
links_reviews_text: So, this dress looks fabulous once zipped up, however it leaves NO ROOM for anything else. I am a size 12 comfortably in all other clothes, but this ran a little small. I got it zipped up, but I ended up wanting to change right out of it after eating a few Christmas apps. So if you are renting this, I'd go a size up!

links_reviews_title: Perfect choice for my 40th birthday celebration!
links_reviews_text: Perfect mix of flirty, but sophisticated, this dress wears like a dream. It runs a size small IMO, as I usually wear a 0, but the 2 fit perfectly. The color is more rust than red, which was a surprise, but I'm an auburn so it worked out great. It was so comfortable to wear, nice heavy weight, and no tugging on it all night. My only complaint (besides having to return it!) is that the zipper is terrible. I was careful not to get the textured fabric caught in it, but despite that, it took both my husband and I wrestling with it to get it up and down. I predict there will be some broken zipper accidents with this style, which is a shame. Definitely attach both hook and eyes first and then just try to be patient to coax that sucker up. :)

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a holiday party!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect & the dress was super comfortable. The only con was that the sleeves made it impossible to lift your arms up all the way! But it really wasn't too much of a bother. I was receiving compliments all night! Would definitely rent again!
I felt this dress was a bit matronly up top. It could be that it was a bit too large. The lace seemed a bit tired, worn too much. I didn't wear this to my event. The color was good.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering fun dress- nice detail
links_reviews_text: This dress fit my petite frame very well. I am 5'2" and 112 lbs and 32C. This dress runs true to size. You could actually be a little bit bustier and still wear it since there was a little extra room in the chest (but was not noticably baggy). There is no give in the fabric.
Sadly wasn't able to wear this. I could zip it up but the back of the dress barely covered my butt. Was way too short to wear
Wore this for game day and loved it
Such a pretty number. Great fit and overall look.
Great design
Chest pattern is a bit too loose

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments on this!
links_reviews_text: It was super comfortable. The lace on the top is a little fragile but nothing to actually worry about.

links_reviews_title: Great color, something different, runs a touch big
links_reviews_text: Material is not super structured so you can see creases and some bunching. Gathered slightly in the hop area but the top fit well with a little padding (strapless bra.) if between sizes, size down. Tons of compliments on the color.

Wearing size 8 at 36 weeks pregnant (just under 180lbs). It was definitely snug but at the time there was not a size 10 available so I had to chance it. No regrets! Dress was cute and comfortable and I loved the color.

links_reviews_title: RTR is sooo easy. They allow an alternate size which takes away the anxiety of renting.
links_reviews_text: The fit accentuates curves in a classy way. I was not able to manage a bra with straps (they showed no matter what trick I tried) but my strapless bra worked fine. I got many compliments. The dress is comfortable, and the color was perfect for my granddaughter's outside summer wedding. I would definitely rent this again.
Fit well at 17 weeks pregnant one size up from my norm (10 vs 8). Quality material. The event lighting made the color look different, so this is at the end of the night with better lighting.

This is a sexy little number... do not wear if you don't want stares! Beautifully cut, easy fit... but the soft, slinky fabric is not forgiving. Even with shapewear I had to be mindful of holding my tummy in... I even tucked the hanger straps into my bra as they showed through the fabric. Will def rent again... my man insists!
Loose around chest. Had to wear white denim jacket so lovely detail on side was wasted. Beautiful color but material so thin and unforgiving. Reviews were so positive, I was really disappointed.

links_reviews_title: This is definitely a bright bubble gum pink!!!
links_reviews_text: Ordered this as an option for a summer wedding. It fits well, the quality is nice. I'm normally an 8 but they only had a 10, which was a tiny bit too big (so it fit true to size). But BE FOREWARNED: maybe my phone screen is off, but I thought the dress was more of a "watermelon" pink. that's even what the listing states. But in real life it is most definitely a bright, Barbie, bubble gum pink. Just keep that in mind!
Cute dress. Very simple. I feel like it would be easy to damage embellishments on the sides so I was a little cautious and didn’t end up finding a specific occasion to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and fit. A little tight but material was nice
links_reviews_text: It was a little tight but I wore spandex and you could still kind of see my belly button. A strapless bra fit great. The little details on the side were cute. It was an outdoor wedding in late June in VA and the material wasn’t hot at all. I felt great in it and got compliments

links_reviews_title: It was beautiful and worked for many different events.
links_reviews_text: The fit is perfect and true to size.

links_reviews_title: The buttons were a fun touch!
links_reviews_text: Collar fit great, room in waist and slit is not exhorbaently high

links_reviews_title: Pretty color but didn't like the cut for a wedding
links_reviews_text: Really pretty color, buttons on the side were kinda cool and it fit true to size. It just ended up looking more of a dress for work event vs a wedding.

Omigosh this dress is awesome. Fit like a glove, beautiful color. Hard to find a bra that works so you have to go braless.. I don't love this as a 36C/D, but manageable for a short time. Buttons down the side were a great touch..
How often do you get a dress that fits like a glove, is comfortable and gorgeous?! This beauty is a home-freaking-run! I wore this to a summer barn wedding and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for a benefit dinner.
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little off for my body type. My usual size 6 fit perfect but way too big in the bust. I had to size down to a 4 which was probably a little too tight but fit perfect in the bust. Although I still felt sexy and comfortable in it despite sizing down. The fabric also wrinkled really easily. But a great dress for the price! I also loved the color which was way different than anything I’d usually wear!
Fit perfectly and I felt like a Barbie doll wearing this dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color..I usually never wear pink. Loved the buttons on the side..it was a bit big.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color..I usually never wear pink. Loved the buttons on the side..it was a bit big.

links_reviews_title: Wore this on Easter. Could have worn to a shower or evening event. VERSATILE.
links_reviews_text: Fits well and is very classy. I felt chic in this dress.

links_reviews_title: A stellar dress for the changing me!
links_reviews_text: I was in between a 16 and 18 (down for the first time from a 22) on this one and happy I opted for the slightly bigger of the two. It was comfortable and cute, which is something I hadn't felt in a long while. I am so glad I went out of my way to find a dress as perfect as this for a friends wedding! The slit was awesome, but I had to rethink my spanx underneath so they didn't show. Bra searching was also a little fun for the girls up top, since this cut wasn't exactly standard bra friendly. All in all, rent this dress!!
This dress was very pretty and true to size. I wore the 6 mostly because I wanted more room for my hips.

links_reviews_title: Classy shape, modern details, gorgeous color!!!
links_reviews_text: Such an amazing color. Fit like a glove, the buttons were a gorgeous subtle detail. Highly recommend

Great dress but does wrinkle easy; for example when driving in the car the dress wrinkled (after I just ironed--it arrived wrinkled but it was clearly pressed just wrinkled in some places) The wrinkling is not as bad as linen but typical wrinkle for a silk. Having said all of that I would definitely rent again this is a beautiful dress.

links_reviews_title: large in hips - beautiful color and fabric
links_reviews_text: Bright warm bubblegum pink color. Beautiful fabric that is smoothing and lightweight. Fit me perfectly except hips. I had almost 2-3 inches too much fabric. (See how you can't see the buttons on me?) I'm an apple shape and carry my weight in stomach - I'm a 20/22 in most things on here. I'm going to try a size down to see if that helps! But hippy girls, it'll be great for you!
The color was a beautiful salmon and it fit well. It didn't have the pop that I thought it would - even for work. It was just okay.
Slim to the body, be careful with lines.
The fit was a little off and it seemed to get twisted on my and so the zipper did not seem to line up in the middle of my back but was otherwise comfortable and beautiful

links_reviews_title: We attended a lovely, evening wedding and this dress was perfect. Not too formal yet elegant.
links_reviews_text: Fit nicely. However, I traveled from Colorado to Ohio for the wedding and it was very difficult to get the wrinkles out of this dress.
Love the button detailing down the sides and the vibrant color.
I sized down and it fit perfect! Beautifully crafted dress.
A little big on the top for a B/C cup
I'm a pretty true size 6 and I was swimming in this! Definitely size down 1-2 sizes. The color is amazing though and I definitely I want to r not this again in the right size.
Super flattering. Loved the color and the cut
I love this dress all the way around. The cut around the shoulders and neck is flattering. The buttons down the side give it interest. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but didn't get a chance to wear it.
links_reviews_text: Love the detailing on this dress. This emphasizes an hour glass figure
I love this dress. It's fully lined but somehow still breathable and cool enough for hot June days. I was expecting the buttons under my arms to be irritating, but they were not.
Great color. Just ran a bit big, so didnt fit as well as i would have liked.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress that was too big
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful but did not fit, I would have needed 1-2 sizes smaller. I'm 6'1" 170 lbs 38-29-41 and a 12 was way too loose in the bust and waist and a bit too big in the hip.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The color is beautiful, bold and bright. The dress itself was very comfortable and the fabric was thick enough to allow for shapewear underneath.

Generally, I wear a 12, but I find with this designer and straight dresses I have to go up a size, especially if you are curvy. I love the dress but I think I may be too short for it because it was gappy in the back around the waist area, perhaps it would have fit much better if I had a longer torso or maybe I should have went with my original size. Anyway it is a nice dress and the color pops.
Size 6 was unavailable so I went with the 8. Overall it was just a bit big on me. I thik the 6 would have fit perfectly. Definitely true to size.

The fit was comfortable and just right, it didn’t fit tight, nor was it lose. I used to be a size zero, and I estimated a size 2 would be good. I ordered a 4 as back up, but the 2 fit. The dress is pretty ageless, elegant, but not too elegant. It’s fantastic for a formal event without being too overdressed with a gown. Classy, beautiful dress. I received many compliments, and lots of stares from everyone ;)

I wore this to my courthouse wedding and I am so so happy that I chose this dress. Fit like a glove . I felt like a beautiful bride in this and received so many compliments. I would HIGHLY recommend this dress for your wedding or wedding related event (bridal shower, engagement dinner, etc.)

Works great for pale girls who can't always pull off white - though I'm sure anyone would feel like a snow queen (Elsa!) in this dress. The folded top was slightly creased when it arrived, but I mostly smoothed it out with a straightener. Would wear it again in a heartbeat.
I wore this for my rehearsal dinner and it was so unique and stunning. I received many compliments and it was very flattering. Would recommend for any formal event to stand out!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my casual wedding in the park.
links_reviews_text: Dress was a bit tight, especially in the arms. I couldn't lift them up much, it was also not super forgiving in the midsection. Other than that I loved the dress, it was a great length and was sexy while still being modest in the chest.

Main problem is you can not raise your arms up in this dress. Totally impractical. I liked the cut and fabric. Did not wear. I thought the fabric might be thick and stiff, but it was stretchy/comfy except for the restricting arms.

This dress was beautiful. I loved the color and the style very much. Unfortunately, the part that goes over your shoulders was a little messed up and didn't look the way it did in the pictures online. There wasn't much of a difference between a size 4 and 6. So I would definitely recommend sizing up. The dress was very tight and very uncomfortable. It's really hard to move in it. Although very beautiful, I'm lucky I only had to wear it a couple of hours or I don't think I could have worn it all at.
I wore to a GNO celebrating my upcoming wedding- it was very classy and I definitely felt like the bride to be!

Dress was great for our surprise wedding. I got a lot of compliments. It really does fit your curves. I have a baby pooch and it showed but I'm completely comfortable with that. If you have a similar body type and aren't comfortable with showing your belly/curves, maybe go a size up or wear really tight spanks. I only wore stockings with a control top, no spanks because I didn't want to spend my wedding day feeling restrained.

links_reviews_title: Right touch of sparkle for a holiday party!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress and loved it for a holiday party- Just the right amount of sparkle/shine. it's form fitting and shows curves for sure, but the material is really stretchy so very comfortable. Rating 4 because the style had me constantly adjusting the straps all night to make sure they stayed flat rather than going up to my neck.

links_reviews_title: Perfect vibe for a civil wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my civil wedding and it was perfect! Just the right combo of classy and sexy. The dress wasn't structured at all, in fact the material is pretty lightweight. This can be either a pro or a con depending on what you like. Be aware that, because of the lightweight fabric, you'll want Spanx or nylons or something similar underneath. The detailing is beautiful up close and the fit is true to size. I didn't have a problem with the sleeves/neckline being scratchy or difficult to fold, but I suppose that if you go with your smaller size then both of these could become an issue (or if you have wide shoulders).
Wore this to my rehearsal for my December wedding. Felt like a princess! Great for curvy gals. So flattering. Didn't need to wear a bra. Absolutely stunning and so festive!
The service, timing, professionalism, ease of app, options available #wedding rehearsal dress perfection!!!
Beautiful silvery white dress. Nice fabric, form fitting.
#awesome

links_reviews_title: Beautiful luxe dress for rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress and got a ton of compliments. Fit is flattering but I'd recommend for someone on the taller side (I'm 5'7" and it hit me mid shin). The fabric is stretchy except for the shoulder already. Really stunning detail up close!

links_reviews_title: Runs large & more beige/silver than expected
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my rehearsal dinner in a 16 & got the backup 18. I typically wear 16s but I'm bustier & have more of a butt than your average girl so I sometimes have to go up a size. The 16 was too large in every way - so much so that I couldn't wear it at all or it would have fallen straight off me. A belt wouldn't have been able to help me either. Also, it's more beige/nude than I expected. Thought it would be more white or silvery but perhaps I just didn't pay enough attention to the real review photos.

For perfect. A little stretch to the fabric. Was worried the sleeves would keep popping up but stayed right in place. Perfect dress for our rehearsal and more formal rehearsal dinner. Only regret was I couldn't keep it!

I rented this as a second option for our engagement photos and I'm so happy I did! This dress was everything I wanted it to be- elegant, form fitting without being showy, and bridal. Our photos turned out incredible and both my fiancé and photographer were obsessed with this dress!

This was my backup dress for my small intimate wedding and I ended it up wearing it to the dinner. The fabric is light and stretches but substantial enough to not look cheap. It is true to size. The only issue was in getting the too to fold evenly, otherwise I highly recommend this dress!

This dress is perfection! Stood out from all the others. Compliments galore! Just be mindful that it hits below knee. If you are 5'5 or taller, it will look especially good on you. Fabric is beautiful, and just sparkly enough.

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated sparkle with enough give to dance
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a charity gala and it was not my first choice. I exchanged my original choice at one of Rent the Runway's store fronts. They were very helpful and, although I may not have picked this dress online, I was so happy I ended up with it. The length and the cut was sophisticated, but the silver threads made it sparkle and really stand out ... I ended up getting pulled on stage to dance with the event's musical performer.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, Chic & Comfortable - Wore for my bridal shower and have NOT stopped getting compliments!
links_reviews_text: Dress hit right at the calfs, I am 5'1 was just the right length and fit overall.

links_reviews_title: The PERFECT wedding dress: Classy and Comfortable
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my wedding, which took place on a boat in Newport Harbor. This dress is gorgeous and super comfortable. The fabric has a slight stretch to it. It did not wrinkle when I sat. The silver threading is gorgeous (which you can really see in the pictures). I have received dozens of inquiries as to where I got the dress. It was the perfect dress for my special day!

This is one of my favorite dresses from RTR - out of the last 15 I've gotten. I recently gained a lot of weight and did not think a form fitting dress could look pretty on me, but these photos are taken WITHOUT Spanx on, and I think I did pretty well!! I highly recommend this dress to all sizes and shapes. It fits your body nicely - slightly tight around the bust (I could not wear a padded, strapless bra with the size 12, so size up if you want to strap on your favorite bra!)
The dress was perfect! High quality, thick material, stunning fabric. It was a touch big around the mid section, but overall, it was stunning.

links_reviews_title: Great for my winter engagement party!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for my November engagement party and it was a hit! The off-white (almost champagne) hue with touches of silver helped keep the look more seasonal compared to a pure white. I am in between a 6 and an 8 but ended up wearing the 8 because my shoulders are on the broad side. The 6 would have been too tight across the shoulders. I am short so the dress ended up hitting me a little closer to the shins (instead of under the knee), but it was very flattering and comfortable. Received compliments all night!

Beautiful quality dress. I did not wear this option only because of my skin tone. My backup dress was an olive green which complimented my fair skin color vs the white and silver. Would love to rent again if the appropriate event pops up again.
Fabric was very comfortable. Not too thick or thin. Has a crepe-like texture and the lightest shimmer. I would definitely recommend this.

links_reviews_title: This dress was everything, took a little bit of a shimmy to get over my hips but it was EVERYTHING
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear and move in I would definitely recommend

Rented this for a formal affair and took a guess on the size. Probably should have ordered one size smaller but this dress was stunning even a little too big! I felt great wearing it and got complements all night long. We forgot photos at the beginning of the evening and this one with my bestie was snapped just moments before the last dance. I loved how it looked even seven hours later (and some of them overheated since it was an outdoor event and was 87 degrees when we started). I'm already thinking about when I might be able to wear this dress again!
I wore this for my backyard wedding. Dress was perfect! Looked great in person and in all the photos!

I rented this dress for my engagement pictures after my original rental didn't fit. This dress was very elegant and photographed well. The dress had a little give to it, which my pear shape always appreciates, however this meant the top was a little more spacious then I would have liked. Overall, I loved this dress and would rent it again.
I rented for my bridal shower. Beautiful dress true to size but uncomfortable. Scratched my arms and couldn't lift my arms. I like it but after a couple of hours I was ready to take it off

links_reviews_title: Rented this for my City Hall nuptials and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I'm between a 12-14 and I rented this in a size 14. I found it to run a little bit big, because I'm also 6 1/2 months pregnant. Unfortunately, they didn't have a size 12 for the date that I need it, so I made the 14 work, but it was a bit baggy when standing. I would definitely size down for your back up!

links_reviews_title: the dress was delivered on time and it fit perfect.
links_reviews_text: there were a few loose strings, but nothing that was noticeable. super comfortable and easy to wear. I usually wear a size 6 in regular clothes, but a size 8 in couture.
This was my first experience of the dress and certainly won't be the last. The fit was perfect and the material was surprisingly stretchy! Great for all occasions. Order the size you usually wear.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful brocade, light fabric for summer.
links_reviews_text: The fit hugged in all the right places. It did run a bit large, so I should have gone down in my second size instead of up. The fabric was much lighter than I expected which was perfect for Charleston heat in summer for my rehearsal dinner. Went beautifully with white/silver stillettos. HIGHLY recommend - so many compliments!

Did not like the material felt very cheaply made like wrapping paper. But once I moved on from the material I loved the fit and my body made the dress look amazing. My biggest complain was customer service I started a chat with a rep because I was not sure of the size. I am 110lbs 5'2 petite 32dd and have a butt. I gave my measurements and the rep said I was a size 16 based on my curvy measurements. I always wear either a 0 or 2 on dresses. Well to the rep that made me feel fat because I have curves! the zero fit perfect but I wore the 2 because I felt it was little loser on my butt. Besides that I got the dress on time.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my bridal shower
links_reviews_text: This dress was unbelievable. I loved it the moment I put it on . It was comfortable and very flattering. My guest at my bridal shower were raving about my dress. Some stated that it could've passed as an actual wedding dress. I got a size 8 and 10. The 8 fit me perfectly

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, but went with another dress
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved This dress, but i wore another dress instead. Will absolutely be re-renting in the future
This dress was beautiful! Very form fitting. It runs true to size, but on the smaller side of things. Lots of compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Not super stretchy so it was slightly awkward in the fit, but still flattering.
links_reviews_text: It's definitely a curve hugging dress, but it was comfortable and I enjoyed the color for a winter wedding.

I wore this for my brother's wedding and absolutely loved it! I wasn't sure how the mid-calf length would look, but the flare is perfect and I found it quite flattering. I was able to wear a strapless bra with it, with no issue. There is one detail that I didn't notice when ordering the dress, which is a very thin cut-out, almost crochet-like, line under the bust and again vertically in the middle of the chest. It's subtle, but you can see skin and bra through it. I was a little apprehensive when first trying it on, but especially if you're in a party or wedding setting, where it's dark and there are lots of people, it's pretty much a non-issue.

links_reviews_title: Worn for a work party in January.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! The fit was perfect and the fabric was stretchy and comfortable. Not itchy at all and the seam above the knees wasn't a problem whatsoever. I have a very small bust and wore without a bra - if you have a larger bust, it might be a bit tight there. My only issue was that the neck was just a little bit tight, but not enough to be a problem after ~4 hours (and several drinks). Overall, awesome dress and I got lots of compliments!

Rented this dress for a winter wedding - felt so flattering and fit like a glove. 5'6" and 120lbs - went with the XS as the small was a little loose around the armpits and sides. Would definitely rent again!
Love this dress! Rented it for a work awards gala and got so many compliments. It's very flattering (even on us short gals!) and super comfy.

links_reviews_title: Classy and all of the compliments
links_reviews_text: Amazing fit, even on a curvy hourglass figure. Slightly big around the arm pits but very comfortable. Stretches a bit,

links_reviews_title: Omg I felt incredible in this stunner
links_reviews_text: This dress is absolutely stunning, I got sooooo many compliments. It is form fitting so a little tight but meant to be. I felt so beautiful
This gorgeous dress fits like a glove! Sexy, classy & comfortable! Received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Love!!! Felt so sexy but didn't even wear spanks
links_reviews_text: Great dress. Wore a strapless bra and it was fine. The cut is sexy but the pattern hides anything that would make it look too tight.

links_reviews_title: Not going to lie, I wanted to keep this one. :)
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like a glove. I absolutely loved this dress and received so many compliments. I'm 5'2" and the length was just fine.
Great dress for a fall wedding! The green made my eyes pop and I received so many compliments
5'5 170lbs large fit great. I could have worn a medium but large was the only size available. It would be hard to wear a bra as the front lines are see through. But overall great fit

links_reviews_title: Great lace dress for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit well and was unique. I wore for a summer wedding but it would have been better for a fall/winter wedding I think. A little difficult to walk up the stairs in but overall would rent again!
The emerald color is subtle but so nice with the texture. Comfortable and ventilated for a warm evening. Highly recommend to my curvy girls!

I got this dress as an extra option. Although I did not end up wearing this dress, I would be very happy to rent again for a formal party of fall wedding. It was very form fitting, but comfortable. It wasn't tight at the bottom so it felt comfortable to sit down in and to dance. The one thing I will note is that if you have a bigger bust, you may want to size up or be careful seeing as the top part is a bit narrow. It fit me very well since I am smaller and wouldn't even need to wear a bra!

I wore this dress to a wedding in the middle of June. I was in between the small and medium, but the small was constricting by the seams at the knees. I opted for the medium so I can dance more freely. Very happy with the dress!

links_reviews_title: This was my backup style, I’m so happy I chose to wear it! So many compliments and so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: True to size, material is very comfortable and breathable. The length is always something I worry about but it was a great mid-calf length for me. The bottom is so flowy... so much fun to dance in! I wish I could buy it to keep in my wardrobe!

links_reviews_title: The dress was snug but allowed for movement. I literally wore it for 16 hours and it felt great!
links_reviews_text: Great fit in the hips and waist. The flair at the bottom was everything! I got so many compliments on this day. If I ordered it again, I would consider ordering a SMALL because of the slight gaping at the the chest area.

links_reviews_title: Having a dress that worked perfectly for me.
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a wedding- easy to move around in, comfortable, and a fun cut! The dark green color was great for fall.

Typically I can't do the fit and flair because I'm an hourglass body type. I sized up due to this and it worked great. I was able to dance the night away. I noted this fit true to size because for most it would. The fabric is not stretchy, so I needed to accommodate for the hips. I did not need to wear a bra (32DD), but due to the size up it was a tad larger than I'd like, but totally not noticeable to others.
This dress was perfect! So comfy and I received a ton of compliments.

I wore this dress for an October wedding. I chose the M over the S because the bottom of dress opening is tight. I have athletic thighs, and I was able to dance, move, sit in the legs easier in the M. The small and med both fit well on the chest area.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a spring time wedding
links_reviews_text: I typically wear black dresses to weddings but I felt like this dress was a perfect way to add some color. It was comfortable to wear all night (8 hours)! I received many compliments! I would definitely recommend this dress to anyone.

This dress is gorgeous! I am 5'7", 120 lbs, with a 34A bust. The size small fit perfectly! I could have fit into the extra small but it was snug. I'm not sure this would work for a woman with a larger bust, as it fit my 34A well.

Overall a great dress for the Ball! As others have said, the bust was a little large on my 34C chest. Zipper is a little tough by yourself, but do-able. I felt it was a little tight around my lower thighs at the point where the ruffle starts, but it didn't keep me from dancing all night! It fell at a good point on my calf too.

Wore this to a St Patty's Day wedding. Loved the dress! The fabric was so thick and luxurious and incredibly flattering. Like some have mentioned, the bottom hem of the skirt can be slightly restricting, but unless you plan on doing some serious squats during your event, it is not an issue. The SR fit my smaller chest and wider hips like a glove. I would rent again!

it's a perfect fit dress for me. Not too tight but shows all the right curves and its long enough for when i sit down its not above my knees. Im 5'8 and 180 llbs. Im a bra size 36D so it was big in the armpit area so i had my mom take it in on the sides to my likeing. I made it tight enough so that i didnt have to wear a bra. I wore spanx underneath but I didnt really need to i did it because it was hot and i was scared my back would sweat and make a spot on the dress. 10/10 dress i got many compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: Came to the house and all I had to do was drop off at UPS.
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress for a wedding. True to size. Loved it

links_reviews_title: Could not believe how flattering it was!
links_reviews_text: Really lovely shoulder cut. Works with strapless bra.
Great fit! Not a lot of give in the fabric but it worked out great and fit like a glove. Received many compliments.
Comfortable and pretty dress! A little tough to dance in as the bottom is tight, but very flattering!

Rented this for my engagement party and it was beautiful!! It is so comfortable and the tea length is so flattering. I'm 5'5 with long legs and short torso, wide hips and this fit in all the right places!!

links_reviews_title: So gorgeous I wish I could keep it!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a cocktail attire wedding! Was dressy and stood out from the typical LBD. Fit was great! Zipper was difficult like other comments mentioned. If I could would buy this dress and would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated color and material for winter wedding.
links_reviews_text: It was a comfortable dress to dance in and the material felt great. Ran a bit long, and little large in the bust, but was to be expected. True to reviews. Would normally get a Medium but it wasn't available.

Loved the fit of this, the top is a little loose probably from constant wears. But! Loved it otherwise. I'm an athletic build with wide hips and thighs, so the medium fit like a glove! I didn't wear a bra either I'm around a B/C for reference

links_reviews_title: A great item that can be dressed up or dressed down for several types of occasions.
links_reviews_text: This dress hugs all the right places, and is forgiving of body imperfections! Wore size SR. The XS backup also fit, but I was more comfortable with SR. I'm 5'3" and the height was great with 3&1/2 inch heels.

Let's be real. My goal when renting a look is to get non stop compliments all day. And this dress accomplished that! I usually wear a 16 in dresses and 40 DD bra. The XLR dress fit perfectly. You may need extra help zipping up. It's hard to get the zipper over the change in fabric. I was able to wear a strapless bra and body shaped with no problem. Felt like a star. No other special items to note.

This dress perfect for a wedding in November. I have an hourglass figure so it was definitely more snug at the hips and butt area, which made it a little difficult to sit down. I still loved it! The fabric was thick and so beautiful!! I got a lot of compliments on the dress!

Beautiful dress with really special sleeve detailing. I think the specialness of this dress was in the beautiful box pleats in the back, which have the dress gorgeous proportions. Plus, it had pockets, which was clutch. Having said that, the dress was a little more conservative than what I'd want in a gown. But if you're renting it for the right occasion, it's perfect.

links_reviews_title: Overall great dress, and it has pockets
links_reviews_text: Overall the dress was beautiful. The only problem was in my professional picture the dress looked wrinkled. It was due to the type of material. The flash from the pic against the material made the wrinkle look.
It was a bit long even for me at 5'6 so I had to wear heels. It has a petticoat style underneath that added hips to my normally straight figure. Loved that I didn't have to wear a bra, too!

links_reviews_title: The way my Boyfriend looked at me, made me feel like the only woman in the room all night long.
links_reviews_text: It got a lot of compliments and it fit very well. The zipper had trouble where the bodice met the skirt so you do need a friend to help you in and out of the dress. Otherwise it was very form fitting and glamorous. A unique pick and very princess-like. Also POCKETS!!!

links_reviews_title: So elegant and so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Pockets, room to eat AND breathe, and absolutely elegant. I wore this to a very formal affair and felt like I fit in perfectly.
Love everything about this dress! The lace sleeves, the low cut, the fabric, the color and of course the pockets!

I rented a 6R and 8R and normally wear a 6 dress but ended up barely fitting in the 8R. It is really tight in the chest area, recommend if you are at least a 36C/D to rent 1-2 sizes up. I didn't even need a bra since I needed a little extra room to zip up the back. Other than that, loved the quality of it and had a lot of compliments.
This gown was beautiful, and I got compliments all day. It was perfect for the concert I sang in- elegant, classy, and a rich color. The long length was long enough for 2.5 inch heels and I am 5'9".

links_reviews_title: Beautiful material and fit like a glove. I received so many compliments as soon I took my coat off.
links_reviews_text: If you are busty, and you prefer your girls to be tucked away, this may not be your dress. Other than that, it was the perfect dress for me.

links_reviews_title: Great Mother of the Bride dress!
links_reviews_text: Submitting this on behalf of my mom who rented this for my wedding. The dress was super comfortable, but the zipper in the back was a little tricky to maneuver. My mom is on the petite side, she did have to use some hem tape to keep the dress from dragging. Over the course of the wedding, the tape came undone but she wasn't tripping over the skirt.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my son's wedding. It was absolutely stunning!! I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I went up a size because I read it ran small. I normally wear a 16. It was the perfect length with heels. It gives coverage to the arms.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a formal affair!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so perfect for the wedding that I attended. I received so many compliments at the event and even afterwards. I did have to go a size up because of a zipper issue - and even with the larger size, I still had trouble with the zipper. I do have a large chest and was a little worried that this was the issue, but realized that this was not the case once zipped. This dress fit perfectly, but for some reason was impossible to zip. Thanks to my mom with a little hint regarding dish soap, I was able to get it on without a problem. I would definitely recommend this dress to anyone attending a formal event - plus, it has POCKETS (huge plus)!!

links_reviews_title: I paired this dress with white satin elbow gloves for an extra level of elegance. I felt amazing!
links_reviews_text: Well made, light, easy to wear. The bodice fit a little loose at the top but it didn't detract from the overall elegance of this lovely gown. This was my first RTR experience and I was very pleased!

links_reviews_title: Loved the overall fit and pockets! I got so many compliments
links_reviews_text: Tighter in the chest, a little lower cut but really comfortable!
Loved this dress it was slightly big in the top but I have a small bust.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress, and so did everyone at the event I received complements all night long!
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit of the dress, it was perfect for my body type and I felt super confident in it. I will say it was a little tight around my bust, so I probably could have gone up a size but it wasn’t uncomfortable fit wise- it just showed off more than I would have like for as school event. Still, the dress was amazing and I had many people asking where to find it, as well as telling me it was a perfect fit for me.

I rented the 22L for a fundraiser (the 22R wasn't available) and it was definitely long but I did fine with some heels. The dress fit really well and I felt amazing in it. People kept complementing me on it all night. The pockets really helped too.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress,felt so pretty...just couldn't bend down.
links_reviews_text: It's tight just round the tummy part. But with my husband help I was able to get the zipper up and I was fine for the rest of the night but it was snug. However I felt like a princess all night..literally the belle of the ball!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for plus size beauties!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear an 18/20. I read that this dress runs a little small and that you should typically go up two sizes for designers items so I ordered the 22! Let me just tell you it was perfection! I did wear a strapless bra and had no issues! Would 100% rent this again! Beautiful piece!
I felt glamorous and confident in this dress. I received many compliments all night and felt like a princess. So happy I rented it!!!

Loved the details and it was so comfortable! It was just slightly big, I probably could have worn a size 8 had I ordered it. I wore a navy blue cami because the neckline was a bit too low for me. Definitely recommend this gorgeous dress!!

Beautifully made dress, I got a lot of compliments. Love the lace sleeves to hide my upper arms. The waistband is tight but the full skirt hides any tummy issues. I wore a light spanx but it's not necessary. Did I mention pockets! Always a hit. The zipper sticks a little so I had to have someone zip the back. Would definitely recommend this dress. Navy is a great substitute for black. I wore 3" heels and the length was perfect. I could have worn flats too.
