I am pear shaped, 5,5", & 138 lbs. I rented a 4 & 6. The 4 fit, but I had a 2 sent over night. I wore the 2. I felt lovely and like a princess. I love this dress & especially that it has pockets! The material does wrinkle, so I would recommend a steamer.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun dress to wear.. There is just something about wearing a ballgown
links_reviews_text: I'm a DD/DDD and it was tight up top but it also allowed me to go without a bra (rare occurrence.) The size long almost touched the floor in a lower high heel, I'm 5'10".
This dress was completely beautiful and very classy. I added a Rhinestone belt to jazz it up. I absolutely loved the pockets.

links_reviews_title: This. Dress. Was. BOMB. I wore it for a ball and EVERYONE complimented me!
links_reviews_text: Being designer and a formal dress, it ran small and not street size (NO idea why they all do this) so I wore the larger size. But it was tight enough that even with my large and not-perky breasts, I didn't need a bra with it! It nipped in at my waist, flared out over my stomach, and had pockets for my phone and lip gloss. The color was deep and felt expensive, the lace detailing on the sleeve was to-die for, and the cleavage was just enough to be sexy without being inappropriate. I wanted to cry when I had to return it! I SO would rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Loved the sleeves! They were nice and wide so you could actually move your arms around.
links_reviews_text: As other have said the top runs a little loose. I opted to wear the larger size even though the smaller one fit better over all because the waist band has no stretch to it and I carry a lot of weight around my middle. That meant the too was loose but some double sided dress taped helped keep it down and not gap.

This dress was beautiful and comfortable. I love that it made my... everything... look better! Great lines and you can't go wrong with navy. The lace sleeves were just enough and added that elegant touch too. The top is tight so if you're big busted (I'm a 38DD) then go with the next size up... that worked great for me.

Dress was perfect, good fit, comfortable, and of course pockets. Length was good with heels. Only problem was my bra kept showing in the front of the dress, this could have been my fault in choice of bra. Got a lot of compliments and was warm enough in a winter wedding for short periods of time outside. Just stunning.

This dress was perfect for a formal holiday gala. I got too many compliments to count! The length of the 6R definitely requires heels. My shoes were almost too short, so if in doubt, go taller with your shoes. I usually wear a 4/6 and the 6R fit perfectly. Like others have said, it's tight in the chest and you'll need a strapless bra since the sleeves are lace over the shoulders. The sleeves weren't too tight, which was a nice change from most dresses off the rack. Overall it was very comfortable when standing, and a little tight in the chest/waist when sitting, but I wouldn't have gone up a size due to the length. My favorite part was the pockets. Oh, the pockets! Large enough for my iPhone 8 Plus, and designed in such a way that you could actually use the pockets without adding bulk or odd shapes to your silhouette. Perfect! The outer fabric was nice and thick, and the inner layer kept the crinoline off my legs, and stayed put nicely. My only complaint is that the dress arrived wrinkled and I had a difficult time getting it straightened out. I might recommend doing an 8 day rental to give yourself extra time to hang it up or take it to the cleaners to have it pressed. Since mine arrived the night before the party, I didn't have many options. One last warning, the skirt is deceptively full, making getting in and out of a car an interesting experience. Plan accordingly!
Stunning dress with pockets! The sleeves were gorgeous. Very comfortable! So many compliments!!!! Felt like a princess all night.

Made me feel like a million bucks and i received sooo many compliments! I usually wear an 18 and this dress fit great for the size 20. Would definitely rent again if I had a formal event or wedding to attend
This is a gorgeous dress but the chest was a little too tight for my chest size, hoping to get a size up that will work
This dress was great for a formal affair- it has a classic elegant look that will make you the belle of any ball.
Loved this dress and got MANY compliments. Runs true to size. Only reason I didn't rate 5 star was due to zipper which had flaw and almost couldn't wear it. Little soap and ingenuity made it work.
Wore to a black tie wedding and received tons of compliments! it was so comfortable!!! pockets are definitely a plus!

The skirt had some poof, just enough to make me feel like a princess at the ball but not swimming in the dress. The sleeves were so decorative I didn't feel the need for a necklace! The bust was a bit tight but that gave me enough support that I didn't have to worry about finding the right bra ;) skirt was long enough for 2in heels

I received so many compliments on this dress! I loved it and it was definitely appropriate for a black tie wedding. I thought the bust cut was a little low but other than that it was very beautiful and comfortable

Absolutely one of my favorite rentals! I am a 32DDD, So it definitely was a tight fit up top. I felt like the 8R was too loose. The pockets were the best part. While I did bring a clutch, it was nice to have my phone & lip balm on me. Highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: I felt like a Disney princess!
links_reviews_text: This dress is officially one of my favorite rentals! I wore it to a black tie gala where everyone looked stunning, yet I still received multiple compliments and caught the gaze of many guests, almost to the point of discomfort (lol). In terms of sizing, the size 8 fit me perfectly (I typically wear a size 6 in casual dresses and size 8/10 in formal gowns). The material definitely has no give, but was fortunately thick enough where I didn't need to wear a bra. Lengthwise, the dress came slightly off the floor with 3" heels. Best of all, this dress has pockets! For right event, I would definitely recommend this dress!
This dress was comfortable, fit perfectly, and different! I wore it for a Labor Day wedding and got tons of compliments. I would buy this one for sure - great dress!
Very comfortable, wrinkles a bit easily but was great overall. Wore for a Miami Vice party

renting this for a memorial day weekend wedding, i got compliments all night! 5'5" 145 lbs at the time - wore with spanx underneath & i was comfy all night on the dance floor! definitely would recommend it
The color is beautiful and the fit is great for an hourglass. I felt sexy but classy. I'm usually a 4, but the 6 fit great. Can't wait to wear it again!
Tight fit but material was stretch and made being in the dance floor a breeze. Color is super bright so keep in mind if you don't want to stand out.

links_reviews_title: Very pleased given this was my backup backup dress.
links_reviews_text: Great dress and even better color. Rented a completely different dress that became unavailable at the last minute so searched the remaining dresses available and RTR overnighted this to me free of charge. Super comfortable and flattering. Didn't need spanx.

links_reviews_title: Color and design of dress made it a stand-out! Perfect for Labor Day wedding.
links_reviews_text: I chose a photo that illustrated that the straps can be worn up or down. I'm an older woman and the photo of the model made it look very revealing. But it doesn't have to be! It is so fitted at waist that I wore the larger of the sizes. I am small on top but bigger on the bottom and the tight waist emphasized that, so up a size I went, and it was perfect. Wore with nude sandals, but gold shoes and bag would be nice, too. GET IT!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to an outdoor August wedding and got SO many compliments, from men and women alike.
links_reviews_text: The material is sturdy but very stretchy. I wore a size 4 which fit me just fine, but I almost wish I'd been able to try the 2 as the excess stretch/give caused the dress to gather a bit every now and then around my waste and narrower hips. But then again a smaller size may have been less forgiving on the old love handles and panty line. Because of the light color you do have to be a bit careful with underwear color and texture. In spite of the sturdy material and length of the dress, it was fairly breathable and with the open shoulders I stayed pretty cool out in the sun on an 80-something degree day. Not sure whether it was my new strapless bra or the dress itself, but I only found myself pulling it up twice over the course of a 6-7 hour event, which for me and strapless dresses is a major record. I think because the dress is so form-fitting the whole gravity factor is minimized and it tends to stay put. What's more, the little "sleeves" pop up onto your shoulders easily and still look pretty dang cute, making dancing a non-issue. I felt simultaneously classy and sexy and comfortable in this dress the whole night...would definitely rent it again.
Lovedddd this dress. Made me look and feel sexy. Dress is made out of thick quality material. I wore this on a hot July day but I didn't really sweat.

links_reviews_title: Fun color for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. It's a bit thin so the material which show all your problem areas, but the right undergarments should fix that.

links_reviews_title: Great pop of color for Summer Wedding!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size, a bit bigger in the chest area and I'm a 34c. I found myself pulling up a few times through the night to adjust. But I feel like that happens with any dress that doesn't have normal straps. Length was perfect, right below my knee and I am 5'5". Based on other reviews saying it ran bigger the 4 fit perfect and definitely had extra stretch and material. Material was super comfy and would rent again, or buy! So many compliments on this dress all night.

links_reviews_title: Stunning! Didn't want to take it off.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! I received so many compliments and felt sexy and beautiful. You will need a wireless bra but spanx isn't required. The color is eye catching so be prepared to be seen.

This dress was so beautiful and super flattering. I would recommend fashion tape if you have more narrow shoulders to keep the sleeves up. This dress was comfortable and I felt great in it! I would definitely recommend this dress for outdoor weddings, it is really vibrant in the sun.
I wore to a beach wedding in Mexico. So many compliments and because I had recently got tan from the beach made the color of the dress POP!!

Loved this little number for a recent summer wedding! I'm between a 4 and 6 normally (4 on the top, 6 on the bottom) went with a 6 and it was a little big overall but manageable! I wore it with spanx to smooth everything out! Very comfortable. Got compliments all night :)

Fun, sassy dress that is classy at the same time. Received many compliments. The color is so different and it definitely stands out in a crowd. Material is very stretchy and comfortable. Ran a tad bit big in abdomen area. Not the best dress for dancing the night away...found myself adjusting the sleeves often, but still would absolutely rent this again.
This dress fit like a glove.

I tend to wear a size 6 but the 6 was a little big on top. So I went with the back up size 4. Still would fall a little so depending on the type of strapless bra you wear you might have to pick it up. Also wore spanx so the dress would lay nice and smooth. The color was out of my comfort zone but glad I did it. Was perfect for spring/summer wedding.

LOVED, LOVED this dress!!! It was perfect for a Key West wedding. I am curvy and it hugged me perfectly. I received so many compliments throughout the night on this dress. The material was very comfortable and not too heavy.

This dress was thick and gorgeous. I didn't love how long it was but I suppose it would be too much if it were tight and short. I have thick calves and ankles so o usually don't wear lengths below the knee but this adorned perfect with a nude pump. The color was beautiful, very bright almost neon. I received so many compliments. I did feel like I had to keep pulling the dress down to stay out because it would wiggle up. Bit otherwise loved the dress and would rent it again!
The dress....stunning. The fit....perfect. The compliments....endless. This is the ideal dress for any summer event.
Amazing dress and super comfortable! The only negative is that the bottom has a tendency to look wrinkled.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for the Kentucky Derby themed party I attended!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great and the off the shoulder style still felt secure. I've seen photos where people pulled the sleeves up but I thought it took away from the shape of the dress. The color is more of a citron than canary yellow but thankfully it still was a good match for my bright fuschia Kentucky Derby hat. My only complaint was the dress had several ink pen stains but RTR's amazing customer service took care of it on the back end. I would rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, comfortable and flattering dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a school fundraiser, and received many compliments on it. The color was amazing, and it was extremely comfortable. It fit true to size. I plan on renting it again for a summer wedding.

I loved this dress so much! Did not want to give it back! I loved the fit and it was extremely flattering. I'm usually a size 2 or 4... but I actually wore a 0 and it fit pretty well, so I would say get a size down. It's longer so if you're short like me, definitely wear heels to get the right midi kind of look. I wore it to the Keeneland horse races and it was perfect! This dress is seriously beautiful and not many people wear yellow, so it will totally stand out. Rent this dress!!!!

links_reviews_title: Great service and dress is always in great shape!
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect for a Hawaiian awards banquet. I wore the 4 and typically wear a 6. Loved it and it was very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: You can't NOT stand out in this color!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! The color is lovely & the ruffle is an adorable detail. The length is classy too. It is tight throughout, so I wore Spanx. Strapless bra works best.

links_reviews_title: Was nervous to wear this color but it ended up being a show stopper. Can you say big bird on fleek?
links_reviews_text: Very comfy and flattering.

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful and had a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: It fits true to size. Although I am usually between a 6 and 8 I wore the 6 with the sleeves up to keep from worrying about the top being too low or loose. I have a larger chest so more chance to show too much. I felt beautiful and had a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress ! I wore this dress to a wedding and absolutely love the fabric and design.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 2 but went with a 0 and it fit great. I would recommend going one size down .

links_reviews_title: I loved the bold yellow! I received so many compliments and felt fantastic wearing this dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly!

This dress was a dream. For those of you that love a little stretch with durable material, add it to the cart ASAP. This dressed hugged me in all the right places. I worried about the off the shoulder, just thought that they wouldn't stay down, but they stayed in place all night. Off the shoulder with this bright color is such a perfect combo. Will plan on re-renting this one.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for beautiful wedding in Key West, Fl!
links_reviews_text: The color of this dress is stunning; a strong yellow with the slightest undertone of lime in it. I am 5’6 and weigh 155lbs and typically fit in size 6, but went with size 8 in this dress to be comfortable to dance, eat and drink the night away. I definitely recommend wearing proper fitting undergarments as the dress is very form fitting. I received so many compliments throughout the evening and would definitely rent this dress again! Such a fun dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress, very comfy! I was 20 weeks pregnant when wearing it so it fit perfectly.
links_reviews_text: Great fit!
This fits hour glass figures like a glove. Such a beautiful dress!

I wore this dress to a formal wedding in Cabo and it was perfect!!! I received many compliments. The fit was snug but the fabric had some stretch. The color was vibrant and beautiful. I loved wearing this dress!

Extremely flattering fit for an hourglass shape this bright yellow number is an absolute show stopper! I wore it to a Brazilian Carnaval themed event and received many compliments! Perfect for the occasion and enough flexibility to dance in. Only concern is the length is a bit long for my 5' 4" height
This was a perfect fit. It was a little restrictive to walk in but overall it was very comfortable and classy.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved this one. The dress has a good amount of stretch and was very comfortable to wear. I am 5'10" and the length hit just below my knee. I did need to wear spanks underneath to smooth everything out due to the lighter color and the tighter fit. But all in all it's a beautiful dress and I felt amazing in it.

links_reviews_title: If you're on the fence with this one, just do it. You'll love it.
links_reviews_text: This dress was about as amazing as it could be without it being brand new. I chose it because every woman I saw in the reviews wore it well, it literally looked great on everyone so why not me?! The shoulders were a tad restricting, but I am very broad shouldered so it was probably just me. I also don't believe this dress was meant to do a lot of moving in. The bottom left seam couldn't seem to find a comfortable spot to sit so it kept bunching up, but it could also be because of the cut. I am normally a 4, but chose a 2 because I have been losing a little weight. It seemed as if the last person to wear it should have gotten a 4, as it was stretched out around the waist and behind area, but still very manageable! Wonderful dress! If you're thinking of renting it, just do it. You won't regret it.
It fit perfectly. Definitely a lot of room for cleavage but I added a cami underneath just to be more conservative. The color is beautiful, the fit is so flattering, I didn't want to return it.
A little too lose in the chest, should have sized down
I felt vibrant and lovely in this dress! The tie was sort of weird in front, but I made it work. It's short. It is light and comfortable. Not a bad dress overall, but also nothing special.

The color is BEAUTIFUL and I have gotten multiple compliments on it. The only thing is that the top is a little loose fitting so you may want to wear an undershirt if you are wearing this for work. If you are wearing it for play, then hey have fun!
Didn't end up wearing. Choose another dress I rented instead. Comfortable dress. Fun but still sexy with the deep v in front. Can't wear a normal bra. Fashion tape and pasties works perfectly though.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color but way too loose on top
links_reviews_text: The top was so loose that even pinned, it would've just popped open. I ended up not wearing it. Pretty color and nice fabric otherwise.

light, breezy silk with a gorgeous drape and flow. seasonless when paired with anything from tall boots to sandals. snug top gives high-waisted fit good for pairing with cropped sweaters or front-tucked blouses.
Beautiful, unique skirt that can be dressed up or down. Long enough to not get rise up in the wind but cool and lightweight for warm weather.
Gorgeous flow, sassy wrap, dynamic colors - love it!
I wore this twice. Once with a black black top. Very cute!

Wore this with a turtleneck sweater and knee high boots when it was cold in Massachusetts for work, and brought to Texas and styled with a tank too and sneakers in 80 degree weather. A truly versatile skirt!
I really loved this skirt! The fabric is super high quality. Very soft and light. Fit perfect and flowed so nice. I really wanted to buy this one, it is that good!
This skirt was so cute and versatile! This skirt was not only great paired with a t-shirt and sandal but also with an oversized turtleneck and sock booties. Such a great piece!

This was such a great skirt. I made it edgy by pairing it with military boots and a leather jacket but this can definitely be worn more polished. I loved the mixed prints and the fit was very true to size.

Love the print which is both modern and timeless at once. Lots of colors to pair with tops in my wardrobe. It's nice and cool in the summer. In winter I can add another slip layer and some tights and boots and it will work just as well. Works well with casual or party shoes. I bought this.

links_reviews_title: Wow could not even figure out how to fasten this.. everything seemed off and lopsided on this.
links_reviews_text: Odd length, odd buttons at waist
Very cute and comfy skirt. I wore it to work and got a lot of compliments.

I'm usually between a size 2 and 4 and the size 2 was big enough for me in the waist. The flow and print was very pretty. The top of the skirt is kind of weird. Don't think I would rent again. The dress version is way better.

This runs a bit large. This skirt is gorgeous, I would have bought it if it was less expensive. I live it a hot climate and it was perfect for happy hour after work or taking a walking 1x1 with my boss.
Fun

After zipping up the skirt there's a layer of fabric that wraps around & you button on top. Call me crazy but I couldn't figure out what to do with the straps and getting it to lay correctly. It's a beautiful skirt and love the pattern but I just couldn't wear it without looking like a mess.
Loved this skirt. The fit was great and the design was unique and beautiful. My regular size fit perfectly. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Loved the mixed prints and flow
links_reviews_text: Runs a little small, so I was glad to have rented the larger size. I loved the mixed prints, and receiced many compliments throughout the day. I paired with a black top and pumps for the office. The skirt flows beautifully.
Great for work or out!

I rented this piece for a conference at work. Pros: loved the drape and flow; the asymmetry works really well with the faux wrap effect and fabric (no stretch) Cons: no cons I styled this with a black silk blouse, belted black draped kimono and white booties. It sounds weird but was absolutely stunning and I am mad I didn't get a pic!

links_reviews_title: Same as pictured but runs small in the waist and hips
links_reviews_text: Very pretty, but much smaller than expected in the waist and above the butt. Also - not a skirt for winter... Very lightweight silk fabric. You'll likely need Static Guard after removing from plastic garment bag too.
Usually am a 0-2 in skirts and probably should have taken the 0 in this. Liked the skirt and the print but not in love with the uneven hem. Nice to try but wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this many times - had a hard time sending it back!
links_reviews_text: Pretty, unusual, classy. Great for work or going out.
Flattering fit. Midi length but not overwhelming like that length can be sometimes (I'm 5'5").
Really pretty fabric and flows nicely when you walk.

links_reviews_title: The best, love the swing and style of this skirt.
links_reviews_text: This fun, flirty skirt was perfect for so many things: dates, work, Thanksgiving dinner. I usually styled with a black turtleneck and booties, but it looked cute with sneakers and a sweatshirt as well. It runs true to size, and was not too long for my frame. The fabric is gorgeous and the print mix is so fun.

Great skirt for having a unique design that is loved by many kinds of people. I kept getting compliments from people who had all different kinds of styles and personalities. I love the length it was not to long or short. It was a great fabric weight for both summer and winter. Styling is easy with this skirt. Only con is the fit design. It has a weird zipper and ribbon that wraps around the skirt that make it hard to wear.

I absolutely loved this skirt. Not only did I receive many compliments, it was also very comfortable. I wore it with a black top and cardigan and it was really cute. Loved the asymmetrical hem and the length

links_reviews_title: Being able to try on high end clothing that I would normally not splurge purchase!
links_reviews_text: This silk skirt was so comfortable and flattering. It has three side buttons to attach the wrap portion of the skirt to the main piece. I got lots of compliments!
This fit fine. It's cute and the silky material felt nice.
This is truly beautiful, the silk is gorgeous.

I am so tempted to purchase this skirt...I got SO many compliments! The print mixing and the asymmetrical shape is perfect. It fit great and was comfortable. I wore it twice - once with a tight black long sleeved shirt and red western boots, and second time with white keys and a white cropped sweater. Love!!!!!

links_reviews_title: I couldn't wear it to work. It was too weird.
links_reviews_text: I might not be cool enough for this skirt. It looked to me like something that came out of a Goodwill box from 1973. It definitely didn't make me feel pretty when I tried it on, so I sent it back.

This is pretty, and light and for me, the perfect length. All sides of this asymmetrical skirt did not go above my knees, which I prefer. The combination of fabrics kept me covered up but cool. The colors are great. Tempted to keep.

links_reviews_title: I am returning because I wasn't happy with the fit.
links_reviews_text: Lovely pattern, nice design.
Fit well, and the lace was beautiful! Very comfortable dress!
I wish this dress was mine! It fit perfectly. Illusion details were very pretty, no special bra needed. Illusion panel in the front was very slimming. Tons of compliments!

This is a fun twist on the LBD! The "cut outs" are lined with a light fabric that perfect matched my pale skin. So while that looks like skin peeks, it's definitely not and easily hid a tattoo! Not sure how the lining would look on darker skin, but be aware that it is lined and not simply lace on skin for the cut outs.

Instagram: @lauren_matthias My husband loved it more than me! My complaint was since I have a longer torso, the waist was a bit high. It was between an empire waist and regular set waist. Might not be an issue for someone else. The lace detail was so pretty but you could still wear a regular bra and that made it easy for this mom.
Perfect for a party
Perfect way to spice up the little black dress! The lined panels were placed to be very flattering and sexy but not too revealing. Wore it to a work Christmas party and it was perfect.
Rented with my unlimited for a cocktail party. Pretty and fit well. Ended up wearing something else although I might rent again for another affair.

I wore this to the rehearsal dinner for a black tie wedding. It was perfect! Absolutely beautiful dress, I got so many compliments! The lace back is nice because it's lined so your back isn't actually showing. The cut is very flattering. It hit me right above the knee. Would absolutely recommend this dress!
Fit well, not tight, I wore it to work with a cardigan over it then straight to a cocktail party at night and it was just right.

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing this backup dress.
links_reviews_text: A little casual for a wedding, and material was quite thin (not as flattering as I would have hoped).

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress - runs small in bust
links_reviews_text: I really wanted this dress to work because it's so pretty, but it was too tight in the bust/rib cage.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a night out
links_reviews_text: Picked 2 dresses for unlimited and wasn't sure which dress would look better with my shoes ( I was going to a wedding the following day). Wore this dress for a fancier date night and it was fun and flowy.

links_reviews_title: Simple and easy to dance in
links_reviews_text: This dress was very simple and pretty, but the quality wasn't as good as I had expected from the listing photos. The fabric was very thin and clingy, and wrinkled easily. It may have benefitted from a slip, which I didn't wear. I usually wear a 10 and the 12 fit perfectly. But I enjoyed wearing this dress. It was very comfortable and easy to move in.

Another amazing dress by this designer! I rented to wear to a bridal shower that became a virtual shower. I wore a beige bra and you could not really see it. Back is so beautiful-you will need help zipping/latching up. I usually wear a 14 for Marchesa but followed others guidance and went with a 16 - fit was perfect!
Fit like a glove and perfect petite length. Only issue was sheer back so had to wear specific bra for this dress. Lots of compliments. Vibrant colors and embroidered bodice made this a standout.

links_reviews_title: Love it! Perfect for a spring celebration.
links_reviews_text: True to size, perfect length, really comfortable! Only thing is that if you are not confident with your back it's not the dress for you cuz it shows a lot! I have a bit of fat in my back and it kinda made me feel uncomfortable but that is just me! Overall super cute and comfy dress

links_reviews_title: Marchesa Notte never disappoints!! Beautiful colors and floral detail is gorgeous!

links_reviews_text: I enjoyed wearing this dress, definitely unique and stands out. The open back detail is wonderful, and makes it feel a bit more sexy, though overall I'd say this dress was conservative enough for a country club wedding. Definitely fits true to size, and the shape allows plenty of room for larger hips.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful detail, perfect for the occasion
links_reviews_text: The embroidery was a little scratchy in the armpit area (I blame my bigger athletic shoulders) but other than that the fit was spot on. The detail on this dress is stunning. The cut was so flattering, too. Perfect for a fall wedding and reception. I'll definitely rent Marchesa Notte again!
Very cute, well fitting and well made dress. Ended up going for a different style. This would be a good option for a daytime wedding.
Fit amazing! Snug around the chest. Normally 8, wore a 10 so it wasn't too tight and I could dance at the wedding.
Great dress for NYFW front row :) So beautiful.

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect dress for an evening wedding at a vineyard.
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this dress. I had gotten this is size 2 and 4. I could have pulled off either but opted for size 2 because even tho it was a bit more snug around my midsection, I have a smaller chest so it seemed to fit better in that regard. I was very comfortable in this dress. I am 5' 3" and 120lbs.
I rented this to potentially wear to an engagement party. The pictures of the dress were super cute but it was boxy and not that flattering on me. I returned it without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Colorful floral lace = my happy place
links_reviews_text: I love this dress. It’s beautiful and fit like a glove. I received several compliments.

Marchesa Notte never lets me down. I've gained a lot of weight (50lbs) in the last couple years and barely anything makes me feel like I used to but this dress came close. It was also super comfortable. No need for a bra or spandex which is such a rarity. The dress was super flattering. It's so gorgeous in person. I received several compliments on it. So happy with this rental!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress! So comfortable yet elegant and unique.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me almost perfectly. I wore it for an outdoor dressy event on a very warm summer evening and I remained cool and comfortable all night.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for hot summer wedding & no bra needed!!
links_reviews_text: Fit was gorgeous, felt like a rockstar in it. The open back gave it the needed air conditioning for a hot summer outdoor wedding. Surprised I felt comfortable without a bra (being 34D) but that also helped me stay cool!

This dress was perfect for a hot summer wedding. It wasn't as heavy/thick as other Marchesa dresses and the open back kept me cool. You can't wear a bra with it but I didn't need one. The dress is beautiful in person, I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: This dress is perfect in every way
links_reviews_text: Get. This. Dress. It is perfect and beautiful and I felt so pretty in it!!! I never wanted to take it off. The fit is perfect. True to size, has a sexy cutout in the back and at 5'4 1/2" it came right above my knee. The mesh part is very high quality but also delicate and feminine. The embroidery is beautiful. The colors are lovely. You will feel like a million bucks in this dress. Perfect for a garden party, but anywhere you go becomes a garden party when you're wearing this.
Perfect for our Golf Tournament Dinner Dance at the Country Club!!! This dress was stunning, elegant and so very pretty! The open back is gorgeous!

Was more comfortable than I thought it would be. Beautiful back, and it fit so well and offered enough support that I didn't need to wear a bra, which is NOT normal for me. Wore for midday brunch on a 90+ degree day, and it was elegant but cool. Wish it were about an inch longer, but still loved it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for summer wedding. Comfortable and easy to dance in.
links_reviews_text: Fitness great. Could have easily worn the 0 but opted to wear the 2 so I could do some fun dancing without worry. Super comfortable and got tons of compliments. The pop of color really made this dress.

links_reviews_title: A fun night, fun pretty dress
links_reviews_text: It fit true to size. The hooks in the back were similar to a bra and a little bit hard to clasp without help. The dress was pretty, I enjoyed wearing it

This dress was perfect for a spring outdoor party Color, fabric and fit were great, a bit loose in the back but is ok! I went one size up because this brands tends to be a bit small Highly recommend this dress

LOVED this dress. It was a replacement when my other dress didn't fit. It was very comfortable--it was a little big as I was forced to get a larger size due to availability, but it was still fine with no bra. Would def rent this again--perfect for a wedding!

links_reviews_title: Love the back of this dress
links_reviews_text: Lovely, beautiful, bright embroidery detail, and love the sheer back. Nubra needed underneath since the back and shoulders are sheer. Wore this for an Alice in Wonderland themed night out-it was perfect for the occasion and was stopped several times by strangers with compliments on the dress.
I wore this to an enchanted garden themed party. It was perfect for the occasion! The embroidery is gorgeous and the dress fit perfectly to size. Loved this.
Dress looked like something my grandma would wear. The back clasp on my open back seemed like it was hanging on by threads. Not my style.
Great dress for vacation or wedding - amazing back. Can't wear a bra with it.
I rented the 4 and the 6 but went with the 4. It was conservative enough for a church wedding but the back added some spice to it! This was actually my back up but I would rent again for sure!
Amazing dress! Brand new with tag still on. Great fit! Didn't end up wearing it since it was too formal for my needs. It would be great for special occasions. Beautiful embroidery and great fit.

links_reviews_title: Stunning color embroidery & light weight Comfort.
links_reviews_text: NWT! I had chosen another dress for an event and then this popped up and I am so happy I changed my mind to get this dress new with tags. There is a first layer that's a see-through slip then you have a silk black layer and then there is the see-through embroidered net layer. It feels like you were wearing air it is so light weight and comfortable. It fits true to size and has ample room in the bust. I am 34B and it would fit at least a C may be a D best. The back of the dress is beautiful with the see-through net closure. Only a sticky bra is going to work with this type of dress! LOVE. at 5 foot two it was above the knee
I could not Wear. So disappointing I'm usually a 10 but 12 seems to fit better. I was unable to wear.
Special and spectacular-
The dress actually fit really nicely. It was slightly more loose than I prefer in the waist but overall it was good and classy! Loved the netting!

The fit was a bit snug, but that was my fault since I had pizza the day before! Stupid move, I know. Regardless, I received numerous compliments and sitting down and dancing in this dress was comfortable. I didn't feel like I was going to pop out of it. Overall, I recommend it.
I personally liked it. My husband thought the back was too much, so I didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a dressy garden party!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Great overall fit with an elegant but not too fancy feel.

links_reviews_title: Loved the back ! easy to wear
links_reviews_text: Cannot do a bra with this but luckily there is enough coverage that you can go braless. dress was comfortable and easy to wear. Could have sized down since up top was loose nad I think there was enough give around the hips which is always my challenge
Did not bother to take a picture. Ordered in my regular size (14) and the back would not close. Given the sheer nature of the back would make it difficult to find a bra

links_reviews_title: Too tight in bust and stomach
links_reviews_text: Didn't like the way it fit. Material is very pretty.
I rented this last minute for Dîner en Blanc. It was a hit!! Not to short, comfortable, functional. Annnnd It Had POCKETS!!!!!!!!

Wore a Medium. Top half of the dress was tight around my shoulders and showed a little too much cleavage. I pinned the opening but it was a little obvious that I pinned it due to the keyhole cut. The dress is flattering but be warned, it's not always flattering in photos. All the other pics made me look huge in the waistline.
It was a cute little dress. Comfortable

This dress got lots of compliments! I will say, I wore it a few times but the arms were really tight and it was a struggle to take it off (side zipper too). The skirt was flattering and pockets are always a plus!

Love, Love, LOVE this style! So chic and classy. It was a real winner for sure. My only suggestion, DO NOT WEAR IN THE SCORCHING HEAT! I wore this to an outside party and the material does not breathe AT ALL. Did not keep me from wearing it because I am telling you this dress is a true winner. Will definitely rent again!

Liked the loose, but tailored fit of the waist. I was a little worried it would make me look fat since I'm more of an hour glass shape but didn't have any issues. I loved the keyhole neckline. It did fit a little tight in my arms so if you feel like your arms are a little thicker or more on the muscular size I'd consider sizing up so that it doesn't hug too tightly. Wore this to a girls brunch with colorful block heel mule slides. Got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my Bachelorette party
links_reviews_text: Fit pretty well, although had to add belt because there's not enough definition in the waist , which makes it end up looking slightly maternity.. Overall was cute for our "golf theme"
If you have wide hips like me the pockets at times make it a little awkward. I felt like they kept popping out.

links_reviews_title: Surprisingly a lot of compliments on this dress
links_reviews_text: But I was not In love with the fit. A bit too loose on my petite frame so I used a waist belt to make it look more fitted. I do love the fit and flare and style and color of it. The pockets were a plus!

links_reviews_title: Classic White Dress with a Twist
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size, but it's weird - a little tight in the arms and hips, but loose at the waist. A little short for work, but great for my upcoming girls weekend. Hello spring!
Loved this dress! Pros: nice length, pockets, cut fit perfectly Cons: Arms were a LITTLE snug when trying to move in certain ways. For the most part I didn't even notice.

links_reviews_title: A white dress thats not see-through!
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress enough to wear once or twice but not my absolute favorite. Good material but did wrinkle

I was nervous to rent this based on reviews saying it was too large. I'm very happy that I chose too, it's a unique dress that's oversized and maintains a sexy flair! Also work appropriate , if your not too tall!

links_reviews_title: A modern twist on classic white
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this as it was part of my unlimited RTR shipment because it was so big in the waist! The fit on top was a little big as well. I do have a small upper frame but was disappointed because the brand normally fits perfect. The material and seam are quality and does not show through, which is always a concern with a white dress.

I love this Elizabeth and James dress! They never disappoint! The dress has a great feel to it yet the material does not have any stretch to it. Thus, running true to size, I would recommend sizing up for backup if you’re curvier and down if you’re smaller framed. There is a lot of room in the midsection, but it can be a bit tight on the sleeves and on the skirt slip for women with fuller hips. The fabric is not sheer yet I would suggest using nude undergarments just in case. You are able to wear a standard bra with it. My favorite part is the pockets! Who does not love a dress with hidden pockets?! Always a plus! I also love the key-hole neckline, but it can be tricky for those of you with fuller busts. Pair this dress with some sandals or sneakers and you will look amazing, Wear it for work, brunch, or any summer day! Can’t wait to rent it again!

Sweet dress for a summer day! Running on the larger size, we recommend ordering a size down for backup. The fabric does not have much stretch, but it is comfortable with a roomy fit. With a tighter fit in the bust, this piece is best for A-C cup sizes. The cinched waist creates a hourglass shape on all body types. Those with fuller hips will look great in this look with a full skirt. The dress hits above my knees on my 5'1 frame. This piece is great for everyday wear or a casual summer event. Dress it down with ballet flats or dress it up with wedges and gold jewelry.
Classy yet sexy. Would rent again if need another white party dress
I didn't end up wearing this because it was too short even on my 5'1" frame! Veryyyyy cute fit though. The other thing was that it was more off-white than expected but not quite cream.

I got this dress to wear on the day of my wedding glam trial. I loved the somewhat sporty look of the color and the length. It was much longer on me than the other reviewers and pictures. I'm about 5'3.5" and it was falling at an awkward length on my mid to low thigh but not exactly to my knees so it just looked untailored for me. The material wasn't a nice as I though either, it was very polyester and thick. Didn't end up wearing it.

I had trouble even trying this on. Once I got it on I actually had the sense to take off my makeup carefully before struggling out if it because I didn't want to stain the white material. It's cute but size up!
too big
Def. one of my fav. rentals; wore often with sneaks.
Super cute, a little tight in the arms but not so much that I didn't wear it.
The fit was a bit odd. Tight around the boobies but super loose around the waist. The way it flairs out makes you look much bigger than you are. Would be super cute if the waist was actually fitted

links_reviews_title: Despite how big it is, it's super cute.
links_reviews_text: The material is nice and feels fancy. I wore it on a bunch of different occasions and got tons of compliments. I think it leaves something to the imagination.

links_reviews_title: daytime on the lawn - this dress looked like it was made for it.
links_reviews_text: important to note - the fit is wide which was my only complaint, my waist is the slimmer part of my body so it skimmed that and was kind of boxy. otherwise very well made and good quality, just have to be careful it's VERY white.

I believe this dress runs true to size, but I ordered the xs instead of the small. I think the small would have fit better. The extra small was too tight across the bust. It "fit", but was definitely tight. The length was good, not too short. The material was thicker than I would have thought. I would try this dress again in the small. I also see that it is offered in black, and that could be cute too.
This dress is cute. Loved the pockets but the material is thick. Not good for a Texas Summer.
Lived this dress so comfy and cute!

This dress was a hit at my wedding shower! I received tons of compliments. I wore the top button unbuttoned giving the dress more of a "v" cut at the chest. I have a larger bust, but the "v" was still tasteful and didn't overexpose anything. The pleats in the front and back of the dress took it out of the "nurses outfit" category when worn. The white material is thicker and did not reveal any nude undergarments. Also, the pockets kept my cell phone handy so I could snap pictures throughout the party. Great dress Would rent again!

This dress was perfect to throw on for work. It's light weight, not see through and it fits conservatively (does not hug you). The only area it's a bit snug in is the arms. Wrinkles semi-quickly but would definitely rent again!
This is a loose fit, wore with pearls, high heels. Looked amazing. I am small chested and leggy but I think would work fine for curvier gals.
I'm curvy and had put on a bit of weight from the time I ordered it till I got it and it still fit and got lots of compliments.
Bust was tight with a bra on, but fit the rest of my body well.

I really liked this dress. I had previously rented the black one in small and it was a bit too big, the xs fit much better although it is still loose around the waist which is cute and forgiving. If you don't like that looseness, it's easy to fix with a belt without it looking bunchy. I was also afraid the white might be see-through but it wasn't at all! Definitely recommend :)

The fit was as expected, a little shorter than I thought, but not short enough to make it uncomfortable. The hem on one of the sleeves was not sewn, so I kept having to fix that, which was annoying. Great for day and night!

Beautiful dress just very boxy and no shape. Top half fits perfectly and then the waist swamps me , easily 2 sizes too big on the waist. Pretty dress, simple and classy - definitely needs a belt to pull in the waist.
So many compliments. Absolutely beautiful dress. I had strangers and coworkers tell me they loved it. Will definitely be renting again.
The bottom came slightly wrinkled but not noticeably once put on. It had the feeling of a structured dress while also feeling cute and casual.
So cuteeee i dont wanna return it!!!
I felt so pretty in this dress! I had to wear a camisole-type bra under it because it was revealing in the chest area, but it was so nice

links_reviews_title: This dress is very comfortable and easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: There is a snap for the wrap, but it did not contain my 'girls' well when I started moving around, especially on the dance floor, so i had to get comfortable with much more cleavage than my usual look. Otherwise, this dress is great!

I rented this for a Birthday dinner for my husband. I liked the fit although a little long. I wore it with a blue jean jacket for extra warmth and to dress it down. I added a slip underneath because when I stood up it wanted to fly open. You just need to be aware when you get up and down.

I rented this to wear to a wedding rehearsal dinner. The fabric falls beautifully! The print was beautiful. The medium fit fine but was a little snug around the bust and would've required a low-V bra or some tape. I opted for the large to have better coverage and a little more length. I am 5'6" and wore 1 inch kitten heels and the large fell perfectly to the floor.
Great dress, lots of compliments, pretty and flowy, I am glad I went with XL instead of large bc the sizing seems a little bit small. Overall great dress! Very comfortable and flattering!

Perfect date night dress for a spring night! Length was around my ankles (I'm 5'8") and could've been worn with sandals or heels. The V neck is definitely low but I was fine without any tape/pins. Can't wait to rent again!

I got engaged in the afternoon and wore this to dinner that night. The flow of the dress is SO fun. Like other reviewers mentioned, the chest runs a bit small like other reviewers mentioned, but honestly I wore it open and flaunted the girls (not pictured ha!). Super gorgeous dress!
Such a cute dress. Received several compliments. The pattern is amazing and lots of freedom with it being a wrap dress. Did have to wear a slip and be cautious of slit.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful print. Hard to keep closed.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to an event in Hawaii. The print is gorgeous and the fabric is light and wonderful. My only complaint is that it's a true wrap dress and anytime the wind would blow I had to hold it together. The snap on the chest doesn't work at all so I didn't even try to use it. I wouldn't recommend wearing this if you'll be outside or moving around a lot. I did get many compliments on it though.

I rented this for a date night during vacation. It was perfect! The fit was just right. There was room to make it smaller or larger if needed. I'm 5'6" and the length worked as long as I had a heel. Because it was date night I didn't feel the need to cover the ladies up, but I wouldn't feel comfortable wearing this to work. I got compliments on it all night long! Enough to make me consider purchasing it to have all the time!

links_reviews_title: Easy fit, but a little long
links_reviews_text: Easy fit around the waist and bust (I used a safety pin instead of the button). Long length. I'm 5'1 and wore 3 inch heels and still skirted the floor.

links_reviews_title: Silky elegance in the perfect fall floral
links_reviews_text: I love Yumi Kim's silk print rompers and knew this dress would be a quality backup to my original first choice. Short girls, I know you're reading my review to see if this will work for you and the answer is yes! I prefer maxis to hit the top of my feet and in four-inch satin evening sandals, the dress still ran a tad longer than that. Because of the fall of the wrap and the lightweight fabric, I was still able to walk around without tripping on a dragging hemline. However, the skirt has a sheer poly lining that drops a little lower than the outer silk fabric, so just for insurance I used fashion tape to tack up the liner. Otherwise, the dress fit as expected without gaping or sliding around the cleavage and plenty of fabric on the wrap to cover my wider than average hips. I enjoyed that when seated with your legs crossed, the fabric tends to slide back and show a little leg. This dress was the perfect solution for a 4 o'clock semi-formal wedding and I felt like I stood apart from the crowd. It's Rita Hayworth sexy--classic, glamorous, and just a little exotic.

links_reviews_title: Another great Yumi Kim wrap dress!
links_reviews_text: I'm a sucker for a wrap dress and this Yumi Kim did not disappoint! I'm 5'10" and the length was perfect with flat sandals. Great rental!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for our engagement shoot!
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress but it was a bit small in the chest area(I am a 36 D. I wish there was a fastener to keep it closed a bit more. Other than that the dress was great and I received tons of compliments on the photos.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing. Flows perfectly and is so pretty, my mom's best friend insisted I buy it. One my favorites!!

I rented this for work and wore it to work, date night and church. It is a truly beautiful dress, with a bold, fun pattern. I got tons of compliments, even at work. I rented the medium and definitely could have worn the small. The bottom is lined but the top is not so I needed a cami underneath. Rent this!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress that's easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: Flows nicely, easy to adjust since it's a true wrap. Gorgeous colors.
Great dress. Rented as part of the unlimited. The snap was missing on the top so I wore a cami under it. Worked great but larger chest be cautious.
Super easy comfortable dress for a wedding. Wrap style. I am 5'11" and and wore this with 2" shoes. The length is good but did not cover my feet

links_reviews_title: Pretty for nursing mom but nothing special
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a wedding and needed something nursing friendly for my 3 month old. This had a true wrap and extra button at the bust to prevent too much cleavage. The fabric was just OK and the cap sleeve felt more like a tank top. It was pretty but not Wow. I'm 5'3" and wore with 4" heels and it was still too long

The button to secure the bust was hanging on by a thread. But other than that this dress was super flattering and very comfortable for summer I'm just about 6 ft tall and the length looked like it was made for me

This dress was the most flattering I've ever gotten from RTR. Its a nice silk blend and the material was nice too. The button at the chest was sturdy and didnt gap at all. Im 5'8" and always wear flats with maxis. I hate the look of heels with them. The SR was the perfect length, skimming the ground.

I rented the L and the XL (backup) for a trip to Hawaii, knowing that Yumi Kim runs large. I actually ended up wearing the XL because it seemed like it was a little shorter (weirdly), but it was also easier to wrap tighter. The dress is beautiful in person and flowed nicely by the ocean. Always size way up in Yumi Kim, but it's worth it.

I ADORED this dress. Comfortable, gorgeous, flowing fabric. A hidden snap to hold it closed at the top was a nice bonus. Cons: low-cut. Had to wear a camisole. Very long! I am 5'6 and wore the XL. I needed at least a 4" heel for it to clear the ground. I guess it would be perfect if you were over 5'10". I am between a size 12 and a 14 and the waist was perfect. If you are any bigger than that you will risk not having enough overlap. Watch that wind! It will part open and you will flash everyone. Also, be careful to not step on it and fall when walking up the stairs! Lol Seriously though, I wish I could buy it. If it were shorter, I would probably live in it. It felt so good to wear.
I'll absolutely rent this again, it worked great for a black tie wedding and was super comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress-- can show some leg if you want or keep it conservative.
links_reviews_text: Great fabric, well made and an overall great dress. A little small for me in the busy, but I loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Being there for the friends that I love.
links_reviews_text: Everything about the dress was awesome, except that the slit would often come open in the wind and flash my spanx haha. Also, as a 36 C, I had to wear a black bra in order for the amount of cleavage showing to look intentional.

Love, love this dress! It's pretty and feminine, yet professional. I wore it to work, on a date, and then just out shopping. It fit perfectly, I never had to adjust the tie or wrap. It is pretty long, I tried to wear flats and it hit the ground (I'm 5'5" with long legs). I would caution anyone wearing this in a windy location as there isn't a way to prevent the skirt from coming completely open if you have something in your hands. Definitely one of my favorite rentals!
Beautiful!
Loved this dress and received so many compliments! It fit great at 7 months pregnant, would definitely rent again!

This dress was so beautiful. It's very long so you either need to be tall which I am not or wear some serious platforms which I did. I felt fabulous in this. It's comfortable and well made. I wore this to a charity luncheon.

Insert the teary eyed emoji now as I didn't get to wear this lovely dress. I'm a 12/14 retail and a 14/16 in RTR. Sadly, the top was much too SMALL for my large chest (38 DD). This dress is so light and airy. It moves beautifully when you walk. I'm seriously considering putting my bathing suit on under this dress and wearing it as a cover up. Small girls, don't hesitate to rent this lovely dress. You'll be sure to get plenty of compliments. In the meantime, this is motivation for me to try to hit the gym because I soooo want to wear this!!!!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful material, not the right fit for me.
links_reviews_text: This style typically looks great on me but the chest area was too small. Wouldn't stay buttoned and had to wear a tank under it.
wasn't too long with heels, wrap style gives you some fit wiggle room
perfect wrap dress

links_reviews_title: So flattering! I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Because it's a wrap dress, it fit perfectly! Definitely recommend!

I’m a medium in most clothes but I am petite and have a small waist so I often wear smaller sizes in dresses. I fit in the small except the wrap was gaping open at the chest and was unwearable (unless I came up with an elaborate tape job). I would have loved it in the right size! It’s very classy and flattering.

This dress is gorgeous. As other reviews mentioned, be careful if you're wearing it anywhere windy, bc the light silky material will fly up! Better for indoor events. It's a dress that's very versatile. I've worn it to a formal wedding, a picnic in the park, and even to work. There are few dresses that are appropriate for all of those!
Okay dress but it was too long.

links_reviews_title: It's a nice dress but wrinkles a bit and wasn't my fav material.
links_reviews_text: It's nice, but not one I'd rent again. Even though it's a wrap, it's still a bit too big / flowy on the bottom - they could use less material for a better fit. I also didn't love the material - hard to describe why I didn't like the material - it's flowy yet a little courser than I'd expect for a dress like this.

Loved this dress. It's form-fitting but very flattering. The side cut-outs were sexy without being too much. I couldn't wear a bra with the dress as they all peeked out of the cut-outs, but the material is thick so I could get away without one (and I'm a 36c who rarely goes without a bra). The dress runs true to size, but material and the straps have a bit of stretch which is forgiving if you're curvy.
This dress was amazing. Very colorful! Received tons of compliments. Fabric was thick, and the dress was very comfortable. Usually wear a 4, but sized down to a 2.

Wore this to my husband's company holiday party where there are a lot of creative/artsy type professionals. So I wanted something that would stand out as unique. Was very happy with my choice. Never felt uncomfortable and definitely got compliments! *I'm a 34DDD/36DD at VS, so no bra- not sure how this would fit a very small chest.

This dress was fun to wear out for a night in Palm Springs. The fabric is stretchy, so it's very comfortable. The bright colors make the dress really pop! I'm 5'10", so I also appreciated how long the dress is.

links_reviews_title: Want something festive for my birthday party. This was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. Good for hour-glass figure. The cut-outs were very subtle. Most people didn't notice cause in a dark lounge. But I imagine they'd pop more at a daytime event.

I was afraid that it won't fit and I was considering getting a bigger size but after trying it on, I would have been good in a size smaller as well. I have small hips, nonexistant waist and 32E bust .... this dress has a lot thicker material then I thought, it's very stretchy and comfortable! if you want to be comfortable then it's true to size, if you like it hugging tight, get a size smaller.

links_reviews_title: Love love love this dress! Got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: True to size! Fun, flattering, sexy and classy all in one!

A little more sexy than I thought it would be, but not really a problem in my office. I wasn't familiar with the brand so I was pleasantly surprised with the fit & comfort. I'm usually a 4 & sometimes a 2, but the 2 fit perfectly. This dress has stretch so you should go smaller if you're between sizes. Worked fine with a regular bra, but also fits well enough to go without.

links_reviews_title: Like wearing a beautiful piece of art
links_reviews_text: Fun and sexy but still classy and flattering. Someone complemented the dress and described it "like wearing a piece of art."

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and sexy at the same time.
links_reviews_text: Lot of compliments - even from strangers. Thick, stretchy material (so pretty forgiving for a fitted dress). You can wear a regular bra, which is a huge plus because the straps are so thick.

links_reviews_title: Colorful Dress. Sexy fit. Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Sexy dress. The side slits were well played. The material was stretchy. Wore to a charity cocktail party with an art theme and a "dress to inspire" dress code. Got lots of compliments!
I would own this dress if I could! The fabric is very comfortable and forgiving. No special underwear needed. And the cut is flattering. Will rent again!

Wore this to fancy dinner date with hubs... The fabric is thick & stretchy, maybe the dress runs a smidge large because I zipped it up and didnt experience any cinching sensation, although the fit looked appropriate. I would have bought except the raw-edge hem looks a bit worn. There is a pretty short slit in the rear but it didn't cause me problems. I wore a Wacoal Red Carpet strapless bra. No fussiness or need for tape with the cutouts :) Honestly, loved it. My usual female opinion panel was obsessed.

Needed an outfit for my birthday celebration. Originally rented a romper that didn't fit because my torso to legs ratio must be off. ;) Contacted customer support and they sent me a new choice and had it to me by the next day. Excellent customer service! Loved this dress so much. Fit perfectly. Did magical things for my cleavage. haha When can I buy this dress?
Was so nervous about this dress because it seemed super tight but it ended up fitting amazing! Stretches just perfect and looked amazing. Perfect Miami dress for a bachelorette party!

links_reviews_title: Flattering, colorful, and cleavagey-- the perfect trifecta!
links_reviews_text: I loved this piece, and was able to wear it without a bra. It is stretchy, and forgiving. I love the wide black straps. The six seemed true to size to me.

Loved this dress, great material, could wear a normal bra (key!) and cutouts made it fun for an even for this 30 something couple in Vegas. Again, other size care ripped so tighter than expected but loved that I could still wear it!
I am 5'7" and I have an athletic build: this was the best fitting dress and the material feels like nothing I have ever worn before. Classy length with a sexy edge.
This dress was form fitting and low cut- perfect for an evening out on the town. It's a stretchy fit so the 4 worked nicely.

The fabric is stretchy and heavy enough to hide shapewear. I liked cutouts but was more comfortable w/o them so I wore a black slip/shapewear under it and it just looked part of the dress! Didn't need a bra, didn't have to suck in my tummy--this was a great dress! I'm 5'4, 110lbs, 32D. Would buy or rent again but too many pix were taken so...I'll just rent another fabulous one from RTR!

Terrible photo of me due to wind in my face, but this was the best one I had that showed the dress... absolutely recommend this! I wore it to a wedding in Mexico. Got tons of compliments on the bright colors and sexy (but not scandalous) fit. The best part is I could wear a regular bra! Material was super comfortable - easy to dance in all night.

Fabric of this dress has a ton of give. It was super easy to get in and out of cars, dance, etc. Ran bigger than expected and I wore the 8 without a bra. This was slightly surprising considering I am a 36DD, but I didn't like the way my bust looked wearing a Nubra, and you could see a regular bra through the slits on the side. The thickness of the fabric was helpful given the no bra thing, but it wasn't too hot for an outdoor wedding in Temecula. I felt plenty of support. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: The dress was comfortable and style fun to wear.
links_reviews_text: The fit was comfortable to wear. Loved wearing it! Fabulous!

I wore this dress to a birthday party. The material is stretchy and very thick. The cut outs were at the perfect height so that they didn't cut into my rib cage and I was able to wear a regular bra. Because the length of the dress came down to my knees, I didn't mind showing cleavage because the dress was still very classy overall.

Beautiful dress! Super stretchy, thick fabric. I wore this to a bridal shower and it was a hit! I wore a regular bra but be advised that if you are larger than a B cup, you'll be showing cleavage! Overall, great dress for both day or night!

links_reviews_title: Perfect piece to wear to Fabrica de Arte in Havana!
links_reviews_text: A comfortable and subtlety sexy dress that is easy to wear, lightweight, and perfect for a cocktail party or night out. The fabric is stretchy and the dress runs slight large.

This dress is true to size and have is stretchy so it accommodated my curvy frame. Received compliments all night and the dress was very comfortable but sexy. Didn't need a bra or spanx. The print is beautiful in person as well.

links_reviews_title: Super fun dress, perfect for Vegas!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED the pattern on this dress and the material is a nice thick scuba which makes the dress feel more forgiving. The straps are thick enough to wear a normal bra, but I also would have been comfortable without any bra. This dress was fun and sexy!

links_reviews_title: Great evening out dress in downtown Annapolis!
links_reviews_text: Fabric is super stretchy, soft and comfortable. I actually wore this dress around the house all day working on projects it was so comfortable & then just dressed it up with heels and a black leather tie belt to dress it up to go out that same night. Love the vibrant colors of this dress too!

I actually rented this for Easter because I want something a little different/edgy. Its a really cool dress! The slits on the sides were bigger than I anticipated so I wore a cardigan over it to make it more of a day dress. This dress is great for a special occasion, wedding, Bachelorette Party. It's super fun and sexy. I typically wear a size 6 but I chose to wear the size 4 so that it fit my bust better. I felt like I didn't have enough to fill out the size 6 in the top.

links_reviews_title: I wanted a high fashion look at my b-day party & this dress didn't disappoint!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the "0" & "2" for backup. I wore the "0" because it fit like a glove.
Love this dress! Very flattering and comfortable fit, true to size. I felt fabulous!
Loved the cut outs of this dress. Comfortable to dance in, fun unique pattern! Stand out don't wear black, can pair with any shoes since has every color in it.

links_reviews_title: Hugs every curve... in a good way!
links_reviews_text: I love, love, love this dress. It was very fun and unique from the fabric type and pattern, all the way to the cutouts in the waist. I loved the length which made it still seem more classy and the thick material was stretchy and forgiving. I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Britney, the stylish at RTR was sensitive and incredible in finding the perfect Art Basel outfit
links_reviews_text: Not as fancy looking as I thought. The material makes it look "cute" in person, but I was looking for more as an artsy show-stopper, did not achieved that goal lol however if fits amazingly and the "crop top cut" on the lateral fits just perfect but I could see being a problem if you are petite. Perfect for the tall gals :)

links_reviews_title: This dress is a head-turner! The fabric is so forgiving!
links_reviews_text: The cut outs are very tasteful, the colors are fun and vibrant, and the dress fits like a glove!

links_reviews_title: Stand Out in the Crowd in this Edgy Alternative
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress with the RTR Asilio Modern Domination jacket and a pair of velvet platform heels. Very edgy. Worked great together. The pattern of the dress is great, and the fit is very flattering. You can even wear a normal bra, too! Wish I could justify keeping it... Only complaint is the hemline on this outstanding dress is unfinished, and - though minimal - it was starting to look a bit worn due to unraveling of the polyester-based fabric. Again this is a minimal issue.
I was surprised at how form fitting it was, but it was not tight. I fit in the 2 better than the 4. This is bra friendly.

Loved the print and dress was so amazingly comfortable that I didn't want to take it off. Would have given it 5 stars except that the cut-outs were a little bigger than I expected but this was also my first time wearing a dress with cut-outs. Able to wear a regular bra with the size 6 while the size 4 rode up a little too high on the rib cage for me. Great date dress!

links_reviews_title: Not as fun as I had hoped
links_reviews_text: I was excited about this dress but it didn't live up to my expectations. I loved the colors and the straps allowed me to wear a regular bra which was nice but the fit overall felt lumpy, not smooth. And the longer length just barely came to my knee and I was expecting more of a midi length. I didn't end up wearing the necklace I rented because it looked better without it. I think this dress was hard to accessorize.
Was excited to order this shirt at it just looks like a class black shirt but it's fairly cropped & small around the bust. Most definitely size up.
Silky and very pretty top! Can be dressed up or down

I am obsessed with this top. I want to buy it. It is the perfect mix of a mature, classy vibe with a little edge and sexiness to it. I really can't wait to rent again (or buy!) only complaint is that it kept riding up (the bottom has elastic to cinch to your waist kind of) but otherwise one of my favorite rentals ever.
Fit great and felt very comfortable yet chic

I wore this to a concert with a blue jeans and open toe bootie. This top is classy and easy to wear. No accessories needed. This top completed the look I was trying to achieve. Renttherunaway never disappoints. The staff are very helpful to accommodate my needs. Thank you RTR.

This top is so classy but with an edge. I loved wearing it. I'm 5'10" so it was just a touch short. It looked good with monochromatic black jeans. Would've looked to short with different colored pants. At least on me. Most girls are prob shorter than me so it's prob fine for most.

links_reviews_title: Silky smooth material but issues with length and tie
links_reviews_text: Fabric was really nice except when it came to the neck tie: the silk was so smooth that the tie kept coming undone. This isn't a tie you want to double knot either, so I had to fiddle with that throughout the night. The length was also too short on my long torso. The elastic bottom kept riding up and I had to tuck it into my high waisted jeans. The tag in the back kept wanting to flip inside out. I wore with light jeans and black lace up boots. No compliments on the top but a few on my jeans! (Which are my own). Won't rent again.
Love this top... Sexy and stylist
Great top. Super cute and comfortable. Perfect for a GNO or date night. I wore it twice and got lots of compliments both times.

links_reviews_title: This is what the unlimited is about… Like this outfit but wouldn't want to own it.
links_reviews_text: Fun top. You have to get a little creative with the bra issue but it was fun to wear. I wore it with RTR theory pants.

Cannot get over how beautiful and comfortable this top was. Super versatile- I wore it with lighter jeans to dress it down but it would be great with a skirt or black pants. Will definitely be renting it again
Wish I could buy this. Run slightly slightly small! I found the tie a hit awkward but tied it as a bow to the side
Managed to make me feel pretty when I was feeling bloated and blah. Pretty versatile. I'll probably wear it a couple of times.
Forgot to take a pic, but this top was amazing. Rented for fun, wore it on a date then brought on vacation. Almost bought it
I didn't end up wearing this top because I like to show off my figure a bit and it was a bit looser at the waistline of the top. However, the material was lovely and the shoulder sexy.

Second time renting this top. It's great with a pair of jeans or could be worn with a skirt. A little shoulder but scarf covers some skin so it's didn't feel like "too much". Only issue was that tag would pop out at back. Other than that, it was a no-brainer.

If you have a long torso, this shirt will be kind of short. It's great and sort of sexy, but as another reviewer said that it wouldn't be a top that i'd like to have in my closet. It's a good option for a date or just something more edgy for work, but you won't reach for it often. Good for its purpose, won't be worn multiple times
Elastic bottom waist is the only thing I’d change
Love this top and the tie details! Would definitely rent again.
I was excited to wear this top, however, I didn't know what to do with the tie around the neck. I tried it a couple of ways and ended up with a bow to the side. Overall, I thought it was really cute.
Cute style but tag on back of shirt is always out, it folds over and can't be tucked. Couldn't wear. If the tag could be removed, I would order again to wear!
great fit

Dressy or casual depending on what you wear it with. I wore it to a GNO, date, and an LA client meeting and got compliments each time. Looks effortless and just a touch of sexy. Love it and I'll probably get it again.
This top is short and as a result wasn't flattering. The elastic at the waist makes it even worse.
Fun top for a night out!
Loved
Loved this shirt!!! I have long torso So when I raised my arms the shirt came up.
Combine with many pieces
Fit as expected, nice fabric, dressy with a little flair
Fits well. The neck tie is akward. Off the shoulder us nice, but hard to find a bra to go with.
So cute and can be dressed up or down. Loved the off the shoulder. Was a little short and has elastic around waist. Very cute though!

links_reviews_title: perfect top- a little fun, a little conservative, can be worn anywhere
links_reviews_text: true

I really liked this top and will rent again. It's true to size but if you're tall or have a long torso it is a bit short and could show some mid drift when lifting your arms or moving around a lot like dancing. I may size up next time for that reason. I wore this out to dinner with friends. Got many compliments.
Great top for a night out! Fit true to size and looks great with some high waisted pants!
Loved this. Could be worn as casual or dressed up. Perfect fit
Strange fit. Elastic waist, tight across the chest.
It was very short and almost cropped. The neck tie was not easy to keep in place. Pretty fabric but will not rent again.
A little complicated to tie, but looks stylish with anything.
Love it!!! I'm keeping it for a few days so I can wear it to dinner, work, happy hour and brunch. I love it that much! Classic but edgy
Elastic waist band was nice to give the tucked in look

I took into account all the previous reviews and ordered a size way bigger than what I normally would order. It ended up being great. I love the fabric and the fit was snug and still a little tight in the chest area, but I could still move in it and felt comfortable. I ended up wearing it three times I liked it so much.
Dress is very fitted. Loved the pattern. You can wear it off the shoulder or as a short sleeve. Wasn't the most comfortable, but still really liked it.
Lovely colors and fit

links_reviews_title: Was not able to wear. Was to tight
links_reviews_text: My goal is to fit into this dress. Love it

Like the other reviews have said, this dress runs really small. I wear a 4 in most dresses and upon reading the reviews I ordered a 3 (US 6-8). It fit but the lining underneath was tight. Thankfully the overlay made it so you couldn't see the tight lining. It was very cute and fun! I liked it a lot. Just heed the reviews and size up.

links_reviews_title: Rented for an engagement party. Too fancy and too big.
links_reviews_text: Pros: Awesome material and colors. This dress is a standout and will definitely turn heads. Cons: Too long, especially for shorties (I'm 5'3"). The material is very thick and heavy, which would be good for a formal affair. This dress would fit exceptionally skinny and tall people.
I normally wear a size 4-6 and ordered a size 3. I was able to wear it but it was very small. A size 4 would have been better!

links_reviews_title: It didn't fit so I needed to return
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a party and sadly it did not fit my curvy body type. There was No give in the material. I ordered a large and the large did not fit around my hip area or my arms. I sent back same day and went in a new direction in my next RTR Unlimited Rental
Pretty fabric, and it is a nice dress. Way too small for me. Never wore it.
I still gave it 3 stars because the dress is absolutely beautiful!

This dress is like a junior size. I've rented it twice. First in my "regular" size, the second in the largest size available. STILL too small. Unless you are a zero (and then order the biggest size) this dress will not fit you. Skip this one, despite it's cuteness. Waste of a rental!
Runs small, note size conversion. Even with selecting correct size with size conversion, too small to wear. Did not wear this dress, sent back
Fits true to size. I wore the sleeved low on my shoulders and it looked great
This dress was very, very small. My assessment is that a size 4 in this dress is not equivalent to a size 12, 10 possibly not even an 8.
Gorgeous dress but runs small...recommend sizing up!!

Wore it to a formal fundraising dinner. This dress surprised me by how much I liked it. I expected it to be okay nothing special but it was so comfortable and fit better than I expected. Although it is looser than dressed like this usually are. Long on me as you can see. Lightweight enough to wear in warm weather but can work for cold weather too.

Lovely drape, pretty floral print, and extremely comfortable. I kind of felt like i was getting away with wearing pajamas to the office. I ordered a M because the S wasn't available (usually wear a 6 in dresses) and it fit well across the shoulders but was pretty loose around the waist. Probably will rent in a small next time to see if that fits better. Giving it 4 out of 5 stars only because it makes me feel ever so slightly more matronly than I would prefer.

links_reviews_title: Wore to work and on a work trip—so versatile!
links_reviews_text: Silky, well-fitting, and elegant! Has two zippers so makes for a tailored look. I love this dress!
