I thought this dress was wonderful for work--it was comfortable and cool (despite the long sleeves) and a great length for a tall girl. Highly recommend.

Lovely silk, colors, drape. Versatile. This dress can be dressed up or down. I think you could wear this dress to a wedding right through to running errands. Good length for tall. True to size, doesn't run big like some Vince. Sleeves cover most of palms. This dress might not work for petites. Good dress for air conditioned office. Fall-like colors but can be worn in summer as light silk. Long zip down side and short zip in back.

This is such a beautiful, easy to wear dress! This lightweight, silky fabric falls in all the right places with zero cling or static. I love the classy, high neckline and the twist detail at the waist brings it together, flattering the figure with no need for a belt. The longer skirt comes up slightly in the middle for some leg peak and lovely flow when you walk, but nothing close to the anxiety a true wrap dress/skirt can cause on a windy day. The fit is somewhat loose all over, but looks so pulled together on. I've rented this twice already and I look forward to wearing again in the future.
I agree with the reviews that this dress looks and feels expensive. But it was matronly on me. Worse than matronly. Grandmotherly. Aged me 40 years. Went back unworn.

I felt like Juliet. Haven’t seen anything else like it. Surprisingly flattering on a pear shape, given that the photo makes it look as if the drape below the waist might not work. In reality it hung beautifully and was comfortable as well as beautiful.
it had a little stomach pooch which made me feel preggo but didnt stop me from wearing 3 times!

Very sexy for hourglass figures. The sleeves were a little long so bunched up to my elbows and looked very sharp. Silky material that flowed. Very feminine. Great fit -- when sitting down twist hits in a way that puts focus on your bust (and not tummy). Considering to buy - great fall/winter/spring pattern.

I had to have this dress for my birthday brunch! It didn't disappoint! All the little design details really set it apart. Love the colors! The pattern is understated. It's so elegant and lovely. I might just buy it!

I don't know that I've ever felt more elegant than the day I wore this dress. I wore it to work and received compliments non-stop all day. This dress is graceful and commands a room. Will definitely rent again.

I wore this 3 times during my rental. I wore to a work event, a wedding, and a play. This dress can be dressed up or down and the fabric is so beautiful. I found it to run true to size. It was a little roomy in the body - but the arm area was definitely a true to size Medium.

This just made me look pregnant. The fabric is beautiful but fit me funny. I am busty and the twist under the chest just made me look bigger then I am. If my chest were smaller it might have sat nicer on my body. I did not wear it.

I personally didn't love where the gathered part of this dress fell on me. I prefer my natural waistline, and it fell higher up on my rib cage. I have a pear/hourglass shape, so anything remotely babydoll ends up looking maternity on me. I didn't end up wearing this out.
Nicely designed

links_reviews_title: The twisting feature on the front and back was beautiful.
links_reviews_text: The fabric was soft and hung beautifully! It was the perfect dress for a rehearsal dinner.

links_reviews_title: ****** Please do not post my review. ******
links_reviews_text: The hem in the front came un-sewn during the event. I was very disappointed in this for several reasons. First, you can see it in photos. Also, I became an Unlimited member just to get items for this event. Then this dress became unavailable, so I had to order it via regular RTR, which I was fine doing because I loved it so much. But then the whole front seam came undone, and I paid extra for that? Disappointing. Also, it's unfair that when you join Unlimited you don't get any explanation that items you've hearted will become unavailable basically immediately.
Too large, didn't wear
Cute dress but very long. Wish it had pockets.

I remember being able to wear dresses cut on the bias when I was younger (and thinner). This one has that same, flowing-but-skimming vibe, but the twists make it very forgiving of curves. In my opinion it fits true to size and accommodates a larger upper body in the chest and arms. Lovely material - not transparent. However, as it's silk and the air is dry where I live, static was unavoidable. That aside, it's a beautiful dress! I received several compliments and I will rent again to wear with boots and a long cardigan when the weather turns. Then I can do the ol' hairspray on the tights trick to avoid static.

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing this dress
links_reviews_text: The dress was not flattering and so I did not wear it.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to wear but it just didn't work
links_reviews_text: I REALLY REALLY wanted this one to work. The fabric is beautiful and it looks amazing on the model but not so much on me in real life. I am 5'7" 120 lbs 34A ordered the small and was drowning in fabric while the neck was strangling me. Part of me wanted to swap for the XS to see if there would be less extra material but I knew the neck would be that much tighter so I just swapped it out for a different dress. *** IF you have a little more curve in the hip or a slightly bigger bust I personally feel this dress would look amazing on you as that is where I had the most extra fabric.
I could've slept in this dress it was so comfy. Paired with heels its very classy and a fun piece to wear. I probably could've sized down as there was a good big of room in the mid section.
Too big in the chest, perfect fit in the waist, too long. But I still liked it.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Fit great, a little long for me (5'4") but with heels it was fine and I like the way it pooled at my feet. Didn't need to a wear a bra (32 B) and got lots of compliments. Loved this dress!!

I ordered this dress as a backup option in case my First choice dress didn't work out, so I won't end up actually wearing this one, but I was really pleased with the quality and look of the dress. It had a muted sparkle throughout the fabric which was definitely my favorite part! Plus, the dress is two layers of thick material that make it feel substantial enough (and not see through). However, I would not recommend this dress to ladies with large chests. I am a 36D and went braless - and the fit was perfect. But I do feel like if I was wearing this, I might be a little paranoid because it doesn't quite leave you feeling covered and secure. The inside top does have a strip of rubbery material that helps it stay in place, which helped, but just be warned! Also, I am 5'8' and was wearing a 2" heel in this Photo, and the dress just perfectly brushed the ground.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress, for someone with a small bust and straight body.
links_reviews_text: I am typically a size 10 in dressed but sized up to a 12P for this based on reviews. Still had a hard time getting into the gown, which eventually was able to zip, but was far too tight on a larger bust. Additionally even the petite length (I'm 5'1) was too long in 4" heels. This is a beautiful gown for someone of an average height, without a curvy shape. I ended up wearing the Silver Cameron Gown by Hutch in a smaller size, and it was perfect for my curvaceous bod!

The dress has a gorgeous shimmer that's just enough to look amazing. I agree with the other reviews that it is tight near the ribs so I recommend going up in size. Also, if you have a larger bust you can definitely be showing some cleavage in this dress.

I really liked this dress but it gave me a little back butt and I was slightly too short in the torso the dress had some fabric overhang instead of laying flat. At 5'4" it was a little too long too even with 4" heels.

The dress is beautiful (simple and elegant). I wore for a Great Gatsby themed event. True to the reviews, the bodice runs small (took me forever to zip up) and even with a small bust like myself it appears too tight and I could barely zip it up. I would say to try on in store or get at least one size up (may two if you have a larger bust). The dress is A-line so sizing up won't make much difference at the bottom of the gown. I am wearing 4 inch heels in the picture and at my height the dress was still long and I had to pick up in the front to walk. I loved the dress and style but the fit is not great.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments and very comfy!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I wore it for a black tie fall wedding and it was perfect. I'm almost always a size 2 in dresses (sometimes a 0), but I'm glad I ordered the 4 as the backup. I couldn't even zip the 2. The 4 fit so well and was comfortable. The fabric is stretchy and light. The top is like a corset, though, so after 7-8 hours of wear I was pretty happy to take it off. In terms of length, I'm 5' 10" and the long with perfect for 2 inch heels. I could have probably gotten away with 3 inch heels as well.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this dress! Wore it for a wedding - would definitely wear it again!
links_reviews_text: So comfortable, lots of compliments. Had a little bit of a hard time with the zipper but overall really great!
Loved it !! It was a little long I'm 5'3 , weight 130lbs . Overall was just perfect !

The fit up top runs small - after reading the initial reviews - I went with one size larger and selected my second size - 2up. I ended up having to wear the 2 sizes larger than my norm due to my rib cage and chest. It was gorgeous though. Just enough shimmer for a black tie event

I wore this for a black tie event. It was perfect. Classic but still fun. The top ran a bit small. I usually wear a 0 and the 0 fit in this everywhere other than the bust. The size 2 was perfect. If you are a C cup of above, I would suggest going up a size!

The fabric is supper forgiving but the bust and waist are very fitted and not good for a busty gal. Very easy to get into but zipper placement makes it hard to get out of. Perfect for my height. I should've ordered larger size.

links_reviews_title: Dark grey shiny color is great for formal weddings.
links_reviews_text: It fit really well. It was a little long for me but I still loved it.

This was a great dress for a formal wedding on a warm October night - shimmery and light-weight. My main complaint was the length, because the hem got in my way throughout the night despite 4 inch heels. This is a pretty common problem with my rentals and I held up the dress for stairs, dancing, etc. The bust was slightly tight as well, and had the potential to smush even a small chest (I did wear a strapless bra with padded cups). But overall I felt pretty and sleek. Loved the straps - so different.

This dress runs small up top. If you have a larger chest... not sure I would recommend. Luckily, my body allowed a better fit haha. Truly, this material was stunning in person and in pictures. Unlike most formal dresses, it was actually comfortable to wear all night and didn't drag down with weight throughout time. It is a bit long though - I am 5'3" and had on 2" heels... but it was still about 2" longer than I would typically like. Overall, I really recommend this dress. I had a ton of compliments on it and feels great all evening.

links_reviews_title: Stand out in a unique dress
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and received many compliments. The perfect amount of sparkle on a pretty and demure silhouette. It is very forgiving in the stomach and hips, but probably not suited to a large bust as it is quite tight on the chest.

This dress made me feel beautiful! I wore this to the formal Captain's Dinner for mine and my husbands 5th wedding anniversary cruise. I am 5'2" and usually a size 0. It fit perfect other than it ran a bit tight around the rib cage but great for the smaller chested ladies! I wish I would have gotten the petite since it was a bit long but I never really tripped over it. I wore a 2 1/2 inch heel. Overall, it made feel great about myself and I would highly recommend!

LOVED this dress. I'm between a 2 and a 4, wore the 2 because that is all they had. Runs very small in the chest area. I couldn't zip it with a bra on. Nice not to need a bra though! Probably won't work well for bustier girls. Perfect length for me with 2" heels. Very comfortable for sitting / walking / dancing! Sparkly and elegant! Very flattering!

This dress is so comfortable in cut and material. The shimmer of the material was very eye catching in low light but more subdued than sequins which I liked. The top had great structure so I didn't need a bra.

links_reviews_title: Pretty, but runs small and short
links_reviews_text: I received this as a backup when the dress I ordered was damaged. I am pear shaped, so these styles typically work well for me, but this one was tighter than normal. I would definitely size up. Also, this dress is much more silver than the picture shows - so would definitely need silver jewelry/accessories. While the dress did technically "fit" (as in- i could zip it up) - I felt like a sausage busting out of its casing, so I decided to not wear it. Also - I am 5'8" and it was also a wee bit too short with my 3' heels.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a grad school ball. Perfect evening look.
links_reviews_text: The dress was the ideal length for me. But, the waist runs tight, which is why I had to go up a size (I have a larger rib cage). I wasn't pulling at the dress much at all, except a few times to reset the top because I didn't wear a bra with it. I recommend renting!

What a beautifully structured pleated gown by Laundry. Running true to size, we recommend sizing up for backup. Although the dress is fitted all around, being that the fabric is very stretchy, it allows for a comfortable fit throughout the midsection and for full hips. However, the fitting in the bust makes it best for A to C cup sizes with no bra required. Pair with silver heels and jewelry.
Really can't go wrong with this dress. Definitely tight in the chest, but worked for me. Super comfortable fabric and doesn't wrinkle. Very grecian.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and the fabric is wonderful.
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful. I was unable to wear it because I ordered the wrong size but I look forward to ordering it again for a different occasion! The fabric is light and easy to wear and shows up the perfect amount of shimmer!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for smaller busted ladies.
links_reviews_text: Didn’t end up wearing this dress, it was sent as a backup after my original dress didn’t work. This dress is beautiful and very comfortable. I felt like a million bucks in it but my chest was a bit smushed, so would be better for smaller busts.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: The bodice is tight, as others have noted. The dress is long on my 5'5" frame but was easily tucked into the waistband to the perfect length.

Rented for a NYE black tie party but won't wear. Should have listened to the other reviews - it is very narrow in the rib cage. I sized up and couldn't zip. I do have a wider lower rib cage that can cause some consternation, but this was ridiculous. Recommend sizing up 1.5-2 sizes! The regular length was fine for my height (5'9") without heels, but the long would have been better for heels. The fabric is so pretty - just the right amount of shimmer - and it's very light. It's perfect for a formal affair that's slightly more casual or where you want just subtle shine.

Such a comfortable dress. Felt flowy and feminine. Perfect for a holiday gala. Loved the sipver shimmer of the dress. Bodice does show cleavage, so be prepared. I was able to wear a strapless bra with this.

This dress was beautiful, especially the fabric. I rented it as a backup and went with my other dress instead so don't have any pics. I am about 5'3 1/2 and even with 4 inch heels the 4r was pretty long still.

links_reviews_title: Black tie gala event! So fun!
links_reviews_text: I was so sad this dress was too small. It is beautiful and long enough for a 5'10" girl! I read the reviews and checked the measurements before I ordered and it was still too small. This was a backup dress, so I only received one size. Super said it didn't work; I'm hoping I can rent it again in a different size in the future.

links_reviews_title: It works great for tall girls!
links_reviews_text: I actually wore my back up dress instead of this one. Fabric is really pretty in person and would be a comfortable dress if this fits your body type. I’m 5’3 and 135, but petite on the top. As other reviewers mentioned the top is really tight around the rib cage and a little difficult to zip especially if you don’t have any help. Not even a question of boobs, it was really the under boob circumference that I found small. The other issue was that even with 4 inch heels, this dress was still pretty long. I would have had to pick it up a touch to walk or dance. I love the style, but it is really made for tall girls with a really small frame. If this isn’t you, I would suggest looking at another option.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: Love the dress! Wore it to a black tie wedding and definitely received compliments on it. I was 17 weeks pregnant at the time. Wore a 0R and it was definitely a bit tight but the 2R was big in the straps. I like that you don't really need to wear a bra with this dress.. the chest area has a sort of thick enough material. Important to note is the length.. I am 5'6" and wore the 0R with flats, and it was way too long. I should have gotten the 0P knowing I wasn't going to wear heels.

links_reviews_title: Received many compliments on the dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit was a little snug in the chest, my daughter is a 30 A.
Comfortable and true to size. I never got to wear it as I decided on a different dress.

links_reviews_title: Ordered this as a backup but did not wear
links_reviews_text: The straps are too long for my long torso frame, bust and waist too tight for my 6 mo pregnant self. Read reviews of other pregnant women who loved this dress; however, the fit was off for me.
Fit in the waist and lower back, but then wouldn't close over my chest. I'm only a 34 B and I was totally squashed by the bust of the dress.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress but I was really surprised at how small it was.
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a 4 but I could barely zip up the 6...size up!
Great dress. Super comfortable and flattering. Would absolutely recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Too long, but overall, definitely recommend.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit true to size and was very comfortable to wear for an hours long event. I didn't experience the bust area being too small as some other reviewers have noted. I am a 34B and wore a sticky bra and the dress fit perfectly, however, with a typical strapless bra, I could see it being too tight. My only critique of this dress is the length. I am just under 5'7", wore 3 inch heels, and the dress was still long; by at least 2-3 inches. That doesn't sound like much, but I found myself stepping on it all night and it got a bit annoying to have to hold the bottom of the dress up when I walked. Overall, far more pros than cons and would definitely recommend.

This dress fit perfectly without me having to unzip it or unbutton the dozens of buttons along the back, really cool detail! This may even run a little large but I like the looseness especially in the summer. It is such beautiful colors and the pattern matching and mixing and the flow is superb. And my girls look great in this! Boyfriend love that

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a Maternity shoot in Hawaii
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a maternity photo shoot in Hawaii. It was the perfect dress and made me feel really beautiful. It wasn't too heavy and flowed nicely.

links_reviews_title: The colors are bold and saturated - perfect for vacation

links_reviews_text: This dress was super lightweight and easy to wear. In my perfect world the prints would have been flipped so the dress was primarily blue, but just a personal preference. Nice for an outdoor wedding! Didn't require any special shapewear which was nice.

Got SO many compliments on this dress! Definitely listen to the reviews - I'm normally a true 4 and the 2 fit me perfectly. I'm also 5'2 and am sometimes scared to rent long dresses but this was the perfect length. Probably my favorite dress I've rented to date.

I loved this when I saw it online but then when I received, I felt like it didn't have the same wow factor. The fabric is a bit hot and constricted, but the colors and flow are quite pretty. Was a little too large in the arms / chest on me.

I loved wearing this around the city! Fit me and my 17-week baby bump (slight), and still defined my waist. I don't know how the lining of this dress could accommodate a larger bump, as shown in the picture... overall, fun dress!

I wore this on a beach vacation at 32 weeks pregnant. I also wore it for a baby shower. Strangely, my usual size (4) fit, so I imagine it's pretty flowy if you're not pregnant. loved the fabric and thick black straps. Just the right amount of cleavage!

links_reviews_title: This dress is perfect for a beach wedding or daytime event
links_reviews_text: I was hesitant at first because of the pattern but I love it. It looks great especially with tan skin. A flowy dress that I can still show off your collar bone area but hide some tummy. #wedding #daytime #athletic
Wish there was a little more room for boobs but overall this was a fun trendy comfortable day look.

I wore this to my baby shower at 31 weeks pregnant. It fit perfectly in my usual size. If I was t pregnant, it would probably be a little too loose for my preference (size down). I couldn't wear a bra with it, but it was fine. The color and print are beautiful, and I got so many compliments on it. On me, it was more "maxi" than "midi" but straps were perfect. Highly recommend this dress pregnant or not!!

links_reviews_title: Tropical print for a tropical vacation
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a maternity dress on vacation to a nice dinner. It was light and airy because we were on an island vacation I needed all the ventilation but it worked great for the bump despite not being maternity so I would say it runs big for nonmaternity.

links_reviews_title: Flowing spring dress. Easy to wear day or night.
links_reviews_text: Went to lunch, perfect. Went to a nice dinner in Miami Beach, perfect. Shoes change it completely.
This dress is very feminine. I wore it all day walking around the Kennedy Space Center. It was a hot day, and the lining got a little clingy, but overall I loved it and would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this beautiful dress for a wine tasting in Napa, it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: very slimming

This has a nice cut to it. It also covers a bra easily, if you like to keep the girls up. I thought the quality and cut was lovely. The only reason I give it 4 stars is the yellow is a little harsh. It has slightly blue undertones, especially on the yellow ribbon near the bottom. To me, the color cheapens the overall effect. I don't wear much yellow, because it's hard to flatter my fair skin, but I defiantly wouldn't have even tried it on in a store. If you can wear yellow, you can probably rock this dress!

I wore a size 2 and it fit great. I'm usually between 2 and 4. It was a little too low in the front and showed my bra a little. Should've used some fashion tape. Wouldn't wear it to a conservative environment. Flows well and is flattering.

links_reviews_title: The color and the print is just to die for!!! Received so many compliments. Very cute and fun dress.
links_reviews_text: All pros when it comes to this dress. It fits true to size, the color, print, and silhouette was exceptional. Loved that it has waist ties to truly help cinch in a define my waist. When I had this dress on, I wanted to do nothing but smile and take pictures everywhere! A lot of fun and I would definitely rent again.
This dress was adorable. It was comfortable and sweet. The bust was a little too low cut for church, so I wore a camisole under and it worked fine! Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Incredible Tanya Taylor does it again!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, print, and cut. The chest was a little big on me, but it worked okay.
Good length for me! Fit is spot on and very flattering. I'm a 34B and was worried about chest being too big but fit was perfect. This is a very pretty dress!!
Wore a 0 in this although I usually am a 2-4. Color is beautiful and different! I'm 5 9 and it hit me tea length. Loved it! Would rent again but I think it's too memorable!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress, one of my favorite rtr pieces
links_reviews_text: Great dress! Beautiful colors and very comfortable. I wore it 3 separate times and got tons of compliments each time I wore it.

Really nice dress. Well made. I am between a 12 and 14. The 14 was a teensy big on top. However, the tie corrected quite a bit of this. It was a nice length and fell well at the stomach down. The slip was a little short but after about an hour, I didn't notice it anymore. Really liked the dress overall.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! So much cuter irl
links_reviews_text: My 13 year old "fashion advisor" gave this dress the thumbs down when I was "shopping", but it had such great reviews, I got it anyway! The fabric and flow of this dress is absolutely beautiful on -- and it feels so "pretty". So so many compliments from random people on the street to male coworkers who never comment on clothes. (I did wear a short jacket to be my-office appropriate). Will keep another few days and wear somewhere this weekend!! : )
I loved this. I plan to wear it again as a swimsuit coverup. I am glad I went with a size 2 because it would have been to big if I had a size 4.
I wanted to keep this! I am 5'1'' and was able to wear this with sandals. Perfect for pear shaped body.

links_reviews_title: So gorgeous and comfortable - sad to send it back!
links_reviews_text: This may be my favorite rental of all time. I wore the dress to an outdoor wedding at a farm on a hot summer day. The fabric is incredible for dancing - it flows so nicely, I just wanted to spin and twirl in it all night. I think the dress ran a little loose, which I liked; I wore the 0R and was able to adjust it to fit me perfectly with the tie. The dress has great coverage and lining so I did not need to wear a bra (32B), but also didn't feel flattened out. It has a beautiful, bright pattern and adorable buttons down the back. I got compliments all night. My one complaint is that the lining of the dress in the front turned out a bit, so you could see a small bit of the lining on one side of the v-neck. It probably could have been fixed with an iron or fashion tape, but sadly I didn't have either. I wish I could keep this dress and would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Comfy dress...great color and great length...but my bra couldn't hide
links_reviews_text: Not sure I could've found a bra to work with this one. I wore a jacket to cover the bra showing from the gaping sides near the arm. Overall a great dress. I just won't rent it again. Great color! Nice alternative to black for a work conference.
Loved the fabric, felt expensive. Perfect for a Spring 1st Communion ceremony and luncheon on a Sunday afternoon! This was the second time I rented this!

I wore this dress to a beach-formal party in Portugal. Then length of the dress really adds elegance to the fun colors and prints. The navy bottom, add a bohemian flow-y sort of look which was nice for a beach party. The color is vibrant, so don't pick this dress if you are scared of standing out. The dress hangs beautifully, and you can always loosen the tie in the back if you eat a little too much at the event ;) I'm ususally a 2R-4R but I needed a 0 in this dress, I'd say it runs large.
I rented this for my baby shower. It's flowy in the skirt so it fit my bump, but would look great not pregnant of course.

I really love this dress! I wore it once to dinner ok vacation and once to a cocktail party for pre-wedding festivities. The colors and details on this dress are beautiful and unique. I felt beautiful and was very comfortable. I received a lot of compliments about the dress.

links_reviews_title: Great flowy casual to dressy dress
links_reviews_text: Great to go from day to night parties after dd's graduation. Dressy enough but casual and comfortable. Bust area is roomy and straps long so safety pins help. Good length, I'm 5'2 so long sometimes overwhelms but this one didn't.
Fit true to size. I only took off one star because the dress I received was missing one of the ties. The other was long enough that I was able to wrap it around and tie it so it looked fine.
Thought this dress was beyond colorful and fun. It was a tad big, but i made it work! I recommend it!
Wow! Love, love, love! So pretty and feminine I didn't need to wear a bra with it and it was not at all see through. The dress is full and so pretty when it moves!

I use a wheelchair, so the dress probably fits me a little different than the average person. It was a little loose in the straps, I'm not sure if it's the cut of the dress, or if I should have just gotten a size smaller. I had many compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: Nice Fabric - and way too much of it
links_reviews_text: The fabric was nice, but this was just big everywhere and completely shapeless on me. I have a pretty straight and narrow frame but am busty, and you couldn't even tell I had a bust at all in this. I could pull inches in fabric from around my waist, hips..everywhere. I'd order at least 1 if, not 2 sizes down!
Beautiful dress, flattering cut, vibrant colors -- great rental!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a holiday party for the husband's company.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, thick material so perfect for Winter, sexy fit.
The fit was tight, so I didn't need to wear a bra which made the back of the dress beautiful. It was an appropriate dress for a black tie optional wedding.
Thick fabric. I liked how it was lined...gave it structure.

The dress had no stretch to it so I probably could have gone with a size 6 even. It was hard to move in the dress. If I was standing up the entire evening the size 4 would have been perfect. I got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Easy and arrived two days before it was suppose to! This makes dress shopping so easy!
links_reviews_text: The fit is extremely flattering! It is a nice tight fit (so don't eat any burgers before wearing it haha) It was perfect for a winter wedding and surprisingly it was comfortable even though it was tight! LOVE LOVE LOVED IT
This dress was perfect for two holiday parties that we had. It fit beautifully and was very comfortable. I received a number of compliments on it! Highly recommend

links_reviews_title: Classy, slightly demure but with a twist!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. The color is beautiful and the weight of it was perfect for skimming over any "trouble spots". I wore a size larger than I intended to as my first choice was not available at the last minute. It was a bit loose but not bad- plenty of room in the arms and bust I wore this with a stick on bra that wouldn't show in the back. I did not want to send it back!

links_reviews_title: Not a great dress for petite people.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'1 and felt that this was too much dress for a short person. It went down to my shins.

The dress is a gorgeous deep green color. I could not get my arms in the 6 so I went with the 8, which was more comfortable to move around in overall. The 8 was not as form fitting so it sagged a little in the mid section. With the open back, I wore pasties. No support in the front of the dress.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my dad's wedding, which was a 40 degree day with an outdoor ceremony. I couldn't have asked for a better dress. It kept me warm, I got a ton of compliments. It was long. I loved it! It was loose but showed my shape. If I wanted it more form fitting I could have gone down a size but overall looked great. My sister and I rented the same dress, instead of buying expensive bridesmaid dresses. We are different shapes and heights but it looked perfect on both of us.

links_reviews_title: I went up in size but shouldn't really have
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a formal event with lots of older guests and wanted a more conservative look with a looser fit. I ordered a 4 but 2 would have been enough. The dress fabric is so thick, it will not inappropriately hug any part of your body. I found it to be unflattering because of the thickness and ended up wearing another dress, but I could have worn it in a pinch.

I am surprised by all the positive reviews on this dress. While the dress was quality and felt nice, it was incredibly unflattering. I sized up, per reviews, but the dress was so heavy and felt and looked like I was wearing a sack. I couldn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Everyone love the dress ask were they could find buy it told them rent the runway. Very fun dress.
links_reviews_text: Ture to the size so don't eat too much and fabric does not stretch. Not a dress to wear in the summer not very dreathable. The color I picked was a dark green very elegant perfect dress for a wedding .

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a March wedding in Michigan
links_reviews_text: This was a last minute substitution to a different dress but it was perfect! I wore it for 12 hours straight while wrangling 2 kids and it was so comfortable. The lace is heavy but I'm always cold. Biggest minus was that the buttons on my son's suit kept getting stuck in the lace. The dress was also looking rather worn and was fraying on the end of the sleeves. Otherwise highly recommend!

I loved this dress-- I wore to a formal wedding in February. It was a heavier material, so it was a great weight for that time of year. Honestly, I was a little warm dancing, but the lace sleeves gave me some room to breathe. I thought the dress was comfortable and although i thought the lace might be itchy-- it was not! And my favorite part was no bra!!! I read other comments so i took my chances (i ALWAYS wear a bra), but i felt supported and i didnt look like i was sagging! Yay! The color was stunning (my favorite color!) and was complimented on how pretty the dress was and how it complemented my (pale)skin/(blonde)hair/(green) eyes. Winner! Ps-- next time i'd wear spanx to hide my belly a bit. :)

The dress fit well, comfortable and fuss-free. I'm glad because i had to wear this dress all day, going to a Luncheon Fashion Show in the late morning in one city and then hopped on a plane to an Award Ceremony in another city. No time to change. The Flight Attendants even complemented me on the dress. It logged in over 600 miles that day! The 2 negatives 1) the back stole the show, but nothing was going on in the front. Its really plain in the front... 2) the bust was an awkward fit across front

links_reviews_title: I wore this for an Oct outside wedding in MD. I received so many compliments and felt stunning in it
links_reviews_text: This dress is true to size. I'm 5'3", 140, 34D. It fit like a glove and I was able to wear this dress without a bra and it still felt appropriate and snug (in a good way). The dress is a bit heavy and for me the sleeves were a bit long, but neither of those things bothered me. The dress is even more ornate than the pictures show. I paired it was matte black heals and a black/purple/green sparkly clutch.
Beautiful dress!

This dress was great! I am 5 months postpartum and wore it with Spanx. It was form fitting enough but comfortable to move and dance in. I couldn't find a nubra in my cupsize so I went without a bra and I don't think it was noticeable. I felt that it would have been nice to have a little more room in the armpit area but they may have been due to my long arms. The color was beautiful and I got lots of compliments. This was my second rent the runway rental and I'm a believer.

links_reviews_title: This dress was everything I expected - great layers, knee length and sleeves for a cool fall evening
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately, the 6 I ordered had some torn lace on the sleeve so I wore the backup 8, but still, with all the layers this dress had, it was perfect for sitting all evening at a dinner event. My only complaint with this dress was that the outer layer of lace appeared to be stretched and sagged a little in the chest area, presumably from others with larger busts.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and conservative dress for work gala
links_reviews_text: This dress was really beautiful - intricate details. The pictures don't do it justice. Definitely can't wear a bra with the back of the dress. The dress is a little heavy but kept me warm in the Chicago winter.

links_reviews_title: Elegant look for a fall wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress came as the backup style after my original choice was unavailable. I was pretty bummed that I didn't get to wear my first pick, but I ended up really liking this look. The fabric itself is gorgeous, and the heavy weight of the lace was great for a November wedding. The sleeves hit just the right spot on my wrists, the length was good, and I liked how it fit around my waist and hips. The fit on top was a little less great since I have a small chest and somewhat broad shoulders. This style doesn't really allow for a bra or other padding, so the fabric was a bit loose around the chest (though thick enough to provide coverage). The shoulders were a little snug, too, so I couldn't really raise my arms above my head while dancing, but I think I would have had that issue with any long-sleeved dress. Overall, I loved how it looked, but wish I could have worn a style with a little more movement to it.

I wore this to a friend's courthouse wedding and casual reception. I was looking for something that respected the formality of the affair without being too over the top. This dress was perfect. I got a million compliments. The color and texture make the dress unique. It fits pretty true to size - I am usually a size 4 in dresses, this one is body hugging which usually makes me size up to a 6, but this dress fit fine in the 4. One note would be that if you tend to carry your weight in your butt/thighs, this can definitely get a bit tight after hours of wear so wear spandex or something to keep your legs from becoming chafe city.
Loved this dress, perfect fit, comfortable, and so classy! Compliments galore from men and women alike, and the only thing I wish was that it was mine!
It was fitted, but very loose on my hips and waist. I wore it because the color and material were absolutely beautiful !

Wore this for a formal office holiday party. Once of my favorite RTR dresses of all time! It was modest in the front with a sexy open back! Fit like a glove. The lace details are even better in person. Danced all night! Got tons of compliments. Would totally recommend.

links_reviews_title: Wore to partner's christmas work party
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress but I think it would have been better to wear to church for Christmas. My partner was a little underwhelmed with it which is never the reaction you hope for as a woman. I think it looked sensible and reserved though which is great if you're not wanting to be the person who is talked about for wearing something inappropriate.

Absolutely gorgeous dress, the multiple layers of lace create an effect that just has to be seen in person. The dress is heavier than it appears, which makes it perfect for late winter early spring nights

links_reviews_title: Flattering fit and exceptional lace detail
links_reviews_text: I originally rented this dress for a wedding, but I had a death in my family a few days before, so I ended up wearing this to a funeral instead. It ended up being the perfect dress for this unlikely event and I'm so glad I still got to wear it given the circumstances. I normally am a size 4 however I couldn't get the zipper closed up around my rib cage so I went with the 6 and it fit perfectly. So sad I had to send this dress back!!

Thick heavy fabric, very warm. Slight stretch and very structured. No Bra friendly even to those with Large busts. Intricate back detail that I really loved. Hem hits just below knee. I am 5'5 and wore 3.5 in heels. Perfect for a conservative work event, or wedding. Well made. Go one size up for backup.

Having just had a baby 2.5 months ago, I needed a dress that actually FIT me (thanks, RTR!). This was a 2nd choice dress but quickly became my favorite. Wore it to a winter wedding a week before Christmas. I'm tall and have hips, so was relieved to find a dress that accentuated all the right spots without hugging too tightly. The lace is stunning, but a little stiff up top. I found the fit on the bottom more flattering than the fit in the arms. I was grateful, though, for the long sleeves in icy weather! Keep in mind -- it's near impossible to wear a bra with this dress. I'm a 38C and felt a little self conscious about the girls being free range. Got plenty of compliments.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments, loved the color, perfect fit!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit no negatives to comment

I am about 5'4'' and weigh around 116. This dress fit me perfectly. I was a afraid of how it would fit me, being that I am very skinny with a little curve in the hip area. The dress has NO stretch, so be mindful of that. The material is nice and heavy, which made me feel comfortable in this Fall weather. I would definitely rent again!

Got this dress as a back up and ended up wearing it to a wedding because it was a chilly evening. As soon as I walked into the reception people were complimenting me on this dress! The photographer stopped me twice and said how classic and elegant this dress was. Super comfy and hated to send it back! Loved the dark green color as well!

The lace dress is a bit heavy, but was perfect for an October wedding at a vineyard. The dress looks somewhat conservative from the front, but the back has a sheer material on the upper half of the back. It's a great detail that I really appreciated and made me feel really sexy. I got the 8 and 10 and wore the 8 which fit perfectly. Because of the rather open back, I decided to not wear a bra and it worked well (I'm a 34DD, 152lbs, 5'6" usual dress size is an 8). Overall, the dress can be accessorized for a wedding, holiday party, or a night out. The lace didn't feel scratchy.

This dress has a slim fit so even though many of clothing is size 6 with tops a 6 or 8 this dress fit perfectly in the 8. The color was beautiful, it stood out in an understated way against all if the black dresses in the room.

I rented this for a "Princess Kate"/royal family themed party. I definitely felt like I channeled Kate in this dress! It's subdued but still sexy with the sheer back and the fit. But the long sleeves and high neck make it family friendly or work party appropriate too. The green is gorgeous and the lace/leaf pattern is so intricate and pretty. Thinking about renting it again for a wedding this fall!

I rented this thinking it would be a great dress for a benefit we are to attend. I loved the pattern detail of the flowers I. The pictures. When I got the dress I was much less impressed. It runs at least 1 size too small... if not more. It's very tight in the shoulders arms and back.
The lace was very nice, not itchy, the open back and sleeves as a little skin to the dress but it is long enough to wear any help you want. Easy to zip, even on your own

Wore this for my partners work holiday party and felt great - conservative but a sexy back and fitted body so still felt fun. Kept me warm most of the night. The fit was perfect. Would highly recommend and wear again!
I had to fix the hem to make this wearable...but still very pretty dress!
Flattering. Runs small. Hard to zip around ribcage, as people have shared. So many compliments. Elegant/classy and work-appropriate. Would rent again.

Warning: I could not get it to zip in the evening when I tried it on, but managed to squeeze myself into in the morning when I hadn't eaten anything. The 2 was TIGHT around my ribcage. But totally worth it because this dress is FAB and worth being squozen all day! It was awesome for work without being TOO fancy, and great for a date. I loved it.

links_reviews_title: Really cute but kind of meh at the same time
links_reviews_text: The top is tight and very restricting while the middle is looser. The hem is also doing something weird at the bottom of the skirt. Got compliments but spent the day trying not to think about how restricting it was.

This dress was amazing! Everyone thought it was a top with a skirt which made it more unique. I got this in a 4 and it fit well in the chest area but was a little loose in the torso. I think if i got this in a 2, it would be way too tight. If you have a bigger bust, I'd size up!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! I’m size 0 108 & XS fit perfect
links_reviews_text: Only issue the zipper is terrible and constantly gets stuck
It's a pretty dress. There was a hole in the lace of one of the arms. I doctored it up with similar color thread. The waist is tight and it was hard to zipper. I should have gotten one size larger.

links_reviews_title: So flattering but crushed my rib cage. I would still rent again. Haha.
links_reviews_text: So many complements. This dress is tight in area under your breasts and above your waist. That tightness makes you look slimmer! It's very flattering. But in the process it is a little uncomfortable for me. If I sized up I worry the rest of the top would not fit as well.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for dressy work or a party
links_reviews_text: I am a lawyer. I wore this to court and received several compliments. It's on the dressy dude but not over the top. It was flattering and I loved the color.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely stunning and appropriate for work!
links_reviews_text: I would say the stress is true to size, I am between an eight and a six, after reading the reviews I decided to go with the six it's a little snug in the lower chest area but I believe an eight would've been too baggy so I'm glad I went with the six, The lace detail and the high collared area is what makes this dress amazing. The skirt is lined and is made of thick material helping to even out any unwanted bumps!

Got so many compliments today. Everyone loved the way it looked on it. I am usually size 10-12 depending on designer. But from the reviews I decided on renting 14 and I am glad I did. Net work is so delicate, you do need some room around. It wasn't too loose or right. Just perfect. I love the neck style too. It didn't bother me at all. I will be renting this again for sure ;)

links_reviews_title: Stunner but runs a bit small, zipper caught constantly, very striking on top; bottom poofs up.
links_reviews_text: Stunner but runs a bit small, zipper caught constantly, very striking on top; bottom poofs up.

This is my favorite dress I've rented from RTR. If it didn't cost 300+ to buy it, I would buy it. I will definitely rent it again. It's comfy, substantial, great length, and has pretty lace detail. Love love love it.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for the business event I attended. Professional but not boring!
links_reviews_text: The top of the dress fit me perfectly, but I do agree with some of the other reviewers that the bottom of the dress could have been slightly more fitted. It was comfortable to have the extra room though! I also could see how the lacy material could be itchy, but I was relieved that it did not bother me. The dress is not lightweight, so I wouldn't suggest for the summer.
Based on others reviews I sized up and the larger size fit. Im petite and short so the length was long on me. I wore to the office.

links_reviews_title: Always grateful for dresses with sleeves
links_reviews_text: More or less TTS, almost a little large. I'm usually a 4/6 and the 4 worked fine. Quite pretty and very flattering when worn.

Fit nicely, am usually beyween a 4/6, but this 6 was snug. It would be lovely for a night out as there is some sparkle in the top part, but putting on a blazer and black knit tights underneath made it work in a professional setting. Fabric is high quality and comfortable.
Loved this. Many believed it was a two piece. Very circa Mad Men! Only issue was it seemed bigger on top for me. I went w/10, but always have issues with my less than larger boobs :)
This is a stunning dress! Tons of compliments and just a very sophisticated fit and style. Would highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Too sparkly for work and it runs small. Size up.
links_reviews_text: The green fabric on this dress has a very pretty sparkle, but it's way too formal for my work setting. Would be better for a cocktail party or wedding. The fit of the dress is abnormally small in the chest, shoulders and waist. The skirt fit pretty well for a 2, though. I suggest sizing up - the skirt is stretchy enough that it will lay nicely, even if it's a little big. The color is very nice, just not what I expected.

links_reviews_title: Favorite dress I've rented so far!
links_reviews_text: I rented a 6 in this and it was the most gorgeous comfortable dress. I always size up with RTR just in case it runs small, and this one was on the looser side. It looks amazing on with the lace top and cotton bottom. Very classy!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my interview! Elegant, professional, beautiful and still conservative.
links_reviews_text: The only warning I would give is that there is a slit up the back so keep that in mind when using spanks lol

I loved wearing this dress. It was beautiful and made me feel A-mazing. A few things worth noting : 1. The lace is itchy. If comfort is your thing, this may not be for you. 2. I'm short and this dress hit a bit past my knee. It could have the tendency to swallow you but high heels help balance the look. 3. If you waiver between sizes, size up. My back and shoulders are slightly broad and this dress was super snug, and at times uncomfortable. For me sizing up would not have worked because this fit perfect from the waist down. 4. The lace has a shimmer to it. Fine for me but some may feel this is too dressy for work. Great dress overall!

This might be one of my favorite rentals of all time!! If I could, I would give this 10 stars! This was classy, but far from boring. It was comfortable and the fit was perfect. It ran very true to size. I tend to have broad shoulders and I did not feel constricted or suffocated in this top. The green lace did not have any stretch, but the skirt portion did. A regular bra could absolutely be worn. No need for special panties either. (Might just want to make sure they are smooth to avoid any panty lines) I did not want to give this back! 100% renting again!
The hem is coming undone in front, likely from repeated wear. Otherwise a beautiful dress

links_reviews_title: Received lots of compliments on the color and fit
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. The top part fits very nicely and is not very stretchy. The bottom part does have a little stretch, so you don't feel uncomfortable when sitting down. The length is very appropriate for work events. Because of the thicker material, I did not have to wear a bra. Very nice!

links_reviews_title: Such a gorgeous dress but needed to size up
links_reviews_text: I rented a four but couldn't zip it up. So disappointed. The lace is beautiful and the entire garment is so well constructed and feels so luxurious. Not apparent in the model photo...the lace has a silver sparkle so more of a cocktail dress than a work dress.
Fits well true to Size

links_reviews_title: Small around waist; true to size in skirt
links_reviews_text: This dress has a beautiful lace top with shimmer of gold, which some may find too dressy for work. Had a lot of trouble getting zipper over waist belt area. Not do to size, but thickness of fabric.
Wore this to work with a blazer, then to an after-work event on its own. Really pretty color and lace, got numerous compliments. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Really cute work dress but runs small!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress but it definitely runs small. Zipper was also really hard to use.

This one definitely looks better in person than I expected. Structured top but the bottom has a little stretch. Perfect for fall office days/work meetings. Also paired well with tights. Would rent again.
I didn't end up wearing this dress. I rented multiple for a wedding and didn't pick this one. But fairly comfortable, good fit and amazing quality!
This lace is gorgeous in person and this dress is very flattering.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a job interview and although it was a little too fancy for that, it's gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 10 but it wasn't available so I went with the 12, it was pretty loose but I was still able to wear it. The fabric is beautiful and the dress overall is stunning, would definitely rent this again. It was really comfortable, but still eye catching.

Not sure if sizing up would help but this dress has a sewn on detail around the waist that was difficult for the zipper to go up or down. I did get it to work and it was great from there. The fabric is nice and the lace was great, not as delicate as I thought it would be which was a plus for me. Overall good find on RTR

links_reviews_title: Nice quality garment, but didn't fit my body type.
links_reviews_text: Nice quality garment, but didn't fit my body type. While my breasts fit in this garment, it just didn't look that flattering with the very high neck....looked a bit too much like a uni-boob.
The lace is pretty, I received compliments, but it was a bit itchy.
I loved this dress. I will definitely rent it again.

Fit beautifully. Delicate ruffles are the perfect amount of embellishment. It ended up being a cold night so I wore with black tights and black booties and it looked great. Comfortable and flattering. The shoulder situation is a little weird with bunching but because the dress has personality it doesn't look strange.
I am usually an 8/10 and I got a 6 in this dress listening to previous reviews but I could have gone with an 8. Great movement and comfortable to wear, masks the tummy area very well too!
Great dress for a black tie wedding! Glamorous and perfect for dancing!
Runs true to size, one of the most comfortable dresses I've worn! Very flattering, conservative, yet flirty.

links_reviews_title: The dress was really chic and comfortable ,
links_reviews_text: It ran a litttle large so you may want to size down. Its perfect for curvey girls.
LOVED IT FOR A WEDDING
fits large, better on a taller frame.
I wore it to a cocktail party in Santa Monica. It's more nicely, it looked expensive and everybody commented how pretty the dress was

links_reviews_title: I'm just not made for dresses.
links_reviews_text: I'm just not made for dresses. I'm 5'9" and those couple inches taller than average affects the way a dress fits.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but wrong cut for me
links_reviews_text: It fit but it wasn't flattering on me - too much fabric for a short not skinny person
Narrow in the shoulders.
worked great but shoulder were wider than expected.

links_reviews_title: Classy, comfortable and just my style.. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: I think I could have gotten a smaller size on this dress, as it does have an elastie waist and is pretty roomy, but it was still very flattering and comfortable. I absolutely love the high neckline, with the ruffle and the sheer top is just lovely. I wore a strapless bra, which worked well, along with some contrasting stockings and leather booties, which made it a bit more modern looking, but also tried it with a pair of miu miu bow peep toes, which made it look very classic 40s. I felt like Veronica Lake and got lots of compliments. this dress would look great on so many body types, and is really nicely made and easy to wear. I do recommend sizing down one size. The only thing that I didnt like was that the seam on the shoulder falls below my shoulder and when my hair was up, it made my shoulders look quite broad.. Otherwise, super LOVED IT and would rent again!
The fit is spot on but the dress looked matronly. Did not wear

links_reviews_title: Flattering, but you can go a size smaller.
links_reviews_text: I went with the largest size bc i wanted to wear this for Thanksgiving and I didn't know if it would be tight or restrictive. Turns out the waist is elastic and the fit is very loose and casual- you may want size down. It was super flattering in photos and got a lot of compliments. I styled it with black d'orsay flats, a gold clutch and statement earrings. It's a versatile dress- would be easy to dress up or down.
Fits well, great style, wore with black pantyhose and silver heels.

I loved this dress! Usually go between a 6 and 8, the 6 fit perfect for this. Very chic and a little different. Wore it to an evening fall wedding. Loved the fit and got lots of compliments. Would definitely rent again!
Made me look rather frumpy as I am not too tall (5'4"), and did not have much flare in the skirt.
Fits true to size and GREAT for taller frames!

links_reviews_title: It looks better in the pictures.
links_reviews_text: It runs a little large, it was too roomy for me

This dress is wonderfully made in terms of fabric quality. But no matter what I did, it looked too gothic and Adams Family like on me - not at all how the dress looks on the model. Also, it runs large. I normally wear a size 10 or 12 if fitted and the 8 in this fit well. I rented this for an event that I was emceeing, but wore something else.
The dress was true to size. I felt comfortable throughout the Worship Service. The material is thin.

This dress runs true to size/ large. It looks prettier on the model. The dress ended at my knees. It's a very light/ airy dress. There's a light lining underneath. The sleeves didn't hit my wrist but the elastic allowed it to stay above my elbows making it more puffy/ flowy around the elbows. I'm usually a size 6 but fit in a size 4 and it was still comfy. The ruffle at the waist does make any belly fat look minimally bigger since the ruffle flows over when you're looking down at it but it visually disguises any slight belly you may have since it looks like it's just part of the ruffle from an observer's perspective.

Must-have for taller ladies! This See by Chloe dress is super flattering and made for a easy work outfit! Running true to size, we recommend going one size up for backup, as the fabric has no stretch. If you are smaller-framed or wear petite sizes, you may want to size down as this can run long and may run a big large on smaller frames. This dress is great for any bust size and falls straight at the waist and hips. The sleeves are fitted around the wrists and I loved how this made the dress stand out! At 5’6”, this hit just about the knee for me and I would recommend pairing with a colorful statement purse and black heels for a simple, go-to work outfit.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress. I actually wore it for a funeral.
links_reviews_text: The dress is definitely designed for tall ladies. I’m only 5’ and the sheer layer on the chest dropped. Looked messy. I’m sure it would look great on someone taller!
Waistband was too high. Much prettier on model than real person.
Cute dress true to size! Definitely more pink than red. On the shorter side and can't wear a bra but you don't really need one with that fabric. Such a fun party dress and very flattering!

links_reviews_title: Not a flattering fit for a petite figure
links_reviews_text: First of this dress is a hot pink, not red. It's looked red on my phone. But the color is so pretty! The top half of the dress was great but the bottom was not proportioned right for my body type. The bubbly fit made me look large and the waist didn't hit me in the correct place. I think if I was a little taller if would have been a better fit for me.
Good for a mother of the bride dress I think. For me, not flattering at all. Somehow was both too big and made me too wide at the same time. Not for my body type

links_reviews_title: It is adorable and so comfortable! I wanted to keep it!
links_reviews_text: It took a little maneuvering to get over my butt and hips but I have a small waist so I couldn't go any larger. Once it was on it was perfect! The back is beautiful and you don't have to wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: Slightly loose in the waist which made me look wide. Solved problem with a belt.
links_reviews_text: Fun and flirty. Lots of compliments. Pretty feminine lace.
It fit just a little snug. And no stretch, but it look great.
Fits perfectly. Tight at top and not so tight around bottom that it's uncomfortable. Very flattering. Got a lot of comments on it! Fabric is comfortable and easy to move in!
Classy enough for my bridal shower but modern enough to be a little sexy.

I rented this for my engagement party and it was great! The slit is pretty high but it's a good mix of minimalist and sexy. It wasn't as white as I thought it would be and more of a gray undertone but none the less fit pretty well. It was a little big in the waist so a smaller size might have been better but I didn't have one. Either way I would rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for our rehearsal dinner!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect and true to size!! Very flattering if you want a fitted dress!! I am 5'6 and it was a perfect length
Fit like a glove! So many compliments all night. Material is comfortable and very forgiving. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, really cute style, received many compliments
links_reviews_text: The dress was true to size. Felt great in it and very comfortable. Subtle designs like the cutout beneath the chest and the high slit made the dress.
Would have worn the 4 but it was unavailable to be shipped. The 6 fit my bust but was too loose in the waist and behind.
The quality was on point with what I come to expect from RTR. This dress was very chic and classy!

I really liked this dress. I should have ordered one size up just to be more comfortable since the dress is tight but overall it was great. It looks so elegant with a minimum effort. Absolutely recommendable for any party or special dinner.
Comfortable & flattering. Sexy in all the right places!

links_reviews_title: Nice fit, a little tight on belly
links_reviews_text: Vacay white party

I got this a a backup dress, and I'm so glad I did. I was a bit worried about the size 2 not fitting my hips, but it was just tight enough where it wasn't riding up all day. I had to wear a stick-on bra, because any "real" bra made it too tight in the chest.
Small around the hips. Rent an 8 if you are pear shaped and normally wear a 6

I was super excited to get this dress - they didn't have my size which is a 6 so I opted for an 8. I was just eh, comfortable, not too tight, and really pretty while standing. Sitting in this dress is SUPER uncomfortable - the slit reveals a little too much when sitting down so just be cautious of that. The dress has a tendency to shift and the cut out in the middle kept sliding to the left.

links_reviews_title: Loved so much I bought it! Perfect as the bride for my rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this dress! Perfect amount of sexy but classy for my rehearsal dinner. Felt gorgeous in this!

links_reviews_title: Show stopper. Classy and just enough sass!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! I wore it for my bridal shower and did not stop receiving compliments. The dress was extremely comfy and was true to the size. I did not have to wear spanx under the dress as I thought I would have to from the other reviews. The dress was also stretchy. I would recommend this dress to anyone! I still get compliments on it!

I rented a bunch of white dresses for my rehearsal dinner, and this one is the only one that fit! I didn't expect to lose as much weight as I did, so I'm glad I got at least one size 4! Regardless of other choices, this dress was pretty perfect. I really liked the cutout. I did have to wear a racer back bra, but not spanx! Love it, would rent again.

I rented this for my wedding ceremony at the courthouse. I love the details. I was at my heaviest and very curvy when I rented this so I didn't love how it hugged my body. I was hoping the 12 would give me a little extra room, but it was snug (which is how it's supposed to be). Would recommend a size up as your back up size.

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit a little tight... I am normally a 14 but I did feel like it was a little hard to zip. Loved the look of it...felt classy and put together. The ONLY thing....there were a couple of stains on it near the bottom (almost looked like food coloring) and it was wrinkled like crazy when I got it. Had to take about 40 mins to iron it so that it was presentable. Otherwise, 5 Stars.

links_reviews_title: Great dress just not for my rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress, it was flattering and comfortable and fit true to size. I ended up choosing a different dress for my rehearsal dinner though, it just felt too 'corporate', despite the cutout for my event.
This dress fit like a glove. I would have bought it if it wasn't dirty and overworn.
I rented this dress for a black and white themed wedding and it was beautiful. I felt super elegant and classy and received so many compliments on it.
Wore a size 2, I am 5'5, 112lb Loved it! So many compliments!
It's a great dress, nice thick fabric and good quality. Very basic though, nothing stand out about it but classy. The color is less white but more off white/gray after many wears.

This dress was beautiful sexy and comfortable. I felt great in it. I didn't have a problem with the slit until I sat down to open gifts. I just placed a napkin on my lap while seated. The cut out was flattering but not revealing. The skirt was a little baggy but I ended up liking it since the top is fitted. I recommend for a shower or rehearsal dinner !

This was a cute & fun dress to wear! I originally ordered size 10 but it was kinda tight and wouldn't have been comfortable to dance in, so I ordered size 12 and it fit a lot better. I have thick thighs, hips and booty! So I would suggest sizing up if you're blessed like I am! :-) Also, the bigger size didn't make the split too high as well. The only issue with this dress is that it's not a bright white. I wore this to an all white wedding and I wish the color was a little more brighter.

links_reviews_title: I had a white party to celebrate my 50th birthday. I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The bottom of the dress fit perfect. However, I have broad shoulder and wear a DD bra so the top was a little uncomfortable. I am 5'6 and weigh 165 lbs. so the size 8 was a little snug.
Pretty dress, wish it was white...luckily it was a bonfire party so it was hard to tell. It's form fitting bur stretchy and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my bridesmaids luncheon. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'5, 130lbs, and muscular through butt and legs. I thought this dress was a great fit and perfect for a bride.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for our couples bridal shower and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: This dress it true to size, comfortable and flaterring. It was perfect for this occasion and I highly recommend!

I wasn't sure if this dress would be a good fit for my bridal shower, but I am SO glad I decided to rent this. It was the perfect amount of sexy and classy and received lots of compliments throughout the day. Very comfy, and the cutout hits just in the right place. One thing to note is that if you plan on wearing this to your shower and will be sitting down opening gifts in front of everyone, the slits goes up pretty high when your seated :)

links_reviews_title: Perfect White Dress for Weddinf Activities!
links_reviews_text: Rented it for my wedding shower and it was perfect! Friends wouldnt stop complimenting it. Fit true to size. Would rent again!

I ordered the 4 and 6. The 6 worked best for me as the 4 was snug in all the wrong places. It had just the right amout of stretch but not bodycon stretch. This dress is more flattering if you have curves. I will be renting again for another white event. Dress was not a true white though. Thanks RTR

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and great quality, but just didn't work
links_reviews_text: I wish I could have worn this sexy and well made dress! The off-white color even worked with my fair skin. I'm kind of oddly proportioned, so this just didn't work on me. The 10 fit on top but was too snug in the hips, and the 12 was too loose in the top which makes the cutout look weird. The torso fit was too long for me- which is weird, since I also have a long torso. Just taking this selfie for my boyfriend took a lot of twisting and standing a certain way, so I know I would have been tugging and adjusting this dress all night. I say this one is worth trying for, but pick a backup style that's a safe fallback.
I wore this for my rehearsal dinner. Though this wasn't my first choice, the dress fit really well and I received tons of compliments on it all night.
Wore to xmas party! Dressed it down with cardi but i did not want to take this dress off! Love it

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a holiday work party. It was classy with just enough sexiness.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great. True to size. The dress is simple but elegant. The only con was the slit up the side when sitting can appear a little provocative. I'm 5'7", 160lbs with an hourglass shape/athletic build and 34DDD bust.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering dress - just wish it was a bright white
links_reviews_text: What a flattering and sexy dress! I love this cut. I feel this dress runs true to size. I just wish that it was bright white and not the dingy greyish beige color that I recieved.
It fit true to size and hugged in the right places. I got many compliments that night!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my wedding rehearsal and received so many compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: Pros: stretchy fabric, comfy, cute cut out!! Cons: ran a little large, I'm normally a size 6 & like to order my back up in the size up, but I'm wishing I had ordered a size down.

Took this dress on a 12 day cruise in Japan. Wore to dinner a couple of times. I usually wear a 4 and this dress in a 2 was a little snug but the beauty of a knit wrap dress is flexibility. The fabric and style were forgiving. I loved it. Travels well. Never needed ironing.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous classic DFV wrap dress and the colors were perfect for my Caribbean vacation!!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs big... well at least for me it did. I had to keep tying and adjusting it all night. Had I gone with the 4long I don't think I would have had this issue. Nonetheless this dress was gorgeous and the colors for were stunning for my Caribbean vacation! I wore a Victoria's Secret body by VS push up bra with this dress. Ladies do keep in mind this is a wrap dress and how you sit/ cross your legs will open the wrap dress from the bottom especially if your someplace extra windy, like a beach for example. This dress looks beautiful in wind but too much wind and everyone else will see all your goodies. Also keep in mind ordering the long bs the regular. I'm 5'6 1/2 and I order the long vs the regular. I didn't find it long at all. In fact I wished it had been a little longer since i opted to wear espadrilles

I originally wore this dress for my brother and sister in law's dress rehearsal. I loved it & realized I didn't end up taking any photos in it because my 5 year old fell asleep on me at dinner! I rented this again for family pictures and it was so comfortable and flattering on me!! I had to pin one spot where the dress crosses at the chest so that my boobs didn't hang out but otherwise this is a fun, unique dress!

It fits great being a wrap. It had a stain on the skirt but you couldn't tell with the bold pattern. I loved this dress. I felt so stylish and bold. Would like to buy it or another dvf dress. I got so many comments. It is modest but also really sexy. There is a big slit and the top is low cut.
Beautiful dress... Definitely figure flattering and the material was nice and thick but flexible. My only issue was length. I'm 5'2 and even in heels it dragged

I was very happy to rent this, as I think wrap dresses are beautiful but annoying. This one had a great, thicker fabric so it was perfect for a fall wine tasting. You can't tell in the picture but I styled it with a navy cami and a dangly silver necklace, with black, high-heeled booties (it was still long on me!).
I found this dress to be very flattering! From the photos I expected more of a knit type of fabric and was surprised it was jersey. I'm 5'2" and did not find it to be too long with modest heels.

I love dresses that look nice, don't wrinkle, and are easy to slip on and off. This hit all the boxes. I wish it were a little longer, as I couldn't have worn any sort of heel, but it was fine with flats walking around. Horizontal lines usually don't do me any favors, but this one wasn't bad since it was longer.

Everything about this dress was great but you have to wear heels if you don't want it to drag. I'm about 5'6 /5'7 and it was very long on me. I wore this for a normal day so I didn't want to put heels on.
Was an easy and comfortable dress to wear .

This dress was perfect for our trip to Napa! I have a large bust and while I can generally fit an 8 around the waist, I sized up to a 10 for the bust. It worked out perfectly as it was able to flatter my bust while wrapping nicely through the waist. It was comfortable all day. My only issue was that when it got windy, I had to hold the skirt closed. But no big deal. I've gotten many compliments and would definitely rent again!

I LOVED this dress. I wore from work to dinner. The wrap is so flattering and although I had to pin the chest, it fit everywhere else perfectly. I was able to go with the 0 due to the wrap and this worked great for the length as I am only 5'1 and the dress did not drag. Also - the material was SO comfortable I didn't want to get out of it!! The slit from the wrap also can make it feel a bit fancier. Another great DVF piece

links_reviews_title: Nice patterns but a fidgety dress
links_reviews_text: I liked how unique the pattern was but the dress is made for someone who is 5’10 or for my height, wants to wear 5 inch heels. I am 5’4 and wore an inch and a half wedge and the dress was dragging on the ground. No matter how much body tape I put on, the top kept sliding off and showing my bra, which I found annoying.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful maxi wrap dress, loved it.
links_reviews_text: Rented the dress for the baby shower, it was great. Fits perfect, the parent looks great, comfortable to wear, the material is soft. Definitely recommend.

Gorgeous wrap dress- usually have a got problem with DVF wrap dresses but this fit perfectly in my chest (small chested). Gave me all the right curves and got many compliments. Although I am a short, this dress was VERY long and even with 5 inch heels was still tripping over it
I liked it, but felt it was a little matronly. Also, the bust area on my dress was stretched out and didn't lay flat. Some gapping created an unflattering fit.

I love wrap dresses and this one didn't disappoint! It was comfortable and the pattern is gorgeous. I loved the tie waist because it gave my small frame some shape. The quality was just incredible too. I wish it came in other colors! I would definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: I read this for my birthday weekend. Wore it to Jazz in the park. Very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: The fit was fantastic. I think it would be appropriate for someone with the smaller chest or a slightly fuller bust.

This was an awesome rental. I actually don't think the pic does it justice- this dress is so pretty in person and clearly designed to fit a woman's body will. I wore it every day for a week straight! I would rent it again but I think everyone I know saw it already! Highly recommended!

links_reviews_title: The dress was so comfortable, which made it easy to enjoy my time at the wedding!
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect; nice airy fabric that was great for a summer, outdoor wedding. The quintessential DFV wrap dress was as amazing as you would expect!

Perfect dress for my body type. Material was perfect for an outdoor summer wedding. It was hit. Dress was comfortable and I had no problems dancing. I wore a regular bra and had no trouble with the plunging neckline. If you are busty I suggest fashion tape. Tons of compliments!
I had so many compliments wearing this dress. Looking into buying one to keep

links_reviews_title: Way more sexy than you'd expect
links_reviews_text: I didn't think I'd love this as much as I do. I'm a 32 DD so I have to be mindful all day of the cleavage. When you walk, you catch glimpses pretty high up your leg. I got some very sweet compliments and was hit on several times today. For a more conservative girl, I'd say maybe not for work. For me, definitely! Lol. Side note, I'm 5'7" and no way with flats. I wear 5" heels though so it was fine.

Classic DVF wrap dress with nice shape (great for hourglass figures). Be aware that the slit can be high -- especially if you walk fast like I do. Also, the top can have too much plunge -- can can easily solved with a cami or bandeau. The jersey fabric is light, but not flimsy. Fabric pattern was bright and fun. Will definitely rent again. I wore with the Marni Accessories Emerald Flower necklace -- worked really well together.

links_reviews_title: I ordered this dress for my birthday and loved it so much! Hopefully it's around to order again.
links_reviews_text: Great fabric, clingy but still comfortable. Only con the slit be cautious when walking.

What a fun dress! Between the stretchy material and colorful pattern it would be very flattering for most body types. You do need to be careful with the wrap closure of the dress and would possibly even suggest wearing a half slip. I could see this worn at a variety of events such a bridal shower, weekend BBQ, or even out to dinner! The light weight jersey material makes it great for Spring, Summer, and even Fall with a jacket!

links_reviews_title: Seemed small and skirt flies open
links_reviews_text: This wrap dress didn't wrap enough for me. The bust seemed small and the skirt flew open when I walked and exposed way too much upper leg. Heavier material makes this a great transition piece or summer nights piece. Pattern was great. Unfortunately I couldn't get past the fit on my curvy usually size 4 body.
