The dress it's self was beautiful. Very comfortable and the fabric/print was great quality. My only caution is to anyone that has a large chest. 110% would need a tank top or brake the underneath. I'm a DD and I had major cleavage in the dress. Perfect for a date night, but not if you are trying to be conservative.

I wore this to a bridal shower & it was a huge hit. I received so many compliments! It was comfortable and I felt really confident. I am very small chested, so it was not a concern for me, but it IS a very low cut dress. The slit in the front where it wraps is also pretty high, so it could be more revealing if you're not careful. I didn't want to return this dress- would highly recommend it!

I rented this dress to wear to church but my husband says it's way too sexy for church. It hugged my curves in the right places. Wore it to a ladies movie night and got tons of compliments. It swoops open in the front exposing a bit of leg which made perching on a stool more difficult but finally I just gave up and let my leg hang out. I was squatting down in the photo; I am 5'9 and had on 4 inch wedges.

The dress was a pretty and vibrant color. I wasn't a huge fan of the fit... The top and bottoms opened up a lot. I wore it to work and kept readjusting to not be exposed when i sat. I felt like by my belly wasn't the most flattering either in it. Very pretty but i dont think id rent again.
Nice material, and great fit- only thing to note is the slit it creates is pretty big and open unless you tie it really well! It's such pretty colors though I loved it!
Loved this dress however it's a little to long for my 5,4 unless I wore heels. Absolutely loved the color and quality though.

This dress is one of my favorites that I've rented here. I think I was the first person to wear mine since the tags were still attached. It was much longer than the other regular length dresses I've rented, so I think it hadn't been hemmed yet. That was okay, I just wore platforms. I'm 5'5 and I had to wear 5 inch heels to get it off the ground. The dress was very comfortable and flattering.
So pretty and definitely stood out!

I thought it was a knit dress (like a Missoni looking Maxi). It's not. It's a flat material with a print on it. I didn't wear it as a result. Fit is great though. I do recommend it if you like pattern.
I did nit wear because its Feb and I feel this is more of a summer dress. Great DVF wrap fit. Would consider renting again in late spring/summer.

Runs big. I was hoping because you could tie it I would be able to make it smaller and that didn't work. The fabric slid a bit. It also was super long so short girls watch out. The dress was super pretty. Lots of compliments though.

links_reviews_title: More a cover-up wrap than a dress.
links_reviews_text: Ran small in the waist/bottom half while bagging in the bust. I usually wear a 6-8, and the skirt didn't even fully wrap from hip around the other hip for me. Didn't end up wearing.

links_reviews_title: very flattering for any shape and size.
links_reviews_text: loved it, but the belt kept untieing

links_reviews_title: Rented for my sisters bridal shower and got many compliments !
links_reviews_text: Overall true to size. I have long arms so the sleeves could've been slightly longer but I would rent again. The backless detail is cute but requires no bra or sticky bra.

This dress's details are much nicer in person. It's a pretty color and the open back is a pop of fun. Can't wear a bra because of the back but you really don't need to. I wore it for an early evening event and easily went to night. I'm always worried about length but this length was appropriate and flirty. I'm 5'4 and 115 pounds.

Wore this for my sisters bridal shower and it went sooo well. The dress seems a little short but there was not one time where I almost flashed anyone. I have a larger chest and didn’t need to wear a bra or anything underneath even though there was no support inside. The neckline also wasn’t too deep. Super cute and high quality dress that I got endless compliments on and totally recommend!

links_reviews_title: Lacey floral dream with statement sleeves & open back!
links_reviews_text: Girly with a 70's edge because of the retro bell sleeves, this cute little dress is perfect for a daytime wedding or outdoor event where you want to feel feminine, but with a little edge. I tried it on at the LA store and really fell in love, but ended up opting for another dress for the actual event so I could wear flats. This dress definitely deserves heels and I just didn't have it in me this time lol. Because the back is out, you can't really wear a bra with it, so be prepared to tuck the girls in tight with some tape unless you were blessed with some gravity-defying twins. Overall, super cute and fits true to size. If you're curvier, I rec sizing down if you want more cinch to your waist. The booty has plenty of room bc it's an open flare, so don't worry.

I love this super flirty lace dress. Running true size with little stretch, I recommend wearing one size up for your back up size. The style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works for al cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this pink lace dress. At 5'9, this hit mid thigh on me. Pair with a shirt stack heel and you have a perfect date night outfit.

links_reviews_title: Will rent again after I lose weight.
links_reviews_text: This dress is adorable. It fit. I'm large busted and could not get away with wearing without support. It was just a lot a lace. I will definitely try this one again once I lose a little more weight.

links_reviews_title: A little snug in the arms
links_reviews_text: I loved the vibe of the dress and got multiple compliments on it. It was not comfortable to wear though because the sleeve material has absolutely no flex. Lifting my arms was uncomfortable and it was very tight.

The fit of this dress is pretty awkward. I did not end up wearing due to the fit. I usually wear a small but the small was too tight in the arms and the medium was loose around the waist. I would not recco
Beautiful dress but the back gaped on me. I'm chesty so that may have been the issue.
Fit in some places and not others, just wasn't flattering.

links_reviews_title: It was okay. I didn't except the entire back to be out, but wore a shirt underneath.
links_reviews_text: A nice spring outfit.

links_reviews_title: Men and women gives me compliments
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful I got a lot of compliments makes me look skinny and so classy the size is true ! And definitely I will consider to rent again every time I have special events
I received so many compliments on the romper and it fit perfectly. I wore it to a fraternity semi-formal and felt so confident and comfortable in it!

I rented this for my birthday and it was perfect. Soft, comfy material but the metallic finish felt very fun and chic. I'm a 36C and wore a Medium and it definitely was a low cut deep V. I didn't think it was too much but def not a conservative look for someone with a larger bust.

This romper is super fun. I wore it out on a Friday night for my birthday with my girlfriends. It is noticeable and a bit flashy because of the silver but not TOO over the top. It's also nice because it's flattering and forgiving. I had a birthday dinner, complete with dessert, while wearing this, and didn't feel squished or self-conscious! The only warning I give is to have a safety pin handy - I definitely needed it to cover up my chest.

This romper was super cute! Tons of compliments & very comfortable. Perfect for our bachelorette party. I have an ample chest so had to keep straightening out the V-neck, I would wear double sided tape next time.
I loved this rental. I got so many compliments on it and it was super comfortable. Runs a little large so if you are between sizes, go down.

I wore the xs and it fit me well in the bottom, but was a little too large up top. I used tape to keep the shoulders and chest in place, and a safety pin to close the deep v (I wore to a work gala). It was super comfy material and I felt great wearing it. Definitely worth the rent if you are a romper lover like me!

Super comfy outfit! Loved the shiny fabric. Not itchy at all which I find tends to happen with glittery fabrics. Used a little tape for the v neck line to prevent the girls from making a debut. Overall, loved this outfit!

links_reviews_title: Used for my Bachelorette party in Vegas!
links_reviews_text: It have a size 42 hip the Salk was to small for my hips so the med fit perfect. You'll have to use fashion tape for the front since it does open out- with out it you just show your nipples.
I had a hard time sending this one back! I wore to a Christmas themed night out with girlfriends paired with white booties. Hope to rent this gem again someday!

This slinky metallic romper was perfect for a night on the town. Was able to get away sans bra in it and it was super comfortable! The material isn't too thick which is nice since it has the long sleeves. Only complaint would be the seam trying to fold over in the front but i put a safety pin on it and you couldn't tell the difference.

This was a well made romper with great fabric. It was not very flattering on me. I'm 5'4" with a built, athletic frame. I felt that it was very loose when I wore the medium but the small (while it zipped and was comfortable) was too short for my backside. I think that it would be more flattering on a more slim build or a taller person. It was still a fun New Years outfit and I'm glad I tried it.

Fit was great, I liked the long sleeves as it was a cold night out. Wore this with black leggings and boots so it was a bit casual but I could see dressing it up as well. Has a bit of stretch, was easy to get on and off which is a plus for a romper!
I wore the XS and had plenty of room but not too baggy. Was perfect for NYE in colder weather. Festive but too extra!

Super cute and comfortable! I had to use a safety pin for the chest because my sticky bra wasn't clasping low enough. The bum cheeks are on the short side, so sitting down with crossed legs made for a show... overall great for the event though.

links_reviews_title: Sparkle and shine for the holidays!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for my company holiday party and got so many compliments from colleagues and friends who saw on social media! I wore it with chandelier earrings and nude patent leather pumps. The length was fine for me, but may be a little short on a taller person. Fabric was comfy and loose (perfect for eating) and it was easy to use the bathroom in!

This fabric is quite soft and flowy - I thought it would be stiff and scratchy. Very easy to get in and out of as rompers go. Minor complaint/warning - the back has a strap with a hook clasp that comes undone frequently (especially if you are stretching, kicking and dancing as much as we were) and it is quite low cut so a regular strapless will not work. I got a stick-on cutlet with a deep-v center that worked nicely. Sleeves were very long but easy to tuck in. Perfect for a night out in Vegas!

My daughter wore this for her sweet 16 and she loved it! Everything fit nicely, and was very comfortable. The length was good also. The only problem was how loose the necklining was, she had to use body tape to secure it.
Had to pin it shut at the bust, but it fit perfectly and made me feel sexy! Would buy this piece. Got so many compliments!
Fun, flirty vegas outfit. I needed a sticky silicone bra to help the girls in this top but otherwise was a very comfortable, flattering outfit.
Loved this romper, it was great for a night out in NYC, just need a little bit of fashion tape to keep yourself in. Received tons of compliments all night.

I rented this romper to celebrate New Years Eve with some friends in DC. While the shoulders were a little loose/shifty and the sleeves a tad long, the overall fit was great! The clasp in the back wouldn't stay locked, which I just attribute to the loose shoulder area, but thats nothing tieing couldnt fix. The romper was super comfortable to move around in, especially for those that love to dance! I had a great time and got lots of compliments so I would definitely recommend this! Shoutout to the other 2 ladies that were wearing this same romper from RTR that night, we all looked amazing!

Rented this for NYE at a club in DC. It was super comfortable, looked really cute, and i recieved tons of compliments! I ordered a small with an xs as a back up, ended up wearing the xs - mostly because i have short legs. Highly recommend for a fun evening out!

links_reviews_title: LOVED THIS DRESS! It was super comfortable and it was very fitting to celebrate the new year.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a new year's eve party and it was perfect for the occasion. I got so many compliments! It is a little short, but I wore black tights underneath to make it more appropriate. The sleeves were a little long and the overall fit was mainly true to size, but I wish I could've gotten a small so that the sleeves weren't as long. If you don't like wearing things tight, I would recommend staying with your normal size, but I had enough room to where I think I would have fit in a small. The romper also showed a lot of cleavage and back. The romper had a zipper and two strings you can tie on your back. Overall, I LOVED this dress considering how cold it was on new year's eve. I would definitely recommend this dress if you don't like things tight on you, but also want to look trendy and sparkly for a nice party! :)
Wore this romper for a holiday party. Easy to wear, super comfortable. Had to use fashion tape. Otherwise awesome.

This was absolutely perfect for pink and gold themed 22nd birthday dinner!! It fits well in the bottom but the top is HUGE! There is also a strap in the back across the top but it kept coming loose so I gave up on it by the end of the night. You can wear a bra with this because the straps are hidden but since I don't really need one I opted not to. The color is in between gold and silver so I think it's perfectly elegantly understated. Would definitely rent this again!!

I LOVED this fun romper! I wore this for my 21st and I received many compliments through the night from my friends but also strangers. This is a show stopping outfit! I'm usually between a small and medium so I went with the medium because it fit better. It does have a lower back but i was able to wear a regular bra. The only problem I had was sometimes the clip holding the sides together would come undone. Overall, a great fun and flirty romper!

The jumpsuit fit as expected and the medium ended up fitting better than the recommended large. I'm bigger on the bottom too. I would say that you'll need a safety pin for the front if you're afraid of exposure and the bottom is a little short - tall girls beware!

The color of this romper is so cute! Perfect for a night out or party. It was a little baggy, especially in the chest and booty area where I am definitely not lacking. Cute, but not as form fitting as I would have liked.

links_reviews_title: This romper was great - I got so many compliments. It was perfect for the event.
links_reviews_text: The pros: This material is incredibly flexible and comfortable to wear! It looks great for any kind of party event. I would absolutely rent again and/or recommend to a friend! The cons: The shorts are a little bit too short. A camel toe is a huge risk for those with longer torsos or even when you just raise your hands. Can be easy to avoid and can go a size up.
The fit is a little loose for a stretchy fabric in the arms and the legs are baggy. But it's still cute. Nice fabric. Not a fan of the seam work. Good price tho.

links_reviews_title: Flattering but a bit loose but I pinned it and it worked. Next time I'd get a S
links_reviews_text: A bit loose

links_reviews_title: Super cute but not great for tall girls
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9.5 and it kept riding up on me and was too short but super cute and flattering!
A little low cut in the back to wear with a bra
Runs a tad big, but sized down and it fit amazing!

links_reviews_title: Ok, very large in the bottom
links_reviews_text: Very large and unflattering in the bottom
This would be perfect for a night at the club. It's not nice enough for anything else.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but not right for the occasion
links_reviews_text: I found this romper to be flattering on my body type and hid my areas of concern (stomach) very well. I did not have any issues with the top being too low cut, I liked where it fell on me. I expected the shorts to be a touch longer and ultimately did not wear this because it was too short for the event I was attending. I would possibly rent for a different type of event in the future.

links_reviews_title: NYE perfect (but go a size down)
links_reviews_text: Rented for NYE on 6th street in ATX. It was very cute and easy; however, the clasp in the back comes undone so easily, I was worried about flashing people by accident all night. You can easily tie the strings in the back together to fix this, but it will make the front of the romper look a little awkward.
This romper was great. Just a little too low cut in the front and short in the back for a work function.
Fit very nicely and was extremely comfy!
I really didn't like this dress. The three tiered skirt looked a bit childish to me. The colors were very pretty, though.
Zipped right up perfectly, the band across the waist hit at just the right spot. The frills on bottom were SO FUN to dance in

I wore the dress to a cocktail party on a work trip. I was specifically looking for something that was comfortable, looked really quality, and didn't show cleavage. This dress did all of that. The embroidery is incredibly luxurious and I loved how the skirt fanned out a bit. My only frustration was that my boob tape didn't arrive from amazon so I was forced to literally wear a regular bra with the straps tucked under like a strapless as a last-minute improvisation. Perfect for my 38I.
Fun Dress for a party. The netting underneath the shirt was a little uncomfortable but it gave the skirt nice volume. Would rent again.
This dress was fantastic for a fall wedding. I was hesitant, but the ruffles are actually really flattering. And it's comfortable. I didn't need spanx but still felt slim. Got a lot of compliments

links_reviews_title: Great Fitted Shape with Gorgeous Skirt Layers
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous fit and flare style dress with a layered skirt. Fits a pear shape perfectly and gives you a great waist. Skirt is not too big but is layered. Was a bit heavier but no need to avoid for summer. I wore this for a rehearsal dinner and a night on the town. Zipper required assistance and was a bit cumbersome. Perfect length. Love this dress and would definitely rent again for a formal affair or cocktail party.
Loved this dress!
Rented this for a wedding. Fits perfectly and I feel like I'll be able to eat and drink comfortably. The skirt portion is very forgiving because of the ruffles and overall A-line shape.

I always wanted to rent this dress but was afraid it would be too short. Luckily though it was just perfect. I felt great in this fun and flirty dress, and I loved the beautiful pattern. Good quality and very comfortable. Perfect for a summer evening event.
This dress was perfect for work. I wore it while meeting people from our other offices. The detailing is gorgeous and really stands out.
More detailed and intricate than the photos. Great rental!
I purchased this dress for a dinner night with my husband and it worked out perfect. The neckline and players are very flattering
This dress has amazing details!

This dress is beautiful and perfect, but definitely runs a little small in the rib cage/middle area where the detail is. The tiered skirt was perfect. This dress was comfortable and great for a summer wedding. I have a larger bust and it fit well with a black strapless bra.

I wore this dress to attend a summer opera. The dress runs true to size but was snug around my rib cage. But the snug fit and structure allowed me to go without a bra. The material is high quality and the embroidery is so pretty. Strangers constantly complimented me. I'd rent this one again!
Beautiful dress, very flattering and comfortable.

This dress hit all the marks. It was the perfect length for a summer wedding where we danced for hours and the embroidery was beautiful! Breathed well and was fun to twirl in, so many compliments. One thing to note is that the chest / side boob area does have a noticeable gap but with my nude strapless bra nobody noticed. Otherwise it was so lovely, I'd buy it if I could afford it :).
I'm normally an 8 but the reviews said this ran small. The size 10 fit perfect. It cinched me in at the waist and the ruffles hit my stomach and love handles perfectly!!! I felt so comfortable!!

I loved this dress so so much and received so many compliments on it. The embroidery is just beautiful. It was perfect for a summer wedding. The chest is a tad small, so I sized up one size (as I'm a 36DD) and it fit perfectly. It was tight enough to not wear a bra and still feel comfortable, but a strapless bra would also work with this dress.
Loved this dress, it fit like a glove and was so comfortable and flattering. Best part is I didn't have to wear a bra and I could still dance the night away
Exactly what I wanted. Fun, comfortable and beautiful.
Slightly tight in the underneath layer through the hips. Otherwise TTS
Beautiful detailed embroidery in a fun and elegant party dress. Slight concern for side boob otherwise would be a 5/5

This is a super pretty dress. I wore it to a wedding with a semi-formal dress code. My boyfriend was complimenting me all night. I loved the floral embroidery and the fact that it's forgiving in the tummy area. It was great for dancing and eating!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for outdoor spring evening wedding
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress for a wedding. I loved the style - the lining is a tad short but the sheer ruffles were long enough that I didn't mind. I normally wear a 14 in most sizes - the 16 just fit through the waist and bottom. There's a little stretch but not much. I wear a 36D and this dress was a teensy bit large on top - I could wear a strapless bra though it showed a bit on the side if I wasn't careful but if you had a black one, I don't think you'd even notice. Style-wise - the embroidery was gorgeous and the ruffles were a great silhouette on bottom if you want to avoid a sheath. Danced all night long and was totally comfortable.
Very pretty dress but did not wear because I'm looking for something more green for St Patrick's day. May rent for another occasion.
I'm usually a 12 and sized up to 14. It fit well and looked cute! I didn't end up wearing it and went with a red dress form RTR instead but I'd rent this again for another party. Beautiful embroidery
This dress was perfect for a winter wedding at a winery. The fit was great and it was comfortable to wear all evening.
I'm typically a 6 and got the 8. Was a little loose in the chest area but fit comfortably around the waist. It was such a beautiful dress!
Had a lot of metallic thread that was unsuspecting.

This was a fun dress that I wore to a bridal shower. The dress was a little tight, but not too bad, I think it was more of the fabric didn't give much. Dress was flattering, forgiving to the stomach area. Overall, I liked this dress.

Such a cute dress and is perfect for a fun event. The green and the detailing of the dress is so beautiful and well structured and should be worn with a strapless bra or a Nubra. Definitely size up if you feel you have a larger bust or wide set back as it did run small for me.

links_reviews_title: This dress was just perfect! I felt feminine, fancy and it fit so well. It's extremely flattering!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a Gala for Children's Theatre and it was just awesome. I actually went to the flagship store for an appointment and tried it on there. My stylist suggested a 4 and I went with the 6 instead. I probably could have done the 4 after all, but it still fit great and was really comfortable. Such a gorgeous dress!!

I am obsessed with this dress. The bodice was tight, so I definitely had to size up. The bust area was actually pretty big for me, but I was still able to wear without a bra. The cut is so flattering - no shapewear needed, and it just brings you in and creates such a flattering silhoutte. The embroidery is delicate and beautiful. One my my all-time favorite rentals.

The size 10 was a little snug in the bodice. I could have worn it without a bra, but I was more comfortable in the 12 with my strapless bra. The dress was perfect for an evening wedding and so comfortable. It was really a perfect fit!
Perfect fit, super comfy and flattering.

Beautiful dress. Love the colors and detail. However, I did find it a bit confining up top. It squished my bust and was not doing my small chest any favors. It also created a fat fold near my armpits. I would not recommend for large busted women.

links_reviews_title: Not my favorite, but it was pretty cute!
links_reviews_text: This dress was pretty cute. It was a back up when my first choice didn't fit. I'm usually a size 8/10 but I wore the 12 and it fit perfectly. It was easy to wear with a strapless bra. It hid any tummy issues that I had, because the tiered bottom isn't clingy at all. Solid dress choice.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a late summer/early fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: If you are petite with a small bust/bigger hips, this is the dress for you. I am 5' 2", 125 lbs., and the 0 fit perfectly. It's a great length even on petites, shows off the shoulders nicely, and is forgiving where it counts for me (hips/butt area). You can't see in pictures, but there are metallic gold and silver threads in the embroidery that makes the dress look so fancy and expensive. Highly recommend.
Wore this for an anniversary. True to size or a little large I had space for a strapless bra. Layers poof a bit

I received so many compliments on this dress! It's a show stopper. I have a very small chest and was almost coming out the top so I wouldn't suggest it if you have a larger chest. You can't wear a bra with it.

links_reviews_title: Would rent again! Wish it was a bit longer.
links_reviews_text: The dress was beautiful. The straps were a bit long for me. I was looking forward to wearing heels since I got the long size but it was not long enough for that! Great dress very comfortable. Danced all evening!
i ordered this dress for my junior year prom and loved it! it was great that nobody had the same dress as me, and the 2 was a perfect fit. i loved the material! would definitely order again
I wore this dress to the military ball. It was super comfortable, the fabric is stretchy but still supportive. There are two sets of hooks in the back so you can adjust the bust size.

Loved this dress! Wore it for a gala. The top is very slim so you have to be comfortable with showing a bit of cleavage — but with that being said, I didn’t have to wear a bra or stickies or anything and they stayed up and in all night!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Comfortable eye catching!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress! So easy to wear! Fabric is a heavier weight and a bit stretchy! I am 6 foot tall, 168 lbs, typically wear 31 jeans. I wore this 10L with heels and it was perfect! Lots of compliments!

Snug fit. Hugged the curves but allowed for an entire night of dancing. I'm a 6 on top and a 6/8 on bottom and wore the 8 because it allowed more room all over. Great stretchy material. Received many compliments!
Great dress overall but the clasp in the back is similar to a bra. If you have it on the loosest part the metal shows. Fit was great though and I liked the length

links_reviews_title: The dress was beautiful and fit well. Process was so easy!
links_reviews_text: The dress arrived on time and fit perfectly other than being a little long. We tacked it with lingerie tape which held beautifully and was easy to remove for shipping back. My daughter (who wore this to prom) is 5'3" and weighs 140 pounds (though solid muscle from years of sports). Fit is best for a small chested and thin or athletic girl. If you have a broad torso or full chest, this may not be the best cut for you. (See the swimmer's review). The dress was elegant and she got multiple compliments. No one had a dress like it. Shipping back was a breeze!

This dress is a bombshell look it definitely shows off your figure. Although, I loved this dress and many of my friends and family did as well, I did not end up wearing for a fundraiser gala and went instead with my other rented dress for a more classic look. I would definitely consider renting this dress again for a more fun party vibe!

links_reviews_title: This dress was super hot! I received so many compliments on the fit and style.
links_reviews_text: I sized up and it worked, although I probably could have worn a smaller size. I definitely needed the tall for length.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Got so many compliments on this dress! Also was my back up! So happy with RTR customer service :) they got this dress to me ASAP and made everything so easy.

links_reviews_title: This dress really just spiced things up!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like a glove and was truly a show stopper. I honestly felt like a million bucks! I usually only wear black and thought I'd give the red a try - it was perfect! I'm a DD and the dress really kept me in without being exceptionally revealing. Also, I'm 5'5 and the long was the perfect length with heels.

links_reviews_title: it was as if this dress was made JUST for me!
links_reviews_text: absolutely INCREDIBLE dress. i felt fantastic and didn't want to send it back!

links_reviews_title: Such a flattering dress for a formal affair.
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress. I received so many compliments. Overall the 10 was a little big at the cut outs but the 8 was a little too tight for my liking. Highly recommend.

This was perfect for the military ball I wore it for. It wan a bit larger than I wanted at the sides where it was cutout, but better to be a little loose than too snug in my opinion. I think I read a review somewhere that the straps are adjustable-- they are not. But they fit well on me! Gorgeous and flattering. The first dress that I for had a broken clasp but RTR overnighted this one to me and it worked out great- they were very apologetic and wanted to make it right. Great customer service.

I am 5ft tall, so i was worried about the length, but with my 3in heals the Petite was the PERFECT length! The only thing that was a bit of a bummer is that i thought i would be able to get away with no bra, but my boobs didnt quite fill the top peice out on their own so i needed a sticky bra. So, if you are smaller chested you might want to try sizing down or make sure you have some sticky cutlets. All in all this dress was amazing, the material, the color, everything! I got so many compliments and i was comfortable dancing all night!

I could have gotten away with the 8 but due to a gathering of mainly older and conservative guests I decided to size up. The front the dress is very classy and the back is a little more revealing. I wore a pashmina shawl around most of the night. It's a nice dress and I did receive compliments throughout the night. At 5'5" with 2 inch heels it was still a bit long but not too bad. Overall would recommend.

I rented this for a formal Christmas party. It truly fit like a glove, and the fabric had enough weight and stretch that it felt like it kept everything pulled in nicely. Spanx helped smooth everything out nicely because of the body hugging nature of the dress it was necessary. I also felt like my posture improved that night because I was very aware to stand up straight. If I didn't I worried my back fat might roll out the side cut outs! Ha ha! Bottom line unless you are stick thin, you need confidence and good posture to wear this dress! Fortunately I was feeling confident and it must have shown as I received many compliments. Lots of "hot mammas" and "sexy" but I never felt overtly sexy, it was a subtle sexy. Overall, good rental but not my favorite.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress! Order size up if in doubt
links_reviews_text: 5'11" 155lbs. Not ideal for big boobs. I'm 36A and there was no room for anything else in there. (I'm also a swimmer so my wide.) I ordered 4L but it was too small to snap the back. This was the most stunning dress! I was so upset it didn't fit. Perfect length for tall woman since it just barely touched the ground while barefoot.

I received MANY compliments on this gorgeous dress! I rented a Size 6 and ended up wearing a Size 8 so I could feel comfortable even after eating and drinking at the wedding. Super flattering shape, no need to wear a bra. Back of the top is adjustable like a bikini top.

Beautiful dress. The fit was excellent and I loved the material. I'm 5'10 with heels so the 4L was perfect. I would say very true to size, but boobs that are larger than a C cup might struggle with the top a bit: I'm a full C and it fit snuggly but any bigger cup would have been very tight.
Stop looking and rent this dress! Got a million compliments on top of the fact that it is a very flattering cut and super comfortable. Danced and ate in it all night!
Great stretchy fabric good for adjusting to body types (I have small bust and was concerned top would be loose but no issues, can also wear a regular bra. Would recommend spanx.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous. Brace yourself for a wave of compliments in this dress.
links_reviews_text: Pros: color, perfect height for petite (5 ft) Cons: tight in the back & clasps like a bra

Although the dress came with a stain on the bottom, I wore it anyway since it was so gorgeous! I'm 5'2" and the 0P was still a little long with 3 inch heels, but I didn't have any trouble walking in it. Received a ton of compliments and will rent it again for sure! RTR was very understanding about the stain and overnighted more dresses, but I still liked this one best and you couldn't see the stain. Awesome customer service!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my brother-in-laws wedding reception
links_reviews_text: The dress itself was beautiful! I originally ordered the 6R and it fit perfectly, but I felt that the size 8R would be much more comfortable. The dress was a hit and I was showered with compliments all night. The only downside of this dress was the latches on the back. Now, I had it originally on the smallest it would go comfortably, but I noticed right away that the latches didn't seem to be on there very well. Sure enough, the first set literally came completely off. I re-latched it to the second row, and not even an hour later, those came off too! I ended up having quickly put my jacket on and left the reception shortly afterwards. I have NEVER come across something like that before.

Loved the dress got so many compliments. Very flattering. I am wider set and it slimed my figure and hugged my best curves and hid my worst. Nice thicker strong fabric too so it isn't flimsy and cheap.
Form fitting and flattering for a curvier girl

Absolutely loved this dress. Glad I got the long. I am 5'9" and this would have been awkward without the long size. I felt so glamorous in this dress, I did not want to take it off. I rented it for a wedding and did not end up wearing it because I literally did not want to show up the bride, that's how amazing I felt in this dress LOL. I chose a shorter more "wedding guest" style. I am a 34D and I did not have to squeeze into the top. I thought everything fit perfect. Even the most seamless underwear showed in this so I would not recommend. The material also has a bit of stretch to it. Will rent again for a ball or black tie event.
Perfect fit and comfy!
Fits true to size. Very comfortable fabric. I got many compliments on this dress.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, easy fit and comfortable enough to dance. No complaints. Fit true to size.
links_reviews_text: Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! But a lil big in the chest for my girls in the ibtc
links_reviews_text: big in the chest area

I ordered the 2 and zero. The strap length of the zero was perfect for my petite frame but the chest was just too tight. Ended up wearing the 2 and it worked out! Comfortable, thick fabric. The back cut-out was a bit unflattering when I sat down, but overall length worked with my high heels!

This dress was amazing, how both of my dresses came with holes. Lucky I was able to still wear the 0P and RTR was very helpful with the situation. I am normally a 2 but I am only 5'2", about 117 lbs, and a 32A in bra size so due to my height I had to go with the petite size but lucky it fit great! A little tight around the chest area but I managed. It is sexy but not over the top and the color is amazing !! Super comfortable and I received tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Best I've ever felt in a dress!
links_reviews_text: I was hoping to be able to rent a 2R, but that size was taken so I rented the 4R and the 0R. I have a small waist and small chest so the 0R was snug but not uncomfortable. The hips were a tiny tight but still looked great. I was able to attend the ceremony, bar hop downtown, and then dance the night away comfortably. I got a TON of compliments, people kept telling me I had to buy that dress! I totally would if it wasn't so expensive. I felt like a million bucks and would rent again in a heartbeat. I would have liked to try the size 2 as I think that one would have been perfect. I am just shy of 5'8" and I wore 2 1/2" heals and I would have liked to have seen the long option. I like my dresses to hit the ground and cover most of my foot and it was slightly off the ground with my heals. LOVED THIS RENTAL!!

I never wear red but I love this dress so much!! I felt amazing. I wear an A cup and the top was still tight. The material is stretchy but the zipper part is not. I and 5'7" so the long worked well with heels I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Perfect balance of formal yet exciting
links_reviews_text: The dress is comfortable- the cutouts aren't too revealing. The color is great. Overall very flattering & would absolutely wear again!

links_reviews_title: Prepare to be noticed in this hot red dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress is very comfortable although I did have to go a size up from what I normally wear. RTR was AMAZING when I called and needed to order a different size. They sent the next size and a second backup (jussstt in case) free of charge and I got it the next day. Although the fabric has a bit of a stretch, the dress is form fitting and not that forgiving. I didn't need to wear a bra which was a plus. Also, usually I can get away with flats in R dresses but you absolutely need at least 2 in heels and even then I was still picking it up occasionally. Overall, I loved the dress and would rent again. I received a ton of compliments!
Super cute! I wore to work and didn't find that it was super low cut like some other reviewers. Good top for work or a night out. Loved the print too!
Ordered a size larger than I normally would, and it was a little large, but this top was so cute and comfortable to wear to work!

links_reviews_title: I found this top to be a great choice for work. Creative, but modest.
links_reviews_text: This top is an interesting one...there were a lot of things I loved about it, with a few characteristics that drove me absolutely crazy. Material: Lightweight, soft, very comfortable. It was easy to style and didn't bunch when tucked in. Fit: I absolutely hated the neckline. It was constantly flopping forward and was really unreliable. Style: The sleeves are so fun! I really enjoyed the step up from your average bell sleeve. I am 5'9" and 165 pounds, a G/H cup, and early in my first trimester. I have a long torso and long arms, narrow rib cage. I rented a 10 in this top. I thought it fit true to size and the sleeve length was perfect given my height. I can see how someone shorter would struggle with this, however. All around, really enjoyed this one! Not sure it has that special sauce that would cause me to rent it a second time, but in general it was a fun addition to my closet for a little while.
I loved this fun and breezy blouse. The sleeves were unique but not annoying. I didn't have to wear a shirt under it and it wasn't too low cut on me for work.
Low cut - definitely needs a camisole underneath. Beautiful buttons and details. Fun top!

I'd say its true to size. Very easy to wear & very versatile. I wore with slacks for work, with jeans to go out with friends & shorts when on vacation. I loved the lightweight, sheer fabric & the flowy frills. For the office, you may need a tank underneath as its a bit low cut. Nice fabric, well made & easy to wear. I'll rent again

links_reviews_title: Great fit, good for work/the weekend
links_reviews_text: Typically wear a size cus or 0-2, and this shirt fit perfectly. I­t­ was a great blouse for work (I'm working in a more causal environment) and I­t­ easily could be dressed up or down. Definitely would recommend renting I­t­!
I wore this shirt 3x during my rental. It was super cute and flowy and could be dressed up and also worn out for drinks. It's quite sheer so I wore a black tank underneath.
Beautiful top! I have a long torso and pear shape so worked best tucked into a skirt or pants. Probably could've done with a 6 but worked it great. Sleeves are beautiful too!

links_reviews_title: Cute top, I just wish it fit.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful top, but it's very large width-wise but super short. Just not for me.
Very pretty, many compliments
Didn't wear. On my frame (5'11") it left a gap at the waistband.

links_reviews_title: Loved the shirt but it was too big.
links_reviews_text: The size 12 wasn't available and this is not a shirt you can size up in. I wore it anyways and loved it. Will rent again in a smaller size.
Comfortable, great fit and perfect for a variety of occasions.
It's too big, didn't wear it.
Must wear over tank cami
This shirt is super cute, and I got a lot of compliments on it all day at work. Very feminine and flowy. I would definitely recommend this shirt and will probably have to rent it again.

This top was comfortable and cute. The fabric is a nice weight and lined in the front. There is a lot of movement. It's fun to wear. It hangs nicely and was flattering. Just the right length for me and I'm 6'0". I'd definitely rent it again.

I love the versatility of this gorgeous floral top. I wore it to work with a black cami underneath (the v is too low not to) and out to happy hour with a bralette. The sleeves are billowy and fun. Rent it now! The red and pink print is even more gorgeous in person

links_reviews_title: Great top. Fits well. Tucks in nicely and lays well with high waisted pants/skirt.
links_reviews_text: Love the sleeves

This shirt is really great. I love all of the button detailing and the flow-y sleeves. The only issue with it is it's slightly cropped almost. I had on high rise jeans and made it work but as someone who is large chested I had to go with the larger side to make sure it fit over the girls, so it was a bit of a game of making sure my navel wasn't showing and too much wasn't showing on top.
This was a very flattering top for me. However, I am not purchasing because I am not a fan of the material in general when it comes to my clothing preferences.
This top was beautiful, well cut and I loved it. The v is pretty low so you may need a bandeaus underneath if you want to wear it to work.
It kept falling down a little showing my bra, but it was overall so fun and cute! The sleeves are great!

links_reviews_title: Really cute, but see through in the back and VERY low cut.
links_reviews_text: Fits loosely, but the shirt is short so I went with an 8 vs 6.
Loved this top! It does run a bit short, so I tucked it into high waisted jeans. Can dress up or down. Love this and will definitely rent again
I love this top. Very lightweight but not sheer in the front! I wore this to work with a tank underneath and it was perfect. Extremely flattering and comfortable!
Definitely size down. I usually wear a 4 in all Nicholas tops but this one ran very big. Needed to return for a size 2. Otherwise, very cute and comfy.
Good everyday shirt. Cut is a bit low so I wore it with a black camisole
The fabric was way too thin and gauzy
I plan to rent this over and over and over again. The sleeves have movement but aren't bulky - which for an athletic gal is ideal. Gorgeous pattern and color. Loads of complements.

links_reviews_title: I was very satisfied with this top! Very flowy and light. I am 23 weeks pregnant and it hid my bump.
links_reviews_text: Comes very low so I styled with a black cami underneath.
6 fit more like a 4. Really pretty and feminine.

links_reviews_title: Really cute for dinner and maybe drinks after.
links_reviews_text: Fit really well. Had to wear a tank top underneath because it is seethrough.
Fit perfectly

This top has very feminine details but there is no shape to it so the bottom is boxy and can be unflattering. I wore a leather jacket over it so you couldn't tell. The spaces between the buttons are completely open but they don't gape. This was an easy top to wear.

links_reviews_title: I am getting compliments on this one!
links_reviews_text: Nice fit. Pretty print. Attractive sleeves. Liking this one.
Wore this for a party-fit was true to size. Loved the details on the sleeves!
Felt Beautiful wearing it

links_reviews_title: main problem is the depth of the V neck!
links_reviews_text: a lightweight blouse with pretty sleeves and pattern but it almost ran a little small - but the V neck is way too deep for me- perhaps a taller person with a longer neck would find it workable. Even with necklaces, it was too bare for me.
I felt like a million bucks!

Loved wearing this jumpsuit to a cocktail party in NYC. Fit like a glove and received lots of compliments. Best of all - it was super comfortable. 8L was a little long for me at 5'9" but made it work with high shoes. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Fun jumpsuit but hard zipper and stretched out arms
links_reviews_text: Would have been a 4 stars for me if it wasn't so hard to zipper (impossible alone) and if the arms weren't completely stretched out. Runs pretty true to size, maybe a little on the small side. I have 32DDDs so it tended to slide down while dancing but not too badly.

This was just an all around flattering outfit. I'm usually skeptical on the jumpsuit/rompers, but loved this one. I have a long torso, (and was 3 mo pregnant), so the comfy material, and long lines were exactly what I needed. The neckline, the cut, the lines, it all just works!

I was nervous about the fit based on other reviews that it was tight through the hips and butt. Pleasantly surprised that it fit perfectly and was comfortable, material has stretch. I wore low heels and it didn't hit the ground which I would have liked (I am 5'7") overall very comfortable and I felt like a badass!
I wore this jumpsuit to a wedding, and I got so many compliments on it. It was really comfortable, and 10/10 would rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect date night outfit for mini moon
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly! It was so comfortable and flattering. I considered buying it a few times I loved it so much. I wore it to a musical in NYC.

links_reviews_title: Size up if you are tall! Loved it!
links_reviews_text: I have never been able to find a jumpsuit that actually fits me in the torso, and finally found it! I am typically a 6/8, but sized up to the 10 bc of my torso. So glad I did! It was slightly baggy and I had some trouble keeping up the top, but just the fact that I actually could wear a jumper felt amazing! I actually like the look of it being a little loose since it was more slendering. My problem areas are typically my booty and thighs and this fit great in both of those areas. I think if you are busty (below a DD) this dress would be fine. I wore this to a double header of a black tie early in the night and then to another cocktail party later. It was the perfect transition dress!

If you have a booty, size up. I am blessed in my behind and felt like I was always pulling the jumpsuit down, especially in the front. Maybe wearing different undergarments would have helped? Overall loved how the top fit and the flared leg
Perfect fit but was long. I was worried the regular looked too short with my heels so I went with the long instead. Also, I didn't have to wear a bra! Total plus for me!

I ordered a 4 and an 8 because the 6 was unavailable. I wore the 8 because I had a little more wiggle room. I think the 6 would have been perfect. I got so many compliments all night and I was soooo comfortable. I didn't have to wear a bra either so that's always a plus. My boyfriend told me I should buy this 3 times.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks in this jumpsuit! I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'7 125 pounds and wore a 2L. It fit perfectly. It was definitely a little long, but I wore 4 inch heels so it worked out well. The cut and fit is incredibly slimming. You will definitely need a bathroom buddy to get the zipper up.

links_reviews_title: I loved being able to rent an outfit for just one night!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is extremely comfortable! I never even tried on the size 2R because the 4R was fairly snug on me, but one thing that was disappointing is there was a rip in the back of the 4R where the zipper is located. I had to make it work for the night despite the tear in the back of the jumpsuit so I was disappointed that the team at Rent the Runway didn't check for the rip in the outfit. I received many compliments from work colleagues.

Great jumpsuit! It fit really well around the waist as well as the length. Exactly what I was looking for! Perfect outfit to wear if you're looking to mix it up from a regular black dress (it looks like a dress in most pictures anyways). You could tell mine was a little worn because the sleeves were a little ripped, but no one could tell.

This was very comfortable to wear all day between the wedding ceremony and reception, it had the perfect amount of stretch but still held its shape all night. The arms are a bit restricting and it hit a bit lower on my chest than I anticipated, but still loved it. It definitely requires a friend for any trips to the restroom. The length was perfect, I'm 5'8" and wore this with 3" heels.

This is a very fun, flattering jumpsuit. I am very petite and I initially wanted the 4P but it wasn't available. I ended up getting the 4R and the 6P and ended up going with the 4R. I am 5'1 and I wore 4in heals and 4R was the perfect length. You can't really raise your arms and you have to have someone help you in the bathroom but other that that I loved wearing it! I got many compliments and it was a fun alternative to a gown!
Rented this for a fancy birthday dinner. Felt absolutely fabulous in it. I'm about 5'8 115 and it fit like a glove. The regular was too short with 3in heels, so I got the long instead.

Fabric has great give/stretch while still being thick and not cheap/casual looking in nature. Definitely a flattering cut. Loved the look overall- I will say that even the long still was a bit short in the inseam for me at 5'11". Also, for those with larger bust (I'm a 32DDD), it can lay a bit weird at top. Definitely needed a bra to help the fit. Got lots of compliments- loved being able to rock a trendier choice while still feeling formal and appropriate.
Fit perfectly! I'm short (5'3") so heels were a must.

this is the 2nd time i've rented this piece. fits true to size and is a great alternative to a dress. the legs are wide and the arms sit very low revealing a lot of chest, neck and back. very sexy and received a ton of compliments. i need this in my wardrobe permanently.
Wore for friends bachelorette in New Orleans. Very cute!

I rented this for my HS reunion. I'm usually a size 8 but if you have junk in the trunk, please size up. This was my backup and they were out of a 10. I had some issues with the zipper so I made sure I didn't have to go to the bathroom that night! Other than that, I receive sooo many compliments and the jumpsuit definitely hugs every curve.
Fit perfectly I received a lot of compliments. The only issue was zipping myself up took a little time lol

links_reviews_title: Fun on trend jumpsuit for night out
links_reviews_text: I chose the regular and am 5'6 with long torso. If you're any taller, you would need the long because it would be riding up. Overall loved the fit and look...almost forgot to get a pic in the outfit until we got home

Rented this for a formal baptism party (second time rental actually) I love this jumpsuit so much, I want to buy it, but I can't find it anywhere!! It's disappointing. You don't really need a bra for this, although I did wear a strapless as I don't feel comfortable not wearing a bra with clothes at special events. I'm 5'2" so wearing 3 inch heels helped, without heels this would be too long on me. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants to look fabulous! I can't wait to rent it again!!

links_reviews_title: Amazing!!!!! Loved how it hugged me in all the right places!!
links_reviews_text: The clasp was broken and I couldn't zip it myself. Definitely need a friend to help you with this one!!

I wore this to a black tie wedding and it was a hit, lots of compliments and it's a fun alternative to a long dress. A little tight in the waist so not very comfortable fit if you've got a big booty or hips. I wore the regular with 3.5-4 inch heels and the length was okay, would go with shorter heel next time.

links_reviews_title: This was such a fun departure from an evening gown!
links_reviews_text: For curvy women, this is a PERFECT selection for a formal affair. I didn't need a bra because the fabric was so sturdy, the waistline hugged me perfectly, and it was super comfy. I am a 5'3" 155 lb. woman, and I wore a 6R. I definitely had to have heels on for it to not drag, but I wouldn't have wanted the legs any shorter.

links_reviews_title: My legs looked a million miles long
links_reviews_text: Only con, which I anticipated from last reviews, are the sleeves. They do drop down and really restrict you from moving your arms up. Would be better with some sort of elastic in them. However, I felt like a million bucks!! The bodice is firm and super slimming. It's a bit tricky to zip by yourself over the band in middle, so bring a friend with you to the ladies room!! I wore the long, with heels. I have very long legs in correlation with the rest of my body and I could've easily gotten away with the regular length without heels. The longs are LONG. I received lots of compliments and would order a million more times.

Wore this from 5am - 5pm between wedding prep with the bride, the actual wedding, and the lunch after the wedding. Felt very comfortable and chic. One thing to mention is that the ruffles on the overarm kept falling down. I wish they had elastic in them so they would stay in place on my arms. Also, should mention I wore Spanx with this piece.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved and was very comfortable! I am only 5'6 and wore the long with high heels.
links_reviews_text: #glam #comfy

The size 8 fit great in the waist but would zip over my chest. The 10 wasn't as good of fit in the waist so I added a white belt. I've never felt so comfortable at a formal affair and I got a ton of compliments.

I wore this to a black tie wedding and absolutely ADORED it. Got endless compliments! Unfortunately the 8L I had ordered wasn't available and I only received the 10L, which totally worked, but was a little bit loose in the bust. I got the long length based on review and it was seriously the PERFECT length with my 3.5" heels. Would definitely recommend the long length if you're going to wear heels. The off the shoulder and ruffle were such fun, playful details. Great quality/material. The boning in the top made it feel structured and secured. Would absolutely rent again, highly recommend!
Gorgeous jumpsuit; regular was allllmost perfect with flats for me (didn't get the long bc I didn't want to wear heels). Unique and fun.

links_reviews_title: We rented this for my daughters Cheer Banquet and she is wearing a size 4 (125lbs & 5'3")
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect ~ Super cute and got lots of compliments
I wore it to a wedding. I received so many compliments. Felt comfortable all night. I would rent it again.

Loved this jumpsuit. Very comfortable for dancing through the night, and warm for a late winter wedding. I'm usually between a 4 and 6 and the 6 fit perfect. If you're in between sizes size up and size up for back up. Not the easiest thing to zipper, but after a few tries I had it figured out.

Its very good material and the pants do run fairly long. I am 5'8" and i wore the 6R. The only negatives are the sleeves kind of prevent you from lifting your arms all the way, and the zipper is a bit difficult to do yourself.
Rented for a Galla. It fit perfect and was true to size. Would definitely rent again

I'm 6'0" tall and wore heels. This was a great piece, but a little short for me. Typically an 8, it wasn't available. The 10L fit well. The arm accents fell. Super comfortable and wrinkle free. I'd rent again.

I LOVED this dress. Wore it twice. So comfortable, great color that pops for the summer season & its midi length that hits at the shins which is perfect for my 5'7" height. It's flattering for the waist bc you can adjust the tie. Really considered purchasing this.

links_reviews_title: True to size but big in the chest
links_reviews_text: Dress is fun and great for summer but I would recommend sizing down one size. I know the dress is supposed to hang on your body but if you belt the dress at the waist, the material balloons around the chest.
Love this lemonade inspired dress. I wore this where it was 90° out and it was surprisingly cool. Definitely runs big though, with extra fabric up top.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for BF's Graduation on a hot day!
links_reviews_text: I felt like Princess Belle! LOVED this color & PERFECT for a hot summer day! AND I could wear a regular bra which is always the best.

links_reviews_title: Material feels amazing. Loved the vibrant color. Wore it all day with a topper
links_reviews_text: Fit good on me. I would especially recommend for women of color. Looks amazing on brown skin

I liked the fit of this dress. My belt didn't make such a cute bow like the model had because the material is floppy, but overall is was a very nice color and good for ladies with a large chest. It has a lining that is very static-y so I had to rub it with a fabric softener sheet before I could wear it comfortably. Got lots of compliments at a school event where I wore it.

Dress is roomy but the belted waist gives it cute shape. The shoulder straps are a bit on the short side so it was a little snug since I have pretty muscular shoulders. Also there's no zipper but I had no issues getting it on over my head. I got a ton of compliments and the best part is that no one will notice if you fill up on tacos in this dress!

Rented this for a hot afternoon LSU football game (purple and gold!). This was great for that - cool, easy to wear, no straps or slits to worry about, and long enough I didn't flash anyone sitting in the stadium. The material was more synthetic feeling than I expected, kind of like sheer curtains, but it worked.

links_reviews_title: Pretty. I felt just a tad frumpy. But, I love the yellow.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable. Billows a bit.
I liked this dress a lot but did not end up wearing it. It wasn't as flattering on my hips and chest but may have looked cute with a jacket. Very pretty color!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a movie night with friends
links_reviews_text: Color is gorgeous. SIZE DOWN because it's quite blousy.
The top was large in the chest area

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this. Sadly, it was too big.
links_reviews_text: Fit was too large.
I rented an 8, which is my usual size, but I think a 6 would have worked better for me. It was too blousy around my bust and loose under my arms - not a flattering look.

links_reviews_title: Very cute and flattering dress - loved the color
links_reviews_text: Great everyday dress or work dress.
Super cute dress. Loved the wrap around belt. Only thing I was conscious of was the chest area looking puffy when the belt rode up a bit.

This is a very cute and flattering dress for a outdoor summer party. Can be dressed up or dressed down based on accessories. Very cute with flats and a jean jacket. This fit me very nicely and I got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Lots of fabric and not flattering
links_reviews_text: Rented this but didn't wear it and returned it immediately. There is so much fabric up top it didn't even feel conservative at that point it just felt super unflattering
Cute and casual. Nothing really amazing or exciting about it. But, it fit well and was a great day time dress!

Fit: Got a size up so it was a tad loose but still fit great. No complaints. Fabric: Comfortable, breathable, stretchy. Elastic waist was a nice plus. Style: Casual but pretty. The comfy fabric and bright color makes this dress great for the summer!

links_reviews_title: Tie was way too long. Chest area was way too big. Did not end up wearing this one.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous yellow color but didn't wear due to awkwardly long tie and big chest area.
As others have described, the top is very blousy and it ended up looking frumpy/unflattering. I did not wear it.
This dress doesn't do anything, positive or negative, for your figure, which is great if you just want to roll into work a little hungover. It's comfortable but still tasteful.
Nice casual dress for work

This dress fits a range of sizes and can easily be dressed up or down. I threw a blazer over it for work, and then added more dramatic makeup and jewelry for an evening event. The color is special and unique, and the flow of the dress is flattering.
5'1", 133 and this was big all over. Too long, the top bunched up and made me look double my bra size. Too long for my petite frame as well. Didn't wear.

I couldn't wear this dress. The top was too blousy under the arms and just lay in an unflattering way. I was disappointed, since it was otherwise comfortable and the length wasn't bad despite my being 5' tall.
Not flattering if you have a curvy bust & hips.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but the straps were big which made the shoulders look odd
links_reviews_text: Love the color and the fabric. The look just was not me. Peasant type look and a bit large on the top. I think someone with a largest chest would look better in this dress.

links_reviews_title: Forgot I was a mom for a night!
links_reviews_text: Form fitting with stretch. Some occasional adjustments for the girls. Not sure how they would hold up dancing with the sexy cutout, but it was worth the rental.
Fits beautifully . Wish it were a tad shorter on my 5'3 frame but still love it . Hugs my curves nicely
The dress was perfect for a fall wedding. The small cutout was perfect and received so many compliments. Definitely would recommend!

Iove the dress. Size 2 fit perfect. I am 5 foot 6 130 pounds for reference. The chest is definitely more for a small chested person. Stretchy material. Be careful of zipper mine arrived and didn't work all the way.

I was worried this dress would be too casual for a formal wedding...it was not! The fabric is thick and looks luxurious in person and in photos. I received tons of compliments. I love the navy/black combo.
Everyone loved this dress. Very chic. Didn't need to wear spanx or anything because the fabric was so thick and flattering. Tight in the chest for me but I'm a D cup.

links_reviews_title: Fantastic dress for a wedding or other formal event!
links_reviews_text: This was a great dress to wear as a wedding guest! The 4 fit perfectly, I was able to wear comfortably without a bra (and without worrying about anything showing). In addition to being beautiful, it is incredibly comfortable and made of a nice thick fabric. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Got tons of compliments! It's sleek and classy but also a little sexy.
links_reviews_text: I tried on the 2 and the 4 because I thought the 2 was a little snug on bottom. Turned out the only difference between the two sizes was the bust, which was way too big for me in the size 4. For reference, I'm a 32B bra size and 135 lbs. I'm very much pear shaped.

Cute dress. The fit on me was tight through the ribcage but loose in the waist and a bit loose in the chest and armpits. A big longer than expected. I may try a size down but I'm worried I won't be able to zip it up.
Originally ordered the 2 but it was a bit wide in the hips. For a snug fit, consider ordering down a size. The top is not meant for larger chests but was perfect for me- no bra needed.

links_reviews_title: Wore to my 20 year high school reunion and received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Such a flattering dress and it offers plenty of support without the need for a bra!

This dress is amazing!! Beyond flattering and comfortable, got so many compliments. I dressed it up for a black tie wedding but you could downplay it also - very versatile. Loved the black and navy color scheme. Fabric travelled well, great for packing!
Not for busty petite girls unless that's the look you want. Couldn't even see the opening cuz my bust was too big and my waistline is too short. I really liked it tho

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a fall wedding paired with a cozy sweater.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great except for the length. For being 5'3, it hit between knees and ankles in an awkward spot. Otherwise, I loved it and received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! and its very flattering.
links_reviews_text: Thicker material that fits nice to smooth you right out : )

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and sexy. No bra needed. Would consider buying.
links_reviews_text: Easy to walk in because of the slit in the back. A little baggy in the tummy, but left me room to eat more! Lol

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove & stayed put!
links_reviews_text: This dress was super comfortable & fit very well. The fabric was thick enough not to show pantylines. The dress stayed put, including the straps. I got compliments all night & felt great!
I absolutely love this dress! It fit so well and had a little stretch to it which I loved. I got so many complements on it!
Love this dress. Super flattering and fits great!

links_reviews_title: Great to use for any ocassion.
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable and there's no need to wear a bra. It is very flattering because it is a dark color however for women with hourglass figures it may feel a bit "baggy" in the waist area. Even like that, it wasn't noticeable and not a big problem for me.
I loved the snug fit of this dress partnered with the length and cutout. It was the perfect combination of flattering and appropriate.

links_reviews_title: Love the dress. Fits like a glove.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear size 2 or 4, I went with a 2. You have to wear stick on bra or no bra. Be careful because underboob can show with the dress if you are jumping around. It didn’t bother me I just saw a hint of stick on boob in photos towards the end of the night. Overall sexy dress, would recommend.
Wore for nye, very sexy and flattering.
This dress was a headturner! I'm usually a size 4 and the 4 fit perfectly. It was super comfortable and I loved every second in it!

This was the perfect dress for NYE. The dress itself is super simple, but the cut out gives it just the right amount of edge. There is quite a bit of stretch, which made this dress super comfortable as well.
I rented this dress for a trip to Vegas. The length made it classy but the top is definitely a show stopper! It was almost too small for my chest, but hey, it was Vegas.
Originally rented this thinking it was black but it actually ended up working out with my date. Super cute. Though was tight, i was able to move around perfectly fine.

links_reviews_title: This dress is super hot! Rented it for my boyfriends holiday party. love the cut out!!!
links_reviews_text: The dress fits true to size. I was worried it might run small from other comments so I got a size up. Wore the 4. Fit like a glove in the chest, didn’t need a bra and had no issues w under boob. Smaller chested women will have no problems. The straps are adjustable too! The rest of the dress fit very well. Had some space in the stomach area so eating and dancing were fine. The butt had some space too, only place the dress was too large for me. My boyfriend loved the dress and I got so many compliments. The cut out in the front is hot and this dress is a dream. It’s tight enough but allows you to feel comfortable! The material is thick and looks classy. Rent this dress!! I wish I owned it :)

loved this rental! Very sleek/sophisticated and got a ton of complements. The dress runs true to size. Is fitted but a thick fabric so is forgiving. Was a little bit long (I'm 5'4) but overall worked out! Rented this for a non profit gala and it was a hit!

Pros: 5 stars for unique and sexy style. Not boring but not over the top. Wore to a friend's wedding. Might not be for a super conservative wedding. Depends on how you fit into the dress. Top is cut for smaller busts (at least the 0 and 2 were). Wore a black nu bra (must be black to blend in with the top where they meet). Length worked because the top is so showy. Needed the length to bring the sophistication. Wore with almost 4 inch heels, which helped to balance the length. Many compliments! Color blocking was so modern and loved that part too. Cons: Needed 10 minutes to situate myself in the dress with the nu bra, adjusting straps to avoid under boob cleavage (didn't know that was a thing until this rental), also used fashion tape to keep the nu bra and dress top aligned. Had to size up. The 0 was way too tight in certain areas of the bottom part of the dress. It was cut for a 0 with no bottom or minimal hips. The 2 looked better on both the top and bottom, but that weird fit on the bottom still existed. Wasn't so terribly noticeable from the side. Could not tell at all from the front. Wore spanx just in case for extra security. Wouldn't have needed spanx if the bottom had a better cut. 4 stars for the bottom part's cut. Guess it was all worth it.
Wore to Vegas. Loved it, fit like a glove but not too tight. Part of me wishes I could have kept it
This dress has some stretch to it and the material is just thick enough that it made me feel perfect in a form fitting shape. Super comfortable and tons of compliments.
Fit like a glove but had no stretch. Busty gals may deal with under boob at the cut out area. Got tons of compliments and felt very good in this dress.

This dress was surprisingly comfortable and very flattering! I loved the black top and blue bottom. The fabric is really comfortable and hugs your body so, you feel comfortable all night long. Loved it! Would rent again.

This dress is beautiful navy blue and black, trendy, comfortable, and a little sexy. I’m obsessed with the this dress and how it fit like a glove like it was custom made. I ordered the 4 and 6 and both actually worked. I choose the smaller size due to the smaller cup size. I received so many compliments from lots of girls at the party I attended and just felt amazing in this dress. Rent it!!!
Fit true to size. Dress runs long, but slit in high in the back. Beautiful dress.
The 2 was a little tight but this was such a gorgeous dress! Sexy yet classy and I'd definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: Received a ton of compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. Best for minimal bust. I wear size 4 usually and 34C, and it was perfect for yacht wedding in Chicago. Material was thick and classy feel to the dress. Only downfall, the dress arrived with busted zipper- but was able to still wear the dress and it was comfortable and looked elegant! Def must rent
I didn't want to take this dress off. I got so many compliments and felt so pretty in it. It fit true to size and I want to keep it forever. Perfect perfect perfect!!!!

I rented this dress for an art gallery wedding. It was the perfect mix of elegant with a tad bit of sexiness with the open mid area. The fit on the top bodice was a tad large with my smaller chest but I was still able to make it work without feeling like I was going to fall out of it. Received several compliments and felt great in it !!!!!

First, the color is beautiful. That's where the pros stop. The zipper was impossible to zip up once on. I broke both zippers trying to zip up. Then once it was on, it was very tight. If you are tall and slim, this would be perfect for you. It kept riding up the whole night. Im usually a 6 and I wore the 6, but only because the 8 ripped while trying to zip up. I'm 145 lbs and 5'4, 34a for reference. Then at the end of the night I couldn't get it off! I had to practically rip it off.
I wore this to a wedding and got many compliments. It fits ttts and was really easy to wear. Recommend!
Gorgeous dress! Wore it for an award party for my husband. Got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: So obsessed I rented it twice...and bought it!
links_reviews_text: The cutest dress - ended up buying it after I rented it twice. Fits like it was made for me

links_reviews_title: This dress was so classy and fun! I received compliments on it all evening!
links_reviews_text: The size 2 and 4 both fit me, but I found that the sleeves looked more tailored on the size 2. The 4 just seemed a little too big in the arms and bust. The length was perfect for someone more petite, I am 5'4". Could possibly be on the shirt side if you are taller.

links_reviews_title: Made the process so easy and stress free.
links_reviews_text: Size 6 fit perfectly
Super cute, great color! A little snug on my chest, but I still rocked it and loved it. So did everyone else! Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress! The fit is perfect, the color is perfect! Would wear this again and again and again!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a dream! I was worried when I ordered it since they didn't have my back up size but it was perfect! I'm 5'7" weigh 130lbs usually wear a size 6 which is what I ordered! I was concerned about the length but it wasn't too short at all! This dress fits in all the right places while also hiding some areas! Was very comfortable and confident all night in this dress! Tons of compliments!
Loved this dress to wear to a winter rehearsal dinner. Perfect fit and great color. Got lots of compliments all night. Would definitely rent again.

This brand runs small, but one size up was enough for me! Got so many compliments on the dress and was definitely set apart from all the other dresses. The sleeves are not snug, which was something I was worried about. Overall, the dress was beautiful, well made, and classy. Would rent again!!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for semi-formal wedding! Don't miss it!
links_reviews_text: This dress is fabulous. It fits well and is true to size. The texture is slightly stretchy unlike the other lace dresses which usually pretty stiff. Perfect length, perfect color for fall/winter wedding. #lookfabulous
Color was beautiful. This dress does run small so at least order your backup size a size up. The chest is full coverage and fully lined so I didn't have to wear a bra. Perfect for a winter affair.

My first option did not fit so this was my go to. It was a true to size fit BUT the zipper was extremely difficult to maneuver. My husband and a friend were not able to get it zipped. I ended up turning the zipper to the front and zipping it past the waist, turning it back around and having my husband zip it the rest of the way. I got compliments on this dress all night! Highly recommend!
Beautiful dress. Loads of compliments

links_reviews_title: Everyone commented on the dress! People lived it and how flirty is was!

links_reviews_text: I weigh 130 lbs, am 5'6 and typically carry my eight in the middle so I went with the six!
Beautiful fit and very nice quality!
Loved this dress so much! Got so many compliments on it! The only thing is how small it fits. Make sure to size up significantly, especially if you have a larger chest.
True to size

I absolutely loved the fit of the dress. It was the perfect fit all around. Got lots of compliments all night. The only con would be that the zipper was a little tough work with. Other than that I have nothing but positive things to say. Dress fit a little longer than I hoped but that was expected since I am only 4'11, still looked great though!
I got so many compliments for this dress! It was beautiful and made me feel great. I would size up if you have fuller hips like I do.

links_reviews_title: This was the first time using RTR and I absolutely loved it. Super easy and the dress was perfect
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this dress the color is gorgeous and fit perfectly. The material is nice- I was worried it might be uncomfortable but it was great for an all night event

I got this dress for my husband's company dinner in Ireland and it was perfect. Comfortable to wear and I got a ton of compliments. It was just long enough for my height, but if you're over 5'9" you'll probably find it to be too short.
The dress is fabulous, very high quality lace, beautiful color and cut. I rented the 0 for my daughter she is 105 lbs and 5'4, it fitted her perfect

I'm typically a 4 and the 6 seemed to fit perfect. It feels very short on but you are definitely covered up! The skirt inches up when you sit so just be mindful when taking a seat! Love the color and the lace is well made. The long sleeves are great for more formal evens while the weather is still on the chilly side up north.

I nervously made a 2nd attempt at RTR for a mid-March wedding. My 1st attempt was in March 2012 [when RTR was starting to become increasingly popular], and it just didn't worm out. 2nd time around in 2019 - what a positive difference IMO!!! This dress was perfect for so many reasons!! This delightful 2nd time around with RTR came about for similar reasons to 2012--In search of a dress for that 'Wednesday-hump-day-like' month that March is... "Not so much winter, but not so much spring" (aka "WHAT KIND OF DRESS IS APPROPRIATE?"). Well this dress was IT. Truly answered that border-like season question. Beautiful color (just like the picture), long sleeved-yet just enough classy-short for those hopeful-spring vibes. Lesson learned: Always give something a 2nd shot!

This is a beautiful dress perfect for a winter event. I received tons of compliments. The fabric of the dress is thick and of good quality. I am more pear shaped and size 0 was a little snug in the hips but the size 2 fit perfectly.
