The fit was amazing. The length was great with some mid-high heels. The color was probably my favorite. With some black heels and fun earrings, it's good for any occasion in my opinion. Would definitely rent again!
So flattering! The color was AMAZING!!!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit perfectly. It felt very comfortable and warm for a winter evening event. Super cute
links_reviews_text: Size 2 was too tight in the shoulders, so I wore the size 4. Perfect fit! I felt super comfortable in it all night. The zipper was a little difficult to close, but I find this to be true for a lot of well made dresses.

links_reviews_title: I received SO many compliments on this drrss
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove!! Will rent again!!

links_reviews_title: This was so pretty on my 12 year old. She loved it and was so confident wearing it. Many compliments
links_reviews_text: This zipper is tricky. We tried 2 sizes in this dress and both zippers were the same. It feels like it get stuck while zipping up, but just pull a litter harder and it will zip!

I loved this dress! The 4 was a perfect fit, but the 6 had just enough wiggle room to not worry if it would be too tight at the end of the night. The 4 was a good fit, but the waist band has no give. I wore the 6 and it was still fitted just a little more comfortable. I thought the sleeves, in both sizes, fit well around the arms, not too tight not too long. The dress feels like it's super short and that you might be hanging out, but the ruffles cover everything. I would just be cautious sitting down and getting in/out of cars. It was great to dance, eat and drink in. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Feminine, fun, gorgeous teal color. Compliments all night long!
links_reviews_text: Its a fun, flirty, feminine dress that was a great choice for my husband's 40th birthday cocktail party. It actually wasn't my first choice, but it was my husband's first choice, and since he's the bday boy, i went with it. I got tons of compliments all night long! The fabric and the color are gorgeous. I'm 5'3" 117# 32B (33-26-36) and the size 2 was too tight across the waist. The size 4 was still snug but totally doable for an all evening event. The weird part is the proportions. I found the breast area to be too low for the size 2, but better (less noticeable maybe because the fabric didn't bunch as much) on the size 4. Its great for a petite figure. Anyone over 5'5" or someone leggy and you're in mini skirt territory. I wore with opaque-ish tights and wish I had gone with something a little less translucent since the top is visually delicate. Highly recommend this dress if you're looking for a fun, lacy, feminine party dress.

This was my first RTR rental since having my baby (3 months pp), so I was looking for a beautiful dress that would still hide the baby weight in my tummy area. I LOVED the look of this dress and how flattering it was! I'm normally a 4, but I sized up and wore the 6. I felt beautiful and received so many compliments! I really loved that it was so unique and such a gorgeous shade of green. I would absolutely recommend this dress!
Fit nicely not to short. I'm 5'2. True to size. I was worried sleeves would be too long but they were perfect. I highly recommend it for a formal outdoor wedding.

The fit was almost perfect for someone petite like me. Length was perfect - the only thing I can complain about is the length of the sleeves. They were a tad too long, but I pretty much ignored that the whole night. It was a nice thick material that helped during a cold January day/night. And the material and color looked beautiful. Would recommend
Loved this dress. There wasn't much of a difference in sizing between the 6 and 8 but I wore the 8 to give me a little more breathing room. I didn't need to wear a bra, the dress held everything in.

Rented this dress for brunch on my 21st birthday and I could not have been happier!! So many compliments and I felt like a million dollars. The fabric is pretty thick because it is such a well made dress. Beware that the zipper is a little difficult just because of the nature of the fabric - grab a friend!

I got so many compliments on this dress. It was gorgeous. A little shorter than I was hoping. But all in all perfect. It was more gold than blush - just an FYI since it says blush but everyone has been saying they love my gold dress.

links_reviews_title: I felt like I belonged at the top of an Oscar trophy!
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress! I am a pretty true to size 6, and this dress fit really well. I am 5 feet tall and wore 3 inch heels and the length was perfect. I got so many compliments and was sad to send it back. It was definitely a high quality piece. My one piece of feedback is that I've had 2 kids and was a little worried about my mommy pooch. My husband loved it, but I was a bit self conscious - especially for pictures. I still loved the dress, but something to be aware of!

links_reviews_title: I attended the San Francisco Opening Night at the Ballet Gala
links_reviews_text: I LOVED, LOVED this dress. I felt like a celebrity. The fit and the length were perfect! The dress was more of a rose colored which I thought photographed quite nicely. I love anything sparkly and this was perfect for me! I also rented earrings and the gold purse which I adored! This is the perfect dress for any fancy event.

This was actually a replacement dress because my original was not available. It was too big, but I wore it any way because I thought it fit my body best besides being too large. This was for an industry awards gala

links_reviews_title: The dress was out of this world and perfect for my event!
links_reviews_text: Really glad I was able to get this dress when the first one didn't fit. This was a game changer for me. Especially since I was getting an award and making a speech. This dress was as good as a wonder woman outfit.

Fit VERY well - did not wear bra or any spanx, just pasties. I have 26 in waist and 38 in hips, this was flattering and perfect as my second dress. It is LONG, and I think even with heels it may have dragged a bit. I was wearing flats and definitely had to hold it up while walking and dancing, but the fact that there was a decent sized slit made it almost like carrying a little train and it wasn't that hard. Loved it so much and got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: This dress was for a New Years party.
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on it. I’m only 5’4, so I normally would’ve gotten the Petite but they didn’t have it. I’m so glad I got the regular. With heels it fit perfectly and the length was great. I didn’t trip or feel like I might. It’s very flattering on my belly which is my problem area. Under my arms got a little sore by the end of the night, but that’s true with any sequin dress. I highly recommend this one!
I rented this dress for a formal NYE wedding. It fit perfectly and was very comfortable. So many complements! Great dress.

links_reviews_title: The dress was very appropriate for the event.
links_reviews_text: I definitely had to wear a girdle with this but I was about to enter a size 18 with my weight. Everyone loved how I looked in the dress.

I wore this for a black tie holiday party and got so many compliments!! The dress is comfortable and moves with you without any issues (even on the dance floor!). It fit perfectly over my large chest (36DD) as well, which is what I was mainly worried about. I highly suggest it!!

I rented this gown for my husband's military ball! I read reviews saying the dress runs large. I ordered a size 6 and a size 4 backup. They both fit but the 4 was skin tight. That wasn't the look I was going for, so I wore the size 6. I'm 5'4" and the dress was a little long but not enough to bother me. The dress itself is a show stopper. I received many compliments and felt very confident in it! This is a great dress for ladies like me with "mom pooch"! Highly recommend RTR!
Gorgeous and sparkly but a bit big and long on me. Would have like a size or 2 down.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and perfect for the occasion
links_reviews_text: Perfectly elegant dress for formal party! Felt like I looked the part of glamor even though I am not glamorous. The only problem with the dress is after a few hours the sequins irritate the inside of the arms, but this is a problem with most sequins things I've worn.

The dress was beautiful! I got many compliments and it was surprisingly not itchy! I feel like it was big though. The mid section area was big and that may have been due to my small bust size. It worked fine but if I could redo, I would have got a 0P.

links_reviews_title: I felt like the belle of the ball!
links_reviews_text: The minute I saw this dress, I had to get it for an award ceremony I was attending. I have no regrets because it was LOVELY! As a very curvy woman, this dress was so flattering. I'm most self conscious about my belly, but with my shape wear and the cut of the dress, I didn't have to hide or suck in at all. I felt like a star and highly recommend. I normally wear a 14 but went up to a 16 because it was all that was available and I'm glad I did. I think a 14 would have been a little too snug - I was able to move freely and easily in this gown.

links_reviews_title: Black tie dinner at an elite country club and I have never felt more glamourous.
links_reviews_text: The dress was a bit heavy to wear in the midst of a southern heat wave but it was gorgeous
The gown is fabulous and has tummy forgiving ruching! There's just enough stretch to make the gown comfortable. In fact, I was comfortable all night! I wore a strapless bra and it was perfect!
I rented this dress for a gala and got so many compliments on it! It fit perfectly, was a nice thick material and was comfortable enough to dance in all night long.

links_reviews_title: My best friend got married and I was super comfortable in my dress!
links_reviews_text: I love the thigh slit because I love for them. The boob part fit perfect for my small size. I wasn’t a huge fan of the tummy area. There was a lot of extra space there when I bent over it gave me a double stomach. Other than that, the process was very simple and easy and I really liked using this company.

links_reviews_title: The dress is gorgeous and worked well as attire for military ball.
links_reviews_text: The dress is snug in the mid-section and fit perfectly up top. My post-pregnancy belly with diastasis recti stuck out a bit. I wore the 6R because I wanted it snug up top but the 8R fit my belly better. In hindsight should have chosen something more flattering to my mid-section but I’m glad I gave this dress a try.
The fit was right on and it was a gorgeous dress! It's more gold than rose gold but, it matched up to rose gold just fine. You would not have any issues with this dress if you rented it!

links_reviews_title: This dress has been complimented by Gloria Gaynor
links_reviews_text: This dress is so good it got almost my entire family into an after-party where we met astronaut Buzz Aldrin. My brother didn't get to go, but that had nothing to do with the dress. Rent it — you will not regret it. It fit perfectly, was very comfortable all night long, the slit was high enough to show a little leg but I didn't feel like it showed too much and I felt absolutely amazing in it. Sending it back was a very sad moment for me and I briefly considered hosting my own black-tie gala just so I'd have an excuse to buy one.

links_reviews_title: I was the MOH @ my sister’ wedding. This dress got compliments from everyone! It did not disappoint!
links_reviews_text: Pros: True to size if you got your size. The rose gold color and sparkles were spot on! Cons: The top was a bit big and the mid section made me look wide in some angles. However, it served its purpose!

Great dress! I was told all night I looked like an Oscar or an Emmy! Dress was really comfortable and fit great. The slit is perfect and is just the right amount of sexy. I'm 5'3" and wore small heels and length was perfect. The draping of the fabric is really slimming. Followed others advice on the body glide - never felt itchy at all. Dress is just SO GLAMOROUS!! Definitely a show-stopping dress where people you don't even know will tell you how great you look.
Nothing but compliments...loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on the dress
links_reviews_text: I felt more comfortable in the 14R but the top part under the arm without the sleeve was kind of sagging. That part looked better in the 12 but I wanted a little more room and length that I was able to get with the 14. Breastfeeding mom, 6 months post partum.

links_reviews_title: I wore a size 4R for my senior prom.
links_reviews_text: The fit was way too big. I ordered a size 4R but definitely should’ve went with a 2. The dress was pretty but was unflattering around the waste in photos. It took a lot of posing to be satisfied with my look. Overall it’s a beautiful dress but I personally would not order it again.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments! This dress is stunning and surprisingly very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect. It’s not itchy and not too tight but very slimming.
Fits beautifully so many compliments at prom

I wore the 2 and it fit like a glove. I'm 5'1 and 115lbs. The length was perfect with 4" heels. The bust area was a tad big but no one could notice that. The side slit was classy and the sparkling blush color was just what I was looking for... I wore this as a chair of a fundraising gala and I got a million compliments.

links_reviews_title: The dress was amazing in so many ways. Fit well, was incredibly flattering on me, and it stood out!
links_reviews_text: I was concerned about whether or not the dress would be flattering on me (I’m 5’6’’ 145 lbs) but to my surprise it was very forgiving. I felt like a princess in this dress! I would definitely rent it again!

I loved this dress. I wore it to a masquerade ball, and it was perfect. I had two minor issues - I should have gone with the long instead of the regular, as it was a little short. Also, the sequins tend to rub on your arms if you have larger arms, so my upper arms were pretty raw by the end of the night with all the dancing. A little Vaseline, lotion, or deodorant would have probably helped here and now I know for the next time. I'd definitely wear this again: I got a bunch of compliments on it!
This dress is beautiful and fits like a glove. I was the Maid of Honor and this dress made me feel worthy of the role (besides the bride being my sister). This dress was soooo comfortable as well!!
Very comfortable. Easy to dance in for compliments all night loved it.

links_reviews_title: I recieved so many compliments on this dress
links_reviews_text: Great fit
Ran too big, the lining did not lay right on the bottom and overall not very flattering.
Love this dress!! Fit like a glove! The Rent the Runway experience was easy, affordable, and fun!! I will use this again!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress with very complimentary fit!
links_reviews_text: Worn to a formal gala and received more compliments than ever. Dress is very comfortable and gathers in just the right places to conceal problem areas. Will definitely wear this designer again.

This dress is gorgeous and the 6R runs a tad bit on the larger side. I'm a size 6-8 normally and this dress actually fit perfect on me. Very comfortable. I'm 5'5 140lbs and the length was perfect. I wore 3 inch heels. The tummy part gave me lots of room (I have a small mom belly). No itching under arms from sequins either. It's a perfect dress! No complaints!
This dress fit perfectly. With heels, the length was great. It's extremely flattering and very sexy. It was also surprisingly comfortable and I didn't even need to wear spanx with it! 10/10

Loved this dress! It was comfortable, stretchy, and really stood out at the gala! Would definitely order again, and would recommend for a formal affair. It's tight, so probably not ideal if there are plans for crazy dancing. But definitely enough space to move around and enjoy one self!

links_reviews_title: This was my back up but I loved it for my event!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. It fit perfectly and made me feel wow. I wore it to a Heart Ball and it was just right for the event. The fit is tight, but the dress is still comfortable.
Dress was a show stopper. Very forgiving and gorgeous! I am size 10 an 6'0". Dress was all the way to the floor ( never happens)

I typically wear a size 2 and I was shocked that I could barely fit the size 2 over my hips. Thankfully, my second size was a size 4L which fit very well. It was hard to get up and down stairs and had difficulty getting into the car because of the mermaid style but it was worth it as I received a ton of compliments. Showed the right amount of cleavage and still classy. Length was perfect. Recommend renting this dress Measurements: 32C, 24 waist, 35 hips. 5'9, 127 lbs.
Lovely gown. Hugged in all the right places! Would rent again!
5'8 140, fit perfect , very elegant
I rented this in a 12R and 14R. I normally wear a 12 in most dress sizes, but ended up wearing the 14 in this dress. It was very flattering and comfortable to wear! I got lots of compliments.

This definitely will get you noticed! The fabric is thick and expensive looking, with a matte finish and nice drape. I'm 5'8" and the Long was actually a hair too long, with 4" heels. This dress has almost no stretch, so I had to size up to fit my curvy hips. This meant the bust and waist were a little roomy, so some bra padding was required to keep things proportional. The mesh insert adds a little extra sexy but also makes undergarments a challenge. Be brave! It's worth it!
Flattering and comfortable, it fit like a glove!
This dress is absolutely stunning. It hugged my curves perfectly and I got so many compliments.

This dress is really gorgeous. Got SO many compliments all night at The GRAMMYs. Took off one star as the sizing is a bit weird - it runs small but was large on my chest and a bit short for me (I'm 5'5"). Material didn't wrinkle as I sat through the entire GRAMMY awards. Fair warning as the side mesh cutout makes it nearly impossible to wear Spanx!

links_reviews_title: Stunning, classy dress! Tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I'm a fuller figure gal and wanted something top notch for a formal party. Took a chance on this one and it was so worth it! Was disappointed I couldn't wear shape wear ( side mesh detail also showed regular underwear) so my full tummy was the one downside for me. Tons and TONS of compliments all night! I felt so fancy!

links_reviews_title: Showstopper that is comfortable and flattering! Wish I owned this one.
links_reviews_text: LOVE this dress so much. I don't wear red a lot but this made me feel like a million bucks and that I should go bold more often. Dress fits like a glove, but the material is nice and thick and supportive so I didn't have to wear any shapewear -- crazy. Fits true to size and is so FUN. So many compliments.

links_reviews_title: I did not want to give this back!!!
links_reviews_text: The fit, the color, the peekaboo mesh on the side, the mermaid silhouette. ALL of the things made this gown a show stopper! I got so many compliments and felt absolutely gorgeous in this dress!

links_reviews_title: Bold, fun color and flattering fit!
links_reviews_text: Order your extra dress down a size. Not sure if my order was stretched out, but fit was very large at the bust and hips and long. Super high heels, fashion tape, and a padded bra saved me. If on edge of regular and petite, go with petite

I was super nervous about this dress and it's plunging neckline and hip-hugging reviews. However the chest area was somewhat tight fitting but the waist and stomach area were very loose. I had seen a previous review of the 6L where they mentioned the seam was coming apart on the left side, sadly I received this same dress (it had not been repaired). Also upon steaming it, I noticed a few vertical stains at the bottom, but with the excess fabric, the stains were hidden in the folds. Over all, I received compliments on the dress all night long during the company holiday party that was Madmen themed (60's retro style). I wore 4" heels and length was perfect.

Honestly, I can't say enough good stuff about this dress. I wore it to a black tie charity event and literally strangers were coming up to me all night and telling me how amazing it was. It fits very snug, I had to zip it up and then put the girls in and pull the straps up. The material has NO give but it holds you in because of that. It was right in the tummy area but also held me in at the same time. Be prepared for compliments. Def a showstopper!

I tried both the size 8 & 10 but felt I could move a little more in the 10. Got soo many compliments, head turns & I felt so confident & hot in it! I ended up going braless because my bra was showing so keep that in mind...Loved wearing it for sure!

This dress is amazing. For me like a glove. I could have gone down a size but it wasn't available. For busty girls it is a little revealing but I was able to wear it without any bra or anything. Note. For you're planning on amazing it does restrict some movement bc of the mermaid bottom however still a stunner. Shape wear is impossible due to the side panel but the fabric is thick enough I didn't feel like I needed it. I got so many compliments.
Perry dress but wore my 2nd option. Tight at the bottom and hard to walk or move much
Fit like a glove. So elegant. Perfect for the military ball. Would probably be revealing if you have large breasts but I don't.
Fit well, very comfortable.
Low cut but stunning. Comfortable without a bra.

Got a lot of compliments on this dress and the color is a pinkish red. Cut pretty low on the bust. My bra poked out a couple times and I wish i used garment tape. Overall, great choice for the curves.
Beautiful form fitting and flattering. One of the only dresses I could find where the length was also perfect since I'm short.

The 14L was a tad big, the 12L would have been better but they didn't have it available, it still worked just fine. Loved how it shows my curves and the red is amazing! There is a side panel that is a sheer red on the other side of the dress, I wore a nude spanx type brief underwear and it worked fine, couldn't see it because there is a fabric at the waist between the two sheer panels, but it's sheer to the hip. And wore stick on bra cups, any bra will show. Loved how I felt in it!
I loved this dress! Unfortunately wasn't able to wear it because it was a bit too revealing for the event I was attending. Would definitely rent for another event.

Loved the whole RTR look! I rented the gown, cuff and clutch to complete the look. I also liked that this gown came in Long sizing options - I am 5'7" and 145 lbs. 6L with 4" heels - perfect!!! I wore a Nubra as suggested in details. Because of the sheer on the right side, you really can't wear anything under/spanx bc it would show there, so you need to suck in your tummy - the dress is a great stretchy tight fabric though, so that helps!!
Stunning dress! This was my backup dress up, but didn’t end up wearing it. It fit great! I am 5’6”, 145lbs 34DDD chest. The stomach area felt a little big, but overall it was a super sexy dress.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a military ball and it matched perfectly with the occasion.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like a glove. I'm 5'6" and currently 11 weeks pregnant, so I'm a bit bloated in the abdomen, but I felt truly beautiful in this dress. The chest area was a bit large for my little boobs, but it worked out alright. I wore stickies on my nipples.

links_reviews_title: My dress fit me in all the right places! I love how comfy and stretchy the material is.
links_reviews_text: My only con would be that it was a little long on the bottom, but other than that super lightweight fabric. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: This dress is so hot!!! I felt like Selena!
links_reviews_text: The dress is a head turner for sure! I didn’t wear it bc I wear a size 32DDD and it was too low cut for the wedding but I highly recommend it if you want to break some necks! Enjoy!
I wore this dress for a wedding. It was perfect! I wore a bra with it. It's gorgeous and super comfortable. I also rented it in black for a Gala.
Loved this dress! Very flattering shape to it! I got so many compliments :)

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress!! It was perfect for my friend's wedding. I got a ton of compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size.
This dress will make you feel glamorous from head to toe! True to size. I am 5'4" and weigh 118 lbs and wore a 2R. Highly recommend!
Great dress a bit short.

Loved this dress! I felt so glamorous in it and got many compliments all night. Due to the sheer side panels, I wasn't able to wear a bra with this. I'm small chested so I improvised with Hollywood-taping bikini top inserts to the bust as makeshift cutlets. I'm 5'10" and the long was perfect with 1.5 inch heels (could have worn a higher heel without issue).

links_reviews_title: This was my first time renting from RTR and it was incredible! Dress fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a perfect fit and I received so many compliments on it! I am 5'3 and weigh around 130 lbs with curvier hips and bum but a smaller bust and the dress hit my curves in all the right ways!

links_reviews_title: A Good Solid Top...Dress It Up or Down!
links_reviews_text: I just love Waverly Grey and this top is no exception. The brand makes pieces that are effortless yet sophisticated and so unique. This top is incredibly comfortable, TTS and can be dressed up or down. A good solid top!

links_reviews_title: Not quite what I was hoping
links_reviews_text: Like other reviews said, it was a bit hard to figure out the ties, but it was cute on. I rented to wear to a party in Mexico but wasn't quite satisfied with the fit. I have a larger chest and the cut makes the short poof out a bit and I felt it obscured my shape, so I didn't end up wearing anywhere.
Love how it looks , perfect for a casual day!

links_reviews_title: Flattering fun print to wear for a night out
links_reviews_text: I rented this top to wear out on the weekend to go dancing with my girlfriends. When you initially put it on it fits a little odd but once you tighten the straps it fits well and looks super cute tucked in with denim jeans or even a white or denim pair of shorts. It was a little chilly this weekend so I opted for the jeans. Danced all night with this top, was able to wear a strapless bra comfortably with it. Got lots of compliments as well. I'm 5'7" and 157 lbs for reference. The medium fit well for my athletic body

Silk material made it breathable on a hot summer night in Texas. Super cute and flattering across the shoulders. All the ruffles and the tie at the neck adds volume so if you're busty, it might be too bulky. I'm slim and only C cup so was fine.

links_reviews_title: Loved the top for date night with my husband! Lots of compliments and fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: It was a little big ....probably could have gone with the medium. But I made it work and really enjoyed wearing it!!
Loved the way this top fit. It is such a fun too for night out. Took me a little bit to figure how to put it on but it was worth it!

links_reviews_title: Fun unique top to wear with jeans
links_reviews_text: Spices up jeans for date night or vacation... very cute!
I loved this shirt. The fabric is amazing. It's a little hard to put on but other than that I had no complaints. I'm usually between a XS and S and the XS fit great! Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Fun top! Tight in the chest.
links_reviews_text: This top has a flowy ruffle over the bust, but the fabric underneath is tight with no stretch. That layer rode up all night and caused a strange fit. If you're busty size up.

This top is awesome! It took me a few minutes to figure out how to get it on correctly, and to tie it up. I like how adjustable the straps are. I didn't need a bra, as the ruffle was enough coverage. The fit was perfect. I paired it with black pants and peep toe heels. I got many compliments. Hubby said it was sexy!
Got so many compliments! Looked so cute with white jeans. A little bit tight around the arms. If I was planning on dancing in it I'd go a size up
Colors were more faded in person. Had to keep pulling this shirt down in the back so that you couldn't see the inside of the shirt in the front. But overall fun to wear

Pro-Drapes well. Can wear with any strapless, good coverage but still sexy. Cons-rolls a little on front -either side of boobs-kept having to adjust. Not nice enough quality to buy. Short-wore with high waisted jeans (to be fair I have a long torso).

Great top! Such a unique design. The straps come up from the back and tie at the neck, which makes it a tad awkward to get on, but also gives you the ability slightly customize the fit. The colors of the shirt make it easy to pair with many pant colors. It runs a tad large, especially in the chest area to the draped sleeves.

Cannot say enough good things about this shirt. The pattern, the fit, the cut at the top, the flowy-ness--absolute perfection! It does take a minute to figure out how to tie it, but is really simple once you understand what you're supposed to do--the straps start in the back and then you just loop them through the front (there is a little fabric loop/hook to do so) and tie straps together in a bow. You can easily adjust fit (i.e. how low the cold shoulder sleeves fall on your arms) by tying more loosely or tightly. You absolutely must rent this one!
Looks good tucked in as I found the cut to be wide and a little to blousy around the waist. I wore to a beach party event and the bare shoulders and upper back got me much attention!
I nearly bought this! I kept it for several weeks and wore it multiple times - absolutely loved it!
This topic cute colors and a great fit. The way the ties are it's completely adjustable. Fabric has a high-quality feel to it and it's easy to match things with. Will rent again!
This top was flirty and fun. Perfect for a date night or a hot afternoon!

Obsessed with this top! The pattern is unique and beautiful and the fabric is luscious. I wore it with white shorts and nude heels for a day of rooftop patio hopping in Chicago. It was perfect. Would say it fits TTS to maybe a little on the large side. I am thinking about buying this one...

This top was so fun for a bday date with my hubby! It worked great with a standard strapless bra and had such fun colors, patterns, etc. I would say that if you plan to be moving around a lot, it might be a bit annoying. But for a helicopter ride and dinner, it was perfect!
Easy style for casual with a touch of pizazz!

Really loved this top! I received tons of compliments at the "mom" comedy event I attended. But it is short in the waist. If you are like me and have had a few kids (and the marks they leave behind on your abdomen) you may want to take this into account. You'll be a little self conscious if you need to raise your hand. Ha! You can adjust the neckline so that is what I ended up doing and it helped tremendously. I did wear the medium but could have pulled the small off as well. I
I wore this on my honeymoon in Aruba. Very fun and airy - perfect for the heat in the Caribbean!

Very pretty and comfortable top. There is comfortable room in the bust, so I'd say its great for any cup size. The shirt fits loosely. The fabric has no stretch, so if you get a back up size, I would size up. A strapless bra works best with this top. I tried this shirt outside my pants, and also tuck into my high waisted pants. Both ways looked nice!

links_reviews_title: Just trying out RTR unlimited, so far it's great!
links_reviews_text: It was a bit short but otherwise a great fit! I loved the beautiful colors in this top!
Super light, fashionable and trendy. Loved it!

This was a lovely top! Perfect for spring/summer. I rented this for our weekend getaway to Chicago. I'm 5'4 138 and the small fit nicely - though I think I could get away with an XS. Style note: The straps start at the back - go over the shoulders - and loop them through to the front part. Then just tie like normal.

I absolutely loved this! This top was so fun and versatile. You can dress it up or down. Great for summer as it's airy and light weight. I am 5'2 and wore the XS. It could be shorter on longer waisted or taller people but it fit me perfectly length wise. I highly recommend and I will be renting this beauty again.

links_reviews_title: Cute for a date or girls' night out
links_reviews_text: This top had a fun, summery print and a trendy off- shoulder fit. It took a little effort to fix the ties to look just right. It looks nice with white jeans or shorts and a coral lipstick. I'd say it was mostly true to size, with the understanding that it's a naturally loose fitting style.
Was nice and loose and covered my arms and belly which are my areas i'm conscious about nowadays. I wore them with black torn jeans and heels and felt comfortable yet stylish.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it. It was too short.
links_reviews_text: Not my style
Fun print and colors, and love the cut once I figured how to get into it. Easy to adjust the length of the necktie if you need a longer length in the torso.
Cute top- great for a party in Florida. Lots of compliments
Felt amazing to wear. And it's very flattering
Super flowy, not my favorite

links_reviews_title: Wore for my husbands birthday dinner
links_reviews_text: Cute..
Received lots of compliments
Cute but if hot outside the shirt doesn't breathe.

I love how I feel in this! The top is form fitted enough that I don't need to wear a bra and the see through sleeve is super sexy without being overt. The crotch and shorts are long however. I'm considering buying this and taking them up significantly.

links_reviews_title: Fun to wear a romper to a wedding
links_reviews_text: It was fun to be able to wear a romper to a wedding. Felt super dressy even with the shorts.
Great twist on a classic black piece. Felt like a million bucks in this hot romper
I really enjoyed wearing this

This fits like a glove. Super comfy but fitted enough to show off your curves. If it wasn't so much I would for sure be buying this. Great length too- enough to show off legs without being compromising.
This romper is amazing! The lace detailing on the sleeve is gorgeous and has a little sparkle to it.

This arrived two days sooner than I expected. I was pleasantly surprised there was some shimmer in the lacy part of the top and the details on the sleeve. Talk about comfy and figure-flattering! I got compliments all night long. People even thought I participated in the parade this was so perfect to the themed event. I'm not sure if this was mine or they all do this, but the neck gaped a little. It wasn't bad, just expected it to hug my neck more than it did. And as others before me have said, this one is easier if you have a friend help you get in/out of it as the zipper sticks periodically as you're zipping/unzipping. It can be done by yourself, if you're flexible.
Rented this for NYE and wanted to keep it! I loved the lace detail on the shoulder and the POCKETS. Was able to wear a nude bra with it and it fit TTS. Will definitely consider renting again!
good quality fit would rent again
Wore this to a concert and got tons of compliments. It's unassuming on the hanger but fits really well, especially for taller gals. I'm typically a 4, but the 2 fit perfectly.

Comfortable fit! I sized up because I tried this on at RTR store and a 4 fit, but it was a little snug. If you think you are going to be in this for a few hours, I would size up! I'm short & have hips, so I think this style was perfect for my body type.

I had fun wearing it out and I loved the neckline but didn't love the whole piece. The zipper was also in hen back and I could barely zip it up myself and so going to the bathroom was impossibly difficult

links_reviews_title: Shiny beautiful detail on the arm
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. found it a little difficult to lift my arms all the way however. I also found it a little awkward with the zipper up the back-I could not use the restroom because I did not have anyone to come with me to help withthe zipper, but maybe that is just me.
Perfect for petites

links_reviews_title: Super comfy & stylish, with added bonus of long sleeves
links_reviews_text: Loved this look, super easy to wear, classic and sexy at the same time. Big fan!
I ordered it a size up because I'm always nervous about the shorts riding up. This was perfect. Wore it to an Elton John concert. It was dressy yet casual. Very comfortable. Will rent it again
This was cute, worn with black tights to a wine event.

links_reviews_title: Perfect sparkle for a 21st birthday in Vegas!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous and comfortable dress. The sparkles look very high end (not trashy at all!) and the dress has a flattering wrap feature in the front as well. Not too short (and I'm 5'8"!).

I agree with the other reviews to order a size down. I am 5'8" and an athletic 151 pounds and normally don't wear a small, but in this I did. This dress shows your legs and an arm, but even on me (with a 34DDD bust and going down to a small) it leaves room in the bust and belly. An irksome feature if you want to show your curves, but nice if you'd like to enjoy the buffet or are wanting to conceal a pooch. I did not find the sequins to be bothersome. If you have to dress alone, you can do so in this dress by zipping it all the way up and still getting it on over your head. I recommend the dress because it's a fun statement piece and as long as you size down accordingly, it should fit about anyone (under 5'10" without showing Christmas). I do think the medium I tried on first was actually shorter than the small that I ended up wearing. Also, I do have long arms, but the sleeve length was a bit irritating; I wished it to have been either an inch shorter or longer.
Love this dress! It was a bit loose in the waist but I made it work. Compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Perfect lbd for a bachelorette party!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a winter bachelorette party. Thought it would be too short since I'm 5'9 but with tights it was fine. Just the right amount of sexy and loved the one long sleeve. The sequins was also super soft, not itchy at all. There was a little gapping on the off the shoulder side but was able to tuck it into my bra and it looked fine. Great rent!
Perfect for 007 theme party. It runs big. So please order one full size down. I normally wear XS, but ordered XXS and it fit perfect.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress just too big on me
links_reviews_text: Ordered this to wear to a sorority date party, but was a little on the big side. Sleeve was also very puffy and looked a little odd.

links_reviews_title: Great statement dress, but definitely SIZE DOWN!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, and would definitely rent again. Very flattering, and surprisingly comfortable. There's a shoulder detail that is hard to see in photos, that I wasn't sure about at first, but ended up loving. It gave the dress a sort of militant feel. This definitely runs large! I'm normally a 10, so chose a large, with an XL as my backup size as I usually size up in dresses this fitted. Both were far too big! Luckily, RTR overnighted me a medium, which ended up being just about perfect.

I only got one size, small, which I believe this designer equivalates to a US size 6. I'm normally between a 4 and 6 and this dress felt loose on me but that might be why it was so comfortable. No scratches from the sequins. Movable. Easy to zip up. I don't normally rent black because it feels boring but this was enough sexy with the one sleeve and cut of the front even in Vegas and I got complimented at dinner on it. Hubby loved it. I wore nude heels. 34C chest fit with room @mlyayn
Super cute. Glad I went with the XS even though I'm traditionally a 4.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so amazing! Made this new mom of twins feel fabulous.
links_reviews_text: I'm a pear shape and with a little bit of stretch, the dress fit in all the right places. I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but exceedingly micro in length.
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit but not the length..

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a bachelorette party at a club! It well, was classy, and was comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I am 130 lbs./5'4" and I usually wear a size 4/size small or medium. But, in this dress, the size x-small fit well and was not tight at all. Even the sleeve was not tight. It was the perfect length on me, about midway down my thigh, but I am 5'4" and have short legs. It was extremely comfortable and the sequins did not bother me or itch at all. I wore this dress for a bachelorette party and everyone loved it!! Everyone kept asking where I got it. Also, I love that the sequins are matte, and not shiny.
Fit perfectly, not itchy
I wore this and got so many compliments. I felt so confident in it and it fit well for the most part! I could have used a smaller size (usually a 00-0) but overall 10/10

links_reviews_title: I received a size 6 when I ordered a size xxs:( I could not wear to my party.
links_reviews_text: Wish it had fit! Looked beautiful!
Really pretty, comfortable and true to size, I really loved this
Great dress for a summer wedding guest.

Loved loved loved this dress! It was cute and flowy and fit the atmosphere of my friends outdoor wedding perfectly! The fabric is gorgeous and flows beautifully. It was a bit tight in the chest but I'm busty so I expected that. Surprisingly the ruffles in the front of the dress did not make my chest look huge (huger than normal anyway) and they fell really beautifully along the neckline of the dress. The one thing I will add is that if you've got a big set of boobs there will be A LOT of cleavage shown with this dress. You can use the tie in the front like I did to cover up a bit but you'll need fashion tape or pins to keep it in place. Otherwise it was an amazing rental and I would definitely wear it again!
Super flattering, feminine and lots of compliments!

Originally rented this dress for a party and didn't end up wearing it due to weather. It was too cute to send back unworn so I decided to wear pink to work in honor of Wednesday. I ended up slightly modifying the lower cut neckline for the office by tucking in some of the textural ruffles to create more of a collar and tied the faux scarf a little higher to cover cleavage. I'm 5'6" and the hem hits a few inches below my knee. Metallic threads add depth to the floral pattern. Would rent again!
I adore this dress. It's light, free flowing and has an elegance about it. I rented for work but ended up wearing it again for my son's first birthday party! It's quite versatile

links_reviews_title: I wore the 4 to a wedding, and the 2 to my anniversary date a couple days before - bonus!
links_reviews_text: This dress us lovely and lightweight for summer events, with a color and print that is light without being easter-egg-y. The full-coverage shoulders and back mean that any bra works - as long as it is perfectly skin tone. I found the dress to be slightly sheer otherwise. The 4 fit my waist nicely, but the bust was cut for someone with more than a 32b. The 2 I found to be slightly snug in the waist, but fit my bust better. Hope this helps!

This dress is so pretty! There are gold flakes all over it that you can't see very well in the picture that make it even prettier in person. I have a small chest and the top was tight on me so if you have a larger chest I would size up
Great fit, perfect length. Very cute.

The dress is very cute! If you are well endowed in front, be prepared to show cleavage unless you angle the folds in front to cover. Otherwise, it was appropriate for a daytime event. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: This was a great choice for my son's high school graduation!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit well and I'm glad I have a small waist as it didn't leave me much room. The color was pink which surprised me a bit, but it was pretty. It also had gold in it which doesn't show in many photos. It was comfortable for a day event. I used fashion tape to keep the ties in place to ensure I didn't show too much cleavage. Overall, I loved this dress and am glad I selected it.
Fits true size

links_reviews_title: Great for a bridal shower brunch
links_reviews_text: Wore for a friend's bridal shower brunch back in August. Beautiful colors and material. Unfortunately needed to size up to my backup due to the bust/chest seams feeling constricting. Received compliments from others!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a springtime bridal shower
links_reviews_text: I got lots of compliments on this dress (and a couple new RTR users!). It was comfortable, light/breezy for a warm day, and perfect for the occasion.

Absolutely loved this dress! Fit was great, might have been able to fit in a 6 but ordered an 8 and 10 based on reviews. The tie added some coverage of the cleavage which was perfect for Church. The metallic details are subtle but make the dress really stand out. Got so many compliments, would rent again!
Runs TTS if not a little big. I'm 5'7 and to me it was the perfect conservative length. The cut is revealing up top but the tie hides that and makes it comfortable.

The front is a bit low so I felt like it is too much cloth in front. In the end use the lowest 2 ruffles to cover up the breast area (tight it inside, across to the bra strap - left ruffle tight to right bra strap).
Very comfortable, light and breezy. Perfect for a luncheon baby shower.
Wore this to a breast cancer charity event the it worked well with the tie tied in front. I'm pretty busty so that helped to not be too flashy. Great fit
Wore for my daughter's Christening. The bust was a little small and kept exposing my bra but aside from that it was perfect!

This dress is amazing! Perfect for a work conference and perfect for desk to dinner. Also works for church. My favorite part was the tie at the neck. With the tie it hides the cleavage and looks more modest and with the tie tucked in it's more sexy. Pairs nicely with nude, burgundy or maroon shoes. I got lots of complements, even from strangers.
Wore this to a rehearsal dinner. Really pretty dress. Fit very comfortably and length was good for a petite person like myself.
This dress fit well and was comfortable for a warm weather wedding. I paired it with ankle strap sandals and got the "old fashioned" blowout at Dry Bar. I wish I could buy this dress.

links_reviews_title: Very flattery, perfect for daytime wedding!!
links_reviews_text: Very flattery, especially the waist and neckline. Perfect for late summer daytime wedding! So many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Adorable dress - perfect for summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a summer wedding in California. It was so comfortable, flattering, and breezy! I have a very slim waist but fuller in the hips, butt, and thighs, and I thought this dress was perfect for my shape. Highly recommend!
It was perfect for lunch at The French Laundry in Napa. Very tight on the bust. Runs small. I am usually a 2 and I wore a 4. Has no stretch. Perfect dress for an hourglass figure. I loved it!
This was flattering and pretty. I wore to work and for a nice dinner out.

Great dress. Lots of compliments. Fit like a glove. Very comfortable. I was a little worried it was going to be too tight in my chest (32DD) but it was just fine. I loved the little gold dots in the pattern.

links_reviews_title: Dress was comfortable and perfect for a summer garden wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress is fairly low cut in the front. I also chose to tuck the extra neck ties into the dress.
I wore this for work, it fit well and looked beautiful. It's light and airy and very feminine.

links_reviews_title: Great for an outdoor summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: Really nice, beautiful, breezy floral dress! I'm 6'1'' and the dress hit maybe a half inch below my knees, which isn't ideal - I think it would be a nicer length on someone either a few inches shorter or a few inches taller than me. I'm a 34A and wore this without a bra, which was totally comfortable. The size 2 also fit and would have been totally fine, but I planned to eat a lot of dinner and pie so I chose the 4. :) the tie around the neck looked great, but for someone who doesn't love it, I found it fairly simple to tuck in for a smooth and more cleavage-y look.

links_reviews_title: Flowy light dress for a summer evening
links_reviews_text: Fit very well. The ruffles are nice and flowy although I think it made me look slightly larger than I am, but not so much that I had a problem with it. It was a beautiful dress. The tie in the front can be worn higher or lower or not tied at all.
Wore this to a brunch baby shower. It was light and flowy and feminine! Great cut and fabric. I loved the little silver and gold accents in the fabric. Would love to keep this one in my closet!

The dress is super beautiful with little metallic (but not tacky) details. The ruffles PLUS the bow were a little much on my petite frame. I usually am between an 8 and a 10 but got the 10. It fit fine, but a little loose (almost like a 9!). My waist is 30" and I am 4'11". The dress did come to mid calf, but the slip ended at my knee and the dress itself is semi-sheer. I wore it with pointed toe flats and didn't feel too truncated by the length.

links_reviews_title: Perfectly showed off my curves without being too risqué
links_reviews_text: This dress fit PERFECTLY. It hugged in the right places and flowed in others. I particularly loved the length. The underskirt is shorter which kept the longer length from looking too matronly, but was the right length for dancing. It is pretty low cut for us busty girls but the neck tie made me more comfortable with my cleavage.
Very easy and breezy dress. Flowed over my hips nicely. Not too snug, not too loose - just right! Would purchase this dress.
Perfect fit and style for a Sunday wedding or brunch #girlygirl

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit! Got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: A little fancy for work but felt super chic and pretty. The fit was absolutely perfect. A little bit of cleavage but the tie in the front covered that area nicely. Very pretty, very professional and great for any Spring or Summer event.

links_reviews_title: Perfect bridal shower or spring/summer day dress
links_reviews_text: This dress was very comfortable. Beautiful material and color with gold and silver details which is not as noticeable in the photograph. I decided to tuck the extra bow in the front into the dress since the front ruffles provided enough detail. Great length for a more formal daytime look.

I wore this for a summer wedding that had an outdoor reception. It was perfect, very flowy and comfortable in the heat. I got compliments all night. The only thing I found was it ran large. I usually wear a size 10, but even the 8 was a little loose on me. Also, being slightly more petite, the torso was longer than I wanted which made me a bit more self-conscious about my cleavage.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress for a benefit. Classic and elegant.
links_reviews_text: A pretty dress, but the material is a bit thin. It can cling a bit. I'm 5'3" and about 111 lbs. I planned to wear the size 2 but switched to the 4 at last minute. Very subtle size difference. Overall, a lovely dress as expected from the picture.

I loved this dress. It fit like a glove and had just enough stretch to make it extremely comfortable. The ruffle in the front was very forgiving and made the dress extremely flattering, even for a 4 month postpartum belly.

This dress was pretty and easy to wear. The slit was fun but not too high. It showed my pretty shoes, but was a nice formal length and the high neck was pretty and not stifling. I probably could've worn a size larger as it was more form Fitting to me than I had expected but other than causing the zipper to bulge a bit, it wasn't a problem. The material is on the thin side but I could still wear Spanx and that helped.

Love the look, cut and fit. I was 135 in the dress pound or two up from my usual weight. a bit tight in the rear, but workable and that is my usual spot. I am 5'3" and only had very moderate rear drag in 2-3" heels. No tripping just needed to be aware on steps. I think it would have been great if I was my usual weight at 130. Real challenge was the fabric is Sil weight and definitely shows bumps, lines etc. I haven't worn spanx in a few year, but necessary here to look smooth.

I wore this dress to an indoor evening wedding in October. The cut and style was very flattering and sexy, but still elegant. The fabric is pretty thin, but not see-through. I would suggest wearing spanx as it's pretty form fitting. The dress is very comfortable and easy to dance in. After reading the reviews I got a size 4 (what I typically wear) and a size 6 just in case. The size 6 had too much fabric in the back so I stuck with the 4. I would definitely rent this again!
Great fit light fabric comfortable to wear.

I'm 5'1" and the 4R was right off of the floor. Perfect length. This dress is super comfy. It has a little give so the stretchiness is very forgiving. I have rented this in the olive too and they are identical aside form the color. Both are amazing dresses and my fave to rent for galas and weddings.
Wore this to a formal wedding and it was perfect. Lots of compliments and it was comfortable.

RTR overnighted this to me when my original choice didn't work. It was stunning and worked perfectly! They only had a 6 available, I'm probably more of an 8 these days but I was able to pull it off and received many compliments! Really great dress - I was sad to send it back!

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit and placement of slit
links_reviews_text: It fit my classic tall and (somewhat) lean frame very well, and I loved how the slit looked. Comfortable to wear and dance in all night.

Loved this dress. Gave it 4 stars because the thinness of the material makes it hard to not show panty lines. One size up for me might have made it better. I am anywhere from a 6-10 in dresses post baby and I fit into a 6 just barely.

links_reviews_title: Sexy and demure. I loved this dress!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a friends' wedding. Loved the fit, the neckline and ruffle detail. Great dress and comfortable for dancing!

I usually wear an 8. I chose to wear the 10 because I didn't want it form fitting. I wanted it more flowy. I got lots of compliments and was the perfect dress. It's simple but elegant and goes with any shoes!

I loved this dress!! Usually wear a size 4 in dresses but this dress in a size 4 had extra material bunching up near the zipper in the back, so I wore the size 2 which fit pretty well. The material is very thin so it's pretty unforgiving when it comes to imperfections, but the dark color helps with that. I am short and always worry about long dresses being TOO long, but this was the perfect length even with medium high heels. I danced the night away without dragging (until I took my heels off but still didn't drag a ton without them!) I got a lot of compliments, it was perfect for the formal January wedding I attended. I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Fabulous, comfortable, lightweight dress perfect for a summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. It's form fitting through the chest and waist, but the ruffle hides any tummy pooch after a big wedding dinner. The material is thin so lightweight for a summer wedding. I didn't need a bra (although only a 34 A/B) and needed to ensure my underwear was seamless as the fabric would show any bump. The length was perfect with heels. Would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Classy with being frumpy. Completely comfortable. I felt Amazing
links_reviews_text: Strong color lightweight fabric and beautiful flow. Silhouette is so flattering. Perfect for petite frame.

links_reviews_title: Love it, but it doesn't quite work for me
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress. I'm 5'3". 117, and have two small kids. I ordered a 2 and a 4, this is the 4. The 2 is maybe a bit snug, the 4 a bit large, and neither is perfect. Both a bit long for me, even with 3" heels, and the dress doesn't lend itself to hem tape. I need to be able to wear a bra of some kind because of my current breastfeeding breasts (I'm usually very small up top), and my strapless really shows through the thin material of this dress. Also, I feel like the ruffle might be a bit much on my short frame. I've ordered a backup, we'll see!
Comfortable! Lots of compliments!!

The fit was good...I am a 36DDD so it gathered on the top in the back of the dress due to the tightness around the boobs. Maybe a different bra would've been better. Thought the whole experience was awesome and one of the best weekends I've had in a loooong time!

This dress was beautiful and elegant but not too over-the-top. After having my son a year ago and losing 60 pounds it felt really nice to feel pretty. This dress was perfect! Warning to anyone who does not like to go bra less I was not able to wear a bra with this dress. But it was still pretty supportive.
The most comfortable dress ever, fabric was like silk. Love showing off the shoes. So pretty and different.
I wore it to dinner then I wore it a few more times as a swimsuit coverup.
Very lightweight fabric, but great fit. Super comfortable.
This dress is very comfortable! Classy yet sexy! Ended up wearing a dressier option due to black tie event but will definitely rent this again!

Felt really sexy in this dress even though it's a turtleneck! Fabric is light and airy, slit made it feel sexy. Bonus, you can eat all you want and it doesn't show! Loved this dress. Photo doesn't do it justice
I have a large bust so that was a little problem for me and it was shorter than I would've liked but I was comfortable and received a lot of compliments

I wish I could buy this dress outright! Sooo comfy and light wear material. Sophisticated and sleek look. The deep blue color is beautiful and I had so many people complimenting me the entire night. I run between a 10 and 12, and decided to size up. Totally could have gotten away with a 10, but the dress didn't look too big or bulky on me. First RTR dress and I couldn't be more pleased!!!!

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for the wedding.
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’2 and had no problems with the length of the dress. Great for someone who has a small bust and larger hips and butt.
It was true to size and I received compliments all night. My husband loved it.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Sexy without being over the top.
links_reviews_text: The high slit, formfitting bodice, and exposed shoulders were nicely balanced with the subdued midnight blue color and high neckline. Was perfect for the upscale city wedding I went to back in February. Lots of compliments!
This was the perfect choice for a black tie evening. Dark navy, so not the usual black. This dress is walkable and "sittable"! Loved the slit and the shoulder reveal! Great dress.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable, and fit the occasion perfectly.
links_reviews_text: I ordered both the 4R and the 6R- ended up wearing the 6R. It felt more comfortable and laid right. The fabric was also really nice. Light, but not see through.

This dress actually came to me when the one I ordered was not available. The stylist picked it out and I think she did a great job! The dress is super comfortable and fits true to size. Was very comfortable all night and I loved the slit up the front!

This dress was incredibly flattering & showed off my figure to the extreme! It an incredibly comfortable dress, but probably not suitable for a very humid or hot day. It was both where we were & by the end of the day, I had sweat so much! The fabric isn't very breathable so it might be better for a spring wedding.

links_reviews_title: This fit just as I anticipated. Very pleased.
links_reviews_text: This fit true to size. I was worried about the length but I wore 4” heels and it was perfect. Very comfortable material and flattering. I wore this for an upscale wedding.

links_reviews_title: Attended my client's Grand Re-opening party and this dress was the talk of the evening. Perfect!
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size. I don't have a single negative thing to say about this dress!

links_reviews_title: I absolutely adore this dress and received so many compliments! (All three dresses shown are RTR!)
links_reviews_text: I wore Spanx under this dress just to keep the lines smooth and so I could enjoy some tacos. A racerback or strapless bra works best. This is definitely a sophisticated, feminine dress that would flatter most body types, so I highly recommend it.

links_reviews_title: I felt good in this dress. It was different and flattering.
links_reviews_text: Fit great! It was easy to wear.
I loved the high neck. It was formal without being too much fabric. Sexy without being too revealing.

links_reviews_title: Very beautiful dress, received lots of compliments! Size 2R fit perfectly 123 pounds 5'5
links_reviews_text: Love the navy blue, not your typical "little black dress"

links_reviews_title: Form fitting and perfect tuck in all the right places!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for family photos and the dress was amazing! So comfortable! So gorgeous. I am 5'7 and weigh about 135lbs the size 2 was just right!
Nice, thick stretchy material. Flattering and comfortable. Loved the cutout detail, didn't reveal bra straps. Overall great basic dress.
Very tight and fitted body con type dress. Think bandage dress but with more give. It was great for work for me. The cut outs hit right where my bra straps are so just something to be aware of.

links_reviews_title: Loved the see through holes at the top of the dress - nothing too revealing
links_reviews_text: One of my favorite dresses I've rented so far! It's great for work, not too tight, good length and it's comfortable material!
Nice dress, good quality, cool details. Nice for a work event

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Want to buy!
links_reviews_text: Fitted but forgiving. I wear between an 8-10 and this size 8 worked well. There is a lot of stretch, and almost don't need support wear. My regular bra showed through the peep holes, so I wore strapless. There is no zipper, must pull over head. Might be best to do hair and makeup after putting on. My husband had to help me so i wouldn't get makeup on the neckline. I've already returned this trying to get a new shipment, but now I wish I would have kept this one. You won't be disappointed with this one!
Flattering and comfortable! Simple yet stunning. So many compliments.
This dress shows every lump and bump. And although the material is stretchy and comfortable it doesn't feel very high end.

Loved the fit of this dress! It wasn't too tight or short even though it's a bodycon dress. I wore this to a work function and loved it! Would definitely rent again! Fell right at my knee and I'm 5'8".
Comfortable to wear all day at a conference and very flattering. True to size and nice, thick material.

links_reviews_title: Great navy dress with a little fun
links_reviews_text: Material was thick and almost scuba-like. I loved the open spots on the shoulders. I just didn't love having to wear a strapless bra. It's pretty tight and despite being forgiving about lines, the design didn't hide anything body-wise. I enjoyed wearing it but probably wouldn't rent again.

Pros: Great, stretchy, curve-hugging fit. The cut outs are bra friendly. The length of the dress is modest but not matronly. The color is a versatile deep blue. Cons: This is a pull-over dress and might be tough for some to manage. The fabric is mostly polyester with some spandex (not very luxurious). The sleeves are a bit tight (even for my skinny arms).
This dress is everything!! The cut outs are sexy but still professional. It is form fitting but would flatter any figure. Beautiful navy blue color and I felt like a million bucks!

links_reviews_title: Received lots of compliments. Comfortable to wear.
links_reviews_text: Fit week. Wore it to work as a news anchor.

This dress was great! I wore it to a school fundraiser. It was a stretchy but thick/sturdy material. It had great length and was super comfortable. It moved with me but also stayed in place in all the right places. I wore a normal bra and slid my straps slightly sideways...they might have been visible a time or two but I was happy that I didn't have to wear a strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: I loved the fun flare of this dress!
links_reviews_text: I loved the style. If I'm being honest though, It didn't fit me as perfectly as I had hoped. The arms and shoulders were a little tight, and it seemed like the hips on the dress were more at my waist. I think it still looked great which is why I'm giving it a 4 star rating, but my arms were a little uncomfortable!

Followed advice on ordering one size up. This made the dress way too big. Perhaps, because I am shorter (5 foot 2 inches) , it fit differently, but I can't imagine this affecting sleeve tightness. It was biggest in the area 4 inches under the hip to the knee. It ruined the line of the dress and I don't plan to wear it. The Size 2 specifically was way too big for a normal size 0. For those comfortable with a body-conscience silhouette, don't be afraid to order your size. Here are my current and honest measurements. Weight the day I tried on the dress: 122 Bust: 34D Waist: 24 Hips: 34.5 Arms around biggest part of the bicep: 10

I get to ring in the NASDAQ Opening Bell every year with my company. Wore this for the TV event. Was perfect; even wore it that same night to a business dinner. Although it was form fitting it was not too tight or inappropriate for work.

The fabric is stretchy, has texture and fits your curves in a flattering way. The cut outs are stylish and on trend. The only problem with this particular size 6 is that one of the cut outs is stretched out. So its uneven amd looks weird. Would not rent this dress again. If you wear a different size, you'll get a different dress. May not have the same issue. Runs small. I wear a 4 but after reading the reviews i ordered one size up, fit was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a corporate event!
links_reviews_text: I got this dress for my corporate head shots and it was perfect! The color was exactly what I needed to liven up the picture, but still be conservative in nature, the fit was incredible, and my bra straps didn't show in the cut-outs like some others experienced. Be careful because it doesn't have a zip, you put it on like you would a sweater, so I took many steps to ensure deodorant didn't stain it while putting it on, and I put a robe on over it while I did my makeup, and did my hair last since the dress is pulled over your head. I would absolutely rent this again!
Nobody could figure out if this was purple or blue, but it fit nicely, very form hugging, liked the ridges in it. Lots of stretch and room for wiggles. Showed my rolls when sitting down though
I liked this dress but wouldn't rent again because it's not very special. The cut outs also show the bra straps so it would have been better with a strapless bra. Stretchy so size down for this one.

links_reviews_title: Cool and confident day at work
links_reviews_text: This is a great dress. I was a little unsure when I realized it isn't as structured as I thought, but I guess the nice, stretchy fabric ensures the perfect fit! It's probably the most bodycon dress I have worn to work, but I feel so confident! I think the sleeves and high neckline keep it conservative enough to stay professional, even with the tighter fit.

links_reviews_title: Love the length and shape of this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fitted but comfortable. You will need a strapless bra with this dress.
Easy to wear! The thick, textured fabric is forgiving. The cut is conservative and isn't too snug. The color is great. That's it!

Love love loved this dress! It fits perfectly bc it's a thick stretchy material. Someone said I looked like a model and 3 ppl said they didn't recognize me at first bc they were staring at the dress and how well it fit and not my face lol. It fits true to size and hit me just below the knee (I'm 5'5"). I would def rent this again!!

I rented this for a work presentation I was giving at a retirement home. I wanted something classic yet fun, and I think this dress worked. It was a thick bodycon material. The size 6 fit but I ended up wearing the 8. I was able to wear a regular bra, even with the cutouts. My arms are on the larger side so I always worry about dresses with sleeves, but these were fine because the material has stretch. For reference I'm 5'5, around 150lb, athletic build.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a business graduation.
links_reviews_text: I had the incredible opportunity to meet Michael Bloomberg and Warren Buffet in this dress so confidence was everything. The dress fit perfectly in place, not a lot of fuss or pulling it down into place, was the perfect length and the open clavicle spots kept the dress professional without being boring. Felt great every moment while I was wearing it.
Definitely a little tight around the stomach so I would recommend wearing spanx

This is a beautiful classy dress with a touch of sassiness. I loved the cutout details on the neck. I received a ton of compliments at work. I was a little bloated the day I wore it but as you can see from the picture the dress was still very flattering. It is very comfortable and the perfect length for work. I would rent again.
I love this dress. I've rented it twice for work. I spent 24+ hours in it once when stuck overnight in an airport. Apart from that, it's fitted, but very flattering.
Wore this for Dance Recital. Lots of compliments. Very chic as well as comfortable.
Tight & form fitting, nice material, very special! Need to wear strapless bra with the cut outs. A bit long on me but good for a work event!

links_reviews_title: I wish I owned this dress
links_reviews_text: Wore it to my organization's anniversary benefit. Totally gorgeous! Got so many compliments. Runs large and the fabric is stretchy so there's some wiggle room. I was a little nervous about the length because I'm short, but it hit just below my knees and looked great. I wish I could find this dress to buy it cause I want to wear it everywhere now.

This was a figure flattering, body hugging dress with a longer length, making it an updated look for event without being too revealing. The fabric is pretty thick and "hugged" my curves. I wore a regular bra with straps which were wider so they didn't show through the cut outs.

This dress was classy and comfy and just perfect for my Business School reunion! It was formal yet given the little cut-outs, still intriguing without it being overly sexy. The dress is stretchy and though normally I wear a size 6, since I'm pretty straight cut from the bust down, I decided to go with a 4, so that it will not hang loose in the hip area. A size 4 fit perfectly my 5'3" frame and 34D bust size. I was thrilled with the dress and would have even bought it if instead of being an entrepreneur I would still be working in corporate.
Sophisticated and gorgeous. Loved the color. Didn't want to give it back. Fit perfectly. So slimming.

links_reviews_title: Classic dress with a twist that stood out while on stage in a sea of color
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Nice stretch, but thick material that looks smooth on

Such a beautiful dress. The material was comfortable. There is no zipper on this dress. It was easy to get on and off due to the stretchy nature of the material. Can wear a regular bra with this dress and they won't show in the cutouts. I'm 5'7" and the dress came past my knees.

links_reviews_title: Shows my well earned Murves-muscles and curves.
links_reviews_text: Wore this to semi formal retirement dinner at country club. Needed to look good form every angle while working hard. This dress was comfortable and elegant. FYI: Openings at neck can show bra strap if yours aren't wide set enough- as soon as I changed to a convertible bra all was perfect. Dress has stretch but doesn't look too body con. Will rent again.

When I first put the blouse on I didn't like it. My fiancé told me it was cute and said I should wear it so... reluctantly I did. I'm so glad I took his advice. I got so many compliments on this blouse. It's chic and easy. Great rental.
There is no give in the fabric, so I would size up between sizes. Also, the back is see through, so I plan to wear a black cami with it to work. Sleeves and neck have lace detail and nice buttons.
Pros- very cute, nice pattern and quality seems nice. Very on trend and goes with a lot. Cons- a little short and boxy. Not "sexy" more "chic"

links_reviews_title: Runs large, but a beautiful top
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately I had to return this top because it had a hole in the sleeve. But I did get to try it on before returning it and it was slightly boxy and big. The overall look is beautiful and I could definitely see myself wearing it to the office with slacks or wearing it with jeans and heels for a night out on the town. I would definitely rent again but size down.
Absolutely gorgeous blouse, very work to dinner appropriate! I wore a black tank under it since the back is sheer. You won't be disappointed!
Beautiful Top! It is a bit snug so size up, I wore it out to dinner

I thought this would be a great piece to wear to work. I wear a size 6 in dresses and can usually wear a size 6, though sometimes go up to an 8 because I like a looser fit. I went with the 6 on this and it was pretty baggy and boxy. I'm not sure I'd rent again, but if I did I'd definitely move down to the 4. So, I would suggest at least going down one size if you want it to look more tailored. I just felt like I was swimming in it.
This shirt is so so nice. It flows really well for my body baby bod and my 36 D the size 8 fit perfect. There is a lining in the front. I wore a tank top underneath because the back in sheer.
Gorgeous top. Wore to work, but would absolutely wear out as well. High quality piece. Loved it!
Little boxy fit like others have described but overall comfy and fit my bust and a cute loose fit.
Love the details, which make the top unique but the color and design make more classic than trendy.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but not for wide hips
links_reviews_text: Everything about this top is gorgeous. My only bummer was that the bottom hem is pretty fitted. I definitely have wider hips and a bottom and I like to wear my tops tucked in. Because of the fitted hem I couldn't do that with this. The detail is amazing and this is great for a more athletic figure!

links_reviews_title: Love the top. Received so many complements!
links_reviews_text: Great fit
Unfortunately this blouse came with two holes. It's a very delicate material and was not in great condition when I received it.
Fit true to size. The sleeve did come ripped on an inside seam but it was covered by the ruffles on the outside. Loved this top though. Perfect to wear from work to dinner. Will definitely rent again
Beautiful blouse! Definitely could have gone with a 2 but the 4 worked just fine. Wore it a few times with jeans, leggings and a black leather mini. Made each outfit special.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top and keeping this month again to wear!
links_reviews_text: Fits a bit large (boxy) so size down if in between. Wear with leggings, slim skirts, jeans, black pants... very pretty blouse.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear because there was a tear in the sleeve.
links_reviews_text: It fits true to size and is a gorgeous blouse. It had a tear in the sleeve, so I didn't wear it, but I wish I could have because it is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: This is a little too frilly.
links_reviews_text: this is very pretty, but it runs small and is a little too frilly
More beautiful on. Fits perfectly. If you have larger wrists, it may be snug. I wore it with black pants, would look great with nude or pink pants.
Fits perfectly, true to size.

links_reviews_title: This is a beautiful blouse, received a bunch of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a night out and on camera for work and it was perfect. It feels great, looks even more beautiful in person, and feels very stunning.

I thought this top looked rich and romantic in the photos but when I received it, it fell flat of my expectations. There is a mauve pattern on the top which wasn't apparent to me from the photos. It's a pretty enough top, I like the lace detail at the neck but I didn't end up wearing it because I didn't love it. It's also a bit boxy.

Forgot to cancel this after a wedding was postponed #coronavirus. But I did try it on for fun- super flattering, unique style, loved the sleeves! However, I'm breastfeeding and my boobs felt like they were busting out of this dress. The slip was also extremely high although you couldn't really tell with the lace overlay. I would rent this again for sure! I recommend sizing up for you back up size.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect! Everyone loved it. I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: When I took it out of the bag, I was worried about the size. I figured it would be too big, even though I was convinced this was my size. After trying it on, it fit perfectly. It's a wrap dress so it looked way bigger in the bag. Once it was on and wrapped, it was flattering. It is a little low cut, but for me, it didn't move much. It was tight enough that it didn't slide around or make me feel over exposed. It was comfortable, it was flattering and it could be used for any type of occasion!

links_reviews_title: This was worn for a formal wear evening work event.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit beautifully and felt good, too. I did have to wear a bit of tape to keep the v in place appropriately on my chest...may not have been so worried about it if it wasn't a work affair. Would definitely wear it again.
The dress is lovely and would probably fit someone else better. Not made for smaller bust. I couldn't wrap the dress tight enough to make the top as covered as I would have liked.

Rented this dress for a wedding and got so many compliments. For bustier women, it is definitely revealing so be mindful. I was inbetween the L and XL but ended up going with the XL because it provided a bit more length overall which felt comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size, was comfortable and flattering for my athletic body type. The last was very pretty in person, looked much more expensive than what it actually cost to rent. And I loved the plunging neckline, which worked well for me since I'm not big chested (showed the right amount of "side boob" - it was sexy without being inappropriate). Would rent again!
Elegant dress with flare - the lace and asymmetric hem adds a special detail making this little black dress more unique.
Flattering fit for my curves. Versatile dress I would rent again.
