I wore this to a bridal shower and got loads of compliments! It's extremely well constructed, heavy lace. It's a true wrap dress, but I didn't feel like I had to adjust it too much. I think the heavy fabric helped it stay put.

links_reviews_title: Flattering but lining too short! Maybe not meant for taller people.
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to a work related gala but the lining wasn't as long as the dress so I felt self conscious the entire time! I luckily had a shawl to cover up but was worried people could see my butt. Everything else was flattering so if only the lining was longer.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so comfortable, and so unique!
links_reviews_text: So flattering and easy to wear. The only con was that since it's a true wrap dress, I felt like the shorter side slit would sometimes ride up. I just pinned the two together and it was fine!
It was suggested I go up a size which I did. The large was much too big for me. I am a true size 8/medium. However, I was did not have the medium as an for comparison.

links_reviews_title: It was a great, chic look that made me feel absolutely fabulous!
links_reviews_text: true to size, wrap dress but fits snuggly (no concern for wrap dress oops!), just overall great!

links_reviews_title: Wore to a fall wedding in Texas
links_reviews_text: Beautiful and flattering fit! I’m usually a small and got a medium based on reviews. It fit wonderfully.
Dress runs large, especially in the shoulders and waist. I recommend sizing down one dress size. Did not wear.

links_reviews_title: Flattering dress but very high cut
links_reviews_text: The picture of the model looks like the lace is only see through at the bottom. This is not the case. The lace at the higher end hem shows your leg underneath the dress at about the mid thigh. Just word to the wise! Otherwise it's a great dress! Just maybe not office appropriate. I am usually between a 4 and 6 and the small fit fine!
Comfortable, easy to wear and accessorize, and easy to adjust for different waist sizes. Flattering and would totally recommend for hourglass and curvy shapes.

The colors and print of this dress make it memorable and definitely turn heads. Best of all, it's comfortable! I am 5'4 and it hit me right at the right place on my legs. Definitely not too short. Professional yet fun!
Love this dress. The rich print and the colors. Wore this a few times. Compliments. Runs true to size
Wore to a luau in Hawaii and the compliments started while I was waiting in line. Lol! Loved the flow. Light weight and classy
Loved the color and sleeve on this dress. Paired it with a pink Gucci belt. For my body, this dress needed a belt. Perfect for an island vacation in the Caribbean. Highly recommend!
This dress was really great for a wedding in the Caribbean. No need to be too concerned about sizing - the elastic waistband has lots of give.
This dress is so cute and flirty! The fit is true to size and so comfortable! I highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Fun and expensive. A lot of, though.
links_reviews_text: Felt special in this expensive dress. The valet guy's eyes lit up. A lot of fabric around the waist, though. Fun to rent and wear once.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress!!! Maybe not the most flattering fit....
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress from the first second and couldn't wait to rent and wear it.... it's lovely, feminine, the colors are beautiful and it is very well made. That being said..... I enjoyed wearing it, but did not receive any compliments or feedback, my husband "liked" it..... it's just not a very flattering fit.... maybe for someone really y'all and slim?

links_reviews_title: Too many ruffles makes this dress unflattering
links_reviews_text: Rented this for vacation in Mexico but sent it back immediately because it was just unflattering around the mid-section with the extra layer of ruffles.
Loved the fabric.
A little tight in chest and bulky around the middle
This dress is unique in that from every angle there is asymmetry. The mid section is a bit "puffy" with the fabric but still cute and flattering.

I loved the colors - the dress is beautiful. However, the fabric is transparent and the much lining is shorter than the dress, i.e. what you see in the picture. It basically felt like a micro mini - too short for me. Also, the lining material was clingy. I wasn't sure whether it would stay in place. I ended up not wearing it.
Too much going on even for a girl who loves lots of detail & ruffles
Loved the dress! Got a lot of compliments.
This dress was very flattering in every way. It's a thicker material with some give to it. The detail in the back is a nice touch!

links_reviews_title: A classy gown that hugged all the right places !
links_reviews_text: This gown was beautiful and fit my body nicely. The only downfall is that it is tight at the knees so my steps were smaller when walking and dancing was a little different. Other than that, I felt great in the dress all night. (P.s- you may need a bathroom buddy to help zip you up since it's tight at the knees)!
Cannot walk in this dress. Everything fit well, the style of this (I have worn many myriad styles) was not working, from Mid thigh to knees were impossible. Everything else was great about the dress!

This dress was absolutely gorgeous. Thick material kept everything in place and I felt confident and sexy at the black tie wedding we attended. I was going to wear boob tape, but it didn't come in time. Still felt comfortable, just had to keep an eye on the girls. Wish I had more events to wear this to, otherwise I'd buy it!

links_reviews_title: Great dress just not for someone super busty
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear because of the lack of room in the bust. Super flattering otherwise!

links_reviews_title: Felt great in this elegant gown
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress! It's sexy without being overly revealing. Since the dress is so fitted in the thighs, it's a little challenging to climb stairs. Ended up being a little large in the bust for me but nothing a sticky bra couldn't fix.

Usually a 2 but kinda hippy so I had to wear my back up 4L. It fit beautifully and was long enough! I got many compliments! A few cons though...I had to have a friend come to the bathroom with me cause I could not shimmy it up they had to literally unzip me and zip me back up. I forgot my sticky bra" but needed something. Was able to wear a black bra because the straps did not show in the back and the small bit that showed in the front looked like it could be part of the dress.

Chose it as a Halloween Morticia costume. The shape is flattering to my pear figure. Not very easy to climb stairs in it because of the mermaid style, but ok to walk with. I am rather a 6 on top and 8 for bottom, and this 8R size was the right choice.

This was a gorgeous pick for my military ball. Thick fabric keeps everything in place with no worries or tugging throughout the night. At 5'7 I really needed the long, but I made it work with flat shoes. If you're thick in the hips you might want to size up, cause this dress was a tight squeeze in that area. The cutouts on the back mean no bra or shape wear, but I'm small enough on top for that not to be an issue. All in all, I was thrilled with this dress and my husband thought I should buy it.

PROS: + form fitting + hugs in the right places, cinching at the waist + gives the girls a nice lift! + simple, sexy, classy CONS: - back fat spillage - you have to take the whole thing off to use the bathroom OVERALL: > it was fabulous, get the dress, but get a size up as a back-up.

links_reviews_title: Compliments all night- just make sure you pick the right size!
links_reviews_text: If you are 5'9" and the long is available- get it! It was not, so I wore the smallest heels possible to make it work. I fall between a 6 and 8 and the 8 was definitely the right size. It's a bit snug in the thigh area which was my only complaint, as someone with an athletic build! Loved the dress and got amazing compliments.
Gorgeous dress but the long size is too long for me being a shorty. Unfortunately that was the only size available.

The dress is perfect for any black affair. It has so much stretch and fits while leaving mobility. The only qualm is that if you have small breast the cups in the dress won't be full leaving the top a bit loose and empty. Due to the front opening and crisscross back, bras are difficult to wear.

links_reviews_title: The dress was comfortable and I would recommend it!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great! It was very form fitting and flattering, I got many compliments!

This dress was beautiful. I loved it. It was difficult to go to the bathroom in this dress. I saw that in the reviews but didn't understand until I was in the bathroom stall by myself. I managed to shimmy the dress up over my tush and use the restroom and then shimmy it back down but when I got it down my panties went with. Then it was trying to fix that problem. So either you have to take the dress off to use the bathroom or go commando? Not sure Other thing was I ordered the long and it wasn't long enough compared to other dresses I've ordered long in. I'm 5'9" and was wearing 2.5 in heals and it didn't hit the floor in the front. It would have been better if I had wore flats.

links_reviews_title: Dress was stunning - simple and elegant.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove. The fabric is thick enough that it sucked me in and didn't show every bump. I loved the hourglass shape it gave me (lots of dresses can make me look boxy). The thick straps + the deep neckline were a nice combo without showing too much skin. The back of the dress is also a fun addition. Not the easiest dress to walk in or climb stairs. Also the Long was a very nice and long fit for me at 5'11" and I wore heals.

links_reviews_title: This dress makes you feel beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress! Ordered as the a backup dress but absolutely loved it when I put it on! Flattering and classy and just the right amount of sexy. I've never worn a mermaid style dress and loved how it showed off the little curves I have. The only downside I found in this dress was stairs were difficult due to the mermaid style, and I needed someone to start unzipping it so I could use the bathroom since you can't pull it up (LOL). The cutout in the front is sexy but not too much. You can't wear a bra with this dress, but lift tape works perfectly and can be hidden well. The material is thick and you can tell it is a high quality dress! Overall though it was absolutely perfect for my event and I couldn't be happier with my first time using Rent the Runway!

links_reviews_title: My first formal event in years!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this dress!! It is absolutely beautiful. The fit and material though don't leave much room for movement, so it's very important to get the right size. Mine was a tad snug, and bathroom trips were tricky. Otherwise so happy with it!
This was a backup to my original pick & the only dress that truly felt great on out of the three I received! Flattering & well made.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a movie star!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress SO much. The material is heavy and strong- not cheap. Hugged everything perfectly. It was sexy but not too revealing. It was amazing!

I wore this dress to my friend's wedding, and it was amazing! It fit like a glove, and the material is thick and sturdy. I got a size 8L and wore 3inch heels and the length was perfect. No bra required! It is definitely a mermaid fit so be prepared to have slightly limited movement because of that. I would definitely rent this dress again!

This dress is everything! The material is thick, so it feels like it's really holding everything in. Accentuates an hourglass figure. The 0 was snug, and the cutouts in the back squeezed some skin, causing it to bulge out of the cutout a little, but my teenage daughter helped me tuck it all back in, because the length on the 0 was perfect, where the 2 was a little too long.

I was a little worried it would be a little too matronly due to its full coverage but it actually allows for the perfect amount of cleavage at a black tie wedding. I'm usually between a 4&6 and did have to size up but the 6 fit perfectly. The only weird thing is I'm 5,5 and I got the regular but it was actually decently short. I had to wear 1 in block heals otherwise the dress lifted too far off the ground. Otherwise it was actually very comfortable and I wore it for like 12 hours. I would definitely rent again for a black tie wedding

links_reviews_title: Well made classic black gown with sexy details!
links_reviews_text: Loved the material- very well made gown! The keyhole under the breast is so sexy! The fit was pretty tight and it was hard to go to the bathroom. I had to have someone fully unzip me throughout the night to go haha. I also didn’t love the cutouts in the back- I felt they squished my back. The gown was pretty long so I had to wear good sizes heels and I’m 5’2. I’m 118 lbs and wore a 4R. Overall I did like the gown and it was the perfect one for our occasion.

links_reviews_title: The dress hugs all the right spots!!
links_reviews_text: You will love it!!

Gorgeous dress! I order size 2L and a back size 4L. The 2 fit perfectly everywhere up to my waist, it turned out being very fitted/tight around the hips area. The size 4 which is the one that I ended up wearing also fit good, just a bit more comfortable around the hips area... just a bit, it was still pretty fitted. I would suggest if you are pear shaped/ curvy definitely size up!

links_reviews_title: The back was really pretty but otherwise forgettable
links_reviews_text: I ordered this in my usual size, a 4 and a 6 as my backup. I never even tried on the 6 because the 4 fit ok but was bunchy in an unflattering way... it just didn't lay right. Maybe the 2 would have been better? The back was really beautiful, I just wish the front looked as good. Luckily, I loved my backup!

I absolutely loved this dress. I wore it for a black tie wedding; I got a 0 and didn't get a backup because they didn't have a 2 available. I got backups in other dresses but still picked this one even though it was a bit tight because that's how much I liked it. The tightness subsided after walking and dancing, but it took a little bit. I have a small waist so it was my choice to pick this size, and I loved the fit overall, it was just a little restricting in the butt area. But it hugged my waist which the 2 probably wouldn't have done. My advice is to either go up a size if you're all-around one size, or try moving around in it before your event so you don't feel restricted. I still gave this dress 4 stars because it was that beautiful and that complimenting to my body.
This was a much prettier mermaid in person. Don't try to walk too fast, the range your legs can move is limited. Good coverage. Thick material. Good for cool- cold nights

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress. Thick material but super comfortable. Made me feel beautiful!
links_reviews_text: The dress is very fitted, tight on hips and thighs. If you are more pear shaped, I would size up. Not much lining in the cup area and unable to wear a bra due to the cut-outs. Back of the dress is extremely flattering and I loved the mermaid shape at the bottom. Overall loved the dress!

links_reviews_title: I was way too comfortable for how good I looked in this dress.
links_reviews_text: This is a beautifully flattering dress on an athletic/muscular body. It was classy, sexy and maneuverable. The length is perfect for wearing a comfortable 2.5” height heel. I danced all night long and was never concerned about a “wardrobe malfunction”. The only complaint is the zipper. There’s a sticking point in the middle. It was a wrestling match to get it up and almost impossible to get it off at the end of the night. There’s no way I could have dealt with the zipper alone. If I didn’t have help, I’d still be wearing this number.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! I got so many compliments on it! It fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit me perfectly I am a size 2R. It was a tad long since I'm only 5 ft but wearing heels fixed that issue.

I wore this dress twice. Most recently (1st photo) to a black tie wedding in a size 10 after having a baby (5’7”, 142 lbs) and it was flattering, comfortable, and I got a few compliments on it. I also wore it for New Years two years ago in a size 6 (5’7” 130lbs). It was form fitting and made me look and feel amazing.
Fit perfect and had no issues

This dress was amazing! Very figure flattering and elegant. The only negatives about this dress were that because of its mermaid shape, it was very tight around the thighs and I had to completely take the dress off to use the bathroom. Also, do not wear this dress if you need to walk up many stairs. I found it difficult to walk up stairs. Please don't let this dissuade you from renting this dress though. The way you will look and feel is totally worth it!
Absolutely loved this dress! It fit perfectly and was very comfortable! The material was super thick and required no bra or spanx.

I wore this to a Mardi Gras formal ball. I felt so amazing in this dress but let me tell ya ladies, if you have hips size it up! I ordered the 8L only because my normal size 6 was not available and thank goodness because the 6 would not have fit. It is a very comfortable dress, was able to dance and literally have a ball! This is a fabulous dress! Would rent it again and again!! Ooh...tall ladies, can’t wear much of a heel even with the long but, I do have some hips going on so, if you are a straight and narrow you may get more length.

Very tight on the hips. I'm a 4 in majority of brands and while the 4 was a great fit up top, I could barely walk because of the snugness in the hips. I went with the 6P and while it was a little loose up top, I was much more comfortable. Stairs were hard though because of how little give the dress has. Overall, it was worth it because the dress is fab and looked incredible.
Absolutely gorgeous! I felt like the belle of the ball in this!! Received compliments ALL NIGHT . Plus size ladies order a few sizes up so back will zip

I rented this dress for my husbands work Christmas party. It is by far my favorite dress ever and I did not want to send it back! The dress and the color are just beyond amazing and flattering. I'm 5'8, 120lbs here, 38DD and this dress was beyond flattering and comfortable. I had just had emergency gallbladder surgery the week before and was only 3 days out of the hospital here. Still my favorite dress and I've rented many from RTR.

links_reviews_title: Fab for a Black Tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I am normally a size 6 and the size 6 fit great. Got so many compliments at the wedding and the dress was structured enough to not need a bra underneath and to not fall down even after lots of dancing

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, not the best comfort
links_reviews_text: The dress was beautiful but the zipper is impossible. It took 3 people to get me zipped in. The corset also has Boning in it which got a little uncomfortable after a while. The dress was also too long for me (I'm 5'6" and I was wearing 3" heels).
True to size. I'm 5'6 and it was a great length in heels

links_reviews_title: At a black tie event I was one of the only in color! This dress popped! A little long on me...
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this dress but it was a little too long on my 5'0'' frame, even in heals.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a beach wedding and it was perfect! Lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: As others mentioned, the dress runs a little long but I’m 5’8” and was able to wear flats with just a little extra material at the bottom. The green color was amazing and definitely stood out!
The fit was great, although I am a tall gal 5’9 and the dress was long. I was wearinG high heels and did step on my dress a couple of times.. but overall loved it, I got so many compliments

Needed a green bridesmaid dress for my cousin's wedding. This was easy and comfortable, the color is beautiful. I typically rent Long but has read a review that said the regular was quite long and it was! 3.5 inch heels and it was fine, but very long for a regular size.

I rented this for a friend's fall wedding. It does run a little big- I'm usually a 6 and this was the 4. I'm glad I got the petite length- I'm 5'3" and wore 2-3 inch heels; this made the dress hit the floor in the right way.

links_reviews_title: Rented for my daughter's prom. She got several compliments on dress, especially the gorgeous color!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit and length. Very comfortable!
The zipper is impossible without a second person.... but other than that I would buy this dress. Beautiful color and fabric and very comfortable.

The fit was a little tight, but it was also my backup size. My boyfriend had to help me zip it up (The fabric bunches at the bottom of the bust and it was difficult. I also have a 34" inseam, and the long was just a little too long for me. However, the structure and stickiness helped me not need a bra, which was a huge plus. I would have preferred the 10 (it was my primary size but it didn't ship in time), but the 8 was just barely on the small side and the 10 might have been slipping down anyway.

This dress was GORGEOUS! The color is amazing. Received so many compliments all night. Very comfortable. Also this dress had to be overnighted to me from RTR due to my original not being available. As always, amazing customer service!

links_reviews_title: Great for St. Patrick's Day Wedding!
links_reviews_text: The dress was true to size and a perfect length! The color and fit were also super flattering. Loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: I got a lot of compliments on my dress and had an amazing time at my last formal with my friends
links_reviews_text: It's a little long, but other than that it runs true to size. The zipper had a tendency to catch at the seam which made it kind of hard to put on, but other than that I loved the dress.

I wore this to a fundraiser that was Madi Gras themed and I received a lot compliments! I'm 21 weeks pregnant with twins so I did need to adjust the size to an 18. I'm normally a 12. A 16 probably would have been better but it wasn't available. My only issue was that the zipper was a big challenge. Got stuck getting on so you had to mess with it for about 5 minutes. Would recommend!!

This dress was so fun and I loved the color. Very comfortable and elegant. It was structured enough that I never felt like it was going to fall down during the night. I danced for hours so I was glad to have a dress I didn't have to worry about or tug at all night. Lastly, the zipper was an issue as other reviewers have said. The size 10 fit best but the zipper was such a problem I moved up to the 12. Overall a great dress.

links_reviews_title: floor length made me feel gorgeous
links_reviews_text: The floor length was gorgeous, and it felt really comfortable the whole night!
This dress is so elegant and beautiful! The fabric is chiffon and is flowy and hangs beautifully. Received so many compliments! The color is gorgeous. I am 5,6" 125 pounds. The 4 was perfect.
Should have ordered the 0. It was loose up top and WAY too long, even with heels. 2 things that I usually never have a problem with. I had to hold the bottom all night so I wouldn't trip.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Color is so, so beautiful in person!
links_reviews_text: Wonderful dress! Easy to dance in, comfortable, yet elegant.

links_reviews_title: This dress was wonderful. Its a deep emerald color that I received several comments on.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'8" and currently 28 weeks pregnant. I'm currently measuring as a 36D and 160lbs and had room in the top but wasn't awkward tight or lose, which was nice. The dress had plenty of room for my belly. It has a sticky zipper which was annoying but we managed. The dress flows and is easy to walk in and had plenty of length for the tall (just slightly raised in the front from my belly.) Gorgeous dress and highly recommended.

This dress was exactly what I was hoping for -- comfortable, easy and exactly how it looks in the pictures. I ended up wearing the backup size I ordered because it felt more secure in the bust, but both sizes could have worked. The only issue I had was that there were a few rips and stains on both dresses. They weren't extremely noticeable, but I could tell they definitely had some wear to them. Overall, very happy with my first experience with Rent the Runway and will definitely rent again in the future!

This dress was perfect for the winter wedding we went to. The fit was exactly true to size, but it is VERY long, even though I supposedly rented a petite size. I had to hold the dress up all night, but it was so comfortable I didn't mind too much! Overall, a great first RTR experience!

I kept coming back to this dress mainly because of the color. As soon as I put it on, I felt amazing. It was super comfortable for dancing and got a ton of compliments. Only downside was the zipper. Where the fabric gets thicker halfway up the back is where I struggled getting the zipper up. It was sad to have to return this one!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color nicer in person than on the picture on line
links_reviews_text: I am 5'9" so for me the dress could have been a couple of inches longer but other than that it fit very nice and I received tons of compliments. Color is a rich green and lived the material of the dress as well.

The fit was perfect, I never had to tug at the top to keep it up or fear that something was going to fall out. I did wear a strapless bra with it, comfort thing for me. The color looks different in person, but I loved it more! Only complaint is this particular dress has some boning issues and I got poked all night. The pleats and the flow of the gown was flawless.
DEFINITELY runs long - absolutely stunning color, a little tight around the bust but was my second choice!!!

links_reviews_title: Great for a Formal Winter Wedding
links_reviews_text: I'm almost 6' tall and usually wear an 8. I scoured all the reviews about this dress and wound up renting the 6L and 8L. In the end, I wore the 6L because it felt more secure and I didn't want to be tugging at the top. It was a little tight and would not have worked if I had a bigger bust but I felt great all night and got compliments on the dress several times.

I order this dress for a formal work event but ended up going with a different dress from RTR. I did love the color of this dress and it fit great. Length was good for 5'7/5'8 with heels. I chose not to wear it because it felt a little "bridesmaid" to me.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a beautiful wedding!
links_reviews_text: This is a great dress. It ran true to size and was very flattering for my curvy figure. The greatest thing is the color, which stood out in a sea of black. I don't often go for color, but am really glad I did and RTR was the perfect way to do so! I received so many compliments on this color! The only downside was the back zipper, which is a problem on and off the hanger. It is tough to zip and takes multiple tries and patience. This was true in the backup size 10 as well, which fit me, but I was more comfortable in the 12. This was my first RTR experience and it was great. I will be back!
Gorgeous -built in boning was a bit uncomfortable though.
Fit tight in the chest and I am small chested. The color is gorgeous!!!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful wedding with an amazing dress.
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments in this beautiful dress! It was flowy and comfortable. The top was very snug but fit really well overall. I've got a little abdominal chunk and the dress hid it so nicely!

links_reviews_title: Compliments all night. Extremely comfortable. Zipper will require a friend.
links_reviews_text: Loved it. It felt very feminine and special.

links_reviews_title: The color of this dress was perfect for a Christmas gala!
links_reviews_text: I got the regular length in this one. I'm 5'10", and knew I wasn't going to wear heels (didn't want to tower over the hubs). It ended up being a little too long, but I made it work! I'm a 34DD, and it fit like a glove. No bra needed.

links_reviews_title: I received a lot of compliments for this dress. It was perfect for the Christmas party.
links_reviews_text: True to size. I had a minor problem trying to zip it up because it kept getting stuck but all was well.
The bust area was very tight and the length was a little long.
This dress was gorgeous and was bump flattering! I'm 21 weeks along, 5'9 and curvy and normally wear a 12! I went up to a 16 for safety and comfort (and no back fat)! I got so many compliments!
This was a great rental for a summer trip to Las Vegas! I felt this was true to size. My only complaint was that it wrinkled easily. I would rent again!
This was a super cute romper. I had zero issues with length of torso or anything like that. I'm 5'5" and wore the medium.
Loved this romper, but a tad large and probably could've gone with a 0. Had to keep pulling it down in the back so my bra didn't show. Perfect length and comfy with pockets!
Wished I had gotten the 6, but overall this was a great date night dress for vacation. Just make sure you have a bathroom buddy to help you get in/out of it.
This runs large, I couldn't wear it by itself but otherwise great quality!
Super cute romper for everyday or weekend brunch! Rented the 18 since I wasn't sure, it ended up being a bit big but not unflattering.

This is my first romper wear and I'm not sure I'll ever get used to getting undressed to go to the bathroom but I felt comfortable and cool in this for an outdoor summer event. Fully lined so no worries about pantylines and pretty easy to zip on and off solo. The ruffles were a little cutesy for my taste and this is low cut, but still wearable.

links_reviews_title: Cute romper - short on a tall gal
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and print and cute/flirty vibe. I love rompers. The length in the back was definitely too short for me (I had to pull it over my butt to sit down or stoop so I wouldn't show any cheek!)- I'm 5'11. But it looked so cute when I wasn't sitting/stooping that I wore it anyway and was just careful!
Tight fitting romper- adorable color!
This is almost the perfect Sunday brunch outfit, but a bit low cut for me. If I owned one, I'd add a nude bandeau bra just to make it more day appropriate.

I wore this on vacation. I normally wear an 8 but it was too tight on my hips and very short. I am 5'8. The 10 fit okay on the bottom but loose on top. It can be dressed up or down. It was okay but I would not rent again.
Very flattering! Great material and has pockets!

This was the first romper I've ever worn as an adult. I rented for use while on a cruise and it was the perfect piece for exploring Caribbean locales- light, breezy, tropical, pockets and fun! The neckline might be lower than something prefer- but I enjoyed how flirty it was. The little cap sleeves dont cover much- if you dont like to show your arms. The romper is lined and made of great quality material- but does wrinkle easily after sitting for a bit. I have a long torso, and was pleasantly surprised that this fit without any problems or strange pulling.
I cannot do rompers. This was true to size. A pain when there's no one around to help with zipper so remember that.

links_reviews_title: This is so cute, but runs a little small.
links_reviews_text: Couldn’t wear because the waist was so tight. Definitely needed to size up.

Ok you could really wear this just about any wear (except super fancy!) with the right shoes and accessories. It's just lovely! Fabric is great - soft and comfortable. Definitely perfect for work, a date, dinner, a wedding, etc. Throw on some sandals and it's a great daytime romper! Just beware - size up if you are thicker through the middle. It was a smidge to snug in the middle for me for comfort. Otherwise - terrific! I'll definitely size up and get this again!
Fit perfectly accented all the right areas HAD POCKETS
Cute! Didn't wear it for this occasion but would be perfect for day party. It's a true size 4
Wore to a bachelorette weekend.. for great and got lots of compliments.
Cute print but the sizing runs small and the shorts were very short

links_reviews_title: It's beautiful but I have a small chest
links_reviews_text: It's beautiful but I'm guessing because of my 38B frame it didn't fit properly. It was too big on top... but everywhere else it was perfect!
Beautiful colors
Comfortable, flattering, beautiful color and I was able to wear a bra with it. Does wrinkle easily but otherwise it's a great romper.

links_reviews_title: Love love love this romper. Super cute for a party or just for the day time!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size and is a high quality material.
This runs pretty true to size, though its quite short. It's absolutely adorable and flattering (makes bigger chested gals look smaller). The cut it flattering as well, I love this romper!

I rented this romper for my recent vacation to Hawaii and it was PERFECT! I'm very busty with long legs and felt perfectly covered up in all the right places. Only thing to be mindful is the lack of stretch in the waist band but other than that, it's true to size and the perfect item for a beach vacation!
I'm 5'3", 135lbs, 36C-27-36, and rented a size 6. It fit me perfectly and is very cute and comfortable. Came with the tags still on!
I love the fit of this romper. It fit true to size. The length was perfect for my 5'1" frame.
Great romper! Fits amazing and looks great. 100% recommend.

Dress is featherless light silk and probably better for warm weather but I wore it to the theater on dark and stormy night and added tights. It has no zipper so a bit tight to pull over your head and it is definitely straight and long. Not forgiving in any way. Ruffles are cute and fall in both sides. Loved the asymmetric ruffle and neckline. Colors are pink and blue. Probably hard to wear if curvy hips or busty. I liked it but didn't love it---- especially for the high price point, not that special.
Loved wearing this to work because it is so lightweight and unique.

I rented a size 4 and I did not wear the dress at all. First off it does not have a zipper. So you have to pull it over your head. That wasn't really a problem it just made the fit even more odd than it already was with the asymmetry. It felt accidental how it hung asymmetrically on my body. Possibly if you had no curves it would hang like a sheath and look different, but the black ruffles on the side were ridiculous on my shape as you can see in the photos. Not for me as you can see.
This dress has a great cut. Ruffles move as you walk. Good quality. Feminine. Pretty. Easy. Unique.

While online looked romantic, we broke up once we met. While it was the right size, I tried it on and it just looked awkward. Also the print and fabric took away potential class. For those looking to add curves/shape this may be a good choice. As for me, I don't believe in second chances.
Very odd fit. Right shoulder pulls . Most uncomfortable. Didn't wear.

Unfortunately, the Large was too tight in the bust area so I wasn't able to wear this dress. A shame, because it's really cute. The fabric is silky and drapes very prettily though it's quite thin. Pretty pattern too.
I'm 5' 3" .... wore with heels and it was still dragging the ground Beautiful dress though! Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a day in the Hamptons
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a staycation in the Hamptons. The dress is very long so unless you're super tall you'll need to wear heels or wedges with this - I'm 5.5. I also wanted to have a better waistline so I paired it with my own belt. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: A little long, but light and comfy!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress as part of a Cosplay at the Rennaisance Faire. I've been working on a gypsy costume and haven't had time to find a skirt, so when I had a free rental with the dresses I ordered for a wedding, I thought "why not?" The dress was very long for me (I'm 5'1") so I had to gather it up like a bustle in the back + hold it up at all times, but it was very comfortable and a great material for a very warm day out in the sun. If you're short like me, would definitely recommend wearing with heels, otherwise would wear again!

links_reviews_title: Everyone kept saying how beautiful I looked all day
links_reviews_text: Massive cleavage shown in this dress. I didn't really like this dress when it arrived. It's red, white and blue, which isn't what to picture looks like, extra long, heel or wedge required. But all day people complimented me on it, a doctor asked me out, so I liked it because apparently I looked awesome in it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, but large and VERY LONG
links_reviews_text: I had to put safety pins for the length because sticky tape wouldn't work because it was too long and fabric is light, but with the length it wouldn't hold. Too big for me in the chest and the shoulder straps kept falling down. Beautiful and comfortable, but just not the best fit for my compact body.

This dress is a beautiful silk like material that looks and feels like a million bucks when you where it! It's long and flowy! I'm 5'9" and the dress hit the floor with 2 inch heels. The picture really doesn't do the dress justice!

Rented this for a trip to Santa Barbara with friends and wore it out to dinner one night. I have a larger chest and I liked that the neckline was sexy but also not too exposed. And I could wear a strapless bra without worrying that it would show. I would say that if I didn't have a D cup, I probably could have gone down a size, as the dress was a bit loose in the waist. On the other hand, it was nice not feeling stuffed in after dinner. The material was nice and the length was perfect with my 3 Inch wedges. My only complaint is regarding the ruffles around the neckline: They're only printed on one side, so when they flip up, or flutter in the wind (as ruffles are known to do) the white unprinted underside of the fabric is exposed, which doesn't look nice. I would expect a double sided print detail on a dress like this, that retails for over $600. The one sided print cheapens the look... I wouldn't purchase this dress for that reason, but it was fine for a rental.
Got this dress with my unlimited subscription. It is long and comfortable. I wore it went tall wedges and the length was perfect.

Loved how flowy this dress was and how extremely comfortable I felt in it. I'm usually an 8 and ordered a 6 and the fit was perfect! This is, in my opinion, a very casual maxi dress which is exactly what I wanted. The fabric is soft but strong. Great rental!

Great maxi, fabric is light and flowy. Although I think it runs on the larger side. I could have wore a 4 and it would have fit perfect. I wore this to work and will again for church, so I will have to wear a cami underneath as the neckline is too low/shows cleavage for work/church. But, for date night....watch out!

Very comfortable maxi dress that can be worn for any daytime event. It does run large so I would recommend sizing down for your back up. The waist is not fitted and the fabric has a lot of stretch. This style would look best with a pair of wedges and minimal jewelry

Perfect maxi providing a variety of details and comfortability! This SALONI item is true to size, but we recommend going a size up for a back up. The fabric stretchy providing room for the hips, while fitted at the bust and waist. The Printed Suzi Maxi Dress is floor length for all heights, so we recommend pairing it with heels or wedges to dress it up if the event calls for it.

Super comfortable dress! Running true to size, we recommend sizing down for backup as I did find this dress ran a little big on me. The fabric does have some stretch to it and the flowy fabric definitely gives it a boho vibe. This dress would work for any bust size however due to the front lace cutout a standard bra may show a little. There is comfortable room throughout the waist and hips. At 5'4 the regular length hit right to the floor with about 3-4" heels. Perfect for work or a casual daytime event!

This dress is absolutely stunning! Feels lux and expensive and is super flattering on! I want to keep it! Fits true to size but is very long. I am 5'8" and need to wear at least three inch heels. Can be dressed up or down. Love love love!!!
Gorgeous but super long and ran much larger than most saloni

links_reviews_title: Pretty but too long for me.
links_reviews_text: I did not wear it because it was too long for me. It was cute and fit fine other than the length. If i had planned on wearing heels or wedges, it may have worked. Really nice quality though.

links_reviews_title: Runs true to size but didn't wear
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a BBQ at a winery but didn't wind up wearing it. It fit perfectly but the cut made me look a little pregnant which is never good when you're not pregnant - especially not when you're wine tasting. The material was lighter than I was expecting, almost like those stretchy smocked tops from the 90s. Also, as other reviewers said, the ruffles don't stay down without fashion tape, and they're not colored on both sides, so it's really awkward. Cute, but not for me.
Didn't fit was too long

links_reviews_title: It's a really pretty dress! The pattern is just so fun!
links_reviews_text: This dress is very long, and it's also a bit low cut. I still absolutely loved it, but it I were to buy it, it would need to be hemmed. I also wore it with a tank beneath.
Very flattering and pretty. The fabric is beautiful. The 6R is very long.
Love the length. Must be tall.
This dress is very pretty, but it was extremely frumpy on me, so I did not wear it. I am a 34 D and size 4, yet the fabric was too loose and not flattering.

links_reviews_title: Really fun dress. Rented it for V Day dinner.
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately the zipper was quite difficult. Otherwise it fit great and my baby bump looked great.

This dress runs slightly large in the chest in my opinion. I wanted to love this dress but the length was so incredibly long (even with platform wedges) that I constantly tripped over the dress. I only wore it for a few hours.

I loved this dress much more than I expected I would. However, it runs very large and is very long. I typically wear a size 2-4. I could have easily worn the 0. I would recommend sizing down at lease one, if not two sizes. It's a great dress for a hot summer day.

This dress would be great for 4th of July. The material is flows nicely and it's not too heavy for the hot summers. I returned it because I don't think it's the right dress for beginning of fall but would consider in the future.
Perfect

I rented this with Unlimited and kept it for a whole month, wearing frequently! I wore for all kinds of occassions, from a school performance, to a BBQ, to a fancy date night. It's pretty long but flows beautifully. The fabric is gorgeous. The print is interesting but not over the top. I love the lace on the top. Can wear with a strapless bra. Definitely got my moneys worth on this rental!
A bit baggy (the 4 fit like an 8) and the colors were less rich than in the photos.

This is a comfortable dress that I thought fit my post partum body fairly well. It shows quite a bit of cleavage, and has a nice length with wedges. I don't think it's the most flattering, but it did the job.

links_reviews_title: Nice print. Easy to dress down for boho vibe.
links_reviews_text: Runs HUGE and VERY LONG.

This was sent as a replacement dress when the original dress I ordered was damaged. There were not too many options in stock that would fit my 6-month baby bump so I was not super excited to receive this dress. The 10R fit comfortable (usually a 6/8 pre-pregnancy) but made me feel frumpy. The horizontal stripes across my belly were not the most flattering aspect. I would size down and maybe avoid if pregnant.
This dress is beautiful, flatters the natural waistline, and according to my husband "shows off your boobs."
Too short for tall girls

links_reviews_title: This dress is an easy wear.
links_reviews_text: The design & material are fun. The fit is true to size & the length is perfect. You can dress this up or wear casual easy!!

Loved this maxi. Other reviews said that it ran small, but I found it ran large? . . . roomy in the waist and chest. It's also VERY long. I'm just over 5'9" and it was grazing the floor with flats. That being said, I wore this a few times before I returned it. A super comfy, easy dress to look fabulous on a summer day.
Great dress! It is very low in the front but fun and flirty none the less!

links_reviews_title: Odd fit; and my dress wasn't as pictured
links_reviews_text: For some reason the dress I got was somewhat different than the one pictured. Instead of the red lace area being somewhat transparent, mine had a piece of black cloth sewn behind it, so the red lace appeared dark and it wasn't at all see-through. Which is a shame because I liked that feature in the dress in the photographs. Also the zipper on the back of mine stuck in a certain place; it was impossible to get on and off without help. Finally, the front armpit area is cut really oddly- resulting in unsightly overhang. I couldn't wear it. Very disappointed.
Loved this dress! Received compliments all night. Would definitely recommend it for a date or a wedding. Can be easily dressed up or down.

links_reviews_title: I never wore it to the event because in person I felt it was too printed and didn't like it.
links_reviews_text: It fit really well and was flattering!
Great dress, nice bodycon that's pretty forgiving. Wore this for our wedding dinner and it is super pretty!
Very nice quality dress, just wasn't my style. It was a little too form fitting for the party I was attending.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to my bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my bridal shower and all my girls loved the dress. I got so many compliments. The dress is so comfortable and makes you look skinnier. I personally liked the fact it wasn't too white. The process of renting and shipping back the dress was so easy too.

I rented this flexible and comfortable dress for a day session that I volunteer for with a lineage society I belong to. It's perfect for dress up in the evenings and day events where there is a strict dress code.

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for the bump!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for our maternity photos and I absolutely loved the way it fit! Since I was nearing the end of my 1st trimester, I didn't have much of a bump, but the bump I did have, could only be seen through a form fitting dress and this one fit the bill. Not only that, but I didn't have to go bra-less or wear a strapless bra in order to wear this dress. I wore a regular bra like normally and I was very comfortable in the dress. Highly recommend if you have a bump and want to flaunt it!

I rented this dress for my bridal shower and let me tell you, I would rent it again tomorrow. I got so many compliments and it fit like a dream. I got both the XS and the S and ended up going with the S because the other was a bit too tight. The S still hugged my body and was very flattering just a little more breathing room. It was a little longer than I expected. I am not super tall so it was a little longer then I might have liked but with a pair of heels it worked out just fine. Over all highly recommend the dress.

Dress fit well. I had to size up since I was almost 8 months pregnant, but the dress worked well with my bump. I would definitely recommend this as a maternity dress. Comfortable enough to sit and do different poses.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments, this dress was snug but also really comfortable
links_reviews_text: I never wear tight fitting dresses and this was so flattering! I definitely have an athletic build, so was a little snug, but because of the stretch was still comfortable and beautiful!

links_reviews_title: I was able to choose the color and style of dress and my vision for my wedding day was perfect!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a stretchy fit and hugs all of your curves. I would have preferred a less tighter fit on the belly area because my girdle was trying to do the job and fell a little flat. I'm glad I didn't need any other special under garments. The length and butterfly mermaid bottom gave me the formality needed for my wedding. I received so many compliments. I felt sexy and sophisticated.
Gorgeous form! Loved this!

links_reviews_title: I received 2 compliments from other guests!
links_reviews_text: Fit well and was very comfortable. Had some stretch and side zipper is well hidden. I was only disappointed that the color was dingy and not a bright white as I wanted for my rehearsal dinner event welcoming guests who had traveled for our wedding.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, high-quality, comfortable/stretchy dress worn for winter bridal shower
links_reviews_text: This dress was so pretty that it inspired me to rent for the first time! Pros: Thick stretchy material, high-quality fabric. Conservative cut while still quite flattering. Great for tall women because of its length. Super comfortable and warm for the winter (wore with a shawl). Can wear to go out too if wanted. Cons: Dress was not brilliant white (looked like it had been worn before)

This dress was very unique and the shape was flattering. However, the overall material was not. I'm not a skinny mini but I think I'm in decent shape...and this material showed EVERYTHING. It also bunches in the zipper area on the side. Overall, true to size, nice color and pretty looking dress. Wore with a fur stole and got tons of compliments about it looking like a 20's outfit!

links_reviews_title: Hugs in all the right places
links_reviews_text: Loved loved loved. It was exactly perfect for the party I was hosting. I am still receiving compliments on how amazing the dress looked. I'm between a size 4 and 6. I ordered a medium. It fit amazing but I think I could have gotten away with a small as well because of the stretch. If you need a form fitting white dress, this is the one.

links_reviews_title: I got a ton of compliments on this dress
links_reviews_text: It was a little tight, but that said it was also pretty forgiving. It hit to my mid calf which made it more formal but still comfy for dancing.

links_reviews_title: It was an instant feeling once I saw it, and tried it on.
links_reviews_text: I felt so beautiful in it, so comfy, and stretchy! I received many wonderful compliments! It made my day! I used this dress for my bridal shower and it just fit in so perfectly with the theme and the look I had in mind. The only thing that did bother me a little was that the arm hole was a tad too big on me. It showed a part of my bra, but clearly it didn't bother me enough for me not wear it. Lol. If that doesn't bother you, rent it now!

I love this feminine dress by Opening Ceremony. Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend wearing your regular size. The style is fitted throughout the midsection and around the hips as well. It works best for all cups but I’m a 32B. You are able to wear a standard bra which is great. At 5’2 the length hit mid calf which was perfect because with my height it can be hard to find at times. I liked how the dress showed off my curves. Definitely a dress I would recommend. I would pair this with a pump but a nice pointy flat shoe would work too. Height 5’2 Weight: 120lbs Bust Size:32B Dress Size:2

links_reviews_title: Such a fun and flirty dress you can make work with your work
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove and hugged all the good spots

links_reviews_title: Got many compliments at my baby shower. Many couldn’t believe it wasn’t maternity.
links_reviews_text: Snug but not suffocating. Fabric hid sins and the length was perfect for me (5’10”). I wore a M but would have been interested to try on the L given the baby bump. They only had the S and M available when I ordered. Would recommend!

I wore this dress for my bridal shower brunch! It was classy and elegant-just what I wanted. Although fitting, it was very comfortable to wear and maneuver in. I was very happy with my rental-Thanks RTR!
Wore for my rehearsal dinner and felt gorgeous and comfortable. Paired it with the rose earrings from RTR.
Perfect little white dress. Thick fabric that you couldn't see my tattoos through the material. Form fitting. Made me feel great
The fit was bodycon-esque, which I loved! Hugged every curve. Wear Spanx or body shaper to smooth out. Wore small as medium was a tad loose/baggy at the top and in midsection.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous fit! Great for baby bumps
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work when I was 9 months pregnant and received so many compliments! It's stretchy so it fit perfectly over my baby bump, and was SO comfortable. Would be great for a baby shower or wedding event.

links_reviews_title: This dressed was perfect for an all white wedding. I wore a fasinator to dress it up.
links_reviews_text: I ordered the M and the L to be safe. The L fit very nicely, but the M was the perfect fit. I am not sure of my measurements, but based on the reviews from other renters this dress had stretch to it, and that was exactly what I needed. I am not top heavy at all, but I am very hippy. The only thing drawback for me was the dress was not as white as I expected. It was almost an off white.

The wave pattern is nice and was what I picked it but I felt like as I had it on there was an optical illusion where I felt like I was bulging out of the dress. I had 3 dresses to pick from and this one was everyone's favorite. The length of the regular was perfect. The fabric is thick and I felt "held in" in a good way.

links_reviews_title: Great alternative for black tie event
links_reviews_text: Runs tight but sure was fun to wear!

links_reviews_title: Need 100 other excuses to wear this - it is perfect!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is to die for! You can tell it's expensive just by looking at it. I am very thin but the fabric still sculpted and molded me to have the perfect shape! My waist was thin, it even gave me more of a hip than usual. I received so many compliments for my bridal shower. I was nervous at 5'4 it would make me look short but the weaving pattern with a heeled shoe really elongates you. I wore a nude bra and seamless underwear which is important. I can not recommend this dress more!
This dress is great a bit see through. I thought about wearing it to elope in but my back side is just to big for my liking. But I will rent again this summer.

links_reviews_title: Great Dress, but definitely Body Con
links_reviews_text: I selected this dress for my bridal shower and ordered the LR backup size. I was so glad I did because I ended up wearing that size instead of the Medium. Originally from the pictures, I thought the dress material would have been a heavy cotton or linen, but came to find out it is a super stretchy material that felt body-con esq. Really comfortable overall and a much different fit then I would have ever gone with!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, fun dress for our rehearsal dinner.
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable, yet form fitting and sexy! Got so many compliments and I felt great in it! I usually wear a size 4 and the small fit perfectly. Absolutely loved this as my first rental!

This dress is really beautiful and also flattering with the little peplum at the bottom. I did not end up wearing it because the fabric was a little clingy around my waist (my bad area) and I thought it would be better with spanx but did not want to wear them, since I wanted to be comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my bridal shower and received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: This is a form fitting curve hugging dress but not to sexy.
Has some stretch to it. Looks very high end.
I received so many compliments on this dress, it was so comfy I didn't want to take it off. I wore this for my rehearsal dinner and it was perfect. I was sad to Return it.

links_reviews_title: All White Boat Criuse Affair Aboard the Odessey
links_reviews_text: I LOVED LOVED this dress!!!! It huged my curves in all the right places. It's made of a thick quality material but wasn't hot for a mid Aug event due to not having sleeves. It was a stand out dress in a sea of all white. I received compliments all night. The only con I have is the sleeve opening has been streatched out quite a bit and would show my bra. I have really long hair so it would cover that but i needed to be aware when taking photos. Double sided tape didn't help due to my bust size. Other than that great rental. I was very pleased.
As many others, I rented this for my rehearsal dinner and it did not disappoint. It was just the right amount of sexy, while still being classy. If you're thinking about it, go for it!
I wore this dress for my rehearsal dinner. It fit perfectly and was very comfortable. I would rent this again!
Everything I wanted and more!!!!
This dress is perfect! I wore it for my wedding shower and received so many complements about how flattering it was. Great RTR choice!

links_reviews_title: Wore this 7 mos pregnant to a wedding
links_reviews_text: Being 7 mos pregnant, I gained 30 lbs. I started at 130 5'5" so in this photo I'm 160lbs. I could have went w the medium but w the medium I didn't like my bra n panty lines so decided to go w the large. Super cute! Great material

Wore this classy, yet "sexy", pale pink dress to my baby shower. At 7.5 months pregnant, the fabric was forgiving and I felt great in it all day! Only thing I would suggest is plan on getting nipple covers, as the dress looks best without a bra, in my opinion. Would recommend 10/10.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my graduation. It was great!
links_reviews_text: The stretchy fabric was great. I am smaller on top with bigger hips and butt, so it is usually difficult to find a fitted dress that works. This one was great! I think the stretch would accommodate a lot of different body types. However, it did stretch out a little as the night went on. It also got some lines/wrinkles on the front after sitting down. Overall though, it was great. Would definitely rent again!

I was 34 weeks pregnant and wore this to my baby shower. It fit like a glove. Was very comfortable and breathable. Not tight at all. The shoulder area did seem a little small / or needed a good iron -- my bra straps kept slipping out.

I wore this for my maternity pictures. I rented this back when I was tinier, and didn't know how big I'd get. I got real big, real quick and was nervous that the small wasn't going to fit. 35 weeks pregnant, and 35 extra pounds more (155), and the small fit great. It was a tad difficult to get on and off, but once on, it was very comfortable and I had no problems moving in it.
Rented for a girls night out! Fit was great. Accentuated my figure but was not too tight.
Very flattering & goes with a lot. Only issue was that the cut around the shoulders & neck were odd so I had to find a bra that fit within the dress cut.
Really loved this dress. I wish it could stay in my closet. Great fit over my 21 week baby belly.
I wore this dress multiple times around 28 weeks with twins. It was very flattering and a great length.

I loved this dress! It fit my body well and the xs was even a touch loose, but in all the right places. I had my hair done in a fishtail braid so I could show off the detailed cut outs in the back. I'm 5'7 130lbs, athletic build - 36/25/35.

links_reviews_title: Loved, even in the third trimester!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress at 29 weeks pregnant and loved it. Great, stretchy material. Not too hot. Good cuts all around. Fabulous dress.
Comfortable and bump friendly. Stretchy so i feel like I could have worn this for a while. I am 22weeks in an XS. My pre pregnancy size is an XS so I'd say it runs large.
Perfect fit! You can see any and all lines, so plan undergarments accordingly!
I like this dress, it is a pretty pink color and is comfortable. Has a nice stretch to it- I do recommend shapewear so you don't see any lumps or bumps. Great for hourglass figures.

I rented this for my shower and it was adorable! It has a cute cut out in the back, but I wore a kimono so didn't get to show it off. I was 22 weeks at my shower and work again to work at 26 weeks. Only complaint is the stitching on the bottom doesn't lay flat, but not a huge deal.

I was 30 weeks pregnant and wore the small. This dress can as an exchange dress since the first dress I ordered didn't work out. They didn't have an xs which would have been more form fitting but this one was so comfortable and super stretchy for anyone who is pregnant and wants to show your body and belly at the same time. I received many many compliments.
Fit is skin tight so any flaws should be concealed with Spanx or a faja. Very stretchy and comfortable.

Wore this for one of our last date nights before baby comes and actually felt super sassy. Love love love the color. That said, this definitely runs big and stretches out throughout the night. I'm a 00-0 pre pregnancy and the XS fit a full term bump...so truly petite women should definitely pass!
The dress was OK but I felt the color washed me out. So not one of my favorites.

links_reviews_title: Bump friendly but not my favorite
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing this dress to work with a blazer, but I didn't love it. The fabric felt kind of thin and cheap, and the cutouts in back looked odd, not cute. It is very stretchy, so it's bump friendly (I wore it at 8 mos pregnant).
I ordered the L and XL, but went with the XL. It fit wonderfully - there is a fair amount of stretch in it! The color was perfect and I felt comfortable in it all night!

links_reviews_title: I felt sexy yet classy. It was exactly what I pictured for my birthday outfit.
links_reviews_text: Fit is definitely true to size. I'm normally a medium and although the midsection was a little loose, it was comfortable and the material was thick.

Had to wear a racerback sports bra but it's a heavy knit. The back detail is nice but probably not office appropriate without a cardigan or jacket but nice day to night or luncheon. Received compliments including a little girl saying I looked like a lady

This dress is simple but classic! Love this shade of pink and the simple cutout design on the back! This runs true to size and is great for any cup size. This is fitted throughout, but is made of a stretchy material, so it's very comfortable. This dress is knee length and can be worn with a standard bra. Pair this with a statement clutch and you're ready for date night!
Loved this dress but didn't wear.. didn't have an XS so I thought I'd try the S but it was too large.
Great fit and very comfortable! I am 6 months pregnant, 5'5, about 160 lbs and the M fit very well. Received a lot of compliments!
Wore this when 21 weeks pregnant. I was looking for something comfortable, fairly modest and still flattering and this dress did not disappoint!

links_reviews_title: Flattering, snug fit with a cool, rosy pink color. Hot dress!
links_reviews_text: Sophisticated and sexy at the same time. Would rent again! Quality fabric that easily stretches to hug curves. Simple silhouette. Definitely a winner.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress to celebrate my wedding anniversary!
links_reviews_text: LOVED the fit of the dress, but it seemed to stretch/relax a bit too much by the end of the night.

links_reviews_title: 30 weeks pregnant, dress was wayyy too tight. Did not wear
links_reviews_text: Too tight
Super unflattering - I couldnt manage to wear it out of the house. You could see every single curve on your body. The color is much more pink and I was expecting nude/skin tone.

links_reviews_title: At 35 weeks pregnant it felt too tight in the belly to wear. More pink than expected.
links_reviews_text: Didn't end up wearing it. Could be cute if not pregnant though.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. I actually didn't get to wear it out.
links_reviews_text: Feels good on, but runs small.

links_reviews_title: The cut of the dress is very flattering and the color blush is lovely.
links_reviews_text: You would think this is a bodycon dress but it’s actually a bit loose. This made it especially hard to find the right bra to wear. Even sports bras showed on the sides and not in a good way. My guess is an xs would actually fit a sm.
Love this because it's comfortable enough to wear everyday and can be dressed up too.
This a demure and sexy dress. With a blazer, it's work appropriate. On its own, it's sexy and great for a date. Very playful and flirty.
it was way too sexy and tight for work than i thought

links_reviews_title: Not sure what goes here when you don’t wear the piece
links_reviews_text: I could have went with the large as the XL made the dress lose it’s body con appeal. I had to pass on wearing it this time because I rented it to wear for a casual office emvironment but didn’t realize there was a cutout detail in the back. Sending it back because cutouts are a bit much at any work environment. It’s a nice dress but the sweater material is heavy and weird.

links_reviews_title: This dress was comfortable but elegant enough for the wedding.
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable... the little cut outs in the back was a great touch!
Beautiful dress. Great color and material. Just too snug in the middle for me.
Simply stunning !!! Classy enough for a work party and sexy enough to be the star of the show :)

It fit like a glove, showed a little skin in all the right places but still modest enough to wear to dinner with my family and daughter. Length was great, sleeves fit nicely, obsessed with this dress.

links_reviews_title: A beautiful dress but tricky to wear
links_reviews_text: Because I am larger chested and attending a family oriented event I ended up wearing this dress with a nude bodysuit underneath (Auden line from Target). This completely avoided the fussy low neckline issue and I could wear a normal bra. As other reviewers mentioned it did run small overall especially through the waistline. Was comfortable and elegant for a New Year's party.

Loved the dress. I got tons of compliments and felt so confident in it. Only down side is that the skirt length was a little unflattering since I have short, stubby legs. Also, the v neck was a bit deeper than expected but that was fine with me!

I wear size 8-10 and the large fit perfectly! I am also 5'9 and have a small chest. It was plenty long enough for me and I didn't need to wear a bra! My only complaint is that I ate too much and got bloated which made the dress super tight around my waist lol get this dress!

This dress made me feel beautiful. I am a little bigger in the hips and it fit really well. I'm not large up top and the dress was a little large but it wasn't really noticeable. I was a little worried about the lace sleeves and if they would fit my arms, as I typically have that problem with lesser brands, and that was not a problem at all. I would definitely rent this dress again.
Great for fall or winter wedding. Didn't need a jacket and the length was perfect !

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress, gaped in the chest
links_reviews_text: I got lots of compliments all night and would definitely rent again. The only things to look out for is that the shoulders are a bit tight and unforgiving. Don't throw you arms up on the dance floor in this dress. I am an A/B in the chest and if I slouched or bent over, this dress gaped away from my chest and put me in danger of flashing someone.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for the holidays! Sexy yet comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Wore it to a holiday party and received a lot of compliments. Dress fits true to size.
Loved the dress lots of compliments. It's more low cut than it looks on the model. Care may need to be take with bra selection, dress tape and bending over

This was my first rental from the site. Loved the fit and it was super comfortable to wear. It's very sexy and revealing in the chest area and I were breast tape to prevent any accidental shows. Overall I felt very pretty.
I loved this dress, so classy and comfortable, great length and gorgeous color!

Pros: I loved the color, easy to move in, plenty of stretch for a filling dinner and received a lot of compliments Cons: if you also are not well endowed you will need some double sided tape to prevent some gapping which will inevitably flash your grandma... Other than that I'd rent again! Great dress!
Wore this to my bridal shower and I loved it, flattering fit. The only thing I didn't like was that the fabric around the armpits was loose but it wasn't a big deal.

links_reviews_title: A beautiful dress for a winter wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was stunning: elegant, subdued sexy, and formal enough for a formal wedding. I did pin the neckline to be less low-cut and that worked pretty well. The back of the dress is just the red lace, so you'll need to be intentional about a bra. I wore a bra with clear straps, and that worked perfectly for me. I am on the petite side, so the sleeves were just a tad long, but nothing unbearable. The length of the dress hit just at my knees, which I liked. I felt like the slightly longer length offset the sexiness of the neckline. If you are tall, you might want to keep this in mind. Overall an absolutely stunning dress!
I almost bought this dress. It fit like a glove and even though the front is definitely a plunge, somehow it kept everything in place and classy.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty, not super formal but definitely wedding appropriate. Loved the lace detailing and got
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were actually more roomie than I would have expected, but I appreciated that. Form fitting but not uncomfortable.

I really liked this dress! It's short, but not too short (I'm 5'7"), has a gorgeous color, and the details were beautiful! I received a bunch of compliments! A few cons- the V in the front is very low, even for someone with a smaller bust (B) like me...more skin than I would usually show. Definitely needed fashion tape to feel comfortable! Also, couldn't wear a normal bra, so had to wear the stick on kind which don't offer much support.
Loved this dress! I got another one I liked more, so I didn't wear it out but would definitely rent again if I had somewhere to wear it.

links_reviews_title: This dress came arrived early, fit perfect, and received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The size was perfect and didn't need to wear tape or bra. The sleeves seemed loose at first, but were perfect for dancing and partying all night.
I really loved this dress but felt that the neckline was too low for a family wedding with my 6-year-old son as my date. It camouflaged my little belly well and I felt fabulous in it.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel beautiful!
links_reviews_text: The picture is dark but in person, it looks like the photo of the dress. The v-neck is low but surprisingly not a big deal. I bought the tape to secure myself in it but it wasn't necessary, I just wanted a little insurance since I chose to skip the bra. The medium was the perfect fit, I'm a 6 in most dresses. I will certainly rent for another occasion since no one ever saw it on me (wedding cancelled).

links_reviews_title: For Anniversary Photo Session. Photo Credit: Gina Purcell Photography (Lake Forest, California).
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress as a "back up" second dress for a wedding anniversary photo shoot. Though I prefer to wear conservative long gowns or dresses that are below my knee, I wanted to try something different for professional pictures. I chose this color because it is the same color as my wedding motif 20 years ago. Although the dress is really low-cut, I didn't feel like I was busting out of it. But I did have to hold it down while I sat. Body tape or fabric tape may have helped to keep dress from popping open and/or for some piece of mind. I love the chic lacy style of the dress and the color was awesome for pictures. Photo Credit: Gina Purcell Photography (Lake Forest, California).

I felt so gorgeous wearing this dress. Got so many compliments, and felt comfortable in it all night long. My one wish is that it wasn't AS tight, but I think that was meant to be in order for the dress to look as great as it did. Wore it for a fancy work event for my husband and it was completely appropriate.
Fit well, low cut but classy and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Lighting wasn't great for pic, but dress IS.
links_reviews_text: Y'all, I wore this for my bestie's rehearsal dinner and I don't think I've ever gotten so many compliments. It fit perfectly, gave me a nicely defined waist, and the color is a gorgeous deep red. I prob would skip it if you're super busty, as I couldn't really fit a bra underneath, just tape. Skip bracelets and do big earrings bc sleeves are to the hands, no wrist exposure.

Fine is really the best way to describe this dress. The lace is very stiff, particularly in the arms. The top lays weird, and I would not recommend this if you don’t have a large chest. I ended up needing to wear a bandeau underneath because it gapped so much on the top. I wore this dress to a formal dinner, and it did the job, but it’s definitely not something I would buy myself.

Okay so I would say I'm a size Shmedium- I'm in between a Small and Medium. There was no way I was able to wear the Small in this dress though! The band going around the empire waistline was tight on the Medium and a tad uncomfortable when sitting. Oh yeah, about sitting, I had to make sure I always had perfect posture or I'd be giving everyone a free show! I did wear a cupid plunge bra that I got from Venus but the straps in the back (along the sides of the back) were somewhat visible since the back of the dress is lace with no underlay (like the sleeves are). I really didn't care much about that. I just wanted the girls to be supported. Speaking of sleeves, they were oddly long as another reviewer mentioned but not a big deal. Overall the dress was beautiful and I was pleased with it. I just wish my girls didn't need the extra support because "free-boobing" it with some fabric tape to make sure there's no nip-slippage is the way to go in this beauty!

I felt beautiful all night and got so many compliments! Even with the low cut top I felt very comfortable and did not have any slips. It was snug around my rib cage but with high spanx holding me in, it was not an issue. This is such a beautiful dress! I wish I could keep it!

I got this dress for a rehearsal dinner in January. I actually thought I ordered a medium, but the large was perfect. It wasn't too tight around the waist and I liked the length. The neck is very deep, I used wardrobe tape to keep it in place. The back is open lace so I just wore petals instead of a bra. Got a lot of compliments!

This dress fit well and was super comfortable. The deep V worked great with a deep plunge bra. I was a little worried that with the deep V and the mini dress, it might be a little inappropriate. But it was perfect--I'm 5'8" for reference. I got lots of compliments! Also, I don't normally wear reds but this maroon/wine color was perfect for a winter wedding.

I rented this dress for NYE, and received so many compliments all night long! It's a stand out with the lace, deep V and dark red color. It is one of my favorite rentals so far, and was sad to return it. Im 5'6.5, 150, 34c and wear a size 6. The M fit great. I wore a nubra and fashion tape to keep the top in place. The dress is sexy with the deep V and its length but the long sleeves give it a classy touch, and kept me warm in the SF cold. There is no stretch to the dress...the ribcage area felt a bit snug but the rest of the dress was perfect, maybe a tiny bit loose even. And the pattern of the lace helps hide any problem areas. I was able to celebrate the new year without worrying of a dress mishap. Will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Dress is beautiful! Worn to a concert and got lots of looks and compliments! Very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a Small and Medium and ended up wearing the small. The cut is low, so the medium was too loose in the bust. The sleeves and waist line do not have a lot of give. Overall, it was beautiful and would definitely recommend!

I'm 5'9" 150 broad shoulders and narrow hips. The dress was pretty. The neckline was a very deep V --required a special bra which I did not have. Could not even use a sticky bra! Luckily, I have nothing "up top" so I got away with Petal Tops. The sleeves were loose and not overly flattering even for toned arms. There was a band detail that went around right below the bust line--it was not stretchy and did not allow me to take deep breaths. Though it worked for the day, I wouldn't recommend this dress.

I was pleasantly surprised with this dress. I was worried it may look a little cheap, but in person the lace is very nice. The chest is loose fitting. It would definitely accommodate someone with a larger chest if you want to brave the cleavage. There is no give on the lace, so size up to your hips. I didn't get to wear this dress as my event was rescheduled. I don't think I would rent again. The top was just a little too loose for my comfort. My boyfriend love the look though!

links_reviews_title: Effortless! This was my First time using RTR. The dress was ready to go & simple to return!
links_reviews_text: The cut in the front was a little low for my work party. I pinned it & it was perfect. The sleeves are a little long but overall a gorgeous dress.
It was beautiful, I got tons of compliments. My only complaint was the shoulders were a little big and it didn't lay quite right on my chest. Overall it was a good pic!

Beautiful dress... not sure that I did it any justice. The front is super low and the back is all lace so a traditional bra is not an option. Unfortunately my girls are a little too big to go braless. I ordered the M and L. The L was more comfortable but did not lend enough support for my breasts... so I opted to wear the M and suffer through the tight band at the waist for the support. The color was perfect for the holiday season and the lace made packing and transporting in a suitcase easy as there was no wrinkles. Overall I felt that I turned heads in this one... not sure they turned for the right reasons.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a work Christmas Party...and event a surprise engagement!
links_reviews_text: The best part of the dress was the details. The top portion of the dress was tight and I have a small bust. The sleeves were a little long but it didn't bother me at all

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a holiday party
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress, but I definitely should have trusted the other reviews regarding the low cut neckline. I was definitely a little out of my comfort zone with the amount of skin I ended up showing all night, I'm a DDD, and thought I could pin it a little to feel a little more secure- but that turned out to be a little more challenging than I thought.
