That said, I got many compliments, the dress it's self was gorgeous - just be aware of the deep v before committing.

Fits like a glove, VERY comfortable. I wish I could wear it everyday. I BOUGHT this dress - I just couldn't send it back. Perfect for cooler weather. I wore it for Valentine's Day dinner and it was a show stopper! Sexy, yet classy. Also, I don't think this will ever go out of style. LOVE LOVE LOVE.
I love this dress! It's comfortable and cozy and also sexy. I'm wearing a corset underneath which explains the lines. Adore!

This dress got a lot of compliments at a holiday party. The fabric is thick, combined with long-sleeves, made it great for winter. There is a little bit of stretch, so I squeezed into the small instead of the medium , and it was much more flattering. The style was extremely unique - sexy but not too sexy. Another great rental from RTR!
Extremely sexy yet sophisticated, the material stretched out a bit over the evening but other than that was beautiful in color and quality. Endless compliments!
Sleeves were long enough and dress was thick , great for a cold night.
The dress was beautiful and I thought it looked good on a curvier figure. Really comfortable and easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: great for a special event on a cold weekend
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a bachelorette in the mountains in November ie cold! The dress was a heavier weight without bulk and I wore a jacket for photos but I did wear a coat as it got colder throughout the night. It hit just below the knees and looked great with black tights and tan booties. Not difficult to walk in, as the fabric had some give. I loved the neckline, no flashy accessories needed!
Dress is comfortable to wear! :)
Really loved this dress. I was 7 months post Parton & worries about how snugly this would fit but I actually felt very comfortable and it was perfect for a fall day in Italy!

links_reviews_title: Fantastic cross-over dress for work party followed by a night on the town!
links_reviews_text: The length and sleeves made this dress conservative enough for my engineering firm's winter party while the fishnet and body-skimming fit made it fun enough to go out dancing in afterwards. I'd say it fits true to size. There was some extra material around my waist, but that's pretty typical for me and dresses because I have thick thighs and a smaller waist. The material is stretchy but not stretchy enough to overcome my thigh/waist ratio :-) Also worth noting: the material is *thick* and therefore warm--nice when walking between bars on a cold February night, but not so nice when lighting up the dance floor :-)

I wore this dress for a college fundraiser dinner. It's thick enough to keep you warm in cool weather and you dont need much jewelry since the dress has a lot of detail. Fits snug in all the right places but has some stretch for movement. Love this dress.

This dress is perfect for ladies with athletic figures and have a muscular upper body. The mesh really shows off your hard work in the gym. I rented this for a banquet my job hosted and it was perfectly sexy yet classy and refined. Highly recommend.
Sexy date night or going out dress!
A little snug for my taste but sexy details. I wore a strapless bra, wish i had some spanx. Love the midi length and feeling sexy yet fairly covered up.
This dress stays in place and doesn't slide up like some sweater dresses. Plus no static reaction when removing a coat. The color was saturated and looks vibrant.

Wore this dress for our holiday family photos. The fit was perfect. Flattering. Minimal ride up. Wore a regular bra but would recommend a strapless so the straps don't show at the top. Definitely recommend it.
Love the way this feels on! Just too long and fits somewhat wonky on my body. Maybe better with more curves or taller as it felt like it hit too low on my shins

links_reviews_title: My company’s award ceremony was at an Italian Fine Dining Restaurant. This dress was perfect.
links_reviews_text: This dress hugged my curves without feeling tight. It was the perfect amount of sexy sophistication which was perfect for my company's Award ceremony.

The fabric maintained its shape throughout the day - which can be a challenge for a sweater dress. The mesh at top (wear a nude bra) and bottom helped to offset the fact that it was a little too long for my 5'3" frame. I wasn't crazy about it, but my friends loved it. I think it would look better on someone 5'5" or taller.
Loved this dress! It has sleeves but the mesh like fabric at the top made it interesting. I received a lot of compliments. It has a lot of stretch so a safe bet for a form fitting look.

links_reviews_title: Very new style for me, but I loved it!
links_reviews_text: I was worried about the length of this on my 5'4" frame, and once I tried it on I was worried about my stomach and hips, but a pair of black tights solved both problems -- it didn't need full Spanx because the material is nice and heavy, just the control top of the tights, and having my legs in black tights seemed to help with the potentially awkward midi length (and the tights were necessary for the temps!). Ultimately I was really happy with the dress, and as usual, I loved a risk-free chance to step out of my style comfort zone. Other pros: The netting of the shoulders and sleeves was comfortable, not itchy, and didn't catch on things often. Sleeves were actually long enough for my long arms. Color was gorgeous and I think would flatter many skin tones & hair colors. Fit: could have worn S or M, but once i got the tights on, I thought the S was more flattering.

The dress itself is fine. Thick stretchy material. Just felt like a sack of potatoes. Even with spanx. It looked good in all the photos but in hindsight, those people are built a little different and my hip dips could not recover. I will usually post photos with my face but not this one for obvious reasons.

I wore this to a winter wedding. It's very form fitting and the sleeves are a fun pattern. I usually wear a size small, and the small did fit well, but after reading other people's reviews about how it stretched out over the evening, I squeezed into the XS and I'm glad I did because it did loosen up as the night went on. It had really nice stretch and was super comfortable sitting and standing. It was tight at the bottom, so I kinda had to take small steps, but that was fine. Overall, loved it! I've rented about 10 RTR dresses that I've enjoyed, but this was the first one I truly didn't want to send back.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for dinner in NYC!
links_reviews_text: Form fitting dress hugs all the right curves but super comfy and warm! I have a long torsoe and arms and the arm length and dress length was perfect. I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a birthday dinner & party.
links_reviews_text: Got lots of compliments.

I LOVED this dress! I wore it to a fall rehearsal dinner. I have long arms so having a long sleeve that actually met my wrists was a huge bonus. The knit does stretch out a bit over the night but I had so many compliments! I'd easily purchase this dress for other occasions.

links_reviews_title: Fun fall dress! Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress was looser on me than I would have liked, but because of the type of material, it still appeared fitted enough. Comfy material and I enjoyed it. It's a great color- more of a brown based burgundy tone.
What a great dress! I'd rent this again in a heartbeat. Very comfortable, even after 12 hours at work. Many compliments.
Sexy yet classy. Great color, true to size and perfect for the holiday season!

The color is a pretty burgundy just like the picture. The fabric is very sturdy. It's tight, so you need to be comfortable with your figure. I didn't like how long the non-netted fabric went. I thought that part would have been shorter. I'm 5'8" so I would guess on most women it will hit right above the knee. Overall, just meah. Which wasn't what I was looking for.

This is a cute dress. I'd size down... it seems to run large. I didn't love that the mesh wasn't even, and their were holes in the one I received so I didn't wear it. I'd probably rent it for a night out.
Loved this dress....so comfy and sexy
Great color but definitely runs big. It was bagging in weird places. But at the same time, the thin material shows everything. I just didn't feel comfortable in it so I didn't end up wearing it.
Form fitting
Tons of compliments. Oh so comfortable.
Overall fit was slim to the body and the mesh cuts down pretty low. Great dress but I didn't select it for my event
The color of this in person seemed more brown than maroon and the fit didn't work for my body so I'm glad I had an alternate dress!

I tried on the small but struggled to get the unforgiving hem over my hourglass hips, even though it did eventually fit and looked great. Figuring this tight fit would be cumbersome on bathroom trips, I decided to wear the medium, which also fit well and was easier to pull on and off. However, after wearing this dress for barely three hours the bottom half stretched out so much it was baggy and looked bad. The bottom hem remained tight on the medium dress, limiting my usually long gait. If this dress would have kept it's shape this would have been a perfect dress.
This dress fits like a glove. Perfect lbd with a twist. The fabric is super soft and comfy. The cutouts are flattering. I could own this one! Rent this Now!

links_reviews_title: Amazing design, but grab your shapewear.
links_reviews_text: The design is amazing, SO amazing, it's just a bit impractical. I want to love this but wearing shapewear is going to be a must for me, personally. I wish it had just a bit more structure. It's VERY comfortable and lightweight but might be too hot to wear in the summer and too cold in the winter. With that said, it's still a fun date dress.

links_reviews_title: This was a great dress for Girls Night!
links_reviews_text: Nice cut with quality fabric that hugs you the right way!
I loved the sleeves and the cutouts. True to size.

This dress was really comfortable. The cut is really flattering. The length is perfect- I'm 5'10". The fabric is a very stretchy, thin, cotton jersey, which allows for a dramatic versatility. I wore to two daytime events, dressed down. Because the fabric is thin, I recommend substantial undergarments. The top part of the dress had a tendency to slip over my breasts if I lifted my arms too high- which made it pretty fussy.

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful and super comfortable
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size. It's a cotton material and a smidge thin. I had plenty of compliments and enjoyed wearing this for my birthday dinner.

links_reviews_title: I love this chic yet edgy look by Sid Neigum!
links_reviews_text: Running a little big with a lot stretch, I recommend going down a size.

The slinky covered fit with the openings at the waist made for a sexy and classy combo. Fabric is thinly ribbed which is hard to tell from the pictures. Only call out is to be careful with the extended sleeves as you have to watch out if your at dinner

I can't tell if I love this. MUCH less formal and more laid back in person than I expected. The fabric is a flimsy ribbed jersey, but super-duper soft. No inherent structure. It's flattering, once you finally place the front knot so it lies flat without extra cutouts up top. The sleeves are crazy long and not belled exactly but a more floppy, squared-off flare. You may not believe me, but it feels totally casual. I would even try it with the right cute black low sneakers or slides to run around town doing errands. Not gala material for sure. It's new now, but neckhole was small for me. The rest would honestly stretch to fit any size.
Personally I wasn't crazy about this dress. I'm short, so the cut out on this was very revealing!
Keeps you warm even with cut outs

I loved this dress! Such a fun look, unique, but extremely comfortable. Got a ton of compliments when I wore it. Very flattering for my body type - smaller on stop but big hips and butt. Hit all the right notes!
Cute idea but more casual looking and shows a lot of skin. The fabric is sweater material. Can't think of where to wear.

links_reviews_title: Wonderful dress, is more of a thick T-shirt type material but easily dressed up!
links_reviews_text: Great fit very flattering
Very flattering fabric is light, stretchy jersey. The cutouts are not too showy. I received a ton of compliments on this dress.

links_reviews_title: It was classy and sophisticated but also sexy with the open slits
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly and very flattering
Soft comfortable material...beautiful flowy bell sleeves
Its gorgeous!
I really dislike writing rtr reviews and never do it but am doing it for this dress, which is fantastic. Feels like wearing pyjamas, looks amazing. I never want to take it off.
Made me look witchy- would look best with open toed shoes but it's winter here and closed toe just would not work
This is a nice skirt in an unexpected color and fabric... it's nice, but I'm NOT blown away.. I did receive a lot of compliments when I wore it to work

links_reviews_title: Shimmery fabulousness for karaoke girls night!!
links_reviews_text: This skirt is everything!! I rented it for birthday night out and will definitely rent again with unlimited!! It is so versatile and just fun to wear!!! Kinda tight around the waist, but surprisingly flattering with the pleats... fabric is light and has a soft leathery feel!! Can't wait to try it again with a t-shirt and heels!!
Fits perfectly, lightweight leather so perfect for multiple season. Dress it up or down! Purchased immediately!
The skirt fit great! A little less bright than image, but still a beautiful skirt- great length. A little past the knees. Great to brighten up a simple outfit. Also with my RTR purse!

I wore this for my final presentation in school. I planned ahead of time to represent myself as a very neat and dedicated person to #1 show my readiness and simpleness in my presentation #2 try Blake Lively in her metalic Gucci skirt for the Sprinkle Cupcake charity event a several years ago!! I loved and enjoyed wearing it. Plus, i got some compliments from my professors too lol

links_reviews_title: Wore it to work and then a networking event after hours.
links_reviews_text: Fit great, however the pleats didn’t look as crisp as in the photo. If I wore again I’d try a slip underneath, as the material kept “sticking” to my tights, and I kept having to fluff it.

I LOVED this skirt. I would rent it again. Fit just right and it was a lot of fun. I danced in the street (for no reason at all) and it caught a lot of people's attention. I received a lot of compliments. Just don't wear it on a windy day. You'll be outside like Marilyn Monroe. That's the truth.
Runs small. I went up 2 sizes to get a good fit. Flowy but clings if you're wearing tights.
Fun bright gold and very sturdy. Went to about my knees. Loose everywhere but waist.
Such a cute, swingy skirt! The gold definitely stands out and the skirt fit comfortable. I wore it to Vegas which worked even though it's pretty conservative. It's the perfect day-to-night skirt!

links_reviews_title: Cute skirt but did not super wow me
links_reviews_text: This skirt runs very small in my opinion. I usually am an 8 and the 10 was a tight squeeze but wearable. I wore this for a Baptism so it worked The the occasion. I liked it but wasn't in love with it compared to other RTR options.
The skirt was a tad bit longer than I anticipated but it still was a great fit! It fit up on my hips very well! Very pleased with this!
Wore this on date night. Has two girls stop me to ask where I got it. It has the right amount of "shiny" - eye catching but not obnoxious. Loved it!

I'm normally between a size 2-4, but I had to rent an 8 in this. No give in the waist and very small, but two sizes up (!!) fit well. I had to wear smooth tights since the leather/no lining got caught on patterned tights and looked static-y. But once I worked out all the kinks, I really liked it. A little shiny so I styled it conservatively for work, but it could be dressed up in a flashier way. Fabric is soft and flows (not stiff leather).

links_reviews_title: The length was perfect! Not full on midi but not too short for a tall girl!
links_reviews_text: I love this skirt because I got that pleated look that is in without having to go midi or maxi. For someone shorter it might hit at an awkward length. I really love the fabric. You can tell it's super high quality. The color makes it more of a statement piece so you have lots of top options with it!
Love it!

links_reviews_title: What a night! It was so fun to dress up, have fun and raise money for a great charity!
links_reviews_text: The fit was dead on, a tad high on the waist and the perfect length. The gold faux leather was so great to the touch. I paired it with a plain off the shoulder top, sheer tights and chunky heels. I got so many compliments!!
I wore it with over the knee leather boots and it was a hit! This was my first RTR rental, got tons of compliments at work and I also wore to a date and it killed!

This is a cool skirt, appropriate for work or evening. However I am normally a six and could barely zip this up (it ended up being too uncomfortable to wear). I also thought it would be a lighter, shimmery material but it's closer to a lightweight leather or suede.

Fun unique skirt! Definitely made oeople look twice & brought a smile to their faces & mine! Rented for a date night in AC but ended up wearing to work and was one of my best days in the office in a while! Everything seemed to go my way that day so this was my lucky gold skirt!

links_reviews_title: I want to keep it!!!! Super fun and flowy.
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly high waisted. I wore it with a black body suit. Very flowy. It didn't even get caught in my butt cheeks! Some skirts do that. This one did not. Lol i loved wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Great fit. Comfortable and elegant. I loved it and I’m still getting compliments several days later.
links_reviews_text: I wore this skirt for my work holiday party. It’s been several days since and I’m still getting compliments! This fit was classic and true to size. I highly recommend this beautiful gold skirt.

links_reviews_title: Metallic gives this fun skirt an edge!
links_reviews_text: This skirt is great! I wore it right at the waist with a tight sweater underneath. I figured I'd be wearing a bulkier top, which is why I ordered the size 4 instead of the size 2 (I'm usually between sizes). The gold color really makes this skirt stand out. I got tons of compliments at work! The leather also feels fantastic. This could easily work for a party or date as well.
I loved this for work! I have an issue with skirts being big around the waist but this was perfect.
Runs small,very

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments but not the most comfortable
links_reviews_text: Fits pretty snugly and is a shorter than expected. I got compliments and it was easy to go from work to happy hour to dinner. A denim shirt made the look more summery and casual. Tons of compliments on it, but not my favorite rental
Great length, great color! I may just purchase this piece I love it so much.

links_reviews_title: I loved having an edgy but feminine outfit.
links_reviews_text: I was disappointed that the skirt runs too small. I am a size 8, and knew that I should be cautious and order 1 size up. I could not zip the last 1" of the size 10. Otherwise, I loved the quality and style. Will consider ordering again, but a size 12 (I guess).
Great fit. Transitions well from office to evening

links_reviews_title: This would have been cute if it fit!
links_reviews_text: Runs small!
I really like this. Got tons of compliments. If it wasn't so tight in the waist, I'd buy it.

links_reviews_title: Runs waaay small, not even close!
links_reviews_text: Couldn't wear it. Very bummed.

It definitely runs small. I sized up & it was still a little tight at the top band. Also would recommend some shapewear under it because of that because it will make you look like you have a pooch...even if you don't! It is very pretty - nice length & great shine to it which takes it to a glam level.

This skirt was disappointing. All of the pleats were pretty much gone and it ran small. I'm in between a 14-16 and have a small waist comparatively but it was so tight at the waist line I couldn't breath. But honestly I could have dealt with not breathing and worn some shape-wear but it wasn't worth it since the pleats weren't there.
I enjoyed this and got lots of compliments, I just wish the pleats were a little less flat.

links_reviews_title: I looked cute in this received lots of compliments. Paired it with a black turtle neck .
links_reviews_text: na
The fit is great. The pleats fall nicely and love the length.

Material is a beautiful gold pleather. The pleating is perfect and it fell at my knees. Unfortunately the waist is narrow. This would fit an hourglass shape perfectly but not someone without a small waist.
Wasn't flattering but was perfect for mardi gras day in NoLa
Very young looking. Not leather-like at all. It was thin and flowy. Nice enough but nothing special.
It was comfortable and fit nicely. Nothing special though. Just an average work dress.
Comfy long sleeve lightweight dress. Elastic waist is very forgiving of figure flaws. Design is also complimentary.
True to size

links_reviews_title: Nice fabric, would work for longer torso
links_reviews_text: I really liked the light, silky, breathable fabric and the pattern was very pretty. Fit would probably be better on someone with a longer torso. The adjustable band set at my natural waist left too much fabric up top and looked a bit saggy in the back. I could obviously pull it down, but I didn't think it was as flattering. Length was perfect for work, and slip was a welcome addition.

At 5-11 it's hard to find a dress that is long enough for work, church and kids. This was perfect. True to size, great length, nice and light. Wore in June with bare legs but would be perfect for winter or fall with tights.
Super comfy, great print and pribably runs a little big, but i was glad the small worked.

Love this dress and I'm really hoping to have one more chance to wear it before I send it back. It would be perfect for many occasions, dressed up or down and could easily add black tights or leggings for a different look. A dress I would love to own!
This dress covered all the bases- cute, comfortable and versatile. It would be great for work or weekend. I loved the pattern and it was super soft and light.
Easy dress to pack and great for fall. Looks great with a black leather jacket too!
Absolutely love this dress. It fit perfectly true to size, and was comfortable and versatile. The material is soft and flows very nicely.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work. I bought it!
links_reviews_text: I love this soft and light dress. It is perfect for work - professional, moderate and feminine. It is comfortable and falls nicely. I have curvy hips and it fit nicely. It's lightweight, so great for warmer weather. Loved it so much I bought it!

This boho-chic dress is a fun one to wear! It may be worn in the office or can be dressed up for a night out. There is an elastic band at the waist in which you are able to alter the length of the dress. I would size up in this! There is comfortable room in the bust - about 4 inches of space so this is great for any bust size. This dress comes to about 3 inches above the knee on a 5'4" person. Great for Apple, Hourglass, Athletic, Pear, Petite, Straight & Narrow, and full bust figures!

I wore it on a couple occasions, both work and to a party and received compliments each time. The stretch waist flattered my curves and I loved that it could be paired with different shoes and accessories! Love!
Dress is really cute but the top half feels like it has too much fabric. I tried tucking it in a bit and that worked. Wore it to work and loved it.

links_reviews_title: Good dress for a normal day at the office
links_reviews_text: Cute & comfortable dress. Nothing too special. A little boho, but the traditional paisley pattern in grey makes it appropriate for the office. Not a stand-out dress. I enjoyed wearing it.
Joie never fails, this is such a versatile dress. Covered problem areas well. This could be worn for work or a shower. Defiantly summer/spring material. I'm a size 10 but the medium fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and so comfy
links_reviews_text: Can be worn at work or at night with a leather jacket. Super comfortable, received multiple compliments.
Absolutely love this dress. Great fit, forgiving style, high quality fabric. Has some boho vibe to it, but you can style it in many different ways. True to size.
It wasn't my favorite rental but I enjoyed wearing it

links_reviews_title: easy dress to wear, runs a bit big especially on top (but i'm small chested)
links_reviews_text: great with tights & boots
Great dress. I wore it with tights and boots. A perfect weekend dress and super flattering.

links_reviews_title: Slip underneath was a little too tight
links_reviews_text: The dress itself fit well and looked very nice, but the slip underneath was a little too tight to contain my glorious thunder thighs. I only wore once for a few hours to church, but wished I could wear more!!
I rented this for a work trip but it was just on the cusp of being too short for international work so I sent it back. It will be nice for the summer when I'm back in the office.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, although the color's a bit drab
links_reviews_text: flattering fit, but the color/print was a bit drab for me.

links_reviews_title: Very comfy, great to dress up or down.
links_reviews_text: Very, very comfy. Material feels great.
Loved the dress but with tights you will need static cling spray.
Comfortable, but didn't do much for me. Pair with a leather moto jacket.

Rented this for my daughter to wear to a day party. It runs a bit big and was unflatteirng on her -kind of shapeless. And even though the details say 37" long, they must mean without the blousing that is necessary for the dress - with that, it was extremely short on her. Sent it back without wearing.
This was a comfortable and easy dress for work (or would be great for a night out too). Looked just like the pic!

links_reviews_title: Pattern is very subtle and pretty, easy piece to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: elastics waistband is a little annoying, there is also a slip underneath caused static

Didn't wear. Rented small when I'm at least a medium. It actually fit and wouldn't have been horrible. Very forgiving. Didn't work for what I had in mind but I'll keep my eye on it for another occasion.
So soft and cute.
very comfortable and fit great
great!
I didn't like the fit. Not flattering. Very billowy

Rented this dress for everyday wear. It’s loose, comfortable and a good length for me. It looks a little boxy on me, even with the stretch in the waist. Overall a nice, casual dress that works for a few occasions.
Sleeve cuffs were loose but very comfortable - all season dress
NA
Flattering fit. Not too short. Will rent again!
Very comfortable, wore to a bridal shower. I am usually a size 4, 5'6" and the small fit perfectly and was not too short

Got lots of compliments! Definitely tight on the torso, originally tried the small and sent back for a medium that was still a little tight. Still fun for a bar crawl, light weight so good in the hot weather.

I you want to stand out with stubble sexiness then this is your jumper. Wore this too a foodie filled event with the trendiest restaurants in town. Received numerous compliments. Paired with flat slide sanders for a more casual, weeknight look and some funky jewelry to bring the flair. Looks stunning with heels for a more dressy look. FYI - Definitely need to wear fashion tape to keep the ladies from making an appearance!
That said... I wore it anyway. Length was great. It has big pockets! If it weren't so low cut as to be borderline unwearable in most contexts I would want to buy it.

links_reviews_title: Cute but gave me a wedgie
links_reviews_text: I wasn't gonna freeboob this one and had the perfect undergarment for it. If you plan to go commando up top you'll need fashion tape. Also I have a pretty short torso and yet this still gave me a wedgie in the front and back. It looked cute but it's not a low-maintenance garment.

links_reviews_title: Really fun- loved the colors-stripes, easy to get in and out of
links_reviews_text: The front is very low cut- I used fashion tape to close the v- neck front about 6". I considered wear a camisole if the tape didn't work.

You will need fashion tape...if you want to sit down without covering up! Also a little annoying to have someone zip/unzip each trip to the bathroom, but so worth it for this piece! The inseam is a little short for taller girls like me, 5'8"...also a little shorter in the leg. Would totally rent again!
Great romper for everyday wear!

It is so fun and playful but dressy at the same time. I have small boobs, so I was worried about the top being too baggy and my boobs showing, but it fit like a glove! No wardrobe malfunctions whatsoever, and didn't even need to use fashion tape. I love the deep cut. I will say, the XS was a little hard to get over my butt (I had to wiggle a little) so if you have a larger butt, maybe size up! I absolutely LOVED THIS. And would've bought it when my rental was up if it wasn't so expensive! I am about 5'5" and it hit me about mid-shin, so it was a great length! LOVE IT!
Be prepared to wear double sided tape.

This rides up a bit, but NOT as bad as the other reviews say. I would order a size larger than you usually do like I did. I only wish I had fashion tape because I had a few close calls with coverage in the chest. Lots of complements though!
As you can see in the picture this was definitely a no go. I think on a smaller busted gal, this may have worked. The purples were great and material looked nice.
I loved this jumpsuit, it brightened my day! I wore a size M, which fit great but the inseam (specifically the crotch seam) was a bit short and uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Super cute but a little tight
links_reviews_text: Super cute and fun for any event but right in the legs and butt if you're curvier and also a little small in the chest. Would probably go up a size

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit fits so nicely on my curves. It was conservative yet sexy. I felt beautiful in this.
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is perfect for short people. The only thing is the bodice area of the jumpsuit is shorter than expected so in specific angles of bending down it gives your crotch area a squeeze for life but other than that it's manageable. Being that, this jumpsuit is like three quarter legged, I paired it with a gold anklet to pick up the small gold threads in the threading. The front v-neck opening is very revealing especially if you're not used to that kind of thing so I wore a bralette to contrast the colors.

The overall fit worked really well. If you're big chested and don't like showing cleavage this isn't for you. I definitely had to keep an eye on the girls. But it was a really cool romper. I wore it for a day event and really liked it.
I couldn't wear this because a-it was too low and b-it was so tight in the rib cage. Sad because cute design and fabric.
I got so many compliments, but I would have probably been more comfortable sizing up.

This jumpsuit was so fun and easy! I hit tons of compliments on it! You definitely need fashion tape! I'm a small 32B but I felt like it fit well and was flattering on me. I'm 5'8" and the torso length was a littttle short for me but not uncomfortable
I didn't end up wearing this as it was too low cut for the event I wanted to wear it for. This would be super cute to go out in!

links_reviews_title: Super cute but the cut is much lower in real life than it looks in the picture.
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove!

Honestly everyone said that this jumpsuit runs small in the body, wish I listened! I shouldn't have bothered renting this. It isn't as cute in person and both the medium and the large were super unflattering in the torso.

links_reviews_title: could not wear it, too short in the body.
links_reviews_text: too short in the body so could not wear it
Super ill-fitted. Could not get it over my hips.
This jumpsuit is super cute overall! It does run up in the front, is a little bit snug, and a little bit big up top.
I'm 5'10 and this was way too short in the torso

links_reviews_title: Wish this would have worked for me
links_reviews_text: Like many people stated... if you have boobs this dress will probably not work for you.

I'm 5'8 usually a small but this jumpsuit literally was up my crotch. It was slightly loose up top in the chest area, but I could've made that work with tape. The short fit made this a No for me. Otherwise it was really cute
Not for me. Too revealing & also general kind of baggy
way too small, i'm usually a small but this medium didnt fit me
Too tight and neck too low

links_reviews_title: Received tons of compliments, super flirty
links_reviews_text: Don’t forget the fashion tape. It’s a must

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear this one out of the house.
links_reviews_text: First, let me say that I have a fairly average length torso - maybe even on the shorter size of average. This jumpsuit is unusually short in the crotch. I wasn't bothered by the open and plunging neckline; however, thing rode up every which way. Definitely size up.

links_reviews_title: Very cute and well-made but strange fit.
links_reviews_text: The torso was way too short for me. I do not have this problem often as I am not that tall.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this piece
links_reviews_text: Fits very tight in the thigh and crotch area. The inseam was very short and uncomfortable. I would have likely worn this item if I had sized up.
This jumpsuit looked pretty much completely obscene! The v neck on the model is MUCH more narrow than the v in real life!!

I really enjoyed wearing this jumper. It was comfortable but still dressy. It's very low cut so I wore a tank underneath to make it more appropriate. The fitting is kind of off though. I'm short but the crotch area rode up all day. If I was a tad bit taller, I don't think I'd be comfortable in it. I also noticed there were belt loops, but no belt. I looked at some pictures and some people had a belt. I dont think it NEEDS it, but weird it didn't come with it.
Couldn't get over my hips to try on but the material was nice.

It is a tight fit even though I order a size up. I did wear a nude tone tank top under because the chest section is very revealing. I did wear it to a work function (bowling) and the right sleeve did come apart :(

links_reviews_title: Could not wear it to my event due to size issue.
links_reviews_text: This is beautiful! However, it ran sooooooooo short through the torso! I couldn't wear it - it road up so short in the lower region that I had the worst camel toe. So sad I couldn't wear this jumpsuit as it would have been perfect for my event. I gave it 3 stars because it is gorgeous, but you must be petite or have a VERY short torso to wear this.
This was far too small to wear. If you have hips, the waist will barely make it over your belly button.
This dress was great and a head turner for sure. I wore a nubra to give it more shape in the front. Doesn't have much stretch so be careful getting in/out of higher vehicles!!
This is the perfect example of a conservative yet sexy dress. Loved it!
This dress was very comfortable true to size. The sheer areas gave an extra little pop. Fit well with a strapless bra. Materialistic but still breathable
Loved the fit, stretchy material, great length too

links_reviews_title: Love this dress. Super sexy and body-hugging but also really comfy!
links_reviews_text: Amazing dress and great for a party or night out. I wore it in the winter for NYE with tights and boots. I chose xs/0, which is my usual size but was a bit concerned about it feeling too tight. It felt and looked fabulous. At first the neck felt a touch tight but it didn't bother me after a few minutes. I wore this dress for six or seven hours and I didn't wear a bra. Note the sheer striping part is really visible at the neckline and not as much at the bottom since there is a slip underneath. You will love this dress!

This dress is TIGHT. I am a curvy 5'1" and rented both small and medium but did not see a big difference between the two. I ended up wearing the small. I wore spanx to smooth underneath which made it a little binding by the end of the night. But, it was flattering in all the right areas and was a flattering length as well. I would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, but was too big.
links_reviews_text: This was sent to me as a replacement since the first dress I ordered was too big, but I had the same issue with this dress as it was only available in a small and I needed an xs. I wore it anyway. It is a very stretchy dress and the bottom was very bulky on me. I would try this dress again, but in an xs. I did appreciate RTR helping me last minute to try to find a replacement for me.

I followed other reviewers suggestions on size and went up one size. I usually wear medium, and while I could get it zipped, the large was more comfortable. I loved everything about this dress, and got so many compliments. Wears well, flexible and so flattering. Would definitely rent again or buy if it goes on sale.
I loved this dress because it fit really well and I was comfortable all night. I wore it in Vegas and felt like the material was dressy enough for the clubs! Would definitely rent again!
This dress was amazing. I wore spanx with it And I loved it.

links_reviews_title: Great for cocktail hour and end of year work awards ceremony with an open dress code
links_reviews_text: Fit is like a bodycon dress - tight, yet flattering material. Pros - color is flattering (for obvious reasons), style (nice length), tight enough to not wear a bra, he LOVED it. Cons- The bottom has a much longer underskirt than pictured, so the most sheer you see is around neck line.

This dress was great! I wanted something to wear out to a bachelorette without feeling like I was trying to dress like a teenager and this was perfect. I am usually a s/m or size 6 and I needed the large because the dress was very fitted through the hips. Highly recommend if you want to feel confident but be in something comfortable

My boyfriend wanted to take me to a really nice restaurant in town and told me to rent a sexy dress. This dress was great! It is definitely a snug bodycon style dress but the pattern is flattering and hides small flaws in tummy area. It positively accented my booty too. Needless to say he loved it. You can get away with a strapless black bra or go without. For reference at time of wearing the dress I was 146lbs and 5'3"

Was a tight fit but my friend wore it as it was my back up dress. I am 32 bust 27 waist and 34 hips. Doesn't stretch as much as I think it should. My girlfriend and I are two different shapes but both fit fine. She's athletic I'm hour glass.
It was a very slimming fit, great for new years! Couldn't see the detail that well in person. But loved it! Lots of compliments. A bit longer for us older gals.
This was so flattering and definitely bodycon style. Perfect for a night out! Im extremely busty and was able to go braless which is rare
This dress hugged all my curves in a the right places! The medium fit perfectly. Loved it! A little snug around the neck but it didn't bother me at all.

links_reviews_title: I love love love this dress. I felt classy and sexy in this dress.
links_reviews_text: Hugged my curves in all the right places. This dress is an example of how a form fitting dress should look.
This dress is so cute. The striped detailing has the right amount of sex appeal with the semi sheer nude sections behind it. It was a little smaller than I anticipated, but it still fit great.

links_reviews_title: Sexy but not over the top
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! So comfortable and a major head turner!

This dress is black with a pattern so it's very flattering. It was a nice breathable fabric as well. I got rave reviews (even from a previous runway model!). Comfortable and flattering... what's not to love?

I absolutely loved wearing this dress! I rented an XS and S, and I ended up wearing the Small for a little extra room, but the XS would've worked too. The cut is very flattering and the details make it look very classy and expensive. The dress is sexy without showing a ton of skin. I was sad to send it back.

I rented this dress for an evening out in Vegas and loved it. I usually don't do short dresses as I hate my legs but i couldn't pass it up for Vegas. It was super comfortable and stretchy so it worked great for me curvy hips, but and thighs.

I wore this dress for a wedding Welcome dinner; it looked amazing on! The fabric has quite a bit of give in it, which hugged my curves nicely, so I was able to leave my spanx at home. The only difference between the dress I received and the dress pictured on the website is that the under slip was a bit long, the shearness at the bottom of the dress wasn't visible in the way it's shown.

I read some reviews that recommended spanx, which I ignored. Although I would not wear them myself, I would recommend them if you are not confident about your mid section, as this dress hugs every curve. Since the top is sheer and the arm area is low cut, it is impossible to wear a bra. I definitely recommend adhesive bra pieces, the material isn't comfortable enough to go all natural.
Fit great! I little tight around neck, but I would wear it again. Definitely form fitting!

Snug fit but very flattering. The mock turtleneck can be a bit warm but still a very nice dress. Lots of compliments. Body conscious style. Not sure what type of spanx you could wear with it since it is sheer in places. Well made, thick material, good zipper. You will most likely need someone to zip you up. Felt confident in the dress. Would purchase or rent again.

I'm usually a 6 or 8. I picked M and L but since I have a pretty athletic build the M was just a bit too tight. The L was perfect and this dress is very flattering and feminine. I agree with many other comments - you do not need a bra with this. It's a great dress.
The fabric is stretchy and very forgiving. Loved the high n
This dress runs true to size. The material is thick and hides flaws. It definitely was shorter than it appears on the model without being too short on my 5'9 frame.

links_reviews_title: Classic LBD that is extremely comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I tend to wear a size 4 in most RTR dresses and this medium fit me like a glove. I had to wear a stick on bra as the dress is cut out on the "side boob" area so a regular strapless bra would show. I am 5'7" and about 135lbs to give an idea on fit. Loved this rental!

I can't explain how comfortable this Parker LBD is! Running true to size, I would recommend sizing up for backup since it's a more form fitting style. I would recommend Spanx and a strapless bra as undergarments for this piece. It's conservative enough for a work event, yet fun enough for a girls night out! Pair with statement heels and a bright clutch to pull the look together.

This dress was great and I got so many compliments! Even though it was form fitting, it was very comfortable. Hugged in all the right places. I'm typically a Small/Medium but since this was my backup dress I only had the medium but definitely could have gone with a small.
This was a backup dress that was sent very last minute. It was so comfortable and flattering! Loved wearing it!

Fit was true to size, and it was a tight, form fitting dress. Easy to wear, lots of compliments, and comfortable for a bachelorette party. I typically am a size 4-6 or small-medium and I wore the size small. Good option for a LBD

links_reviews_title: Very nice dress. Elegant but not dull. Fits well but seems to be a bit larger than expected.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for Vegas for a Cirque du Soleil show and to walk down the strip. It's a very nice dress and elegant. The quality is ok it isn't as good I expected. It's very comfortable, but gives good support. I would recommend to size down though.
slim and tight

Loved this dress. I had originally picked out a completely different dress that was not available at the last minute. Rent the Runway was so helpful with helping me choose a new dress and sent this as a new option. I think I loved it more than the original one I picked. It's very form fitting and a true xs, but because it went to the knee it didn't look inappropriate. Would definitely rent this again!
Wore this for a NYE Black and White party in Minneapolis.
Dress fit like a glove and true to size. Received so many compliments! My husband even asked me to buy it and not return :)
I love the ruffle back detail. The overall fit was slightly loose, so I may have been able to fit a smaller size. The dress is a fitted, curvy shape with red floral detail. Compliments!

I'm an actor in NYC and rented this dress for a headshot session. Needed something feminine and sassy with a dark undertone to it. This dress marked the spot! It's beautiful, colors are vibrant and it's a perfect addition to my looks! One day soon I'll have to buy it right out. So my jam! #actor #photoshoot #gothgirl #sassy

Loved this sassy yet classy dress! The short length was great for my 5'2" frame. The XS was surprisingly roomy on me, but great for comfort and dancing at a 50th birthday party. The ruffles on the back with a hint of skin added a fun and sexy element to the dress!

links_reviews_title: Casual yet elegant, Classy front/ flirty back with a hint of skin- can be dressed up or down. Great!
links_reviews_text: #redtiechallenge

Rented this dress for holiday photos. The color/fabric is even more beautiful in person. It was good for picture taking purposes, but I don't know if I could have worn this is a more "practical" setting. I did feel it was very short and was not comfortable to sit in. I would rent again for this purpose or perhaps in a bigger size for a party.

Fit was as-expected - wore the medium for 5’4”, 135-140 lbs. The length was good. You can wear a regular bra with no problem. The colors maybe make it more of a “winter” dress, but note that if you are going to wear tights or spanx, they will show in the back if they come up much higher than where you would wear pants or a skirt. It’s a nice dress that I would recommend, but isn’t quite as differentiated as others I have rented, or stand out in a crowd as much (...but sometimes that’s ok), which is my reason for 4 stars rather than 5. Note: I did review a different dress with 1-2 stars in the past and the review never got posted. Hopefully this one does :)

links_reviews_title: This dress fit well and was fun.
links_reviews_text: I am short and the length was good. The back was super fun! I love the pattern and material. At the time I was post baby and was 5'2, 145lbs, 36DD, and I wore the size 10.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a night out
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a night out in San Fran for my friends 30th bday. We ended up going to a Cirque De Soliel show in addition to getting drinks and dinner. Loved everything about this dress, it was so comfortable and fit really well. It did not cut into the lower back like I was originally worried about. I ordered a small and a medium and ended up wearing the medium. The small fit better in the top but my curvy booty and thicker thighs felt very constrained so I wore the medium instead. The extra bit of room in the top wasn't noticeable at all! The dress did stretch out throughout the night so I wondered if the small would have ended up fitting better but I was happy with the medium and wouldn't change my choice on size looking back.

I loved this dress. It made me feel very sassy and confident. The floral pattern did a good job of making me appear slimmer and the cut out back was super fun and not as exposing as I thought it would be. I was worried it would be too short but I thought it was a good length. I had a hard time returning it.
Wore this dress to an event where I performed a 30 minute comedy big. Loved the dress! Got tons of compliments. Material is heavy, was a bit sweaty on a hot night.
Love the traditional print paired with a fun, flirty cut. Short but back has fun detail. It’s more structured with no stretch so be warned. Wore to a Kentucky Derby party. Head turner!

This was a great dress for a full day in the city for Valentine's day. The open back isnt very exposing so it's still comfortable...only complaints is that it seems to wrinkle easily, rides up when you sit (not a problem with leggings underneath), and the arms are a little restricting. The medium fit perfect (despite the arms) but the large was too big. Overall, loved it!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my engagement party! Such a fun dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great! I’m 5’1” and about a 125 lbs and the size small fit well. It was a tad big around the neck line but that didn’t bother me. The back was super cute! The length was perfect and this dress could definitely be dressed up or down. Would definitely rent again!
Stands out, loved the pattern and the back

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Fantastic fit with a really fun back. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: Rented this beautiful dress for a singing gig at Christmas. The gorgeous deep red roses on the dress were perfect for the holidays, really cute cut out back but does not expose too much skin. Loved this dress! Rented the small and extra small and ended up wearing extra small. I would say it runs slightly big.
I feel that this dress fit true to size. Im 5'5", 138, 34 D. I wore a regular bra with the dress. Loved the fabric and the back of the dress. Lots of compliments! Worn for a holiday cocktail party.

LOVE THIS DRESS! It was perfect for my boyfriend's work holiday party. The material is very nice but there is no give to the dress so order a size up if you're unsure. I loved the classic look of the front and the fun and flirty look of the back. This was my 3rd RTR experience and this dress was yet another winner! RTR never lets me down!

links_reviews_title: Did not wear but good fit
links_reviews_text: I actually did not end up wearing this, it was not dressy enough for my event. The fit was great, I'm usually a medium and this was a perfect fit. The color is kind of muted, I was hoping for more of a brighter red to pop. The material is light, absolutely no stretch. The ruffle back is nice but the front is a bit plain.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my husbands company Christmas party.
links_reviews_text: I did feel like this dress was a little snug in my waist but i was really happy the bust fit well. I am usually a size 8/10 with a 36 DD bust and the large fit. I felt like it was a little short throughout the night but after i just accepted it, i was out dancing the night away. Nice heavy fabric and the pictures do not do the colors justice. More of a deep Red/burgundy. Absolutly beautiful! Highly recommend.
Lovely fit, definitely a mini. The ruffle back is flirty and feminine. The fabric is great. I really loved the color too.

The dress is true to size. It is short but I didn't feel it was revealing. Watch when you sit down the dress does hike up. The back has a nice cut out which makes the dress pop. I got tons of complements.

links_reviews_title: A haute couture affair at Dior. My RTR Amanda Uprichard was beautiful, unique, held it's own!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'3", so most "short" dresses are not short on me, but this was a nice length. I am a size 2, and wore the XS. The flouncy in the back with a little cut out made the dress different. I felt great in this dress!
I wore this to a work Holiday party and received a ton of compliments. Loved the little ruffles in the back!

I'm 5'9" and usually an XS but ordered the S for length, and the S was almost too short. The back of the dress is awesome and makes the top of the dress really comfortable. Just be careful about the length!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for Birthday Date Night
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for going out on my birthday and loved it! When roses are your favorite thing, you can't go wrong with an allover rose print dress! I really liked the fun back, too. I've gained weight recently so am about 10 lbs heavier than the 132 lbs listed in my info. I rented the medium with large as my backup size. Both fit me fine, so it was nice to have an option. The medium was obviously more of a fitted look and the large was a little looser. The large was a little more comfortable around the waist, but I liked medium better up top for my bust. I went with the medium for this date night.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect and I had no problems with receiving or returning.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit just as described and looked amazing!

I'm 5'2" and 120lb and I wore the XS which fit better than the S in the chest area for me but it was snug getting my shoulders into the dress. I thought the print was very pretty and the back detail is unique. It's pretty short but I think that gives it a sexy twist to this classy dress. My husband really liked it.
Great fit!

Absolutely loved this dress! The photos of the material don't do it justice! It's stunning! I rented it for a couples Rumba lesson with my boyfriend and Valentine's Day dinner! Countless compliments! Love it!

Overall, beautiful dress with a GORGEOUS back. The back was my absolute favorite. When I ordered the dress from RTR I thought that the dress looked silky, but when I got it in the mail I noticed that it was not at all. The material is nice, but it doesn't stretch much at all and I found it a little difficult to move my arms a lot because of how tight it was. I am normally a size small, so I ordered a small and an extra small as backup and I ended up wearing the extra small.

links_reviews_title: Business in front, party in the back!
links_reviews_text: This dress had a great fit, once I found the hidden zipper on the side. The ruffle in the back gives it an extra flair, and I loved that I could still wear a regular bra with it. Only downside is that the ruffle can show in the front and look a little funny.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress - got tons of compliments and would highly recommend!
links_reviews_text: This dress was great - it does run a little large. The medium fit me a little better but I couldn't zip it up past my chest (a usual problem). The ruffles in the open back make the waist silhouette look slightly larger than is actually true, and it's tricky putting on deodorant, but otherwise loved this dress!

The fit was true to size. The slip seemed slightly longer than the dress and hung out a little in the front, but other than that, this dress was perfect! Not too tight - could still dance, and the back was adorable!

Very cute dress. Loved that it was structured- made for a nice fit. Only wished the cut out was a little more distinguished, felt that the ruffles hung a little too low and covered a lot of it; but really a lovely, classy dress. Was super cold on our date night, so wore tights and booties. Experience couldn't be easier, ordered 3 days before my trip, got it on time, wore it on a date with my hubby on a business trip across the country and sent it out UPS from the hotel. Was a trial run- already ordered a holiday party dress. Will def use this service more often!
Service, fit, convenience, and description of rental were top notch.
Wore to my birthday dinner.

Wore this to company Christmas party. It was very comfortable in size I almost felt that I could've worn an extra small. Nice length for me, not too short. Shows just a bit of skin in the lower back. My only complaint with this dress is that when I sat, the black slip lining would extend past the dress hemline. Had to keep pulling the skirt down to cover lining.

links_reviews_title: Love the fit— not to short. Romantic and modest.
links_reviews_text: A little stiff — the fabric is thick
difficult to put on and take off since the zipper is on the side and it's a thight fit

links_reviews_title: Wore to a Piano Guys concert. Lots of compliments. A little short!
links_reviews_text: A little short, but sexy. Pretty print.
Fit like a glove.. there is some extra material that looks like it just hangs but it actually works well
Gorgeous drape. Works well on my petite and busty frame

I felt like a goddess in this dress!! It has good movement especially with a little breeze. However I usually wear a size XL and could have totally done a large. It works well with big bust and covers up any mid section flaws. #angieknowsthetruth
The draping on this dress is really beautiful. It was quite long as I'm 5'3 but other than that it was great!

links_reviews_title: Very stylish, fabric on the cheap side
links_reviews_text: I say this runs small because I got a 46R, which fit, and I would usually wear a 44. Very cool dress - flattering, funky. A bit challenging to arrange so that the draping was doing what it was supposed to do. Disappointed in fabric - just ordinary t-shirt style knit. It would drape better if the fabric were heavier.

links_reviews_title: A unique but fun vibe for Palm Springs Wedding
links_reviews_text: Given the California destination, I wanted something different and unique. The bride is a fashionista, so I wanted something she would appreciate. It was perfect for a day into night Palm Springs weather wedding. I received tons of compliments and it was super comfortable. I did have a little trouble with one bra strap that kept wanting to poke out, but other than that it was perfect. I will definitely rent again, it was so easy to wear!

The knitted fabric was great and draping was very kind to my body. Ladies, try this one. You will feel like a goddess. I felt comfortable and able to eat a four course meal in Italy full of cheese and pasta, also had room for gelato. I will rent this again.
I like the idea of this dress, but wasn't crazy about the jersey fabric. It felt like a shapeless nightgown, so I didn't wear it.
totally comfortable

links_reviews_title: This dress makes daily work/activities so chic
links_reviews_text: I'm hourglass with full bust and it runs a big large but ordering true to size gives it the layering it needs to be full grecian

This dress is incredibly flattering and comfortable. I am 5'2 and the back comes down to just above the floor on me in flat shoes so it definitely is a little longer than on the model, but I expected this. This could easily be dressed up or down and the material is very soft and breathable. The dress I received is also like new. Will be re-renting in the future.

This dress fit like no other I have ever seen. The front was awesome but the back of the dress was so bland and baggy. It was super soft and comfortable if you can get over the weird arm and head holes.

links_reviews_title: Dress was comfy and I bought Vionic (comfortable) shoes similar to those in the picture.
links_reviews_text: 44R is what worked for me. Conversion seems off to me. The 42R (returned) was more of a 4 than a 6. And this 44R was more of a 6 than an 8. Anyway, I'm purchasing this one.
I loved the fabric, the shape with exception of one arm... had a weird fabric lag.

links_reviews_title: Could not get the draping right.
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress. It is flowy and comfortable and elegant and all the rest... on the model. I COULD NOT get it to hang right. It was like an origami puzzle that just didn't work. So back it went.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to work with a Rick Owens leather jacket. Legit.
links_reviews_text: As in most Rick Owens, it shapes your body without being fitted. A winner.

Loved this dress - so comfortable but with enough style and structure that you don't feel like you are wearing your pajamas. The only thing that's a little less-than-perfect is that it is a bit (small bit) sheer. With all of the draping I was comfortable wearing it without too much worry to a daytime party, but if you are considering it for something more formal it's a consideration.

links_reviews_title: The dress was too big in the arm holes as well as all over.
links_reviews_text: The dress was too big in the arm holes as well as all over.

I absolutely loved this versatile dress. I wore it to a formal gala, outdoor wedding, and afternoon brunch. It feels like wearing pajamas but that Rick Owens draping makes you look effortlessly cool. I'm pregnant and it was great at hiding a small baby bump.
Draping is unforgettable and you don't have to wear Spanx!
I did not wear this. It had so much static and it looked like a giant sack. Not attractive.

links_reviews_title: Very stylish and cool dress. I loved the color and draping.
links_reviews_text: The fit was tight. I rented this as a maternity recommendation, but I would not recommend it if you are in your third trimester. The bump made it hang strangely in the front and it had a weird gathering affect behind. I just wore a jacket and it was fine and comfortable but more of a second tri dress.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear due to odd fit
links_reviews_text: See how in the RTR pictures the chest area is kind of strange both on and off the model? I did but I ordered the dress anyway because it was so cool and because RikOwens! But alas I should have believed my eyes because it appeared the same way on my body. Clinging in odd places - maybe better for a smaller chested, non curvy figure? Nice color knit fabric though.

This was an amazing dress. The drape was flattering and interesting, and the jersey material was so comfortable. It is a very forgiving dress, so order your true size and you should be fine. Perfect for a Statue of Liberty costume, also! Would rent this again in a heartbeat.
Great quality fabric. stretch no zipper. Hugs in all the right places. Felt like a Faahionista at work on R.E.D. Fridays. This designer is great and I loved it.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous quality dress that fit like a dream!
links_reviews_text: Just absolutely fell in love with this dress and designer. Want to rent more from them if I can find an event to go to! Fit my hourglass figure perfectly!! So comfortable too! Love love love! Rent this only if you are ok with LOTS of strangers stopping you to compliment your dress!

links_reviews_title: Tight in all the tight places.
links_reviews_text: Tight in all the right places. No zipper, pull on dress.

links_reviews_title: Great, stretchy material. Comfortable yet very form-fitting!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for my engagement photos and loved it. Ran a little big, in my opinion, but it looked incredible. I got a lot of compliments!

I wore this dress to a wedding and it was a big hit! The fabric was comfortable but structured, almost like a scuba. The style was flattering and the dress was good quality and fit true to size. Be advised that there is not a zipper so you have to tug it on.

I loved how stretchy and comfortable the dress was with still appearing very formal and well made. I got so many compliments!! A lot of co workers were invited to the wedding and this was perfect for the occasion

links_reviews_title: Love the dress and so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I originally ordered the size 44 (8) and it was a little too large so I then ordered the size 42 (6) and it fit perfectly. Very happy with the dress and received many compliments. This company was great to work with and I highly recommend Renttherunway!

links_reviews_title: This dress made this stay at home mom feel so glamorous!!
links_reviews_text: This was my first ever experience with RTR, and I was blown away!! I loved this dress and am so happy that I ordered it. I ordered the 48 (size 12), and the 46 (size 10) and am very glad I ordered the smaller size because the 12, which is my normal clothing size, was really large and gaped in the stomach area. Honestly, I'm dressed I usually have to jump up to a 14 because of my larger bra size, but this dress is curve friendly! This dress is a scuba-like material so it has an amazing stretch to it which makes the dress fit like a glove. I received so many compliments and I was so comfortable all night! Thank you RTR for making this stay-at-home mom feel glamorous for a night!
All I can say is damn. This dress is very flattering, great cleavage, hugs the curves, hides the imperfections. Felt very sexy. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: The dress had a great fit, great color and was comfortable too.
links_reviews_text: I wore a standard bra but good shaping undergarments. The dress looked and felt great.
The dress was flattering in all the right places. The fabric is high quality, which helped to mask some of the mid section spots I'd rather not highlight.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a Christmas Party and it was perfect
links_reviews_text: I’ve rented several items from Rent the Runway but this was my favorite. It was way flattering and uber comfortable.

I love this dress! It is comfortable and covers all of the lumps and bumps if you order the right size. It fits true to size and if you stand at a slight angle for pictures, the shirring makes your waist look smaller. I love it!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my doctoral graduation dinner and loved it!
links_reviews_text: This dress is classy, beautiful, and sexy. It is a well made Italian dress that appears the price it is $$$. It made me feel confident, comfortable, and classically pretty. The material is quality but also thick; it was perfect for my indoors event. I would not recommend wearing it outside on a hot summer day though. It fit me well and comfortably. I did not wear a bra but used adhesives in case I got cold. There is no zipper which was not an issue for me but I can see how it can be a challenge to slide into. I picked this dress to wear to one of the most monumental events in my life and could not have imagined wearing a better dress for me. Many complimented my dress and I was pleased with how it made me appear in photos. I loved this dress so much I considered buying it, but for now I am glad for RTR!
Great if you are hourglass. It accentuated my waist and hips perfectly. It's also crazy comfortable for a formal dress. I could have sizes down as well
Love this dress! I always feel great in it. Super comfortable.

As always this designer nails it...but this one ran a bit big (wish it was a little more fitted, as there was some gapping/puckering due to the loose fit). In general; form fitting and yet still forgiving of flaws. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for a holiday party.
links_reviews_text: The dress is super cute and a nice stretchy material. Like other dresses from this designer, there is no zipper and you kind of have to shimmy into it. Can be difficult if your hair is done. I was able to wear a bra without it showing which was good because it was freezing and the material and color show nips pretty bad. It was cute and I liked it, but it wasn't one of my favorite dresses I have rented so 4 stars.
I have worn this brand multiple times and it's always a hit!! It totally sucks you in and makes you looks amazing!!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a cocktail party
links_reviews_text: I thought the size I ordered fit great. It has no zipper so slips on and I thought it hugged very well. It is more coral red than red red, if that makes sense. I am giving only 4 stars because on the size I chose to wear, the gathering on the left side had been taken out and so it just hung there. I don't think anyone noticed, but I did. It also arrived a day late so I was unable to ask for another one before my event. However I loved it and would rent again. It was comfy and stretchy and I was able to wear strapless bra under it too.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and color for a company holiday party
links_reviews_text: I ordered a size 38 (US 2) and 40 (US 4), ended up wearing the 38. The dress was fitted but comfortable because of the stretchy fabric. I fluctuate between a size 2 - 6 depending on the fit and the 2 worked in this scenario. Very flattering with the ruffled fabric on the front. This dress was perfect for my company holiday party, the color was vibrant and the length was spot on. I am a tall woman (5'11") so I'm not sure how the length works for women on the shorter side as it hit me right above the knee. Very happy with my decision!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress ! It is beautiful
links_reviews_text: The dress was amazing it fit perfect. My arms are a little thicker so the arms were a bit tight but other than that I received tons of compliments. I did have to pull the dress over my head since it didn't have a zipper on the back or the side.
A little long, I'm 5ft. Loved how forgiving the material was in my trouble areas, and loved that I could wear a normal bra with it!
I rented this because in the reviews EVERYONE looked fabulous in it! Got so many compliments and the color is gorgeous. Will rent this again!
The dress was just perfect for the charity event I attended. The only "but" is that the size 48 was a little loose around the size 36C top. Nothing horrible, but I had to watch when I leaned over
It was a great look for my fashion week this season
This dress (and this brand in general) always fits like a glove! Gorgeous fall color.

This dress was so comfortable, does hug every curve. No zipper- it's completely stretchy, honestly wish every dress was this material. The front has a bit of ruching so definitely great if you want to hide your stomach a bit.

I felt great in this dress. I was able to wear a regular bra, and the fabric was super forgiving. I rented a similar dress from the same designer to wear next weekend. It was a lot of cleavage though, hence the Jessica Rabbit title.

links_reviews_title: This is the best dress I've ever rented!
links_reviews_text: I can't say enough good things about this dress. It is gorgeous and so flattering. I was worried about my midsection in a form fitting dress and this accentuates all the right curves while hiding any problem areas. I got so many compliments! I wish I could buy this one.
I have worn this designer before and wore 44. This style was better fit in 42. Was a bit worried about too much cleavage, but it was fine.
This dress was extremely flattering, especially in pictures. It was also very comfortable. I would definitely rent again!
Loved this dress. Fit my body perfect. The material is stretchy and you can move easily in it.

I wore this to a wedding and was a little worried about such a bright color. I got so many compliments on it that I wish I would have kept it for my closet! The dress runs large, I could have gone down a size comfortably. The material is on the thicker side so it was a bit warm for a June wedding, but it was so forgiving and the leggy was perfect for my 5’10” frame. Will definitely rent this one again!

Dress was amazing...I am usually an 8 or 10 and am curvy and this dress fit perfectly in all the right spots. The material was such that nothing showed through and I would absolutely rent this dress again. Wore this on a vacation cruise to the Captains dinner.

links_reviews_title: This dress fits like a glove!
links_reviews_text: This was by far the most comfortable dress I've ever worn! The material was stretchy yet high quality. I danced all night in this dress and not once did I feel restricted. This dress is true to size and flatters your chest and shoulders. Would definitely wear again!

I didn’t rent this dress, it was picked & sent by stylist since my original wasn’t available. The size they sent was too big(very stretchy material-size down) so they overnighted me this one and it was absolutely perfect!

Love this dress!! This is the second time I've worn this brand and they do a great job helping those of us wanting to "disguise" problem areas. I wore a strapless bra that converts to a regular bra and shape wear. The first time I rented this brand I got a 46 and felt I could've sized down so I did with this rental and it was perfect. The material is the thicker neoprene type that holds you in. My husband is insisting I buy it because he says I look amazing in it.
Fits like a glove. Wore spanx under and it was perfect.
Nice thick fabric and very comfortable. Paired well with nude pumps.
I'm 5'4 and I thought it was just too long and too much material. The material was a bit too thin as well. On someone taller and/or thinner, it would probably be gorgeous
I agree it's very thin but this dress was perfect for running around / work.
I wore this to a Keith Urban concert and wanted something o wouldn't be too hot in. Wore strapless bra. Only beware, had static cling and wish I had a couple dryer sheets on my purse.

links_reviews_title: It fit and its my favorite e
links_reviews_text: Very thin but great dress
Loved the fit and the colour - you can dress this up or down for a more formal affair or just a casual date night. Super comfy and the dress flows beautifully

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments, great color and flattering fit
links_reviews_text: At first I was nervous about this dress since it's silk and was clinging to my legs. My sisters said to spray anti static spray (or hairspray) underneath the dress and it worked like a charm. The fit was very flattering I thought and it was pretty comfortable and light. I wore it to a baby shower and got a lot of compliments on it. I would definitely recommend!
This dress Hugs your waist at the perfect spot and gives you allllll the right curves! I want it in every color!

I would have to wear a slip and a cami with this dress in order to wear to work. It's more of a beach dress. Definitely not a work dress Or an office dress. Did not wear it. Cute. But way too-sheer to wear

links_reviews_title: way to sheer had to wear a slip
links_reviews_text: great color comfortable

links_reviews_title: Cute but very sheer with no lining
links_reviews_text: This is a lovely color and silhouette but you could not wear this without a full slip
this dress is amazing! It drapes beautifully and it's so flattering. The yellow is spectacular. It's a little sheer so plan accordingly!

I wanted to like this dress, but the fabric is so sheer and clingy that any bra shows right through and distracts from the lines of the dress. This dress would be great if there was an extra layer of fabric from the collar to the bust.
Not fit for work (maybe beach wear, but definitely not church) unless you wear a slip, and then why?
Great fit. Super flattering. Received lots of compliments.
I tried this on in low light and didn't realize it was completely see through. Luckily, I had it for a trip to Vegas, where anything goes. Beware, though!

links_reviews_title: Love love love. Lots of compliments, but beware ...A bit see through.
links_reviews_text: Super comfy...stains easily due to material...
Unfortunately my event was cancelled and I wasn't able to wear this. But I'd rent it again!

Gorgeous color, very flattering cut/ fit... Ultimately returned before wearing for 2 reasons, well really 1- it's too thin. With the thin material, I was afraid I would swear through in the summer heat, and also could clearly see bra lines.
Fits most bodies, lots of elastic and fabric. The yellow silk is sort of sheer, so you may want to wear a slip.

I wanted to love this dress, because I love the designer… But it was a huge NO for me. The color was gorgeous, and even the loose and flowy style was beautiful. The length of the dress was gorgeous and looked great with heels, but the fabric was completely see-through and static cling was out of control. It literally stuck to every curve in a very unflattering way. Just the fact that the dress was as see-through as it was and unlined made me return it immediately. Small bust or large bust, It couldn't have been worn without a bra because it would've been way too obscene, but even with a strapless bra you would have seen every line of your underwear and body through the dress. Very disappointed.
The feel of the material is incredible and it just drapes beautifully!
fabric is very light, sticks to body and lot of static. did not wear.

This dress is so beautiful and the yellow color so bright, perfect for the summer, however it's completely see through! I have a large tattoo on my thigh and when I put on this dress you can totally see my tattoo. I loved the fit and flowiness, so I wore nude undies and bra and paired it with a long kimono like jacket. It covered what I needed covering. But really disappointed it was see through.
Fit was too baggy.

Ugh! It looks like a designer clothing version of a wet t-shirt contest. I absolutely love Ramy Brook and was so excited to see a new color in my favorite style. But ladies, this is just a big nope. You can totally see right through it. And the silk clings to every curve. PASS!
Loved the style of this dress and the fit but you can see everything. It is completely see through
Fit was so flattering loved it so much! Got lots of compliments on this and would totally recommend.

I love this dress! I sized up because it's all that was available and it was big but I made it work. Such a cute and flattering dress! I got many compliments and a few head turns from gentlemen in my office common areas. I love this dress! I felt great in it all day. I did need to pin the top to keep it closed.
Perfect! Wore it for a work cocktails event and a travel day + meeting.

links_reviews_title: It is so soft and fits like a dream
links_reviews_text: I feel very 70's chic in this getup. I love the cut and length. One of my favorite rentals.

This was a bold print for me and I was obsessed. I wore it (safety pinned to avoid cleavage) to work, added some red lipstick for dinner on my birthday, went axe throwing. I got nothing but compliments. Regret returning it haha I may buy it

I wore this cute little dress for my baby shower in March. It was perfect, lightweight yet warm. Really beautiful colors and oh so comfortable. Many compliments. Only thing -- before arrival, I thought the dress was black w/ flower pattern, but it's really NAVY (which was actually better for a Spring Shower). I don't think the details describe the colors, but they should.
Felt amazing on, plenty of fabric to wrap around, loved the print.
Beautiful dress and pattern. Wore with tights but would be great in summer. Does have tendency to open up when sitting down

This dress will be PERFECT for Spring. It was a little chilly in February to be rockin this look, but luckily I live in the South so some sunshine came out and I paired it with a black unitard. The fabric is very thin, so it's def more or a warm weather dress, but the print is GORGEOUS and I got lots of compliments on this dress.

Rented for a shower, but ended up wearing to work. Would have been great for springtime bridal/baby shower, but worked fine for work with a tank top underneath Note: the background color is definitely navy although it looks black in most photos.
