Pros: - Lightweight fabric that really flowed beautifully - hugs curves nicely without being form fitting - cheerful springtime pattern - great length on my 5'7" frame hitting just below knee - wrap stayed closed 98% of the time, so not much awkward adjusting needed Cons: - ordered on my smaller side of my range (2-4) to avoid looking matronly or sack-like, but did find it snug around the ribs (I'm broad in shoulders and back) and also snug around my biceps - one good wind gust caught me in a Marilyn moment, so maybe not the best choice for outdoor events on windy days - cami was necessary as the top bloused out throughout the day - print is VERY bold and colorful, so be prepared to stand out (better for event than for work, imo)

Pros: Great length for the office, wraps around well and doesn't flap open easily like some wrap dresses do, great print Cons: Not really cons but worth noting... a bit see through... though nothing good under garments doesn't take care of easily, I needed to add a cami under for work. I'm only 34B/C but bigger cups could have issue with coverage without a cami...arms were slightly tight on forearm... wasn't much an issue for me but depends on your build. Also, it's more blue than black background. Overall, a sharp look

links_reviews_title: Pretty pattern, too narrow to wrap properly.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for work and I wanted to love it. I had to wear a black camisole underneath because the v in the wrap was SO LOW. I mean, ridiculsouly low. I feel like there wasn't enough material to truly 'wrap' the dress so this might work for a very narrow woman with slim shoulders and torso, but i dont think sizing up would have worked either. The material is silk, so no give at all. I did get a couple of compliments but overall this didn't feel comfortable to me.
Great fit! I wore this for an evening work reception.

links_reviews_title: Super cute but too much cleavage, even for a date wiht my boyfriend!
links_reviews_text: I'm going to try renting a larger size and seeing if it covers more. Fabric is very light and thin. Gorgeous print.

A bit tough to figure out how best to wrap and a little low cut for work so I wore a black camisole underneath. Could be worn without for a more formal occasion. Tough to tell, but color is more navy than black. Great material for early fall! Love the ruffles!
Loved this dress!
Wore to a bat mitzvah. Had to wear a cami underneath it, but would be very sexy without! Received many compliments. Wrap dresses are always great!
I was worried about the longer sleeves in summer but it was perfect! Fun pattern and very breezy. Great with all types of shoes and I think rain boots would be extra cute!
I don't usually like wrap dresses...I find them high maintenance...but this one is a winner. Great print, silk, loved the longer length, only needed one pin, slimming.
I had multiple ladies stop me to compliment this dress. Super comfortable and true to size. I ordered a 2. Slightly snug on the arms but still super comfortable and beautiful
I wore this to the White House and got so many compliments. I don't want to send it back.

This dress should have been flattering, but it wasn't - maybe because of the length?? The print is pretty loud and while I wore it to work it would have been better suited for a dressy brunch or lunch. Beautiful detail around the neckline and sleeves but it didn't look great on me. I bet this would be better on someone taller.

links_reviews_title: Great, true wrap dress. Small arms
links_reviews_text: Dress was great and flowy and kept everything fully covered - which is hard to find in a wrap dress sometimes. I am a pretty standard size 4 but I do have larger arms and my fear was confirmed: the arms of this dress were very snug on me. I'm pretty sure I could have sized up to the 38R and the fit would have remained the same and the arms would have been comfortable. The material is also very lightweight so be wary if wearing in the fall as I did. Would definitely rent again in the spring but would definitely get the next size up to accommodate my arms.
Beautiful dress. Had to wear w cami so it wasn't too low cut. Great work to fun dress. Light material made it nice for warm day.

Pretty dress and felt comfortable, but too revealing in the front. Ended up returning the day after I got it as I could not wear it out unless I safety-pinned it. Tried it on with a tank under but did ruined the look.
Beautiful dress and quality. I have medium muscular arms and this was a tight fit on my arms.

I received a lot of compliments on this dress. I wore a slip underneath because it is a bit see-through in the sun and also low cut. However, with a form-fitting black slip it was very flattering. I am a bit curvy and felt it hugged the right places. I would rent again for an evening party.
very flaterring on all bodies

links_reviews_title: Vibrant but Odd Cut and Super Sheer
links_reviews_text: I couldn't figure out how to make it work. The top part is very small and barely came together at the center of my chest, and the waist seems to be empire, which is odd placement for a wrapped belt. My daughter and I had a few laughs trying to figure out how to salvage the look before I gave up and sent it back.
Love the dress but way too low up top. Was able to pin and wear to work and got a lot of compliments

The pattern is beautiful. Sadly I couldn't wear this, it was completely see through and the fabric felt flimsy. The neckline is also super low so I suppose you can remedy both issues by wearing something under. Wouldn't recommend though.

This is a true wrap dress that has such a pretty floral print! I found a cami underneath was essential for making it work appropriate. The wrap was way too low for work without it. Comfortable and pretty!

A super cute dress, but fabric says 'fun day of brunches and mimosas' and not 'take me, a professional, seriously.' Also, the slit for the 'wrap' part is under the right arm near the waist. Took me almost 10 minutes to find.
the pattern is beautiful, but the dress is unlined, and doesn't wrap very well. the arms are also pretty slim cut, which i don't typically have a problem with.
Wore this for a baby shower and it was a hit. Def had to pin the cleavage because it super low cut otherwise and need to wear a slip due to it being super static clingy.
Beautiful wrap dress. Light weight, chest had a hard time closing up and laying the way I wanted. I love it.

links_reviews_title: i wish it were a mini dress!
links_reviews_text: it's a beautiful dress but a bit too much floral for me. personally, i wish it were a mini, because the pattern is so cute and the fit is good otherwise!

Beautiful print, perfect midi length, and very feminine feeling. I'm not very busty, but I'd imagine it'd be revealing or low-cut for larger busts (even though I wrapped it tight, the chest would open at times). Had a bit of a 70s vibe that was unexpected but super fun.

links_reviews_title: It was too springy for winter. But pretty.
links_reviews_text: It was true to size and would be great for Spring!
Loved this whimsical number, however had an issue w/ the bust. Required a pin for me and didn't want to ruin the material so will end up sending back.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an engagement shoot. Made every picture
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit for a great shoot. Just a little long but the high heels helped

links_reviews_title: Wore this on a recent birthday trip to Austin with cowboy boots and a waist cinching belt.
links_reviews_text: 38r was perfect. Others have said the slip was short but I did not feel like it was. Dress is not overly heavy but is incredible quality. I loved it! Would rent again in a heartbeat!

links_reviews_title: A little angelic, a little naughty
links_reviews_text: Stunning lace, got a TON of compliments. Super fun to wear with the long skirt, I felt like a princess. I swapped out the slip and wore a nude leotard underneath for an edgier look. The slip was short and tight, but def wearable. I just wanted a more festive look for a rowdy Easter picnic.

Wore this dress for our anniversary photos! IT WAS PERFECT! The slip underneath was a little short but I went with it. I wore pasties for a bra. Didn't want any straps showing! It was a little large around the waste but you can't tell in photos! Gah, it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: It is exact as shown in the picture just little Large and little less soft fabric
links_reviews_text: This is so so pretty, comfortable and beautiful gown. People can't stop asking from where I got it

links_reviews_title: Felt like I was getting married again!
links_reviews_text: The arms are a little tight as the fabric has no give. The slip is crazy tiny so I wore my own. Overall gorgeous!

I wore this dress for my garden-style engagement party. I had ordered another dress that didn't fit well so a stylist overnighted this dress the day before the party. It was perfect! The slip under is super short so size up (or 2) for your 2nd option and wear the slip from that. I have a big bust and the top fit just snuggly enough, but I'd recommend an unlined nude bra. The dress was really long even with tall wedges so I had a family member fold the bottom up a bit and put in a few thread stitches. All in all, I loved it and felt like the bride :)

links_reviews_title: Wore it to my bridal shower
links_reviews_text: This dress is really beautiful and unique. I wore it to my bridal shower (at a riding club) with a brown leather belt around the waist and brown leather wedge sandals. While I highly recommend this dress, you should note that the slip is EXTREMELY tight and short- I felt like I was pulling it down all afternoon. So, if you rent it, I definitely recommend getting a longer white slip to wear underneath. Other than that, this dress really is gorgeous and quite comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Worn for my casual bridal shower
links_reviews_text: The outer layer is absolutely gorgeous, and runs true to size. The slip, however, was too small, very sheer, and so short it didn't cover my hips. I wore my own black slip instead, and added a black ribbon belt. It was truly gorgeous, and I got compliments on it all night. It was a huge hit!

links_reviews_title: Unique dress for lots of occasions
links_reviews_text: I rented this in a 44 which I believes translates to an 8. I'm a size 6 and it was a kind of noticeable size too big on me but due to a dress mix-up I had to pick something out at the very last minute and this dress is beautiful and was close enough. However - be aware that the slip dress underneath is very short and I found it very difficult to pull down again upon standing after it would get hiked up from sitting. Very awkward! So I was self-conscious all evening that I was flashing a lot more of myself than I had intended. (The slip dress also felt a bit tight, especially considering the lace dress was overall too loose.) For that reason alone I wouldn't rent this dress again for an upcoming event. Otherwise I think it's just beautiful. Very different and I felt like I stood out but wasn't garish. Just wish that under dress was a few inches longer!

links_reviews_title: Slip underneath is too short...otherwise it is a gorgeous dress.
links_reviews_text: I was mistakenly sent the size 4 slip and the size 6 dress. The slip was way too tight and short around my backside...I had to improvise by wearing my own white skirt underneath. Otherwise this dress was stunning and fun to wear...perfect length with heels, but careful about getting the heel caught.

links_reviews_title: Lace dress is pretty- slip is WAY TOO SMALL!
links_reviews_text: The lace is very nice, but plan on wearing your own slip or dress under this!! I don't think the slip I received with the size 40 would have fit a 10 year old. I should have listened to other reviewers.

I rented this dress as a potential for my wedding rehearsal. Unforunately it didn't quite work. The dress was too short for my 6 foot frame (above ankle length) and was a little frumpy. The material was also kind of scratchy. Will be sending back and looking for another option.
Loved this dress to change into for my wedding reception. I am 5'9 and this was the perfect length with flats. The slip is too short but I wore my own nude slip. Would definitely tent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect and fun for a themed gala!
links_reviews_text: The slip ran way small, but luckily I had one on hand. I thought my nude slip ended up looking better than the white slip anyway. The dress was great! Warm enough to keep me from freezing outside, but not so warm that I overheated on the dance floor. It definitely stuck out in a sea of thousands of black dresses! Would rent again.
It’s a nice dress if you are 20 u/o. This was chosen for me by rent the runway stylist since the dress that I initially picked was not available.

This was a fantastic dress. It fit beautifully. I wanted something for a formal Sunday brunch, and this worked perfectly. I am a solid size 8 (sometimes a 6) and the 42 fit perfectly. I'm 5'7" and wore 3 inch heels and sometimes the dress was slightly on the ground. I would rent this again in a heartbeat. My only small compliant is that the underslip is tight and short. I ended up putting a longer white slip underneath and that solved the problem. You can tell, however, this is an expensive dress, and it is extremely flattering.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love but missed the mark
links_reviews_text: The slip fit about 2 sizes smaller than the overlay and was way too short (stopped right at the bottom of my butt cheek). Unfortunately couldn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Very easy and forgiving dress, understated yet sexy

links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress! It was perfect for a summer evening wedding. 80% of the women in attendance were in florals, but this dress offered up a unique silhouette to the summer trend. I felt incredible all night! Like the other reviews mention, the straps are a little loose, but nothing some fashion tape or good posture can't fix.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a double rainbow kind of outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: Low cut and high slit. I had to wear shorts underneath. Either way I loved the dress.
Runs small def needs a lot of fashion tape and safety pins. I wore it outside in Vegas and it was windy so I kept having to keep my dress from flashing. Super cute tho I liked it
Loved this dress! I wore it for a day/night in Chicago. I probably would size down to an 8 because i had a lot of extra room. I usually wear a 10-12. You can add heels and really dress it up also!

Girls who are tall be careful, this dress splits in the middle and sometimes your undies might get exposed while walking or if it's windy. Overall I loved this dress! Super flattering, and I received a ton of compliments but the dress runs small. I'm usually size 2 in most dresses but got this in size 4. I had to wear a stick on bra since the back of this dress is open. Straps/sleeves kept falling off my shoulders tho. A lot of cleavage showed in this dress. I felt sexy in this dress as long as it didn't show my underwear, my bra, or the sleeves didn't fall off. So yes be ready to put in some work if you will rent this dress. :)

links_reviews_title: Adorable dress - just not the right occasion
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress as a backup to another dress that I ended up wearing to a friend's wedding. Although this dress would have actually been the better choice between the two, I ended up choosing the other dress and here's why: As sexy as this little dress is, the front slit is suuuuper high and my lady area definitely peaked thru a few times. I love to dance at weddings so this dress would not have been the better choice for obvious reasons - LOL! I would highly recommend safety pinning the front as other ladies have suggested in their reviews. I tried that out of curiosity and it definitely helped! I think this dress would be perfect for an occasion not involving dancing or moving around a lot. Overall though, it fit perfectly (size 0) and it was super flattering on!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! I wore it to more engagement party.
links_reviews_text: The fit overall is good. The shoulder straps were a little loose. I could of gone a size smaller.
Fantastic fit!! You have to fill comfortable being a little exposed. I used it on Valentine's Day and it was just perfect!
Liked the asymmetry of the dress on the shoulders. There is a a deep v and unable to wear bra so that part was a little difficult, but cute print. Felt girly
I rented this dress for my Florida vacation. It was fun and flirty. It fit perfectly in the waist and hips but straps were a little big. I pinned the front to help secure the fit!

This dress runs on the small side and has very little hive around the rib cage/stomach areas. I used fashion tape to make sure the top stayed in place. I didn't wear a bra with it. Be aware the slit doesn't stop, so be prepared on windy nights. I loved this dress! Super fun to wear and felt perfect for a date night.

Rented this for a rehearsal dinner in Charleston - the attire was "dressy formal" and I loved how flirty this dress was. Very comfortable, and the ruffles are definitely forgiving! I did have to pin the top considerably (and still was rather low cut in pictures - but personal preference, I just don't like that look on me), and the wrap opens right in the center so can show a little more leg than you'd like. I used fashion tape to try to hold it together but next time would probably pin it, as the tape didn't hold throughout the night. Standing is totally fine, as was sitting at dinner because I could use my napkin, but I wouldn't recommend this for an event if you're going to be sitting a lot! Really liked the colors and was fun to accessorize with.

I have a larger chest, so those sticky bra things are what I used since the back is fairly low. A little effort to not flash people, but I got the hang of it pretty quick. I just loved trying on a size 12 that didn't make me feel super large with a ton of material to cover me up, or super sausage-y. It was flowy and super pretty! Would totally buy this if I found it in a store.
won't wrinkle. I got so many compliments. loved the back

Loved this dress! I didn't wear a bra because of the open back, but one of the straps kept falling off my shoulder so I almost flashed people multiple times..... other than that, very comfortable and adorable

Wore this a few times, a little chesty and the gap in the leg was a little annoying so I had to be conscious of that but overall really cute. Could wear with boots, flats, sneakers or heels if you wanted to dress it up. Size was perfect for me (I'm between 6-8 normally wear a 6).

links_reviews_title: Most amazing dress, wish I could buy
links_reviews_text: Beautiful, true to size and WISH I could afford to buy. It's very low cut and impossible to wear with a bra - I have a B-cup and was able to just tape with some petals. Don't think that would be possible for someone bigger-chested.
Loved the uniqueness of the dress. I'm normally a 10-12. The straps were a little long and kept slipping off. Pretty low cut. Very comfortable to wear and the perfect amount of sexy!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but high maintenance dress that requires many safety pins and lots of tape
links_reviews_text: This is a lovely, flowy dress that's great for warm summer weddings, but I would never rent it again. Although it "fit" perfectly, in that it zipped up nicely and was snug around my waist and ribs, the front has a slit directly upwards, so it took about 5 safety pins to pin it so that it wouldn't open directly over my undies (these safety pins were actually already on the dress when it arrived, so clearly other people have had this problem, too). I also had to pin the front to keep from exposing my chest (you can't wear a bra with this one), and then used a few pieces of body tape to keep the shoulder strap from slipping off. The pictures turned it out lovely and got lots of compliments but sheesh, this is not a well-designed dress.
Be prepared to wear a slip or something unless you are ready to flash people. Loved the pattern and shape otherwise! Also note there is no stretch and i found this to run small.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but straps fall easily and top is loose
links_reviews_text: The straps fall off so easily. The top is also very loose and I needed to wear body tape to keep it from flapping open. The front of the dress also kept blowing open. I wore this to an outdoor party and kept having to hold the front down to keep from showing off more than I wanted to... Overall a very pretty dress, but it doesn't keep in place at all and I wouldn't wear again.

Fit perfectly at the waist, and was a great length. Definitely was large in the bust, but I don't really have much to hold it up...Used fashion tape to secure the neckline, and it held up all night! Spaghetti strap kept falling down, but it was never a big issue. Such a fun dress for an outdoor, early summer wedding. Would rent again! I got so many compliments.

Loved wearing this dress. Since I am petite (5'0"), pinning up the straps worked like a charm. Placed double sided tape in the chest area to prevent any mishaps. The dress did have a body odor smell (took off a star for this) so tried to air it out prior to use as well as wear perfume. I loved the way it showcased the back, especially if you like to work out. Very feminine and flattering!

Love love loved this one! Sexy, unique, perfect for summer . The only problem- very tight around waist, but i did not want go size up- worrying it will be loos at the chest, but if you not hourglass shape - i would recommend size up, as its no stretch . ExtraShoulder straps can be worn on the shoulders or under ( works both ways!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! So fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: Photos don't do the dress justice! This dress was perfect and really beautiful. I would say if you are in between to order the bigger of the two due to not much give in the waist and the ruffle slit in the front. It was so fun to wear!
So flattering and stylish
I wore this on vacation and it was super cute! The material is high quality and very comfortable. The dress runs true to size and I would definitely rent it again!
I loved this dress and recieved numerous compliments. The sleeves were flowy and fun and I like the gathering and cut of the dress between the legs. Very sexy!
The front layers blew open so easily that I wore black spandex shorts underneath.

I cannot even express how much I love this dress. I've actually rented it twice: 1) My birthday in Miami Beach, 2) Wedding Anniversary date night. On both occasions, I received so many compliments. It's a little short on tall girls, but nothing obscene. The front is very low cut, though, as is the back, so you cannot wear a bra. That being said, the overall design is super flattering and perfect for a summer night.
Great dress, fun to wear, just straps seem to slip at times, so kne has to watch for that
So fun and flirty. Looked slimming and great. Only downside was the chest area has a very weak button. But I just kept pushing closed / could have gotten a safety pin and been fine (didn't have one)
You will definitely get a lot of boobs in this dress, however, it's simple and elegant and perfect to wear. I felt like a super star in this dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and flirty dress. Perfect for women with wide hips or slim and slender girls
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love this dress and I may end up purchasing it!! I am a regular size 14 with a 38DD chest so very rarely can I fit a size 12. With this dress I fit the size 12 which was amazing. The dress is extremely cute but please note that the top front and back half of the dress are very low cut so you may need to wear fashion tape to hid a larger or smaller chest. For me, the top part was large so fashion tape is a must and I would say if your chest is any bigger than 38DD you may not be able to fit in the top. You will not be able to wear a bra due to the low back but fashion tape and nipple covers should work. The waist was snug but comfortable and I was able to wear spanx and they did not show!! The waist of the dress may be snug but the bottom half is very light and not restrictive at all which is great because I have a large butt (45 inches) and smaller waist. Overall, this dress is beautiful and it will work with any body type and esp works well with bottom heavy women!!!

links_reviews_title: A fun and sexy nightime floral
links_reviews_text: I just loved thid dress! Be warned you will need a safety pin as the front slit extends to the waist line! The right shoulder kept falling down and more than one malfunction ovcured oops! Need fashion tape to hold shoulders in place for sure.

This has to be one of my favorite styles! I'm not sure which side I like better, the front or open-back. It's certainly comfy, although the fabric has no stretch; you certainly have room to move around. It's great for any cup size- I would recommend no bra or a NuBra. Received tons of compliments! Great for a party, or a night-out with your significant other to show you off!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress & fit my 31 week bump!
links_reviews_text: I love love love this dress!! I will definitely be renting it post-baby! The material is comfortable and the waistline fit above my bump perfectly. The top was a bit loose so I used fashion tape to avoid any embarrassing moments! I also safety pinned the bottom - due to my bump, it was a bit short. This was the first time during my pregnancy that I actually felt sexy, so thanks RTR!! I definitely recommend this dress!

Came with the tags still on :) so I was def the first person to rent this. Wore it to my friend's wedding at the beach in NC. Nicholas definitely runs a bit on the smaller side, so keep that in mind. I also had to tape down a few parts in order to keep it from falling down (at the shoulder), or open (in the front). But overall a very beautifully made dress and perfect for the occasion.
Wonderful dress!
I brought this on a trip to Florida and received so many compliments. Very flattering on and flowy. I would definitely rent again for another vacation

links_reviews_title: Great holiday dress if in warm weather
links_reviews_text: Dress fit a little lose, would normally order large but was worried about the no stretch so went with larger size and it fits great.
I rented this for a wedding. It was cold so I wore with tights. Overall it fit well but I had to pin the vneck together because the plunge was so deep my bra would show. Was very flowy.

I like the idea of this dress, but it falls a little short. The length is good for my 5'11 frame, but the high section in front proves to be too short. the cut is low at the bust, but that was ok for me. I would have like a little stretch to the fabric for a more comfortable dress.

links_reviews_title: So flowy and perfect! Loved it!
links_reviews_text: I am pretty tall and had to wear heals or it was too long.
Got lots of compliments on this dress. Would definitely wear again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a San Diego wedding
links_reviews_text: Liked, didnt love. The dress was overall flattering, could be dressed up or down. It is lowcut, but able to wear a bra. There was an odd pucker around the stomach area, but not enough to deter me from wearing it. Not sure that I would rent again, but was perfect for the occasion.

links_reviews_title: Big prairie dress on the prairie
links_reviews_text: It was cute from the waist up but unfortunately I'm not 6 feet tall and the dress kind of ate me

links_reviews_title: loved the dress. wore it with Miu Miu ballerinas
links_reviews_text: I love how it fits and the skirt moves so beautifully. It was a little long on me, came down to my ankles but still loved it.

I rented this not even thinking I would like it, but couldn't find anything else at the time. Well I ended up adoring this dress. The fit, the fabric. Complements everywhere, from old men at the airport to women in the grocery store. Non stop compliments. It is comfortable, feminine, and despite the color it just works. I wanted to buy it, very hard to give back!

links_reviews_title: Better for someone tall and lanky.
links_reviews_text: Too much material. Not as flattering. Thought I could do a mother daughter photo shoot with this.

links_reviews_title: There's nothing wrong with the dress, I just didn't think it looked good on me.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size.
True to size

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a baby shower
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Got so many compliments on it.
Wore for to a holiday dinner party. The color is a very pretty green. The shirt was not particularly flattering when untucked though.
This blouse looks like a million bucks - elegant and intensely gorgeous color. I wore a small, I'm 5'5 and about 124 pounds. Felt glamorous in this!
Absolutely loved, order a size up !

links_reviews_title: What is wrong with designer sizes?
links_reviews_text: So I'm an 8/10, 5'5, 34b... and the X LARGE of this shirt was laughably small. The body of the shirt is cut very small, which doesn't really even work with the voluminous sleeves. Just don't waste your time on this shirt unless you're a 0.
Unique, but definitely runs small - I usually wear a medium but picked an XL at the store and it fit (though a bit big)
i love this top and get complimented on it every time I wear it requires a strapless bra
Cute if you are ready for serious sleeve volume! Not great under anything needs to be worn to shine on its own

Material was fun, this olivey green was a great alternative to the traditional "Christmas green" for Christmas dinner. Paired with dark jeans and black slides it was a perfect way to dress up without being over the top. A little bit of shoulder action made it even more fun. The gathered sleeves add a flair of drama. The top hits right at the top of the hip.
Really great top! Sleeves are so cool! The top is a little short, especially with a bigger chest.
super fun just too small couldnt wear
Just a little tight in the chest (I'm a 32D) but the shoulder and sleeves are fun!

links_reviews_title: Sleeves are very large. Didn't wear
links_reviews_text: Color is very pretty, but the arms are very large - didn't end up wearing
Fits very small. Normal size is large and the XL was too tight to wear
This dress was perfect for a baby shower I through. And it is flowy and allowed me to eat all the yummy food with an elastic waist

Wore the dress for family phot shoot. I don't usually wear prints but it was a nice delicate floral print. Felt very feminine, light and comfortable. Only annoyance was that the cream lining on the top kept showing on the neck line. Overall, it was a fun dress to wear that I wouldn't have bought at full price.

I rented this for a daytime graduation event, and I received so many compliments on this floral feminine dress! You are able to wear a standard or strapless bra with this dress, but it is optional. At 5 feet 2 inches the length hit floor length on me. Since I didn't purchase hem tape, I folded it underneath the elastic area around the bust, which worked like a charm.
This dress was perfect and I got so many compliments! Super comfortable and flowy!
Wore this for my baby shower at 32 weeks pregnant - it was flattering and beautiful!

This dress was much cuter on than on the hanger! The back detail (tied close) was different and I received a lot of compliments. I found this to be the perfect length for a smaller heel, and I am 5'7.
Nice dress that was good for outdoor day event. Could be dressed up or down.
I loved the idea of this dress, so romantic, off the shoulder. It was pretty but not flattering as my waist is my smallest feature and it covered that. So it wasn't a 5 star but still cute!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for Summer family pictures.
links_reviews_text: Light and airy but so prettty! This dress is a hit.

Love love love this dress! Definitely one of my favorite rentals. It fits true to size (I'm an 8) and was the perfect length for me to wear with sandals (5'6). Straps are adjustable. I work the sleeves, but it was also cute taking your arms out and wearing as a tank. Dress is flattering and I received many compliments. My only complaint was the straps do fall down and it was a little tight in the bust so I didn't wear a bra.

I originally rented this dress for a bridal shower through my unlimited service, and loved it so much I wore it 2 more times. Highly considering buying it. Very pretty, feminine, flowy (but not too much), and extremely comfortable. I would recommend renting this dress for any type of spring/summer occasion.
It's a great summer dress. You can dress it up or down.

I liked that this dress was loose and flowy. It is perfect for a hot summer day or night. I also received several compliments. However, it runs very large. I would definitely order a size down. I felt that it did not accentuate my figure and would've preferred a smaller size.

This dress was perfect for our first wedding of the year. It was so feminine and girly, I loved it. The dress was also very light weight - it was 86 degrees the day of the wedding but the dress was very breezy. I got a bunch of compliments as well - it really accented the bump nicely! The only negative of this dress is the straps kept falling down - I had to pull them very tight in order to stay up!

I love this feminine by BB Dakota! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back-up. This style is roomy throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear a strapless bra since the dress is off the shoulder. At 5'0", the length hit floor length on me. This dress is super cute but the spaghetti straps are pretty loose but you can adjust them or just tuck them in. Pair with strappy heels and a cute accessory to complete your outfit!

Beautiful sundress that fits true to size. All of the flowing layers and looser fit makes it good for all body types. It does swallow you up slightly because there is a lot of dress but it's still flattering. There is a low key hole back that made it hard to wear a bra but I didn't need one. Perfect dress for a Rose & Bubbly party. (Bonus- still had tags on)

links_reviews_title: perfect for a daytime party - wore it for a baby shower on a hot september day
links_reviews_text: overall comfortable fit - was a big loose in the waist

links_reviews_title: Beautiful!!!! I would def rent again.
links_reviews_text: No cons with this dress...it was beautiful & fit true to size. Got compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: I was almost stuck in this
links_reviews_text: It's supposed to be ok for maternity. The shoulder part fit, the dress was loose enough, but there is this band around the rib cage, right under the chest, that had zero give. I barely got it on over my chest, and when it came time to take off, I thought I would have to be cut out of it. It might have been a cute dress if I didn't have a panic attach trying it on.

links_reviews_title: Got this for a Caribbean vacation, ended up wearing it home on the plane.
links_reviews_text: There is no stretch. I had a tussle getting it over my wide and sunburned shoulders, but once on it was quite comfortable. I had to wear it with heels to keep the hem off the floor. It did a nice job not clinging to my jiggly bits, nor did it accentuate my belly.
Cute print but very baggy
Color washed me out. I looked like Ted Stohman was taking me to prom circa Something about Mary 1987
This dress has such a boho feel. I loves how it drapes and flows.
Wore this out to dinner while recently on a beach vacation. The cut of it made me feel sexy and fun but I was totally comfortable. Could also work with heels for a fancier occasion.
Was a bit long and voluminous, fine with platform sandals but flowed well and surprisingly kept me warm with a cardigan on top!

Would have been cute if it fit, but was too tight across my hips and butt. I have wide hips, but rented an XL and was still too tight. Dress either runs smaller or the cut was just too straight for my curves. Oh well!

A nice pullover dress that was easy to wear and flattering for my shape. I'm usually a medium but I got this in small and it worked well. This was a dress that I was surprised by. I'm not into florals or pastels but the light color and the spacing of the flowers made it very classic and sweet and perfect for Hawaii. I'm not very tall (5'5") but I was able to wear flats in this. Enjoyed this one and wore it multiple times. Sometimes with a denim jacket, sometimes in heeled sandals. Very cute.

links_reviews_title: great for a spring or summer day date or wedding
links_reviews_text: fit great. if you are taller than 5'7 i would go with a tall
Great dress for outdoor party, summer soirées
It was comfortable, but the elastic for the arms seemed a little stretched out.
n/a

Rented it for a family event. It was breezy and allowed me to eat like one should at a family event so I appreciated it. I did find the underlay to be more visible than I expected and the material to be a bit lower quality than it looks so I felt more like a teenager in it but it was was it was.
Dress hit me at the ankle (I'm 5'9") and was a great fit for a rehearsal dinner. It was 90 and humid but I never felt hot.

links_reviews_title: Great fit & really pretty in person
links_reviews_text: Nice material & color. Very flowy and easy to wear
This dress does run small while is on the long side... wear heels if you are short, and if you are top heavy def size up!! beautiful dress and very feminine.
My bust made this crazy tight around my shoulders. Was not comfortable at all.
Just as pictured and to be expected. I couldn't wear bra with this dress but didn't need to considering all the flowy fabric covered me up in front.
Big on top, tight through the thighs...Just seemed like it is cut for a body type that doesn't exist. I am curvy and it gave the effect of wearing a mumu. Maybe for thin builds.
Ran small, made me look like a linebacker. Disappointing.
This was my second choice and I didn't go with it. Dress fit well and true to size. I will definitely re-rent this one to wear.
Great dress and great color! Wore it to an early November wedding it was perfect!
The ruffles and the cut of this dress are so flattering. The wrap style dress is a friend to most bodies, making this an easy choice for renting. The fabric has great movement for dancing!

This was my backup style because I knew it would fit. It was comfortable and flattering. I was complimented by strangers and felt pretty in it. I used double sided tape to keep it from shifting at my chest. I didn't feel like I needed a slip under it, but know that it is a thinner, slinkier material. Because of that, if you are self conscious about any lumps or bumps, I would recommend wearing Spanx.

I took this dress on vacation to Santa Barbara. I wore it on our wine tour. Perfect dress for wine country.. great color, material is light and breezy. I received tons of compliments and the dress looked great in photos.

This dress was very pretty! I will start by saying I have very broad shoulders and broad back. Im normally a size 14/16 in dresses from RTR. This dress did run large. This size was perfect for me. I normally would have ordered the xl. When I went through the reviews I was hesitant as to which size I should order, but was pleasantly surprised with the fit of the Lg. The fabric is thick, and a bit stretchy. It wrinkles very easily and I needed to steam it a few times. Other than that, I was happy with this purchase.

Love wearing this dress! Needed a little fashion tape but other than that super easy to wear. Very flattering. Love the kicky pleated ruffles. Fabric seemed like it would be too sheer and light but it covered just fine. Good piece to dress up or down- has that flexibility to be a wedding option or formal attire
The dress fit just ok. Not sure if this style is just not for me.

This wrap dress was very comfy and I loved the color. It was a little low cut for me and since it's a wrap dress I kept having to adjust it. I noticed my bra was showing a few times so plan undergarments accordingly. Other than that it was a great dress and I got compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: Wore it on a cruise - so comfortable
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and fit - wore on cruise. I used a bit of fabric tape to hold it in place on my chest which worked perfectly.
Fit so well I ended up wearing another dress to the event but I love this dress so much!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a wedding dance floor!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful and flattering. The color is a deep burgundy. The ruffles added a fun touch. I ended up safety pinning the front closed because it was a little low cut for me. Could be easily dressed up or down. I found it better to wear big earrings instead of a necklace because the ruffles add so much interest at the neckline already.
Fit was beautiful. Comfortable. I loved this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for pear shape. LOADS of compliments!!
links_reviews_text: I felt so beautiful in this dress. I am very pear shaped and the wrap dress hugged me perfectly where it should and had give where I needed it. I ended up putting a tiny safety pin at the cleavage to keep it from showing my bra. (I wore a regular bra with it!!) I was very comfortable all night. I wore it to a cocktail attire-charity event and got so many compliments. I am normally an 8/10 and the medium was perfect. The length was just right too. I'm totally sold on RTR. So fun to have a new dress, enjoy it and then NOT clog up my closet with another dress I won't want to repeat. Excellent experience!!

links_reviews_title: Very sexy dress! Material is very flowing, nicely cinched in the waste
links_reviews_text: Wore it for Valentines. Got many compliments! Shows a lot of leg and chest. Loved the dress will get it again fir sure!

I'm usually a size 2 and XS got great. Plus it's a wrap dress so easy to make it fit well. Did not need to wear a cami underneath like DVF wrap dresses. I wouldn't wear it again. The material doesn't look that high quality and it does not flatter your stomach area. It looks much better on the model than it does in person. Wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my engagement shoot and absolutely loved it!
links_reviews_text: I wasn't sure if this would fit, but I adored it for my engagement shoot! I had to pin the top for modesty but you couldn't in the photos! :) Highly recommend this one!
Beautiful drape! The ruffles and sheen of the fabric totally elevate this simple, comfortable wrap dress.
Received lots of compliments and very simple to put on. Needed a safety pin for my cleavage area though.
I'm 5'7" and over 200lbs and as a plus size woman, I am always nervous nothing will fit. This dress fit beautifully and felt luxurious. Beautiful color as well!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit so well and true to size, it's a wrap so you can really adjust it in anyway to make it more comfortable. I would definitely recommend!

I rented this dress for a fall wedding in Texas. It was perfection! I love the color and it is very flattering. I received many compliments and would have loved to have bought the dress if I could. One thing that I did notice is that it was a little revealing in the chest area so you have to really make sure the dress is tight enough when you tie it if you are larger chested. Other than that I would highly recommend this dress!!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to an outdoor wedding and I was very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: This dress was lovely to wear. It fit well and I got lots of compliments. Only note would be that it's quite low cut - I could have used a safety pin to keep the bust from opening a bit too much.

links_reviews_title: I had a formal wedding in the fall, and this dress was great for dancing!
links_reviews_text: I'm short, so it hit about halfway down my calves. The only negative I had was that the top was really large, so I had to tape certain parts to my bra so I wasn't showing it off all night.

It was big in the chest , I had to wear a bandeau under it. And the wrap dress seemed like it didn't have enough fabric so I had to hold it closed while I walked. Otherwise, whenever the wind blew , somebody got a show. Ruffles are pretty.
Very comfortable and perfect fit.

links_reviews_title: This was my first RTR experience and it did not disappoint!
links_reviews_text: Fit was great, flattering for my petite frame/mama body. I did have to make minor adjustments throughout a night of dancing. But overall I felt pretty in this dress!
I loved this dress and revived so many complements. I felt 100% comfortable it this wrap dress.
The neckline was too deep for me (it needed pinned) but other than that, it was perfect and fun!
This dress has been one of my favorite rentals! The wrap dress is perfect. Not cut too low so I could wear it to work and then to an event I had after.
I wore this for my sons birthday party. The first thing my husband said was wow when he saw it. It's really a beautiful color and held up to southern heat

This dress was good but not as amazing as most RTR dresses IMO. The wrap had the flutter ends on all sides so you could see them under the fabric. It showed off more cleavage than I normally do but overall great dress.
Very easy to wear, great length, not too hot, beautiful color! This dress was a hit all around. Wish I owned it.
the color and fabric were just perfect! flattering if you're curvy, forgiving in all right places.

I received a lot of compliments on this dress for its color and the details. I found it to be very flattering and comfortable. My only qualm is that it's hard / impossible to find a bra that doesn't show on the sides. Also it is quite a low cut, so I pinned it for this particular event.

links_reviews_title: Almost perfect - but big armpit holes
links_reviews_text: The dress is almost perfect - beautiful color, beautiful fabric, the ruffles and cut is perfect for a curvy figure. The biggest problem with this dress is that the armpit holes are unusually large and you can see your bra on both sides. I was able to secure one side with safety pins to hide my bra - but it didn't work on the second side. I used some fashion tape to try to conceal my bra - but found I was uncomfortable during my event trying to keep my bra undercover. Perhaps sizing down would help with this dilemma. Otherwise - beautiful dress and quality.
Comfortable classy pick for a cocktail party

I loved the color of this dress. It was comfortable and breathable, which was important since I was outside for long periods of time while wearing it. The bust area is low so you may consider wearing a cami under it. I found myself adjusting it so nothing slipped out! The fit was nice. I've gained some weight and am in between sizes but the large was perfect. Overall, I was happy with the dress.

I loved this dress! The color is more ruby in person then the brighter red shown online. It's a full wrap dress but you can wear normal undergarments with it which is a plus. Really flattering on my body shape, beautiful fabric and great color. The ruffle detail is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: This dress looked great, and was easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a charity gala. Beautiful dress! Was both extremely comfortable and very flattering. I was really pleased with the color of this dress in person. The fabric is a good weight so it hangs nicely. Highly recommend it.

links_reviews_title: Would buy this if i could
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love this dress. Its so flattering, especially if you have an hourglass shape. The belt made my waist look small and the ruffles hid the unflattering parts. I did need to safety pin it on the chest which i expected from the reviews, bit once it was pinned it covered well. I usually float between a medium/large and the medium was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Great fit. Struggled with the zipper a little likely from over use.
links_reviews_text: 5'2 with three inch heels and the length was perfect

Loved this jumpsuit so much that I bought it :) I've never had a jumpsuit that flatters my petite frame so well. It's a real knock out piece. Super comfortable to dance and sit in too. Love love love!!!
Haven't worn a long jumpsuit before, was a little concerned since I'm short and curvy, but it was actually really flattering! Surprisingly comfy too, and true to size.

Perfect fit! Comfortable, flattering, elegant and fun! Other than need a partner to help you go to the rest room it's amazing! Would rent it again in a heart beat! Above average bust - tiny waist and larger bottom - accommodated me perfectly!

I wore this to my husband's holiday party and absolutely loved it. I was comfortable in it but still managed to have a nice look. It is a little bit short so I wore the larger size to make it full length. I would definitely rent this again though!

I rented this for a work party and also a holiday work party for my husband's company. I am tall and had to size up (I usually fit in a 4 or 6 and rented the 8) to make sure it was long enough/wasn't riding up in the crotch area and I still was pulling it down a little so tall ladies beware. It was comfortable and I got a lot of compliments but I recommend pairing with a belt like I did otherwise I'm not sure I would have worn plain.

I wore this for a Gala that I put on through work. It was so comfortable for running around all night. I am 5'3 and was expecting to need hem tape as usual but the legs were much shorter than I was expected. Definitely fit tighter in the groin area than I had expected and I went with my larger back up size because of this. I would suggest sizing up. Got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Quick outfit that looks polished. Might rent up to next size to allow more room in waist area.
links_reviews_text: Ran bit small around waist, but I should have ordered next size for my height and weight. Anyway great piece for work or going out.

links_reviews_title: A Little Flirty & A Little Fun
links_reviews_text: I loved this jumpsuit! It was easy to get on and off myself, once I got the hang of making sure that the ruffles in the back didn't get caught in the zipper. It was comfortable and dressy, which made it perfect for the birthday brunch and and the baptism I wore it too. My one suggestion is to wear it with a belt or scarf to help dress it up a little.
Wore to a wedding with a "little black dress/cocktail" attire. Wore with red earrings and heels and fit perfect. Was able to wear a bra with the size 8 and 36DD.

It's fit like a glove. Even with it's light ruffles and all ot was very comfortable overall and I felt like I could do anything all night. All I had to worry about were my shoes hurting but there's little way around that.

links_reviews_title: I love being a member of the unlimited club
links_reviews_text: Absolutely love this jumper . I was hesitant because I weigh 172 pounds and I'm short 4'8 plus more rolls than a bakery . Anyways I was nervous dog how it would fit and look . I put on a nice body suit shape wear and I must say I feel fabulous . Length is workable with 2 1/2 inch heels
Wore to our work Mardi Gras ball. Semi-formal. Normally a 12 but based on the reviews sizes up to 14 and it was quite comfortable. A little roomy in the legs. Would rent again!

I thought I wouldn't like the ruffles on this jumpsuit. I was wrong. They're the perfect bit of festivity in a simple, elegant jumpsuit! Fit my short torso and generous hips well, perfect height for my 5'6" frame. Fabric is heavy enough to smooth you out a bit, and keep you warm, not so heavy it's stifling, but I wouldn't wear this to an outdoor summer event. Perfect NYE look.

Loved this! Was my first time wearing a jumper, and i was a bit nervous about it but looked great! The fabric was very stretchy which will allow you to easily bust a move on the dance floor. I am almost always a size 8, and this was very true to size. I kind of wished the pant legs were a little longer to wear with heels, but the size 10 were the perfect length. Not a huge issue for one night anyways. I was also worried it would be too busty, but it wasn't! Perfect amount of cleavage. Loved this rental!!!

This cute little number was so fun! True to size, flattering, and comfortable. I knocked a star off because it wasn't as flattering on my muscular arms as I would have liked. Zip is up the back so using the restroom solo was a little challenging.

Overall a great choice for holiday party. Was a little tight in the torso but not noticeable. The shoulders had snaps to keep bra straps hidden which was nice. The length was perfect with 3 in heels. Oddly enough, the 4R fit exactly the same and was way too short. It didn't even hit the floor when I tried it on.

This jumpsuit is amazing. I received countless compliments and it it extremely flattering. Not to mention comfortable! It gave such a sophisticated vibe with a hint of sex appeal. True to size, although I highly recommend shape wear as it is very fitted in the booty.
Fit was spot on and style is classic.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable for a fall evening wedding in VT.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, comfortable fabric, not too low cut, good with a pair of heels. Overall really loved it and got a ton of compliments. Would definitely rent it again.
Great for the gala

This was a high-quality, simple but elegant jumpsuit. Unfortunately for me it was too short-waisted . I should have tried the 8 but felt it would have been too large in the arms and bust area so I just sent it back.
Very pretty jumpsuit. I did not wear because I liked my other choice better but also because I struggled with the zipper getting caught in the back ruffles.
Runs very short. I'm 5'8 and could barely get the top up over my arms because it was so short. Would be nice if you're much shorter.

Overall this was great! Like many of the reviews, this does run small - and short. Fits more like a petite size. I'm usually a size 0, but sized up to a 2 as the torso was small/short and pulled in the back. Length is shorter (I'm 5'2"), but I wore 3" heels and was fine.
The length was too short. I did not wear this
Wore this to dinner and the theater for a work networking event and felt pretty, yet professional. Loved this jumpsuit... might buy it.

links_reviews_title: Pant length didn't work for my little legs but gorgeous romper!
links_reviews_text: This was a beautiful outfit/romper. Classic in the black with elegant frills along the deep collar. As a large chested woman I was nervous the neckline would be too low but the frills helped take away from that and was actually very comfortable. The fabric has some stretch to it so it didn't feel suffocating being all one piece. The only problem I had was the pant length was an odd length for my size. The pants looked more like high-waters then the gorgeous outfit it was. If they had been longer or even a couple inches shorter they would have looked great with heals. I'm 5'4 for reference. Otherwise beautiful outfit, comfortable material, easy to zip up (alone if you don't have help), and terrific neckline that doesn't require a necklace with the frills adding extra flare. Wish it would have worked for me. Hope it works for you!

This fits perfectly throughout the jumpsuit. So cute and flattering! More for party wedding date then every day wear. Perfect for girls night out at the wine bar. Note: it's plunging so be comfortable showing cleavage.

links_reviews_title: party like a boss in this pantsuit
links_reviews_text: Stretchy and extremely comfortable pantsuit, the ruffles were a bit "stiff", but it didn't matter, the overall look was great

links_reviews_title: cute but it is very short. I am 5'4" and could only wear it with flats and it was still short.
links_reviews_text: Very cute though.

Loved this outfit! I didn't end up wearing it though because the torso was about an inch too short for me. I have a longer torso and was worried about going up a size and then having the rest of it be too big, the fit was absolutely perfect other than that one simple thing.

links_reviews_title: Love it, so many compliments. Dramatic feature with an over all simple look.
links_reviews_text: N/A
Fit was good but it was way too short for me! Need to have tall options!

links_reviews_title: Great outfit, hanging out with family and friends, and a great concert.
links_reviews_text: I really liked this jumper. It was very comfortable. I am 5'9" so it almost was not long enough but a high healed sandal was fine. I wore it to a concert followed by a trip to the casino. Your bra needs a lower lying strap. I am a D cup. Wearing my Champion sports bra actually worked best because the back strap was low enough that it didn't show. I'm sure there are better options, but this did the trick in a pinch. This was my first time using this service. It was unbelievably easy. The company takes care of every detail for you. Love it.
Flattering, not too tight, great material
Didn't wear

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a bachelorette party, and it was the perfect combo of dressy but not over-the-top.
links_reviews_text: The 4R inseam was quite tight in the groin area. And despite only being 5'4" - both the 4R and 6R seemed short - however if you wear it with strappy heals you can pull off the look easily. No biggie. The outfit fit snug but not too snug, and was perfect for work functions or parties.

links_reviews_title: A nice look for an anniversary dinner.
links_reviews_text: The inseam was very short and I'm not very tall (5' 6"). Ended up wearing the larger of the two sizes hoping it was slightly longer. I also wore it with a belt to better define my waist. Looked nice but not my favorite item from RTR.
It was too small in the torso/hip area unfortunately as I loved the style. Would try it again in larger size.

links_reviews_title: The dress was great to wear to a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: Fit pretty good for the most part, but I usually wear a Small in dresses and I had to wear the XS in this dress.
This dress was so great! The color is beautiful and the fit was perfect.
A little too pastel
Wore this to a summer wedding and the color and fit were perfect for the time of year and occasion. Fit true to size but you'll need to wear sticky cups to make sure that you don't let anything slip!
Very flattering dress for an outdoor wedding! However, it was a bit large in the waist.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, easy to travel with
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a garden wedding in San Francisco, and was very pleased! It traveled well in a suit case, and the adjustable straps made for a custom fit. I normally don't go for this dress length, but thought it was the perfect level of formality. The color is beautiful in person, the perfect light blue.

Loved this dress for a summer wedding. I went with a medium and large as a back-up - wasn't sure on the fit as I'm adjusting to a new post my-baby body, but the medium fit perfectly! For reference I am 5'3" with 36-29-41 measurements. Color was great and I would call it Carolina blue. Nice movement but the material is heavier - it wrinkled a bit but overall stood up to 100 degree weather with insane humidity. Straps are adjustable but I still couldn't make a bra work, though it was fine without one. I got tons of compliments, especially on the color!

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments, great for a summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly and has adjustable crossed straps on the back.

links_reviews_title: It was a fun dressy sun dress for a day out and about with the husband! Very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size and material is very forgiving. Not snug at all!

I wore this to an outdoor, HOT and humid summer wedding on a farm. This dress was perfect for the occasion! The color is also a beautiful blue shade. I stood out in this dress because it was so trendy, cute, and the color popped without being obnoxious. I loved it! At first, I was nervous about the deep V cut but it actually suited me just fine. I was able to wear this dress without a bra and the top stayed taut with no tape needed.
I wore this to a semi-formal barn wedding in Palo Alto. It felt so comfortable on, not too tight. I did end up wearing the XS since the S was looser than I expected.

links_reviews_title: Strap adjustment did not work so it was a bit too low cut for the occasion.
links_reviews_text: beautiful dress straps way too long and would not adjust.
The seam lines on the dress were very apparent, making the dress unflattering.

I rented this as my back up dress option. I rented the medium which fit in the bust area but was just too baggy/loose in the waist. I felt like it was missing something- like a cute belt or something. Didn't end up wearing.
So disappointed. This dress runs very large. Size down.

Rented to elevate my WFH game. Virtual meetings are all about necklines instead of shoes so I feel utterly unprepared to impress. This whole outfit leveled me up! Husband loved the sweater for open back and the way my unsupported lady lumps looked in it. I was close to purchasing but being conservative during this whole covid situation. Styled with jeans and lovely valentino nude laced pumps.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous & unique 90's chic date night top
links_reviews_text: This elegant and flattering sweater was a merry addition to my holiday wardrobe. I wore it on a date night w/ my new husband. The sleeves are flamboyantly long and voluminous which makes quite a statement - but beware of grazing the gravy boat if you wear it at a festive dinner. I'm busty and I wore it with a strapless bra buttressed by a clear strap attached as a halter. This worked perfectly & kept me supported all night. Hard to wear a regular jacket w/ this lewk, so I paired it with a cape.
This was a showstopper. Very unique neckline and loved the sleeves and color was vivid. Wore it to a New Year's Eve dinner

links_reviews_title: This is a pretty flattering top but...
links_reviews_text: Beware; when you put it on, you'll likely ruin your makeup bc of the neck, AND you'll get deodorant marks unless you step into it instead of pulling over your head. It is long so I tucked it in.
I loved this top. I felt very glamorous and the back was super sexy!

Who doesn't love a dramatic sleeve? I wore this top to a holiday party, and as you can see, I had a lot of fun wearing it. Getting in and out of the shirt was a little precarious, but the amount of compliments I received was more than worth it. If in doubt, size up!
Got soooo many compliments! The hole for the choker part is tiny and kinda hard to get on. I would say to size down if you like a tighter fit on the body because it does bunch up a bit

links_reviews_title: Absolutely stunning shirt with lovely statement sleeves; totality a show stopper!
links_reviews_text: Very glamorous statement piece! Lovely material; size up!!
The neck/shoulders was all weird and didn't lie flat. Body-arms fit fine.

The fabric in this top is thick and lovely. I'm a tall girl and the sleeves went past my hands which was surprising and I thought a little awkward. But because the slits are in the inside, whenever your arms are bent it hangs and looks perfectly fine. My size wasn't available but I wanted to experience this top so I got it anyway. I was going to send it back because it was too large and at the last minute I ended up wearing it to a Game of Thrones opening party! It was perfect LOL
Fits great. Wore it out to dinner with girlfriends and it was a hit

As everyone else aside, this top is incredibly tight around the neck and you definitely need to do your make up after getting it on. I'm glad I read the reviews first. Overall, the top is very stylish and structured and looks great with a pair of high waisted jeans.

links_reviews_title: It was a pretty sweater to wear on vacation.
links_reviews_text: I have broad shoulders so it was a little tight there. But the body of the sweater was comfortable. The neck was tight to get over my head.

links_reviews_title: I Love a Serious Sleeve Situation
links_reviews_text: Basically the best sweater you'll ever wear! The collar is tight enough to fit correctly without chocking you or irritating your neck. The cut out shoulders frame you perfectly. And the fit is extremely flattering. There's a slit in the under part of the long sleeves that prevent them from getting in the way of things. This sweater is literally everything.
Definitely do your hair / make up AFTER you put it on as the neck is challenging to get on, but looks great once you do. Loved the dramatic sleeves and exposed shoulders. Really pretty

This top is so unique and made me feel sexy while keeping it classy. I probably could have worn a size up comfortably, but the fabric is thicker than I expected and held me in pretty well. I loved the open shoulders/back and the long bell sleeves really set it apart from anything else I have ever worn. Size up if questioning, but don't hesitate to rent this top!

Loved the fit. Thought the turtle neck would be irritating but it was totally fine once I started moving around. May ruin an updo when placing over your head so pick a simple style or style hair after dressing!

links_reviews_title: My future mother in law wanted to tear this off of me and steal it
links_reviews_text: The sweater isn't the most comfortable thing in the world but it is made well and looks fab. In addition to my future mother in law trying to steal it, my coworkers now want to start an Instagram account called "Rene's Sleeves" Haters gonna hate. Ladies gonna look fabulous.
Loved everything about this shirt. Great color and sexy fit. The long sleeves are definitely the best part.
I absolutely love this sexy statement top. It fit like a glove. The material is thick, quality and luxurious. I felt like a fashionista. If it was less, I'd buy it in a second. Highly recommend!
I know people always say this or that is EVERYTHING but this top actually is EVERYTHING!!! Sexy. Comfy. Hides flaws. Stunning!!!

a few things, definitey order a size up. I ordered my size and it rides up a little at the waist and i couldve used a little more room in the chest. The sleeves are really fun, and overall really sexy look. *The neck hole is REALLY tight so make sure you put this on BEFORE you do your hair! Its definitely a statement piece and beautiful color.

links_reviews_title: I Loved Loved Loved this sweater!!
links_reviews_text: The fit was so comfortable and flattering. The sleeves and open back / shoulders give drama and head-turning shape. This is one of my favorite all-time RTR pieces.

The unique and high fashion style of this top is so fun to wear. A head turner. The sleeves are very long and dramatic but have just the right length of slit to keep them from being inconvenient. The color is decadent! I can't even begin to explain the subtle sexiness of the shoulder to back cutout. Truly a fantastic piece.

links_reviews_title: A very unique high fashion top!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved how different this top was and how it got noticed. It is a beautiful merlot color with thick fabric. The arms are long and "vamp-like" but still easy to maneuver. It is a very form fitting top, so I ordered the 12 versus the 8 I usually wear and it fit fine.
Great top if you are looking for something different. I️ did wear this to dinner and the sleeves made it difficult to eat! Probably better for a night out.

links_reviews_title: For curvy women, this is a very flattering shirt!
links_reviews_text: Do your hair after you put the shirt on, the neck part is a bit tight.

I didn't realize quite how much of a statement this sweater truly makes until I tried it on- A turtleneck/cold shoulder/ exposed back/ bell sleeves- there's a lot going on here. That's not a bad thing, just more than I had anticipated. I paired it with a halter bra to get around the strip of open back that connects the cold shoulders. which worked great. Overall, this sweater looked good, but with the turtleneck and almost cape like sleeves, I started to feel very Dracula, and had fun with that accordingly. The fabric is heavy and does pull down/bunches so it isn't super forgiving. Sleeves didn't get in the way too much, and honestly they were the reason I rented it, and my favorite part of the sweater. I had a total of two compliments on it throughout the day. - dressupbee

links_reviews_title: This is my new fav designer
links_reviews_text: Warm , soft, and cozy material- seriously love this designer and the tops they make- thick STRETCHY material - it fit me very comfortable- absolutely will rent again- color is deep burgundy loved it!
love this top, make sure you put your make up on and do your hair after you put it on because the neck is very small
very heavy fabric, sleeves a bit too long but still beautiful , hard to get on as collar does not have a button and is not very stretchy , many many compliments

The fabric on this top is amazing! Slimming & comfortable. Also, the open shoulders and exaggerated sleeve details make it unique and memorable. Loved it a lot and only returned it because I wanted to maximize how many things I get in a month. Might go back and buy it since it's 75% off.
Cute top dramatic sleeves. The cut out was to tight and pulled on my arms making the garment unwearable.

so, I ordered for a NYC trip with my son but ended up not wearing. Maybe if I was still in my 20s this would be fine. It was flattering and nice looking but WAY too uncomfortable. The neck (as others have said) make it very difficult to put on. the way the shoulder cut outs work, it also felt odd holding my arms in certain positions. While it looked very nice on, it just was not practical for me to wear for my intended purpose. Maybe I'll try one of the similar ones in this branch that goes slightly off one shoulder...

links_reviews_title: I was unable to wear it. My neighbor held my runway delivery hostage. (He meant well)
links_reviews_text: It had a lot of stretch to it. I'm sorry I missed the opportunity to wear it
Fit TTS. Nice thick material. Sleeves were a little too long for me and I love a bell sleeve. Didn't wear it because I was hoping for something a little more casual.

links_reviews_title: So much fun...the sleeves are doing the most in the best way :)
links_reviews_text: It was a great fun shirt that can be dress up or down. I would definitely rent again

Fit perfectly, but be aware that the bell sleeves are long and can be annoying. I wouldn't want to wear this to a restaurant for a fancy meal- the extra long sleeves would drive me crazy. I also think a long waisted woman would find this top too short- it was perfect for me, a busty, short waisted gal. The color is more burnt sienna than cranberry. Fun but not for a dinner party!
Sleeves were enormous! Looked ridiculous! Strange fit!

links_reviews_title: A basic turtleneck with flair, literally!!
links_reviews_text: Neck part was snug and I recommend putting shirt on before hair and makeup. Otherwise, great shirt for casual or more dressy affair.

links_reviews_title: Loved it but couldn't figure out a bra that worked
links_reviews_text: The color and feel of the dress are beautiful, but the fabric is very light and shows whatever is underneath, so I wasn't able to find a bra that worked with the neckline and wasn't visible under the dress. Too bad bc it was very comfortable and unique

links_reviews_title: Roomy, comfortable, elegant with 7 month bump!
links_reviews_text: Super pregnant and had a wedding in balmy Miami. This was perfect. Looks see through on the hanger but definitely not. You will need a strapless bra, preferably with low sides as the armholes are very roomy. I wore my normal size (regularly 2-4P depending on cut, but I'm more an 8P pregnant, cup size now 36C). And because of my height, the midi length felt like a well-fit gown (wore 1.5-2" heels). Compliments all night and great for eating and dancing--my favorite things! Rent this dress!
Loved this dress! Not normally a big fan of red but the color is stunning. Very comfortable and flattering with a 27wk bump. Perfect for any formal occasion or upcoming holiday party!

links_reviews_title: I was happy to not have to wear Spanx, and felt comfortable but sexy all night.
links_reviews_text: The dresses I had ordered online did not work for me so luckily I live in an area that I could go into an actual RTR shop and try on dresses. I would never have picked this dress from a photo online but as soon as I put it on, I beamed with joy and danced around. The jewel, red color is beautiful, and even though there’s a decent amount of material due to the design of the dress, it draped in a way to still give you shape. The neckline was one of my favorite details and loved how it showed off my shoulders. You can’t wear a bra but I just used some stickies and was good. Would def rent again.
Beautiful dress of silk material that was just so comfy for a 7 month pregnancy bump. The color is a great red that is elegant and the dress flows lovely! Easy to wear, makes you feel glam.

links_reviews_title: Felt glamorous and comfortable at 22 weeks
links_reviews_text: At 22 weeks, I was just starting to struggle with dress options and this was beautiful and comfortable for a formal, indoor-outdoor wedding. The material is light and breezy, making it nice even for the spring or summer.
I am usually a 0 but they only had a 4 at the RTR store so I tried it on and loved it! felt comfortable and elegant all night!

links_reviews_title: Color was stunning and very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful gown. Material is pretty thin so keep that in mind. It ran a little large I went down a size.

This dress ran larger I think as it was very roomy. It ended up being really pretty and elegant on and I received a lot of compliments. I did feel like it wasn't the most flattering just because the lack of shape in the dress, but it was fine. I might suggest wearing shapewear or the right underwear as the material can cling if staticky.

I wore this dress to a boho-chic wedding at six months pregnant. The dress is great, but is a little long on short women (I'm 5'2 and had to wear 4-inch heels so it wouldn't drag). I got complimented with "stunning" multiple times throughout the night, which made me feel great, given that I couldn't drink at the wedding! Would rent again, and def recommend for other expecting moms!

Such a comfortable dress for a formal wedding when you're in the 3rd trimester. I could've sized down to the 4R, it's very forgiving. This wasn't my first choice as it arrived with water stains on the chest and needed a good steam. But it was the most comfortable option!

Fit right into an Indian/American wedding. The color of the dress was jewel toned and the fit was loose and flowy. Being 30 weeks pregnant with twins, a flowy dress is exactly what I needed. Tons of compliments on the dress. Def recommended!

I rented this dress for a gala in February and the color was beautiful for the event. It ran true to size but I probably could have sized down due to the cut of the dress. With my height (5'1"), it was much longer than in the photo. I initially paired it with a thin rhinestone belt and I liked that look (and it helped with the length) but unfortunately the belt broke midway through the evening. Nonetheless the dress was still beautiful and had a great bohemian look!
This dress is the perfect length for petite gals. The fabric is so soft and feels like you're not wearing anything. Loved it!
Beautiful! Fit lovely, gorgeous color! It is definitely a spring or summer dress, I rented in the winter and it is not a winter dress.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a military ball.
links_reviews_text: It was a little big, but I think I overshot my actual size and should have ordered the 8 and not the 10, but I loved this dress and am checking to see if I can rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Runs very large, very pretty red
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress for a gala event when I was 24 weeks pregnant. Unfortunately it ran very large, and I was unable to wear it. Not flattering on a petite figure -- even with a baby bump.
Little too moo moo for a formal wedding
The dress hung much lower near the armpits than I thought it would -- on the model, it looked like it was cut higher, but the way it draped wasn't flattering for me. Decided not to wear it.

This dress is fun, but good to know that it is floor length, not "midi" as shown in the photo. So it is essentially a long red column of silk. Not bad, but not the look I was going for. I can see why it is a great dress for pregnant ladies, but was too mumu-like in full length for me. Fortunately, it was my back up dress so this was not an issue.

For those who don't love bump-hugging dresses (like me!) this was an excellent option to wear to a wedding during my third trimester. The fabric is breathable and of good quality. I recommend ordering your normal Elizabeth and James size in this dress, as the only fitted portion of the dress is the neck. I sized up and it felt like there was a little too much fabric. But, despite that, I loved the dress and was very comfortable all night.

links_reviews_title: Not lined or formal enough for the event
links_reviews_text: Not what i was looking for

links_reviews_title: This dress is flowy with lots of material and would look great on someone tall. I loved it though.
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful (and comfortable!) dress for formal holiday party
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a formal holiday party while 18 weeks pregnant. I felt fancy and like I said,COMFORTABLE, and received tons of compliments on the fit as well as the color :) Would definitely recommend this dress - pregnant or not!

links_reviews_title: The dress was a stand out against all the basic black dresses
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a wedding in Spain. It was perfect very flown but a bit big

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress 6 months pregnant and it was the perfect combination of elegant and sexy
links_reviews_text: Great for anyone looking for something comfortable yet elegant. Make sure you have stat guard handy though because it did cling a bit

links_reviews_title: Not worn, but might rent again.
links_reviews_text: Ended up not wearing this - but would probably rent again for a different kind of party. The color is great. But, the material seems cheap and is kind of polyester-y. On me, was not appropriate (formal enough) for a black-tie fundraiser.

I wore this dress at 17 weeks pregnant with a small but noticeable baby bump. I loved it so much I wanted to buy it. The fabric is lighter and more flowy than it appears in the picture, so it moves nicely and is flattering to the body. I selected my pre-pregnancy size, and it fit well. I am sure I could wear it with a much larger bump also.
xx

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, comfortable, flowy dress! Received compliments all night!
