The dress is beautiful and I wore it to work and to dinner. Definitely short in the front but the longer sides allow for work. Colors are pretty and looks cute with a denim jacket.
Nice and flowy. Flattering. Looked great with a tan crop jacket
Tight in the shoulders but overall a fun top with skinny jeans.
Loved the color of the shirt! I got it in the large bc that was the only size in the nyc store. Normally a medium so the shirt was big on me but I tucked it in so it was fine
Loves the color. Had to wear strapless bra but really loved this top. Fits true to size. Straps are adjustable.

I love the color and the neckline and how the straps cross in the back so you aren't worried about them falling. It is more drapey than I expected and I worried that it made me look bigger than I am. But it's easy to wear and I was comfortable without a bra because of the pleats (or you could wear a strapless one).
I wore this top out one night and it was so easy to throw on and go. I liked the high neckline. I would say the color is more pink than red. I would rent again in another color

links_reviews_title: Pretty blouse. But, it didn't make me feel confident. I felt more like a balloon.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable
Comfortable and can be dressed up or worn with a pair of jeans!
The neckline was odd and really tight. The rest fit great. I ordered an XS based on other reviews that it was boxy and too big.
Gorgeous color and fabric. Flattering cut. Loved this top.
Cute and stylish, loved the color. However, the arms were really tight
This is a cute silk top; but it is definitely on the boxier side. Not overly flattering, but cute.
I liked it and knew it would be low cut but definitely wish it had a little more fabric in the front. Still really liked it though. Tight up top and loose on the bottom.

links_reviews_title: Fashionista teacher review: I wore it to work and received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Great fit all around! It showcases an hourglass figure/

This dress is amazing!! My friends and I rented this dress for a baby shower. We were the hostesses and thought it would be a cute idea to wear the same dress. RTR was the obvious choice to start looking. Christian Siriano really does make dresses that fit every body, every type, every size. All 3 of us were thrilled with our dress. Having said that, we did ALL pin the dress in the front to eliminate the too-much-cleavage problem. But the dress fit perfectly for all of us, the dress is very flattering, and pockets! An obvious pro that doesn’t need any explanation. I highly recommend renting this dress. You can’t go wrong!
Liked it but wouldn't rent again!

This is a beautiful dress. I wore it for a lingerie luncheon for my friend who was getting married in Sydney. Very figure flattering. I did have to wear a cami with it. The front is loose and plunging, and I'm busty. But it was beautiful.
Wore this for dinner in Milan. The shoulders were a little large and would slip off easily. It fit perfectly in the bust and stomach. Very cute and felt perfect for the fashion capital of the world.

My husband and I threw a Paris themed party and this was perfect! It is gorgeous material and made me feel like a million bucks. It has a DEEP v, so be prepared for that. I never fell out or anything but they were definitely on display. I would definitely rent again
Loved the style, pattern, and idea of wearing this dress, but as you can see in the photo it is SUPER small in the chest area.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress for pretty fat girls!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was incredible. I literally felt in my element the whole night. I wore it to a graduation. I am pear shaped, a 16 (sometimes 14) on the top and an 18 on the bottom, so this dress was large in the bust but fit perfectly at the waist. Tbh I didn't even care that the bust was big, it still worked! Even though I'm larger in the hips the full skirt was beautiful, perfect length even without heels, and it had POCKETS that were perfectly placed. Will rent anything Christian Siriano makes now!

Ah - so here goes: this dress is likely meant for a smaller chested woman and if I'd had time, I might have rented something else. However, I was able to pin the front together to a degree and the lining to my bra, which helped it not be any boobier than it was. A couple other funky things - I had to pin the lining up because it was longer than the skirt in two places (weird) and the frills on the shoulders are sewn in two different directions (so one side wants to lie flat one direction and the other, the other way). I had the dry cleaners press these so they stuck straight up, which they more or less did (the whole dress needed pressing because it's a heavy cotton and the hem of the skirt arrived pressed inconsistently) HOWEVER, all that aside, it was an amazing dress for Derby and super fun to wear!

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress! Perfect for Kentucky derby. Sleeves are a little loose and slid down a few times but otherwise perfect. I sized up to an 8 - usually a 4 or 6. So many compliments. And yes - the hat - go big or go home!

Loved wearing this dress for a work gala. Not only was it totally appropriate (once I applied some fashion tape to the bust area, that is), it drew tons of complements, and -you guys- it had pockets. Pockets for my phone and vip guest list. Pockets for comfort. Pockets for cool points. It was perfect. Did I mention pockets? Don't forget about pockets friends.

The event was a 50's rebel themed event and the dress fit that theme perfectly. I put an additional layer under to poof it up a bit as a disclaimer! The dress fit wonderful everywhere except the breast area which was a little to large I am a 36 a/b so my breasts are not all that large. I used tape to keep the edges from popping out and showing too much cleavage. Work event ;-)

I'm between a 4/6 and the 4 fit me well in this. You'll feel absolutely stunning in this classic, feminine, vintage-inspired cocktail dress. You can dress it up or down depending upon your occasion. One of my favorite rentals.
I loved it and felt beautiful but I could not reach my arms or really sit so I'm glad I didn't have too! Lots of compliments at my work function.

I got a ton of compliments from the moment I walked in. Very flattering in the neckline and bust. I did have to safety pin it to my bra or it would have opened up everywhere. Pockets were quite useful. I would definitely recommend it. I paired it with ankle boots and a belt. It gave me more of a rock chick look for the engagement party (not mine) that I was hosting.

Would have rated this better but for a small chested girl like me, the open neckline and unsown front gapped and made a few almost embarrassing moments. A bit of fashion tape and/or a better bra and this dress would have been perfect. Paired with black tights since it's a bit chilly and it was a great date night outfit! Excellent fabric and fun swing on bottom!
Loved everything - perfect for my hotel stay at a farm inn - the straps were just too long and kept slipping and I was exposed a number of times - otherwise it was beautiful

links_reviews_title: Didn’t end up wearing bc wasn’t ideal for beach wedding
links_reviews_text: I actually ended up liking this dress WAY more on than I did on the hanger/pictures. Loved the way it looked, but it was too formal for the beach wedding. Hope to be able to rent it in the future and actually wear it. Fair warning: there is zero give around the waist.

links_reviews_title: So many things too love...but dear god, the cleavage.
links_reviews_text: This dress is lovely. Nice pattern, full circle skirt, lined and cute details. Also...Pockets!! But goodness, the shoulder, arm holes, and cut of the bust are so far off. The straps do not want to stay on my shoulders. The front gapes so badly l had to change bras. So much fabric tape and I brought more just in case. Also, the arm holes are tight and pinch. I can't tell if it would be better if my boobs were bigger or smaller. I don't think it would work either way. It's disappointing because I really thought I would love this dress. Even with a little cleavage showing...but this is a wardrobe malfunction waiting to happen! Also, I was feeling a little sheepish at a family wedding with this much bust showing.
Very cute dress but not good for holding in a large bust!

The dress felt very 50s, and had a very defined waist with a wrap bust to emphasize your waist even more. I really liked the structure of the waist and the way the skirt puffed out without using any boning. And there were pockets! The material itself was much lighter than I thought it would be. Typically dresses like this are a heavy satin or polyester and this one felt like cotton. The one drawback was the shoulders. It's a bit off the shoulder but there are no straps to hook your bra into. Standing up, it was fine, but when I sat down, the straps slipped off my shoulders some and there was gaping at the front. If you've got a shorter torso or you're petite, I'd recommend using fashion tape to stick the dress to your bra strap and the top of your bra cups when you sit.
Really big in the top and because I’m short-waisted and broad shouldered it looked bad.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress. A little tight on bust
links_reviews_text: This dress is off the shoulder and bra straps will show. You'll need to go strapless of bra less. Strapless means huge clevage due to the fit. I recommend braless as you still look good as there is dress structuring but not ridiculous clevage. Lower half is ballooned and flouncy. I'll rent again. More of a day dress for a shower, derby, work. Not cocktail in my mind. It's a cotton look and feel.

Very comfortable dress. I ordered a 16 and 18 there is no give to the dress so the size 16 was too tight under my bra line so I went with the 18. The dress needs a tank top under it especially if you have a large chest. It was very revealing when I sat down but the tank top covered me nicely. It has pockets which was an added plus! The one thing I would say is the color is NOT white. It has a mix of beige which makes the dress not pure white. When I ordered it I thought it was all white with black flowers. Lots of compliments and would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Huge pockets and stunning low back
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this dress. Comfy, functional pockets and a low dramatic back without it being too revealing.
Perfect summer dress.

This is a review of the Christian Soriano white floral full skirt dress. Pros- this dress is beautiful. It has super deep pockets. I carried my 📱 in one pocket and a water bottle in the other. I wore this in New Orleans and while I did sweat, it held up pretty well. I would absolutely wear this dress again. Con- i had to safety pin the cleavage area as it just left my boobs very exposed. This is the type of dress you wear to church and well it’s too much boob. I’m a 36c. In conclusion- yes! I wore this dress to brunch and you know what, this dress elevates life.
The fabric and cut of this dress is just beautiful. It ran slightly large in the chest, so I didn't wear it. But I loved it. And it has pockets

links_reviews_title: Cocktail dress for a small wedding
links_reviews_text: Beautiful shape and silhouette. True to size. No stretch. Have no suggestions of sizing up or down since either way doesn't work. The top is for bigger chested ladies, and the waist has to fit well. Or the dress doesn't look right. Had to use about a half a deck of fashion tape to keep the dress in place. The dress is supposed to sit right on the shoulders, which is fine, if you never move. But if you are the type of human that moves like I am, I suggest a lot of fashion tape. The lining is silky and moves, it is a comfortable and beautiful and noteworthy dress. Endless compliments and fun to spin in on the dance floor. I wore mine with red pumps.

links_reviews_title: Thank you, Christian Siriano, for making designer apparel accessible to all!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. But, in hindsight, it was probably a bit busty for my event. The dress does run small - though I would more typically wear an 18W in a fit/flare style dress such as this, the 22W fit comfortably albeit perhaps a bit large - but I feel like that is to be expected with higher end designers. Not sure that fashion tape would have helped, the "straps" (as they were) were a bit wide for my shoulders. Again, probably because the dress was too big, but the next size down wasn't available. So ... ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! Would absolutely wear again!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a Kentucky Derby party. Note: I added a tulle slip underneath, thus making it much poofier than pictured. I got so many compliments with this dress. Pockets! It is very low cut, but I am larger chested. I ended up using fashion tape and opted for no bra as the fabric is lined. A little snug in the waist, but overall loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous gorgeous dress! Perfect for a day at the races!
links_reviews_text: This was my favorite RTR experience ever and I'm sorry I didn't get a better picture! This dress is GORGEOUS. Glamorous and beautiful cut and fabric. It is a full skirt and narrow waist. I loved the neckline but used fashion tape to keep the shoulders up (I wore it for a loooong day at Churchill Downs). Pockets were super useful. I wore it with fancy flats but heels would have been better. I really want to own this dress, I love it so much.

This was a great derby dress. It runs very tight at the waist I had to go up 3 sizes to get a decent fit there. You'll want some fashion tape to get the chest to fit just right based on your needs. Pockets made this dress the BEST dress at the derby!

The silhouette of this dress is so elegant! Loved the detailing on the shoulder you can see on the photo when renting. I own a two-piece Christian Siriano in a size 2 and this 0 was perfect so it might run a tad bigger than some of his other pieces. The fabric is a bit different than pictured online, in addition to the cream and black there's a bit of a tan/nude color sprinkled in as well. It is long but I loved the tea length. Also, the pleating of the skirt is beautiful and great for twirling :)
I LOVED this dress. The top ran a little big but it still looked fantastic. There were no reviews so I was nervous buy it ended up being beautiful. I'm 5'5 and the length was great.

links_reviews_title: Loved it but was to small in the chest to zip up
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely lovely it was a really nice coat and I was excited to wear it but on the way up zipping it right when I got to the rib cage it seems to be way too small about two sizes too small so next time I'm going to be renting a larger size and hopefully it'll fit
I got my size (18) and a backup 20. Even the 20 was Tight around bust, less white than in photos. More grey
Bodice was tight, chest area was literally falling off. I wasn't crazy about the fabric. It isn't a pure white as I expected and looked dirty although it wasn't. Didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Pretty but it has seen better days
links_reviews_text: Looked tired and ready to be retired. It is a lovely dress, though. Big on top even for a busty lady. I didn't wear it.

I loved the concept of this dress, but at 26 weeks pregnant this dress just wasn't ideal. I'm typically a 2 or 4 so I ordered a 4 or 6 for being pregnant. I wore the 6 but it was still pretty snug and the zipper dug into my back a good bit. Maybe an 8 would have been better.
I loved this dress! I wore the size 8 and it was true to size. It was so comfortable and flattering.

This dress has all the benefits of a modern little black dress with all the upside and very little not to like. Dress effectively concealed a growing pregnancy belly. Was tight on top and didn't wear a bra. Length was perfect. Cape was AMAZING
The cape on this dress was a little odd to me but it fit the best of all the dresses I ordered. I think i would've loved it without the cape but I guess it adds something a little different.
Fit was true to size. Comfortable and perfect length, received numerous compliments, wld wear this again
it was a little more form fitting than I anticipated but the cape added a little flare to an otherwise simple LBD. it was a classic piece and I got so many compliments!
Pros: it is a simple, cute, black dress. Great for an intimate date or wedding. I used mine for our engagement session. Absolutely loved it. Cons: the only con - the chest area. It was a tad big

I rented this dress for a high school reunion. The picture doesn't do it justice because I think the cape makes it hard to see my figure. But I really liked this dress in real life. The material was nice and thick so it held my problem areas in. The cape made it stand out and the length was classy. I'd rent it again!
I ended up wearing different dress but will definitely rent this dress again for another event. True to size.

If you are on the fence about strapless, you won't regret this one! Strapless is not usually my 1st choice in a dress but I'm so glad I went for it. I carry most of my weight in my stomach so the shift style was perfect. It didn't flatten my chest or lack support another bonus! I'd buy this dress in a heartbeat!
Black dress- simple enough. Didn't care for the cape feature, made me look larger than I am.

links_reviews_title: How quick and easy it was.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great, very comfortable. I felt very covered up in all the right places. Would definitely rent this one again. Lots of compliments! Personally I would purchase this dress.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and classic with a twist
links_reviews_text: I have typically been wearing size 12 recently, but the 10 was much more secure around my chest and still fit my hips nicely. It's got a lot of give, but is structured. I did wear spanx under it for my own sanity, but don't necessarily think I had to. I don't think my picture does it justice, because it doesn't look boxy when the sides are flowy and you can see your shape. Would rent again for sure.

I'm 6 months pregnant and attended a cocktail fundraiser where I received an award. I'm a size 6 pre pregnancy so i ordered and 8 and 10 to accommodate my new belly. The 8 fit perfect! I received tons of compliments and felt very pretty and most important, comfortable. Good stretch without looking overly stretched. Overall it was a hit. If this was available in any other colors I'd be renting it my entire pregnancy!

links_reviews_title: Everyone said they wanted this dress in their closet!
links_reviews_text: This dress was really easy to wear and a fun twist on a little black dress. It is hard to tell how the cape looks in person by just looking at photographs, but when you walk in the dress is has great movement. It was also perfect for a wedding on a hot SC afternoon! Several people asked me where I got it and said they wished they owned it. I did throw on a pair of Spanx since this fabric is a little stretchy and was clinging to my mid section -- but after that it was perfect! The cape and the dark color helped flatter my shape also.
Wore the 2, dress fit great, didn't have to pull it up constantly. Was a little baggy in the stomach area but you couldn't tell. Great rental!
Wore this dress to my boyfriend's daughter's wedding. It was very class! #weddingguest

links_reviews_title: Shapeless and unflattering for my body type :(
links_reviews_text: Although I like the idea of this dress and saw some fabulous photos from other RTR users, it totally did not work for me (I ended up using my backup). I'm about 140 lbs, 5'6.5", 36B with wide shoulders and hips. The size 6 felt a bit too big in the waist/hips but was super tight at the banded top, which ultimately made it hang strangely in a way I found unflattering. The cape made it difficult to actually see the curves of my body. Completely shapeless and not at all for my body type!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for the occasion can dress up or down with accessories.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a six o’clock outside wedding. I am almost 5 months pregnant and normally a 0-2 but wore a 4. It was a little loose in my bust area but still comfortable. I could have worn the 2 but it was tight around my bust area. This was a great dress and very comfortable for the event. You can wear straps with it but it does make the top part roll down and looks great as a strapless. Great material and very forgiving especially when you are pregnant and don’t want to stand out!

I wore this dress to an evening event, a film opening. The dress is interesting. The fabric is comfortable and swingy and the strapless stayed up really easily! As other reviews have mentioned, the built in ruffle/cape adds some interest and fluidity so it's not like you are just wearing a sheath, which is great for someone like me who is always trying to hide her belly. The weird thing is the ruffle/cape doesn't totally cover your belly, but is kind of to the side. I wasn't sure I was wearing it right, but I think you could kind of rotate it to make sure it worked for you. I ended up wearing it with a wrap to dress it up and it was super comfy and easy to wear.
Very flattering.

links_reviews_title: The cape was a great WOW factor
links_reviews_text: After reading some reviews that women wore this during their pregnancy I decided to order it. Because this dress doesn't have any corset like lining, it was easy to wear when I was 26 weeks pregnant. The cape also helped hide any pregnancy weight while keeping it comfortable and classy. The material is a little thick so I would definitely flag that because it was unexpected how heavy the material was.

links_reviews_title: Classic black dress with a twist!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to a fall wedding and it was perfect. It's a flattering fit that I think would work well on any body type. I'm a 32D and the 4 fit me well, the 6 was a little too roomy up top. Definitely recommend this dress for any night time event!

Not my favorite dress I've ever rented, and I almost didn't wear it because I was in between the two sizes but decided to go with the larger one and was comfortable and happy! The cape is a little strange but for fall in the northeast was a nice touch to a strapless dress that would have otherwise felt a little too summery. Fabric is thick and flattering, hit right above the knees on me.

links_reviews_title: This dress was very comfortable, sleek, and sexy.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size. I'm a 32B and it was comfortable in the chest area. I loved the fact that there was a cape on the back. It gave a whole new level of definition to the dress. Wish I could have kept it!

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful wedding, I received many compliments on the dress.
links_reviews_text: Simple, classy, but with an unexpected twist. Fits well for a curvy body, a little stretch, yet refined.
I wore this to a wedding. It was super comfortable, stayed in place (concerned since it was strapless) and I received many compliments. Would definitely rent this again.
This dress is comfortable and I got lots of compliments. The zipper is a bit touchy but it's great.
The material was very comfortable, and I am typically an 8, and that fit perfectly. It was easy to move and dance in. It was a unique dress!

Okay so I am extremely pear shaped and it can be hard to find dresses that fit well. On the model this dress fits like a shift dress on the bottom. But the stretch of the bottom also works perfectly as more of a tighter bodycon dress for those with wider hips and booties! The cape is also amazing if you don't normally like flaunting your hips and butt/thighs. So flattering. Perfect little black dress.

Flattering fit- photo doesn't do it justice. Top stayed up all night- I was not fussing with it at all. I received tons of compliments. Fabric is good weight and has good stretch. I would love to wear this again!!!

links_reviews_title: This was my second choice as my first choice was too tight. I received multiple compliments.
links_reviews_text: This dress is perfect for full bust and hips. The cape covers the back while adding an elegant style. It was also very comfortable.
It would be perfect for any occasion, great fit, flattering, loved the cape. I would rent this for future events again! I was wearing a strapless bra with it (personal preference).

I had to go up a size (could have worn the 8, but it wasn't as comfortable), but all in the dress was great for my growing (28 week) belly! Got a lot of complements and felt elegant at an event at the opera.

links_reviews_title: Fun and interesting dress for a special occasion.
links_reviews_text: Great fit! Fun cape! Easy to wear and dance in.

links_reviews_title: Would love to own this dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress was so classy! Wore it to a Roaring 20's themed wedding. As soon as I put it on my husband was "Wow! Can you please buy that!" Would love to try it in another color as well. It fit true to size and was so comfortable, I wasn't in a hurry to take it off.
This dress was amazing. I was a personal attendant at a wedding where I was constantly on the move. Very comfortable and elegant.

links_reviews_title: This was an elegant wedding and this dress fit the bill perfectly. Comfort and style
links_reviews_text: This dress ironically was my backup choice, as I am 5 months pregnant and was trying to hide the bump for a little bit longer. This dress drapes so beautifully for a simple black dress, I received non-stop compliments all night. Best part I was very comfortable. If you have a little pooch the side drapes covers very well. The material was perfect as I didn't get hot or uncomfortable as I ate throughout the night. I wish it was in white, would rent for my bridal shower!

I was surprised upon receiving this dress bc it has a cape. I was unsure about it at first but it was so flattering on my curvy figure. The front of the dress is form fitting but the cape hits just right flattering your hips/rear. I was so comfortable in this dress all night. It runs true to size but I may also suggest sizing down for your extra dress as the size 12 was a bit big in the chest area for me. I received tons of compliments and felt beautiful in this dress.

links_reviews_title: Classic black strapless dress with touch of character
links_reviews_text: Loved this black strapless dress. Wore it to fundraiser gala for my daughters school. Classic with fun lines, loved the ruffle! Received many compliments, would love to own it.
This dress is perfect. I purchased it bc the fit was perfect, the length was fun but appropriate. Like it was made for me! Perfect LBD with flair.
Great LDB for a Vegas night out. Comfortable, flattering and fun!

links_reviews_title: This is the PERFECT little black dress! I loved everything about it, I should have purchased it!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect for 5'6", I could see it being a little short if you were much taller than me!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress, classy. Lots of Complements
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress
Perfect fit dress that's good for work or parties. Goes with everything. It's such a great material and look that I'd consider buying. Definitely renting again.
Super comfortable!! I am 5’5 148 pounds (most days) & 36 DDD, Thank you RTR for your fantastic customer service! You were super helpful. :)

Loved this dress! Super comfortable and got tons of compliments. I would suggest going down a size. I ordered the dress in a size 8 and 10 thinking since I have a 34 D chest and the dress is a zip up in the back that it might be tight in the chest area. Well it wasn't.. the size 8 was actually kind of big and could have worn a size 6. The dress material was great and the dress length was just right.. not to short! I think this dress would look great on any size!
Overall great fit. A tad big but mostly true to size. It's a little short for tall women but still wearable. Cute and flirty. Try on review on Youtube https://youtu.be/CzHyi7JcKHM
Sleek lines, but "different". Zipper in back lies flat and material is thick.
Wore this ADORABLE dress to a wedding with a normal bra!! Oh yes, it was pretty amazing. Great fabric, very fun LBD that pairs nicely with RTR’s Rebecca Minkoff Wonder Leo Clutch. 5’, 120#, 34C
The dress fit perfectly in the waist and length. Very comfortable as well. I would say it runs pretty true to size.
Can wear it forever it fit me so well!!!!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a bachelorette party in Vegas and it was the perfect little black dress!
links_reviews_text: The material is a little thicker than I thought which meant no bra and panty lines :) I loved the zipper up the back and the flutter sleeves received so many compliments. The dress is very comfortable and a good length.

My original order did not arrive at my apartment. FedEx delivered it to the wrong address and someone else signed for it. I didn't discover this until after work, the night before my flight. My husband called Rent the Runway while I was in flight and they declared this a "fashion emergency." Lol I ordered this dress for the ACM awards in Vegas and had no plan B. I flew to Vegas planning to shop the second I landed. Rent the Runway was so kind to us. They opened a claim with FedEx for the original shipment, and overnighted two of my 4 items to me in Vegas. This dress was so comfortable and flattering. I knew it was a winner the minute I slipped it on. The perfect little black dress. Thank you Rent the runway for saving the day!!

links_reviews_title: It fit perfect and so comfortable
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit so comfortable

links_reviews_title: Hole in seam made it impossible to wear
links_reviews_text: It fit beautifully.....other than the hole on the right hip which made the right side fit completely wrong. It didn't lay correctly from the hole down, and you could (obviously) see that there was an imperfection in the dress. I was so sad bc this dress was otherwise really cute! It also seemed to be the least clean of the 4 items that I received, so I'm not really sure what happened to this particular dress....
Wore to two events because it was so flattering and I will def rent again!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for new years!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! Great LBD. I loved the sleeves! Not too long and not too short.

This was a great fit, hugged my curves, but still very classy and fun! The material is thick, and a little stretchy, so it clung to all the right places. The flutter sleeves are just the right amount of fun for a work party. I usually have trouble with dresses being too short, but even in heels, this was modest enough to wear without flashing. Will definitely be renting this one again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect LBD for work! And after work!
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing! It is perfect for a day that you have to work and have a party after. Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable size 6, could dance, move as needed. I truly enjoyed this little black dress!
links_reviews_text: Wore to a party and family photo day.
I loved this dress! The ruffle cap sleeves gave it more than your average lbd. Will definitely rent again!
I love wearing black and this was a fun dress to wear. I love the cinched waist and the ruffles on the shoulder. You can literally wear this dress anywhere. It's really comfy and stretchy!

I'm only 5'1" and was concerned with the length but it was perfect. Everyone loved my dress and complimented it all night long. The lil sleeve gave it the fun detail that made it a little more dressy than normal. Fabric had stretch and was super flattering.
It hit me in all the right places and made my waist seems slightly tinier.

links_reviews_title: I love this dress! Fit so cute, and was perfect for a rehearsal dinner. I wore a size 0.
links_reviews_text: Fit great!

links_reviews_title: Great LBD however it came with a hole on the back seam. I was so embarrassed!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Great coverage! Great style just poorly maintained
This is another fabulous dress. Easy for work and then to wear out after. I paired it with espadrilles.
This dress is absolutely beautiful. Fit perfectly. It is on the shorter side but that's what is so pretty about this dress.

The perfect but different LBD for your next night out! First of all, the fit is true to size and is so flattering for all body types. The structured shoulders definitely gave me the hourglass shape that I wish I had, but the ruffles don't make your shoulders look extra wide. It is fitted at the waist to make sure to size up for backup if you like a looser fit in the midsection but there is ample room in the hips. I would recommend this for women with A to C cups since the material does stick to your body due to the stretch. It's a hassle-free dress since it can be worn with a standard bra. At 5'6, this comes up to mid thigh for me! Pair this with your favorite pair of strappy heels and maybe some red tassel earrings!

This dress is ADORABLE very very comfy and versatile. I was able to wear a regular bra with this which is always a plus. Very cute style and fit and would give it 5Stars if it were more fitted at the waist. Material has stretch.

links_reviews_title: Loved it but it fit a little tight.
links_reviews_text: Fit a little tight.

links_reviews_title: It had just enough details to dress it up with some black heels
links_reviews_text: I'm 5.5" and it was a little long in the torso area, but other than that loved it! Got alot of compliments
Too small in midsection.
My favorite LBD to date! The flared out sleeves were so cute and the fit of the dress was very forgiving and flattering. I got so many compliments! Would highly recommend.
Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: I have gained a lot of weight and felt so sexy and confident in this dress
links_reviews_text: Fits great

links_reviews_title: Very small and unforgiving. Shows every roll.
links_reviews_text: This dress was a size up for me. Still did not fit.
Loved this dress and received a lot of compliments on it. Extremely comfortable material, I would say it's a body hugging material. The dress is flattering and a unique LBD with the sleeve detail.

links_reviews_title: comfort with a Bit of edge
links_reviews_text: Was a bit small. Usually a size 6 but had to go to 8 to make it more comfortable

Loved wearing this dress for a wedding! Tons of compliments. Fits like a glove. No bra necessary. Warning...it is short, though! I'm only 5'3 and it was even short on me. Absolutely beautiful, though, and I would rent again. One of my husbands's faves!
Fit well. I am 5'2 and still very short on me. Overall loved it.
The color is beautiful in person and I received tons of compliments. I decided not to wear a bra with it and it still worked out nice
The dress is beautiful but VERY short. Had to cover myself with a napkin while sitting down for a meal.
I rented this dress for a steeplechase event. It was perfect and I got a ton of compliments all day. Although it was short, it was very comfortable and fun to wear for the day.

The dress runs small so I ordered a size up from normal, but it was just too short for the my body type and the event (mother/daughter tea at school). My daughter ended up wearing the size 8 for length and I ended up wearing the 4 and turning it into a shirt. So we made it work and it was fine, but beware that the reviewers don't lie - it is SHORT. And was shorter IRL than the image of the model.
Fits loose but still fitted
Loved this dress! Wore without a bra and was completely comfortable...a little short but not too revealing...loved it!
This dress is definitely beautiful and made with good quality materials. It does run small around the chest and ribs. I recommend going one size up. NO BRA NEEDED!!

I am in no way short but this Lilly sure is- regardless, I loved it. It's a classic Lilly pattern and overall fits like other Lilly dresses except shorter than the ones I own. I received several complements on this one.
Dress was cute, wore no bra. Very short. I sized up bc backup wasn't a choice. Glad I did. I feel like it was a little loose. Can't go wrong with a Lily!
If you love Lilly you'll love this dress. Dress was true to size. A little on the shorter side, but manageable

Used my birthday rental on this dress and wore it to a bbq. I read the other reviews and sized up to a 10. The dress fit good and stretched a little as the day went on. It was VERY short so that took some getting used to when sitting or bending down to help my kids. I wore a bandeau underneath because you can't wear a regular bra and it was too hot for a strapless. All around a real cute dress that I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: The dress was beautiful and perfect for a garden wedding party
links_reviews_text: The dress fit a little snug, I have gained some weight, so I end up using the 6 instead of the 4. It was very short, I'm 5'1 and I felt I couldn't bent over without showing my underwear. Not for tall girls!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and from one of my favorite designers!
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit! It was a tad bit big in the waist, but fit perfect in the bust! The material was form fitting without feeling right! I loved it!

I loved the colors and fit of this dress but it fit me tighter than other Lilly dresses in the same size. Overall it looked adorable but was incredibly short for me (5' 3") so sitting was tough but standing it looked great. I wore the 2 and it was okay but my backup size 4 wasn't available or else I probably would have sizes up in this dress for a more comfortable fit.

I wore this dress for my college graduation, I felt good in it and got several compliments. Unfortunately I would have felt uneasy wearing it for any other event because it was so short. I usually wear a size 6 but wore the 8 because it accommodated the girls better and also because I needed whatever extra length I could get.

I wore this dress for a brunch on the beach in April. It was perfect. The dress was bright and classy. It was also comfortable. I found that it ran a bit small for me around the ribcage and I had to size up just to zip. Otherwise the rest of the dress fit nicely. It is short, so beware!
I wore this at a sandals resort on vacation and loved it! Great fit, perfect for shorter girls, I am 5'2" and thought it was a good length for a more casual dress. Ended up keeping this one!

I'm 5'3" on a good day, and this was still quite short, but it fit great and worked fantastically for a derby party. It wasn't super flattering through the waist as I'm more hourglass shaped and could use something to accentuate that. Very fun though! And I didn't have to wear a bra!!
I wore this dress to a Kentucky Derby party. Other reviews were correct- it is very , very short, so I went up 1-2 sizes. The fabric is thick, so it hangs well without wrinkling or bunching.

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments! Perfect dress for spring or summer!
links_reviews_text: The dress ran small, I wore my bigger size. This dress is VERY short, and pretty low cut. My legs are a normal length, and I have a short torso, so I didn't think length would be a problem, but it was still super short on me!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress if it covers your butt!
links_reviews_text: I knew from the reviews that this dress might be too short on me....and it was. I took the risk because it was a perfect dress for the Saratoga horse races. In the picture, I am wearing a short pair of shorts and the dress is shorter than the shorts. In the back, it JUST reached the bottom of my behind. Maybe with a flat butt and shorter torso, this would work. I ended up wearing another Lily dress but really wanted this to work.
Very cute dress. Runs small and probably would have been more comfortable sizing up

I loved this print and the beautiful white embellishment, but I absolutely hated the length. I am not tall by any means, 5'4/5'5, but this dress was incredibly short. I probably would never rent this again.

Loved this dress! Super cute & short. I wore this on our honeymoon cruise. Sorry for the pic- it was during a karaoke contest and the only pic I had that was full body. Definutely rent this dress! Very true to size

I rented this dress for our Arizona vacation and couples photoshoot. It fit well and flattered my figured. I am usually a 6 in Lily's, but opted for the 8 b/c of the length. I received many compliments from people around our resort, spa, and around town. Definitely worthy of another rental if I cannot purchase the dress. Lily Pulitzer dresses never disappoint me.

links_reviews_title: Everyone said how much they love the dress. The picture doesn't do the color justice. It was so cute
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size and the color is just amazing!
Tons of compliments will rent this again

links_reviews_title: Wore for horse race all afternoon. No complaints of comfort, got many compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: Based on other reviews of those wearing this prior, this size was as expected and fit well! Length good and fabric was comfortable! Form fitting but not tight. In general, Lily dresses are bigger than what size I would normally order, if you haven't ordered them before. I have an athletic build and wear size 4-6 in jeans.

I rented this for my birthday event downtown. I got so many compliments on this dress! The biggest stand out is the color, very pretty in person. If you are looking for a fitted dress, this is not for you. It fits like most Lily dresses, a little baggy but still very flattering. The fabric is thick but not hot (I live in FL so I know heat). Super comfortable to wear! I was sad to send it back

Wore this to Saratoga Race track and it went flawlessly with my fancy/ridiculous hat. Very comfortable to wear all day. Went sans bra because it was too small in the bust with the strapless I brought - worked fine. Should be noted though that it's really short! I had to be very conscious of bending over and sitting on the benches.

This was my first Lilly dress I've ever rented and I understand why people love them. I got both a 6 and an 8. The 6 fit, but it was short, like uncomfortably short for me (I'm also 5'9" no heels). The 8 was better, but the length is why it didn't get 5 stars. I wore it to a bridal shower--standing it was fine, but sitting down on a couch I wished it was longer. It has a scoop back but you can wear a regular strapless bra and the dress is not super form fitting. I wore it almost all day and it was really comfortable. I would rent it again!

My friends rented a yacht for their 30th birthday party, and I rented this dress to wear. Lilly Pulitzer is not really my go-to style for every day but it was SO CUTE for this event. I got a TON of compliments. It fit true to size and was actually very comfortable. Be forewarned though, this dress is SHORT! I am 5'8" and it looked fine as we were walking around the boat barefoot, but with high heels I probably would have been uncomfortable. Has little hooks for your bra strap but I still wore a strapless. Relatively tight in the bust.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Lots of compliments! Comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Runs small but does stretch out. Wish I wore the 4! Loved the dress ! It was perfect for hot day in NYC!

This dress was perfect! I wore it to the Traveler's golf Championship and received so many compliments. It was only slightly form fitting which was perfect because it left just the right amount of room in the right places. I would and will definitely rent this dress again and if I can I will buy it!

Wore this dress for a sunset cruise on vacation and it was perfect for the occasion. It fit beautifully. I ordered the 4 and 6 but the 4 fit like a glove. It was a nice length, not too short and not too long. I would love to have kept this dress!

I rented this for my 15 year old daughter for a wedding. She is 5'3" and 120lbs with an athletic build. The size 2 fit perfectly! It was comfortable and very classy looking! So happy with this rental!

links_reviews_title: Such a pretty dress for vacation!
links_reviews_text: This dress was definitely a tighter fit and very short. I ended up wearing boy shorts under it so that I would be more comfortable. It is beautiful in person and very flattering!

I wore it to a "resort casual" wedding reception during the day and kept it on for a friends birthday in the city. I got several compliments at both events. The dress is short but comfortable. It was a little big in the chest/shoulder area for me, but I needed the 6 to comfortably fit my hips. Overall great dress.

links_reviews_title: Forgot to cancel when our event got canceled...
links_reviews_text: So we dressed up anyway and had a formal dinner in our front yard, while social distance socializing with our neighbors #dressupanyway
The cape aspect is a saving grace for pear shapes...I could have fit an 8 I'm guessing, so runs slightly small
The cape made it feel very glamorous. Could wear to a number of formal occasions. I'm usually a 6/8 and went with an 8!
Good fit. Fun and cute one-sided cape made it unique. Flattering from the front, just hangs like a toga in the back (cape is attached).

links_reviews_title: I loved that it wasn't a typical LBD. It was very comfortable and very flattering.
links_reviews_text: I am in between sizes. I ordered a 6 and a 4 and ended up wearing the 4. The 6 was a little wide under the armpit. I am 5'6 and I felt like it was a good length and not as short on me as the original picture.

This dress was the prefect fit for my short, curvy frame. With my build, It's not easy to find a flattering dress that's the right length and needs no alterations. This dress fit like a glove!! It looked classy and sexy. I was very comfortable sitting and standing in this dress. We had to drive 30 min to the gala, and it didn't crease or look wrinkled. The only thing I didn't like was the hanger straps on the no sleeve side---they kept wanting to show, they're not in the best place. I finally taped them down with wardrobe tape. I found this dress to fit TTS, and would highly recommend it!!

I loved this dress! I was originally going to wear the 6 (my size) but I had a little more room in the 8 and I knew there would be a TON of food at this wedding - so I went with the bigger size. I'm only 5'1" and the length was perfect. One of the reasons I rented was because it was on the shorter side. I paired with a pair of gold metallic heels (Feb wedding) and it looked beautiful!

I got many compliments. I absolutely adored it. BUT I had to stand up perfectly straight the whole night because the bust area is much larger than the rest of the dress. I always wear a 6, and this time it was too big. I still loved it.

I didn't end up wearing this dress to my event, but it was such a close call between it and the other dress I chose to wear. It fit well and was so different. I loved this style. The body of the dress wasn't the most flattering, but I feel the shortness of the dress and one shoulder exposed made up for it. Would love to rent (again) or own this dress!

I was a little nervous about whether I could pull this off, but I got a TON of compliments and it was fun to dance with! I liked that it was sexy in a subtle way (perfect for a work awards dinner) and I felt super confident in it. I ordered a 6 and an 8 and I don't think the 6 was really a 6 - the size and designer labels were missing and I could barely get it over my legs. So I went with the 8 which was a little loose in the waist and bust (a padded strapless bra fixed that part). Take a chance on this dress - you can pull it off too!
This is a beautiful dress. It runs true to size. I sized up and it was a little big. It's also a good length. I'm 5'7 and it wasn't too short.
Fit true to size - wouldn't recommend for broad shoulders, the way the sleeve fits the shoulder could be tricky

links_reviews_title: So striking. I wore it for a rehearsal dinner and I felt like I stood out.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and flattering. A tad tight around my hips.

links_reviews_title: Pretty but does nothing for your body
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful and very elegant! I felt very chic in it, but my only complaint is that the cape in the back drops straight down and makes your backside look like a plank. It would look lovely on someone who is tall and thin, but if you're hoping to accentuate your curves and not hide them- this is not your dress.
This was a comfortable dress, the fit was perfect. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a concert in Vegas!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable fit, sexy without being revealing, material was substantial without being too thick. Great fall dress.
The dress is very unique and I received several compliments. It was also super comfortable! It could have been a bit smaller for me, but still totally worked!

links_reviews_title: My first caped dress and it was a hit! Just call me Bat Girl!
links_reviews_text: I wore it with a strapless bra and Spanx to keep everything looking smooth and I felt great wearing this dress. I received a ton of compliments from people at the wedding. I felt comfortable and confident in it except for how surprisingly short it was when I tried to sit down. I playfully explained that I was wearing peek-a-boo Spanx to the people sitting near me and then just let it go. What can ya do? Overall, I would highly recommend this dress. It was super flattering and easy to dance and move around in. Just have to be mindful that it rides up a bit when you sit down.

links_reviews_title: A perfect fit when I didn't want to be too formal at a BTO event...
links_reviews_text: Probably my favorite dress from this site so far. For well, with a bit of give. The cape is stunning and made a great conversation piece. The length was perfect (but I'm on the shorter side) for a black tie optional event but the cape and the dramatic shoulder made it a little fun, too. Fabulous structure and great fit!

links_reviews_title: Super cool concept, just a bit too snug for me.
links_reviews_text: I loved the idea of this dress, but it just didn't work for me. I usually float between a 6 & 8, tending towards a 6. This was a little tight for me in the tummy & chest - it's a more fitted style and not necessarily comfortable for me. It was probably still wearable, but I'm opting for another dress.

links_reviews_title: Great universal dress that will look good on anyone!
links_reviews_text: I could have worn an 8 or even a 6 but the 10 was roomie and still flattering. The cape sleeve added personality but the dress was still simple enough not to clash or stand out (in a bad way) overall I enjoyed this rental!
Wore this for a superhero themed fundraiser so the cape was the perfect accent. The cape also hid my problem areas. It's a little shorter than you'd expect, even on my 5'3" frame.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress, got lots of cmpliments. Fits well and true to size
links_reviews_text: Wedding dress in winter. Classic LBD

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and Elegant-Perfect for company Holiday Party!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a backup for another selection, (that wouldn't zip) it was very pretty, perfect for my Husband's company Holiday Party. The reviews said it runs small, I agree, it fit well in the chest, but was tight in the hips. I could have sized up, but it would have been too big. Thankfully, because it was black and had the cape, it wasnt at all noticaeble. Its a great LBD that is unique and fun!! Overall, highly recommend!!
I've had my eye on this cape dress and it did not disappoint! Great twist on the LBD and the cape was a unique feature. It also make it possible to wear on a cold day.
this dress was both flattering and forgiving in all the right places. i received numerous compliments throughout the night!

This dress is gorgeous! Wore it to a fundraiser that was cocktail attire and it was perfect. I ordered the 4 but actually wore the backup size 6. I would say it runs a bit small. The zipper can be a bit difficult so assistance may be needed. I didn't wear a bra as the material is thick but I did wear nipple concealers, just in case. I didn't wear Spanx although I wish that I had so my tummy would have been flatter. This very dramatic dress was beautiful and I highly recommend it.

Love love love this dress. The cape and coupled with the one bare arm is such a showstopper! I had compliments from strangers in the street. It is made of quality material that isn't too heavy. Definitely recommend and would rent again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a wedding. I received many compliments- sexy, yet classy.
links_reviews_text: Fit well. I used clothing tape to keep shoulder of dress in place. I wore nude shoes. I'm 5'4"- 140 pounds.

links_reviews_title: Classy yet unique! So many compliments!!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! I received compliments all night long and I felt great in it

links_reviews_title: Running around NY event after event in a cape dress
links_reviews_text: Wore it for a NYFW event. Runs true to size. I ordered a 0 and got a backup 2, the size 0 fit perfectly (I'm 5'3"). Really easy to use, I chose to pick it up at the flagship store in NYC and dropped it off there as well. Thank you!

This dress looked great! It was a tad on the uncomfortable side because it was difficult to move around and still be lady like with it being short. It was also very tight on my busy area and no room for a bra. However, I received a ton of compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: Didn't look like everyone else in the room
links_reviews_text: At an event where a black cocktail dress was pretty standard, I felt sophisticated and interesting in this dress because of the cape sleeve, without being over the top. I was worried about mobility with the cape sleeve, but the dress was comfortable and I even danced in it.

I rented this for a fundraiser event. It was classy but sexy at the same time. I got so many compliments on it. It was a little tight around the butt so I went with the larger backup size. Overall a great dress!

I'm loving this cape trend! It's so glam and easy to work with! You do have to wear a strapless bra due to the one-shoulder, but the rest of the dress is loose enough that it's very flattering and comfortable without needing any special undergarments or shapewear. I rented this for a fancy nighttime wedding and it was a huge hit! It does run true to size and fell right above my knee at 5'5".

links_reviews_title: Comfy, flattering and lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress is a perfect mix of classy and fun/flirty. I love the length - was so nice to not worry about it being too short. I felt it was flattering and I got tons of compliments. Material is great for any time of year. I don't have an hourglass figure, so I'm sure that plays into how it fit, but it was a bit tight in the chest, otherwise I would have worn a 10. I'd recommend this one in a heartbeat!

I had a semi-formal event to attend, but did not want to wear your standard business formal attire. This was perfect. The cape did not weigh me down or annoy me. It added the extra flair needed to make this more than an average LBD. I ordered a size up based on other reviews. I probably could have worn my normal size, but glad I went up because it was a bit short when I sat down. Would recommend to any body type.

Really beautiful, fun, and elegant dress. Wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner held at a museum and it was perfect. I am rather large chested, so it was just a tiny bit tight across the chest. Otherwise, I feel like the fit was perfect. Also a really great length, not too short. Would rent again for a formal event in a heartbeat.

This is a great twist on a little black dress. I wore this to a school gala event and felt elegant and comfy at the same time. I am between a 4 and a 6 and decided to go with the 6. It had a better fit through the chest but was a little loose at the waist. I would rent this again!

For reference, I'm 5'1, 145 lbs, and typically a size 8-10. In higher end clothing I vary between an 8 and a 12 depending on the brand. So I think this dress ran true to size. The 10 fit great but it came damaged. The cape was torn where it met the shoulder of the dress. Rather than pay $25 to overnight another 10 I decided to go with the 12. It was fine. Notes: This dress is short. I'm pretty short and when I sat down I was very glad I wore tights with this dress and didn't go bare-legged as originally planned (thanks Florida for throwing us cold weather during Spring Break). It definitely crept up higher than mid thigh when I was sitting so if you prefer a more modest length skirt definitely pair this with tights or stockings. Speaking of, make sure if you DO wear some (because the skirt creeps up when you sit) try sitting down in your tights/hose before you go anywhere. If they have any reinforcement in the thigh area it may show when you sit. Because the weather turned out to be chillier than planned my choice of undergarments were my Spanx opaque tights. They're warm. Unfortunately they're also reinforced in the upper thigh. I had to yank them up higher to make sure that part didn't show. Be careful if you are a slip wearer. I am, and I couldn't wear one with this dress because it showed (even my short one). The lining tended to peek out when I sat down and I had to keep an eye on that. The straps to keep it on the hanger weren't too bad. I had my husband stick the back one down the back of my bra and it didn't come out all night. The front one got the same treatment and it kept trying to peek out but I kept it hidden. Tape would've helped. This dress has no give. If you're hippy definitely sit down for a bit before you choose which size you're going to wear. The 10 would've worked but I think I was more comfortable in the 12. We were at the bar before the ceremony and I was very glad of the little extra room in the hips while swinging up and down from a barstool. And getting in and out of the truck. This dress is definitely a show stopper. I received many compliments on it. My husband called it classy but sexy. But he wouldn't let me wear boots with it - he said it reminded him too much of Batgirl.
I wore this beautiful blouse to a group dinner and received a ton of compliments. It's a little bit on the fancy side so I toned it down with some ripped jeans and it was perfect.

I wore this to a fancy celebratory dinner. I got so many compliments that night, everyone wanted to know where it was from. I can't express how gorgeous this top is. Not to mention the fit... Stunning, unique and so flattering. I want it in every color! I wore it tucked into a black a line mini skirt from Aritzia.
This top was amazing, zips up back with really cool off the shoulder sleeve. I received so many compliments, I would say size up if you have broad shoulders or are busty.

This fabric is to die for, very luxe! I am usually a 4 or 6 in a top and the 10 was perfect. Sleeves were long enough for this tall girl. It is a tab short but I wasn't raise my arms much so didn't have to worry about my midsection showing.

This blouse has a unique shape but it is classy and fancy and the cut makes me look curvier than I am so that is a plus, too. Wish I could keep it! I did have a hard time figuring out which pants would match with it but it is such a pretty top that no one will be looking at your pants anyway.

links_reviews_title: Very unique and beautiful blue color!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect! True to size
Great fabric, color, unique cut. Classy with some edge. I couldn't wear as only US size 10 available...I'm usually a 6. 10 was only a bit too big overall and sleeves way too long.

I've rented this top twice it's absolutely stunning! The fabric is super luxe and the asymmetrical shoulder detail is sexy without being overly revealing. I love the ruching detail on the body also it's ultra flattering and gives you an awesome waist!
I normally wear a US Size 4 but sized up to a US size 6 and that size was perfect.
It's a gorgeous blouse, it was just a little too tight. I'm hoping to rent the next size and try again.

links_reviews_title: Luscious fabric and beautiful color. It is stunning. Very elegant for a party.
links_reviews_text: The shoulder drops. So a bra is a challenge. It’s not entirely practical, but I didn’t care because the color and fabric were so beautiful. It’s luxurious and will make you feel like a princess. Rent it!
This fits gloriously in all the right places.
Snug fit. I normally wear a 10 on top and the 14 was snug around my mid section. I would definitely size up!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top by ran small in stomach
links_reviews_text: Everything fit well other than the stomach area that had no stretch and was too tight. The zipper in the back went up fine because of the stretchy material but the front was different. Such a gorgeous top though!
While I'd fit and looked cute with white jeans I wish I had one size up
This was a fun top! Well made shirt. I got lots of compliments.

The style and color of this blouse are gorgeous, however, I ordered in US sizes and when I received the blouses, they were in European sizes which were way too small. Make sure you select the right size using a conversion chart. I missed out of this one Maybe I'll order again in the future.
Color and fabric are beautiful! Feels like a very expensive designer (which it is). The sleeves might be long for woman with medium-short arms.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous. Sleek and beautiful and highlights all the right curves.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a size 6, which is a size 2 in US measurements. I have a slim waist and wear a 32D, and it hugged me perfectly.

I rented this for a night out but was unable to wear it, even having sized up. It was too small and cropped. But the color and neckline are pretty, I would re-rent in a larger size. It seems like you would need to plan to wear with high waisted pants.
Very long sleeves, slightly awkward neckline but overall an interesting and different top
Runs very small. I normally wear a size 6 or 8 top, but in this I wear a 12.

links_reviews_title: Loved it. Great style, unusual look.
links_reviews_text: Fitted thru the waist, so not good if you have a bit of a tummy.
Wore this for a tourist day walking around Boston. It wasn't super comfortable, the top was itchy a little but it was very cute and got many compliments
I felt pretty fabulous in this at work all day. The cut was flattering and the asymmetry of the neckline was fun.
This is my favorite blouse ever! Goes from work (with blazer) to night, very well. Color, quality, and style are stunning. It was hard to send back!

links_reviews_title: Cool shirt but the sizing is off: I usually wear M or 8-10. Ordered a 12 and it was still too small
links_reviews_text: Beautiful blue fabric. Though the stretchy fabric on the back makes it look like a less classy piece, IMO.
small and just strange

This shirt really adds amazing curves to your body. It was very flattering. The cons however for a work shirt is that it really is OFF the shoulder on one side. So a shirt that looks super respectable in the photo on line is probably not ok for work for the majority of people.
Beautiful - fit true to size!
I am a size 4 rented a 6 and couldn't get it zipped. Will size up and try again
Wish I could have found the perfect bottom for this top - my jeans were the wrong tone. Wish I had some blue or white capris to go with it. I didn't end up wearing, but this top fits beautifully.
I wear a 0/2 or xs. Im a 32DD. This top fit but was definitely snug in the chest. I would have sized up eben more if i rent again

Such a comfortable fashion forward top. Material and cut are excellent. One of the sides is cinched so wear a higher wasted pant if you don't like your side exposed. Renter beware, you may get complements wearing this top.
The concept was nice. It ran narrow in the shoulders and the sleeves were really long so they pooled at my wrists. It juat didn't work for me.
Fits exactly as I expected!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for the perfect venue!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful! I received many compliments. I am 5'-6" and wore a 3-4" heel - I may have been able to get away with the regular instead of the long, as it was slightly longer than I hoped for. The bodice has silicone trim to assist with keeping it in place - It worked great!

Dress looked great other than the staves in the dress were protruding out and stabbing my armpits all night. Ran true to size. Wish I would have ordered 2 dresses on this order. Anything would have been more comfortable.

Our family reunion banquet was formal this year so I rented this dress for my daughter. All they had left was a size 2 Long but it worked out for her since she's taller than I am. The fabric is nice and thick but not too heavy. She really enjoyed the pockets.
Very comfortable, light-weight gown. I am 5’6”, and dress hem was just right or almost too short with standard heels.

I absolutely LOVED this dress! I have no regrets because this is something I'd never buy because how can you wear this more than once?? But it fit beautifully, great length, pockets, and felt heavy in the best way!

I wore this dress to a gala at the National Museum of African American History and Culture and it was a hit! I was nervous about the chest, but the dress stayed up pretty well with a thin, strapless bra and was floor length with a 2-inch heel. When I sat down, I did have to pull the dress up a few times, but it didn't happen enough for it be a con (plus I've come to expect it with my bust size :))The dress wasn't as heavy as I thought it would be which made it perfect for a winter event, but not too hot once I got inside. Did not need to be ironed and didn't wrinkle throughout the night. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: This dress is more stunning in person with its rich colors and the comfort level was 100.
links_reviews_text: Excellent fit. Bra unnecessary due to the binding. Pockets were a plus!

I'm 5'7", 125 lbs, and normally wear a size 2. I rented a 2L in this dress. I did hem the dress with Hollywood tape 1/2 inch. I could have worn a higher heel and left it alone. I think mine were 3 inches. I wear a 32 DD and I did feel like the dress was a tad loose on top. I wore a longline bra underneath to help keep it in place along with Hollywood tape. Dress was stunning and different. I paired it with a small necklace and sparkly blue earrings I found on Amazon.

This dress makes you feel amazing and is comfortable. It fits great and is structured enough to stay up. The gold is very metallic but the dress is not too over the top. Get this dress if you are thinking about it!
Fit was amazing and I got many compliments

links_reviews_title: This dress was even more beautiful in person! Be prepared to be complimented all night!
links_reviews_text: The gold makes the dress sparkle and shine without being flashy. It's a ball gown with just enough fullness without swallowing my frame. The pockets were a huge bonus, since I didn't need to carry a purse for the evening. I usually don't do strapless dresses, but this one stayed up. To note: it's meant for a smaller bust and longer torso; I'm full busted and short waisted and had to adjust it a few times to make it work. That aside, this dress was beautiful and I felt great in it.

Literally cannot say enough good things about this dress. I received compliments all night - even from the bride! There are pockets which is the greatest. It fits perfectly. Don't need a bra. Hides all tummy and leg flaws. Feel like a princess in it. So so so perfect. Gorgeous dress.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. So comfortable, and with pockets. I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'2 and 140 lbs. size 6R was great. I did have to do a quick hem. I had on 3" heels and was still to long.
The dress for perfectly and I received so many compliments that’s evening. It is long so I had to wear 3 inch heels because I’m 5’3” but I felt like the Belle of the Ball.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments and felt like a queen! The pockets are a plus too!
links_reviews_text: The dress is gorgeous! The pattern is everything. It's really long though so I had to do a temporary hem because I didn't want to wear taller than a 4in heel. I love the fit, although the top was a bit big (I could have gone with a 6). I could be spanx free and still look and feel beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a princess AND it has pockets!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress and received so many compliments! It was my first time renting, but definitely not the last! The top was sturdy enough that I didn't need a bra, and there is an adjustable hook at the midpoint of the back zipper that was great for getting the fit just right around my rib cage. Not once did I feel like the dress was falling down, which is rare for a strapless. The pockets were an added bonus and definitely a selling point as well! I wore 4 inch heels and the dress just brushed the ground. Overall a great first rental experience!
This dress was my back up size 8, typically a 6. Other dress choice very classic, but when I put this in, I felt like a goddesss. Fits true to size, just a little big up top for me.

I'm usually pretty skeptical about strapless dresses because I don't want to constantly have to pull them up all night, but this dress was amazing! I didn't have any problems with it, the fit was great, and I absolutely loved how I looked in it. The dress is a little but lengthy though, so I'd suggest wearing heels with it. I am about 5'4" and wore 4" heels with the outfit.

links_reviews_title: Worn to gala event, elegant and unique
links_reviews_text: Among a sea of women in tight red or black sheath dresses, this one really stood out. It's unique and beautiful, the metallic detailing is awesome and very me. I felt like a princess. The pockets are an added plus too. I am super short and had to pin this up for myself, but I expected that. You can tell this dress has been stepped on a lot and there's a bit of fraying on the liner but nothing crazy or visible. I loved the built in bra and not having to wear a strapless bra because I hate my strapless bra. This dress was super comfortable too. I wasn't the only woman at the event wearing the dress but that's ok - we both rocked it in our own way. Rent it for your next event!

links_reviews_title: This dress was incredible! It was so beautiful, flowy, and comfortable. True to size!
links_reviews_text: All night I couldn't stop getting compliments on this dress! It's so comfortable and beautiful. It needs at least 2-3 inch heels for it to lay well on the ground/ slightly above. I'm 5'6, 145 pounds, and wear a 36C and this dress fit me great. And doesn't need a bra! Can comfortably wear and be supported.

I ordered the dress in both 6 and 8; ended up wearing the 6. I knew from the reviews and photos that the dress would be stunning, and it did not disappoint. I stood out (in a good way!) in a sea of black and red gowns at a function held during Valentine's weekend. I received many compliments that evening and even more when I posted photos on social media. The only downside (which I also knew from previous reviews) was the length. I wore 3" heels and had to tack the dress and lining hems up 3". Other than that, it was a terrific dress that made me feel terrific!
Fit super and loved the dress. Received many compliments and the pockets always make me happy!
Good fit really pretty in person, navy bronze and gold too long next time I'd order the 2 reg

Beautiful dress, although the fabric was thinner/less substantial than I'd expected from a brocade. Also thought it would be fuller, but the tulle on the underskirt was totally limp. That said, I got compliments on the gown throughout the night. And I loved having pockets! If you're short, plan on wearing your highest heels!!

links_reviews_title: Great friends and a lot of fun. The dress was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. I had to wear 5” heels and it was good.

Fit true to size, I usually wear a 4 and the length was almost too long but fine with my heels. For some reason I thought it was black but it is navy so plan accordingly! It was pretty comfortable and has two hooks inside to snugly fit around the top so I wasn't pulling it up all night. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: The most gorgeous dress I've ever worn -- compliments all evening
links_reviews_text: This dress was extremely flattering and the fabric/pattern were drop dead gorgeous. The dress reflected beautifully under the event lighting. I've never felt so beautiful. All evening, strangers were coming up and complimenting me over the dress. It fit just right. You will need help with zipping it up. I wore the long version with high heels. Would not recommend the Long for anyone shorter than 5'5. All in all, I will definitely rent this again. Plus it has pockets!

links_reviews_title: Compliments all night highly recomend Rent the Runway.
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful however it is very long I feel it runs small in size, the zipper is dificult to handle.

I'm 6'0 and this dress was fantastic. It was slightly tight in the ribcage but I could still comfortably sit, eat, and move around. I wore it to a black tie holiday party for my husband's work and people loved it! In the dark lighting the dress really sparkled. The zipper is very difficult to do the first couple of times- I had to have help. I wore flats though could have worn a bit of a heel. I also wore leggings under to stay warm! Comfortable and felt beautiful! I also tried on the size 8 but it was too large and felt like it might fall down.

links_reviews_title: Umm, hello dresses with pockets! Plus it was comfortable and flattering
links_reviews_text: Because I wasn't sure of the length, I ordered the long. Perfect with heels, or in my case: platform sneakers. They weren't going to see my feet anyway :-) If you're looking for a unique and comfortable dress to bring out your inner beauty: you've found it!

links_reviews_title: Fabulous, Unique Dress for Black Tie Wedding
links_reviews_text: I absolutely LOVED this dress! Based on other reviewers, I initially ordered my regular size and a size up. However, my chest and waist are significantly smaller than my bottom half, so both sizes were too big! Fortunately, they had the 8L in stock and it fit so much better. I'm 5'8" and wore 3.5 inch heels, and it was still a smidge long, so take that into consideration when ordering. The print is so unique; love the color combo. I received so many compliments, even from people who weren't guests at the wedding! My only true gripe was the strings to keep the dress on the hangar (not sure what those are called?) kept popping out of the dress. Aside from that, I highly recommend renting this gorgeous gown if you want to stand out in a crowd!

This dress is beautiful and flattering. I loved the length on it-I ordered 8L and I could still wear 3 inch heels with it. I'm right at 5'10" and have an athletic build. I wish the top had fit a little more snug but otherwise it fit perfectly. I wore it for a black tie NYE wedding.

links_reviews_title: Eye catching, gorgeous pattern and texture
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a gala and got a ton of compliments. I wore 3 inch heels and it looked great but I sometimes got caught in the dress as I walked. I think that's just the nature of a long gown though. The top was slightly bigger than I would have liked but the waist was perfect. The dress is very high quality.

This dress was gorgeous and very different from the typical black dress everyone wears to formal black tie events. I loved how easily it stayed up and the length was perfect with 3-4 inch heels. Everyone loved it as well and some were even asking where I got it!

links_reviews_title: LOVE this dress, I got so many compliments, and did I mention - POCKETS! Perfect for a black tie!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, although it would have fit even better if I saw the bra clip before I wore it. I'm 5'9" and it was long enough for me to wear 3" to 5" heels (I wore 2" in the photo).
Love, love, loooooooove! Get it!
Fun dress! And POCKETS! I wore this to a formal Christmas work party. So many compliments! The metallic really shines.

This was a very pretty dress! I wore it to a quinceanera. I am 5'1" & 105lbs. 32C. The 0R fit pretty great. I used hem tape of course, since I'm very petite. I felt it was a tiny bit loose at the bust and was afraid I would be yanking it up all night, but it worked out. I don't think I'd be able to let loose on the dance floor though. I loved the shimmery gold. I wore a strapless bra. I wore black pumps. Brown or navy would've matched better, but no one could see them anyway. I also wore a brown shawl with it but I think a shimmery gold shawl would've been nicer. I was very happy with this dress!

links_reviews_title: I attended a gala to celebrate my Sorority chapter anniversary.
links_reviews_text: I was unsure if I needed an 8 or 10. I'm normally a size 8. I'm really not top heavy, but I wanted to make sure the dress would zip up, so I requested both sizes. The size 8 was too tight and I was unable to zip it, but the 10 fit perfect. I'm 5'4" so the dress brushed the floor a little bit, but I had on 3" heels. I did not want to carry around a clutch, so I truly appreciated the pockets! I received so many compliments. The material was thick and had the right amount of weight. It was PERFECT! This dress is absolutely gorgeous. I was different and this dress made me stand out. My confidence level was definitely on a 10. I would definitely recommend this dress!
Great for day to evening. Loved the bold color and fit like a glove.
I loved the bright blue color! It is a little tight for the office. The sleeves make the dress!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress!!! Wish it was a bit longer... but overall fits perfectly. Classy and sexy.
links_reviews_text: Might rent again

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear it due to the pointed seams on each breast. Looked like I was very cold.
links_reviews_text: Loved the color, length, and material. Unfortunately, the points on the chest ruled out the option to actually wear it.
This sides puckered out at the hips on me so I did not wear it.
A bit snug in stomach

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, lots of compliments, doesn't wrinkle
links_reviews_text: It's bigger up top then on bottom which prevents it from being perfect. Style is cute, though, so it's great for a rental. Gorgeous color and travels well (I had drive in it for 4 hours to get to a work function)
Love fit and fun sleeves

links_reviews_title: Unable to wear because it runs small
links_reviews_text: The length is short. Not for formal wear. Runs small

links_reviews_title: Awkward Silhouette, Didn't Work For Me
links_reviews_text: Cute dress and color but the shape was all wrong. It was tight on the bottom and big on top. I'm a 32F so for anything to be too big on top is unusual.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress once I received it. There wasn't anything wrong with it. Not my style.
links_reviews_text: I did not wear this dress. Once I received it it was just too conservative for my style.
