I really wanted to rent the dress and ended up going smaller than my normal size (but still within my normal range). It fit, but was a little too tight for me to wear comfortably and confidently, so I ended up returning it. I'll rent it again but in my normal size. It was really cute, just a little tight in the stomach on the smaller size.

links_reviews_title: snug on the bottom fit a little big on top
links_reviews_text: beautiful dress and great color better for larger chest and narrow hip person
overall great fit, comfortable semi stretchy material

links_reviews_title: Loved the scuba material and print
links_reviews_text: Fun to wear to the office and outside of my usual style. Fit was flattering but showed off my curves. Could be considered too snug for the office.

This is such a cute dress and I really wanted to wear it but it runs really small. I normally wear a size 2/4 and not only could I not zip this dress but it would've been way too short even if I had. I also think that if you have a long torso don't even try to rent this.
This dress is definitely shorter and tighter than expected but looks good on! Great for work + fun

This would be great if you are petite but not great for anyone with a longer torso. It is a scuba type material and the pattern is cute, but the bottom half was so short and the seam hit at such a weird place.
The fabric feels like it could be a dance recital costume. It's stretchy but not in the right way. The dress was too short and way too tight around the arms
Where it flares out is tight if you have hips!
I liked the look but squeezed me like a sausage. Going to try a medium!

links_reviews_title: Wear this to a luncheon. If it's a little tight in the upper chest area but showed beautifully
links_reviews_text: Definitely recommend for a work event
Really liked the design of the dress but couldn't wear it because it runs way too small.

links_reviews_title: Probably not good for work but cute for date night!
links_reviews_text: An interesting and cute dress. It's a bit short, even for a shortie like me (5'0). With tights, it could be work appropriate. The fabric is a thin, scuba like material that makes it less heavy than the standard scuba fabric.
A little tight through the shoulders
I love this dress! Great for wearing it during the day with flats and dressing it up for night time too! The material expands easily and hugs your curves.
Wore this to work and got lots of compliments. High quality fabric, good structure and nice lines.
I typically wear M-L, so I went with the L based on other reviewers. Couldn't even get it over my waist.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress.
links_reviews_text: The fit was smaller than I expected. While I could have worn it, it was too tight for my comfort. Had I ordered it in the small size I might have worn it. The print is not as elegant as it appears in the photo.
I sized up in this dress, and it was still skin tight.
I usually wear an XS or S and even this S felt a tad sung.
Runs very small. Otherwise cute and flattering. Probably a bit young for me (in my 40's). But ok for a day I am not meeting clients etc.
Really comfortable and very flattering.

I loved the print and fit of this dress! However the bottom is very flowy and hits right under your bum, because of this it's very prone to flipping up in the wind. Didn't enjoy having to hold down the bottom when I went out for my lunch break! Shorter women probably wouldn't have this issue with the dress though!

links_reviews_title: cute dress but runs small and is very short.
links_reviews_text: cute dress, well cut and comfortable but runs small and is very short.
I had rented another dress from this brand that ran small so I ordered one size up but it was still to small. Will order again on a larger size.
Great print, flattering lines, runs small.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much that I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Fit a little small & rides up a bit, but so cute! Got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Super cute but doesn't fit great
links_reviews_text: I normally get XS, couldn't wear it because it was so small, returned and ordered S. Wore to work but was a bit awkward fitting and veryyy short. Cute and got a bunch of compliments but won't rent again

This dress was super flattering so I ended up purchasing it. It is quite form fitting around the waist and belly area so you could size up. I normally wear a 4 and I wore a medium. Fabric is really light and great for summer.

This was super cute but it didn't fit. I was able to zip it up but couldn't breath since it was so tight on. I ended up not wearing it since I didn't get a 2nd size. If you are a true XS I would order the next size up for this.
Fits very small and is unlined.
TOO SMALL

links_reviews_title: Fun J lo snakeskin party dress, sexy and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Loved the tiny sequins and tie neck halter was adjustable and comfortable. Fun dress
Loved this dress. You def need biker shorts underneath and maybe some tape for the fabric that rubs your skin wrong. Overall it was a hit and sexy to wear.

I've turned to RTR to rent dresses for all my sorority events and this one didn't disappoint !! Only downside was that the sequins rubs a little right by your armpits, but the rest of the dress was so stunning and flattering I'm still giving it a 5/5!
Really cute but super short!
Great cocktail dress. Plenty of shimmer.
The slit is right in the middle making it impossible to dance in without flashing people. Also the waist is super small with a larger bust area which fits weird.

links_reviews_title: Wedding reception party for my daughter! She picked it and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Felt like butter and was a perfect fit! Loved!
I LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress.... It was so comfortable. You can not wear spanx with it because of the side, or a bra (well I wore one cup)

I rented this dress for a black tie wedding- it wasn't originally my first choice, but I picked it last minute... I am SO glad I did. I have never received more compliments on a dress in my LIFE. It's a little tricky with the whole side being exposed really, however the material is thick enough where I didn't need a bra and I wore thin low-cut underwear. I paired with simple jewelry (diamond studs, diamond pendant and bracelet) and black heels... perfection!!

links_reviews_title: It felt as good as it looked
links_reviews_text: Great fit! So many compliments! Sized up due to length

THIS DRESS! I need to start with the fit because it was perfect. Hugged in all the right areas and looked like it was perfectly tailored. The mesh panels were incredible quality and comfortable enough to dance in all night while still feeling like a movie star. The satin was amazing with a perfect liner that made the inside feel as amazing as the outside. I was concerned about the material being unforgiving but this designer is such high quality that the second I took it out of the bag I knew that wouldn't be an issue. The weight of the garment itself speaks to its craftsmanship, but isn't something you notice the moment you put it on. Sexy, chic, without being revealing. RENT IT!!!

This is one of the best dresses I've rented and I've been using this service for years. The 4R was perfect -- perfect length (just grazed the floor) and the extremely comfortable (I'm 5'5, 130lbs, wore 2.5 inch heels.. which you could see just my toes in this dress). The mesh/nude side is such a sexy addition to an otherwise conservative dress. The open side part does dip low so be careful your underwear doesn't peek through. The material is amazing and the detail at the top looks great in person and pictures. It was very flattering and I felt like a million bucks.

links_reviews_title: This dress is a show stopper!
links_reviews_text: Flattering to a max! It is easy to wear and move in. The quality is obvious and can be felt as well. I am 5'3 and the length was perfect... even let me show off my pumps:) So many compliments all evening long.
Trendy but classic
This dress was stunning! It was perfect for the event I rented it for, would highly recommend!!
It was very sexy and screamed red carpet. It fit true to size. You can wear a sticky bra.
I was worried the length would be too long, but with heels and petite size I didn't need any alterations. I'd recommend no underwear with this one. Beautiful gown!

I love the drama in this dress and the fit is really nice. I have broad shoulders so I ended up wearing a different dress. I'm also a 36DD and felt like if I had danced in this, my one side might have made an unwanted appearance but such a jaw dropping dress that I might have risked it if I hadn't rented a different one that I adored!

Fit beautifully. I received a ton of compliments. Only thing was the thin strap on the inside for hanging the gown was really long and kept showing in the area of the cutout no matter how often I tucked it back in.
got lots of compliments! pretty dress
Loved this dress! SO many compliments on this dress. Runs a little tight in the bust if you have anything over a C cup. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a tall chick who can go braless!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, interesting details, covers well with subtle peeks of skin

This dress is very flattering it has a great thick liner so you don't see any lumps and bumps it is difficult to wear any kind of spanks underneath because of the cut out on the side. I wore a nu-bra (chicken cutlet style) & it worked great! I'm 5'9" And I wore a 3 inch heel and the long was the perfect length
The levels of confidence this dress made me feel was unreal. Wore a size 4R --5'6, 138 lbs, 34DD. 3 days after the event and I'm still getting Compliments on the dress. Memorable for sure!

I rented this dress for a New Year's eve party. The dress itself is extremely beautiful and soft to the touch. I am smaller chested so the dress was a little loose on the top but if you are larger in the chest area, then the dress should fit perfectly. I didn't wear a bra with this dress but I'm sure sticky bras would work with it. I wore 5 inch heels with this dress so the dress just lightly skim the floor with the 4L. 10/10!!
It fit my more athletic figure very well, as well as my roommate's more hourglass figure. The material was soft and high quality. I felt like a movie star.

links_reviews_title: This dress is gorgeous. Classy & sexy.
links_reviews_text: Fit well. I'm 5'7" and it was just the right length with heels
Sleek silhouette makes for a gorgeous and classy gown! I felt like a million dollars in this dress. I have broad swimmers shoulders and an athletic build and Kaufman Franco always fits me well.

This was a replacement of a replacement of a replacement for the Theia dress I reserved back in September for my husband's black tie holiday party. I was not too happy with RTR, I gotta tell you, and I expected nothing to fit with the last minute selections I had to pick from. Man, was I wrong. Ladies. This dress is amazing. For all the 5'1" shorties with no boobs, thick thighs, butt-is-your-best-asset, Crossfitter-type bodies, this gown in petite is freakin' PERFECTION. GET IT. I am not a fan of high heels and my 3" worked fabulous with it. No stretch, and I wore a Stickeebra with no underwear for the cutouts. I felt like a queen all night long.
Th gown was gorgeous and extremely comfortable. Was sexy without having to be concerned about a wardrobe malfunction. Material felt so expensive. Many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Omg! Non stop compliments all night and days to pass!
links_reviews_text: This dress is an absolute dream. So comfortable and elegant. I got a new compliment every 20 minutes. People came up to me all night asking where I got it. I might buy it I'm so dreamy over it. My boyfriend almost fell over when I put it on!

Wore this gown to a formal event and got tons of compliments! I normally need an 8 in dresses to accommodate my chest but the 6 fit perfectly. I am 5'6" and wore 4" heels which made the regular length dress come just an inch off the ground. It pairs well with the Alexis Bittar brutalist earrings. Was truly a hit and I felt glamorous without being stuffy formal.

Dress was okay and material wasn't too flattering for my body, but the material felt very nice on my skin. The see-through mesh made me feel kind of naked. If it wasn't a work event, I may not have cared. I was surprised the length fit me (2R and 5'2") - it usually doesn't for "reg" sizes. I ended up returning the dress.
Be aware of the cutout - my tattoos happened to be perfectly placed to show off. This dress is amazing.
Here's a picture of the side panel. It's a clever dress but size down. I sized up & it looked awkward. I would try it again in a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this. The cut outs make wearing any bras or underwear impossible.
links_reviews_text: You can't wear any underwear. Really pretty and super sexy but not right for a wedding.

links_reviews_title: Black tie wedding elegant and fashion forward gown
links_reviews_text: This dress was so glam! Was worn with the NuBra since there is see-through mesh on one of the sides. Very comfortable and elegant. I am 510 and wore this dress with 3 inch heels. A little bit of arm restriction but was still able to dance.
I felt so great in this dress. It fit like a glove and the material was excellent quality. Wore to a black tie wedding and received compliments all night long.

Loved this dress and got tons of compliments. The fabric is thick and luxe and feels expensive. I'm 5'8" and found it slightly short on the hem so if you're any taller I would opt for L instead of R. Also might not be best for those with a larger bust as the cutouts make it impossible to wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress - runs a little big
links_reviews_text: This dress was so beautifully made and cut beautifully. I looked at all the reviews and went up a size. I usually have to wear shapewear to smooth my belly bumps (from two major abdominal surgeries). Didn't need it with this dress - the fabric lay perfectly. I was actually able to wear regular seamless underwear and it didn't show through the mesh side panel! Wore an adhesive bra as well. I rented it for a black tie wedding. The only tough part was trying not to step on the train when I was dancing.
Dress is so flattering and sexy. Wore it for a black tie gala and received compliments all night. The asymmetrical length allows me to show off my shoes too!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress, fun and sexy but with class
links_reviews_text: The most amazing dress I rented to date. Wish I had a reason to wear it more often.
Loved this dress so much! It fits like a glove.

links_reviews_title: Not this excited since my wedding gown!
links_reviews_text: Not your typical LBD! The illusion panels on this gown amp up the sexy factor while remaining very classy for a black tie event. I'm 5 foot two and I found some cheap heels at forever 21 that had approx 3 inch platforms and a 5 inch heel which made the length perfect on the regular length dress. There will still be a slight train in the back as the dress is made for that. The dress feels like silk and the panels are sewn in a diagonal. It feels like butter on your body or the most comfortable silk pajamas ever. I cannot recommend enough it is stunning! II wore a nubra and you can get away with very tiny undies if you want. I wore with the RTR Kenneth Jay Lane Crystal waterfall earrings and they were cascading diamonds from my ears!!!
Perfect fit for my hourglass shape. I have Broad shoulders, a small waist and full hips but the dress flattered it all. A week later people were still talking about the gorgeous dress.
This dress was so comfortable and easy to wear. It was a bit out of my comfort zone but I was so glad I chose it. It was perfect for our Bond-themed event.
The dress is perfect and does not need a bra. The only thing I found weird was a bit of a bubble butt effect, but I didn't mind
My daughter (pictured) wore this dress to her winter formal. It fit like a glove and was very flattering.
Fit perfectly and I stood out

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a college formal!
links_reviews_text: It ran true to size, was super comfortable, and very flattering. Highly recommend!!

I was really hesitant about this dress while I was waiting for it to come in, thinking I had made a mistake. I was so wrong! As soon as I tried it on, it was so beautiful on me. The only complaints I have are the big stomach area compared to the relatively tight chest and butt. I got endless compliments. Showed just the right amount of skin and a really beautiful color.

links_reviews_title: This dress is off the charts
links_reviews_text: Show stopper
Fit tight just like it is supposed to and the cutouts hit right in the perfect spot. Had some stretch so it was still comfortable. Perfect for a Miami night out! The earrings and bar are RTR as well!
Fit okay, just didn't end up liking the style. It was a little baggier than I wanted and a little too much fabric around the thighs
The bust area was a bit big and couldn't add a bra because of the straps back but was grand! Wore for a rehearsal dinner. Love the block colors and cutouts.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my bachelorette party
links_reviews_text: This dress was a thick material, it fit comfortably, and it was very flattering. As a flat chested woman, I could comfortably not wear a bra with this outfit.

I wore this to a daytime semi-formal event and I'm glad I did because I felt like a million bucks! The side cutouts showed a little skin, but the dress was still sophisticated enough that I felt appreciate. I would definitely rent this again.
I wish it was a tad tighter. But it was flattering around my stomach! Got lots of compliments! It's fun and flirty!
This dress was perfect for a spring wedding. I normally wear a 6 but the 4 fit great! I was comfortable all night wearing this even while dancing! Definitely recommend for any special event
Loved!

i’m a small 0 so i was expecting it to fit a little big. it actually fit pretty well but if i was being nitpicky i would say that the waist was a little big and the dress was a little to long for me (lower mid thigh). definitely was room in the chest area but it still looked good!

LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress! Fit quite well. It's not too short, but still pretty short to be sassy. I was confortable dancing in it. I did not wear a bra with it. Probably would fit a B cup a little better (I am an A), but I can't imagine it working super well for very busty women. Highly recommend!

This dress fit great and was really fun to wear to both a holiday party and then a bday party dancing night out for a friend. Cool colors that I never would have put together in my own but it worked. Can't wear a regular bra (pic here taken in RTR dressing room). I wore one of those bras you just stick on without a back and it worked.

I rented this in sizes 4&6 and I went with the size 4. I'm 5'2" and weigh about 125 pounds. I also wore spanx underneath with no issues. The material wasn't as thick as I hoped, and the spanx helped smooth everything out. I was complimented on this dress all night long. The only issue I had was getting the back hook closed. I struggled for like 5 minutes with that to get the dress on but otherwise it was perfect. The cutouts and different shades of red were a perfect combo. I also wore a nubra, as I'm small chested and it did not look right without a bra (you can't wear a regular strapless dye to the openings in the back). I will definitely rent again.

I wasn't to sure about this dress at first, but when it arrived at my house, i fell in love. Im a 34C and would recommend wearing a sticky bra or tapping your boobs with this dress. It was very breathable, comfortable and easy to dance in. The back was definitely the best part of the dress. The only thing i had a problem with throughout the was when i would walk it would tend to ride up my legs. I received many compliments throughout the night and would recommend this dress for a homecoming dance.

This fits true to size. I have a somewhat larger ribcage and this fit great. No bra needed, and I'm a 32-34B. I'm also very picky about fabric and cut, and this material was comfortable and allowed me to dance all night without being uncomfortable or making adjustments.

Maybe I just dont have the correct body type but I ended up not wearing this 1. Beacause I didnt like the fit 2. It ended up being very cold for my event that day. I wanted to like it and maybe if I would have worked a little bit with it I would have. It was very cute on the hanger and very high quality feeling

Warning: this dress will turn heads! I would never attempt to pull off this style of dress, but it fit me perfectly and I didnt want to take it off! I received endless complements. The fabric has a little stretch,so I was able to eat and dance the night away. I'm flat chested and got away with just some pasties- no bra.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit nicely and looked beautiful. Comfortable and thick fabric to cover flaws.
links_reviews_text: When I got it, I assumed I was going to have to wear the size 8, however, when the dress arrived the clasp on the back of the dress to connect the straps was missing and I was forced to wear the 6. Luckily, it fit nicely. The dress is beautiful, prefect for those girls like me with a larger butt and small waist.
A little tight, but fits like a glove and is stunning! Loved the unique design and bright color!
I got so many compliments on this sassy red cocktail dress for our company holiday party! Fits great and the back is secure enough that I didn't have to wear a bra.
Recommend size down, got lots of compliments

The dress was gorgeous!! I ordered a 2 with a backup size of a 4. The 4 was way too big, and I think I could have sized down to a 0 if I needed/wanted to. The bust area of the dress was a little roomy (I’m a 32 C for reference), and it was a tad long on me. But I received so many compliments! The back is absolutely stunning on, I wish I would have gotten a picture. Very comfortable, unique dress :)
Pro: well made, nice cut outs ... I didn't have to wear a bra. Con: can't really think of any

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments in this dress.
links_reviews_text: this fit true to size and was nice quality. The color is gorgeous. It was exactly what I was looking for.
This dress is sexy yet classy. The 4 fit me true to size and the material was very stretchy and lightweight. I wore it for my 1 year anniversary and my husband loved it.
Loved this dress! They didn't have a size 4 so I went a size up. Ended up being a little baggy but comfortable and I like the subtle side cutouts.

links_reviews_title: It was a great much needed date night with my bf!
links_reviews_text: Really great fit for a fancy date night out! Loved the dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Flattering cut and unique two tone red!
links_reviews_text: Unique dress to stand out.
too much room on top for a 32 bra size.
Loooooved it. Comfy and cute and helped me stand out.

links_reviews_title: Great color and exactly as pictured!
links_reviews_text: Fit super well and looks exactly like the photo. It was my first time wearing cutouts in a dress and this worked as the cutouts weren't too crazy big. I wore a backless, strapless bra that taped on the sides and it worked out well. It was actually good that the dress top was snug with a bra, so I didn't have to worry about the tape giving way :) Easy to dance, sit, and walk around in. Great for Vegas or a night on the town!
Such an amazing, flattering dress. Very unique and easy to wear. I did not need a bra.
Runs small but super cute!
Wore for Valentine's and it's super sexy (while not being too much). Bf was a big fan.
cute dress but didn't fit... boxy shape and too big in the waist
Wore this for my sisters civil ceremony and it was the perfect easy going dress throw on and still be dressy yet comfortable. Love the lace details
I loved it and got tons of compliments!! I went with the smallest size bc it was too big around the chest area
Wore this to a rehearsal dinner. I normally wear a 2, this fit perfectly. It is comfortable and very flattering. It has a classy look to it. I actually ended up buying it!

Wore this dress to the formal "welcome party" for all the wedding guests. I'm normally a 6/8 on bottom and wore the 6R, so it was no surprise that the bottom of the dress was slightly small on me! Reading the comments it says that this dress is restrictive and would be hard to dance in because the fabric doesn't have stretch, completely agree! Otherwise, loved this dress and received many compliments!
Pretty dress, comfortable and easy to wear

links_reviews_title: Wish I could keep this dress
links_reviews_text: Love the fitting of this dress.

This beautiful dress was perfect for my sister bridal shower! I wear a size 4 or 6 in dresses - the 4 was too large up top, so I got The 2 which worked perfectly. I love the wide straps, the overlay at the top and the ruffle at the bottom. It’s definitely long for shorties like me, but I still loved wearing it, and received lots of compliments!
Cute and unique. Great fit
This was my favorite rent the runway dress! Received compliments all day! Fit perfectly and very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect dress for my birthday dinner, I got a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 4 & 6 and wore the 6, if you have a pear or hourglass figure I recommend sizing up. The zipper was a little difficult even before putting the dress on because the material got caught easily. Other than that, it's the perfect dress to highlight curves and really complimented my figure.
Lots of compliments, fairly light dress, no stretch, loved it over all

Considering buying this dress. I absolutely loved the fit and the movement. The detail of the fabric is so great and the colors are perfect for a spring outdoor wedding. I have a bigger booty so sometimes I worry about the top and bottom both fitting on more fitted dresses, but this was perfect. The fabric had just a little bit of give, so I would size up if you're worried about sizing, but otherwise true to size.

I rented this for a September wedding and absolutely loved it. The details are beautiful and I got tons of compliments all night. The zipper is a little tough through the lace but not a big deal overall. Can't wait to rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for pre-wedding afternoon celebration at Lake Minnetonka
links_reviews_text: I thought this dress fabric might be too heavy for the August MInneapolis heat, but it was a fantastic choice. Received many compliments! Super comfortable.
This is a very fun and comfortable dress perfect for going out. Dress it up or down. A real favorite. Only con -- as with most lace dresses the zipper is difficult.
I absolutely loved this dress, fit very well and felt it was very flattering on. It had a romantic vibe and also very unique. I wore to an outdoor summer wedding and felt great. Would rent again!

I wore this to a garden wedding and I got compliments the entire night (even from the bride!) The fit of the sheath itself was great but felt the straps were a little big (they kept falling down but it wasn't anything serious). The length is quite long, I am 5'10.5 and it hit me around my shins. One thing to note is the fabric isn't that stretchy but I didn't expect it to be.
Loved this dress. It was very high quality and looked great on my brunch date with friends!

links_reviews_title: Wore to my aunt's summer funeral
links_reviews_text: Long enough, and fabric was thick enough to wear to a formal event. I got lots of compliments from close family

links_reviews_title: Great summer dress to show off a tan
links_reviews_text: Really pretty dress, great for photos and made for a tan. May need help with zipper.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and easy to dance in!
links_reviews_text: I didn't love the colors but very flattering!

I love this super cute crochet dress by Shoshanna! Running small with no stretch, I recommend wearing a size up for your primary size. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works best for A - C cups sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this, so you should wear a strapless bra since the back is open. At 5'4 , the length hit tea length on me. Intricate crochet lace from Estepona, Spain tiers swath this lovely sheath dress further accented with a pop-over overlay and peekaboo trumpet hem. I would recommend pairing with a cute bracelet and wedges to get the full look.
Really pretty dress. Loved the pop-over. A little on the large size, but I feel most shoshana dresses run on the larger end. Nice soft rose colors. Would love to wear this one again.
I got tons of complements on this dress but it's a bit stiff and tight, making it a little uncomfortable to wear in hot weather. Overall though such a beautiful and high quality piece.

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated elegance yet comfortable for the Grand Prix in Monaco
links_reviews_text: Easy to put on, figure forgiving, elegant, perfect for an outdoor event, not heavy, perfect dress. I'm 5'1 and it made me look taller and the design is good to detract from midsection

Wore it for a baby shower, birthday dinner and to work with a sweater over - perfect for all occasions, amazing fabric and colors, infinite compliment. Not stretchy but very comfortable with space to breath

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my husbands grad school graduation!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress...got so many compliments! It does run large, I ended up sizing down into my backup size and it fit like a glove. Wished I could have kept it!
Pretty dress, flattering fit, runs small!
Pretty dress, feminine but comfortable

links_reviews_title: Comfy and stylish for a hot summer night!
links_reviews_text: Such a sophisticated fun dress for a date night!
Loved this dress, wore to an informal wedding and got a ton of compliments. Fit well throughout, didn't find it restricting at all around legs as some other reviewers. Would rent again!
I didn't find this as flattering in person as in the pictures
This size too big and I think smaller would've been too tight.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but wrong size. Will try again.
links_reviews_text: I sized up on this dress based on reviews that it ran snug through the hips but the dress was huge on me and I could not wear it.
Dress run a little small and did not have enough stretch for more curvier women.
Didn't end up wearing. No stretch. Not bad dress but did not fit. The lace color was not my fav either.
Color is a little dull

I got this as a backup when my original order didn't fit. I didn't end up wearing because I liked my other choice, better. However, this dress is really cute. It was a little big up top for me, which was another reason I passed on wearing, but a great dress for summer!
Such a beautiful summer dress! I was expecting it to be tighter since I'm usually a 4 the fit was perfect and it's so flattering
Beautiful lace, fit well (I am between a four and six and this was a little big but wearable). Just all around a very lovely dress. Compliments all night

Dress was super cute and I loved how the fit looked! The off the shoulder arm straps were pretty tight which is why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5, but it didn't stop me from loving the dress. I am 5'2" and I wore a small wedge but the dress was a tiny bit long on me still.

I was nervous if the dress would fit but it was perfect. It was a little big on top but that is because I am not full figured AT ALL. I was so comfortable in the dress and didn't even feel like I needed to wear spanx. I am larger around my midsection but this dress made me feel like I didn't have to worry about my insecurities. I can't wait for my next event!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: I just loved this dress so much. It was comfortable and I felt really classy and pretty in it. The shoulder straps did restrict movement a little but I felt that was to be expected; they were definitely not as restrictive as I thought though. The length was perfect for me with 3 inch heels. The 6 fit me well... the bust was a little bit big without a bra but a strapless bra worked perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and perfect for the occasion
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great and was very comfortable, although the off-the-shoulder sleeves were a bit tight. It was perfect for the gala I attended.

Wore this to my husbands military event. I ordered the size 10 and 12. Both fit comfortably but decided to wear the 12 for a little more wiggle room on my arms. I am 5'3" and 160lbs. I got soo many compliments and the dress was very flattering in all the right places. I have 2 children and wanted to hide my stomach area. The dress material is thick and I felt very comfortable in it! I would definitely rent this dress again and again!

links_reviews_title: Dancing and having a great time with friends
links_reviews_text: Loved it for a Black Tie NYE Wedding. True to size, ordered a 4 and a 6. Went with the 4 since it was slightly more form fitting. Only complaint would be that the arms were a little constricting, which I guess is to be expected with this style.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work event or formal party!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit great, was easy to dance in, and has a little stretch and give to it which made it very comfortable. LOVE this dress!

I initially didn't want to rent a black dress for this event, but this was such a comfortable and flattering dress that I had to! I was worried about the sweetheart/off the shoulder style since I'm bustier (36DD) but it was so secure and comfortable. I didn't need to wear a bra and the black was super flattering. Definitely recommend!

I rented this for a black tie event and it was absolutely perfect! Really flattering fit for a pear shape like me. The top was pretty roomy for me (34B) and I could have probably sized down to a 6 and been OK, but the 8 was still comfortable and looked great. The regular length was fine for me too (5'8" with 3" heels).

This dress fit like a glove! It was the perfect balance of elegant but sexy with the off the shoulder. The slit gave me enough room to move out on the dance floor. I loved it so much that I was so sad to return it!! Amazing amazing dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a black tie wedding.
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful and comfortable to wear. I'm only 5'2" and the length is perfect with heels. The only issue I had was the zipper. It was very difficult to zip up and down -- took quite a few tries to get it to work!

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments on the dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit great, was a little big, could've worn the 12L. I was comfortable all night, the straps on the shoulders stayed put. I would definitely rent this dress again.
Dress is super comfortable and fits in alll the right places!

links_reviews_title: Fun event and countless compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: My only complaint was that the cups were bunched and I couldn't get it flattened out. Other than that, the dress is very comfortable and a perfect fit. I'm 5"4 and the regular length was perfect with heels. Dress has a nice stretch and was comfortable all night.

I can definitely say the quality of this dress was on point. It was delivered a day early and had limited wrinkles upon arrival. The material was very high quality, but the zipper and padding in the front of the dress were kind of a disaster. That being said , the overall experience was not the best. I order sizes 14 and 16. The 14 was very small and oddly (and thankfully) the 16 was the true to size option I went with. The dress fit very well in the arms and the length was good even with heels. I received many compliments, but it was very uncomfortable to sit in this dress. I would discourage anyone who is attending an event with a sit down dinner etc to go with another option because the rib cage area is very restrictive. Additionally, the dress has built in cups which created a weird line on the front across my bust. My friend helped me maneuver them as best we could, but I was still self conscious about it for photos.

links_reviews_title: Easy dress for a black tie wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress was great, the ruffle was a little lack luster to what I was expecting but it did the trick of hiding my pear shaped bottom half. The off the shoulder stayed put all night even with a ton of dancing. It was comfortable and I'd wear it again!
Loved this dress! It fit great and I was surprised at how much movement I had in it. I definitely recommend this dress, especially for my short haired ladies out there!

Fit like a glove, thicker material, so good for winter events (I wore it in the snow). I'm 5'3, wore 4" heels and the dress still had an extra 1/2 inch on the ground. My only complaint is the built in bra padding. I couldn't wear a bra with it because that made the liners even more obvious and the pads weren't even close to covering my boobs (34DDD) so there was a weird line across my boobs, and I was left pulling my boobs up all night because it wasn't tight enough to hold them in place. Otherwise, great fit.

I am 5'5", 140 lbs, 36DDD. I wore an 8R. It was perfect. I lucked out since it was the only size available (no back up) ! I based my size on other reviewers. The material is stretchy so it can accommodate many shapes. As you can see from pic, I am very busty. This fit me well with full coverage. I felt like I was wearing pajamas. If only heels felt this comfortable then we would be in business!! I would rent this again. A+

links_reviews_title: I am obsessed with this dress! It's simple and sexy & is the perfect go-to dress for a formal event.
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size. I'm a little curvier and it fit in all the right places.
This dress is fabulous. I wore it to a formal affair and it was the perfect dress. The material is so soft and stretchy. The fit was as expected and it was very comfortable!

I rented this for a black tie wedding and it was perfect. I carry all my weight in my stomach and this dress helped disguise the stomach area and turned out to be very flattering. The slit is nice too, not too high. Only downside is the arms are a little tight... not too tight to affect the dance moves though!

This was a nice dress to wear for a work cocktail party it was a little short waisted, I did have to adjust it a little more than I liked throughout the night. It was a flattering fit. Not too long despite the long size. The zipper was a little sticky. Can wear a strapless bra but needs spanx for a smooth look.

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments - simple but elegant dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size

Perfect fit and long enough for me to wear a little heel with it. Excellent for a friend's wedding at a casino, and required no changing for doing a little gambling after! It was definitely hard to send this one back!
Fit great however I'm 5'9 and it was too short to wear with heels.

I was in search of a dress for a black-tie wedding. After scouring RTR for quite some time, I chose this dress, and I am SO GLAD I did! It was beautiful! I ordered the 8R and 10L as my back-up (they didn't have an 8L available for my dates.) When the dresses arrived, I didn't even try the 8 on and went straight to the 10. I'm normally an 8, but the 10 fit like a gem and true to size. If you're on the fence, I would size up one to be safe. I'm 5'7 and in heels, the 10L just touched the floor so it was the perfect length. The dress was sexy, simple and elegant! I received so many compliments on it all night and truly felt like a princess in it!! I wish I could keep it and even started searching the internet to see if I could find a place to buy it. LOL! Thanks RTR!!!!

I generally wear a 2 or 4 and I wore a 2 in this dress. It runs true to size/almost slightly larger than some 2s. The slit up the leg was very flattering and gave some breathing room through the stomach area. Liked it so much I would consider purchasing!
Fitted well and was very comfortable

The cut of this dress is so flattering!! I love the off shoulder feature and loose fabric hiding problem areas. I received so many compliments throughout the evening. I felt comfortable and beautiful all night!
I'm wearing 12 but it was too tight so I went for 14 and it was just perfect, loved it

This was my backup dress and I absolutely loved it! It fit comfortably and had the perfect length. The zipper was hard to zip up halfway but I figured there would be some issues as these are rented often. I loved the fabric and details which hid some of my problem areas ! I definitely looked 10 lbs lighter and was so confident in this dress. I couldn't have felt more beautiful and I will definitely rent again !

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! Fit great and got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Great length and fit! I got many compliments throughout the night! Would love to rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Dress fit great...nice fabric...not too heavy...hides your arm enough but felt VERY sexy...
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Sexy meets sophisticated just perfectly!!!

links_reviews_title: I wore this in a wedding (bridesmaid).
links_reviews_text: I am 180lbs, 5"6, 36DD. True to size, should have worn the 12L instead of the 14L but both fit relatively well.

This dress was elegant and simple in the chicest way. Perfect for a black tie event in nyc with statement earrings and red lips. You really have to watch your posture in this dress - there's nowhere to hide! But the stomach was flattering and hid any tummy pudge and I appreciated the built in padding at the bust. I'm 36DD and felt good without a bra.

links_reviews_title: UNREAL DRESS!! I got so many compliments!!
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly, especially on tall girls!! It held itself up all night (which is rare for a strapless dress). I would honestly pay for this dress if it wasn't on rtr.

links_reviews_title: AMAZING! So many compliments all night. I wish I could buy it !!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, true to size and not too long

I rented four dresses and this was the only one that fit like a glove. Classic, elegant and flattering! I’m 5’4”, 170 pounds and the 12R length was perfect with 3 inch heels. When one of my dresses suddenly became unavailable RTR contacted me and not only replaced the dress that was unavailable, they gave me a bonus rental of my choice. Amazing customer service!

This dress was the perfect choice for a black tie wedding. It was comfortable and easy to move around in. I'm 5'8" and wore with heels and the regular length was just right. I normally wear a 10, but usually go up a size in dresses, so the 12 fit great. I received tons of compliments all night and felt fantastic in it.
Wore this top to Cedar Point with my boyfriend a few weeks ago. Love the colors and the fit! I had to layer up since it was so chilly, but loved showing it off when it was warm enough. 10/10!

links_reviews_title: Bright colors, fun off the shoulder!
links_reviews_text: Runs a tad small. I should have sized up as I felt it was a little right in the shoulders. But other than that very comfy and nice heavy fabric. No need for a bra either :D

I wore this for a little mini photo shoot on vacation. Very glad I got the large for my broad shoulders and there was a little tummy showing unless you wear a high waisted bottom, but I love the vibrant colors and cut over my arms. The material did well to sit properly and not bunch up

links_reviews_title: Great going out top - was a little loose on top
links_reviews_text: My boyfriend loved this! Really flattering and not as cropped as I feared.
I was looking for an everyday top that's unique and could hide some of my winter pudge. This top was perfect. It's a thick flattering knit and gorgeous pattern. Def a beautiful item!

This top is absolutely gorgeous and flattering. It showcases your neck and shoulders in such a flattering way without being overly sexy. While it is advertised as a midriff top I am short waisted and none of my belly showed. Great quality, did not move the whole night and looked fantastic on me -very flattering. I highly recommend. It is unusual and the colors are vibrant and it's really an unique top. Highly recommend.
Top fit well and was very flattering. Wore with high-waisted black jeans while on vacation in warm Argentina!

Cropped but not too cropped. Great colors. Stretchy, flattering, and forgiving. Off-shoulder and stays put. Good quality. Really liked it. That said, this item was not my first choice for my unlimited shipment. I got it because there was extremely little available in stock and because I learned that my first choice item did not actually exist- RTR advertises a lot of items in their inventory that they don't actually have, and not because they are rented, but because they just literally do not have those items anymore; they used to, but they don't anymore. This is false advertising and it's very frustrating. And this is not the only issue that RTR has- missed shipments, wrong items sent, extremely slow customer service response, etc. So while I gave this item 5 stars, I would give RTR's operations 2 stars.

This top was so flattering on. Great quality material that is super snug and hugs your body in the right places! I always turn to reviews for sizing, so I thought why not write one of my own. I am 5'7 120 lbs and this top is amazing. Will be renting again
I wasn't expecting this to fit me because I'm a bit overweight. But it did and it's so vibrant and fitting that I felt I rocked it! I enjoyed the confidence boost.
For like a glove! Did not expect it to feel so good on but felt like a queen and the arm pieces did not slid up! Loveeeeee

Wore this to an outside concert. This can be dressed up or down. I paired it with jean shorts to dress it down. It was very comfortable to wear. Typically this type of off the shoulder style drives me nuts when I have to continuously pull them down. However, this shirt has structure and the sleeves do not move.
This is a nice thick material. Has a hugging fit. It was very comfortable and vibrant colors.

links_reviews_title: Cute top for a night out
links_reviews_text: Loved this top! It was nice thick and structured material so I was able to go braless. I wore it on a night out with friends and paired it tucked into some faux leather leggings with booties. I'd say it runs true to size but might run a little short on taller people. Got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Penny and Sparrow concert. I felt INCREDIBLE.
links_reviews_text: I made a friend with a girl in the bathroom who ALSO looked amazing because she thought I looked super lively and happy. I think it was the shirt. It's super comfy, hits great with a high waist pair of jeans (wore it with my Madewells and Rothy's pointed flats). If you lift your arms up it'll show a smidge of skin. It also stays up pERFECTLY- without any boning. the fabric is a scuba style knit so it really feels upscale but comfy.

links_reviews_title: A little too cropped for me
links_reviews_text: Great quality fabric and beautifully striped, but too short in length for me.

links_reviews_title: It was a fun pattern and color
links_reviews_text: I liked the off The shoulder shirt and the combination of colors.
I thought I could pull this top off at a spring weekend party but it was far too summery. It was also tight around my arms. Great vibrant colors though!

links_reviews_title: Stylish , well made top-- high quality
links_reviews_text: Great top! Medium fit fine . Definitely too young for me these days (I'm 52) reminded me of what I wore in the 90's. I loved it but sadly sent it back so some hip chick could rock it.

Vivid colors! This top is BABE.. it is figure flattering. The cap sleeves are great if you have concerns about showing arms. It looks great with black jeans, white linen pants.. you could dress it up with a pencil skirt. I may have to purchase!

The actually shirt itself was too big and the sleeves were too small. It wasn't flattering at all. Very boxy, at least for my body shape. The color and style overall is lovely, wish the fit was better.

links_reviews_title: This is super cute but I didn't have anyway to wear it.
links_reviews_text: True to size but rather short.
very stylish

links_reviews_title: Makes you feel skinny and very good material
links_reviews_text: Great fit and colour. Can be worn many different ways, hood support, no need for bra

links_reviews_title: Good for summer, wear high waisted bottoms
links_reviews_text: Be comfortable with showing torso! Fit like a glove and would be good for summer night. Great thick fabric. Sleeves a little tight but would take that knowing they won't move.
Amazing fit! Beautiful on.. many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Didn't lay right with big boobs
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear, I didn't think it was flattering and didn't lay totally right. Don't think this is a top for those larger on top
This is a super cute top for a date night or causal outing. The sleeves were a bit tight on my arms, but other than that it was a super cute top to wear. And the colors are beautiful!!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color top, high quality thick material
links_reviews_text: Wore to dinner with a denim high waisted mini skirt
Nice fabric, soft pretty colors, and a unique piece. Runs a bit small.
Based on prior reviews, I reserved the large. It fit perfectly.
Size up unless you like looking bandaged. Also be aware of the size of the armholes. I have skinny arms, but they barely fit in this.
Loved it -- needed the small.

This dress was very flattering - fitted but not too tight. The fabric was thick but I wore spanx anyway to smooth things out. The only issue I had with the dress is that I did have to pull it down from time to time. I imagine this dress could be tricky with a large bust. The arm holes on me were slightly big (small bust) but nothing noticeable or annoying. Many compliments - I wish I had a photo that did it justice.
I'm a size 10 and found the L size slightly on the small side. Pretty dress though!

I rented this dress for a formal work dinner and I fit in just right. The material is snug and thick, yet smoothing. I'm 5'4 and 120 lbs and wore a size Small. I was able to wear my regular bra but I also wore Spanx just for the extra belly support. The XS pulled too tight in the chest. I highly recommend this dress!!!
Perfect stretch. Quality material. Very comfortable.

My husband had an event for work and this dress did not disappoint. The fabric feels amazing and the fit shows off your curves in a classy way. I felt good in the dress all night including on the dance floor. I moved well in it. I wore a spanx just because I always do with form fitting dresses because I like a smooth foundation but I could've gone without it.

links_reviews_title: The dress was a perfect fit. Fit like a glove
links_reviews_text: The material was perfect. Not to thick

I originally rented this dress as part of my RTR Unlimited subscription for a professional event. Unfortunately, it came a day later than I had hoped and I was unable to wear it. I wore it to work the following day though, and I loved it. It's very comfortable and figure flattering. That evening, I wore it out to dinner. I would definitely rent it again. It was lovely and I felt great in it!
Had to wear a sweater over it because my Spanx where hanging out my my bust in the arm holes. Goes below the knee. Comfortable.

I wore this for a company party... I'm 5'3 and hated that the dress hit below my knee. BUT this dress is beautiful, thick material, elegant, and very comfortable to dance and move around in. I went from the party, a club and to the casino and was very comfortable in it!

This was a beautiful elegant dress that was flattering for someone like me with a small bust and wider hips and a round bottom. I was a littler nervous getting a large with no back up but was surprised. It was actually very comfy. It was tighter in the hips but a good bit too tight fit, and it was nice in the shoulders and neckline. There was small gapping under the arms but not bad at all for a person with a smaller bust. LOTS of compliments.

I rented this for my job's annual holiday party that is as fancy as weddings that I've attended. This dress is a little out of my comfort zone but was talked into renting it by a friend and I'm glad I did! I received so many complements on the shape and neckline all night long. The fabric is stretchy but snug; I wish the XL would have been available, although, that may have been too big. Overall a great rental.

links_reviews_title: Dress fit perfectly. It had just enough give!
links_reviews_text: Stretchy fabric made the dress fit like a glove.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! The fit and material were incredible. Would rent again! You must try this one!!!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! The fit was awesome!
This fit really well, and it was so comfortable. I would definitely rent again because of its simplicity.

links_reviews_title: Great coverage for a winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: If I could have combined the bottom of the L with the top of the M I would have purchased it! Dress was great, loved the full coverage and lace detailing, was long enough for me at 5'10". Would certainly rent again

I was really happy with this dress, it was very forgiving, and comfortable to wear for a wedding. My only complaint was that the lace around the neck did not lay flat. I would still rent this one again. I also rented this red bag, and wore my red heels.
I love this dress! The length was long which I loved, it is definitely form-fitting (Spanx worn) and the lace detail makes it special. I would love to rent again!

I really liked this dress for the most part! It was comfortable and form fitting, but it tended to ride up a little bit, so I found myself pulling it down regularly. I also noticed right away it was a bit stretched out around the armpits, creating a little bit of a gap, as well as stretched out too much around the bottom of the legs. Probably brand new the bottom half wouldn't have bothered me too much, but because of it being stretched out, I didn't feel the length worked very well on my 5'4" height.
As soon as I touched the dress I knew it would fit like a dream. I am 5,10 on flat and it was perfect with heels for my work dinner. The lace neck and sleeves add the pop of style I needed.
Yeah so this dress was perfection. Knocked it out of the park. I jazzed it up with a fun colored clutch and red heels. Fit true to form. I can't recommend it enough. Form fitting and fabulous.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress. So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly. Great for an evening fall wedding. I was nervous about the xs but I'm glad I went smaller. I'm 5'3 and 118lbs and size 34B.

links_reviews_title: Felt confident and comfortable all night!
links_reviews_text: The dress was very comfortable. It was stretchy and fit very nicely. I didn't even have to wear a bra but you could if you wanted to. Got lots of compliments on this perfect little black dress!
This dress fit like a glove! I received a lot of compliments!

When I rented this dress, I thought the entire dress was lace. So when I initially received this dress I was super bummed. My dress already came late so I didn't have time to exchange. It's a pretty dress. This could be worn for business or pleasure.

Worn to Eddie Merlots in Louisville for my Anniversary Dinner. Rented the Medium and the Large, wore the large but should have worn the medium. By the end of the night the dress had given a little, the medium probably would have held tighter all night. Fabric is amazing and supportive. I'm 5'4, 155lbs, 36DD. I didn't wear any spanx or a bra and I felt supported all over. The fabric is on the thick/heavy side so I wouldn't wear it if you're outside and it's hot. I feel like someone with a longer torso would fit his dress perfectly. The lace around the neck gapped a little because I have a shorter torso. Still not a deal breaker! Felt sexy and classy.
Beautiful dress for a cocktail party. Fit nicely and was comfortable to wear.

links_reviews_title: This dress...omg...I almost kept it! I've been renting for 7mo and hands down my favorite dress!
links_reviews_text: When I zipped this XS up I felt like it had been altered just for my 5'7" 110lb frame! It didn't choke my neck and the arm openings didn't feel right or restricting. The length we so comfortable and it never rode up once!

This dress fits so well. I was super shocked at how it moves and stretches with you. It made me feel beautiful and elegant and skinny... this was my first RTR and I will be doing it again. Wish I could by this dress it's so perfect.

links_reviews_title: The dress was the perfect, classy LBD for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: I wore a medium, and it fit perfectly. I am typically a size 6-8 and it was exactly how I pictured it after reading other reviews. The material is nice and thick to cover up any flaws you may want to hide and the lace was pretty and not itchy at all. I noticed a teeny bit of extra room near my armpit, but I imagine it is because I am smaller in the chest area. Super cute and would rent again.

This dress was super comfortable and the length was great! My favorite feature was the lace trim. It elevated it from a basic LBD. I was at a charity event that involved a lot of sitting and I was very comfortable the entire night. Go for this one! You'll love it!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress so much that I bought it...
links_reviews_text: This dress is perfect. Very fitted and maybe even an ca would have worked but I was very comfortable all night. The fabric didn't show anything that it wasn't supposed to but I did have to continuously pull it down throughout the night. I loved it!

Great fit, no bunching above my butt like some sheath dresses do. Thick fabric so you don’t have to wear spanks if you don’t want to, I did though. I’m tall but the dress still hung right above my knee. The top was a little big but I just wore a big bra, yes you can wear a normal bra ++++ the lace is a pretty detail and I didn’t feel I had to wear a necklace. Very elegant and feminine! Wore to a cocktail attire gala event.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to an Annual Gala and got a ton of compliments- would definitely rent again!
links_reviews_text: The dress is super comfortable and is true to size. It is definitely form-fitting so if you aren't comfortable with that I wouldn't recommend it.
Wore for a formal work event. Conservative enough but classy and sexy. Both medium and large fit but opted for the large for a lil more wiggle room. Great dress, would rent again.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit amazing! Got so many compliments

links_reviews_text: I rented the medium and large, wore the large. The medium fit fine, but I felt more comfortable in the large. There was plenty of stretch and I was able to wear a halter bra without a problem. Spanx shorts also helped. I wore this to a very expensive and fancy wedding at the Ritz Carlton in downtown Dallas and fit right in. Would rent again!
Rented for work but would also be a great work to drinks dress. Really compliments my figure and great length. Will def rent again
The material is thick enough that you do not have to wear a shaper. I love the midi length. Everything about this dress is just perfection.

An LBD that's comfortable AND stunning?! I'm in. This polyester dress is both thick and stretchy, which makes it very flattering on the curves as well as comfy to wear -- and it didn't wrinkle in my luggage! (I tend to be between an XS and a S, bc the fabric has so much stretch, I prob could have worn an XS, but it would have been more like a bodycon fit...) The neckline was a bit stretched out and hung awkwardly, so I pinned it to make it tighter. The length was work appropriate on me, in fact, I rented this with my Unlimited for a work party but kept it and wore it again too. Definitely recommend (esp for travel) and definitely would rent again!
Ran a tad small

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments and super unique
links_reviews_text: Fits fairly well, somewhat of an odd fit in the stomach but I usually wear a 0 and that's the size I wore. So many compliments on this dress because of how unique it is and how well it fits! I would only recommend for women with a flatter bust and a more hourglass shape. Fabric is not stretchy at all so definitely get the size up just in case

links_reviews_title: Weird fit- "wings" in the mid section look really strange. I didn't find this wearable

links_reviews_text: At the recommendations of reviewers I sized up two sizes but I think I'd have been okay with only going up one size. The dress is really pretty and I loved the color and pattern. The cut of the shoulders was not flattering on me--my broad shoulders looked huge. I returned it without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this dress! The pattern and color are very unique and flattering.
links_reviews_text: Really glad I got a size up! In photos, the ruching makes the dress look like the fabric is flexible, but it is actually very tight. I would absolutely recommend getting your regular size + a larger one to ensure a more comfortable fit.

links_reviews_title: Fun, cocktail dress- runs very small
links_reviews_text: Fun print- shows constellations. Fit great and got tons of compliments. Dress runs VERY small- size up! I am always a size 0 and couldn't even get it on, had to go with the 2. Designed for those with small busts- tight in chest area.

Adorable fabric, nice ruching on one side. Could dress up or down. Inner slip a little tight around bum and quads but flare in dress and ruching made it a non issue. It felt like a size 2 but was a 4. It fit me, but i found it to run small! Great date night dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a cocktail themed wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress is adorable! The photo doesn't show that the design is actually planets, moons, shooting stars, etc. which wouldn't have been my first choice, but the fit was too cute! It ran extremely small. I typically wear a size 0-2 and had to size up to a 4. The 2 was listed as XXS on the tag. The skirt has a flirty flare at the bottom and it fits snug throughout. The ruffles on the open back are a sweet touch. I would recommend this dress for a fun, not formal, occasion!

links_reviews_title: This dress is not cut well
links_reviews_text: Firstly this dress runs so small. And if you size up it's huge in the stomach area. I just can't make this work. But honestly, that's ok because I'm not crazy about the fabric. There is something cheap looking about this dress overall.
I love this dress! It's so fun and really cute lines but it is way too small!! I usually wear a two or four in dresses and I could barely get this over my hips.

I rented this dress for work, but unfortunately, I couldn't wear it. I'm usually a Small or Size 4 in dresses. This dress runs so small that I was unable to even put it on. The color and material are beautiful; however, I would size up 2 sizes.
I wore this to a company party at a resort in the mountains of Colorado. It was snowing and this coat was not only gorgeous & fun but super warm. I got so many compliment on it.
This coat takes every outfit to the next level. I wear it all the time. It is warm, comfortable and daring. It is the best item I have rented so far. See more clothes for RTR: @jessicapaige.la
Fits exactly as it should. Super soft fake fur in a beauuuutiful color. Loved it, wanted to keep it!
it's everything I was expecting. True to size! highly recommended if you need a fur piece for a date or party.

Loved this fur!! It was a serious hit at brunch. Knocked one star off because the lining was ripped when received. It continued to rip more as I wore it. But couldn't see it, so still loved this rental

links_reviews_title: The color of this jacket is just amazing.
links_reviews_text: I'm very broad shouldered and this jacket was slightly tight in the shoulders. Otherwise- FABULOUS! I loved loved loved it! Color is amazing. The top hook wasn't attached but didn't interfere with the look at all- it hid in all the glorious purple fur.

links_reviews_title: Amazing, lush color. Glamorous and SO warm-- sized way up for a fun oversized look.
links_reviews_text: LOVE. Wore this to the ballet. I got a ton of complements on this. I am 5'4, 113 and wore a large for an oversized look (I actually ordered an XS and a large cake by mistake). Color is amazing in photos and in person.
Paired it with blue jeans, booties and a black top. I received many compliments and could not have been happier with my rental.

links_reviews_title: Because why not rock a purple faux fur coat?!
links_reviews_text: Rented this beautiful faux fur coat for a charity benefit in a chilly tented venue in Chicago. Super fun and comfortable, and I was so thankful to be warm and still look fly! The color and style is hard to miss so I received tons of compliments. Would definitely recommend renting for special occasions. Take the opportunity to try something new!

links_reviews_title: Jacket that sets a tone, changes your mood.
links_reviews_text: Every woman should have at least one night in a jacket like this. It makes you feel glamorous & fabulous. How can you NOT have a great night in this?! Very warm. Id pair with something tight on the bottom so it wont make you look bigger. No need to overdo. With black leggings & high heal boots - this jacket IS the outfit. I often struggle with size smalls having arms too short for me, but this fit perfectly. When i joined RTR i promised myself id push my bounderies. This does that. Its a furry shot of confidence, so work it like you own it!
Compliments all night super cute!!! Totally took the LBD up a notch!! And its actually quite warm

This was a really fun rental. It is a conversation piece. Everyone had something to say about it and wanted to touch it. All my friends and co-workers complimented me on it. My boyfriend is the only person who was not a fan.
The jacket was as described, it was warm and fit true to size. I absolutely loved the fullness of the fur. I would highly recommend.
I usually wear a size 14 or 1X. The coat will not fully close BUT it's still so amazing. I leave it open and i also drap over the shoulder. Its a real show stopper and I will keep for awhile.

links_reviews_title: i loved the fur with my black sequin dress for my 30th
links_reviews_text: the fit is true to size

links_reviews_title: I don't know if you can find a better item to wear to a LSU baseball banquet!
links_reviews_text: I love this jacket! My son is on the LSU baseball team and I wanted something fabulous to wear to the first pitch banquet. This purple fur was perfect! The small was not available so I got the XS. It was perfect. I'm not sure I will ever send this jacket back!
I usually wear S or M in jackets but XS was perfect for this one. I got so many compliments and requests to touch it/try it on. The color and quality were great.
I'm in love with this jacket! It looks purple in the picture but it's actually a wine/burgundy color. I'm actually considering keeping this one because it's beautifully made and so soft.
I loved renting this coat and staying warm on NYE! It is so much fun.

I wore this to a concert in Nashville. It was absolutely perfect! I received so many compliments on this. Also, it was super warm. Which was perfect in the 30 degree weather. If you go out to eat.... I suggest you take off . It sheds just a little bit. I had a few "hairs" in my food. Lol
fits perfect

This jacket is everything. Super warm and the perfect color. I had people stopping me in the street to ask where I got it. Definitely thinking about adding the piece to my wardrobe indefinitely because it's just that good.
Fit perfectly
The fit was perfect, runs true to size. Ordered a M but clearly needed a large to be able to button up. The color of the coat is amazing and very comfortable to wear. Nice and warm!
I felt like Carrie Bradshaw. Fun, Warm, and feels like you are being hugged by the softest pillow. I am busty so I felt it was a little large, but I would not recommend sizing down.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Wore it out to dinner in Aspen
links_reviews_text: Such a fun piece!
Cute, fun and actually warm. Might be tight if you are busty and want to button it.

I loved the fun color of this faux fur and wanted to pair it with a fun dress for an upcoming wedding but the material was just meh - I expected it to be soft but it was a little scratchy and not that great. The color was gorgeous and vibrant - so if you're looking for fun color and not that concerned with feel/texture this might be the statement crop jacket of your dreams. I only wore it to try it on and sent it back for another faux fur on my list that I love way more.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful. Too large for a Petite
links_reviews_text: Beautiful and elegant. Unfortunately too large for my petite figure even in the XS
Great faux fur. Received numerous compliments.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun color! Many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Just what I expected. Easy, boxy shape. Nice lining.

links_reviews_title: It was beautiful and warm which I needed that night
links_reviews_text: Just loved it and got plenty of great compliments
Just swallows you whole. Don't rent if you have a prominent torso or wide shoulders.

links_reviews_title: Great for red carpet and casual event
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! Love the color and had so many compliments on the red cart and also wore it with jeans. So fun

This was the perfect coat for a winter trip to NYC. I wore it out every night we were there and it took each outfit up a notch. It was also really warm. I may not have a ton of places to wear this on a regular basis, but I just couldn't send it back!

links_reviews_title: Sadly, wasn't able to wear it! Had rented for a winter outdoor wedding. Weather was warm & perfect!!
links_reviews_text: Wish I had been able to wear the jacket because it fit well and was so cute. It would have been the perfect addition to go with my plum gown -- and fit it wonderfully with the bride's chosen color of purple. SO easy to package up and send back as well.

This was my first experience with RTR and I wasn't impressed with this piece. While it looks exactly as it does in photos, the hooks were distorted, making it difficult to hook for some of the closures, so it laid weird. Also, size up for sure!!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Studio 54 Theme Party!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect, the large was a bit big on me but it was very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: wore this jacket often for ~1 month. love it. the color got many compliments
links_reviews_text: ture to size and very warm

links_reviews_title: I did not have the opportunity to wear it.
links_reviews_text: It was beautiful but I think I needed a smaller size. Was not loving the fit on me but may try again!
My daughter used one of my Rtr meme era hip rental for her sorority semi-formal. She looked amazing in this dress. She had rented two and went with this one.
Outdoor wedding - if ur boobs are bigger that 34b this size will be super tight
Love it and will rent again.

links_reviews_title: My first time trying RTR and I am sold. This dress came in clutch as none of my others worked out.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! This was a last minute decision but it ended up fitting perfectly. I chose to wear spanx to smooth everything out. The material was thick but not too thick for an outdoor wedding at night in September.

Got compliments all night and the day after when I shared photos on Facebook. I got the 4L bc 4R was sold out, ended up wearing the backup size 6R bc it had better room for my bust. The dress has no bust support so need to wear a good strapless bra. The torso bunches up a lot, so I would recommend something like spanx. Loved the leg slit & the color, it was a nice matte cool yellow tone, just bright enough to stand out but not distract. The material is also thick, so no panty lines!

links_reviews_title: Pop of color at a fall wedding.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a wedding that requested that you wear color and this did the job. I'm usually between a 0 and 2 in this brand and ended up wearing the 2 as the 0 was pretty tight at the top. Since I wore the 2 it was a little baggier in the middle than I would have liked but not enough for me to wear the 0. Length was great with heels.

I've always been obsessed with yellow dresses after watching How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days. I know this dress isn't silk like the movie, but it's still a beautiful dress. Got lots of compliments on the style & color. It's a soft yellow, not that bright. Really worked with my tanned skin tone (although I really regret the bikini lines). It's not that stretchy & the 2R fit better in the body, but did not give any room for the boobs so I went with 4R. Slit was just enough to be class but sexy.
The fabric of this dress was great, had just enough stretch to be form fitting, but not uncomfortable. Stayed in place all night.

links_reviews_title: Felt so chic in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress! Although if you are 5'3 and under I would most certainly go with the petite size. I had about an extra 6 inches I had to tuck under with garment tape. Super long and wore 3 inch heels. Other than that the body of the dress fits as described.

This dress is as stunning as it is comfortable. The fit was perfect, I rented both the 0 and 2P and wore the 2. The strapless stayed on without needs for adjustments. The leg opening was sexy but not super revealing. I got lots of compliments, definitely recommend wearing this dress for a special occasion. Plus, the yellow color was subtle, yet eye catching!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments, and it passed the dance test!
links_reviews_text: I was a little afraid the top of this dress would fall, especially since reviews said to size up, but it was perfect. I was told it was stunning, it was comfortable, and it didn't fall down at all. Sizing up is key, especially if you have boobs, and if your back is a little broad, like me. I would rent this again for another summer wedding!

I received so many compliments when I wore this dress. Although, the dress was very tight I recommend going up a size. While the fabric was not thin by any means, you could see anything underneath of it. The dress came with a few marks on the back of it but I was able to cover it with my hair. Overall, I was very satisfied!
Great dress, received so many compliments - does run alittle small but was comfortable all night!

links_reviews_title: Received compliments all night! Yellow is muted but photos well. Gorgeous dress.
links_reviews_text: If you have big breasts, order a size bigger than what you usually wear. I wear a size 6 or 8. I could fit size 8 but my breasts could not - not while wearing a bra. Size 10 bunched a bit around my waist but not dramatically so. This dress is definitely for women with a cup C or fewer.

This dress is super tight around chest. I ended up wearing my back up size 6 to get it over my larger chest (34DDD) but used fashion tape and safety pins to tighten the waist/hips. The material is very strong, I needed no bra and felt supported all night. I wore to a wedding and felt comfortable dancing all evening. Only downside of this dress is I felt I kinda upstaged the bride from all the compliments I received!
Comfy, gorgeous, fits like a glove!

links_reviews_title: I got SO many compliments on this dress ! Perfect for a cocktail event
links_reviews_text: Very good for curvy figure, runs a little small so I went up in size. I’m 5’10 and the regular length still worked.

I rented this for a Black Tie evening wedding-the fit was a little tighter than expected, I got a 4R and normally would fit comfortably in sizes 2-4, the upper back where it finished the zip was a little tighter than I expected. Other than this, the dress is a head turner and SUCH a fun, classy one for a summer wedding event. I received so many compliments and felt fabulous in it all night long. I attached a silly photo so you can see the movement possible in it.. ha!Definitely recommend!!!
Flattering and elegant
#glam
This dress was gorgeous and looked amazing! I would definitely use this again.
I wore this to a wedding and received so many compliments on the color and style. True to size and the length was so fun on the dance floor
Everyone commented on this beautiful dress!! Fabric was great fit was beautiful .. loved the bright yellow!!

Got so many compliments on this dress everywhere I went. Its a show stopper. Wore it to a black tie wedding. It was a little tight on the hips. I might have tried a size 6 but it was comfortable and I felt great in it! Just had to be careful sitting down too fast. Would wear again

links_reviews_title: Colorful, Hourglass Wedding Attire in Quality Material
links_reviews_text: If you are ready to rock something colorful, fun and flirtatious, this yellow strapless dress is a great option. I loved the fringed slit that gave my look a little more movement and a whole lot of leg. Great material and a tight fit keeps everything in place for a nice of dancing.

The color (soft Canary yellow) and weight/feel of fabric were nice. The length on me was also good - covered my 2-3 inch heels without dragging on floor. My issue was that is runs small. The 8 was my backup size and fit tighter than I would have wanted. The top portion lacked rubber grips on the interior so I was also tugging to keep it up most the evening.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a princess and was comfortable too!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress in regular sizes 8, 10 and 12. I ended up picking the 10. The 8 wouldn't zip up in the back and the 12 was too loose. Just to give you a little bit of size information. I typically wear a size 6 in dresses and skirts at Ann Taylor Loft. And size medium in shorts and pants at Athleta. Tops are typically extra small or small at both places. I find that gowns are usually a tad bit smaller in general. This is why I picked "true to size". I assume the 10 would be the perfect fit but wanted to make sure so I tried the other sizes as well. I am a little bit shorter so I grabbed 2 1/2 to 3 inch heels to wear with it. I suggest always having fabric tape to use when ordering anything from rent the runway as they are not hemmed. And fabric tape works amazingly - I did not use it on this dress however. This was comfortable and adorable and everyone loved it! Definitely a showstopper! I would definitely recommend this and would wear it again given the chance!

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove and got many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'5 and usually wear a size 0/2, but ordered the 4 because of my larger breast size and it fit. It was a little loose on the hip area but not noticeably.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a special occasion!
links_reviews_text: This was a wonderful dress! I'm 5'4" and it was just a teeny bit longer after my high heels. But that wasn't a problem!
