Fits true to size (I wore a 4R), but the only con was that the hanger straps kept popping out of the strapless top. I had to keep adjusting it. Other than that, it was great and beautiful!
Likely dresses fit like a glove. Loved this one except it was a little long.
Not for over a B cup Runs very small, size up
The dress runs small, I normally wear size 4 and this dress in size 6 felt very snug. It is also very long, with 3inch heels I still has to pin 3 inches up

links_reviews_title: My friends getting married, but also the compliments of the dress.
links_reviews_text: My usual size is 8, but this dress runs small, so I had to use my backup a 10, still loved the way it fit.

links_reviews_title: Heavy material and not forgiving in the hips
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress based on the good reviews. But, I thought the material was thick and heavier than expected. I also have wide hips and this dress was not forgiving in that area. I ended up wearing my back up dress.
I loved the fit and flair of this dress. I wore to a Gala but would be perfect for beach wedding.
Very low cut on the top very high slate over all a very nice dress for the summer or Spring

links_reviews_title: The fabric and color was beautiful but lord this dress runs small
links_reviews_text: I ordered 3 dresses for a wedding to see which would fit. This dress was way too small for my friend who is a size 2 and my friend who is a size 0 but tall. I'd recommend the small for someone with a very small frame. A petite size 0
This dress runs small. I wear a 14 and couldn't even very this dress past my butt..

links_reviews_title: Rented for a wedding but didn't wear
links_reviews_text: Very pretty but too small / not for my body type

links_reviews_title: I wore this to an important work event where I wanted to be classy but fun and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I was getting compliments days later and felt like the understated belle of the ball. The small was way too tight, the 6 fit nicely. The lace is a little bit itchy but the quality and detail are so beautiful.
This fit like a glove! I felt classy and sexy in it at the same time. Beautiful, quality dress. Alexis is such a great line!

The fit compliments the curves with the right amount of breathing space. So have that bagel! This dress has you covered. Compliments all day in the office and in the streets. Only con is that the material is a little itchy mainly in the sleeves.

links_reviews_title: Got a little dressed up for my 34th birthday celebration
links_reviews_text: Decided to get a little dressed up for my 34th birthday celebration and had a fun time wearing this! The bottom lining slid up without me realizing but it was ok since the lace had a lot going on

links_reviews_title: I received lots of compliments and felt it was very classy yet sexy!
links_reviews_text: Fabric wasn't too smooth on the inside but wasn't bothersome. Looks great in heels with the length of the dress. I wore simple black heels with it.

Wore this to my company's celebration. Attire was "dress to impress" and I certainly did thanks to this little number. Being 17 weeks pregnant it was hard to find something to fit my new body, and this was the best. It is tighter with the overlay but the under was forgiving. There is a slight itchy factor to the fabric but I wanted my arms & legs covered because it was January. Loved the detail and I wore a black bodysuit underneath because the sheer panel I didn't feel was appropriate in that setting. It's a very pretty dress that's modest, photographs well and still has a wow factor. Normal undergarments can be worn. I'm 5'4" and the length came just below calf.

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated and sexy holiday party dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous. It has beautiful flower details and is a mix of sexy with the skin showing through and sophisticated with the long sleeves and hemline. It was really hard to zip up by myself tho.

I rented this for my mother to wear to a party we were hosting and she loved it! It looked fabulous on her and she got compliments from her friends all night. Def designed for someone narrow as the fabric doesnt have much give. A must-rent for the holidays!

Ordered this last minute for a friend's Orthodox Jewish wedding and it was a total hit. For perfectly, provided great coverage for a conservative event while still being flattering. Will absolutely rent again!

I am 5' with a athletic and curvy build, 32 d, and this dress was a perfect tight fit for a night on the town with still enough room for some grooving, but not dropping down and getting your eagle on lol. Needed help getting in and out of it though

This dress is very subtle, but really accents your curves. If you are curvy, this dress is for you. My hips are about "42" and my waist is "34"... this dress totally showed my curves. I also liked how it hugged me and reminded me to "sit up straight". You can't slouch in this dress, if you do, it's uncomfortable. I really liked it. Wish I could have spent more time in it!
Great dress with extraordinary embroidery and detail, but very very itchy and almost impossible to sit in. Would definitely size up if you have an hourglass figure.
Fit very well
Loved the fir and the lace!

links_reviews_title: Perfect last minute style for a mom of two!
links_reviews_text: I really felt amazing! I don't have time to shop in store as a full time working mother of two. And I don't frequent events enough to justify the spend for a nice dress. This. Was. Perfect - my first RTR! Overall great fit. The fabric is a bit itchy and sleeves were a little tight. But overall fit TTS and I received sooo many compliments. Classy, but sassy with the see through rib cage and shorter slip underneath. Would definitely rent it again!!

links_reviews_title: Appreciation ceremony for my Father-in-law Mr. P
links_reviews_text: we love this
Arms fit a little tight but the dress hugs in all the right places. I wore it to the ballet. Eye-catching and classy but beware: it has zero stretch.

This was such a fun dress! I ordered something else and went to the RTR store to pick it up but it didn't end up fitting. Found this in the store and fell in love with it. So much different than anything I would've picked out online. It was a little scratchy from all the embroidery, but nothing that would stop me from wearing it again. I really left like a Hollywood star in this dress, which was perfect because I wore it for a girls night out in Hollywood!
This dress is simply gorgeous! Form fitting without confining. Exquisite details. I got stopped all night long with compliments and I felt like a movie star. My husband was floored!
So many compliments!!! Great fit and beautiful material!! Another great rental!!!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress to wear for Christmas dinner.
links_reviews_text: Nice fit and little Tickle .
The color was perfect for this holiday occasion! the dress was sexy because of the fit abd at the same time conservative because of the length! I love that it still has tags on when I rented it!!!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a company holiday party and felt like the belle of the ball!!!
links_reviews_text: I can be a 4/6/8 depending on brand. I am athletic build with a big ol' booty and a narrow waist and hips. Fitted dresses normally work on me and this was no different. I ordered the S/M because the L was out (reviews said size up). I couldn't even get the small on (AT ALL), medium was a good snug fit and I think L would have been too big. That said, the M was tight in the arms and a little tight in the hips, but that's mostly just my body. The arms did chafe a little bit by the end of the night, and because of the tight fit, I did ultimately want to get it off. Until then though, I felt amazing. My date told me heads were turning for this dress!! And the President of my company sought me out to tell me how much she loved it, and she wasn't the only one. I almost felt guilty because I knew the dress wasn't mine! LOL Also, this is the best pic I have -- I guess I was enjoying myself?!?! :) TY Rent the Runway! So excited to use you again.

I had a feeling it was my surprise shower! Thankfully I wore a dress that matched the theme my mom picked out (Frida Kahlo!). I received so many compliments! My dress hugged me in all the right places. The only drawback is that for those of us with athletic builds, this might be a bit too narrow in the underarm area. It was hard for me to lift my arms without feeling like I would rip the seams. I am also wearing this dress with black Spanx that go up to my bra line, which is a nice way to tone-down the see-through middle part of the dress. I wish I could own it!
While the dress was very pretty-the lack of "give" of the material was not an inviting wear.
Rented it as a back up and didn't wear as it was itchy. May be difficult to wear a whole night. Also wasn't able to see the different layers as much on as in the photo.
For an hourglass figure, this wasn't the best choice. Beautiful dress, but the shoulders and hips were restricting while the waist had extra fabric.
Too snug, not flattering
Loved the way this looked, but is itchy and like others have said, runs small and has no give. Beautiful dress, so worth it, just order size up as your second option.

The dress is absolutely gorgeous! The sheer panels are much more visible in person than in photographs and give this otherwise elegant conservative dress a sexy boost. Warning: the dress has zero stretch. (It is difficult raising your arms to even shoulder height for dancing.)
Ran small. Didn't fit. Wasn't comfortable either. It's quite a beautiful dress, though. And I thought it looked GREAT on those pictured on the RTR Web site.
gorgeous dress - very small - couldn't wear it to my birthday party :(
Fit great, true to size. Kinda long, but intentional that way!
I would have loved this dress, but it didn't fit my shoulders/upper arms. I usually don't have any problems with fit in this brand, but this was definitely small on me with no stretch.

links_reviews_title: Sheer parts of the top give the dress just the right about of sex appeal
links_reviews_text: body--con fit hugged my curves in all the right ways
Beautiful dress, but painfully itchy. A bit baggy in the waist - fits like a straight line.

links_reviews_title: NOT for athletic builds. Arms way too tight.
links_reviews_text: I'm not overly muscular by any means, and I could not get my arm into the sleeves of this dress.
Black tie holiday party - great fit and very festive!

I'm usually a 2/4 in dresses and I rented the small. Although I could zip it, because there is no give and I couldn't move my arms and had limited movement in my legs since it's past the knee. It's a really pretty dress, I would definitely rent a medium next time.
I should have ordered a small but it wasn't available so I attempted to squeeze in a XS. Cute dress just needed next size up.
I got so many compliments on this dress. I unbuttoned the too few buttons and tucked them into my sticky bra because I was heading out in the dress. Very comfy!
Very flowy, flattering, and comfortable.

Really cute dress - lots of compliments on this one. Loved that the arms were covered a bit as well. The only area of concern was the bust area im a 36ddd and at moments it was pulling a bit- I think I might be the largest bust size you could be in this dress.
Easy dress for casual events.

links_reviews_title: So flattering for my tall hourglass figure!
links_reviews_text: Love, love this dress! Long enough for my tall frame and the fit was perfect for hourglass. Accentuated my waist nicely without over emphasizing my chest. Plus, regular bra! And happy, springy colors!
Very cute and flattering. If you're busty be careful when sizing as the buttons in the front have no stretched. I'm 5'3, the dress was too long, but it looked cute tied at the bottom.

This dress is a stunning blue color and I got so many compliments from strangers everywhere I wore it! I realized after wearing it twice that I wasn't putting my arms through the armholes properly (LOL) but it still looked cute. Only note is that the dress runs pretty long. I'm 5'6 and had to wear a heel or wedge so it didn't drag on the ground. Might be an issue for more petite ladies!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for work and then happy hour!
links_reviews_text: A little tight across the shoulders but I have wide shoulders - just left top button undone for extra room. Small bust fit well! Definitely long - had to wear with wedges so it didn't drag! Got so many compliments on the color!
Love this dress ! Got so many compliments ! It was a little tight around the busy so I just left a button open . Comfy , and so chic !

Worked well as a maternity dress for me! I'm 5-foot-11 and 28 weeks. Upside: cute pattern and comfortable. Loved the sleeves and tie front. Downsides: my height and bump included I still found myself tripping over the length. The lining within the dress felt cheap and wrinkled.
This dress was comfy & the cold shoulder was cute. But the waist didn't come close to being on my waist. Tight across the chest
Beautiful dress, wore at 6 months pregnant. The dress was long even with wedges, had to pick it up a little to walk, not for short people.
Very cute print & was comfortable but there wasn't anything special about it to me.

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for a maternity photo session and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: The dress is true to size. I saw some comments about the dress being long. I'm 5'7 and the dress was floor length, no longer. Perfect to wear with flat sandals. The top arm section was a little tight. I'd rent a size up as a back up if you're pregnant. I was 29 weeks pregnant in the photo. The waist is elastic, and there's plenty of room with the tie belt. Overall, fantastic rental -- I didn't like the sewn in layer under the dress.

The dress s really comfortable, didn't want to take it off. The fit is amazing with a waist tie to give the body a nice shape. I wore it Resurrection Sunday (Easter) but it's really an everyday dress!

It's a heavy dress and also really long (I'm 5'4) and it dragged a bit on the floor with flats. I got it for vacation so it worked but it's not the most flattering the cold shoulder is weird so I tucked them under. Looks better in photos than in real life.

I rented this for my own baby shower and got SO many compliments. The dress was comfortable, fit well, and made me feel confident at 31 weeks pregnant. Pre-pregnancy I would have worn a size 6. I sized up one to a size 8 and it fit great!

links_reviews_title: Figure flattering. Great date night dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress when I just started showing with my pregnancy. Very comfortable and plenty of room to grow. Loved the pattern and the sexy slit on the leg gives it just the right amount of demure and sexy for a date night!
Really great summer dress. It's very comfy and has some wiggle room.
Wore this dress to a bridal shower. I loved the color and the fit was flattering, I wish it weren't so long but I'm shorter so can't complain, worked with heels!
Comfortable and breathable material. Received many compliments. Loved the color.
This made me very excited to try my Draper James! Comfortable, airy, feminine. I've been wearing a 16 but after reading the reviews felt comfortable enough to try the 14 and it fit perfectly.

Love the incredible fabric (vibrant blue with green/white pattern) that was flowy and elegant. The slit was a perfect balance to the sweetness of the flounciness of the dress, though you can see that I didn't wear the off-shoulder sleeve parts for the workday (just felt a bit too party-ish, but I did wear it normally for my evening events!). My only complaint was the underskirt--which I've pictured here. The fabric was bunchy and I had to keep tugging it down since it's not secured to the skirt with stitching. I was glad to have shorts to wear under it, otherwise I would have been really unhappy.

Picked this baby up at the Chicago store. Probably should have gotten the 6, but the 4 was available, so it was a bit tight across the chest. I'm 5'2" and wore this with some heels and it was perfect for a nice brunch.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and extra great if you're busty but like a defined waist
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a dress size 12 but got a 10 after reading other reviews. I'm very glad I did! This fit well though for my shape (pear) it was still pretty roomy in the bust area and the lining bunched up a lot in the back. For a rayon/poly dress this looks and photographs more luxe. Sash is not completely removable - it's stitched in place in the back - so that limits some styling options. Overall really liked it and can't wait to rent more from this brand. As others have said, it's quite long so great for taller people. I'm 5' 8" and wore with about 2.5 inch heels which was the ideal end length for me.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful spring or summer maxi, runs large
links_reviews_text: This dress was worn to my daughter's birthday. I was 7 months pregnant at the time. It fit well, was fairly comfortable and I received many compliments. If I was not pregnant I would have sized down. The dress is also pretty long so I did wear sandals with a small heel.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a late spring/early summer outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: It is a really pretty dress, but not the best fit for someone with a larger bust. Personally, it was not flattering for my body type.

I love this bright floral print maxi by Draper James. Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back-up. This style is formfitting throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this maxi. At 5'4, the length hit floor length on me. Styled with cold shoulders, airy ruffles and a tie waist, it's as flattering as it is feminine. I would recommend pairing with a cute bracelet and small earrings to complete this look.
Dress fit perfectly and looked adorable with baby bump! (Wore at 5 months)

Didn't love the pattern as much in person as I did online, but it's a beautiful blue color. I'm 5'9" and it was grazing the floor. Perfect with wedges though. Love the way it flows when I walked and in the breeze. Probably won't rent the exact dress again but love the style of it.
The beauty of this dress lies in the slip at the leg. It's truly a lovely dress.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my graduation and I felt like a goddess!
links_reviews_text: It's forgiving on fit (theres a bit of stretch in the waistband) and long and flowy throughout.. very elegant and pretty! The material is amazing as well and it skimmed over all my problem areas! I loved it.

I loved this rental! I'm a big fan of Draper James and this maxi offers classy and chic style without trying too hard. I do however think that the arm holes, and how they rub on my armpit is uncomfortable. That's my only qualm with the dress. Otherwise, it's great!

links_reviews_title: Light and airy but not the most flattering
links_reviews_text: Beautiful chiffon material. Fits exactly like it looks on the model but just doesn't feel very flattering to me. It's boho. I can see it for a lot of occasions - napa, a baby shower, but I wanted something more tailored. The slit is nice! The fabric is truly gorgeous.
I could have easily worn this dress two sizes smaller. This is my 2nd Draper James maxi dress and they run VERY long.
Loved the color etc. fits well, a little large!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blue color and comfy fit
links_reviews_text: This dress was adorable and I received a ton of compliments! I rented it to wear to a celebratory dinner and ended up wearing to a concert later in the month as well. I'm normally a size 0 and the 2R fit perfectly. At 5"6, the length was good for a 2 inch heel.
Worked well early in my 2nd trimester. Pretty "baby blue" color for a baby announcement. Length was perfect for me at 5'8" to wear with flats.
I got lots of compliments on this beautiful dress. It was flowy and easy to wear---it stood out and made me feel attractive and special without being over the top.

links_reviews_title: Wore this 6 months pregnant, fit well and pretty color
links_reviews_text: Wore this 6 months pregnant, fit well and pretty color

I rented this for a wedding I was standing in that the bride asked us to find our own navy gowns. I wish I had taken a better photo but I was obsessed with the bow at the neck! It created a gorgeous shape while also being nice and secure. The dress just skimmed the floor over my 4 inch heels so it was perfect for dancing. The shape of this dress created the illusion of additional height and was very flattering with its shift style.

links_reviews_title: Had to order a size up b/c it was the only size available but was still happy with the fit!
links_reviews_text: Ordered a size up, I'm typically a 4/6 and ordered the 8. Was definitely big but I looped the ties in the bag so the neckline fit right. Loved the look so classy! But I'm 5'6 and it hit me right at my ankles so you could see my shoes so beware for taller girls!

This was the only photo We tool that didn't make me look grumpy...The dress feels like a dream and is honestly beautiful but it lays funny and makes your stomach appear "wide." If you're pregnant or super narrow at the waist /pear then this dress is for you
The dress flows, is easy to wear, and just moves in an effortless way. I absolutely enjoyed this dress!
Beautiful cut and fabric. My only complaint is it is too short. I'm 5'9" and could wear 2 inch heels

links_reviews_title: Go glam for a winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: Loved this glamorous dress for a Christmas wedding in a castle. Super flattering, fabric has good weight so it doesn't show off any lumps. Received so man compliments. I'm usually a size 2 and the 36 fit great, probably could have sized down but I didn't want it to be too tight

Beautiful blue moment. I was worried that it would show all of my flaws but it was actually super flattering. The silk just flows down you. Ended up wearing something brighter but will def keep this dress in mind for my next event.

links_reviews_title: This was for my son’s wedding and it was the perfect dress for an evening wedding in late FL fall...
links_reviews_text: This dress fit beautifully. I’m ‘5 “3 with an athletic build. I wore the petite, which was the perfect length with 3 inch heels. I could walk around without it trailing on the ground and I didn’t have to worry about holding it up. The color was a gorgeous navy; it did not look black just a lovely navy blue. Best part: it was super comfortable. It was not too loose but not too fitted so it was comfortable for sitting and dancing. The long sash in back was a nice touch. I got compliments on it the entire evening.
Amazing fit!!

I absolutely loved wearing this dress. The petite sizing was perfect. I'm 5'3 and wore 3 inch heels and the dress just skimmed the floor. You definitely need a good strapless bra and a pair of Spanx with this one, but the fabric was more forgiving than I expected because it is a little thick. Based on other reviews I ordered a 36 and a 38 (I typically wear a 4 or 6 in dresses depending on the brand) but if I rent this dress again I would go with the 34. It was a little big in the waste, and I had to pin it in to actually have a defined shape. Otherwise, this dress is classic elegance and glamour and incredibly comfortable!
AMAZING!! I love this dress and have never gotten so many complements in my life!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous fabric and oh so elegant!!!
links_reviews_text: Loved every detail about this dress. It lays perfectly with thick silk and no slip. I felt great all night! I'm 5' 5" and would have liked it to be just a couple of inches longer, but that was not a big deal at all! I would recommend this dress to everyone!!

I am in third trimester at 29 weeks and this dress was great with my bump! A loose style so super comfortable but elegant. Wore 3 in? Heels and length was great. Normally wear a size 2, French 36 but sized up 1.
Love finding petite sizes. This dress is not tight/form fitting but for sure flattering. It wasn't my partner's favorite but I loved it! Loved the elegance of it. Would love to rent again

links_reviews_title: Black tie wedding at 20 weeks pregnant
links_reviews_text: I felt so elegant. Didn't have to size up much there was room for the belly
Just fabulous all around. The fabric is luxurious!

links_reviews_title: Six months pregnant, but sill fab
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a black tie summer wedding. Even though I was six months pregnant and it was nearly 100 degrees, this dress was perfectly cooling and the material was thick enough that any sort of sweat didn't show through. It's very flattering and I highly recommend!

I rented this dress for the Daytime Emmys awards and it was a winner in all categories! The fabric had enough weight to skim over the body (only wore petals and a thong; no Spanx needed) and the midnight blue color is a standout in a sea of black. It was a bit long for my 5'-5" frame with 3-1/2" heels, so I had to lift the skirt to walk up stairs. Absolute stunner - received compliments all night long!

The best thing about this dress is that it doesn't wrinkle. I am between a size 2 and 4 the 2 fit me fine so it might run big for some people. Also, I am 5'7" and it was a tiny bit short on me. I had to wear kitten heels with it. Great go-to dress and very flattering!
Heavy silk, form fitting but not sight, gorgeous and very comfortable, received lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Love getting dressed up and Rent the Runway makes it easy and affordable!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable dress
I am 5'10 and the long was just long enough with 4" heels. Beyond gorgeous color and material. Will definitely be renting this dress again.

links_reviews_title: It is a very elegant dress
links_reviews_text: A very elegant dress. The fabric and the color makes it a great dress for a formal event. It is a bit too long for me and i had to use a fashion tape to shorten it. I love this dress !

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress made me stand out from a crowd.
links_reviews_text: The dress is elegant and simple.Love the material. Hoped it could fit more though since it runs a little big on waist.

links_reviews_title: A little long, but so comfy and elegant.
links_reviews_text: At 5'2" I really needed the Petite size but they only had R available. still, i wore my tallest shoes and even snuck leggings on under the dress. It was very comfy, I ate and drank all night without worrying and got lots of compliments. The back sash is especially cute. Would recommend!
Can't rave about this dress enough. Its elegant and sexy. The color amd fit are gorgeous. Perfect for a wedding guest or pair with a jacket for a super fancy dinner.

Wow! This dress replaced a dress that i originally picked but was unavailable. What an upgrade. It is beautiful and really enhances your figure. The navy color is gorgeous. The cut in the dress so elegant. Sleeveless high neck great for olive skin.

links_reviews_title: Great night in a beautiful gown.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect as was the length and color. It helped to see pictures of other ladies wearing the dress.

This dress is striking in person. The sheen of the fabric makes the navy blue really pop; The fabric has a good weight to it so it falls and flatters your curves and moves nicely. The fit is true to size, I'm short so it was long, I used hem tape and it stayed all night even after dancing. This dress really show cases your collar bones and shoulders, which I love. I felt very elegant in this gown, it was perfect for a black tie wedding.

Hung beautifully, fabric had great movement, and was comfortable. This was the only size available on short notice, but the loose fit worked perfectly and the silhouette was glamorous even though it was too short for my 6' frame in 4" heels.

I loved the feel of this silk dress! I received compliments throughout the wedding reception. The undergarments worn underneath need to be tight otherwise they'll be visible. I will say that the dress does NOT have zippers or any other closure to get into it. You have to slip it on over your head, which is tricky if you've gotten your hair done to wear with it so be careful putting it on! Otherwise, great rental!

Dress is absolutely beautiful in person and very forgiving when you wear it. I have a strong pear shape and have a hard time finding dresses that fit over my lower half while still accentuating my upper half. It draped beautifully and was incredibly comfortable to wear the entire night.

links_reviews_title: Classic, with just the right amount of sexy.
links_reviews_text: This dress showed off the curves without being too revealing or form-fitting. Felt very glamorous.
I wore a 4 when I really wear a 6 . Please don't wear this without spanx and a good strapless bra. Also I don't know what size I wore in the dress

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, I felt chic and comfortable at 19 weeks pregnant.
links_reviews_text: I had to size up because it was the only size available, I wish I got the long because it does run short (especially when I am 5’10”). But would highly recommend for any formal affair.

links_reviews_title: really comfortable, the dress was a tad long
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear and received so many compliments. Very flattering and really comfortable.

Such an awesome dress. I was a little worried about it being too long (I'm 5'3'') but with a 3 inch heel it was perfect--probably an inch above the floor, just enough to show some shoe. I put on sneakers for dancing and it was touching the floor a bit but not enough that I was tripping. I wore it at the beginning with a sticky strapless bra (NuBra) which I took off and replace with BandAid blister cushions for my nipples. Really--this is the best tip!! You can see the normal nipple petals under the dress (at least I could) but these were totally invisible!
Im 5’4” 110 lb. This dress was a perfect fit with 4” heels. Could have likely gotten away with 3” heels.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful flowing dress, hugs curves the right way
links_reviews_text: I was a little nervous to wear this dress since I'm pretty curvy, but it fit perfectly. I would definitely rent again. I also found it easy to dress down a bit for the after party with a brown leather jacket.

links_reviews_title: Great color and made me feel sexy
links_reviews_text: Great fit, good fit. Made my 34 B breasts look voluptuous which never really happens...lol. I would definitely rent this dress again.
Loved wearing this for a summer wedding. Was comfortable, and sexy. Highly recommend if you want to pop in red :)

links_reviews_title: Wore this on a dinner cruise in Charleston.
links_reviews_text: Material light enough for a warm evening but thick enough to make a smooth silhouette. Beautiful color and figure flattering.

This dress is incredibly flattering and easy to wear. The color is vibrant, the cut is forgiving and the entire dress is double-lined. I've been trying to lose the baby weight for over a year now, so my confidence is not yet where it should be. But the top comments on social were "hit mama" and "amazing dress!" Once this dress is available to buy, it's happening. Tall or short, skinny or curvy, every woman should get a chance to feel this good in a dress. Rent it now!
Loves the overall fit and cutouts. Hits just above the knee and is more fitted on top.

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing. It is so comfortable and flattering.
links_reviews_text: Could not have been happier with the dress. Despite being fitted it did not ride up or wrinkle throughout the night. When someone spilled on my dress it easily washed out and was dry within a half an hour. The color is the perfect shade of red. 10/10 would rent again.
Definitely more bright red than I thought. Expected more coral pink red. Dress was tight but with a spanx like underwear, I was able to pull it off.

links_reviews_title: The side cut outs are amazing!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely LOVED this dress! It fit well, loved the side cut outs on the dress and got so many compliments on it at my friend's wedding. The color is great and the dress isn't super tight so you have some room to move and dance around. My one small complaint is the straps seemed to be a little long and I had to readjust a few times, but that's so minor that it doesn't deter from my love of the dress. Definitely would want to rent this dress again!! For reference, I wore the size 10 and I'm about 5'6", 34DD (31 in waist and 42 in hips--I find this more helpful with sizing personally). Definitely recommend a sticky bra that clasps in the front.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: The sizing is just right. I loved this dress!!
This dress was a win. I feel chic and sexy for my friends wedding. The color pops and it snugged my curves nicely. I'm definitely planning to rent again in the future.
I loved this dress. Fit so well and was able to dance all night !

I found the fit to run small I'm usually a size 8 . Other than that loved the dress got tons of compliments!!! The color is different from the picture it's more of a coral orange overall a great dress

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a night out with the girls!
links_reviews_text: Great dress for a night out with the girls. Not. I hope give but sucks everything in. Got a lot of compliments!
My husband loved this dress! Looks like a basic, sexy LRD from the front but the side details make it pop!

links_reviews_title: Really cute but not for tall people
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a Florida wedding. I loved the color and the subtle side cut-outs. My major issue was that the dress seemed to be made for those probably 5'6" or under - the straps were just 1-2 inches too short and the fitted hip area sat 2-3 inches higher than my hips. That being said, I went with it and got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! The color was super bright and fun, the fit was great, sexy cut but a good length. The only downside was the straps fell down a few times when I was dancing but other than that, it was great! Got lots of compliments on this dress!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a summer wedding - got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Runs a little tight in rib cage / chest area which is good if you want to go braless. I sized up to wear a backless bra but the straps were a tad big then.

Loved the way this dress fit my curvy hips/butt and small chest. Hard to find a dress that will stretch enough to fit my butt, but be tight enough to flatter my upper body. Beautiful orange-red color, perfect length and super sexy cutouts. All around LOVE. if I wasn't broke as heck hehe I would absolutely buy it!

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! I ordered the size 4 and 6, both fit but ended up wearing the 6 because I felt more comfortable in it. I usually am a small or size 4 in jeans. I am pretty short so I was nervous about the length but it looked great! The color was beautiful and bright and perfect for a summer wedding!
Loved the fit and got lots of compliments on it. Didn't wear a bra because of the side cut outs.

links_reviews_title: Must wear dress to a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: I am obsessed with this dress, and it's perfect for a wedding or a formal affair. From the beautiful salmon color, the the unique cross cross cut outs, to the stretchiness of the dress. Got tons of compliments and felt like a million bucks! I wore with nude heels and gold jewelry which I though paired well with the color. I would order true to size, I'm usually a 4/6 in dresses and the 4 fit and has some give around the hips which is needed for my shape. I didn't have any problems with the dress all night which is always nice not to stress about straps falling, nips slips, etc. Go order the dress!!!

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and the cutouts
links_reviews_text: Really loved the color and the cutouts oh this dress. I wore this for a night out on vacation in Mexico. Looks great with a tan!
Felt amazing in this dress! Definitely form-fitting, and you can't wear a normal bra with it due to the side panels.
Form fitting and comfortable. You’ll need a sticky bra with no sides.
Looked great, party canceled (quarantine)
Couldn't zip up or wear
Great length for corporate holiday party, fit true to size (didn't need bra or tape to keep everything in place). Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a spring time
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove! Got so many compliments

links_reviews_title: wow! this dress was great, I received so many compliments, and the detail on the sides were perfect
links_reviews_text: fit perfectly
The dress was super fun with the cutouts which obviously prevents you from being able to wear a bra. If you're large chested it works with a sticky bra but be prepared for a lot of cleavage.

Theia is a perfect designer for women with curves. I have a standard hourglass shape and this looked amazing. No need to wear a bra even though I'm a C-cup, and I was able to wear shapewear (which I do think helped) despite the side cutouts. I'm typically between a 10 and a 12, and the 10 was perfect for holding everything in place. This is the fourth Theia dress I've rented and I've loved all of them.
Perfect fit. Gorgeous side details.
Loved this dress! The fit was perfect. Simply stunning!
I wish I owned this dress--very comfortable, standout color, compliments all night! You'll have to wear a sticky bra because of the side panels

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress and color, but the TOP just didn't fit
links_reviews_text: I loved the sight of this dress. So pretty and feminine. It fit perfectly with one big exception. The top just didn't fit . . . at all. Sadly, not even close. So very very small. I am an average 36C. I had a tough time putting my finger on the problem. I came to the conclusion it would be a beautiful fit if you are an A or B cup, The lattice detail on the side is exquisite. Needless to say, I didn't get the opportunity to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Rent it if moving isn't high on your list
links_reviews_text: Stunning but absolutely claustrophobic dress. I sized up from 4 to 6 but still could barely breathe and definitely couldn't move. Looked like a bombshell but felt ornamental. Rent at least 2 sizes up if you want to be able to lift your arms high enough to put a coat over it.

This dress is definitely a showstopper. Wear this to a black tie event with no dancing because there was no moving in this dress. I ended up changing into my backup dress because it was so uncomfortable. This dress runs SMALL so definitely size up! I hate I didn't get to wear it all night, but comfort won the day.

links_reviews_title: Size up size up size up
links_reviews_text: If you read all the other reviews and size up this is an amazing dress. So many compliments. Not great for dinner if your trying to reach across the table for anything though.

I rented this dress for NYE after renting it in red last year for a wedding. Just beautiful and so well-made. RUNS SMALL. Order one, maybe two sizes up. I wore a 2 last year, and was 18 weeks pregnant for this rental - the 4 barely fit. So, not the best option for a pregnant person given how structured the tailoring is throughout the bodice (I know this seems obvious to most people, ha!). Highly recommend - you'll feel like a classy lady and get tons of compliments!

This dress was very flattering but reviews about it being uncomfortable are definitely true. I normally always select fashion over comfort, particularly for a wedding but this one was especially brutal- first time in memory I was more excited to take off my dress than my shoes. Normally I wear a size 2 or 4 so got the six, perhaps sizing up even more would have helped. That being said, I would probably still wear it again!

links_reviews_title: Showstopper! Loved everything about it. Looks very elegant and sexy at the same time.
links_reviews_text: Runs small. I needed two sizes bigger.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for a wedding and got soooo many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Such a flattering dress, but not the most comfortable. Really tight and hard to move arms. I went 2 sizes up.

It was gorgeous but i didn’t get the option for a backup size and went with the 6. I should have sized up to the 8. I literally felt my circulation being cut off to my arms, and my thighs didn’t stop touching until i took it off. Glad i didn’t drive because i had to shove myself into the Uber. Again, it’s beautiful but no stretch at all.

I am 5'6" 112 pounds and literally no boobs. I normally have trouble with "small dresses" that run too large. This dress however almost didn't fit. I got my normal size and then sized up just in case. I couldn't get my normal size over my nonexistent hips. BUT the larger size fit like a glove. It was amazing. Very tight, not much wiggle room but I would absolutely rent this dress again.

I was super excited (& somewhat nervous) to rent this piece after reading through the many reviews regarding fit and sizing. I am a slender build and typically wear a 4 (or at most a 6) in dresses. Still, I carefully considered reviews that suggested going two sizes up and so, I hesitantly ordered a size 10 (as there wasn’t an 8 available). Praise be for the smaller size not being an option, because the rental would have been a complete fail. The size 10 was *quite* form fitting; owing to the restrictive nature of the sleeves, I dare say a 12 may have even been ideal. That stated, I wouldn’t suggest wearing this piece for any event that requires a lot of arm movement or perhaps even leg movement (given that it’s a pencil skirt fit). Though, it’s perfect for a ‘stand still and be seen’ type of outing - and it’s gorgeous :)
Pro: Fabric is so thick, I didn't need Spanx. Con: You really can't lift your arms much. Great fit, and I'd rent again.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress and even better in person
links_reviews_text: Like other reviewers, I had to pour myself into this dress and was afraid I would be uncomfortable all night but wasn't. The fabric is very thick and holds everything together so felt great and received so many compliments!
This dress was awesome was alittle tight on the arms but otherwise great! very flattering and easy to wear
This dress was amazing! It does run small so go up at least one size. It fits all the right places! Loved it!

This dress was beautiful. Very old Hollywood. It was great to stand and look beautiful in. However, dancing, going to the bathroom (bring someone with you to unzip!) and overall just moving around is hard to do. I really needed a 10 but the 8 worked. I'm normally a 6. In hindsight this is more of like, a gala dress or something that doesn't involve dancing. The dress did stay up which is hard to find with a strapless dress. Overall very classes just SO tight and runs very, very small.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress! Top rental for me
links_reviews_text: The dress was unbelievable, I felt great in it and received many compliments. My ONLY complaint was the sizing, understand the sizes are not American, they are European and not accurate. I understood they ran small. This is not the case. I went up 3 sizes and the dress was still too small. I couldn’t dance and split the dress sitting down. My overall experience would have been best wearing the correct size. Rent the Runway, could you update the sizes?!

It took two people and a lot of squeezing, but once I finally got in the dress I felt so glamorous! Luckily it stretched out a bit over the course of the night. SERIOUSLY order way larger than you think. I'm usually 4-6 and 10 was pushing it.

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated with just the right amount of sexy
links_reviews_text: 5'3 & 130 lbs, usually a 2-4 in dresses but ordered a 6 & 8 in this... ended up wearing the 8 and it was still a little snug...dress is gorgeous and would recommend.

links_reviews_title: Runs very very small, but truly stunning dress
links_reviews_text: The arms especially were extremely small, nonetheless I received many compliments on the dress and wish I could have kept it!

Loved this! Size up! I actually tried a 6 but went with the 10 for comfort. Busty girls can still wear a bra. I wore one but had to keep pulling the top section up. Dress is difficult to dance in since you can't move your arms. Beautiful dress!

Wore this to a black tie optional wedding. Received a ton of compliments. Luckily I read all the reviews on sizing. Usually I am a 4/6 but wore an 8. Nothing but good things to say about it, a little difficult to raise your arms but worth it!
I felt amazing in this. SIZE UP! I am normally a 4-6 and I wore the 8.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress and absolutely loved the neckline!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs extremely small and has no stretch, make sure to order a few sizes up. I'm only 5'2", so the dress hit lower on my legs than I would have preferred if I owned the dress.

I normally wear a 4/6 and based on the reviews decided to try a size 8. It fit tight on my shoulders and upper arms and a little loose around my waist. Because of the tightness around my arms I wasn't able to lift them comfortably. So I went with a different dress. I can see why this one is so popular, it's a beautiful dress, classic cut, modest length and if I'd been able to move easier I would have worn this to my friends wedding because I felt like Marilyn Monroe in this one! And who doesn't want to feel like that goddess!?

I poured myself into this gorgeous dress! I am a solid size 4 and based on others reviews, I sized up to an 8. That advice was perfect. I am 5'2 and I like the longer length. For reference, I have an hourglass shape, 32D. You will have limited mobility in the arms, but the dress is really fabulous.

Man, was this dress a hit... but the other reviews are NOT lying about it running small. I'm usually around a 4, sized up to a 6 and could BARELY zip it up. By the end of the night, it was stretched out and much easier to wear but it took a lot of dancing to get it there. Either way, it was worth it - LOVE LOVE LOVED the dress.

I am so torn on this dress. I wanted to love it but the sizing is ridiculous. I rent clothes from another service and never have issues. I am 5'7" and 155 lbs with an athletic build. I generally wear a size 6, but even the 12 was tight in my arms and chest. While I am athletic, I've never had anything so tight on my arms and chest but lose through my waist and hips. The size 10 fit much better through the hips and waist but there's no way I could have zipped it. Even the 12 required help zipping and I couldn't wait to take it off as my ribs felt like they were slowly being crushed. If your curvier I'm really not sure how you would use the restroom in this. I could luckily pull it up since it was lose in the hips but I can't imagine curvier ladies having that ability. Overall: don't plan on being remotely comfortable, size up, and not for an event where you need lots of motion. So cute but not functional.

links_reviews_title: I mean this dress is EVERYTHING
links_reviews_text: This picture doesn't do it justice. When I say this dress is everything, I mean EVERYTHING. I was voted best dressed by my coworkers and they're never that nice lol. The "cons" of this dress are: it runs small and you will need help getting zipped in. You won't be able to lift your arms very much. And it shows the outline of your undies. Some helpful tips are to get this dress a couple of sizes up or to go to the website for this designer and use their measurements to determine your size. You WILL NOT NEED a bra or shape wear, trust me!! I will highly recommend no show undies tho. Get this dress. Do it. Click "reserve".

links_reviews_title: Sexy yet classy! Great option for early-mid pregnancy
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress at 19 weeks pregnant and loved it, it is the perfect LBD that is just the right amount of sexy and classy. However, definitely size up. I have an hourglass figure so I'm already curvy, that mixed with the baby bump made this dress quite fitting! I am typically a size 4, I wore a size 8 because that was the only other size available, I think a 10 would've been perfect (and much more comfortable). Also, if you're busty you may want to be a little careful with this one, my pregnancy boobs are at a DD right now and at times I felt like I was going to tumble out of the top. All-in-all, I would definitely rent this dress again, but just take everyone's advice to heart and be conservative when selecting your size.

I paid close attention to other reviews and decided to order a size 10&12, I normally wear a 6 or 8. I couldn't zip the 10 and the 12 was still incredibly snug around my bust and arms. I wore it anyway, as I didn't have time to order a backup. I received tons of compliments, but I was uncomfortable most of the night.

Ladies! Listen to the reviews! This dress runs small. I'm usually a size 0 and I'm so glad I ordered the 4. Loved the style but it was hard to keep the dress up and it was difficult to move my arms. Great for a fundraiser because I wasn't moving much but I definitely couldn't wear this to a wedding.

links_reviews_title: The shipping was incredible & I'm incredibly busy.RTR was right on time & every thing was INCREDIBLE
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size & being a tall woman that wears 5 inch heels it was the classy length. Still sexy but conservative! Never ending compliments! The great little Black Dress. Every woman that is looking too politely turn heads, this is the dress. The packaging is highly organized and easy to access.

I just had a baby - 2 months ago and this was perfect and so glad I sized up 2 sizes. I'm in between sizes and my bust was even bigger than expected bc I'm nursing so I was all bust! But loved the curves, loved the material- thick enough to hold the girls in! If you are curvy be prepared for some major cleavage. But I still thought it was super classy dress. Loved my first rental!

links_reviews_title: This dress is GREATfor your figure. But she is tight, would totally rent again
links_reviews_text: The tightest region is the bust/where the zipper ends because the sleeves in the fabric don’t give. Take these ladies seriously about sizing up, im usually a 0-2 and I squeezed in the 4. Only downfall is feeling like you have t-Rex arms all night. But I would say the fit is worth it. Material isn’t too thick, but thick enough you don’t need shaper under it.

links_reviews_title: The compliments I received where good for the ego :)
links_reviews_text: There are no words in the dictionary to describe how fantastic this dress was. Based on the reviews I ordered a size 4, initally it was too small. I removed my bra, and it fit perfectly. It hugs your hips, so it was a bit restricting when trying to dance. I am on a hunt to find this dress so that I can purchase it!

Love this dress! The neckline was really flattering, and I felt so sexy in it! It really has that old Hollywood feel to it. The only reason I gave four stars was that it was quite small. I read the reviews and got two sizes up. And thank goodness I did! I ALWAYS need a bra, and I didn't even need one it was so form fitting. Which was nice because it def gave the sex appeal but when it came to dancing it was a little difficult. I couldn't really even get a full stride in when I walked lol. BUT I am a slave for fashion and I have to say that it was a worth it sacrifice for how great I felt in it!
Absolutely adored this dress, and received so many complements, but grateful I ordered 2 sizes up (I'm typically a size 6). It's itty bitty.

When they says it runs small, BELIEVE THEM!! I usually wear a 4, I rented and 8 and it was snug but very flattering. Sitting, going to the bathroom, putting shoes on we're challenging but the pay off was my husband jaw dropping every time he looked at me. He must have told me I was beautiful more than any night I can remember in 15 years!! Plus my daughter said I should buy the dress. Win win!!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this little black dress!
links_reviews_text: This was a sleek and elegant dress! I received so many compliments...it hugged in all the right places! Per the reviews I ordered a higher size than normal. (Depending on the designer I can wear anything from a 4-8) I ordered an 8 and a 10 and the 8 fit perfectly. It is limited with arm range of motion, but manageable!

I got so many compliments and loved this dress. It is made in China and the sizing is not true to American sizing. I wear a size 6 and wore a VERY tight 10. I would have been more comfortable in a 12!

links_reviews_title: Perfect printed dress for any party, wedding or vacation
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress for vacation, but will rent again for a summer wedding or party! Loved the dress. Fit was perfect. It was super comfy but the fabric was nice enough and heavy enough to dress up or down.
I am more than 5m pregnant at 138lbs and I still wore a 0! Dress runs big. It's gorgeous and feels amazing!

links_reviews_title: Such a cute and fun dress
links_reviews_text: Very comfy and felt great in this dress. Straps were adjustable which was nice and necessary. Didn't need or wear a bra with it. Would definitely rent again!
Fit great. Nice material wore it casual and with heels!
Nonstop compliments, comfortable as hell, loved everything about this dress!

I took the advice of other reviewers to size down, and was so glad I did! I'm a very consistent size 14, and the 12 fit perfectly. The straps are adjustable, so no need to wear a bra- the girls will be held in.... But there will be alot of skin showing. I also tried the dress with a cami slip, and a bandeau- neither looked good- just go au natural & be grateful for what your momma gave ya 😉💯🙌🏼

Wore this a number of times- date nights, semi formal dinner. It was really flattering. I usually wear a 4 and originally ordered a 4 but exchanged for a 2 which was more flattering yet still forgiving in the ribcage and hip area because of the shape/style. Great for post partum bods. Worked well with a sweater blazer and a wool wrap on a different occasion. Fabric is somewhat structured, has a little weight due to the type of fabric, layers and lining.

I loved this dress! It fit perfectly, even after a few buffets (a very important criteria for my wardrobe selection). I could go without a bra and felt super comfortable. Perfect for my trip to Napa where I pretended to be fancy. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful quality. I could have sized down.
links_reviews_text: Love the quality of the fabric and flowy style. Got it in my usual size 2 and it is works with a strapless bra but barely. I'm small chested (32B), small rib cage, straps aren't adjustable and the front is low cut. Those things combined make the top a little big. This could be fixed by wearing a plunge bra or bralette. If you're larger up top then you're fine. Since the bottom is so flowy a size 0 would have worked for me as well, probably better. At 5'3" it hits a little above the ankle. The only other cons are that it hurts to lean against the top of the back zipper/clasp and I needed help clasping the top piece. I do like how the skirt is lined. On a warm nyc day it didn't add too much heat but does give the dress nice structure and it's also a nice feature for the freezing indoor AC temps

You know when you put on a dress and you automatically feel amazing and confident. This is that dress! I'm petite and the length was a perfect tea length. I can fit into a 4 or 6- I went with a 6 but either could have worked because of the adjustable straps and awesome cut. I easily dress this up with heels and accessories.
Would rent again! Super easy to wear

The fabric and design of this dress was high end, but it fit like a maternity on my petite frame. If you carry small you could easily wear this in your third trimester. There is so much material in the front and back. I couldn't wear it at all, I tried, I wanted to like it. It is a gorgeous dress.

links_reviews_title: Wonderful dress! Super comfortable and the fabric/print are even better in person!
links_reviews_text: Fits a little large, but overall perfect!

links_reviews_title: Well made,transitional colors for warm fall weather
links_reviews_text: Fitted on top but a little flowing through middle, still felt good in it though

links_reviews_title: surprisingly was able to wear a strapless bra!
links_reviews_text: Ended up wearing it for 5+ events. so easy and chic.
Really unflattering on me. The volume was not flattering and it showed a lot of cleavage. Just not a good look for me but might be darling on someone else.

links_reviews_title: Will wear to an upcoming event out of town.
links_reviews_text: Love the dress, the fit, everything.
I'm 5'1" and this dress was skimming the floor when I put it on. But thankfully it has a peplum so I was able to belt it under the peplum and tuck up the extra fabric so it was the right length.
Loved the top but the bottom was so big and full that it was unflattering. i didn't wear.
Size up if you have a larger chest, the whole dress fit me perfectly but the triangles for the top basically only fit half of my chest
Loved the colors and incredibly comfortable. Perfect length with a platform sandal. Only potential downside- a lot of boobs, so not work appropriate.

i'm typically a 2 and this fit perfectly w plenty of room for a large dinner. cannot recommend this enough for a date night or even work to dinner w a blazer. hit my ankles, but i was able to wear heels or flats. both worked well. no bra needed. fitted around the chest, then flowing. highly highly recommend
I ordered up a size and it was a mistake. Sadly I could not wear it- bummer because it's gorgeous

links_reviews_title: Instant beauty! I loved this for work with a blazer and pumps to casual sandals for after work play.
links_reviews_text: The print is bold and eye catching, but it can be dressed up or down.

After several attempts to rent some thing I finally settled on this. My original choice was unavailable but the staff at RTR was awesome and assisted me with every option until I found one. They even overnighted it to the hotel for me. It's a great color. Definitely true to size. Was very comfortable. I really don't have anything bad to say about it except that it definitely requires something a little more high waisted to wear with it!
Loved the Lacey red for holiday parties. Lots of bare spots so be ready with a nice bra racer back or strapless as its sheer over the shoulders. A little Bulky through middle but fun.

Loved this top, the fit was perfect, I wore a strapless nude bra and thought that worked, though the back is sheer. The sleeves are also sheer and so pretty. The one complaint was that I don't think my top was cleaned properly and I thought it still smelled a bit. I was rushing in the morning and didn't notice it til I was already out so I wore it. But I think I would have not worn it had I realized sooner. Really an otherwise stunner of a top.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not exactly my style
links_reviews_text: I might have preferred it to be a little more fluid but that is more my style and not the fault of the piece. Gorgeous lace and beautiful details.
Not a great item for a full bust!
Great for a short torso person
unique design
I love this top! The color is so beautiful. It's very short waisted, even for me who has a very short torso.

links_reviews_title: I never wore this so it wasn't memorable.
links_reviews_text: It rides up a lot. For a shorter person, my torso could technically be considered long but when it rode up it also made the chest bunch up so I looked heavy.
I SO wanted to love this top! The red is beautiful and the sleeves are super fun. However, the length is much shorter than I anticipated and there are strange cutouts on the collarbone.
Cute just not the best look for me
Very pretty! Work appropriate and good for date night.

This is a beautiful top! It fit great and was comfortable. Unfortunately I could not find anything to wear that looked good with it. It is short waisted and I am a 34 DD and only 5' tall so even though it was pretty it was just not flattering to my body so I did not wear it.
too much volume

I wore this dress to a wedding in Mexico and was showered with compliments all evening. The lace detail was gorgeous and I loved the rich rust color. The unique fit made a statement as well. I would rent again!

I rented this to take anniversary pictures with my boyfriend. It did run big, but I opted not to belt it. I was able to pin my bra so it didn't show too much. GREAT movement (we took some spinning pictures) which is mainly why I chose this dress. It ended up matching the sunflower centers perfectly. A little thick material but since it had extra fabric, it wasn't too hot. Probably wouldn't buy but loved it for this occasion!

links_reviews_title: Dancing the night away in a comfortable gorgeous dress
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. I did pair it with a belt just because I liked the contrast against the dress! Very comfortable and got compliments all night !

links_reviews_title: Fun to dance in, love the skirt.
links_reviews_text: I ended up with a size small because the extra small was out of stock. I was worried it might be too large because of some other reader comments, but it was a good size. The neck was a bit tight, the armholes were a bit large, and the waist was a bit large like other renters have said, but it wasn't uncomfortable for me. I wore it without a bra and that was fine. I wore it for about 6 hours for a wedding and was comfortable. One thing I wasn't expecting is that the liner was a bit short, I felt myself checking to make sure the skirt wasn't ridding up through the night. Overall though, comfortable and really cute! lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: If you like wearing a tent, this one's for you!
links_reviews_text: I was SWIMMING in this dress and had to add a belt just to gather up the extra material. I got lots of compliments though. Very artsy--wore it for opening night of a play.

links_reviews_title: Fit perfect for my body type and was SO comfortable
links_reviews_text: Runs big, the neck is a little tight and it cuts in a bit at the boob, so you can't wear a normal bra.

This was a perfect fall dress! Beautiful in person definitely for anyone that wants a flowy boho feel. I was able to wear a strapless bra. You can add a belt if you would like but I liked tight fit on top and how it hung loose. Many compliments throughout the night!

links_reviews_title: Did not want to return this dress
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. I ordered one size down like the other reviewers suggested, but I found it was true to size on me. The XS would've worked, but I went with the S because the neck hole was bigger. I wore it without a bra and even though it was a religious wedding, I didn't feel like I was too exposed. It photographed beautifully from some angles but looked a little unflattering from others due to all the fabric on the bottom. But I also felt like all the fabric balanced me out since I have broad shoulders and a large ribcage. It's a little darker in person than it looks in the pictures and the underlay is orange, not white. My only issue with this dress was the neckline. It was a little itchy and tight at first, but as the night went on I was able to tune it out. Overall a great dress that I got many compliments on!

I wore this to my fall themed baby shower at 33 weeks pregnant. I didn't mind the low armholes, but I also didn't wear a bra, so I wasn't concerned about straps or sides showing. I'm also pretty broad around the chest and ribs (38" pre-pregnancy) so there were no gaps. I was worried this would feel too big since it has draping to accentuate the rear, but by styling with some tall wedges, it really helped me feel more proportional. I had strangers in the street complimenting me on this one. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Copper is the best fall color!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a rustic barn wedding, that ended up being a ridiculous 90 degrees in October. The lace was breathable and not too heavy for the amount of fabric. I got compliments all night long, I would have rented the small - but it was unavailable. The medium was more like a large and definitely hung loosely around my armpit area showing off a bit of my side boob/bra. But I believe it gave more of a loose footing hippy feel, than I'll fitting. #wedding #sideboob #beautyandthebeard

This dress was just as amazing as other reviewers described. It definitely caught the attention of other wedding guests and I got a lot of compliments! It is a nice burnt orange/copper color. I was concerned with looking too much like a pumpkin for this October wedding but it didn't have that vibe. The midi length was so classy--I'm 5'11" and it really hit just at the knee for me, but that was fine. The lining under the lace was long enough to be comfortable. The skirt is wayyyy bigger than it appears, so it was so fun to spin in on the dance floor! I was concerned about side boob--I am usually a size 6 and the medium was the only size available for my weekend. I definitely could have sized down to a small because the dress is not very fitted. However, the sides were not overly revealing. I wore an adhesive bra and nothing showed. Highly recommend this for your fall and winter weddings!

links_reviews_title: Size down, consider two sizes if you don't have a large chest
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful and I got so many compliments. Based on reviews, I sized down and still had plenty of room. If I didn't have a larger chest, I probably would have wanted to go down two sizes to provide more shape in the waist. This was the only full body picture I got so it unfortunately doesn't show, but the waist is not form fitting, so if you prefer a dress with more shape that is something to consider. I thought about wearing a belt to cinch at the waist, but it is so beautiful on its own I went without. Perfect dress for a fall wedding!

links_reviews_title: the burnt orange color is gorgeous!!
links_reviews_text: I had gotten the Small and Medium, usually I wear medium, but the small fit a little better without wearing a bra which was good, because like others have said, the holes for the arms are a little big. The only downside, the neck was a little tight at first, but I eventually got used to it, if you are not a fan of things around your neck tightly, I'd stay away, but otherwise the dress is great. Orange is my favorite color on me and the dress was the perfect color.

links_reviews_title: The color is amazing for a fall Wedding. I added the belt to dress it up! I love the high neck!
links_reviews_text: I am between a 10-12! I ordered a large and it fit like a glove! I added the belt so it was more of a fitted look! I rented the earrings too! Love those with the high neck!

I wanted something uniquely elegant for a late summer wedding, and this dress fit the bill! I felt beautiful in the copper color with the high lace neckline, and loved how it flared on the dance floor. It was little larger than I anticipated and being the RTR n00b that I am, I didn't rent a second size. I ended up belting it around the waist, which accentuated my curves and helped the fit. I loved this dress and would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and flow and movement of the dress.
links_reviews_text: This definitely runs large. Whatever your size is, order one down and then another one down for your back-up. They didn't have a size down and so I went with the 4/6 anyway. Belt was a necessity because of both the oversizing and the cut of the dress. I also pinned both sides under the armpits a little bit. The armpits also run longer than I would have liked. Still, I got lots of compliments on the look. I would recommend it - just order size down!
wore this for a fall wedding - got many compliments! Wish I could have bought it!

links_reviews_title: Love the top/neckline of this dress especially - fun and classy!
links_reviews_text: As others have said, very wide armholes, so tape or the like is really your only bet. I didn't wear a bra at all, but the top is snug enough so that my ladies were not entirely loose and I was comfortable all evening. I am not feeling great about my belly area at the moment, so it was nice to have it loose at the bottom - I didn't even wear spanx. Fun to dance in!
Wore this for family pictures and to church. Love the orange color and lace touches. Great fit but looked better belted with a belt I already owned. Very hippie chic
The lace detail was gorgeous, color was a beautiful rust. The cut was a little low on the side of the chest, but stayed in place all night. Loved and would rent again

I wore this dress to an outside graduation. It was great for the weather. I ordered a M and L. The medium worked out. It was a great feel: light weight and airy. The color was gorgeous and the flow made it even better.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a rehearsal dinner in Chicago, IL.
links_reviews_text: This dress actually looks much better in pictures than in person (in my opinion). It is cut close to the armpits and as I have a large bust, I didn't have a bra to wear that would not show (I chose one as close to skin color as possible, but it was still visible). I got TONS of compliments on the pictures I posted on social media, but not as many compliments in person. It was a fun, flirty dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, flowy dress with gorgeous lace detail!
links_reviews_text: I'm early in my pregnancy and don't look pregnant yet, but don't fit well into my regular size. This was the perfect dress for the in-between stage. You can size down, but I found that the neckline felt too tight when I did that, so I was happy with my regular size. Because it's such a wide flowy skirt, it is very forgiving. Make sure you have a nice, nude strapless bra because anything else will show.

I loved this Free People dress! It was very comfortable and flattering.. I paired it with a denim jacket and minimal jewlery to keep it casual. I do agree, it runs larger in size.. so I opt for the XS.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress that invited complements all evening.
links_reviews_text: Color is less copper in person. Definitely go the size smaller. Looks and moves lovely. A bit tight at the neck.

This was an out-of-the-box pick for me, but it was so worth it. The dress is very comfortable (I didn't belt it, but it would easily be even more stylish with one) and easy to wear. I wore a strapless bra with no problem. The color and lace are striking without being overwhelming.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful wedding, beautiful venue, beautiful company, and stunning bride!
links_reviews_text: This was my backup dress and I absolutely loved it! The color was so vibrant, the lace beautiful, and the style was so flattering. The length was perfect for me at 5' 7" with heels that were a few inches tall. Like previous reviews stated, it does run a tad large. I typically wear a Medium or Size 8 and was able to comfortably wear a size Small. It is a bit roomy in the waist, so I belted it with a brown ribbon to really cinch the waste. It looked great with or without, but I wanted it more form fitting for the evening. The side does cut a bit low, but I was able to wear a strapless bra and it did not show. This is one I would definitely rent again and would love to own! If you rent this dress, do yourself a favor when dancing and twirl the night away!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. So different from typical cocktail dress. Great for a fall wedding.
links_reviews_text: the fit is so comfortable

Rented this for a formal fall wedding. The dress was super comfy and the accessory options are endless. I went back and forth on wearing a belt with it as others have suggested, but in the end felt it looked fine without. I usually would wear a M but wore the S in this. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Best shade of orange in a fun style
links_reviews_text: This dress was really fun to wear in a great shade of burnt orange. I loved that the skirt was full but the top form fitting. The lace was feminine and boho but still youthful, sophisticated and appropriate for this event. The dress ran large so I wore a medium without a bra it fit perfectly (the large fit with a bra but was too loose around the waist and ribcage ). Wish I had a black leather jacket to wear with it but a black Gail eres suit jacket worked well and I liked it with strappy black heels.

The XS was a perfect fit for me. The neck was a little tight, but not enough to make me not wear the dress. I paired it with a grey belt and shoes and received tons of compliments! Perfect dress for a Fall wedding!
Love this cut for my body shape. High quality material.

The dress was very comfortable. The color was beautiful, especially for a fall event. The sizing was true to my bodice. I tend to be a 6 on top and an 8 across my bottom. This dress truly accommodates that kind of figure. It is not cut to cling. There was plenty of bodice room. As other reviews have noted the top and armhole area are cut in. I did need to wear an appropriate bra color because it does peek out. I am sure, if I were 20 years younger, a strapless bra would have been best. I enjoyed wearing this dress! The dress did arrive a day late. RTR staff acknowledged my concern kindly and efficiently. Thank you

I loved the color of the dress and how perfect it was for a Fall wedding. It's more of a burnt orange than a copper, per say, but it got plenty of compliments (especially in pictures from the event). This dress also TWIRLED; dancing at the reception was so much fun with this number! I'm also glad I got the Medium rather than the Large, following advice from other reviews (I'm normally a dress size 10). However, as others have mentioned, the fit is a little complicated. The neckline was very high, and the arm holes are very large and low. Since I'm a little bigger on the top, I wore a strapless bra, but I had to wear a sweater or remember to keep my arms down so it wouldn't show on the sides. I found myself trying to adjust where the dress fell on me all night, and I learned that I don't prefer a high neckline, as it was a little restricting for me, personally. Although it photographed well, I feel like the fit wasn't as ideal as other dresses I've rented. Overall, I liked it, but I didn't love it.
I'm normally a small in FP but went a size down because it was all around a better fit

Waist was loose but didn't look bad to me. I felt very well put together and ready to dance all night in this dress at the wedding I wore it to. I did grow tired of the restricting neck as I knew I would but it looked so good that I stuck it out much longer than I thought I would! Disclaimer, I am writing this a little far after the fact so I don't actually remember exactly which size I wore... sorry!
This dress got tons of compliments!! It runs large and I would recommend to get a smaller size. It was perfect for my 30 week bump. It was such a great fall color!

I ordered this dress to wear to an evening show in Pittsburgh PA. The weather was warm so the dress was a great weight. I ordered a large and it ran a bit too big. I had to belt in the waist and I had to wear a wee jacket to cover my arms. The arm holes are ridiculously open and low. Too much exposure. I received many complements while wearing this dress. My advise - Size Down and Twirl Around!

The dress had an odd smell so I had to air it out for several days. The arm holes were large and showed more than I liked but overall for a wine country wedding on a working farm in the fall it was perfect!!! The lace was country but still sophisticated and the color was rich. All the ladies in the wedding party wore cowboy boots and this dress was perfect for that too.

links_reviews_title: A wonderful dress for a fall wedding guest!
links_reviews_text: This is a great dress for dancing and sitting at a formal event without having to worry about preserving your modesty (especially after a few drinks!). It's comfortable and chic, and as many other reviews noted, it runs quite large. I'm a 34A, 5'6", 125 pounds with a pear-shaped figure and found that the XS fit just a tad large. If you're petite, I imagine this dress might run too big for you! It was perfect for the occasion and was a great first RTR rental.

Pretty dress. The fabric was much heavier than expected. The top was big and very low cut, but the waist fit perfectly. Seemed too revealing to wear and didn't look good with tank underneath either. I was worried I may tear the sleeve picking up my kiddos, but it made it pretty and unique.
Very long dress. Wore one size up as I was concerned about it being too tight. Must wear high heels for sure!! Received wonderful compliments.

links_reviews_title: AMAZING dress ladies, wedding, formal eve; BUT deep cleavage (I used tape to keep it together!)
links_reviews_text: AMAZING dress ladies, wedding, formal eve; BUT deep cleavage (I used tape to keep it together!)

links_reviews_title: Great dress for bridal shower tea party
links_reviews_text: Fit great at 22 weeks pregnant!

links_reviews_title: Floral dress for a formal spring wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress definitely stood out and the floral print was perfect for spring. As other reviews have mentioned, this dress does run tight in the waist and hips. I'm normally a size 4, and ended up wearing the size 6. I didn't wear the loose sleeve on the side and no one noticed, but it did add an extra ruffle look on one side. The neckline is very deep so I used fashion tape and a safety pin to make it more modest. The length in the back was a little long for my height (5ft2in with 3in heels), so I had to hold it in certain situations so it wouldn't drag behind me. In the end, this dress was comfortable to wear and hugged all the right places, it just needed some extra work to fit the top.

links_reviews_title: Sexy and feminine dress, just needs a pin for the front
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me so so well. It was feminine with the floral print and ruffles. The front slit and tight fit in the hips/ waist made it very sexy. The front is VERY low cut. Too low cut. With a safety pin I was able to wear a bra and feel fairly comfortable that nothing would show. But it was still more cleavage that I typically like to expose.
Loved this for a wedding I attended in Puerto Rico. Very low cut and requires some double sided tape, and has a pretty high slit, but still super pretty!
Super fun and festive for bridal parties.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a dinner party with my work team in New Orleans. Semi formal dinner, fun, and flirty.
links_reviews_text: Nice fit, true to size. Loved the colorful material. I ordered the selected jewelry as well, and it complimented this dress perfectly.
