I have an athletic build with curves, 34-36DDD. Deep v-cut showed off the girls and I had to use a safety pin and double sided tape to create a tasteful boost!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous for an outdoor wedding! Many compliments received!
links_reviews_text: This was my backup dress for an end of summer evening wedding. I wasn't sure if it would be too summery for an almost fall wedding but after trying it on i just had to wear it! I got so many compliments left and right! I usually wear a 2 and ordered a 4 based on reviews that it ran big. It fit perfect! It is a little low cut but I am small so it didn't bother me.

I got this dress for a formal party. I didn't read the reviews before ordering and realized it runs small and had to get a 12 instead of my usual 8/10, so keep that in mind when ordering. It's extremely flattering for women with hour glass shapes like myself. I felt beautiful in this dress and got many compliments. A true statement piece.
Wore this to a friends birthday tea party
This dress is absolutely gorgeous with nice thick material that is forgiving on your body. Unfortunately couldn't wear because it was so tight around my waist- I have a big rib cage though.

I got this dress for a formal wedding. I went into a Rent the Runway store and they only had the dress in a size 2R, the dress fit ok, but was snug when I was zipping it up over my shoulder blade area, so I went home to order the 4R instead. Unfortunately, it was not available, but I loved the dress so much I went ahead and got the 2R. The day of the wedding it fit much better than expected and I received SO many compliments. I agree with other reviews that the cut in the front is very low, but I was still fine with wearing a plunge V bra. If it wasn't so expensive in real life, I would buy this for other occasions!! I also didn't wear the extra arm fabric, I saw in reviews some people pinned it down, but I didn't even do that and you couldn't notice, it just added an extra ruffle layer on your side.

I weigh 191 I should have sized up. Dress has no stretch so if youre too wide in the hips. This dress might not be for you. I wore no bra, I just used a safety pin to hold the cleavage area together. I would rent again

I rented this dress for a Linen & Sundress Party and I felt fabulous! I read the reviews and what everyone said was accurate about the bust since it's so low cut that you will need to pin it or adjust it so it's not too revealing. If you are slim and petite, I would size down. I wore a size 2 but could have gone with a O instead. However, if you are busty and curvy, I would size up. This dress was perfect for the party. The material was well made and was comfortable enough for warm weather. Most importantly I was able to dance with ease and looked fabulous while I doing it! As always, RTR to the rescue! Last Minute never looked so good!

links_reviews_title: Colors are beautiful. I definitely stood out.
links_reviews_text: The colors are beautiful. Chest area is a bit big and may fit women a bit taller. I'm practically a hobbit.

links_reviews_title: I wore this as my bridesmaid dress in my friends wedding!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this dress! As far as the fit goes, I had a little extra fabric near my lower back area, other than that, it fit like a glove! The front cut is extremely low and I had to use a safety pin but no one noticed! I also pinned the side that can go over your left arm to the side of the dress (no one noticed that either) Really enjoyed the flow and fit of this dress!

links_reviews_title: Super soft fabric; got many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Dress made me feel beautiful while celebrating my birthday at the beach. It runs large at the top, so I had to pin it. Size 6 probably was a better fit but then it would have been tighter at the bottom and I wanted to be 100% comfortable.
I absolutely loved this dress! My only complaint is that it's too low cut so I had to use a safety pin to bring the v neck together. Other than that, this is one of my favorite dresses!

links_reviews_title: Festive, fun, but needs some adjustments!
links_reviews_text: I loved the style - V-neck, ruffles and sexy split! But, let me warn you I had to make a few adjustments. 1) V-neck was very DEEP, so had to safety pin it to bring it in a tad. 2) Not made for women with hips and hiney. The dress has 0 stretch, so was super tight around my hips. Whew! Could barely pull it down all the way. Spanx helped, but still a bit uncomfy for sitting. Otherwise, it's a lovely dress made of a gorg print!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for the Kentucky Derby and it was perfect for this event.
links_reviews_text: It is long, so make sure to wear a higher heel shoe

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, but very low cut
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and got tons of compliments on it. I had to wear a cami underneath because of how low cut it is but overall I loved it.

I loved the way this dress fit! It was super comfortable but formal enough to wear to a formal awards ceremony. I got so many compliments on it. I am busty, so I needed to wear a cami underneath because of the deep v neck. It is also on the longer side. I am 5'2 and even with 4 inch heels the back still touched the ground (just barely).
Amazing fit and design. A bit fitted in the middle and hip area so you may want to size up. Also low cut for fuller chests. But still love this dress and got so many compliments

Very pretty dress, the top was too low cut for that style of dress, at least for me. Pretty though and felt very feminine. It was true to size, I'm 5'6" with athletic build ( more narrow hips,) I think if I had a butt or hips that part may have been too tight.

links_reviews_title: This dress is so beautiful! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs really small I usually wear an 8 and had to get a 12. This dress hugs curves in all the right places and on the dance floor this dress was amazing! I felt like a princess the entire night!
Tight for athletic build!

This dress is gorgeous. The neckline is very low, so I did have to use double sided tape since it was a corporate environment. Make sure to measure your hips to get the correct size as it is fitted through the hips and backside.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress - received lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I ordered the size 2 and size 4. The size 4 actually fit tighter than the 2 and had some flaws, so I ended up wearing the 2, which was a little snug. Overall gorgeous dress but wish the 4 fit better.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, not ideal for curvy or short women.
links_reviews_text: Rented for garden wine event, and it would have been perfect but sadly didn't fit. Super tight on my curvy hips and also too long for me 5'3". Best suited for tall, thin women.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous print and fabric, fits specific body types
links_reviews_text: This print and fabric were gorgeous and I loved the dress's details. However the shape was cut for someone with bigger hips than me, and I wasn't able to wear it. I think a size down wouldn't have worked - this seems like it would mostly suit an hourglass figure.
This dress was too tight. The moment I saw I was going to struggle getting this up passed my thighs I stopped. Would recommend sizing up

Was sad to say this dress had a rip in it. I was planning to wear it to a friend's wedding, but I guess it just wasn't meant to be. Otherwise the material is thick and heavier. Length was great with a pair of heels and was comfortable.
Too Small

This dress was gorgeous and it was comfortable. The material was very thick and heavy but the fit was beautiful. The only catch was the breast area as it kept opening and exposing my bra. I ended up wearing a different dress but this one is definitely a keeper!

links_reviews_title: So unflattering that I couldn't wear it!
links_reviews_text: Dress didn't fit well at all- hugged all the wrong things and was very low cut. Beautiful design- disappointing it didn't work!
Way too tight on the hip. Could not wear. The sleeve falling next to it was awkward at best
Beautiful dress, very well constructed. Felt fantastic to wear. Wore it to an event and got tons of compliments.
Wore this for a derby party. Cut was so low. I loved the length and fun skirt cut, however.

Such an elegant dress! I wore this for a fancy date night to see Hamilton, after which we dropped into my boyfriend's formal work holiday party. Dress is on the longer side: I am just short of 5'6" and was wearing 4" strappy wedge heels, yet the outer fabric was still lightly grazing the floor. (Would not be a issue if you're slightly taller.) Overall, the dress was very comfortable and not at all revealing despite going braless. I felt sensual and classy!
The fit was true to size, very comfortable, and the open cutout on front and back were gorgeous! Everything stayed in place and I didn't have to worry about it at all during the night!
Love this dress. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Loved how it flowed and was fitted!
links_reviews_text: The R length was perfect with 4 inch heels for my height. If I leaned forward, the fabric would buckle and make an opening on my chest. Nothing a little fashion tape couldn't fix (taped two sides together at base of chest) and wearing pasties to feel secure!

This was actually my backup dress to a November wedding, but I liked it better than the original. It fit nicely and I felt comfortable in it all night. The long was very long though, even for someone 5'9 and wearing 2-3 inch heels!

links_reviews_title: Very flattering and comfortable but deep V
links_reviews_text: Great fit and very comfortable but had to pin the neckline because it was very deep/wide

I went with the 8R while wearing flats. I'm 5 10. The hem just grazed the ground. Could not wear a bra, and I needed a little fashion tape to make sure the cutout in the front stayed in place. The dress is very elegant. It's subtle and classy.

Very nice dress in a beautiful navy blue color, but the top will definitely fit different on every body. Not too tricky, but a bit tricky. I had to pin the front diamond opening which was revealing, without being ridiculous looking. The back is open and the zipper/band where the dress gathers at the waist is a bit tight around the ribs if you have broad ribs/any ribs at all. Size one size up and be prepared to pin the fabric around the chest. Otherwise, it was a beautiful dress. The only other thing that's hard is that the lining kept riding up and twisting, which I notice on many dresses these days. The dress doesn't LOOK low quality, but this tells me it wasn't particularly well-made. The lining just clung and twisted and had to be readjusted throughout the evening quite a bit.

True to size! I wear an 8 and got an 8 long so I could wear heels. I'm 5'9 and wore 4 inch heels. Fabric is so amazing, flows beautifully, and very flattering. Used dress tape as you can't wear a bra. Loved it!

Very nice dress, lots of compliments all night long. Worked perfect at a winter wedding. Ran tight in the hips/butt so I ended up going a size up from normal. Wore a backless bra with it to add support. Some fashion tape may be needed too to keep everything in place. Overall great look. Fabric wasn't the most stretchy but I was still able to dance and move around without too much trouble.

Love this dress! I'm 5'6" and usually an 8. I ordered the 8L because I'm right on the cusp between regular and long. I wore about a 2 inch heel and it was a tad long, but worth it. The regular length would've been too short I think. You can't wear a bra with this because the back is open. I wore nipple covers and put a small safety pin in the lower V. I'm about a 34C bra (from VS, so take it with a grain of salt). I felt super comfortable in this dress and got tons of compliments on how flattering it was! Highly recommend!

I ordered this dress for a military ball and it was perfect! I am 5'11" and usually wear a size 4 or 6. I received a 4L and a 6L and ended up using the 6L, which fit perfectly. I am always concerned about dresses being long enough for me, and this dress was almost too long (which I prefer over being too short). The color and material were beautiful, the dress was very comfortable and easy to move around in. I had to use double-sided tape on chest area as I felt it was a little too revealing for the event. Overall, I loved this dress and highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for engagement photos. Gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: Flattering, comfortable, and sexy and classy. I loved wearing this dress and I loved the way it turned out in photos

This dress makes you feel like a Greek goddess. It was pretty and elegant. The back is great and the front is a little difficult to manage if you have a large bust. Bring on the fashion tape!! Also the underlining was a bit snug around the hips.

Good overall fit. The long worked well for me with heels. I'm 5'10, 150 lbs and the 6 was perfect. A little loose in the chest, but I have no boobs so that's always a problem. If you have a bigger chest, you'd fill it out a little better.

In one word - Elegant. It was both classy and sexy, with the small cut out on the chest and open back. The slip was snug around my butt and thighs, but the outer silk layer is loose and hides the tighter look underneath. Had to wear pasties - cannot wear a regular bra. This was the first time I tried a mystery bling, and I loved the RTR gold cuff bracelet that matched my gold earrings.

links_reviews_title: Flattering, classy with just enough sexy. Felt like a princess in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I picked this dress out last minute to wear to a Military ball with my bf, when my original dress didn't fit. I'm so glad though, because this dress was stunning! The 8 fit perfectly and the cut was so unique - I love the twist in the front (though I did have to pin the front just a little... small boob problems!!) and the open back was stunning. I wore a sticky bra since wearing a regular bra wouldn't work. I was worried it would be too short as I'm very tall, but the 8L hit the floor and I actually probably could've worn a short heel! Overall in love with this dress and would highly recommend it.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Aside from the bride, this dress stole the show!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, comfy, beautiful folds in the fabric, lots of flow in the skirt!

links_reviews_title: Classy and fun dress for a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well and looked great on. Perfect for a black tie wedding. I will say the under layer of the dress fits more snugly than necessary and the 6r felt exactly the same except the dress was longer. Just something to consider when renting the dress. I am 5'3 and wore 3.5 inch heels.

links_reviews_title: Favorite rent the runway dress I've worn!
links_reviews_text: Great for smaller chested girls (A-C cup). Due to cut outs, I didn't wear a bra with this (there's boning in the chest area of the dress). It is extremely comfortable and super flattering. I likely didn't need the long size, as bottom was a little long even with 3 inch heals (and I'm 5'9"). Overall, this is my favorite rent the runway dress! I wish I didn't have to return it! It is beautiful and so easy to wear.
The cutout in front is low so make sure your bra is cut low

Gorgeous dress! Made me feel very beautiful for my brother's wedding. A couple of cons: the bust is very low cut, and the one piece of fabric just sort of drapes over. So when you're moving or dancing it can be very revealing. I pinned it and that solved the problem. The lining was a bit tight on my hips and butt, and the low cut back sagged a little bit. Again, pinned it, problem solved. I am 5'6" and wore 3" heels, and the dress was about an inch too short. Overall a beautiful dress that I got many compliments on!

links_reviews_title: Black tie spring wedding in Napa!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a black tie summer wedding in Napa. Fit like a glove! I was afraid the zipper was a little too tight but in reality it made sure the dress stayed put and my bra-less boobs didn't pop out. I'm 5'9" with B/C cup and size 6 (or 8 for length) generally. This 6L was meant to be worn with 3-4 inch heels! Amazing!

links_reviews_title: Classy dress for a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress is a deep navy blue and is very comfortable. I am 5'10" and worse 3 inch heels and it was plenty long. I found it tighter in the hips and a bit looser in the bust. I wish I had tape for the chest area as it gaped a bit on me,
This dress got so many compliments! It fit beautifully, and barely grazed the floor with small heels on. Very comfortable to wear and looked great!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable and easy to wear. I received tons of compliments on it and everyone wanted to know where I got it.

I am 5'7" and 180 pounds. 12L was the perfect size for me. I wish I had purchased a better backless bra because I needed more support. My fault, not the gown's. I received tons of compliments at the gala. Everyone kept saying how beautiful the gown was and I was very happy with it.

links_reviews_title: simple dress but with unique touches
links_reviews_text: I did not expect to love this dress but ended up feeling very wonderful in it and received many compliments. I wore this for a wedding in Lake Tahoe. My original pick didn't fit and my back up size wasn't available and after a major complication where RTR sent more dresses for me to try but sent them to my home in NC instead of Lake Tahoe, I finally got this dress from them. I asked for the 8 because I was too afraid to try a 6 after the other one didn't fit. While this fit looser and was a bit big, I didn't mind because we were eating and drinking all night and I felt 100% comfortable in it. I loved the plunging neckline with the twist above. This dress ended up being perfect!

links_reviews_title: Felt majestic. The slimming inner layer was great while the flowy outer layer was so feminine!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. I'm 5'4 and petite was perfect, regular would have been way too long for me. I did use fashion tape because we did lots of dancing and i didnt want to worry about the open front.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering dress perfect for any formal affair!
links_reviews_text: Fitted around the chest, wore sticky bra and used double sided tape on the chest. Great length for 5'6 and 2.5 inch heels.

links_reviews_title: Wonderful classic dress for formal event
links_reviews_text: This dress fit really well - I wore the backup 4P rather than the 4R because of the length and because the underlying "sheath" in the 4P was a bit more comfortable. I loved the fabric and the color of this dress, as well as the back design. The front design was really pretty and got me lots of compliments, but I did have to tape to keep the ladies from falling out when I bent over or danced around. But overall a great comfortable dress that had a classic but feminine look!

I normally wear between a 14 and 16 in this so i ordered a 16L with 14L as my backup, as I am 5'10". This dress was actually a backup to my original dress that was too small. Length was perfect for flats, which was more comfortable than heels. The area around my rib cage was tight and slightly uncomfortable all night. The opening around my bra area gapped open and I was not happy with that because I was constantly tugging at it and keeping my chest covered, however a little double sided fabric tape did help somewhat. Overall, I was pleased with the dress but would not rent again as the front area made me uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Great Dress! Perfect for a formal affair.
links_reviews_text: I am above average in height, so I thought the 8L would work--but it was way too long. I ended up going with the 8R and it was perfect length, even with the heels. I received many compliments and loved the fit, feel and look of this dress.

links_reviews_title: I loved the color, the stylish and unique neckline, and the way it flowed when I walked!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 4P which is my true size, and just in case, I got the 2P as a back-up because of my small bust. The 4 ended up fitting the best because it wasn't as tight around my hips and thighs. The length was PERFECT! I was so happy with the length of the dress! My only worry when wearing the dress was the crossing fabric in the front. Since I was not able to wear a bra with this gown, I was worried about leaning over, hugging people, etc because I didn't want to show too much cleavage. I ended up safety pinning the front and using some fashion tape to help with this. But overall, I really enjoyed wearing this dress!

links_reviews_title: I have never received so many compliments on my dress before!
links_reviews_text: -smaller chest, no bra/tape required -stunning open back -elegant and classy -true to size -I'm 6' and the long was perfect with small heels

Fit well, was kind of long, i wore heels with it and it worked well. Fit well in the top, i am a 32B, wasnt tight. I am 5'4" so it dragged a bit at the bottom but nothing i couldnt handle, i was carrying it a lot of the night though so i didnt step on it. Overall very classy :)

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress to help make you feel elegant and sexy at the same time!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing and I'm getting really sad that I have to send it back. The 12R fit like a dream but right under the bust there was a tear that I didn't want to attempt to hide so I opted for the 14R. I'm 5'5" and the dress was a bit long. I wanted to wear flats (which is why I chose a long dress in the first place) and I had to hold my dress for a majority of the night but I didn't personally find it that big of a problem. The inside liner was the perfect length but the top fabric was where it got long. If I had ordered the petite size, maybe then it would have been the perfect length for wearing flats. I am not a very busty lady so the dress dipped down in the front more than I would have like. I just pinned it up and it still looked great. The back cut out is my favorite part! It's high enough where you could wear a shaper or spanx if you needed it. Even though the dress had some minor (fixable) flaws, I would absolutely rent this dress again!!!

links_reviews_title: Wore for a Marine Corps Ball
links_reviews_text: Overall, this dress was ok. I felt pretty, but the fit was a little weird in spots. It's tight around the rib cage, and makes the chest area gap open because of it. I ended up going with the larger size because of it, but was still concerned you could see a lot of side boob. The back of the dress also gaps out. It made it look like I had wings. It did not lay flat on my back, and made me a little self conscious. Length wise was pretty decent. I'm 6'1, so length is always a bit difficult. I wore about a 1 1/2 inch heel, and the dress just touched the top of my feet.

links_reviews_title: Fit perfectly, felt very good in it and got so many compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: It's little long, but I wore 3 inch heels and those were perfect. It moves so beautifully when you walk! I didn't feel uncomfortable or self conscious at all wearing it, and I have smaller boobs and never felt like I was going to have any malfunctions!

links_reviews_title: This is a dress you have to put on to really see how beautiful it is! I loved it!
links_reviews_text: It fit great! The chest part I had to pull up a few times, but it was lightweight and very elegant!

links_reviews_title: Great fit for broad shoulders and narrow waist
links_reviews_text: This dress fit my body type perfectly. It was broader in the shoulders and gave the appearance that I have a waist. It was also ver comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to be able to love, but lopsided sizing between top and bottom made it impossible.
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately the sizing on this dress doesn't make sense. I ordered a 6 even though I'm usually a 4. The bottom part of the dress fit *perfectly* and was actually so pretty. However, the top part of the dress (sleeves and bust area) were massive. It is overloaded with so much extra material on top. I'm flat chested so that didn't help but would not recommend this dress to anyone unless you have a large bust or broad shoulders because it's more than likely going to look ridiculous on top.

I love the fit of this dress. The fabric has some stretch, the length was long enough to wear for work, and the eyelet at the neck shows a bit of skin, but no cleavage. The arms will a little tight on me - not so tight as to be uncomfortable, but a bit snug compared to the rest of the dress. I paired the dress with a lariat necklace and booties.
I loved everything about this dress! The color, the fit, it was very unique and it worked perfect at the office then to dinner that night! Travels well! Lots of compliments and I recommend!

links_reviews_title: Great work dress for tall girls!
links_reviews_text: Nice dress, perfectly fit and comfortable. Thin material, not lined, good for warm day. Doesn't wrinkle and stayed nice all day.
This dress is very thin. It's not the quality I would expect for the price. It's a nice plum color, fun hem line, and easy to wear. I wore it for work travel and dinner with colleagues.

I wore this dress for an event I hosted. It had odd, tiny, circular stains on it that I am reporting to RTR, but I loved the actual dress. I would have wanted to keep it forever if it would have arrived clean. Rent this dress.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress that could easily go from work to fun night out!
links_reviews_text: Mostly liked this dress. A bit more fitted at my hips. I'm short and it felt a little long in the back (it's a high/low style). Love the eggplant color.

This dress was perfect for a belated work holiday party. It is fitted on the top and flowy on the bottom. It was very comfortable. The only drawback was that the zipper catches so you need to have someone zip it for you. Otherwise great dress!

This dress is great - it's work appropriate but also has flare, and the color is great. The cut is also flattering for my curvy frame. I docked it one star because there are flaps on the inside of the keyhole cutout that kept coming out, and for a long sleeve dress the material is a little thin. Overall, however, it's a winner.
The fit was perfect. The dress showed off some curves, but was also flowy. Got a ton of compliments! My only con is that the fabric is a little thin.

links_reviews_title: Flattering, conservative dress in gorgeous aubergine color. True to size. Perfect for work/church.
links_reviews_text: Flattering, comfortable dress in gorgeous aubergine color. Quite conservative. Peek-a-boo opening at chest is small and very appropriate for work/church. I am usually a size 10 on top and size 8 at bottom (5'8", 154 lbs, 36C). This dress in size 10 fit perfectly, with a little bit of extra room at the hips (as expected). My only knock on this dress is that it is not lined (especially since the material is quite light weight).
This dress is a bit conservative but I love the way it moves. Great color too!

I rented this dress for work, but I ended up wearing it to temple instead. Different from my usual black, and also a bit longer (in the back at least), but I got lots of compliments. Saw quite a few people in similar colors, so I guess it's on trend. I liked the ruffle and that it came up in the front, but it still felt a little big. However, the fabric is very thin, so you may want to be careful about sizing down. Don't think it would be very forgiving.

links_reviews_title: Put a ring on this one
links_reviews_text: Dear RTR-ers. What a night! Wore this spectacular raisin color dress to a person of the year dinner. I totally stood out in this beautiful dress and received more compliments than I could count. The hi-lo hemline offers a swish to the skirt I adored; the peek-a-boo opening on the chest was just enough. Paired with tights, patent wedges and a black leather moto jacket to completely stand out in a crowd of LBDs. Definitely renting again. May even buy it...

links_reviews_title: Thinner than expected but great color and fit
links_reviews_text: This dress is unlined and a pretty thin fabric, which wasn't what I expected from Shoshanna. However, it still managed to hang beautifully and the rich color was gorgeous yet professional. The keyhole was a little lower than I would have liked.

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit from waist up
links_reviews_text: Because I am short, the hem didn't fit right. But this dress would be perfect if it came in a petite and would look great on someone a little taller.

links_reviews_title: cute but wear it with full body spanx
links_reviews_text: This dress needs a lining. The material is too thin on its own, it comes off as cheap to not have one. otherwise It's lovely and form fitting and flattering otherwise.

I wore this dress to work and received many compliments. The color was beautiful in person and perfect for fall but the dress was very thin. This dress fit true to size and had a flattering fit on an hourglass shape.

Beautiful color! However, the material is meh in my opinion. Lightweight feel of the fabric was good for a 60 degree day but I would have been cold if it was colder than that. Had to wear shape wear to suck in my mom bod which helped me squeeze into this. Was overall okay but the fit was not the best for me. I don't think a bigger size would have worked either, likely would have been too big on me. Great color for fall and style is conservative for work.

links_reviews_title: Great figure-flattering fabric and overall feel. The front is a little short, I needed to be aware
links_reviews_text: Loved the fabric and the cut.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a speaking engagement, feminine without being too sexy.
links_reviews_text: First, Shoshanna is a brand that fits me well. Her designs skim the body and are very flattering. The color is gorgeous and I felt fantastic. I wore the dress at a conference when I had to be on stage... which always makes me a bit nervous. I had no concerns about how I was dressed and received quite a few compliments on the dress.
I wore this several times. It's a nice dress.

Loved the color and style of this dress. Perfect for a work day. The cons would be the fabric, as a it shows everything and the size. The 6 fit me just fine but I felt like I was sucking in the entire day, so I could have gone up to an 8 for a little more comfort.
good daytime to evening dress
Odd fit big in hips tight in chest

links_reviews_title: I love the little details that dress up the simplicity of this dress without making it frumpy!
links_reviews_text: Works great on my relatively curvy body. It fits small in the shoulders, short in the arms and the graduated hem is short in front, so it fits nice on a short person but might look weird on a tall one. The flounce of the hem and keyhole in the front are just enough to dress it up without making it too frumpy or too revealing for work. The high low hem was very flattering for my legs. This is one of my favorite colors for work, too. My criticism is that the material is quite thin and polyestery. It is easy to sweat through, and does not feel like an expensive dress. It needs one of those sweat-catching undershirts underneath and that kind of ruins the keyhole effect. Call me a purist but I expect more natural fibers in designer clothes.

links_reviews_title: Attractive on an hour glass figure.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is thin and thus appropriate for spring, summer, or fall.

links_reviews_title: A little fun for work event
links_reviews_text: I'm a 10 on top and 8 on bottom, and this was a bit snug though the torso and shoulders. I threw some spanx on and got through a day at the office and a work event after, but I definitely wasn't as comfortable as I wanted to be. But I love the cut and color of the dress. I was a bit worried because I'm not a huge fan of ruffles, but this worked really well. The day ended up being a little chillier than I'd expected, and the material was a bit on the thin side for the weather. Overall, a lovely dress.
The dress runs small. Fabric was nice but it did not fit.
This is made of a very thin material, but forms to hug your body. It was a little snug in the chest. I liked the shorter ruffle detail in the front.

Should have listened to the reviewers on this one but I like Shoshana so I thought I'd try with my unlimited. As others have noted, it's not lined at all and as a result the neckline doesn't lay properly. It's also very tight and ill fitting. Sent it right back.

links_reviews_title: Loved the shape of this dress. Will rent again!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is a little thin, was my only complaint. Will be renting again. Wore to work with knee high boots and was the perfect transition fmo winter to touch of spring.
Not much give in the dress but it was stunning

links_reviews_title: Love this dress and will wear it again
links_reviews_text: It fit true to size and was very flattering.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear the dress too tight
links_reviews_text: Too tight
Fit is great but it gets a little wrinkled and isn't lined so you can see waistline of hose unless you wear thigh highs.

I loved this dress. My size wasn't available but both sizes (I went one size up and one size down) fit fine--this dress is very flattering. I wore this to a gala for work and it was conservative but still stylish. I would totally wear this again!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress flattering cut- very thin fabric
links_reviews_text: I did not wear this - becasue I rented it in the winter and the fabric, even for So Cal, is just too thin, more of a summer dress, however the color is all fall/winter. Loved the style and cut. I may rent it again come warmer times.
Just amazing.
Got so many compliments on this dress. The top was a little big on me because I have a small chest but i used a clear elastic around to tie the top and it looked great.
Great dress for a wedding but a little bit in the chest area.

This dress is so cute and while I liked it I just wasn't able to love it due to the fit. The fit through the hips was perfectly snug and comfortable, the fit through the rib cage was too tight and immediately uncomfortable, the fit through the torso and bust was the most problematic - it was way too long and large through the torso which caused it to gape as you can see in my photos. Had this fit better I would have absolutely loved it. The slits in the legs are gorgeous and make the dress very easy to move in and the color is fantastic. I have long legs and a shorter torso with a small chest - this dress would probably be better suited for someone with more even proportions and a larger chest.

Absolutely loved this dress and got so many compliments. I am usually an 8-10 and the large fit me pretty perfectly. The cutouts on the side are not too big or revealing however and extra chubb will be seen in pictures if your not standing straight. The only complaint I had was finding a bra that didn't show as the band around the back is thin. I ended up wearing a bandeau and just twisting the back so it was small enough to hide under the strap. Overall love the way the dress looked!

links_reviews_title: Unique dress at great rental price!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a summer black tie optional wedding in Florida - it was perfect in the sense that it was formal enough but not a long, hot dress. It was a bit large in the back, but I was able to tie the sash a little tighter and didn't run into issues. I decided to go without the stick-on bra, as it cuts in to the sides pretty significantly (but not over the top). I would recommend this dress to anyone!

Fits true to size. I am 132lbs, A cup, athletic build. Did not wear a bra with it, no issue. Soft pink color is beautiful, quality fabric, sexy but not too sexy cut outs. I'd rent this again! Highly recommend

I loved this dress! I am in between a medium and a large usually and the large fit like a glove! Super sexy and yet elegant. The top was a bit tight across the bust area but I would have worn this regardless. I ended up not wearing it because it was my back up style and the other dress was too good too!

I wore this to a daytime, summer wedding. It didn't look like much on the hanger, but it was a pretty dress on. I wore a small, but it was a bit tight in the bust. The medium had too much room in the bust. The slits up the side gave this otherwise gentle dress a little sex appeal. It was an okay rental and served its purpose. I don't think I would rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Good mix of trendy and classy
links_reviews_text: I had been wanting to rent this dress for awhile, and finally did for an evening wedding in June. I loved the thicker material and color of the dress. It definitely hugged the hips tight so I wore shapewear to smooth the lines with the small-- the medium was way too big and not a good fix. The biggest con I would say is that the top portion was a little too baggy, so I had to be aware of not slouching over and ended up pulling it up a little with a safety pin behind the neck. I wore a sticky bra that did slightly show on the sides a bit so I was also conscious about that. Not my most comfortable/favorite rental but definitely got tons of compliments and it served the job!

Loved how different/unique the cut of this dress was. Wore the M to a wedding, and received compliments all night. Very comfortable, although the top portion was a bit big on me - and I had to continuously pull it up throughout the night.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a English Tea Bridal Shower!
links_reviews_text: Everyone kept complimenting me! Saying that I looked like English Royalty! I would definitely rent this again. I ordered a xs and small and ended up going with the small bc I don't have a smaller waist and have a bigger rib cage. Since you can't wear a bra, I wore a sticky invisible pasty things from Amazon and they worked great!

links_reviews_title: Wore it for a christening for the sweetest little boy.
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove. Perfect length. Low back wasn’t too low but added a lot to the look of the dress. I was very happy with my choice of dress.
Super comfortable dress! Didn't get too hot in it even sitting in the sun during the ceremony. The bow is versatile, can be worn in the front or back! Love the high neck as well.
The dress was super comfortable, stayed put. I would love to wear it again. I am small chested so I went braless and it worked.

I received so many compliments in this dress! It was snug around my booty, but kind of gaping in the top. The kind of fit up top that were j to own the dress I would have had the halter straps tightened. Also beware it wrinkles very easily!!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a Kentucky Derby Party!
links_reviews_text: Loved the color (dusty pink with a shade of tope) and fabric has great texture. Fit was true to size however if you are curvy on your lower half I would size up one as it's fairly pencil with no stretch. Otherwise loved the cut and received lots of compliments!

I wore this to the ceremony and decided it was very awkward to keep on for the reception. I ordered a small and medium. The small would not even zip. The medium was a very awkward length. I am 5'1". The bust was also not flattering. I am pretty busty so the cutout on the sides were constantly pulling. I did not feel confident in this dress. I ended up changing into a dress I wore to a wedding earlier this year. Would not recommend for busty/shorter girls.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit great & is comfortable. I wore this dress to 2 weddings and a bridal luncheon.
links_reviews_text: I am 5' 6" 145 lbs. 34 D. Make sure you have sticky boobs!

links_reviews_title: Super classy and gorgeous. Perfect for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: The bottom of the dress fit me perfectly, but the top was loose. I used some fashion tape on both sides of the top so that it wasn’t too flowy. Everyone loved the dress!

I loved this dress! It does run small, I'm usually size M/8 and I had to wear an L. Perhaps because of this, the top part was fairly loose. To address this, I just crossed the halter straps. I got so many compliments. And because of the neckline cut, you probably won't need a necklace!

links_reviews_title: This dress was a perfect combination of sophisticated and sassy.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. So much that I wish I owned it! I thought the small would be great, but it was actually way too tight. The medium was a tad too loose, but I used a safety pin to tie up the halter neck tighter and that seemed to do the trick! Definitely more fitted in the hip area than the chest. It was a perfect dress for the rehearsal dinner.
I'm a 32AA so it ran a little big in the top but I just tied it and styled my hair down so no one can see. Otherwise great dress

links_reviews_title: The color, and fun cut out on the sides!
links_reviews_text: It was a little bit of a weird fit, but I wore it with ease throughout the evening. By weird, I mean it didn't hug all the right places, but most on me.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for my birthday and loved it.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. Was a tad tight in the mid section.

links_reviews_title: Wore the dress for my sister in laws wedding. Received so many compliments.. it was a hit!
links_reviews_text: The dress came very wrinkled so I had to get it dry cleaned prior to the wedding. It fit well but kept sliding down in the back. It's too loose around the bra area to get away with no bra so when it would slide down it showed the back of my bra. Other than that I loved the dress!
I'm 5'1, 105lbs and it fits perfectly! I'm thinking of buying this dress!

Got so many compliments on this chic number! I ordered the small and a medium for backup (I'm usually a size 4 or 6) and while the small fit, there was no wiggle room and wasn't as forgiving a the medium. However, because I have a small chest (34B) it was baggy up top. Definitely order a backup size if you're on the fence about fit.

links_reviews_title: Classic Look, yet a little difficult to wear
links_reviews_text: This dress is stunning. I have a curvy bottom and the size L fit me like a glove. The only negative is the top part kept looking bunchy and I would have to smooth it down. I have a C cup so it's not like I'm totally flat chested, but the top part didn't look as filled in as the bottom. Overall though it was a very beautiful dress and I would rent it again. Loved the little hints of skin that the side cutouts gave also.
This dress was killer. The bottom is snug and the top a bit loose but a safety pin fixed that. Got tons of compliments. I'd love to keep it! Rent rent rent!

It runs small but it looked great. I got this dress as an exchange and I was happy overall with the exchange. I did have to tie the halter part of it because it would have shown side boob if I didn't. I felt elegant and got many compliments, for having had a baby 8 months ago I thought it looked great. I wore this for my daughters's baptism.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, great price. Would consider purchasing!
links_reviews_text: This is a fantastic dress. Gorgeous, affordable, and eye catching (except to the bride and groom, which is as it should be). Loved it and would rent again!

I did really like this dress and almost wore it but you definitely cannot wear a bra with it. It is low cut in the back and has side cut outs. The fabric is also not very forgiving so spanx were a must for me. I sized up and it fit well.

links_reviews_title: Day trip to Toronto for play and dinner
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and unique style. Fit was a little off which I'm sure has to do w body type. Top area was a little loose when just buttoning but a little too tight when I looped before buttoning. Slits def show some leg while sitting. Fabric isn't forgiving if you have a little extra in the stomach area. Should have tied the bow in front! Does wrinkle easily but hung up once I got to the hotel and it was fine. Overall positive rental.
Love the fit and got lots of compliments! A bit of sideboob- fair warning, but otherwise thought it was great
I have bigs hips so a little tight in the hip are but really a beautiful dress.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It was a perfect like pink for a summer wedding. It was very flattering & I felt that the tie in the front hid any potential bloating. I thought the length was perfect. I normally am a small and it was tight! I forgot to order a backup size so I can't say if the medium would've fit or been to big. But it definitely is snug so if you are nervous about it being too small - size up.

links_reviews_title: Loved it....but I was a little between sizes. I may rent again tho!
links_reviews_text: The 6 was a little too big and the 4 was a little tight. I chose the slightly bigger dress since I was going to go eat pasta..... The 6 kinda gapped at the arm holes, but it fit everywhere else fine. The 4 was mostly just tight in the lower stomach area and thighs. I'm 5.4 &1/2 in. and fluctuate between 130 and 140 regularly (I have a D chest and wear a 6 in most jeans and a 4-6 in most dresses from RTR) FINALLY, the material keeps grease stains, I think, because the 4 also had 2 grease spot discolorations on the chest area (small but noticeable)!

Fits true to size and is very comfortable. I love this dress! I didn't wear a bra, but I run small up top. I'm 5'9 with an athletic body type. The only thing to watch for are the slits when you sit down. But if you're careful you're fine. It wasn't too distracting.

I love this dress! Very comfortable and weightless. I was afraid this color would be too neutral to wear to a wedding. It has more of a blush tone than tan, in person, especially with the white belt against the material, so I felt comfortable wearing it. I'm 5'2 and the length wasn't overwhelming at all. Unable to wear a bra because of the open back but sticky cups were perfect!
Snug on the hips & the top is little loose but I think it all worked!! Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Black lining takes away from the details
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress in the pictures but was so let down when it finally came. In the pictures the lining is buff/beige so that the lace and the beading really stand out. But the actual dress had a black liner and so the intricate details got completely lost. Such a bummer. The fit through the midsection was loose and gaped at the back. And the length was maybe an inch or two too short - it draped oddly over 4" heels. It's still a gorgeous dress just not what I expected.

I was honored for an award at a charity Gala and wore this dress for a 1920s themed event and LOVED it!! Matched the theme but would look great at any event. Was a little tight but overall I loved it. Would highly recommend. If you are in between sizes like myself I would go up a size
Loved this dress! Easy to wear and felt #glamorous

I ordered this dress to get a gauge on the size for a different dress by the same designer for another occasion. This dress is gorgeous, fits true to size but I am 5' 10" and I need a 4L, the 4R was too short (see photo)

links_reviews_title: The dress was worn to prom and there was no one there in anything like it! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Dresses came in sizes 8 R and 10 L. Surprisingly, the length of the 8 was too short so the long was chosen even if it was a little larger than what would normally be worn.

links_reviews_title: Being comfortable in this gorgeous dress really made my evening!
links_reviews_text: The fit is overall is true to size but I would say on the smaller size of an 8. The bust ran a little small but I just went braless and it was perfect. The length worked well for kitten heels or flats but to wear anything higher I would have needed the 8L and I am about 5'6". The liner is black, not nude as pictured, and most reviews say that. I actually like it better that way. Whether I was sitting, standing, or dancing the dress was very comfortable! I highly recommend this one for your formal affairs!

links_reviews_title: The detail on this dress is stunning!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 10L and the 8L. Both fit. I went with the 8L because it formed to my waist a bit better. The 10L still looked good but wasn't as form fitting. This was my first RTR experience and it was fabulous! The detail on the dress is gorgeous and it was incredibly comfortable. So you know exactly what my measurements are, I'm 5'7", 154lbs, Bust 34", Waist 30", Hips 41". I wore 2" heels and that had the length just touching the floor. So I'm glad I ordered the L.

This was my backup dress but it fit so well I loved it! Had lots of compliments on it all night. I felt very comfortable to sit or stand. Loved wearing it. The neckline needed to be pressed s bit to lay flat but overall it exceeded my expectations.

As others have mentioned, this dress has a black underlay instead of a nude one as shown -- still gorgeous. I'm about 5'7.5" and the regular was a bit short. It ended up working fine, but if you plan to wear higher heels or are a taller gal, get the long.

links_reviews_title: This gown was perfect for our Black & White Cotillion. It was very elegant.
links_reviews_text: The 8L dress I originally ordered was not available. Nor was the 10L. My backup size was ultimately the 10R and it was just loose enough to hang a little longer and be super comfortable. Very nice lace and beading details.
A little large

The gown fit well and was fairly forgiving. I recommend wearing it with a strapless bra due to the cutouts on the top. The lace and beading give this otherwise simple gown a sophisticated feeling - perfect for a formal affair. It was comfortable to wear all night.

links_reviews_title: I thought this was a flattering and elegant dress for a formal affair!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. It wasn't very long, so I wore shorter heels, which was fine by me!

This dress is just beautiful and fits like a glove. Bust runs a little small. I am 5'2" and 145lbs. Bust is 36C and the dress is very snug through the chest. Minimal issue considering the reward. Will definitely rent again!
Not your typical black gown! The lace and beads are one of a kind! Perfect for a festivity of any kind!

I absolutely loved this gown. I am typically a 4 (but can go down to a 2) but it was only available in a 2L so I gave it a chance. It fit perfectly and with heels, the length was fine. At first, I was thrown because the lining is black and not nude as in the picture but I ended up loving it just the same. It breathed well and I was able to dance and enjoy the night without problems. I got so many compliments and felt like a million dollars in it! I would highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for a formal holiday party at at country club!
links_reviews_text: The dress is simply amazing!!! Is not heavy even though it has beaded work. It fitted like a charm and it was very easy to dance in it. The pictures don’t make it justice, it’s a gorgeous dress . You’ll receive many compliments!

I found the 4R somewhat loose but wearable because the heavy fabric falls smoothly. Received lots of compliments. The liner is black, NOT nude as it appears in the RTR photos. Would rent again if I had the opportunity!
I rented this dress for a gala but ended up wearing a different gown. This dress is gorgeous but was not as fitted at the natural waist as I would have liked, which is why I wore the other dress.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Didn't want to send it back!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size! Can't wear a normal bra with it, so be aware. Super comfortable, made for a great night.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress for black tie gala
links_reviews_text: Dress fit true to size. While it was heavy on the hanger, it didn't feel heavy to wear. Wore to a black tie gala that I ran - was easy and comfortable to run around in all night. Perfect with a small heel. Underlay is black - not nude as it appears in photos of model. I received compliments all night on the dress.

links_reviews_title: I rented this gown for my son's wedding, which was black and white.
links_reviews_text: The gown was a perfect fit and so very comfortable. The cut and detail of the gown with beaded lace was truly elegant. I received compliments throughout the evening!

links_reviews_title: I felt gorgeous and received many compliments on my dress!
links_reviews_text: I usually struggle with dresses because I'm a 2/4 on top but a 6 on bottom. However, the 4R size fit me PERFECTLY. It was form-fitting, but not too tight. It was also super comfortable and the length was perfect.
Loved this dress!! So elegant and perfect for our event.
Absolutely wonderful. Beaded lace and truly elegant. You can't wear a traditional bra with the dress - I ended up not wearing one. Really gorgeous gown.

Dress was in good condition, however, some previous renter had placed a temporary hem in the bottom that was coming loose. After removing temporary hem everything was perfect. Great experience renting.!

Dress was beautiful and true to size. I'm 5'9" and wore the long length with three inch heels and still the dress was the perfect length. Very comfortable to wear all evening. Dress even came a whole day before scheduled.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress. It fit amazingly abs I had tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'1 and it was very long but I had heels on and it looked great!
My first rental and it was amazing! The dress fit perfectly. I am 5'9 and the 6L was exactly the right length. I loved this dress!!

links_reviews_title: It was a little heavy....but stunning!
links_reviews_text: But it was absolutely stunning. Even though it was heavy, the fabric was very soft and very comfortable. The pictures came out amazing, and I would definitely rent it again. It fit true to size and

This dress fit wonderfully, but the material was lighter than I expected. I had a baby about 5 months ago, and was looking for something black to hide my new curves and this dress was only slimming because of a new pair of Spanx :). I'm 5'6 and the length was perfect with kitten heels. I got so many compliments on the lace details and it was really comfortable to dance in!
Perfect fit, with subtle sparkle. Sleeves were comfortable. Very flattering and great fit!

I wore this to a black tie event with colleagues and clients. It was conservative enough for the event but the beading and semi-illusion neckline made it a great dress for a young professional. The dress is extremely flattering and the beading is beautiful. I got compliments all night. I wore short heels because the dress was not long enough for my nicer heels. I'm 5'5 so potentially order a long if you're much taller.

This was the back up to my back up and I had to make last minute decisions because my dress was not available. I asked the stylist for something more covered up and appropriate for my age and this was suggested. It worked perfectly. The size was right on although the 10R would have been a better length with 2 inch heels as I had to mind the hem all night. I wore with a strapless bra because the shoulders are sheer. I felt terrific and would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress could not have been more perfect. It fit like a glove, the details were subtle, but gorgeous, and it was incredibly comfortable. I'm 5'3" and with 3-inch heels the regular length was great. I have zero complaints and would highly recommend this dress to other curvy girls.

Wore this for a work holiday masquerade ball. This dress was so comfortable to wear, a little heavy but it looked so beautiful. The dress style if very forgiving for the post baby body! no spanx needed :) The only con- the bottom lace will snag on shoes if there beads or anything else on it

This is such a beautiful dress. The details in this dress are so pretty! I am wearing a four in the photo and the dress does fit true to size. The dress is slightly fitted in my waist but not at my hips. I do recommend going a size up for a backup size. The fabric has no stretch to it. The dress would work for any cup size. I am a 36D and felt very comfortable. This dress must be worn with a strapless bra or NuBra. This dress would be perfect for a formal event during the night. Pair with black heels and gold jewelry.
Loved the dress! Had tons of comments. One problem I had was the under slip was hanging out and rolling up showing the tan color....quick fix though my mom did a quick stitch and turned it under :-)
This is dress is absolutely beautiful! It wasn't heavy, or uncomfortable. I received so many compliments on it & I will totally rent this again if I need to.

This dress was a beautiful fit. I'm carrying some extra weight around my hips and thighs after just having a baby and this dress made them look awesome. The lace and length of this dress scream elegance and I felt absolutely beautiful wearing this dress.

links_reviews_title: Love the look but a little tight on the waist. My waist is 25
links_reviews_text: Love the sexy look, but tight on my 25 inch waist

links_reviews_title: I wanted something nice but not to over the top to wear to my daughters high school graduation..
links_reviews_text: I wear a (s) or 4/6 and this dress was perfect fit

I wanted a casual, cute, summer dress that I could wear on the 4th of July and not worry about getting too hot. This was great, it's light, fits well, and I love the cut. Definitely rent for the summer!
Not for tall girls. I'm 5'9 and the slit hit at my crotch. I was so excited about this one, too. It isn't that it's too small, it's just got a seriously weird cut.

This dress was perfect for derby day with my big sun hat. Exactly as described and fit true to size. Only things to be aware of is the slit in the front goes up pretty high, I wouldn't recommend wearing on a windy day. The top has plenty of room for someone more busty than me, but didn't gap on the sides when wearing it. Would rent again!

The dress was perfect for our Derby Days event... I had read the reviews, and took the comments about the slit with a grain of salt. Until I had the dress on I didn't appreciate the comments. The slit is high and almost revealing when you sit down. So renter beware. Otherwise, the dress was great!
Slit was indeed very high, but this was a great dress for dinner on vacation. Fit very well - true to size

links_reviews_title: Cute vacation dress but woah that slit
links_reviews_text: Looks cute in pics but literally had to safety pin it and still hold a napkin on my lap so I wasn't showing off my underwear to the world!! It was pretty uncomfortable, so I'd prob pass on this one next time

links_reviews_title: Chic for the end of summer!
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful and I was able to wear it a few times - out to dinner in the Hamptons and to a wedding. I felt so chic in it! Things to be mindful of: -it's almost impossible to get this dress on by yourself. Tricky buttons in the back with elastic loops. -the slit is very high. It was hard to sit down in this dress without flashing people. Not possible to wear normal shapewear with it because of that.

links_reviews_title: Love the slit on this and the way the dress falls is perfect!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this on a day trip to Montauk (NY) and I got a ton of compliments.... it can go from being dressy (which is what I originally thought it to be) to being a nice, hamptons/nautical day dress with a pair of sandals (how I wore it). I did not have to wear a bra, my chest was held in on top so you couldn't tell- huge bonus. The slit goes up pretty high on your leg so it makes up for the fact that the dress is long and loose. It was tight on my ribs a bit where it goes from the top to the skirt, but I could completely breathe and move around. (If back-fat is a concern of yours you my want to consider getting a size up as a back up just in case.) It is hard ordering clothes sometimes being petite but also having a chest, either XS are too tight on top or they are not tight enough on my waist and give me no shape - this dress was PERFECT.

This dress is super cute i think would be adorable for a boat party! It has a high slip so be careful bc it is a little higher then i would have likes but besides that it was super cute! Fun for a nice day in the hamptons!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an outdoor event
links_reviews_text: This dress was very comfortable and cute for an outdoor event. The slit is high but a little fashion tape was all it needed. I really felt supported in the front and loved the open back.
Loved this dress!

So the dress was amazing!! I wanted to go braless, but I didn't have stickies (I suggest going braless if you have them on hand or picking some up). The dress was easy to move in and I received so many compliments. HOWEVER, like many others said, this dress is terrible to sit in, the slit is far too high!! I was so glad I brought a sweater with me to the wedding or I would have given everyone a show!! I didn't pin it, but that is an option. Good luck and definitely try this dress!!
Was perfect if I wanted my crotch on display. Top was strangely big

I just think if you have boobs and hide all of them then you run the risk of looking fat (especially when you don't have toned athletic arms like me) I'm 5.4 &1/2 in. and fluctuate between 130 and 140 regularly (I have a D chest and wear a 6 in most jeans and a 4-6 in most dresses from RTR). It was still cute tho. The slit was really high though, so if you walk around a lot in it (like I did) then you run the risk of it shifting around and exposing yourself (I know I did twice for sure)

links_reviews_title: It was a great dress for MDW and my bachelorette!!!
links_reviews_text: Pros- comfortable Cons- short slip

links_reviews_title: Pretty and I got lots of compliments, but didn't fit me quite right
links_reviews_text: I got a medium in this dress and Lordy am I glad I didn't order the small. I'm athletic shaped and am usually a 4/6 in dresses, but this dress fit so strange. It was super tight in the waist band and as other reviewers noted you have to pin the slit closed. It wasn't the best choice for a horse race...I had trouble playing corn hole and sitting down. At the end of the day I unzipped the back a little just to give me some more breathing room. I'd say this dress is probably made for someone tall and very skinny and small wasted based on the sizing.

The dress definitely runs small. I usually wear a 2. This was weirdly loose up top and tight on the bottom. I had to tape the slit shut and still didn't have enough fabric to wear it comfortably to dance or sit down at the wedding. I had to hold my jacket as a cover the entire time. A medium would have fit better in the hips but the top would have fallen off of me.

links_reviews_title: Love the cut of this dress!
links_reviews_text: I went up to the medium in this dress because the waist was a bit tight across my ribs. I was able to go braless, which was nice since the back is slightly open and would have shown a strapless bra. I loved the look and neckline of the dress. The lining did show at the slit even after ironing, but I don't think many people noticed.
Wore this for a nautical wedding and it was perfect for the theme. So soft and comfortable and flattering at the waist line. I could have gone a size smaller.

I rented this dress for a friends bachelorette weekend and felt beyond confident in it. Perfect dress for a night out by the shore! As other reviewers have pointed out, the slit is a little aggressive. With a strategically placed safety pin and some careful leg placement I was good to go!

links_reviews_title: Comfy and cute but watch the slit!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress but use double sided tape to ensure the slit doesn't come up too high! Otherwise loved.

links_reviews_title: Great dress but the slit was very high
links_reviews_text: Needed to be pinned in order to be comfortable

links_reviews_title: Beautiful shape! But slit is dangerously high
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress! But the slit is really high, so it was a little nerve racking at times- especially in the wind. But still totally worth it! I am pretty petite around my rib cage but this dress fit great! Great dress for any ladies with a small frame and have difficulty finding clothing that is small enough.
The warnings about the slit did not bother me I did not find this to be an issue. Flattering but a little baggie on the back but not enough to make it look unattractive.

I ordered a medium and a large. I am usually a medium. The medium fit perfectly but the slit was a little too high and would show too much. I tried a safety pin from what I had read on other reviews but I couldn't get it to lay right. I tried on the large which was big and not as fitted around my waist but the slit was the perfect length. I ended up going with the large and received compliments all night! I also went without a bra and you couldn't tell
The slit is VERY high, if you are tall, be aware of this. Also, very tight fitting, wish this dress came in an XL

The sizing of this dress was so odd! The medium felt like a small and the large felt like an XL! I ended up wearing the large because I really wanted this to work for my BFF's nautical-themed bachelorette party. You can see in my photo that the top was way too big. The length ended up awkward as well. The slit was high on both dresses so be mindful of how you sit, walk, and stand up! Wore it, but would not rent again.
This dress was flowy and comfortable and trendy. I wore it for a booze cruise on the Hudson. Received lots of compliments

I wore this to a daytime formal engagement party. The top was very flattering and easy to wear the bottom was a little dicey with the high slit but I just pinned to make sure a gust of wind wouldn't cause a wardrobe malfunction.
I'm usually xs but it was a little tight around ribs. Used small and fit great. Like everyone else I pinned it to keep it closed.

links_reviews_title: Nice Dress, but fit was a bit funny
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my best friends bridal shower. I liked this dress, it was comfortable. It fit me a little weird though it was tight in the waist but loose on the top, and I have larger shoulders so that's unusual. The slit was a kind of high as mentioned in other reviews so beware, maybe bring a safety pin. Over all it was a nice dress, but not my favorite that I've rented from here.

I got so many compliments on this dress! The slit was very high, as expected after reading previous posts. I wore it to an engagement party for a wedding I am in. Only issue, one of the buttons was broken on the back and it was a little awkward looking. I'm 5"9 and weigh 155 lbs and wore the medium. The neckline and tied bow were sexy and so different!!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for an outdoor summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wear a 32C bra, measurements are 32-27-38 and typically wear a 4 in tight dresses and a 2 in looser ones. I would have liked to have worn the small in this dress, but it was just a little too small and the slit was just too high for a wedding. I wore the medium which was more appropriate on the bottom but way too big up top. Thankfully my mom was able to make a quick fix for me. Overall, beautiful dress and very comfortable for a very hot summer wedding.

I rented this dress to wear for my bridal shower. The dress was nice but ran small. Also, the front slit was fine when standing but when sitting it showed a little too much leg. All in all it was a nice dress and I received many compliments on it.

I rented this dress for my friend's engagement party. The party was outdoors and the material was just right for a summer night in July. As a warning, this dress does have a slip. I bought some safety pins to fix that issue. I wore sticky boobs with the bra and loved the fit. Other than that, I loved this dress. I am on the shorter side however I didn't feel like this dress shrank me. I received plenty of compliments and I wore a pair of nude booties with it. Overall I highly recommend this dress and wished I owned it.

I read the reviews thoroughly before renting, so, i took the advise and sized up...glad I did! Upon arrival, the dress looked rough. The underlining was sticking out from the dress and the slit opening was flipped out, so the lining was showing there too. The Medium I chose to wear was also missing a button. After I ironed it and ripped a button off of the one I didn't wear and attached it to the one I did....It turned out pretty good. The bottom of the dress runs small, but the top runs large. It worked because the back of the dress just bloused down, so that wasn't that big of a deal. If you size up, you can avoid the slit in the front being inappropriate. I wore this for an outdoor wedding in Vegas, so I felt like showing a little leg in sin city would be ok, but the small showed underwear (not just leg). I wore a sticky bra that had the sticky back to it and secured it to the dress rather than to my chest as I figured I'd sweat it off in 5 mins. The fabric doesn't tend to wrinkle easily, which was also a plus. I got a lot of compliments and would tell someone to rent this dress as long as they heeded the warnings listed. Happy Renting!

I'm on the bust-ier side and I was able to get away with a sticky bra comfortably all night. The waist band has no give but it fit me perfectly and I loved that the high slit let me show off some leg! Comfortable to walk, sit, and dance in as well. The bf loved it and I will 100% rent this again!!

links_reviews_title: I loved the style and neckline of this dress
links_reviews_text: The medium fit but the slit was super high I couldn't wear. I had to wear the large so that the slit wasn't to high up. The large was a little baggier on top
Gorgeous material and fit well. Was a bit low and loose on top so tape was needed. Received a lot of compliments.
Fit perfectly for a summer wedding outdoors
Loved the dress! The top runs a little big, I used clothing tape from Victoria Secret that worked really well to keep the top closed.
The fit was perfect. There are 2 drawstrings, which was nice to be able to adjust to my liking. Lots of compliments and very comfortable
Very comfortable! Great if you have small boobs. Best to wear pasties as it's a little see through! Over all I loved it!! Very classy yet sexy !

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but the top runs big
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I wore it to a bridal shower and it looked great. The one problem I had with it is the top is a little funny. I think if you have a large chest it would fit okay but it flaps open if you can't fill it out. I ended up safety pinning it down and it looked great. Overall, I would rent again.

Very cool dress that was flattering. I will say, the top was a little loose. I used nipple covers and no bra, but I also needed fashion tape to hold the top pieces down and not billow open. Other than that, the dress was great!

This dress was a hit. I rented a size Small; I'm 5'4" and the dress hit me at ankle length. This is great for pear shaped women because of the empire waist. I have a very small bust and I would tell larger busted women to rent with caution because it can show plenty of cleaver. Aside for the fitted top part, the rest of the dress is airy and flowy. I word it to a daytime wedding in California and fit in perfectly!

I LOVE this dress. I felt like a princess! I was a little worried after reading the reviews about this dress but I'm so glad I rented it anyway. The fabric is gorgeous! I loved everything about this dress and would definitely rent again!!! Received many compliments!

This dress is a really pretty color and I really like the concept of it. Pulling it out of the bag I was excited but once I put it on it didn't do much for me. I felt as though it made my hips look bigger and I didn't like the way the top part fit me. I love plunging necklines but this was too much! It didn't lay flat on my chest (it was too big). I had to use fashion tape to lay the material flat on my chest and use a safety pin to tighten fabric right in between my boobs to give me more coverage while keeping the plunging neckline. Bright side, this is a comfy dress and nice material. I think if I would have bought a small then maybe it would have fit better up top and maybe singed more at my waist to flatter my body type.
This dress was great for a summer work event - although I did have to pin the cleavage a bit so I wasn't exposing too much. Overall super flowy, pretty and lightweight material!!

I wanted so much to be obsessed with this dress. The cleavage and cut are both AMAZING, as are the fabric and color. I felt so sexy and comfortable, which was great. I just couldn't figure out how to do the cinching ties without them puffing out and making the extra fabric look like fat rolls. It photographs looking like I have a lot of stomach fat popping through the dress, all because the dress has weird tie structure. Wouldn't rent again.

I really loved this dress. Light and airy, very flowy. I received load of compliments on this dress. The bust however was giantic and I had to pin it. Not sure if it was stretched out by others before me or what. That is the only complaint, git true to size.

Color was lovely but i didn't like how it laid in the chest. The inner lining didn't match up with the outer layer well. The low neckline doesn't hide a normal bra so unless you have a specialty bra, a deep V bra, or are cool with going bra less, then you'll have issues. Also my husband thought it was a night gown when i walked out in it so I didn't end up wearing it.

I really wanted to LOVE this dress. But I could't quite get there. The fit is different. There are 2 adjustable drawstrings- one directly under bust, the other at the waist. They are tough to tighten because there is no elastic and the fabric feels very fragile. I know it's fragile because the first dress I was sent was ripped down past the second drawstring. Someone clearly didn't know how to tighten it and they pulled too hard and ripped the dress. It shouldn't have passed RTR quality control but they did overnight me the same style so it all worked out. I wore petal pasties as a bra would have shown- even one with a deep v. I don't think this would be for curvy girls or girls with a larger chest. It's a midi length so heels are best if you're short. I feel like it looked better in real life than in photographs.

Love this dress but my only problem was the bodice of the dress does not have much structure making it seem loose. I did pin the front to make sure that there wouldn't be any unexpected wardrobe malfunctions. Both ties are functional which was really nice. Makes it easy when it comes to sizing knowing that you can adjust the size to fit you best. I did receive a ton of compliments on this dress and did really love the look and style of it. As for the length, I'm on the shorter side was so happy when the dress still felt that it was a true midi length!!
not petite enough and super long
Beautiful dress the top is revealing I used double sided tape and it was fine

Overall this was super cute and very comfortable. My only issues were the fabric under the arms stuck out a little bit with both sizes. And it is a VERY deep V. I had purchased this for my father in law's 70th birthday so in order not to have an accident I pinned from the inside so it wasn't as low and that worked great. I got compliments on it as well!
Long, fancy dress. Doesn't shape my waste as much as I would have preferred but lovely on!

I rented this dress for my graduate school graduation ceremony but I did not end up wearing it. I am a 36C up top and it was too revealing to wear to the formal ceremony. I would rent it again but for a different occasion, possibly a vacation or party.
This was too large and didn't lay right. It also looked much frumpier in person than in pictures. I didn't end up wearing it.
I'm 5'2 and very curvy, just had a baby a little over a month ago. The dress looked like a huge bag on me. I think this would be a great dress on a taller and thinner person who can wear heels

This dress didn't work for me. The top is too large and didn't fit my medium chest size. I couldn't tell if it was stretched out from someone else wearing it before me or if it was made this way. I ended up not wearing it.
I should have listened to the reviews! The waist ruching, tie was bunchy and unflattering. The fabric and print are pretty so it was a bummer to send this one back.
Everything about this dress was perfect except for the chest. Even with safety pins it felt uncomfortable. Wayyyy too much cleavage for how classy this dress is.

links_reviews_title: Cute style, but cut issues on my small frame
links_reviews_text: Really wanted to like this dress but it just didn't fit. I'm petite and have a small chest, so the straps were a bit too long, and cut was too deep. The chest area didn't have enough structure and puffed out awkwardly on me. Loved the pattern and style though.

The fit is very odd as the two ties are under the deep V, which on me, sat very low. I think it was mostly a sizing issue for me--I think I ordered it too big--but it was weird. It isn't as pretty in person as it is in the photo.
Big on top

links_reviews_title: Bad fit for my body type
links_reviews_text: Love the fabric and color of this dress. Didn't fit my chest well, made me look wide. Wish it would've fit, love the color.

links_reviews_title: Don't rent! Listen to the reviews !
links_reviews_text: I wish I listened to the reviews on this one! The waist area fits / ties awfully and it gives you these weird bubbles. Material is cheap. Not flattering.

Rented this to wear on vacation in Tulum, but I won't be bringing it along with me. It's not well suited to large chests. The dress leaves me feeling very exposed in the bust but very matronly throughout the rest of the body.
You really can't wear a bra with this weird neckline, but it's also too loose to go without one... Ended up not wearing. Material is pretty.
So chic. It's def a deep V in the front so be prepared. It was a bit too revealing for the wedding I was at but a perfect date night dress.

I rented this dress for a casual party in the summer. I am usually between a 4-6. I rented the medium and it was slightly large, however I was able to adjust the fit slightly with the ties in the front. The dress was very flattering and lightweight. I am just under 5'5 and the length hit me mid-calf. I would definitely recommend!
Pretty dress just runs big. Make sure to wear a slip under it because it is see through.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments, it was darling, fit comfortably, and I was able to wear a bra or no bra!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size

links_reviews_title: I did not wear it. Too loose in the chest and ribcage.
links_reviews_text: But the style and cut were nice otherwise.
Didn't wear it. My fiance loved me in it, but I thought it was slightly frumpy.

links_reviews_title: This could have been cute for larger chest
