links_reviews_text: This could have been a cute dress for a fuller busted person. with 32B the straps an whole bust way too loose.
Fun, flirty, feminine. Elastic kept the arms in place but wasn't too tight. Will be renting again this summer! Shown tucked into the Cupcakes & Cashmere Raven shorts.
Loved this top- wore it a few different days. It stays down on the shoulders which I really appreciated!

links_reviews_title: Exactly as cute as I expected it to be!
links_reviews_text: The shirt looks essentially exactly like it's supposed to. I knocked off a star b/c it was hard to get a lot of the wrinkles out, plus the sleeves were tight so they kept riding up and the shirt is a little more cropped than I expected so when the sleeves rode up the shirt was pretty short. However, I liked that it was short because it was a bit boxy so the length made it a bit more flattering. Really loved this shirt and will probably rent again!
Love the ruffle detail!! Very easy to style with white pants or jeans. Great for dinner or going out.
Wore it to a party of the shoulder and to work with the sleeves up. Super cute
This romper is fabulous!!! It runs a little big, but I loved it so much I bought it!

If you're on the fence I promise you will love it! I rented this for game day and it was so comfortable with the perfect material for a hot day. Just like another reviewer said beware of the ruffle, because if there is wind it will blow up and hit you in the face!!! Other than that, it is a cute little flirty top! Runs TTS.

links_reviews_title: Flattering just annoying it kept going up
links_reviews_text: This top is perfect for brunch in the city! But the annoying part it kept sliding up more than usual a top like this. I wore it with leather pants and got so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Simple throw on top very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Wear with high waist jeans.

Quality top. The material steams very easily and doesn't wrinkle too easily. A size 4 fit perfect in the shoulders but does make it a little boxy but I expected it with this style. Definitely could be partially tucked if you want more shape. I love that the ruffle covers your chest so I didn't have to wear a bra of any kind. Fun top and would rent again.

Cute top for the summer! Wore it with shorts and black jeans. Fabric looks better once steamed or ironed. Was a little tight around the shoulder but didn't restrict movement. Would require strapless bra. Wore it twice. Would recommend!
Loved this. Simple different and a fun too to wear
Fit was perfect. Fun and light weight

I loved this top. It was extremely comfortable. I originally tried size 2 but it was a little snug around my arms so I sized up to a 4 it fit perfect. You can't raise your arms up without showing your belly or having the shirt ride up to your shoulders so if you're going dancing probably not the shirt to wear otherwise love this shirt!
This top is beautiful and first true to size. The sleeves dont fall down and you dont have to pull at it all day/night. Very cute.
Great top. Easy to wear. Didn't need a bra because of the ruffle. Can be worn on or off the shoulders.
Great fit, but wrinkles easily.

I find that all Veda jackets are Well Made and designed. And this one is no exception. I expected it to be slightly lighter, but loved it just the same. I wore a medium, and I would say that it runs slightly small not much room in the sleeve which is fairly fitted. I usually wear a small, except in jackets where I find it sizing up usually works better.

I loved this top! It can get a bit wrinkly, but if you have a steamer or iron, that should do the trick. The fit was decent but the shoulders were slightly loose, but that worked in my favor. Would definitely rent again.

Rented this for everyday wear, also wore it with jeans & heels for a girls night out. Makes you feel stylish and put together with minimal effort. I'm busty and worried about the ruffles being too much, but they don't overtake the outfit. The 8 was a little loose around the shoulders but overall fits great. Material doesn't have much stretch, more of a structured/tailored fit at the bottom.

links_reviews_title: Cute shirt for 4th of July Party!
links_reviews_text: The shirt is super cute! The ruffles look a bit too big for me, since I am very petite and curvy, but that's the story of your life if you are that short 😂! I added an American flag pin and red shoes for the occasion.
Easy to wear. Boxy waistline looked cute tucked in with high waisted culottes and skirts, but would not have worn with low cut pants.
You can wear it off shoulder or one shoulder, like I did. Love that the ruffles weren't too overwhelming, which is something I've found with some of these trendy tops.

links_reviews_title: Love, love, love these flattering ruffles!
links_reviews_text: This shirt was so well designed with a slimming effect that most ruffled blouses don't offer. Very comfortable. Can be worn off both shoulders or one depending on your preference. I received a ton of compliments while wearing this paired with white pant.

links_reviews_title: Loved this! So many compliments! I wore it to host a model search ... fun and fashion forward.
links_reviews_text: Fit great ... only downside was it was windy and the ruffle kept flipping up. (I used some fashion tape and fixed the problem.)
Runs tts, possibly a bit tight across the shoulders. If I order again, I may size up to a 6. Nice light cotton material. Definitely a fun summer top!

The fit is a little boxy but works with skinny jeans. I wore a four and it was right across the shoulders but that helped it to stay in place. Overall would rent again! Also I have a long torso and it came to the top of my jeans. Usually short boxy tops look more crop top on me and this didn't.
I prefer it off both shoulders, but it can be worn (IMO) off just one, also. The ruffle detailing down the sides is to die for. Just love it.

links_reviews_title: Not really off the shoulders, crop top
links_reviews_text: The fit is short (meant to be a crop top). It hit right at my high waisted jeans, and I'm short and high waisted. The top kept riding up, possibly because I'm busty (36DD). Cute enough, but not worth the fussing and adjusting. Also, the hem kept falling down.

links_reviews_title: Great style- not always staying off shoulder though!
links_reviews_text: Rented for trip to Cuba. Wanted fun sun styles. This was a great fabric, cool and breathable. Sometimes it did not want to stay perfectly off shoulder and rode up a bit. Since when I rented there were no reviews, I looked up the brand and their size chart and got an 8 on account of that but probably could have done a 6. It was pretty windy which made it silly to walk around sometimes in since the top part flapped up. Best for a sunny day with no wind! Not too short on me but I have short torso so if you have a longer torso you'll probably want high waisted bottoms. Wore twice with no bra!
This top is SO CUTE. I got so many compliments! I probably could have worn an 8, but the fit was comfortable and not too baggy!
This top runs a touch large and a touch short but I loved it. The off the shoulder style was perfect for a fun vacation top.
Really flattering. Consider sizing up. Felt a little too constricting in the arms
I wore this to a summer concert. It was flattering and ran true to size. I have a longer torso so it was a little short on me but might be fine for others!

links_reviews_title: Was perfect for a hot day on vacation in Greece - loose and girly
links_reviews_text: Relaxed fit, feminine ruffle.
Unfortunately I ordered too big so it wasn't as cute as it could have been but really loved the design

links_reviews_title: Cute but too short for my postpartum body
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing because when I lifted my arms at all you could see the top of my maternity pants. I'd rent again though when the post baby goes away!
Not a fan of the style. Top was way too voluminous for me.

links_reviews_title: Cute top but not flattering on me.
links_reviews_text: I think this top is adorable. I wish I looked adorable in it. I thought maybe I could rock the off shoulder ruffle look, but apparently my broad shoulders had other ideas. If you know you can rock this style, rent this shirt because it's very cute. If you are a broad shouldered gal like me, it may not be so flattering.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not as functional as I hoped for
links_reviews_text: The shirt was adorable and I loved the details. However the elastic felt very tight. Any time I moved my arms up the elastic would shrink up.

LOVED the fit of this gown-- so easy to wear, so flattering. The fit is very casual, but the very subtle sequins give the dress a little bit of flair, and the neckline is really elegant (at least on my small chest-- it might be more exposure for someone with a much larger chest). I don't usually wear this color but it looked much better on my skin tone than I expected. Really loved it!
The only downside is the straps were pretty long for me and kept falling down. It was also very long.

links_reviews_title: Work gala. Felt beautiful all night
links_reviews_text: The fit could not have been more perfect. It hid my trouble areas. I just felt like I was glowing all night

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for me my first time being a wedding officiant
links_reviews_text: I was an officiant for my friends' wedding and decided to rent a dress to help me look "official" - I picked this one because it felt the right amount of formal and was in the same color family as the bridesmaids' dresses. I really loved this dress - got lots of compliments throughout the night. I ordered a 2L and 4L, and wore the 2L, as the dress does run a bit large. Liked the classy, elegant look - the color and the sequins were great. I am on the pale side, and decided to get a spray tan for the wedding, but the color of the dress still looked good without the tan. The dress was delivered a whole week before the wedding so I had plenty of time to try it on with shoes/ accessories, etc. The only con as other reviewers mentioned that the sequins go right to the seam, so can get a little scratchy against your skin, but definitely not anywhere close to a deal-breaker. Definitely recommend.

Dress was beautiful, comfy, and fit very well. I loved the cinched waist, which made it flattering, but it was flowy, so I think it would be pretty forgiving size-wise. This was my bridesmaid dress. My friend wanted us to wear champaign, this turned out to be the perfect color! I was a little worried because this was my first time renting a dress, so I knew I wouldn't be able to get it hemmed. It turned out to be the perfect length with 2.5ish inch heels.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Bridesmaids dress. Got so many compliments
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size

I rented this as my bridesmaid's dress for a friend's wedding and it was perfect. It runs a little long but wearing 3 inch heels helped. It was very comfortable to wear all night and the fit was so flattering for my body type. Would rent again.
This dress was incredibly comfortable and flattering. I loved it so much I purchased it. Highly recommend trying it!
Was very beautiful and fit well. Perfect for formal event and a subtle amount of sparkle that was wonderful.
Pictures do not do this dress justice!!! So comfortable too!

I absolutely LOVED this dress for prom! It was comfy, light, and stretchy. It did not show undergarment lines at all either. The only thing that was slightly annoying was the strap would fall when I would dance, but I can't blame the dress too much for that! Haha 10/10 would recommend to anyone

links_reviews_title: The color was perfect to match my sisters wedding! I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It was perfect for some bloating. I was on my monthly cycle and it allowed me to not feel self conscious and still feel sexy! It wasn't constricting nor suffocating. The material is breathable. The only con I wold say is that the straps are a wee bit too big. I had to adjustment them from time to time. Other than that, I loved it! I'd order it again!

links_reviews_title: This gown was perfect for my event and fit me in all the right places. It was comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This gown was perfect for my event and fit me in all the right places. It was comfortable!
- dress runs large, size down - sequins rub against skin on arms/chest area, uncomfortable - cut is flattering - skipped the bra - pale pink, did not wash me out despite not being tanned atm

The dress hugged my curves from the waist down and I could wear the 14L vs my usual size 16. The color was perfect for a wedding (formal) and it was the perfect fabric/weight for wear all day! Would definitely rent again and rates it a five regardless of the straps falling constantly.

I received so many compliments on the dress, and felt just beautiful. It was so comfortable, while being the level of glam I was going for. The color was perfection, I wore rose gold accessories with this and they worked perfectly.
Felt like a princess all night! Stretchy fabric, true to size, beautiful color, and very comfortable. No adjustment needed at all throughout the night!

I loved how this dress fit my body. I have a flat butt haha so I thought this didn't accentuate that. It was a nice pale pink color. It was super comfortable! It was very humid when we got married and the dress wasn't overbearing. The only thing that was annoying was the zipper could get stuck on the sequins. Besides that it was great!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a gala for my local aquarium.
links_reviews_text: I actually only ordered this dress as the back up dress and the one I originally wanted was not shipped. This dress however was gorgeous and fit well. The material is fairly stretchy so it didn't matter that it hugged my torso (doesn't fit like the picture but does it ever?). It is a little short, however. I am 5ft 4in and the dress touched the ground when I was barefoot. Other than that it was a great dress for a fancy night out.
Loose straps, form fitting, good length
Glamorous and romantic
I am between a 12 and 14. I ended up wearing the 12 and it fit perfect, maybe even a little big. It's Flowy, breathable, and got tons of compliments!!
Loved this dress! The color was beautiful. Subtle but super cute with the beading. Very comfortable and stayed in place all night. Would rent again!
The dress was very comfortable. Beautiful color with a lovely sparkle. The style is very forgiving around the tummy.
This dress was plenty long and very sparkly, but I ended up going with a different dress because it didn't fall quite right on my figure.

links_reviews_title: A sweet dress for gender reveal photos
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a gender reveal for our first baby! The dress was a little large overall, especially the straps. Used a strap adapter to pull it tighter, but I'd recommend sizing down overall. Definitely requires steaming for the liner beneath, I felt as if the wrinkles were visible. Overall really enjoyed this rental.
Comfortable fit. Very flattering. Perfect for a summer evening wedding.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress! It is so sparkly and comfortable I just loved it!
links_reviews_text: I am 5’8 and the long was the perfect length with 3 inch heels. I am about a size 8-10 (29-30) in pants and weigh 160lbs and the size 8 fit great! I could have gotten away with wearing the 6 but I didn’t want it as tight in the stomach area.

I wore this in my best friend's wedding as all of the bridesmaids had different tones of rose gold and blush gowns. It was very comfortable, photographed well, and suited my body type well. I prefer more form-fitting dresses but as a bridesmaid, I was happy to wear this dress as it was very appropriate and most importantly easy to dance in :)

This was sent as a backup when the original I picked was not available to ship. I really liked it. I thought the pattern and sequins were subtle and fun. Really easy to wear. The top is blousy by design so I felt there was too much room up top and in the waist so opted not to wear. I would have liked to try a smaller size

This dress pleasantly surprised me. I am 6months postpartum, so my body isn't quite back to what it was before. When I selected my size I didn't know if it'd work out. The dress was pretty forgiving and surprisingly flattering. I loved the color! It was so different and no one else had anything like it- which is always a bonus. I wore the L because with my heels the R was a tad too short. I had to hold up the L when I walked but I'd rather that than too short. I am more busty too and was able to wear a strapless bra which was nice because the days of not wearing a bra are gone ;) Very happy with my rental.

links_reviews_title: This dress is A+. Style and color were perfect for a spring ball.
links_reviews_text: I am normally a standard Size 4, but the size 2 was perfect with a 2-inch heel. Very comfortable and flattering dress.

links_reviews_title: It was easy to rent, and in the end I got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly. I am 5'7 and weigh 145. The edge of the dress lightly touched he ground and I wore sandals with the 4R. It hugged my waste nicely and was comfortable. My only complaint is the sequins irritated my arms by the end of the night . Gorgeous dress, it matched well with pink and purple flowers!

Very pretty but entirely too large. I didn't wear it. I have a 34DD chest and this chest was ginormous. The straps aren't adjustable either so there was no finagling it. I'm in 3 inch heels in the picture and I'm 5'7 without shoes. I would totally rent it again but would absolutely size down. On the plus side- when I tried it on it was super comfy- it has a really soft inside lining and the color was very pretty- the sparkly detail gave it enough glam to be appropriate for most any semi formal or formal event.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous sparkling dress, perfect for my bridal shower! Received tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress! It was perfect for my bridal shower especially because my wedding colors are blush and gold! It sparkles so beautifully and I received so many compliments. I really felt beautiful! I would definitely recommend sizing down though, I typically wear a 16 but could have definitely gone with a size 14, and the extra size I ordered was a size up. It was big on me, but I was able to make it work especially since I was wearing a blush cardigan. As a first time customer of RTR I am VERY pleased and will be using RTR in the future, most likely for my wedding rehearsal dress!

This dress was...OK for my body type. I think it looked nice but it does huh your hips/butt/ tummy and those are my "problem areas" I didn't end up going with this dress for our military ball but I would have still felt beautiful if I had. Overall, good quality and pretty dress

links_reviews_title: Great dress for bridesmaid or guest
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. So comfortable all evening long and so many compliments even months later. Sequins are delicate and don't feel scratchy on the inside of your arms. Highly recommend and wish they made in other colors.
Great dress. Fit great and very comfortable. Was worried about length but it was perfect with 3-4" heels

links_reviews_title: It was a very beautiful dress... no one else had one like it!
links_reviews_text: It fit great! even with my big bust I didn't have to wear a bra. It is tighter around the mid section, so I did wear spanx.. but the dress is sort of see through, so nude is the way to go!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a black tie gala with work, and got tons of compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit very well and was super comfortable. I could have worn it all day. The only thing i would say, which I did see others comment on, was that the straps were a bit loose so keep that in mind. Other than that, a great dress, especially for those a bit heavier chested like myself. Lots of breathing room. I would rent this again in a heartbeat. My favorite rental from RTR.

links_reviews_title: This dress is amazing!!! I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I was worried this dress would be too formal for a daytime wedding, but it wasn't at all. It was dressy, but not too dressy. Sexy, but not too sexy. It fit like a glove and was extremely flattering in all the right places. I didn't need to buy a special bra; just wore my favorite Natori Feathers Contour Plunge bra. Out of all the dresses I've ever worn, this is definitely one of my top 3 all time favorites. I felt like a million bucks!

links_reviews_title: Too tight in my rib cage
links_reviews_text: I loved it but didn't wear it because it was too small around my rib cage. Perhaps next time I will try the larger size.

links_reviews_title: Too small to wear comfortably, SIZE UP!
links_reviews_text: Such a pretty and unique dress, I wish it was bigger so that I could have worn it. I am normally an 6/8 so I sized up and ordered the 3R (advertised as the 8/10). I never usually have an issue with other dresses that are deemed "small/tight" in the waist by some renters, but this really was way too small and really difficult to zip. Once I had it on I knew I wouldn't be comfortable all night so I wore something else. My advice: size up, then size up again.

links_reviews_title: Cute on the hanger; bad fit.
links_reviews_text: Couldn’t zip the waist in any of the sizes I ordered (2R, 3R, 4R). I’m a size 8.
Looked very professional and yet felt so comfortable.
Slip not being attached was a pain… Boobs showing slip shifting

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear this dress. But it's cute.
links_reviews_text: I ordered this in a 3 first and it looked really cute on but I couldn't get it to zip in the waste. It wasn't even close. But the length was perfect. So I ordered it in a 4 and it still wouldn't zip. The waste really didn't see any bigger. But it was much longer than the 3. The slip is also very weird and is hard to hide under the dress.
Wow, I loved this dress, but got the wrong size!!! Will definitely rent it again when I have the right occasion and in the correct size.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful long dress without being too formal
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a dinner fundraiser. The fabric is very light weight. I had some trouble lining the slip up properly with the the low cut of the dress. But it worked out. The dress runs a little big because I am a 4/6 and was able to wear the 2. It made my boobs look bigger so that is always a plus. I do recommend that you size up if you have a larger chest.
IT is beautiful and the length was perfect. You do need a slip. Was not able to wear it as I could not zip the back due to being too small, They send me wrong size a 2r, I wear a 4-6.
Love the the detail in the ruffle. Fitted with no stretch so not very comfy. Ended up wearing something else despite this dress being very pretty. Needs spanx for sure! This photo was just a try-on.
Beautiful wedding dress for our civil ceremony wedding

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, romantic, and perfect for bridal events!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my engagement party. It was so comfortable, I wore it all day (which included setting up and taking down the party) and didn't notice any discomfort. Some people mentioned they couldn't move their arms that much, but I didn't experience that. It is a form fitting dress and I wore spanx and no bra. It was perfect! I would purchase this dress if I could.

links_reviews_title: Great service. Easy, fast, and very convenient. Would def rent again.
links_reviews_text: Wedding celebration. Fitted true to size. A little snug around arms. 135lbs 5'4 - wore size 6 .. bust 36B ... great fit. Comfortable, great material for formal yet elegant wear... I was very satisfied with my pick.

I loved this dress & got so many compliments in it. However, the dress will show every line & bump. Nevertheless, I felt great in it & was so pleased I didn’t have to wear a bra with it - that rarely happens with F cups!
This dress is so comfortable. Wore for my bachelorette, so easy to dance in! Loved it!! The gold detail is gorgeous. TTS

The dress was beautiful and fit pretty close to my body. Loved the dress overall, but the 'over the shoulder' detail was a little tight restricting movement. But I got tons of compliments! Happy with the dress!

I wore this to my bridal shower. I figured I would be the center of attention so I might as well dress like it! I looked and felt amazing and I got so many compliments. The only issue is that the arms can be restricting but that is typical of an off-the-shoulder dress. It is form fitting, so don't wear it unless you want to show off your figure.
This is a different style for me...off the shoulder fits comfortably... stays put...no bra necessary. The material is sturdy and looks lovely but doesn't feel too delicate.
A little tight in the shoulders but overall it fit well. Got tons of compliments, which is always a plus!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my bridal shower-it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: It fit well, and stayed off the shoulder!
Loved everything about this dress
This was the perfect dress for my bridal shower. I wore the 10 because it was tight at the arms in the 8. This was form fitting and flattering.
Perfect for my daughters baptism. Tons of compliments. Everyone thought it was vintage.

I loved this dress for my rehearsal on the beach and welcome party at a beer garden. It was fitted but not too tight overall, the shoulders however were a little snug. The ivory color and gold detailing was lovely. Overall really happy with this rental!

This dress was perfect for my engagement party! I went braless because the top was tight enough to hold the girls up, and it was just flowy enough to cover any potential diamond cutters. The rest of the dress was form fitting - this dress runs SUPER true to size. The sleeves have some give but not a lot. I would definitely rent again.

Wore this dress for a wedding shower, received many compliments. Rented a size 2 and 4, although the 2 fits nicely I went for the 4 to have more of a shift dress look rather than it being too tight fitting. No issues as far as moving my arms around. Highly recommended!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my bridal shower. Beautiful dress, and it looks great with a sash!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 2 in dresses, but I chose to size up to a 4 because the 2 was too tight on my shoulders. I'm 5'8" and the dress hit just above the knee. The bottom of the dress fit well, even though I had to size up.
This dress was long enough to be classy at my bridal shower, but fun enough where I didn't feel stuffy or stiff. It was the perfect dress!! Highly recommend!

I wore this dress for my rehearsal dinner, and it was so comfortable! The details on the dress with the gold threading is gorgeous. I say it runs smaller (only slightly) because of the cut. Great length as well!
Thank goodness I found this for my anniversary party/gender reveal because nothing fit. Wore size 12 at 31 weeks. Danced all night in comfort.

I’m usually a 2-4 and the 4 was perfect! This dress was very comfortable. No problems sitting or moving my arms. Had to iron a little. No stretch to the fabric on the hips. Would recommend spanx and a spray tan. Tons of compliments!

This dress was absolutely perfect for my bridal shower in July down at the Jersey Shore. The ivory/off-white dress was exactly what I was looking for, and I matched amazing well with the decor. This dress was actually not my first choice initially, but once I put it on I knew it was the one. It fit me like a glove. I am smaller on the top, and it fit my curves wonderfully. I received so many compliments, and I'm so thankful I ordered this dress.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Perfect for bridal events!
links_reviews_text: I thought this dress was very flattering and made me feel pretty!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a wedding shower
links_reviews_text: Beautiful, elegant

links_reviews_title: Very true to size. I got a size up and it was still pretty tight.
links_reviews_text: True to size

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a work awards dinner
links_reviews_text: Felt great in this dress! Usually a 4 and the 4 fit comfortably! The dress made me feel skinny and I didn't feel like the top was too puffy like mentioned in other reviews. Great summer date dress!

I wore the dress for my rehearsal dinner. It was absolutely stunning. I have an athletic build, so it was a little tight in the legs and butt for me. It was comfortable, but the slit in the back was a little higher than I was expecting. Overall, it was a great dress, and I would wear it again in a heartbeat.

links_reviews_title: worn this to my bridal shower
links_reviews_text: fit really well! the arms are a little restraining but overall it was a nice fit and i felt beautiful! would rent it again

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my bridal shower
links_reviews_text: The bottom fit great. The top felt too poofy when I first tried it on but it didn't bother me at all during the event & looked great in pictures.

links_reviews_title: White with a hint of gold = Awesome!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It's a tight squeeze to get both arms in but once you do it's very comfortable.

I love this feminine dress bySlate & Willow! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works best for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear a strapless bra, nubra or no bra since the dress is off the shoulders. At 5"3, the length hit right at my knees on me. This dress is perfect for a night out or for date night. Pair with heels and a statement clutch to complete your outfit!

I wore a size 10 and it fit perfectly. The mid-section did bunch up a bit, but it didn't bother me. I chose not to wear a bra with this dress. Great support for a large bust. I will note that the material is a little heavy (I wore this in Mexico) so it may not be the best dress to wear in the summer.

links_reviews_title: Classy, comfortable, and so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my bridal shower. The sleeves were not itchy and uncomfortable. The dress hit at the knee which was an appropriate length. I decided to size up to allow my body to move freely and be more comfortable. Overall I was very happy and would rent again.

The top is well fitting and will allow even the most conservative ladies feeling comfortable going braless if you choose to forgo your strapless bra. The off the shoulder design made me feel classy and sexy at the same time. The dress did fit me more snug in the rib cage and in the hips than I would have liked, but I run big in these areas to begin with. In retail jeans, I'm a 12/14. I wore this dress in a 16. The material is light and would make a good option for spring time weddings.
I rented this as a possible elopement dress. It was way to small. I usually wear a 14/16 - and received both sizes nether fit. Not close.
I liked this dress and it was really pretty just never wore it because it didn't really work for the occasion I was looking to wear it for.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my bridal shower and it was soooo comfy and fit perfect. LOVED THIS DRESS!
links_reviews_text: The only Con I had for this dress is if you are wearing it somewhere you need to dance or move your arms a lot, arm movement is very restrictive.
I rented this for my bridal shower. Perfect dress. Felt confident in it. I am usually a 4, but I wore the 6.
It is a snug fit, but isn't constricting. The top is a fluffier than I thought it would be, but it was a very nice dress.

links_reviews_title: Soft but edgy looking fabric, an elevation to the usual LBD
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a work holiday party. It came right on time and the fit worked. My only complaint is how much room there was in the hip area, despite the waist being very fitted. It was fun with the pockets and it was easy to accessorize with big earnings and a pair of cute heals (I went with red velvet open toe pumps).

links_reviews_title: Was surprised by how gorgeous this was, ended up purchasing!
links_reviews_text: I had rented this dress thinking it would be a fun departure from my usual office dresses and loved it so much that I ended up buying it! The fabric is really cool- it looks like leather but is machine-washable. The quilting really elevates this look so that it is appropriate for my office, but easy to dress up for the weekend. Check out all of my rentals and my outfits on my YouTube Channel, I often talk about RTR-related topics! Channel name: Pointe Boutique.

Rented this dress for a work performance in still-chilly spring. I wear a size 8 (6 top/10 bottoms) but only the 6 was available--snug at the waist, but spanx made it work! The stretchy sides also helped, and the skirt gives room for the hips. This is a fierce, sexy dress. Compliments galore. I did wear a light knit sequin scarf to disguise the cleavage though :)
Great for curvy ladies. Loved the vegan leather!

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for a company Christmas party!
links_reviews_text: Wonderful fit! Was a little tight in the waist. Very flattering! The fabric is heavier. I wouldn’t recommend for warmer weather but it was the perfect weight for winter! Just enough edge to be sexy but still conservative!

Great dress and love the material. Fit a little small around the rib cage. Needed a dress for my work holiday party that was a little loose over the tummy since I was only 8weeks PP. this was a great choice!! Lots of compliments.
Tons of compliments. Flattering on the stomach. Everyone loves the leather look. One of my favorite rentals so far.
I would definitely rent this LBD again. I felt amazing and received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Looked great, super comfortable, plus pockets!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a more casual charity event. I intended to wear the 6, but the hem was unstitched. The 4 was a little snug but not uncomfortably so. The structure hides flaws. It was very flattering for my more bottom-heavy shape. It's a perfect material for Fall/Winter.

Fun dress to wear to an end of summer gala (dinner and dancing). Loved the pockets, and the 6 (back up size) fit better even though I usually wear an 8. Dancing was easy with the full skirt and I really liked the texture and look of the dress.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous edgy LBD! Fits true to size with lots of extra room at the hips. Love the pockets!
links_reviews_text: OMG, I love this edgy LBD! I rented my usual RTR dress size 10 (for reference, I am 5'8", 154 lbs, 36C) and it fit perfectly. The top creates beautiful cleavage (too much for work, but great for date night) and the stretchy side panels create a comfortable, snug fit. The skirt is fuller than expected with lots of extra room at the hips (skirt is not the most flattering, but very comfortable). Love the pockets! The material feels more like normal thick fabric, less like faux leather (but looks like faux leather).

This dress was made for me.... Or that's how it fit anyway.... It was lightweight yet had just the right amount of structure. The fabric was edgy and so it worked without much in the way of accessories. This is definitely a dress to own!

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Got lots of compliments on the style of the dress and the quilted vegan leather look.
links_reviews_text: The 6 fit like a glove on top. I am a 36B and could just barely get it zipped with a bra on. The bottom of the dress is a little full, due to the style of dress, but very forgiving with POCKETS!!! Comfortable to dance in. A great dress overall.
Loved the fit of this, very flattering and cute! Had lots of compliments all night! Would rent this again or buy it!

links_reviews_title: The PERFECT black dress for my art show!!
links_reviews_text: This was PERFECT for my art show! It made a "black dress" less basic and plain with interesting texture, form, pockets, and the neckline! I loved how it fit!

links_reviews_title: Perfect LBD with some fun stitching.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. The length was perfect for a work event. The dress was super comfortable and didn't show those extra few pounds I put on over the holidays. I do have a larger ribcage so I went up a size. Accessorized with a black pleater tie belt.

Wore this to the office and it made me wish I had happy hour plans after! The fit is structured but comfortable. There are pockets which sent my love for this piece over the edge! The textured leather look makes this your "Little Black Dress 2.0". I loved it and plan on renting again for a date night.

I love this dress so much. It looks like leather from far away but its polyurethane. Did I mention it has pockets? I think this dress could fit most body types. There's lots of room at the hips and the top is nicely fitted.
Great dress, pockets are always a plus! Awesome choice for a fun formal corporate function. Ran a tad small in the waist, I would size up, no stretch in the material.

links_reviews_title: Great fit. Tailored in all the right places without being too form fitting or revealing.
links_reviews_text: Length was a little longer than I would have liked. The material is cool and feels kind of like leather, definitely dresses it up.
This dress fit like a glove!!! It's really true to size and very flattering!!! The pockets are definitely a plus!
Got this as a backup dress. Was so torn as to which to wear as they were both so cute!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a night out!
links_reviews_text: Liked the look of the dress. Material is different and has a cool vibe.
Loved this dress, fit perfectly.
I loved this dress. Super flattering and extremely soft fabric and the pockets were the best.
I'm a 4 in this brand and the cut of the fabric makes it run small. Size up!
Tight in waist but poofy on the hips. Not flattering.

Fit true to size. Dress is fitted on top and almost a bubble skirt on the bottom, which I found comfortable and not unflattering. It did show some cleavage. The quilted faux-leather is soft and makes for a fun twist on the LBD. Although I ended up wearing something else for the event, I ended up buying this to have in my closet.

links_reviews_title: The fabric was interesting. It looks like leather. Everyone was reaching out to touch it.
links_reviews_text: It's form fitting on the top. The sides are elasticized so it hugs you your body. Very cool fabric. Loved the pockets. I had lots of compliments!
Nice balance between edgy and low key. Fit was as expected
Very cool fabric and nice fit.

links_reviews_title: Super stylish, perfect fit, I want to buy this dress!
links_reviews_text: I really love everything about this dress, and I want to own it, but I don't have enough places to wear it. The cut is super flattering, the fabric looks interesting and is comfortable to wear, and it feels like a dress that can be worn in all kinds of seasons or occasions. I wore this on date night to my husband's work holiday party in NYC. You could just as easily pair with a blazer for a work dinner, or sandals for summer night out. If you are even slightly considering this dress, rent it!

The fabric is really soft and luxurious. The fit was odd. The bodice was tight and the bottom really ballooned out. I could barely breath when it was zippered up, so didn't wear it. I have broad shoulders and a more athletic build so maybe that was the issue. I think this dress would be great on a pear shaped body.
This dress is a little tight at the waist so I recommend sizing up one size. It looks like a textured leather fits well. It also has pocket which is a nice surprise.. TONS of compliments!
Really unique dress that felt warmer than a regular sleeveless dress would. It is a bit puffy.
This is a very flattering black dress with a bit of a twist in fabric.... they say "leather" more rubber Like but really cute and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Definitely my style but way too much cleavage
links_reviews_text: I loved the leather look, the pockets, and the general fit. But my cup size didn't work for the cut. Too much cleavage to be work place suitable.

links_reviews_title: Cool material, can dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Got it as a backup for a gala--ended up not using it, so wore it a few times with a sweater or shirt over the top to dress it down a little. Got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: The material was perfect for the evening. Loved the pockets!
links_reviews_text: Fit pretty true to size. Tried the size 8, but wore the 10 to allow for comfort and room to dance. Perfect length and fit.
Fit was perfect and the dress flattered with the need for spanx or a special bra!

I didn't love this dress, but it worked. The size 2 was spot on for sizing. I'm 5'2" and it was as short as I go for work, so tall girls beware. The cut made me feel wide-probably because of the shoulder cut.

This dress is perfect for a bridal shower or bridesmaid luncheon. It runs a little large, I typically wear a 6, but the 4 was still a little big. It was still super cute and conservative and I'd wear it again!
Perfect color, great fabric, cute asymmetrical hem, perfect for pear shaped women! Tons of compliments!
Loved this dress. It fitted perfectly. I'm keeping!
This was a last minute replacement dress and even though it didnt arrive in time for the event I was able to wear it the next day for Palm Sunday! I felt great in this dress! And... pockets!
Skirt flared flatteringly and material has some weight. Pockets!

Color as pictures on model! I used this as a bridesmaid dress and it worked great. I loved the pockets. It fit well and I am large-cheated (double d) and gave me that perfect cinched weight with comfort. I would rent again in a heart beat!!

links_reviews_title: classic dress with a fun twist
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress. I rented it for work but it was so comfortable I also wore it over the weekend. The bottom is uneven and even though it's a cute detail, the shortest part was too short for work so I wore it with leggings. My favorite part of this dress was the color and that it had pockets. I would totally rent again.
Lov d this color! Got s lot of compliments. Great for girls with curves since it gathers above the waist line .

The dress is beautiful, I love the soft pink color and how flattering it was on me. However the top was large (which usually never happens, I have a large bust) so I found myself pulling it down all night to try to ensure a better fit. Overall, I loved it but most likely wouldn't rent it again. The pockets were fun!

The material is thick and structured. Beautiful, easy and no-fuss piece. Doesn't wrinkle easily which is fantastic for everyday use, especially if you sit at a desk. I rented this for an everyday office day where I was running several meetings and wanted something conservative yet eye-catching. My office's bathroom lighting (in this photo) doesn't do the dress justice! Seriously contemplating purchasing.

The dress fit well; the waist hit at the smallest part of my waist, which was nice. Loved the pockets. I felt a tad washed out in the color, but that was probably just my skin tone. Cute and classy overall.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous! Style it with accessories to really shine :)
links_reviews_text: The top was definitely baggier. The reviews were right about that. Still, I got my normal size, but wore a huge padded bra to fill it out. Be prepared. The fabric was a little on the heavy side so the style matched the tan shoe/belt better than a hot pink. The atypical skit length was just what this dress needed to jazz it up. I wore it on a date, and to church. Pretty, and classy. Beautiful color. And you got to love those pockets!!!

I rented this dress for a bridal shower. After reading a bunch of other reviews I could see that this dress ran large on top. However, since it was my first time using RTR I was nervous. Normally I'm between a 4 and a 6 so those are the sizes I got. I didn't even try on the 6 because when I tried on the 4 it fit fine. If anything it was a little big on top (my chest is on the smaller side) but I don't know if a 2 would have been too small. Either way I loved it and got lots of compliments on it. Also LOVED that it had pockets! Can't wait to rent again from RTR!! :)

links_reviews_title: The color was beautiful. Fabric quality excellent. Compliments figure.
links_reviews_text: It's runs a little large but not by much. I typically wear a size 4 in RTR but I wore a size 2 in this dress. So I'd suggested ordering a size down.
This is a great dress-it has pockets!!! I enjoyed the asymmetrical hem. The color was a little off for my skin tone, but I still rocked it.
This dress was cute and had pockets which is always a win. No complaints!
Pretty color, nice fit and some originality on the shape of the skirt. The simplicity is the best asset.

Loved this dress! I wore it twice, both to nice dinners. I wore it with nude heels. But the fabric and style could easily be dressed down with booties or even cowboy boots. It's a great blank canvas for jewelry as well. Material has some heft, so worked perfectly for our TX fall weather. Best part of this dress is the hemline and drape of the skirt. It adds something nice to this simple dress. One note is that you need to wear more of a streamlined bra so it doesn't show where the arm holes are, but a normal bra works great.
Super flattering and great length. I just wish the top would have been a little more fitted.
I loved this dress. The color and the cut made me feel very princess-like. Highly recommended!
Fit perfectly love the colour and style

links_reviews_title: Rented twice I loved it so much
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color. Has pockets. Comfortable fit. I would buy it if I could afford it.

I wore this to my engagement shoot. I read all the previous reviews and decided to rent an 8 and a 6. I usually wear a size 8 but I ended up wearing the 6. The fit around my waist was perfect. However around my bust and arms was super weird. I have DD so I know I should be able to fit anything out.... But if you see by the picture it fit super weird around my arms and my bust... It's like the waist was a 6 and from there up it was a size 10..
I wore this for a work meeting and got tons of compliments - it is a slightly larger fit so a belt is helpful but if I had gone down a size it definitely would've been too tight in the bust!
I thought it would have been short so I sized up... No need to size up due to length. I wish I would have gone in with a 4 so I might order again.
Don't be fooled by the first glance at this dress. While it looks boring on a hanger, it's a beautiful piece on. Unique hem line, flattering cut & color. Has pockets (amazing).

This dress fit fine. I typically wear 4 or 6 and the 4 worked; I'd recommend sizing down if you're on the fence. That said, while a fit and flare dress is usually a good choice for my figure, this one didn't quite work. I felt like it emphasized my hips, rather than camouflaging them. I also felt like the color washed me out a bit.

links_reviews_title: This was a 4 in the mirror and a 5 in photos!
links_reviews_text: Putting aside the fact that the dress is "dusty rose," not the "light carnation" the stock photo suggests, and putting aside the fact that while that stock photo looks like a cotton poplin or other light fabric and it is in reality a fairly weighty crepe - this dress is a winner. I was mostly pleased when I put it on and then when I took the photo realized it looked better in natural light and with the belt (which is mine). It's a little roomy for the size in the upper bust (though not on me at the ribcage) and roomy enough that the belt made a difference in the waist. I would not, however, have wanted the size smaller because of the ribcage factor (for reference my ribcage, at all the sizes I've ever been, is wider than average). Great for work and were the color a little more "me," I'd buy it in a heartbeat!
This dress was a thicker fabric so it kept a nice shape all day. I received compliments all day! I kept going places just so more people could see me in this dress. Fits true to size.

The fit of this dress is definitely loose in the chest area, but it's very structured and appropriate for a work or school presentation! I am only 5'1, so the length of the dress was great for professional dress ... Great quality and would definitely rent again.
The fabric is pretty thick and I had too much room in my waist area, the dress made me look very big and bulky - which I do not need! ;)

I wore this for our family pictures... It's still cold here in NH so the thickness of the dress was perfect. I'm pretty pale this time of the year and the dress didn't wash me out. It was so comfortable! I also loved that it had pockets. I would definitely rent this again.
Was very comfortable, had pockets that were super useful and was flattering.

I wore this dress for Valentine's Day brunch and dinner. At first I didn't love it. The color wasn't quite what I expected, but it was so comfortable and pretty. Between comfort, compliments and the pockets, by the end of the day I loved it! :)
Cute dress. Runs pretty true to size--a little large. I am only 5'0 so the length was great for me for work. Love the dusty rose color and asymmetric hem
I loved this dress so much. I am large busted, and this fit and flare style fit great!! I received so many compliments on it, and would totally buy this if I could!

This dress was a lot of fun. For me, I felt the the hem wasn't as asymmetrical as pictured but that could just be me. The one drawback that really kept it from 5 stars was that it did this odd poof in the tummy area that wasn't terribly flattering. It wasn't a deal breaker but just seemed a little odd. I may be too long waisted for the style.

Rented this dress for work/post work drinks, it's on the shorter side so beware if you're tall. As other reviews have noted the fabric is heavier than expected. The top of the dress runs quite large. I'm typically a 6, but will size down to a 4 in an a-line. I could probably have gone down even more, the dress was a bit gape-y in the under arms and across the chest.

With dresses I am usually a size 4, but if the hip part is tight I lean towards a size 6. This had plenty of room in the hip area, so the 4 fit me very well. I would say this dress works well if you are more curvy on bottom. As other reviews noted, the color is dusty and muted yet still very pretty. I received 2 compliments on the pretty dress. Because I am 5'10, and the dress hem is asymmetrical- at the shortest part it was a bit short! I still found the dress to be conservative because of the neckline and overall loose fit. Also, the arm holes were large, but this wasn't a problem.
Really flattering on any body type. Big fan and perfect for formal occasion like a wedding! I'm curvier and likely how the stripes didn't make me look larger.

links_reviews_title: Wore for Easter and loved it! Colors are perfect for spring and dress was comfortable throughout
links_reviews_text: Adorable!
I felt so fab in the dress. Fun print and easy fit. The sleeves are full for sure but the ruffles add flare.
#birthdaybrunch Dress was true to size. I am 5ft 2" and it was a mini dress for me. Beautiful colors and very flattering to hide any extras.

I ordered a size up but didn't really need to - I could have done the 44 bc it really is true to size. This dress was great! I wore it to my nephew's birthday party and it was perfect. I actually kept it and wore it again to work and a dinner party and got tons of compliments as well. Good material and well made. Keep in mind the sleeves don't really allow for a sweater or coat. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but too short for me :(
links_reviews_text: I was worried this dress would be too short on me and I was right. I'm 5'8 but have a longer torso. The dress did run a bit small so I could not wear it primarily for that reason but also because it was far too short on me. The dress itself is beautiful, I love the frilly sleeve and the colors. If it came in Tall I would purchase the dress again!
Lovely dress. Fit well. I have larger thighs (usually have to size up on straight dresses) and the dress fit perfectly. I received compliments all night long. Thick, quality material.
Loved this dress. It's very structured so for sure not clinging to you and showing any unflattering areas. The details on the sleeves are so fun and just adds to the overall flirtiness of this piece.
Loved the dress! It was my very first RTR experience, and I really enjoyed it. I loved the bright, fun colors and the material was nice and thick with good structure to the ruffle sleeves.
Seemed a bit large on me -- I might get a six next time. Still, super beautiful. It is fun and definitely a bit funky. I could imagine wearing this a number of places. Nice!

links_reviews_title: I may never give this one back!
links_reviews_text: I've worn this dress every chance I can and gotten over the top compliments. So cute and unique.
The flutter sleeves and bold pattern make this a super easy dress to wear without much thought or accessories needed. Super comfortable, especially on fat days :)

links_reviews_title: Cute but wish the size 4 was available
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my sisters graduation. I got it with my unlimited subscription but no size 4 was available so I chose a 6 (my normal size). It was a little boxy. I added a belt but it was still a little large so I wish there was a 4. It was about 90 degrees out and the dress was a little bit thicker material but not overwhelming! So that was nice
A little bit bigger and boxy but overall a great summer dress. Loved the shoulders and got lots of compliments on it. Makes u look skinny too!

Beautiful bright colors, high quality fabric and a flattering cut. The flutter sleeves are everything. Such a fun detail, but understated and don't call for too much attention. I loved this dress, received a ton of compliments and hope there's an occasion that I could wear it again soon!

Loved this dress. The colors are very bright. One of the shades of coral is very close to neon. The fit is fantastic. It is a true shift style but it's cut to skim your body so it is very flattering. I wore this to a wine tasting event that was fairly dressy and also for Easter. Lots of compliments. Love the sleeves! If you have a large chest it might be snug. I am an A and I feel like if I had much more up top it would be too tight.
This shift dress is feminine and flirty, with popped sleeves and a rich fabric!

links_reviews_title: Lines are awesome. Fun cut and sleeves are a riot!
links_reviews_text: This gives a whole new meaning to puffy sleeves. High on the compliments. I would get one size smaller.

I wore this for a Valetine's Day dinner date, with black tights and black pumps (and black snow boots for a while...). I would say it runs a little big, but it still looked cute - it's not fitted, but still flattering, so it's good if you want a dress that can hide some flaws. The fabric is thick and beautiful, and the flower texture is really nice. The colors are close to the RTR picture, just a little more vibrant. The only thing that was surprising is that the colors of the stripes are printed on, so they bleed a little past where the flowers end - it's meant to be this way, and it looks fine, but I just didn't expect it. The only reason I have this 4 stars is because the pleating around the shoulders is pretty big - I felt it was a little over-the-top, and more practically, it made it hard to wear a cardigan over the dress in the cold weather. Overall though, a fun dress.
Nice fabric. Fun colors. Good transitional piece for spring.

I was super excited to rent this one but a tad disappointed when it got here. It was a very strange fit which made it unflattering. It was big for a size 38 and the sleeves so loose you could see my entire bra from the side. It was very baggy in the torso so it bunched out (hard to see in pic). I even tried to add a belt but little improvement. The sleeves are VERY poofy! The colors were very bright and would be a great dress for spring summer if it fits (maybe a different body type then mine?). Unfortunately I had to send this one right back :(

links_reviews_title: Great structure, loved the ruffle sleeves
links_reviews_text: The dress had a few pulls in the fabric, but besides that it was so cute! Great for spring and could be dressed up for an event or down for a simple brunch with friends. The material is super thick, so I wouldn't opt for this dress when it was really hot or humid.

links_reviews_title: Love this fun and festive statement dress
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly and was comfortable. The sleeves puffing out really gave it a unique look. Gorgeous dress!
This dress was fun and youthful without being childish.
Great, thick material. Flirty and short but work appropriate! I am typically a 2 or 4 and the 40 fit perfectly!
A bit tight in the chest-otherwise perfect!

Loved this dress from the first time I saw it online. Unfortunately the size I ordered (40/4) is just too small. It's pretty short but also just tight! Tag inside the dress says it's an XS, I think this info would be helpful on the listing. Definitely tight across the chest for any larger busted girls. Would love to order a bigger size but probably will hold off until the summer. Too short to be appropriate for a family wedding!

links_reviews_title: Really cool texture but kinda tight
links_reviews_text: The flowers are all hand sewn and the colors of the flowers match exact to the picture shown on the homepage for this dress. Unfortunately there is no give to the dress and the sleeves flare. Also kinda short for work. All I can say is size up. Would rent in a larger size but not my first choice.
This dress runs true to size. I wore it to a wake sadly, but it would be perfect for the office.

links_reviews_title: The dress is awesome but very small in the chest.
links_reviews_text: The dress is awesome but very small in the chest. I usually wear a 4. I ordered a 6 and had to wear a sports bra to fit the cheat area. It is a bit short but looks great with flats at work
Nice stitching detail. Cute & comfortable to wear.

This dress is a true statement piece. The colors are bold and beautiful and the overly accentuated capped sleeves make this dress stand out. Reminded me a little bit of something Elizabeth Banks' character would wear in the Hunger Games. Got a lot of compliments from my female co-workers. I would recommend sizing up if you are between sizes. The dress was a little tight in my tummy area which made it shorter than I would have liked.
I got a 38, which I thought would fit but was a bit too tight in the hips for me to feel comfortable wearing it out. I really do love this dress and will order one size up so I can wear it to work.
The pattern and the color look great. It's just that from the side, the hole is too big that the bra is easily to be seen. I wish they made the hole where the arms are to be a bit smaller.

links_reviews_title: Such a beautiful dress, was perfect for a summer brunch party!!
links_reviews_text: The fabric and the colors were absolutely beautiful! I got many compliments wearing it!!
This is one of my favorite rentals. It's a beautiful dress that is very forgiving. The size is true and the fabric is gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: Great spring dress - the flowers are beautifully done. Material is thick and festive.
links_reviews_text: The dress is very cute - thick material and the flowers are beautifully rendered. I didn't love the way the sleeves fit, but the dress is unique and stands out.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and looks fantistic in pics
links_reviews_text: fits very well. Slightly on the looser side which allows you to eat. There's a little flare which is flattering. The sleeves are gorgeous.

This dress was spectacular! Amazing fabric. The reason I did not wear it is that it ended up being too cold outside, and with the sleeves the way they are, it is not easy to wear a blazer or sweater over it. The sleeves were a 'stand-up' ruffle, which really require that they not be covered. I will rent this again when the weather gets warmer.

links_reviews_title: Fun Spring dress with great sleeve detail!
links_reviews_text: The quality of the fabric is great-beautiful detail, color, and a nice weight without feeling heavy and definitely feelings like an expensive dress. The sleeve detail is the best part in my opinion-it feels very sweet and feminine. As a petite, this dress was right above the knee, didn't have much shape to it, and ran on the larger size. This dress was perfect for a warm work day and would be a great pic for a Spring/Summer shower!
This top was pretty! It ran true to size. Was a bit flowy for this who are extra conscious about a belly.

links_reviews_title: Works for many occasions - casual or dressy
links_reviews_text: Easy, comfy, cool. Not too tight through the body. Got lots of compliments.
Beautiful silk. Unique print. Very flattering. I received lots of compliments. Arrived brand new with tags on. Wish I had worn it more!
Great top. I wore this one a couple times this week. Once on the weekend and then again to work. Paired with some white jeans and healed sandals.
Didn't wear ...flows more than picture and looks baggie.

links_reviews_title: Will try again one size down
links_reviews_text: The silky material felt great, but there was a ton of extra material around the waist. I am usually between and small and medium for tops, but this medium felt like a large.

Quality/material is good and I liked the print and color. That's all this top has going for it. Wanted to love it based on all the reviews but found it to be tight around the bust/armpit area (and I'm relatively small chested) whole being insanely too flowy elsewhere. Looks like a pregnancy top. I had to tie it at the waist to give it more of a fit. Wouldn't wear again.
Too big, hung weird, looked like a piece of drapery.
Loved this shirt - many compliments given.
This could be worn at work, date night, vacation anywhere. Gorgeous style. Breathable material and so classy. I loved this top and the structure of it.
Wore to a bbq and got many compliments! Super comfortable and stylish with white pants.

links_reviews_title: Loved this top for vacation dinner
links_reviews_text: Such a great top! I couldn't decide between the xs and s based on reviews, I went with the xs but wish I got the s. It was a little tight around the neck. Love the flow pairs with fitted bottoms. I'm 113 5'4" 34b.
It was really cute but a bit too billowy. I wish it were fitted a bit more. Cute with white jeans for the trip to Hawaii.
The material was light & airy, and perfect for a warm weather vacay. For me, it was too tight in my armpit area.

This is a lovely looking top. The fit was not for me. This style is cut too high in the arm area and reminds me of a nice top at Ann Taylor, cut for petite sizes. It is billowy in the mid section making if forgiving to any residual fall/winter tummy action. Overall a nice top but for those who are on the petite side.

links_reviews_title: Cute style but not that flattering
links_reviews_text: One shoulder tie is cute but mid section is too loose and not flattering. Fabric is light and flowy
Nice thin silk. Long enough by not too long. Would rent again.
Beautiful top, nice flow, gorgeous fabric- I felt like this top was eye catching without being flashy. I wore it with cropped jeans and sandals for a fun everyday look.
Flowy & comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Very sexy top! Classy. Fit great!
links_reviews_text: Great top. flattering fit. It does look a little summery or beachy with the material.
This top was super cute but tight in the bust and upper back area. I am a size 12 and wore it once but was uncomfortable
Fit well and was great for a dinner night out. A little tight in the bust for us busty girls.
Loved the shirt but the material pulled across the chest like it was to small. Fit nicely everywhere else.
I wore this top a couple of times. It fit well, and it was great with a pair of white jeans

links_reviews_title: Fun top, wore with white shorts
links_reviews_text: Runs a little big. Flowy so tucked in front. Very cute
Wore for a night out to a concert. Great top, flowy fit but not baggy. The one shoulder is a festive look for a night out in the summer. Fits true to size.
This wasn't a huge wow, but was on trend with tropical print and off the shoulder styling. The big floppy bow was a little over the top, but loved this with white jeans.

links_reviews_title: I ended up wearing this for 30 reunion. Very comfortable
links_reviews_text: runs large through the midsection
Loved this top for my trip!
I received so many compliments on this dress. The fabric is firm but with some give. Arms are difficult to move up. This isn't best suited for dancing.

Gorgeous dress! I never wear form fitting dresses but, because it was a thicker material, it held me in place. The only downside is it's hard to dance in because you can't raise your arms very high and the thick material made it hot! I would absolutely rent this again!
This dress was super tight so it made me look thinner but was hard to move in. Got compliments on it though.

Fit like a glove, has the perfect amount of stretch to give in the right areas but hold you in in others. Thick fabric, very smoothing, and so flattering. Always think about buying this because I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for a black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’0” and wanted a formal dress that was a bit longer but didn’t drown me. The leg slit made a nice addition and was perfect for pairing with accessories!

links_reviews_title: Never want to take it off!
links_reviews_text: This dress definitely is cut slim, and is very body conscious, but the material is fairly thick and can definitely take curves. I got so many compliments on this dress, and when I returned it this morning, even my husband said he hoped we'd have an occasion to see this dress again. Such a classic shape, with a sexy update.
Perfect

links_reviews_title: I just love this dress. I got so many compliments and felt incredible all night!
links_reviews_text: Fit was great, amazing quality. I love the high slit, the length was different and flattering. I have a full bust (F) and have a hard time finding dresses that look sexy without being too much. The bust part of the gown is definitely intended for small breasts but is stretchy and discreet enough to accommodate bigger size though. All in all, amazing first experience wearing an RTR gown!

links_reviews_title: This dress was used for a professional model shoot. Yusuf Salahuddin, SLRHero.com, Inst @SLRHero
links_reviews_text: This dress fit beautifully.

This dress was great! Don't let the photos fool ya, this dress is TIGHT! I ordered a 6 and an 8 and went with the 8 just to give myself some breathing room. Got a ton of compliments and it's great for shorter women (I'm 5 ft). Not sure I'd rent again, just because I like something a wee bit more comfortable, but, still was a knockout!

This dress was amazing. I usually wear a 2 or 4, and the 4 fit perfectly. It was fitted enough to wear without a bra, but super comfortable at the same time. I got compliments all night long and felt like a million bucks.

links_reviews_title: It was great to receive 4 options to choose from and try on dresses in the comfort of your own home.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs a little small but it's very flattering and hugs you in all the right places. I felt confident in it however, if you like to dance, this dress makes it difficult to do so. Received many compliments all night.

I rented this as an option for a black tie wedding, and as soon as I tried it on I was WOWed!!! Reviews were right.. it’s much more dressier and elegant in person! It is the right amount of sexy yet still so classy. I rented both the 0 and 2 and found the 2 to fit much better. I absolutely loved wearing this dress and got compliments on it! I wish I owned it.

links_reviews_title: Received tons of compliments! Great for a semi formal/cocktail wedding.
links_reviews_text: Received tons of compliments! Great for a semi formal/cocktail wedding. Fits true to size but can be a little tight in the hips. Had to go with the larger backup size because of the hips even with the stretchy fabric.
Has some stretch!

This dress had such a classy and elegant style. I felt stunning all night. The dress has an understated sexiness that worked really well for this semi-formal wedding. Fabric is not very breathable, which helped me stay warm while we were outdoors on a chilly night. I received a lot of compliments and would wear this beauty again!

This dress is stunning!!! S0 much so that I am on the hunt to purchase it! it's a classic cut in a classic color. everything from the flattering neckline, to the partial sleeve, and let's not forget that WOW slit up the side. PERFECTION! The material is lovely, holds you in because of thickness, but I'd still say good for year-round wear. I wore it to an august wedding. I did wear thin spanx with the dress, but only because the backup sz14 was loose everywhere but the hip, and I needed to make the 12 work. it was comfortable, and i got compliments on how beautiful and sexy i looked in this dress!!!

links_reviews_title: Worn to a work cocktail party.
links_reviews_text: The fit is very flattering. I normally wear a four, but the six fit better to be more comfortable for a longer party. It's made from sturdy material, but seems to run a bit small.
Fit like a glove and so well made. So many compliments. I felt like the bell of the ball.

This dress is very form fitting. This is tight around the waist, however there is some stretch to the fabric. The split is kind of high how it works in a classy yet sexy kind of way. This dress should be worn with a strapless bra.
Material was great, fit was a dream. Slit was higher than expected but didn't budge much is wasn't too big of a deal.

Ladies with boobs, beware! I am 5 4", 155 and typically a size 8. My boobs are 36DD and if you too have a bigger chest, this will not fit you. Based on the reviews, I sized up to a 10 thinking that would be fine and it fit everywhere perfectly except I couldn't get it zipped at the very top/back because of my chest. I love this dress, the quality is amazing, and it was so flattering. Just be warned if you aren't perfectly proportioned and have a larger chest smaller body, you may have problems.
Felt like i was in a sausage casing. Might be sexy on, but no fun to sit or dance in! Would size up if i were you.

links_reviews_title: Runs small so curvy girls size up!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'5" 154pds and I couldn't get this past my hips. I'm normally a size 8/10 and the 8 wouldn't fit. I don't think a 10 would fit either. The fabric is super thick so I'm sure I would've been hot. The dress is cute, but for me it was a no. If you're petite this would work for you.
The rubbing in this dress is very specific. I have a long torso so the fit was all wrong
I ordered my usual size, and couldn't even get this on, let alone zip it up! Make sure you size up.
It's a beautiful and classy dress. However neither size I ordered fit me. Disappointing. Order a size up from your regular size.

links_reviews_title: Pretty but runs small and very little stretch
links_reviews_text: I'm short but curvy.! This dress was really tight
it is thight up top so it dose not fall down when ou dance

I am super glad that I tried this one at the store and had an opportunity to exchange it before I left town for the wedding I was attending. It is super cute, but it runs super small and doesn't have much give in the fabric. I could not even pull it all the way on, much less zip it up. Bummer.

links_reviews_title: So close to being what I needed
links_reviews_text: I loved the material and construction of this dress, but due to my lack of boobs I couldn't make it work. If I wore it low as intended I had a huge gap between where the fabric sat and my chest; if I pulled it up to make it sit better the hips were all off and bubbled around my waist. Wish I could have pulled it off!
I ended up wearing another dress because I wasn't going to be able to dance in this dress. I would recommend for a cocktail party or event where you are just standing and looking awesome.
Fit a little tight - sleeves make it difficult to move, but I felt good in the dress and enjoyed the night! It's a flattering neckline and like the length.

My hips were too much for the 10. (hourglass, 140, 38D), and the 12 was falling off my shoulders. Fabulous style, unfortunately did not work for me. It was really tight in the rib area, but would have worn the 12 if could stay on shoulders.
I rented this as a backup for a wedding. I loved this dress- it was not wedding appropriate in my case. This would be a great party/NYE dress but the slit was too high for my event.
While fit is not super tight, you definitely need spanx! Send it back because of that

Decent fit. It was a little loose on top because I have a smaller upper body. Also, the waist part was baggy though the bottom half of the dress fit well (and is not as A-line as the pics on the model show). It might fit better on someone who is more of a ruler shape and has less of a difference between the hip and waist measurement.

links_reviews_title: I normally wear a 4, After reading the reviews I ordered a 6 and a backup size 8. neither fit
links_reviews_text: the fabric doesnt give at all , not made for curvy women

links_reviews_title: Perfect black dress. Feel confident and love the way you look!
links_reviews_text: Snug fit, definitely need some shapewear, but comfortable to dance the night away! Slit is a perfect height and can be dressed up in any way.
Didn't even wear a bra with it! It's such a beautiful color! Loved this dress
This dress was perfect for vacation or a slightly more dressed-up party. nothing too special about it, but glad I rented. Nice periwinkle color.
Fit a 5'10" size 0 girl perfectly! Absolutely lovely and gorgeous in every way. Classy, elegant, stylish.

I rented this dress for a casual dinner and loved how easy it was to wear. The fabric is cool and breezy, even in very warm weather. The length on the small regular was perfect with some lower heeled sandals. I could have easily dressed it up or down with different shoes or jewelry. Although the extra small fit, I opted to go with the small in case the rib cage area was too tight for sitting for long periods.

links_reviews_title: Color of the summer, conservative sexy with the open eyelets
links_reviews_text: Slightly tight around the rib cage

links_reviews_title: Slightly odd fit, but truly show-stopping!
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’5”, and I was 135 lbs. at the time of this rental. I ordered a small and a medium, and I ended up wearing the small. Although it was pretty tight in the rib cage, it was loose in the chest area, so the medium would have showed way too much, especially while dancing at a wedding. I got SO many compliments on the dress, and it was the perfect pastel purple for an Easter season wedding! I love how different it is; I would never buy something like this, as I don’t have very many places to wear it, but it was SUCH a fun rental. I highly recommend!
Open back makes it bra-less but I added a white tube top in order to wear a bra

links_reviews_title: Perfect Easter Dress! Tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: Great if you have a smaller chest and waist. More of a purple color than blue but it's pretty. Open back was also nice. Can't wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: Love!! My absolute favorite rent ever
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my engagement pictures and loved it so much that I'm planning to buy it. The back is open so I wore sticky boobs. I'm tall so the length was fine but I wore a flat sandal. The color is so pretty and the dress is really well made. Love love love!
The dress fit great. I will say it is a little tight around the rib cage. Showed just the right amount of cleavage. The color was amazing. I received A LOT of compliments of this dress
Pretty color. Back is open so I had to wear a tank under. A bit tight around ribs.

I loved this dress. You can appreciate it so much more in person. I received compliments all night!! I wore the small, the rib cage area is very tight but I went with the S rather than M due to how the bust fit. I kept accessories simple because this dress definitely makes a statement on its own!

links_reviews_title: THE PERFECT DRESS FOR WINE TASTING IN ITALY!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a wine tasting in Italy. It was the perfect dress for the occasion! I got so many compliments and felt like a million bucks! This dress is comfortable and elegant. It works for casual and formal events. The size and fit were great and the color was beautiful! The back is out so a stick on wouldn't be a bad idea if you don't want your strap peeking through.

I got so many compliments on this dress for my friend's bridal shower. It is super feminine (hello ruffles, lilac and eyelets!) and the fabric is super soft and comfy like a worn-in T-shirt. I dressed it down with flat sandals but you could just as easily dress it up with heels, jewelry and an updo for a formal affair. Big fan!

I loved the dress but it cuts off in a weird place on your back so I had to go a size up! Wore braless which was awesome but it showed every bit of sweat and every drink that people spilled on it on the dance floor! Also, it was WAY too long... I wore 5 inch heels and I was still stepping on it..

links_reviews_title: Can't say enough lovely things about this!
links_reviews_text: Literally perfect! Skimmed the floor in my flats.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for our blog photoshoot @SassandSweetness!
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect choice for a long day of shooting. I was completely comfortable but felt totally put together. The color is gorgeous!
Wore this dress to a garden party. Got so many compliments on this dress! Love the JetSet Diaries.

This dress was the perfect go to for a June wedding in Texas! The fabric is lightweight but gives enough to feel great. I cannot say enough about the color!!! This dress fits true to size. I wore a 3 inch heel and the length of this dress was perfect.
I'm usually between small and XS and the XS fit great! I love how different this dress is.

I have wide shoulders and arms, and this dress has little give, but fits without constricting. My chest is larger as well, which means strapless bras are not possible. With an open back, this would be difficult, except that the material is sturdy and thick enough to offer support without a bra. A simple bandeau works well with the fabric and doesn't look bad. The waist is really narrow, which is perfect for an hourglass figure, but may not work for thicker waists. The length is also perfect for me at 5'8", and it's beautiful and comfortable to wear all day.
