links_reviews_title: Dress was so cute! It was very long though even with heels ( I am 5"5 and it was dragging)
links_reviews_text: Dress was so cute! It was very long though even with heels ( I am 5"5 and it was dragging). Everyone loved the color and its perfect for spring but the length is a bit long.

I love this preppy dress by The Jetset Diaries! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going one size up for your back-up. This style is comfortable throughout the midsection and comfortable room at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are not really able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 5'9", the length hit floor length on me.This color is gorgeous, perfect for a daytime event in the spring time!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, tight around the ribs and long
links_reviews_text: This was a pretty dress that I got a lot of compliments on but it wasn't entirely comfortable. With heeled boots I was still tripping over it and then it was tight enough in the ribs to restrict breathing and dancing. Good value for the price though...back is open so consider a backless bra.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear, but really wanted to!
links_reviews_text: Love how different it is! Was going to wear to a bridal shower but the baby blue / periwinkle color threw me off. Also not sure what I would have done for a bra because of the open back. Either way, I loved it! Super comfy.
I'm 5'10 and could only wear a 1 inch heel. Beautiful color. Tough to wear a bra. A little tight in the arms, but really pretty. Wore it for Easter.
Can't wear a bra which was a huge negative for me. If you are small busted it will be great!

links_reviews_title: The details on this dress are very delicate and pretty. I wore it to a rehearsal dinner.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'4 with a sort of narrow ribcage and small bust so I chanced it with the XS and it worked (although it was tight at the waist). I needed a high heel to get the length to a good place. Note that the back flutters open so you cannot wear a regular bra.
Very pretty dress, but fits quite small through the rib cage. It's also been loved, it's fine- but not new looking!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but huge on me.
links_reviews_text: I actually ordered a small but received a size 8. The dress was a pretty color but was huge on me (i was literally tripping in it cause it was so long).

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. So comfortable. My husband loved it so much he wanted me to buy it!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable and elegant. It can be dressed up or down. I loved it. I will say I am 5'9 and it was just barely long enough to wear with flats. I couldn't used an extra inch! But it worked. Definitely not to be worn with heels if you're tall (unless you don't want it floor length).

I rented the 2R and 4R. The 2R fit in the waist and bust, but was too short. I rented this dress after reading the reviews saying it seemed to run longer (but it seems to be true to size). The 4R was long enough but being small chested the top was way too loose and looked frumpy. I would have worn it if the 2R was longer for sure! The details and color are so pretty and it is so different from a lot of other floor length dresses.
Pros: Pretty color and flowy material Cons: - long - right in bust for large chested
Comfortable, light and easy to wear. Casual but special.
I really wanted to like this dress. The bust is not flattering and separates your boobs. The back is open so you can't wear a push up bra.
It was way too formal for "everyday" wear + it didn't look great with my tiny boobies. I like to go braless and it just didn't look great.
Yuck. This runs really small in the waist. Fabric has no stretch/give. Super uncomfortable. My husband said it looked like a bad bridesmaid dress.

links_reviews_title: I wasn’t able to wear it to my event because it didn’t fit well.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were too tight, even with the medium and the bust was too loose even in the small. Otherwise the dress material quality is really nice, beautiful color and textures.
Quite long, plan to wear heels. Very pretty dress. Received many compliments.

I loved this dress. Absolutely beautiful and I had rented to wear for spring family photos but it did not fit me. I could not get the back zipped up, I'm a size 12 and ordered a large. If I ever lose some weight I would definitely rent this again, all the details were beautiful
Took a chance with the neck detail, but I thought it ended up super cute! I had to readjust it throughout the night, so that was the only annoyance, but otherwise, it was very flattering

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove and stunning
links_reviews_text: Snug everywhere and heavy material holds shape and remains wrinkle free.

links_reviews_title: I felt amazing in this dress. So many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove throughout, tiny bit large in the neck area but only bc my chest is small!! Amazing dress!!!

links_reviews_title: Hugs curve in all the right places
links_reviews_text: Fits true size, stretchable and holds curves in all the right places. Comfortable to wear.

links_reviews_title: Symphony ready in this black dress!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a symphony. Overall I loved the dress. I gave it a 4 because I could not get the tie to come anywhere close to looking like the picture. So I ended up pinning it and using fashion tape. The bottom was a little looser on me than I would have liked but I'm not super curvy. It was comfortable and I did get lots of compliments!
This dress fit great but just a tad snug around the waist. If you have hips and a butt, I would go up a size for the comfort.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Very form-fitting. Wore to an awards party and it was a hit.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size.
Flattering, good quality fabric, relatively comfortable
Was my back up dress but my first choice when it arrived . Loved it

links_reviews_title: Sadly, this dress arrived late and I was not able to wear it to my event. However, it is gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: I am hoping to find a reason to wear this dress because it is gorgeous. The fit is flattering, sexy and form fitting without being overly revealing. It is slightly low cut but that may be because I was between sizes and sized up. I'm going to keep it for awhile in the hopes of finding something to wear it for or I will rent it again!

I wore this to a black tie wedding and felt fabulous. I uploaded the least flattering photo to show that the fit wasn't *quite* right and would sometimes give me a ouch at my belly but I still wore it even though I had other options. Despite the fit issues I still felt great and had a great time in the dress. You could only tell from certain angles so overall it was still super fun and photographed well/flattering. I def stood out in the red! And no bra needed which is nice
#ballgown

links_reviews_title: Got many compliments, felt like "pretty woman"
links_reviews_text: I have big butt and small boobs. So was little tight in my hips and little large in my bust. But no one could notice ...
This dress was everything. It fit perfectly. I didn't have to wear a bra. I wore it to a gala and received a lot of compliments. It will make you feel like Jessica Rabbit!

Loved this dress so much. It was so out of my comfort zone I was afraid I couldn't pull it off. But it fit great, was elegant and sexy and with enough stretch to dance all night. The material is not forgiving though, any lumps you'd want to hide could show right through this dress. Couldn't wear a bra or underwear bc you could see the line. I'm fairy petite so it was still enough support that I didn't feel uncomfortable.

I wore this dress for a New Years event. So many compliments and very flattering. It runs very small. I'm 5'4 128lbs, 34D. I ordered a small with a back up size medium and the medium barely fit!!! Awesome dress though!
This dress oozes sensuality as it hugs every curve perfectly and smooths your silhouette. I was able to achieve such a sexy, classic look for this wedding. Would definitely recommend.
Good for pear shape! Expected bottom to be tight but fit perfectly. Too was tighter than expected.

Loved this gown! I wore it to a gala and it was beautiful. It was TIGHT in the chest and I could have sized up - just a warning that this runs small. I wore a the SR and am a size 2 on average. Material is thick and very supportive!
This dress is gorgeous, but the small definitely fit like a glove! My only issue was that it was a little loose up top. The length was perfect with heels!

links_reviews_title: Statement dress for a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress however, I wish I sized up to the medium as the small was VERY tight.
Only flaw was my bra kept showing, but it could be because I have no chest. Lol other than that it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Definitely one of my favorite dresses thus far! Elegant with a little edge & the fit was perfect!
links_reviews_text: The fit was excellent! However, be sure to try out 2 sizes as there’s no stretch to this dress & little room for any bulky undergarments.

links_reviews_title: Last minute decision that I was beyond impressed with. It was sexy yet appropriate for a wedding❤️
links_reviews_text: I usually wear size 4 but they didn't have it so I just orded size 2 which I was glad I did because it perfectly fit

links_reviews_title: Chic, classic, and flattering dress for a red carpet!
links_reviews_text: #glamorous evening gown!
Super forgiving fabric and PERFECT length for 5'4".
Fits perfectly

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable! Got a ton of compliments.
links_reviews_text: perfect fit, esp for pear shaped bodies. I got a small and the length was perfect since I don't like when dresses stop at the ankle for me since I have a pear shaped body.
The strap was a little long for my short torso. I couldn't get the dress zipped with my strapless bra on so I went without and was fine. Good length and comfortable.

This was a backup dress I didn't end up wearing because I wanted something a little more fun for the event I went to. I'm a slim 6, and the dress fit like a glove! The cut is grabby around stomach/waist, and wouldn't hide anything. The slit is fun, but the cut of the top is pretty conservative. I tried it on without a bra, and wouldn't have worn one if I did wear the dress. Length was good for my hight with heels.

Very comfortable. I did size up but probably would have been okay with a medium - I was worried about how tight it would be if I got a medium. So since it had some extra room I did have to tape the top for the material to stay done. But other than that it was perfect. Not too tight. Comfortable to dance in. Skit wasn't too high. I'm 5'2 and did have to wear heels in order for it to not touch the ground.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress! People were saying I looked like Jessica Rabbit.
links_reviews_text: This dress made me feel sexy! It was a thick fabric and hugged in all the right places.

links_reviews_title: Great look but get some safety pins!
links_reviews_text: No stretch at all so make sure it fits as soon as it arrives, and I needed a half dozen safety pins to secure it to my bra and make sure the neckline folded/draped the right way. But very flattering dress and got tons of compliments!

I really liked the slim look of this and the one shoulder but overall it just didn't work up top. The dress wouldn't lay flat and it seemed to be a tad small for me. Don't recommend for busty ladies but did like the length for those tall ladies
Loved the color and style. Didn't end up wearing it but it was a top 2 option! It fit perfectly.

loved the red! color was vibrant and made me feel confident all night! Also had a very good experience renting from RTR.. this is my replacement dress that was overnighted to me for FREE! because my original rental was too big.
Perfect fit and length. I'm usually a size 2 or 4 and am 5'6". It was the ideal dress for the occasion.

links_reviews_title: I loved the shade of red!
links_reviews_text: It was a little big in the waist but I loved the length and the slit on the side!

links_reviews_title: One of a Kind Holiday Picture Dress
links_reviews_text: I felt very regal and amazing in this dress. It was super form fitting and had a quirky detail at the sleeve. I rented for our annual family photo. I wore a Small which runs small. I could barely fit in it. I did get a backup in Medium but Medium was loose at the bust and hips.

links_reviews_title: Great Red Dress For Holiday Party
links_reviews_text: A little snug around the chest but it worked out great. Lots of compliments!
The dress looked great. It was nice quality fabric and fit great. Definitely stood out in the crowd.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: I received a ton of compliments on this dress, it was comfortable and unique!

links_reviews_title: I ordered on 11/27, it arrived on 11/29 & my event was on 12/1. I love how fast the turn around is!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I got so many compliments all night. The dress fit well everywhere except the bust, it was a little large. I usually wear a 36B and this was the Medium Regular dress. I used a strapless bra to help fill in the extra space. No one else could tell it was big, I just didn't feel as secure as I would have liked. I loved that it was long busy didn't drag the floor so I wasn't stepping on it, the slit was nice and I liked it on the side as opposed to the front. Overall, it was a great dress!

links_reviews_title: We attended a work Christmas party.
links_reviews_text: I am in-between a size 8 and 10 and the LR size worked very well! The fabric doesn't have a lot of give but still fit nicely even with a larger bust. The shade of red was very striking! I would wear this again.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Favorite dress. Ended up buying it
links_reviews_text: Fit great, except for the length. I ended up pinning it.

links_reviews_title: Super fashionable without breaking the bank!
links_reviews_text: The dress was very flattering. I got so many compliments! I was worried that it wouldn't fit as I am petite but it fit like a GLOVE.

This dress was perfect for a Black Love Gala that my boyfriend and I attended. Its only drawback is that the shoulder strap tends to pull the top down and reveal the inner lining. I put Hollywood tape on it, but after dancing the night away it didn't help much.
I rented this for a black tie work event and felt like the prettiest girl in the room. The sleeves are a little confusing but other than that the dress was a dream. I've never felt so glam!
It fit perfect, the color was so pretty and the cut got lots of compliments. Was really happy with it!

This dress runs sooooo small! The first time I rented it I got it in a 16 after reading reviews. For reference I'm a 14. The 16 wouldn't zip up, so I rented again and size to an 18 and BARELY fit into it. Definitely size up two or three sizes. To be honest, I don't think it's even worth the rental having to risk fit problems.
I usually wear a size 6, but the reviews said to size up and the 8 fit perfectly. I felt very comfortable and glamorous!

I loved this dress when I saw it on RTR! I originally ordered a 10 and 12 as my backup size only to realize how small the dress runs! Thankfully RTR is quick with their replacement sizes. I was able to rent the 14 & 16! The 16 was the one I decided to wear. Very comfortable and everyone loved it!

This dress is absolutely gorgeous, but it runs small. I'm a 36D/36DD and couldn't get the dress to zip all the way in the back although the front was a little large. Regardless I made it work for what I needed but highly recommend getting 2 sizes just to be sure.

I wanted to wear this for a Gala Dinner, but ended up going to the local RTR store and exchanged it to another dress, because it did not fit (I have a wide back but usually size 12 and 14). My replacement also arrived and I tried on size 16 and it still did not fit, so if you have a a wide back, I do not recommend to order it, unless you go like 2 or 3 sizes up. It looked pretty though, I liked the fabric as well as how it flows.

Loved that I was able to get 2 sizes. I had to wear my backup order. The delivery was awesome. I didn't realize it was a garment bag. Super cool! Dress was a little snug when I first put it on but was better as I wore it.

I'm 5'1 and the dress was long but with 5 3/4 in heels with a 2 in platform it fit! The straps were also long with with s little dress tape it was an easy fix. I got tons of compliments on the dress and loved wearing it.
It's a beautiful dress, simple but chic. I used it for a photo shoot

links_reviews_title: Blush isn't usually my color of choice but this dress almost changed my mind!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a styled engagement shoot and it was great! The 2 was a snug fit, although I often fit into the 0-2 size so keep that in mind and go up if you are somewhere in between. The bodice is very form fitting and structured which I liked as I am bustier. I found that the petite size was exactly the same fit as the regular size but just a bit shorter which was perfect for me.
I didn't end up wearing this dress, but it was a very close second! Fit well and was very flattering.
It’s a pretty dress but it really looks like a bridesmaid dress. This was a backup and i didn’t wear it.
Straps fall and way too long. Plus runs very small.

links_reviews_title: I wore this as a bridesmaid in a friends wedding. So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: We had a heat advisory the day of the wedding and shockingly for a long dress, this was breezy and cool (considering the circumstance). The top was more baggy with excess fabric than I would have liked but as a first time user of RTR, I was impressed by the services and the fit of this gown.

links_reviews_title: A gala with friends which included hats!
links_reviews_text: Pretty dress that flowed. Tight torso with no give so be mindful of that. The 8L was snug with no room to spare and I'm a 36C. The length was perfect for my 5'9 height along with 2" heels. Would highly recommend!

Beautiful dress but definitely size up if u have a larger chest. The dress definitely runs small. I was concerned that it wouldn’t fit across the chest after reading a previous review but thought I would still give it a try after I called and was told that the 2R wasn’t available...

links_reviews_title: Almost perfect, but far too long
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 0P but was sent a 0, so I couldn't wear the dress for my event. I think a 0P might've been perfect. The pink fabric was almost the right length if I wore my highest heels, but for some reason the sheer chiffon was an extra 3-4 inches longer so it was still impossible to walk (5'2", 4 inch heels). The fabric itself is pretty enough, though a little rough, and the shape of the dress is pretty but a little tight. Overall it's a pretty dress for the price, but I wouldn't recommend if you're short.

I’m glad this was my backup dress. The straps on the top half are odd and I was not sure how to wear them. I still had room in the bust so it will fit larger sizes. The bottom half is the real issue. It is a thin layer of fabric and then the tulle skirt over it. It is completely unlined which makes it see through even with the right undergarments.
Pretty and fit well other than length... I'm only 5'0" so even my highest heels wouldn't have been high enough.

I received this dress as a back up since my original dress ended up not being available. This dress looks like a bridesmaid dress.. so if that's what you're going for it's probably perfect! Just not what I was looking for.

Was very small, I normally wear a 12 and this 16 was almost too tight to zip up.I do have a large bust and athletic build. I am 5'7" and wore this dress with 3 inch heels but the gown did touch down past my ankle. I would not recommend the long for someone of my height. I tried the long and it was dragging on the floor. Also not for girls who have a large bust and shy about showing them! I was a little self conscious about that but everyone said it looked great.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear... too small in chest.
links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress. But not the right fit for me in the chest - tight in bust but straps were a little loose.
It was very small for size so it didn't fit and i couldn't wear it.
I am an athlete with broader shoulders, and this zipper wasn't even close to closing. It is a beautiful dress, but it was a hard no for me. If you have an athletic body consider 1-2 sizes up.

links_reviews_title: Pretty colors, flowy bottom but tight chest

links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress! Love the colors and very flowy! I am 5 months pregnant- 5'7, 160 lbs. The dress was a little long but I wore 5 inch heels and that helped. There is a band under the boobs that was a little snug And dug into the top of my belly. Most likely won't have that issue not pregnant! Zipper did get stuck in the back when going over the band. But overall happy!

I normally wear a 0 in bcbg and this was tight around my rib cage (it doesn't stretch). So much that I don't have to worry about it slipping down. There is more room in the chest area so I will wear a strapless bra to fill it in. Note I'm tall and dress touches floor. It's beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, I loved the pattern and color combination and received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: There is a ribbon around the waist that makes the dress run really small and hard to zip up. Definitely, size up if you consider getting this dress. Additionally, I'm relatively short so I had to wear my highest heels so the dress wouldn't drag.
This dress is perfect. Love the print, and the belted waistline nips in so it doesn't go too maternity looking like you see with some maxi dresses. Will definitely rent again.

This was actually a replacement dress for me and I'm so glad I chose it! It was perfect! The fit is true to size, it is a tad long for shorter people but would be perfect with wedges. The colors and print were everything! I'm a huge fan!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a spring wedding!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful! Received so many compliments on this dress. The waist ribbon was a little tight (I do have a large rib cage) but the dress stayed up very well for being strapless. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a Hawaiian photo session! It even matched my tattoos perfectly.
links_reviews_text: This dress is not for shorties! At 5’3 a ton of this dress was dragging on the ground. But that ended up being okay for photos. It looks nice actually with me holding it up and most of the pictures aren’t full length anyway. This dress is super flattering and gorgeous. The zipper does get stuck going over the ribbon. We were afraid we were going to break it, but it does need a lot of force to get over the seam there. All in all, I love this dress and want to buy it for myself!

links_reviews_title: Would rent again but in a different size!
links_reviews_text: This was actually my backup dress I got for a wedding. After reading other reviews I sized up and went with a 6 but unfortunately this was too big, mostly in the chest area (I'm 5'5", 125lbs, and a 32D). Also, it was really hard to zip where the band is right below the bust! It was a comfortable dress and I think in the right size would be adorable for a wedding. I didn't end up wearing it this time though.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, accurate as described in reviews, bust was a bit large
links_reviews_text: Overall, the dress was exactly as described and fit well. The regular was long, so definitely wear heels. The waist fit well, but the bust was a bit big - I'm not sure if the dress was designed this way or it had been stretched out from previous wears; usually a 4R is well fitted to an A-cup, so that was frustrating. I recommend if you have a smaller chest, use tape. Liked the design and the dress was lightweight, which was great for a summer wedding.

I'm normally a size 4-6 but I'm glad I read the reviews. Other girls said to size up and they were right! The 6 was just a little too snug and the 8 fit just right. I'm 5'6'' and it was long enough to wear with 2 inch heals. When I changed to flats I had to hold up the dress when I walked, but I didn't mind.

I had rented this dress about 2 months ago in a 4 (I am usually a 2 or a 4 so when I saw the reviews I rented a 4), and I couldn't zip it up past the ribbon because that part is SO tight. I rented it again (without a backup dress sadly) in a 6 thinking it would be perfect and the SAME thing happened. Everything else about it fits and the tip was even too big on the 6 because I am so small chested. I had no choice but to wear the dress because I didn't bring a backup with me and had to attend a bridal shower so I wore it without it being zipped all the way with a sweater. Didn't love it with the sweater but had no other choice. Beware of this dress and size WAY up

I received so many compliments with this beauty! It's a perfect dress for a summer wedding/occasion. It's light weight and flows with the perfect amount of color. The band around the waist is very snug so size up! I lost a considerable amount of weight and am usually a 6 maybe 8 in dresses, so although I sized up the bust area remained very roomy and wasn't fit. I wore a strapless bra to help keep me in place. I was so sad to return it because it was that beautiful :). Can't wait to rent again!

Dress was slightly small, and mine had a defective zipper... though I was able to get it to work the day I needed it! Dress has very little give, so I would order a size up. But I received so many compliments on the dress!

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable dress for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: Overall, I loved this dress. I typically wear a 4 but the ribbon and boning in the bodice were tight so had to size up to a 6. However, I was very comfortable in the dress and it had the added bonus of not needing to wear a bra. I got a lot of compliments and was sad to have to return this dress!
Very fun and comfortable dress. Loved the print and I got a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to Bourbon & Bowties Charity Event! Loved the beautiful print!
links_reviews_text: Runs a little small! I am typically a 4 or 6, but this was tight in the band under the chest, especially after eating and drinking, but I was worried the 8 would be too big after wearing for a few hours. No bra needed because fit was tight! Bottom half was nice and flowy! Would definitely rent this one again... lots of attention for beautiful pattern and flattering fit!

links_reviews_title: Very fun night at a friend's wedding; dress was perfect for the summer heat and dancing.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable dress! It is a bit snug at the waist but very breathable and lightweight. True to size, I'm usually between a 6 and an 8, but decided to go with the 8 to have more breathing room and space in the bust to wear a strapless bra. Loved the colors and fit! Perfect for a summer wedding!
I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner for a destination wedding and it was perfect for a summer evening event. The band around the waist was tight but it kept the dress in place well.

links_reviews_title: Got a lot of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! I wore it for my 40th birthday and got a ton of compliments. The only issue I had was with the zipper...getting over the ribbon. It was hard to get up and down. Needed a lot of help from my husband. Also, I was trying to wear the dress too high, and it felt tight in my ribs. Once I moved it down a little, it fit much better. I wore the size 6, but also fit in the size 4, but not quite and comfortably. Highly recommend renting this dress! Super cute and comfy!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for the movie premier
links_reviews_text: It fit great! Love that it was strapless and it did no feel like it was falling down all night! It was a little hard to zip at first, but not a big deal! Got lots of complements on it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, light weight, great for any occasion
links_reviews_text: Long enough to wear flats with without dragging on the floor. Top has some ribbing on the sides which made the top a little snug. I am normally a 4-6 but went with the 6 because of the top.

links_reviews_title: Flattering dress, but size up for a back up!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress, and received many compliments. The colors are true to what you see online. I wore the regular length, with about 3 inch heels, so at 5'3" it still ran a bit long. I would definitely size up for a back up dress; I am 4 months pregnant, and though you can't see my bump too well in this dress (which was fine for me as we still had a few people left to tell), the dress was definitely tight around my widening body! I almost didn't wear this (8R) because of how tight the dress felt, but I'm glad I did. It did stretch a bit as the night went on, but just beware that your rib cage will be a bit restricted from this style.
Fit was great, didn't have to wear a bra. Great material. True to size. Would definitely rent again.

This dress was great for Florida. The lining is above the knee underneath so it was super light and cool. But the belted area can get tight. The 6 fit like a glove but if your not sure def go up a size. Would rent this again in a heart beat

links_reviews_title: Classy, daytime or evening dress that doesn't disappoint!
links_reviews_text: I was very happy with this dress! Beautiful color, and tailored fit. I needed my 4" heels for this dress as it is very long! Also, you need to be accurate with measuremenys as it is fitted in the top half. :)

Loved this. Kinda tight where the ribbon hits but helped keep it up for the smaller chested ladies. I usually wear a 4 or 6 and the 6 was perfect. Long dress and I'm tall- must wear heels or you'll be stepping all over it.

links_reviews_title: Had the perfect night celebrating my graduation from anesthesia school with my friends and family!
links_reviews_text: This dress was the perfect mix of elegance and simplicity for my event. I wanted a sleek, strapless look, and this dress was it for me! It was slightly tight in the bust- I ended up wearing the size 8, which was a little big otherwise. The 6 would have been a perfect fit if the bust was a little bigger. Nevertheless, I loved this dress and was sad to send it back!
Had the option to use the straps. Much better for support and overall fit. Zipper was a bit hard to pull up but not due to fit. Great length. I am 5'5 and wore 3 inch heels

I wore this dress for my engagement pictures,and I really wish I had a formal event to wear it to after the pictures were done! This dress was very comfortable! I'm glad I got both the 6&8,although I thought for sure the 6 wouldn't fit,it did! I'm smaller up top so I didn't have trouble zipping it up. I could see where bigger busted women may have trouble zipping up over the ribbon. Overall the dress felt great!

I got so many compliments on this dress. It was perfectly formal enough but not too overdone for a rustic barn reception and outdoor ceremony. The double layered skirt with the bottom layer stopping above the knee helped with circulation and keeping cool in the southern humidity but didn't look any different than if the layers had both fallen to the floor. Highly recommend. I would purchase this dress I loved wearing it so much.

I rented this for an afternoon wedding. It was light and flowy and I received lots of compliments. The 2R was a little snug in the chest, but I didn't have to wear a bra. It was also super long. In a short or petite length it would have been perfect for me.

I wore this to a rehearsal dinner for my best friends wedding. I'm 5'2" so it was just barely too long. To fix that I ended up tucking it into its own waistband a little to shorten it up so I could walk. Overall I got lots of compliments and I would rent again

Beautiful, lightweight chiffon maxi. Definitely really snug on ribcage but true to size. No bra needed and probably looks best with fuller B or C due to built in cups. Hit floor perfectly with 3 inch wedges but had to hold dress up when they came off for dancing. Really pretty, lots of compliments!

I have never received a RTR dress with tags still on! How exciting. I love everything about this dress. I'm 5'6 and the reg was a little long. The zipper is hard to get up over the ribbion. Depending on your rib cage width you may need to go up a size. It was tight and made it hard to sit. They only had a 10 in stock so I can't compare to a 12. I wear medium shirts and narrow but I could of used a little more room.

This dress runs small in the natural waist because of the band just below the chest and boning that digs in once you (or more like if you) get it zipped. It's also very long! I'm a little over 5'8" and this dress had at least an inch dragging on the ground. You could probably tape a temporary hem because of the material. This dress would be perfect for someone tall with size C-D cups (or wear a padded strapless), very small waist and a small backside (the inner liner rode up a lot but I have a big butt).

Super Chic! Extremely comfortable with room for just about any cup size. Easily worn for picnic, shopping with the girls or a Caribbean vacation. The dress runs large in the bust area so I would recommend sizing down for this number. Love the print!

Another gorgeous maxi from BCBG! The colors and pattern of this dress are absolutely stunning, and you are bound to get a lot of compliments with this style. This is a very fitted dress at the waist and bust, however, so we recommend going up a size for your backup style. In addition, because there is a built in bodice for this top and it is a smaller fit, this look would work best for women with an A to C cup, as it may be uncomfortable for women with larger busts to wear. Try pairing this dress with a statement necklace and wedges for a fun, summery look!

I really loved this dress and got lots of compliments on it! It was too long for me, but it was very comfortable. The dress was pretty tight around the torso where the ribbon goes around below the bust. If it weren't so tight there I probably could have gone down a size.
Very cute but felt a little tight/hard to zip up
Love this dress!! Might buy it.. the fit is amazing and it's so flattering. Only thing is that I should have had boob tape bc I could have easily had a nip slip.

I love so much about this dress but with the shape of the top- you can't really sit down or else your boobs literally just fall out, I have a pretty small chest too. So just make sure to use some double sided tape! :)
Comfortable because it was flowy but it was pretty low cut so had to use double sided tape
Cute girl next door vibe with a serious dash of sex kitten.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Need fashion tape for sitting down!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Wore it on vacation in Spain. Fun yellow color and shape. I did not wear a bra with it. Only downside was that I did not bring fashion tape. When I sat down to dinner, I fussed with it most of the time to make sure I wasn't exposed. If I owned it I would have it tailored a little tighter in the chest as it was a little big on me.

LOVED this dress but it definitely runs a little snug around the rib cage. I wore a size medium and it fit, but barely had any room to spare BUT I am also small chested so the large would have been way too much room in the chest. It is fun and easy to dress up and down as I wore it with sneakers, sandals, heels, and barefoot on the beach. So many options. Be aware the dress is yellow and beige, not yellow and white. It is still very pretty but it appears more white in photos that it does in person.

This was a show stopper! Definitely needed to tape the chest area. It was fine standing up but sitting down would have been boobs everywhere!! I was concerned about wearing yellow with my coloring. It has a tinge if green so it looked great! Perfect for my cruise
Loved this dress it was my favorite of the trip! Wore it in Tulum to dinner and drinks. Very feminine and pretty.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a date, for a wedding after party, and for a Hawaiian luau!
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress! Although I ran into an issue with top being a bit large - 1) For a sexy deep V look, I used double sided tape, which half worked - looked good while I was standing, looked weird and bunchy when I was sitting; 2) I ended up wearing a cropped top underneath which made me more comfortable, and it worked. It hit above my ankles given my 5'4" frame, and I loved the skirt's "swooshiness" when I moved. I would definitely rent again for a fun, flirty and comfortable piece!
Absolutely love this dress! The fit is really comfy and easy to wear. Just make sure you have Fashion tape since it's a deep v neckline
This was a cute lightweight dress. Not too fancy. The bust was too big though hence the "runs large" I wore a bikini underneath so my bust wouldn't pop out!
Wore a L (I'm usually small) to fit my 37 week bump! Was too big in the chest however so had to pin the straps to shorten them. I got lots of compliments
I loved wearing this dress. The low cut gave it sex appeal while staying cute and comfortable. I did have to use tape to keep my breasts in. 34B and if I were any larger bust I'd size up.

This Ali Ruffled Hem Dress by Line + Dot is super cute for a summer day. This dress has cotton material, so its light for a summer day! This dress was true to size on my body type and I'm 5'3 and weigh 110 pounds. There is enough room in the hips. The chest part of this dress is tricky, you are liable to have a nip slip if you do not use fashion tape.
Dress was super cute and fun to wear! Straps were a little big so I recommend having some fashion tape since it's impossible to wear a bra with this one.

links_reviews_title: Could not wear, as it didn't fit my chest area.
links_reviews_text: Very low cut and not enough material to cover chest.

I rented this for a family reunion and ended up returning without wearing because it was wayyyyyy too revealing! I am on the smaller side in the chest and it still gave me major sideboob, even with fashion tape!

I wore this with a white bralette underneath (to avoid having to tape). Material was a little too wrinkly for my taste, but worked for summer. Also a bit tight in the bust. If you are busty, maybe go up a size.
It is a really pretty dress but the fit at the bust did not work. The large was too large and the medium fit to tight near the armpit area.

links_reviews_title: Should have gone up a size
links_reviews_text: Was a great summer dress, would likely have been more flattering had I gone up a size
Very tight across the bust. Fun day dress, but not for full busted women

links_reviews_title: Great summer dress but large on top
links_reviews_text: Loved how light and airy the dress was. Overall fit was great except for the top. If the straps were a bit shorter then it would have been perfect. Had to use a lot of top so I was coming out.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty but small in high waist
links_reviews_text: I got this dress for a summer party. The color were a nice muted yellow and off white, and the length was really pretty and made the dress very easy going. I was so sad when it didn't fit right on my waist were the zipper ends. But the chest and everything else fit great, so size up if you have an average to large size chest.

links_reviews_title: Too much side boob, wouldn't zip
links_reviews_text: Had to return without wearing

links_reviews_title: This is a great dress, if your torso is long enough to keep the straps up.
links_reviews_text: I used tape to keep the straps up and the nips in, but it was still a bit large around the bust. Maybe for someone with a larger chest it would work, but I think it would be a lot of cleavage, depending upon your taste.

links_reviews_title: Such a beautiful and fun dress!
links_reviews_text: I loved the deep plunge and the v back. Shows lots of skin so works for me with a smaller bust. So comfortable !
Although I didn't wear it, the dress looked like a perfect weekend summer dress. Lightweights and cool.

links_reviews_title: I wore this out to a fun dinner with friends. It's adorable I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: This is extremely low cut, I'm an A cup so I was comfortable, but I could see this being a challenging style for anyone with a larger chest!

I thought this was yellow and white, it's not. The clot is yellow and sort of tannish. The dress is very revealing. Cute, but I would have to wear sticky tape and stand up very straight the entire time wearing this.
Cute dress but was huge on my small boobs. Couldn't wear it.
This would be great but it's oddly sized for such a breasty dress. It also hits an awkward length.
couldn't even zipped the small. I wear 2/4 normally. And my boobs aren't even that big and we're spilling out the sides. Terrible dress

Very deep V in the front, but the straps were secure enough that I didn't feel like I was at any risk of showing "too much" of my chest. No side boob but was definitely made to worn braless. Fun and easy dress to wear anywhere.
Tight in the waist and loose in the bust. Makes for some unfortunate nip slips if you're not careful!

This dress just had an awkward unflattering fit. Nothing seemed to sit where it should, and it wasn't as low cut on me as the pics, which wasn't a bad thing, but it didn't really line up to my boobs or waist. Just weird all around. Pretty color though!

This dress is super cute, but I did not wear. The fit was way off. It fit right around my rib cage, but the top was too loose. I'm a B so I think maybe someone with a larger chest would fit better? Not sure.

links_reviews_title: Wore for just a day of hanging out enjoying the lovely weather
links_reviews_text: Fit was pretty good! Definitely use some breast tape as this dress is very revealing.

I really liked this dress, but didn't wear it because even with a B-cup, it was too revealing. Unless you want to be provocative, I wouldn't rent if you are bigger than a small B. The picture of the model in it is definitely true to how it's cut. I would have worn it if I was going on a beach vacation, but it wasn't appropriate for the occasion I rented for. Also, the fabric was unexpected. It was a lined cotton with no stretch. Still, very cute and will look great on someone. I would say it's ideal for someone taller (it's long) with a small bust. Runs TTS and zips up the side.
Cute dress but couldn't zip it up around my rib cage.

links_reviews_title: Very sparkly in person, forgiving fit
links_reviews_text: Great dress! Rented for a charity event. I wore a medium which is usually my size but I probably could've rocked a small (but I almost never get a small as my backup size). Very sparkly in person. Sleeves were a little short but I'm wondering if that's the intended length based on where it hits of model in the pics? Not sure. Also, peep my friend wearing another great RTR piece (tiered multi-color skirt).
Love this wrap dress!! So many complements!! Awesome dress, TTS.

I was so skeptical about renting a wrap dress. I thought it would look droopy and worn out but it was fresh and comfortable like brand new. Very sparkly and I got so many compliments. Wonderful dress!
This was a last minute find because I ordered the wrong dresses for a black party but I'm so glad I did because I would not have picked this dress online.
Wore this for my boyfriends holiday party and felt like such a standout! The dress is sooo much fun and has a 60s vibe to it that I just loved! Would definitely rent again! It fit really well!

I loved this dress! I wore it to a family holiday party, a dinner date with my boyfriend and kept it around for awhile just in case. Dress was very stretchy and fit great. I'm sometimes between a small and medium, and medium fit great, although I think I could have worn the small too and it would have been just fine. The wrap style allowed me to pull the dress as tight as I needed it. The inside of the dress is soft, so even though the metallic was scratchy I was comfortable. I kinda wish that the ruffles were double sided though, I didn't like how they flipped up and was black on the other side. Overall, great dress!

I rented this through update for a holiday party but ended up wearing something else. Luckily I had it on hand for Christmas Day since I wanted to wear something pretty and then next thing I know I got engaged in this dress! It photographs so well and is super comfy to wear. It can be tied in the back or the front and is super stretchy and not itchy. One thing to note is it was a lot longer on me than the model but it was still perfect and I’m so glad it’s what I had on for my special day!

links_reviews_title: I felt dazzling in this sparkly dress!
links_reviews_text: Love the fit and style. Looks better on than I thought.

I've taken an awful photo that doesn't do either the dress or me justice. Ruffles made me feel like a glamorous cuttlefish. Which was awesome. Not scratchy. Def low cut so wore a cami underneath for work but would happily go without for a date.

I love this feminine by Free people! Running a little big with some stretch, I recommend wearing a size down for your primary size. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works best for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this wrap dress. The length hits just below the knee. This is the perfect holiday dress1

Hosted a party at my house in this dress and felt like a million bucks! The material is a shiny blue and silver (not as dark as it looks on the model), but it is super festive for the holidays, comfortable and so flattering. Got loads of compliments. Am debating buying as a new holiday favorite!

links_reviews_title: Didn’t wear was to low cut for me. Beautiful dress though.
links_reviews_text: Love the feel. And style gives you lots of curves 😃
Super comfortable and flattering and perfect shimmer for a holiday party. The chest is quite open so I had to pin it so I wasn't worrying about it all night.

links_reviews_title: Not at all what I would expect from Free People!
links_reviews_text: Definitely fits true to size which is unusual for FP...don't go smaller! It is very sparkly and mainly blue sparkles so prepare yourself. Great dress for any fancy cocktail party. Comfortable and warm!

links_reviews_title: Christmas work party- perfect blend of fun but professional.
links_reviews_text: This dress is insanely flattering. I'm 5'7" and its a true midi dress. I wore with point toe black pumps. Received so many compliments. It was perfect for a Christmas party since its slightly shimmery but oh so classy!
The dress is glittery which didn't quite work for my workplace. It would be great for a cocktail/date night though.

links_reviews_title: So sparkly...perfect for a holiday party!
links_reviews_text: Great fit!
Not terribly flattering for an hourglass figure

links_reviews_title: Dress was too big. Didn't wear
links_reviews_text: Dress too big. didn't wear
This dress looked great but the material was extremely uncomfortable. I was unable to wear the dress and do not recommend it.

links_reviews_title: I didn't realize it was sparkles
links_reviews_text: didn't fit in the bust

links_reviews_title: Great length and enough sparkle for the Holidays.
links_reviews_text: Received so many compliments. The front was a bit too revealing for me, but my friends said it looked AMAZING. I wore it to a Xmas party and it was a hit!
This dress is very flattering, and long enough on me (5'9" - it hit mid-calf) that I wouldn't be too cold without tights

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress.
links_reviews_text: Fits great. Husband didn't like it.

links_reviews_title: I love the color of this dress. It shined and sparkled.
links_reviews_text: The best thing about this dress was the material. It stretched in all the right places. I am also tall so the length was perfect. It was a great dress to wear for a holiday party networking event. I received so many compliments.
comfortable and elegant

This is a beautiful, festive dress, but it didn't work for me. It was too low cut for my occasion and I didn't like the look with a cami underneath. The dark grayish blue fabric has more metallic and glitter in it than I took from the picture. I am in between 8-10 with and went with the L, which had enough room for this true wrap to fit around my curves.

links_reviews_title: The picture does not show how incredibly sparkly it is.
links_reviews_text: Cute/great cut, but I couldn't wear it to work. It is extremely sparkly... would be great for a holiday party though.

links_reviews_title: It is actually silver and blue sparkles, and I thought it was gray, so I didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: It fit well.

This material is so festive, its a beautiful navy with a sparkle/sheen (better color than the picture on the model). I am only 5'2" so it was longer on me, like tea length, which worked. I am about 150 lbs and curvy and the size small fit, so I think it runs a little big and you can order down. The sleeves were not too long on my short arms, so I personally think this is a good dress for a petite. The material fell beautifully and did not emphasize my stomach or make me self conscious at all. I tucked in the ruffle a bit around the waist to eliminate extra volume (super easy fix and it stayed all night) and I pinned the neckline just so I wouldn't have to worry about cleavage mishaps. Would be super cute on someone with a great bustline. Regular bra, no Spanx needed - easy dress to wear and festive for winter/ the holidays!

This was a gorgeous dress and super festive with the sparkle material. I got a lot of compliments, and it's great for an hour glass figure. It hides flaws well! Only thing that I noticed was as the day went on it became itchy.
Hard to tell from the photo but this dress has a lot of bling and it is glittery! I will return it without wearing... not for me...

links_reviews_title: The top of this dress is strange.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress & almost wore it, but decided to go with another one at the last minute. The color is stunning, but the top of it hangs quite low.

links_reviews_title: Received a ton of compliments all night on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly, and was super flattering. The color stands out and I received so many compliments at the black tie wedding I attended!

I got many compliments on this dress and I loved the color. I'm 5'10" and was wearing heels, and it was the perfect length. Usually wear size 4, but the size 6 fit well. A bit itchy under the arms, but manageable.
Royal blue & gold lace made this dress stand out in a sea of black dresses. Comfortable fit

links_reviews_title: If you want to stand out, pick this dress!
links_reviews_text: I didn't want to wear the traditional red or black for this Christmas gala so I chose to go bold with this beautiful royal blue! I like the high-low effect but it was not as dramatic on my 5'2" frame. Something about the bodice/bust line fit a bit weird on me. It could be because I have broad shoulders or a short torso. I wore the 8R and it fit a tiny bit snug. I probably should have tried the 10R but the bodice would have dropped too low maybe. I wore a low back, strapless bra underneath. I'd select this dress again if needed but try the bigger size.

links_reviews_title: STUNNING DRESS - lots of compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like a glove and was super comfortable. Love the gold detail and the high low aspect... unique, classy and perfect for the black tie gala that we attended.

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect fit, style, and color
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I received so many compliments! Nothing bad i could say about it. If you are my height 5'9, get long! Otherwise it was amazing!
I wore this dress to a formal banquet fundraiser and got compliments all night! The dress is so incredibly beautiful and elegant, you feel like a princess! <3 I love this designer. :)
I wore this dress to a black tie optional wedding. I was very happy with it! The material was thick and comfortable (no spanx necessary!).

links_reviews_title: It's great to know that they always have what I need I love it rent the runway

links_reviews_text: The chest could use some padding and structure because there is none - but otherwise this is beautiful and comfortable. Compliments all night.

I rented this dress for a company event. It's a beautiful royal blue and the gorgeous gold lace on top is like icing on a cake. I didn't need a necklace but gold accessories complimented it perfectly. The blue part of the dress is a stretchy fabric, which makes a bit more forgiving and comfortable. The high- low hem was nice because I didn't have to pick it up to walk around like you would a full length dress. Received a lot of compliments and felt great in it. I highly recommend it!

One of my favorite RTR dresses to date. Fit like a glove and I got lots of compliments. I wore a nice strapless bra with it and you couldn't see it under the lace (the back was too low for at least a bit of the bra to show through). The material is comfy and has a bit of stretch to it, but it does definitely cling in the tummy area, so be cognizant of that. Also, the material is light enough that I wore it to a beach gala when temps were in the 90's and it was super cool and comfy! Would definitely rent again!

This dress is comfortable and beautiful but felt a little big on me in the chest and shoulder area. It was also long - I am 5'4" and wore 3" heels but the back still dragged on the floor some and got stepped on.

Not forgiving at all around the stomach, so if you plan on eating and bloat easy you may want to size up. Unfortunately on the size up it does some weird thing underneath my boobs- might just be because I'm just a B. I didn't end up wearing it. Beautiful dress though.

I'm 34 weeks pregnant and needed a dress for a black tie wedding. I was having a really hard time finding anything elegant that also fit my third trimester body. I felt amazing and received so many compliments. I'm usually a size 4/6 in dresses and went for the 10 to be safe. It worked out great and I felt beautiful!

Perfect Dress for this formal wedding. I'm normally a size 4 but in dresses with my bust need to wear a 6 or larger. The 6 would have worked fine if I had Spanx. The 8 was big but, I wanted to eat and drink and dance and it was awesome . I received a lot of compliments. The length was long but, with the high low it was perfect. I would definitely wear it again if I owned it!

links_reviews_title: The whole experience was a success. I loved the dresses and got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress has some stretch to the material so it's forgiving and comfortable. The material is nice and thick. Overall it was a great fit and perfect for my event.
The dress was very beautiful and fit comfortably- I am 5’3” and 130 lbs. Gorgeous blue color! The other red dresses in this photo are also from RTW.

I really liked this dress and I did get a lot of compliments. I wore a 4R. It sucked me in which was nice. I did wear spanx and a backless sticky bra with it. The lace was beautiful, but I took a star off bc it was a tad "baggy". I did like the uniqueness of the high/ low and the design over all. I would recommend this dress. I'm submitting a pic of the back to give you a different view.

Gorgeous dress! I'm a little between sizes right now and boyfriend though the 2R looked too loose, so I went with the 0R. Be warned this fabric shows every curve! I was afraid to eat anything lest I feel full and the dress let everyone at the event know I felt that way. I'm about 5'3" and even in heels that are around 5 inches, the back of the dress dress touched the ground. If you're petite and going to an outdoor event, that might be something to consider! Wasn't a problem at my indoor event. But the color is gorgeous and the style is unforgettable. Despite a little self-consciousness, I felt beautiful!
such a stunning dress. It fit all of my curves and even minimized my breasts. I loved the detail of the top, although it is low in the back, so a regular bra strap won’t work.

links_reviews_title: Lady with a blue dress on!
links_reviews_text: I should have gone up one size for comfort. However, it was pretty forgiving for a curved girl! Lots of compliments as always!

links_reviews_title: AMAZING Dress, Perfect for Curvy Girls
links_reviews_text: The gorgeous detail at the top and beautiful bright blue color attracted SO many compliments! It hugged my curves in all the right places! The top is a little itchy but I didn't notice much because I felt so gorgeous in this dress! Perfect length (I'm 5' 2") with some short gold heels. It really stood out in the midst of lots of black formal dresses :) Go with something different and pick this dress!

links_reviews_title: Numerous compliments at my jobs Holiday Ball
links_reviews_text: Love RTR! #HRCARMYHOLIDAYBALL

Well designed! This was my emergency overnight replacement and it was worth it. I am 5'7", a 6 and a true hour glass (32DD, 29" waist, 39" hips). The material was stretchy, super comfortable, and the high/low skirt moves wonderfully when walking or dancing. No bra works, but it was comfortable enough. Lace under arms rubs a bit but is so worth it. I didn't even bother to wear spanx (was in a rush late from work) and don't really think I needed them. I plan to rent this one again.
True to size, vibrant color, comfortable to wear. And it is such an elegant dress best fit for winter holiday parties. Wish I own it!
Very comfortable and sexy!
Rented to see the opera and it was fabulous for the occasion and I got soooo many compliments! Just enough of a mid/low to show off great shoes!

LOVED this dress so much! The color is beautiful and the gold lace is gorgeous. I wore this for a black tie optional wedding and received compliments all night. The lace rubbed a little under the armhole, but not enough to bother me while dancing. Fit like a glove! I would definitely recommend this dress. I wish I owned it!

links_reviews_title: I got compliments on my dress all night!
links_reviews_text: It ran small, and I had to have a hotel staff member come up to my room to zip me into the dress, because I was alone, but other than that funny mishap, I looked fabulous and received many compliments all night! It's a bold, royal blue, and the gold detail at the neck appeared to be a more metallic sage color, in person.
This dress is stunning. The color is amazing, detail is spot on and hugs in all the right places. I got compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Stylist Review: it was good but not great
links_reviews_text: Hmmm I wanted to love this dress. It fit correctly I just wasn't wowed. I wanted to love it but the fabric was just ok and the fit was about the same. I did love the color so that was a plus.

Perfect for a Sept black tie wedding. I liked that this was different than your typical black tie black dress. Sizing was pretty accurate - I wore the size 2P and it fit pretty well in the top, but was a little loose in the waist and hips area (but this is pretty typical for me). The fabric (the blue, not the lace) has a good stretch to it so it is comfy. Definitely recommend the petite size if you are short.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for our engagement photos!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for our engagement photos! It was comfortable, yet so stylish and beautifully made. The cobalt blue was a hit and photographs so well!

links_reviews_title: The color scheme perfect for an evening wedding.
links_reviews_text: It does have a high neck and I didn’t think the necklace I chose would work but it did and was perfect.

I loved this dress! I wore it to a black tie wedding in Italy. The material was stretchy so it didn't feel too tight around my waist when I sat down like what usually happens with other dresses. The heading up top was so intricate. Even though it was 90+ degrees in Italy for the wedding, it didn't feel overly hot. I sat outside for a ceremony and then danced the night away. It made me feel like royalty!

Fit like a glove but flattering for pear shaped girl like me with larger chest 34DD. Perfect for shorter girls too -this gown was the perfect length. I paired this gown with 4 inch heels and had no problems with the hemline! Would rent again !
This dress is a stunning royal blue. The gold portion was a little bit too big and this dress isn't great for a smaller bust, but still loved it and it looked beautiful.

I rented this for a wedding but the fit was off. the dress itself is gorgeous. However, it make my chest look even more flat, and the upper part was way too long it was floating. If you're short with small chest, skip this one.

I rented this dress for my work Holiday Party and this dress was the talk of the evening. It's super sexy and fit perfectly. Only complaint is that some of the stitches holding the front structure together were missing and I had to resew it. I felt amazing in this dress and was sorry I had to return it!!

links_reviews_title: Received ALL the compliments. Flirty and Fun!!
links_reviews_text: The fit was good however I would recommend on a smaller bust. I'm a 32 D and although it fit perfect in my bust area I personally feel it would look better on smaller. The shoulder straps are a bit restricting if you're doing the most but besides that it comfortable. Short yet conservative which is ideal for any A-line ensemble.

I would say the dress is a tiny bit shorter than ideal (but that is clear from the picture of the model). The cut-outs look great and are still modest enough for a formal affair. The fabric is thick and luxurious. I would wear this dress again.

links_reviews_title: I may have been a tad over-dressed, but it was worth it!
links_reviews_text: I got compliments on this dress all night! The hard part is definitely finding a bra. The one I wore still ended up showing from the side.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable, has pockets & great navy color.
links_reviews_text: 5’6 140...typically a 6 and needed the 8...if they made a “7”...that would’ve been perfect. The 8 worked great.

Perfect for a night out with your SO. I rented this for my birthday. It was perfect. If you have a smaller chest like me, you'll definitely need fashion tape to keep it closed in front! Slightly limiting in the shoulders but, Overall pretty comfortable.
I wound up not wearing this one because it wasnt as comfortable as I hoped. It runs a little bit small and I couldn't raise my arms in it.

links_reviews_title: This dress was ADORABLE and I want to buy it!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit me perfectly. I'm 5'4" and 118 lbs, so I am almost always a solid size 2. This dress fit me perfectly at the waist and the off-the-shoulder sleeves were the perfect width. The dress was short and cute and super sexy! Everything I was looking for. Very comfortable to wear! Can't wear a bra with it, but I've never been a fan of wearing bras anyway.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress! It fit like a glove and I felt super sexy in it!!
links_reviews_text: The dress was a bit tight in the arms, so eating was an adventure, but overall I absolutely loved this dress! I fit like a glove and I felt incredibly sexy in it. I will definitely rent this dress again!!

links_reviews_title: I got SO many compliments at my friends birthday!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear an 8 but the chest was a bit too bit on me- which is interesting considering I am a 32DD- so I wore the 6 which was tight on my waist but I thought that was better than popping out in the chest area. It is a really beautiful dress! Measurements: 5'6, 165 lbs, 32DD.

This dress leaves nothing to the imagination. I am 5'9" and ordered a 6, it was very very tight and crazy short. The problem is that a larger size would have proven too showy on the top. It's a hard dress to pull off. Wouldn't recommend it for a curvy girl. That being said my husband LOVED it, but I couldn't walk out of my house with it.

links_reviews_title: Fun but a little tough to dance in
links_reviews_text: Wore it for an art gala in NYC. Length was fun and dress was different but the band around the arms made dancing a lil tough.
This dress was the perfect combination of sexy and classy. I received many compliments though bout the night and felt like a glove. My only complain is that it was hard to raise my arms.
Tight but the boobs stay in bc it is tight

Wore this to a Vegas darty at a friend's bachelorette and got SO many compliments. It's super unique and very flattering for hips. The only thing that was a bit difficult was getting the top half to lay flat, but that was definitely outweighed by how cool this dress was!!

It was challenging with the chest part of the dress, I don't have boobs so ofcourse it fitted me loose there, so whenever I sat or turned it wrinkled out and you can totally see my nipple stickers. Other than that it was really beautiful, comfortable and fun!

I don't usually wear a-line skirts out on the town, because they don't strike me as sexy. I feel like they make me look like a little girl. BUT! This dress was awesome. It was fun, flirty, sexy, and the shape and cutouts were really something different. I had a lot of fun wearing this dress for a night out in Vegas. Like other reviews said, it is hard to raise your arms up due to the shape of the sleeves, but it really didn't hamper my night. Sorry the picture isn't great--I was having too much fun! I did not wear a bra, and I paired it with nude wedges.

I wore this dress for my birthday and loved it! I initially went up a size because everyone said it was snug on top(on the shoulders - which is true) but had to go back down to my regular size(6) for the right fit. I loved this dress it fit well, I felt really comfortable in it and felt great. Got compliments all night.
I'm a 32 b and would of been better on a c
The shoulder area is awkward but a beautiful comfy dress! Had to fix my boobs a bit but I'm a DD so that was expected lol

links_reviews_title: Sext and classy- perfect for my birthday
links_reviews_text: Great fit- true to size. Is very short so keep that in mind if your thicker on the bottom. Received so many compliments all night. Perfect dress for my birthday

links_reviews_title: Cute. But short. Don't wear if windy!
links_reviews_text: Very short but adorable dress. Unique cut. Just can't wear shoulder bag with it. Definitely try it!

The bands around my arms shifted a bit,but everything stayed in place.My husband loved it & I got compliments all night. It was the perfect amount of sexy & classy!! More colors please. PS the POCKETS are everything!!!

The dress was super tight for a bustier fit. I couldn't really get the top to lay down very well even with fashion tape! I still wore the dress since I didn't bring a different dress for the occasion! The side of the dress was tight and made me worry if I was going to fall out of the top or side! I would definitely recommend sizing up!

We went to an upscale bar before the show and everyone gave me compliments on my dress. A man even bought me AND my boyfriend a drink, because he liked my dress. Apparently he was a fashion designer... it was a hit! I will say it is very restricting in the shoulders. You shouldn't need a bra with it, and B, C and D cups will fit great. Perfect length.

I wore the dress to a party. It was perfect and very unique, in the no one had a dress like mine. The way the dress was cut was a little weird. I found the dress to be small in the hips and a little to lose or big at the top. I was able to squeeze into it, but the waistline kept rising and my bust could have been more fitting. I am usually a size two, so overall i was able to fit into the dress, but the waist was a little tight.
Fit extremely well and was incredibly flattering! Loved this dress. Some sort of sticky bra (that you can unclasp) or something is necessary though unless you're comfortable going bra-less.

Wore this for my 37th birthday and felt gorgeous! I'm 32 D and normally wear a 2 and it was perfect. In reviews people complained about the sleeves but coming from someone who moves a lot (I'm super hyper) it was perfectly fine. Oh, and it has pockets!!!

links_reviews_title: Actually for to a wedding!! So cute, fit great; but the shoulder straps are constricting.
links_reviews_text: I added a little bandeau under and it was good to go for a wedding! Got a lot of compliments!

I have a 60's style. I like to play around with my wardrobe a lot and this has been on my wishlist for a while now. It's gorgeous. I'm 132 lbs (recently dropped some baby weight) and 5'8. The 6 fit well, but it was slightly large around the boobs. I'm medium chested so maybe it just really needs fashion tape. The back up size 8 was much too large. I'm glad I rented it, and I would absolutely rent it again! Wish it came in other colors, like pink or orange!
Wish I could keep it. Classy but still sexy.
Fit me super well, only con was that you couldn't move your arms around very much. But I got complimented by everyone I saw!!
The dress fit me perfectly. I have a 30 in. bust, 24 in. waist, and 37 in. hip. Be prepared to not move your arms up as far as you'd like. Otherwise, it was the best unique dress.

Perfect and soooo cute. I received a thousand compliments. I absolutely love how flirty this dress is. The cuts are all in the right places and it would flatter anyone. Except the arms! I could not at all lift my arms up so they stayed low the entire time so not a dress for dancing! Just for walking around looking pretty and maybe eating. I even had trouble closing my suitcase and putting my shoes on lol!
Perfect dinner dress for my birthday! Girlie, yet sexy.
This was a great look, but I would caution against using this dress for any affair that is made up mostly of dancing. The strap wrapped your shoulers greatly limits your arms' range of motion.

links_reviews_title: Classy with a whole lot of sexy
links_reviews_text: The bad: the waist is a bit snug, while the bust is a tad big, but nothing a little double-sided tape can't handle. The good: I love nearly everything about this dress, including the thick material, the perfectly placed cut outs, the strap across the arms (arm movement is seriously inhibited, but we must all make sacrifices in life...espeically in the name of fashion ;-) ), and the flared mini skirt. I can't wait to wear this dress for NYE.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress so much
links_reviews_text: I wanted to keep this dress forever. It fits true to size and it might be considered too short for those who are too traditional. I used size 6. I am 5’07 and 135lbs. Is definitely an eye catcher dress with a sexy and princess chic vibe at the same time. I used tape for the deep V ( really recommend).
Definitely more skin than I typically show. This dress gets lots of attention. Nice length that offsets the top.

links_reviews_title: Great for a Khaleesi Halloween costume!
links_reviews_text: Runs very small, but got complimented all night!!
I loved everything about this dress! Wore it for a Mardi Gras ball and felt great all night. I would suggest heels because it was on the longer side.

links_reviews_title: So many nice compliment on this red dress.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and easy to walk in. I had to go on stage to give an award and the dress was easy to walk in.

I rented this dress for a black tie charity event and it was absolutely stunning. I'm 5'4, 34C and 125 lbs and ended up wearing the backup 6P size. The petite was the perfect length since it still hit the floor with 3 in heels. The size 4 was a little tight and I was unable to zip. If you have non-straight hips & round bottom, then go with the 6. I wore with a strapless bra since the material is not thick enough to go without. I also wore with Spanx since this dress is form fitting.
Snug fabric made this dress very flattering. I was between a 6R and 8P. Probably would've worn the 8P but it had a stain on it. The 6 was still very comfortable. Lots of compliments

The fit’s very slim. It was a beautiful dress and I felt great, but I don’t feel like it was a good fit for my body type. If you have a pear shape I would definitely size up for your hips or choose a different dress. I loved the train and how long the 8L was.
This dress is the perfect shade of red and it's well structured for a flattering fit. Lots of compliments!
Perfect fit. I wore 3 inch heels.
Got so many compliments in this red dress at a Christmas wedding. Was very happy about the fit and it was comfortable all night!

links_reviews_title: Elegantly Simple for a Hollywood-themed Affair
links_reviews_text: As usual RTR offers good quality gowns with substantial fabrics and linings that aid in smoothing lumps and just plain look better. This dress is no exception. The quality makes me feel good about me. I am not well endowed on the top, however, the dress has room for much much more in the bosom area. Being a seamstress, therefore, I carefully hand stitched a sizeable dart in from the arm hole so that a breeze would not blow in one arm hole, across my chest and out the other armhole. The dress then fit flawlessly. The morning after I removed the same stitches without harm to the fabric. My husband complimented that my dress fit so much better than those of many of the other ladies at the event. I look forward to my next opportunity to rent an exquisite designer gown from RTR!

links_reviews_title: Exactly what I needed for my Company Holiday Party!!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly and was super comfortable!! I'm 5'3" and the petite length was perfect with a 4" heel.

Wore the 2P in this dress. I'm so glad that RTR has some petite options in long gowns for shorties like me! I felt beautiful in this red dress and will definitely rent it again in the future. I'm very small chested, didn't need or wear any bra. Very flattering fit!

links_reviews_title: Lady is on fire in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this dress! I did wear spandex under it but no bra. Fit like a glove. Would wear it again for sure!
I wore this dress to my husband's Firefighter Ball and received so many compliments. The fit was perfect, the dress was gorgeous, and it was comfortable allowing me to enjoy the night!

Gorgeous red gown! So comfortable and very flattering. The petite version was the perfect length for us shorties too, which is rare!! Only challenge I had was that you can't wear a banded strapless bra because of the cut.

links_reviews_title: Just WOW - I didn't want to take this dress off
links_reviews_text: This dress was such a hit. The color is so vibrant and certainly stands out in a sea of black! I had so many compliments all night. It's classy and doesn't show off too much skin which was perfect for work. I really didn't want to send this back. Rented a 10R as the 8L wasn't available and it worked out perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Flattering and comfortable, but runs a bit long
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress for a formal wedding - was very comfortable the whole night. That said, I'd definitely recommend ordering the petite - with 5 inch heels, the petite was the perfect length for me (I'm 5'5)

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a formal wedding in Colombia! The fit was so flattering and I received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I’m glad I ended up with the long (I’m almost 5’9”) but the regular 6 fit as well. I didn’t end up wearing Spanx like I thought I would need to because the material was thick enough to cover all my tummy things.

Loved this dress, was the only one at the wedding wearing red so lots of attention, but the dress hugged in all the best places and form fitting so attention wasn't a bad thing. Super fun to dance in, hard to walk if you generally have a wide gait but over all fantastic and easy dress.

I usually wear a 4 and read in the comments that it ran small so I got the 6 as a backup. Unfortunately, both were huge so I had to get a 2, as well. The 2 was perfect and I felt like a million bucks!

I had read that it runs long so I hoped to rent the petite, but it was not available. I wore 2 1/2 inch heels and this regular length dragged on the floor. I am small in the bust, and thats why I chose to wear the 0 over the size 2; it just fit better on top. Other than the length, I loved the shape and the color. I received lots of compliments.

I've never gotten so many compliments in my life!! I normally wear a 6-8 and often wear Long sizes (5'8) but for me the 8R was a good length. The backup size i ordered was an L version and it was too long. The 8 was good but a little big, I likely could have gone 6. The dress is very true to size. And the red - it's a perfect dress!!!
Was a tiny bit too long, even with 4 inch heels, but still looked and fit great. The neckline is really flattering and I got compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments and the red stood out in a crowd of black
links_reviews_text: Fit great just a bit long I'm 5'4". But still loved it and was pretty comfortable with soft fabric

links_reviews_title: Loved the simplicity of the dress but it brought a huge WOW factor!! Great fit, comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, I’m 5’6” and 136lbs, it fit beautifully in all the right areas.

I wore this dress to a formal event and the fit was true to size and the length was just enough for a 3inch heel as I glided onto the dance floor. The compliments were constant thru the evening and I felt so pretty in it.
Loved it. ! Fit great

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for the occasion
links_reviews_text: I was worried when the 8R wasn't available, but the 8L ended up being the perfect size. 10R was too loose and the length of the 8L was perfect with heels. I wore a strapless bra to help fill it out a bit, but that might not be necessary for everyone. I also might have considered wearing some shapewear because my belly pooch kind of showed through the dress, but ultimately decided I didn't care enough. Overall it was a great dress to wear to a charity gala with coworkers!

This dress was more than I expected. The red is perfect, the fabric is not too heavy, and fits like a glove. I don’t have a large chest so I could have used to go down a size in the top, but it was comfortable and easy to move in. I would definitely rent it again.

I took a chance with the fit of this dress, as I prefer an Aline silhouette but I did few very pretty in this dress. I wish it was just a little bigger on the stomach as I don't like anything too snug on my belly but other than that I really did like wearing it and the color is awesome!

links_reviews_title: I was very comfortable all evening and my daughters loved the dress on me.
links_reviews_text: Fit in the 8P but was a little too fitted for me around the back at my bra strap. Length on 8P was perfect and the 10P barely touched the ground...wore 3" heels

links_reviews_title: didn't wear for event, but was a cute backup.
