links_reviews_text: Very comfortable, flattering, basic dress. looks good on hourglass figure.

links_reviews_title: Super glamorous, a bit short on a tall gal
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'10" and the size 8 was a few inches too short (my ankles showed). But overall, very flattering and nice quality. Im wearing Spanx in this pic because it's a bit unforgiving in the mid section.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress on Valentine's Day in Paris and I felt as BEAUTIFUL and lovely as the city.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly- I used spanx and petals, though. I am 5'3" and it was very long on me, even with high heels, but that made me feel even fancier :) I 100% recommend the dress and the brand.
This dress fit perfectly!! So many compliments! Runs true to size!

This dress didn't look like much on the hanger, but I encourage you to try it on! I rented this for a formal event and was not disappointed. I would describe it as sexy yet simple, and the dress can be easily jazzed up with accessories. I paired it with gold accessories and shoes. Many compliments on the color all night. it's definitely a stand out. I am pretty tall (about 5'11") and the 6 Long was unavailable so I had to rent the 6 Regular which ended up being fine in terms of length.

I cannot say how much I loved this dress for a wedding I just attended. The bright red color really popped. The fit is very form fitting, which was great for my curves. Typically I am size 6 but went with the 8 because the dress shows all. The size 8 laid better over my curves and under garments. The dress is also a little long. I am 5'5" and with 2" heels it still felt a little long. Worth renting!

Overall fit on this dress is true-to-size, but there is very little give. If you're looking to hide a tummy - this isn't your dress. The Pros: the color is gorgeous. The red pops and you'll definitely stand out in a room. The Cons: The dress seemed to wrinkle easily and it was ultimately enough of a deterrent that I went with another dress.

links_reviews_title: The color popped on my skin tone!
links_reviews_text: The dress was really comfortable. It was very forgiving, although I did wear shapewear.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress. A little looser than I would have liked but still very nice.
links_reviews_text: Very pretty.
A little big. I usually wear 4 but sized up to 6P for the length. I probably could have worn a 4P.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! The wrap/tie helps to be able to adjust it.

links_reviews_text: A little long for my 5'4" height, ended up holding the skirt a good amount.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a barn wedding.
links_reviews_text: Dress was perfect for a barn wedding. Very flattering and fit perfect.

links_reviews_title: Dance it up in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fun dress to dance in! Fit perfectly, never felt like I was going to have an issue with anything popping out (was a concern when purchasing!). Highly recommend for an outdoor summer wedding!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a spring/summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: I received SO many compliments on this dress! It was so flattering and so comfortable. I ordered the MR and SR, but ended up going with the SR. I'm 5'2" and wore 3.5 inch heels, so the dress was a bit long, but nothing too crazy.

links_reviews_title: True size is super low cut.
links_reviews_text: This dress was just ok. The medium was way too low cut for me, I'm too busty. I wore the large and safety pinned the top to stay together but the top looked frompy because I sized up and tightened the straps.

The dress I had originally rented had some issue, so RTR sent this back-up for free. It turned out to be a winner, and I had never even considered it when browsing the site. It looks much better in person than online, and the key was the adjustable straps. I could adjust the straps to exactly the length I needed. I'm 5'4", and with 3" heels, the MR dragged ever so slightly on the floor. Not enough to trip though.
Great for an outdoor wedding!

Wore this to a summer outdoor wedding and received so many compliments throughout the night. This dress is so flowy and fun, with the high/low wrap in the front giving it a touch of sexy. So beautiful when the wind hits it. One thing is that the STRAPS DO NOT cross in the back as shown on the app, which I was a little bummed about. The bust area does cut down low if you do not wrap it properly, but I had no issues with it when the inside piece was pulled tight enough. A little double stick tape on the bust just to be safe, but it wasn't really necessary. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous and unique but busty women beware!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress and got so many compliments on it throughout the night, it's perfect for a summer wedding. It's a very flattering shape and flow for all body types. My only complaint is that it shows a LOT of cleavage, especially for me as a 36E. The straps are adjustable but don't do as much as I needed them to. I ended up having to pin it at the front to make it a bit less revealing, but it was an easy fix and did the job. Overall I had a great experience with this dress

Pros - lightweight material, figure flattering, pretty color, comfortable Cons - wide open in chest area - have to wear fashion tape, if you are 5'4" or shorter, heels higher than 3 inches are a must or else it will drag on the ground I received a couple compliments on this dress, but not as many as in previous RTR purchases. It was very easy to dance in though, and perfect for an outdoor summer wedding. Definitely not my favorite dress, but it wasn't my least favorite either.

links_reviews_title: Great colors, easy to wear (and dance)!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a summer wedding at a country club and it was perfect for the occasion. Both the SM and MD fit fine but the small was a little too much cleavage for a family affair so went with the medium. Did have to have some help to make sure the thin strings were tied tight enough.

The colors and flow of the dress are beautiful. But, I had a few issues with it. First, I could not figure out how to tie it. It took me forever to find the tiny hole near the armpit to put the string through in order to wrap it around my waist. Once I did, it took a few tries of wrapping the strings in different ways to figure out what looked best/how it was supposed to work. Second, the top was huge. I'm not large on top, but it was tough to wear. I had to use a safety pin to keep it closed and even then it was just too large up top and baggy. I had worn stick-on chicken cutlets but they were constantly out because the dress kept shifting and falling open. I ended up wearing the jacket in my picture only because I was self-conscious of them showing. I would recommend double-sided tape if you rent this. Even though the dress was beautiful, I wouldn't rent again. Too much hassle.

This dress was so pretty, light, and lovely to wear all night. It has a train so be sure to tell your date to watch out because my boyfriend stepped on the back quite a few times. The material is so delicate and comfortable, but definitely not made for bustier ladies like myself unless you're willing to get in there with a safety pin - even with that I was adjusting the girls all night but thankfully there were no slips!

links_reviews_title: A jigsaw puzzle but worth it
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a June wedding and found it to be a fun and lightweight option! Make sure you have safety pins and time to figure out the wrapping however, as the dress is a mystery to get on and situated. I ended up wrapping the ties around multiple times to secure and had to get creative with the front closure so that I didn't flash anyone. Got lots of compliments though!
Great fit overall and beautiful print. It was just a little low in front but nothing a safety pin couldn't fix. Perfect for a spring beach wedding!

This dress was late to be delivered so I did not get to wear it, but it is unbelievably gorgeous! Once I figured out how to tie it haha! Ok I really had to watch a YouTube video as I was looking all over for a little hole to put the string through - the hole isn't at the front of dress like I thought just follow the seam where the string starts and it's more on the right side kinda behind where your armpit would be. Maybe the size small hole wouldn't have been so far behind my arm (if that makes sense) but once I had it all tied I thought the XSR fit. I don't have a bra on and I think the ruffles disguised my small chest. I tied it very tight and it felt secure. I thought the length was perfect with about 3.5 inch heels and didn't think it would expose much of my legs like I saw mentioned in prior reviews, only up to about my knee if I was walking, but I didn't actually wear it so this is just a guess. Material is light and flows. The pastel floral pattern is super feminine and I will rent this again because I have to be able to wear it somewhere!! I'm 38 years old Approximate measurements: 5'4" about 130 pounds - 34b/c - 28 inch waist 36 inch hips @mlyayn

links_reviews_title: Pretty spring matron of honor bridal shower dress!
links_reviews_text: This wrap dress was great, perfectly flowy and the best dress for running around. I wore sticky petals and the straps are adjustable to keep your breasts in. I loved it and felt very pretty! It was a little long but I wore block heels!

links_reviews_title: I loved the adjustable tie around the waist. So flattering!!
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly. I have an hourglass figure and usually wear a medium or 4 in clothing but went with a size small and it not only fit perfectly, but was long enough to wear with heels (I am 5'9"). So therefore, I would size down and get petite for length if you're on the shorter side!

I loved this dress and got so many compliments. The medium was a little too small on my chest. The large was perfect for chest. It was a little too low cut for my liking so I just used a safety pin which made it to my liking! The large was long in the back for me and would have dragged without heels. My 3 inch heels brought it up just enough for no dragging!

Wore this dress for my engagement photos after I saw other reviewers do the same thing. Absolutely love this dress. Easy to wear a strapless bra with and very flattering as it hugs in at the waist. Would rent again! Being 5'4" I wouldn't have been able to wear this without heels though! If I wore it with sandals I would get the shorter length.

Gorgeous fit. It has the usual issues with a wrap dress, I wouldn't suggest it if you have a large bust. I felt like I had to keep making sure the girls were still where they belonged but over all I was really happy with it!

Light and airy. Felt very pretty and girly. This was so perfect for the tropical wedding that I wore it to. True to size. The string to make it wrap and tie were kind of confusing. I had a little too much cleavage, so I safety-pinned the fabric closed around my chest.
Beautiful dress! Was long but worked with wedges. Had to safety pin the front. Received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Love rtr! Can't recommend it enough
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Lots of compliments. Little long in the back and tad sheer that require nude under garments but overall the fit is beautiful. Also had to use double sided tape on the bust area for secure fit on top.

I rented this dress to take photos with my infant son. The wrap dress was beautiful and even the XS fit my large bust. My only complaint is that the top cake rather low and I needed to safety pin the top shut.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress, made me feel like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, was long but I was wearing high heels so it wasn't a problem at all.

links_reviews_title: Perfect flowing dress for engagement photos
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for our engagement photos and it was exactly as I hoped it would be! It was a little long in the back since I am only 5' 2" but If I had worn heels it would have been perfect. I was worried about the chest being to open since I am small chested but I just made the straps as tight as possible and it stayed pretty decently in place even with the wind blowing. I ended up wearing the smaller size an tied it pretty tight but it was very flattering and I highly recommend.
Loved the color, very comfy, could possibly expose you if windy, not secured only by the tie

I wore a size larger to have more material to cover the "ladies" and wrapped it tightly, it was a little long though (but I'm only 5'2") so I had to wear tall heels. For a wrap, I didn't feel like it was going to come open at all! Got lots of compliments and it was perfect for a summer wedding.

This dress was perfect for a wedding in Mexico. It had a beautiful and soft pink color and pattern that wasn't too loud. I loved the ruffles and the fact that it was a beautiful flowing dress (especially on the beach). However it was very long (I'm 5'4") and the train in the back had to be picked up when I went down or up stairs. It definitely ran larger and longer but still fit in my small chest very well without any tape or a bra (I'm a 34B). I'm not sure if I could have gone smaller but I should have!

Wore this dress to a fall wedding. The length and the ruffles gave it a formal flare. The colors are more spring-like but it is still a great dress. I ended up wearing a bandeau underneath for more coverage on top.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my engagement shoot and it was amazing!
links_reviews_text: I am 5’6 and 145 lb, 36C and the MR fit perfect. It would have fit better with a bra on but pasties worked just fine. Could use some garmet tape if you have a smaller chest and are afraid of shifting. The straps are adjustable too!

Wore this to a late summer wedding. I'm fairly small chested so I had to safety pin the top for it to fit. When wrapping the dress, the little slit to thread the string through was kind of hard to find, but once I got it figured out the dress was gorgeous! It was super comfortable and very flattering!

This was my first RTR experience and it was amazing! I knew that I wanted something beautiful for my engagement photos, but didn't want to buy a dress that I probably wouldn't wear again after having 100+ photos in it. I finally had an excuse to try RTR! While I did have to consult a YouTube tutorial to assemble the dress (FYI, there is a TINY hole in the seam on the right side for the string to go through), the dress was so easy to adjust and make fit just right. Like other reviews mentioned, it is a long dress so you will need to wear a heel! It runs TTS in my opinion, but you can also adjust it as needed. Definitely happy with this choice and wish I didn't have to return it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but a lot of dress
links_reviews_text: I didn't get the chance to wear this out unfortunately, it was just too fancy and a little too girlie/frilly for me. I wanted to try to dress it down but it was too long to not wear heals and it was just a lot of dress. I am very petite and Most Yumi Kim items i have are an XXS so i wish this dress came in that. Nevertheless beautiful dress!!

links_reviews_title: Great for a southern summer wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved that it was lightweight. Definitely needed to pin it closed at the cleavage. Just was able to wear a regular strapless bra. Be careful if you're outside and it's windy, wrap can easily blow open. Overall very comfortable and loved it.
I'm 5ft4in and I wore 2 inch heels and it was a little long but not crazy. Stickies instead of a bra worked well.

links_reviews_title: It was there for me when I needed it. And it was flattering
links_reviews_text: It fit well although because of the wrap style it had to be pinned since it showed a little too much cleavage. But it was fun and flowy

I loved this dress! It was comfortable and fit great. I got so many compliments. Only issue I had was how shear the top was. You could see my petals so I had to wear a strapless bra, which meant I had to pin the top a little to hide the bra.

The dress is true to size. It's a fun, beautiful dress! I didn't even try on the next size up as this one fit perfectly. Strapless bra worked great with it. As other reviews mentioned, if you are a spanx girl, would probably want to wear with this dress. I don't wear spanx, but usually seamless panties, but you could notice even the seamless, so I opted for wearing nothing so you wouldn't see lines. Worked great! Elegant, classy and would definitely rent again!
One of my favorite rentals. Understated but fit makes it svelte. There's no lining, so confidence or quality undergarments are highly recommended.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Wore it to a fall wedding and enjoyed it the whole night
links_reviews_text: Great color I was a little worried about the neck area but it was fine. Not too high or tight at all. The pattern was very nice and complimentary. Material was a bit thin but I just wore a long tank dress underneath.
The 10 was a little tight, but it was my only option. This dress was amazing and looked great! It shows every line.
Fabulous dress! Great color for a fall wedding! Got a lot of compliments. I normally wear a 4 but wore a 6 in this so I'd say it runs small. Would definitely recommend it!
Slimmer fit, but the fabric has some give. Nice form fitting dress with unique details. I'm 5'3 and length was perfect with a 4" wedge.
I loved everything about this dress. It is on trend yet classic enough to wear to a formal wedding. It is stretchy material and I loved that it hugged my figure comfortably. I felt great in it!

links_reviews_title: Made me feel beautiful and unique
links_reviews_text: A bit tight around the waist and the tag did show

I was hoping to love this dress, but it was awful. It created problem areas where I had none (my belly is normally not a problem for me yet this dress really gripped it in a bad way) and I felt very frumpy in this. Going up a size is not really an option, it's just not made for anyone curvy. I could see this working for women who are tall and very thin or athletic.

The fabric has some give. It lays on the Jody so nicely. I absolutely loved the way my curves were accentuates in it. No bra was needed and nips weren't visible because of the drapes fabric falling from the collar. I seriously LOVE this dress.
Really liked the color, fit, and cut of the dress. Probably best to wear strapless bra. Classy and flattering - would rent again.
Fit perfectly and was extremely comfortable and flattering. Got lots of compliments!
The material was comfortable and stretchy, the dress was gorgeous and so special. It stood out in a sea of dresses at a black-tie optional wedding. Perfect for dancing and eating lots of cake.

I have rented this dress twice now. And revived tons of compliments on it each time. The olive is a great color because it stands out in a sea of typical black and navy formal dresses. The cut is flattering and the high low helps it work for even a short girl with so very high heels. The material is light and comfortable. If you have an updo the hook at the neck can get caught in your hair. I recommend covering it up with a small piece of moleskin if you are wearing an updo. I will definitely rent this dress again for another formal occasion with a different group of people.

I rented this hot little number for a wedding New Orleans and it totally fit the black tie occasion! I got so many compliments and felt super sexy! I'm 5'6" and 145LBS with a 34B chest and the 6R fit perfect. The 4R would have worked had my hips been more narrow. The fabric is very soft and definitely hugs every curve. Which is great for those who aren't concerned about their panty line showing. I'm super pleased with this one - it was my first RTR and I'll be doing it again!

Perfect for a black tie optional wedding-winter in Florida. Material is thin and stretchy which means lightweight and not forgiving. Be sure to wear Spanx. I ordered the 4 and 6. 4 fit better overall. 6 would have worked better if I had a bigger bust. Definitely worth wearing. So many compliments and was so comfortable all night long. I would buy this dress if I had enough events to warrant it.

The dress fit like a glove. I selected it (and the backup style) because I knew the length would work (I'm 5'4) so I needed something a little shorter in front and a backup (since another size wasn't available) that allowed length adjustment with a belt. Turned out my backup wasn't available so they sent an alternative that didn't work at all (it was a weird one shoulder that was so low my flat side boob/armpit was overexposed). Then when I went to return my items on Monday (since you just need to return to UPS before noon) - no return label, no lock to secure the package - nothing. I didn't notice this since this was my first RTR experience and looked online for the info I needed - assuming I could easily print a return label from my account. I'm assuming Monday was a holiday for RTR since no one responded to my emails until Tuesday at 4. They sent a new label in the email, but by that time my return was already 2 days late. And since I didn't hear from customer service, I paid UPS to ship overnight for $140+ to avoid late fees. My stylist told me to refer my question about reimbursement for shipping to collections. . RTR's response was to disable late fees and offer a $30 credit. Ultimately I'm out $200+. Oh, and there's no phone number to call customer service. You just have to wait for emails.
From certain angles this dress was great, but it was way too clingy in all the wrong places. Definitely Spanx if you get this. It is a beautiful dress.

Received endless compliments at the wedding and after about this STUNNER. My husband even said I should just buy it. Great, comfortable material. No issues with standard undergarments. Danced the night away without a problem. Love, love, love!!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, easy-to-wear dress for black tie wedding!!
links_reviews_text: This is an incredible dress! The material is light and very stretchy, and the slit makes it easy to dance in. The top fits loosely (if you have a small chest) - the 2 was almost too large
I felt great in this dress. It was unique and fun. Hands down would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a late fall/early winter black tie optional wedding - Unique and Different!
links_reviews_text: Love the cut of this neckline, the slit is showy but not too much leg, and the ruffle adds some interest to this otherwise simple silhouette. Paired with simple nude heels and a faux fur wrap!
The dress is comfortable and elegant. Fits true to size. Loved this dress.

I picked this dress over others more formal because of the front design. The material was nice and hugged me in all the right places. The split was the perfect mix of sexy and classy. I didnt need any undergarments (panty line would show) either. Instead of nude accessories I used a pop of color and received many compliments on my attire for the Friday night awaes event!

links_reviews_title: Something i never would buy or own so glad i could try it on and rent
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove, better without bra

links_reviews_title: Sleek lovely dress with an unexpected olive color.
links_reviews_text: Christmas Eve every year, my family gets dressed to the 9's. No one is better dressed than my mom (ever!), but this year I came close with this sophisticated look. The olive green is very flattering and the ruffle is well-placed camouflage for those extra holiday lumps. The fabric is light and the high neck not too high. The dress was snug without being clingy but a strapless bra and commando thong were smart choices.
Dress was perfect for a wedding. I would definitely rent I️t again. I got so many compliments.

The ruffle creates a very flatering line that totally slims your body. The fabric is a nice weight - definitely not flimsy at all. In a sea of cranberry dresses, the olive drab was a refreshing contrast. Very comfortable and easy to wear, although spanx were employed for extra smoothness. Also, don’t be afraid of the leg slit as it’s not too high at all. No spanx peeking out, even when seated!
I loved this dress. Received many compliments and although runs slightly small the fit is very flattering. Beautiful fabric and color.

links_reviews_title: Perfect color for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'7" and wore 4 inch heels and the dress was just short of the perfect length. It cut perfect around my neckline!

Obsessed with this dress. Got it as a backup and didn't wear because my original worked better for the event, but looking for future excuses to wear this one. Classy, sophisticated, and fairly formal. Very unique and different. Material is very body conscious so the correct undergarments would be essential, even for the most confident of ladies. And what everyone else has said is correct: the placement of the tag is super weird and visible. Would have to do something about that. But... totally worth it! This dress is awesome and I can't wait to find a time to wear it.

This dress was a last minute pick replacement dress. The original dress I ordered arrived unwearable. I did however, have a great experience in the store. Customer service was wonderful. The size of this dress was one size too big, but because i was in a panic and needed a dress ( i was on my way to the wedding in a city two hours away) I went with it. A true size for me would have been 0 (the store did not have it) but due to the cut of the dress it wasn't too noticeable. Received a few compliments.

links_reviews_title: Classy, conservative, feminine with a hint of sexy. Compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is unforgiving so wear Spanxx. The color and the high collar with ruffles are perfect for any fall event. I got tons of compliments all night and online. I am tall so the thigh slit was a little too high for my liking, however on an average size women it would be conservative. LOVED THE DRESS!

links_reviews_title: Perfect color and style for a campground wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for the occasion, and I was getting compliments all night! I was at a summer wedding at a campground, and thought a more muted color and flows dress would be nice. I also thought I'd wear a chunky heel rather than a stiletto, and I had the perfect copper heel to go with it. I am 5'7.5" and 128 lbs so I often wear between a 2 and a 4 (2's often snug and 4s often have extra room somewhere), and this dress was similar. It didn't hug any curves, although it wasn't supposed to. The material was light enough for a summer or warmer event but could be appropriate for fall as well because of the color. The fit was almost like an a-line or shift and the ruffle and turtleneck are great style details that made this dress more unique. Half of the women at the wedding complimented me on this dress (as well as the blush colored tuxedo cape I also rented). The only problem was the turtleneck zipper. It kept getting caught in my hair all night :/ Would rent again!

I wouldn't usually have chosen this dress, but I went for an in-person session at one of the brick & mortar stores and I'm SO GLAD my stylist suggested this for me. It's so sleek and flattering and different and interesting. It's VERY thin and skims your body very closely, so unless you have a tighter midsection than I do, be prepared to do some sucking in and standing straight ;-) If I owned any spanx this would probably have been a good opportunity to use them. I was so sad to send this one back. I want it forever!

I was told I looked "radiant" in this dress. The style was perfect for the work gala I had to attend. The only two things was the high Neck got a little annoying half way through the night and there's a white tag on the bottom left of the dress that isn't well hidden. You can clearly see it when you walk. It's a terrible place for a tag. I wound up using fabric tape to try and hide it. Other than that, I received tons of compliments and the fit was perfect. Paired with gold jewelry and nude shoes. In my opinion, Hair styled back is a must.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress - could go formal or less formal. Unique!
links_reviews_text: This dress's material is great. Slipped on nicely. I love that it was alluring, without being sleazy. There is a slight slit but it doesn't go up too high. Loved this dress!

I had to attend an award show for work, the dress with perfect, paired with RTR earrings. I like the conservative high neck with the bit of leg peaking through. The dress is not double lined, and the fabric is quite body hugging. Its the kind of dress you can't wear underwear with any lace on it because the texture will show through. Overall, really beautiful and appropriately sexy.
I'm hippy. This was a little tight around the hips but felt good going one size up.

I absolutely adore this dress. I'm 5'9, so the first thing I was worried about was length. Even with a 3 1/2 inch heel on, it fell at my heel. I wore a size 12. The fit was tighter than expected, but it still looked great. The fabric has some stretch and the dress was easy to wear for hours. The fabric is this so seamless shape wear is recommended. This dress is definitely one of my favorites.

I had to shoot this dress from the side because I was literally busting out of the top. It was unwearable in public. It fit everywhere else though, so I don't think sizing up would fix the problem. Busty ladies beware!
A little big on top but nothing a little fashion tape can't fix!

I rented this for my baby shower. The wrap is perfect to go over your bump! I felt so feminine and beautiful without wearing a traditional maternity dress. I'm 27 weeks and the large was a little big. Pre pregnancy I usually wore a 6, I think I could have worn a medium. I did need to use fashion tape to hold the neckline in place, but that could have been because it was just so slightly big on me.

I ended up wearing the back-up size, LR, because it provided better chest coverage. I used a little bit of tape to keep it from showing too much cleavage and a safety pin. I wore a flesh colored bra and the ruffled arm covered parts of the bra that was showing. I have a 4 month old and am nursing and this was the perfect dress to look stylish in and still be able to feed the baby with ease. I brought extra dress tape. It fit decent in the body but with a little sag in the lower back bc it was a little bigger than my normal size. The sag was barely noticeable. If I had worn a MR, I would have been fidgeting with the chest coverage all night. I would recommend busty ladies and nursing moms to go up one size. I received a lot of compliments all night. It was a very comfortable, and perfect for the hottest day of July whimsical summer wedding dress.

This dress has...many issues. Since it's a wrap dress it can/does shift depending on how you tie it. My boyfriend called it the puzzle dress because every time I put it on, it was like trying to do a puzzle to assemble it to fit properly - all in the chest and arms area. Beautiful pattern but the fit is all off.

I rented this dress for a baby shower and while it was perfect for the occasion, it's not my favorite rental. The print is pretty for a daytime event, but the material looks kind of cheap. The fit was also off a bit. Runs quite large for wrap dress and required pinning on top so it doesn't gape open.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a bridal tea party
links_reviews_text: Fit was as expected so flattering. I received so many compliments! I even considered buying.

links_reviews_title: Simply beautiful color and unique styling.
links_reviews_text: The color is what drew me to this dress, and it didn't disappoint. I'm petite, so I had to make several temporary adjustments to get the fit right. It has unique asymmetrical styling and I loved the fluttery details.

Wore this for a luau themed party. Would be a great graduation/wedding shower/brunch dress. Can be worn with a regular or strapless bra. Comfortable and great length. I used a safety pin to secure the top.

I wore this dress to our friend's wedding in late March. This dress runs true to size. I did originally order the large, and the medium as my back-up. The large was wayyy too big, the medium was a much better fit. What I liked most about this dress was that you could adjust the waist to fit comfortably, because it is a wrap dress. I did need to use a couple of safety pins to secure the front part of the dress so that my bra was not completely exposed. I thought the length was perfect, fun, and flattering. The material was comfortable in 60-70 degree weather. However, for warmer temperatures one might sweat more than they would like in this dress. I received so many complements in this dress and would reorder it again in a heartbeat.
I rented this for my Hawaii honeymoon. I wore to two different dinners. I got lots of compliments. It felt very secure and had full coverage, particularly for a wrap dress. I loved the length

links_reviews_title: Rented for bridal shower. Tricky to put on but fit well... just couldn’t figure out the strings. It
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments but the top part fit me funny.

links_reviews_title: Feminine, floral, and flattering blue birthday brunch dress!
links_reviews_text: Overall the dress was beautiful and flattered my shape. I’m 5’2 and the dress was a little long on my torso. I had to pin the strap and wear a Bralette underneath to not show too much. Will definitely be trying to wrap dress style more often!

A bit of a strange fitting wrap dress, lower arm holes made the fit a bit strange and couldn't wear a bra. The wrap was flattering at the waist and a great length for a taller girl. Overall feminine, pretty, and well made.

links_reviews_title: Cute Dress But Sideboob Problem is Real
links_reviews_text: Many reviewers have mentioned the strange cut along the side, a little flappy and side boob revealing. It's true. I was lucky enough to find the right tie up equation and was able to wear a pretty normal strapless bra with it. Thought I'd get more compliments but maybe my friends are just jerks. I felt good in it so poo! Perfect garden wedding guest dress

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and an easy dress for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: My only con for this dress is i have a short torso so the strap that you couldn't adjust was a little loose. Other than that great fit super comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely stunning dress!! Rent it now!
links_reviews_text: I rented this to wear to Jazz Brunch at Commander's Palace in NOLA and I am absolutely in love with this dress. I had to google how to tie a wrap dress but it was pretty simple to tie once I figured it out. I would definitely suggest keeping some safety pins around for the cleavage area. Also practice tying it before your event so you have a plan. I got so many compliments from everyone and my date was pretty happy with it too! I will 100% rent this again.

This dress is so soft and beautiful. It does run large and the bust is VERY revealing. I was able to pin it and it fit perfectly. Because of the ruffles you could not see the pins. The dress was super comfortable and I was able to wear it without a bra. I felt so feminine and was receiving compliments all night long.
It's a bit low cut for busty ladies.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for a day at church.
links_reviews_text: The fit was almost true to size but like many other testimonies, the top was awkward fitting. I had to use fashion tape to control it from moving. The cut of the body was awkward as well, I had to be mindful the dress did not blow open in the wind.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a Hawaiian wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress makes you feel beautiful and the pastel colors are just stunning! I liked that it was a bit longer than just a midi on my short frame, and that because it was a wrap dress, it was adjustable. It didn't quite fit perfectly, as the front was a bit low cut (I had to pin it) and when I cinched the waist, the right arm hole kept being pulled, revealing my bra. I found a good medium, but still felt a bit self-conscious. I don't think the flaws are obvious, which is why I still really enjoyed the dress for the occasion, but will probably think twice before renting again.
Loved this flowing dress although the chest area was a bit big on my small chest. Overall it was a great rental !
I love this dress so much omg I don't want to return it. It's making me want to go outside for no reason
Lovely dress making you feel oh so pretty, and it fits nicely. Probably not recommended for anyone with bust size above B. Really feeling the flowy, girly prints of Yumi Kim.

This dress was beautiful especially for summer. The color scheme was perfect and I loved the flow I was. I didn't feel as secure with it literally being a wrap dress without a zipper, though, in it. And the reviews were right about the arm area. Cut way too big where my bra would show- I had to pin it to my bra and it didn't fully help. Good thing for long hair.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a friend's bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: Practice putting this dress on before the event - wrap dresses are very tricky! Tried on the large in store which fit but was very open on the chest, ended up wearing the XLR. Loved this and already ordered it for another bridal party later this summer. I definitely needed an undershirt/bandeau. Ended up safety pinning the dress to make it more appropriate. Great dress for an hourglass figure, and with an undershirt for someone with a large bust as well.
Even though this is a flower dress, I felt like it was still sexy. There was a split in the front and a little Side cleavage on the side. It was almost like a naughty Easter dress
Hard to get the wrap to sit right but very flowy and perfect for a bridal shower
I wear the dress for everyday outgoing dress. The dress is light and comfy. I wear size 4 and it still plenty of room to fit my body. I am 5' 6" and 135 lbs.
Kinda want as flattering as I hoped, probably because it was too big
was a bit large for me, in a size medium.

links_reviews_title: It worked out great for the wedding.
links_reviews_text: The fit was nice. I didn't wear the sleeves and that worked out fine as well!

Not a great fit for me, but such a romantic lovely dress. Wore it on my anniversary. I have a very short torso and the distance from my neck to my bust is extremely short. So, for me, my entire bra was exposed unless I wore with a tank which somewhat took away from the pretty one-shouldered effect. If you have a nice long collar-bone area, I don't imagine it would be a problem.
The dress was beautiful, so flattering! I had to secure it at the bust because I'm a 36D and I wanted to look classy but other than that, zero complaints. Would totally rent again!
This dress was so pretty but ran large. I normally always have to size up, but this was too big in the bust area. It was gaping, and I couldn't figure out how to pin it without it being noticeable.
Con for a petite body type as I am 5'2" and the string is not short enough. The side that hangs over your shoulder is too long and my bra ended up showing all night.

links_reviews_title: Its a beautiful and pattern and color. I received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this dress except that I have a full breast and felt like I was falling out of it. I had to use a lot of fashion tape to prevent a wardrobe malfunction!

This was an overall great dress, light and easy to move and dance in but the straps and chest of the dress fell a bit oddly to the point where you definitely need double sided tape to prevent anything from.. slipping, especially around the underarm/chest area. I have a pretty small chest and when I sat down the dress would gape and so I had to make sure everything was pulled very tightly, to the point where it was a little uncomfortable. That being said the wrap component did accentuate my waist and curves which was a plus.
This dress was wayyy too big. Wanted to love it. Too bad.

I originally ordered this for an engagement party. The wrap takes some skill to get it to sit well. The dress actually looks pretty good on for my body type. I did not wear because it felt like it would be better suited at a resort or tropical destination. It just didn't seem dressy enough to wear for a cocktail party.

I wore this to a black tie event, and was a little worried that I would be underdressed when I first received the dress. But once it was on, paired with sparkly accessories and red lipstick, it was perfect! I was able to dance, drink and eat comfortably in this dress - and with the sleeves, it was warm enough to go coatless on a December evening in Chicago!

This dress is amazing! I wore the size 4 because it gave me more shoulder movement without sacrificing the fit of the dress. I am tall (5'10"ish) and it was a little short, but I felt comfortable just wearing boy short undies. The dress being a short shift style dress is what made it sexy! The lace was comfortable and even the high neck was comfortable. I am looking forward to renting this dress again. I LOVED it!

This dress was perfect for our rooftop date! It was sexy without being too showy and it was super comfortable. I loved the long sleeves but didn't feel restricted at all and the ruffle detail was precious! Highly recommend, I wish I could have kept it!
Super cute and comfortable! Had to size up from regular size and was glad I did since the dress is very short. Wish it was a little longer but got a lot of compliments!

I'm 5-9, 145, and ordered the 8 and 10, ended up wearing the 8. I was worried the dress could be short on me but it truly went right to the edge of my fingertips and was completely fine. The dress is excellent quality and I received lots of compliments. Thanks RTR! I'll be a return customer for sure!

Beautiful dress. I love the fabric and interesting details. A little difficult to raise your arms, but otherwise comfortable. Best to wear a strapless bra with this dress, as any straps worn underneath will show. Sleeves were a bit long, but easily fold over. Even though I'm 5'3", the length was a little on the short side for my taste. Easily fixed with leggings or black tights. Overall loved the dress!
Runs small, and the sleeves were itchy

links_reviews_title: Unique, easy to wear for most any occasion
links_reviews_text: Wore this for New Year's Eve and Loved this dress!! Usually between a size 10 and 12 and both sizes worked for me- ended up going with the 12 as it was a little longer and forgiving in the belly area (not a lot of stretch). Loved the sleeves, still a little sexy while also being a bit more modest. Think this dress would honestly work for any body type!!

links_reviews_title: Cute, but be wary of the arms!
links_reviews_text: I wore this super cute dress to my work holiday party, and after reading the reviews I decided to get the 0 which is my true size. I would say this dress runs a little on the smaller side, just because the arms were tight and the bands that runs over the shoulders was also a bit restricting for lifting my arms. It was a nice length, not too short but didn’t make me look Amish. Would definitely recommend but maybe get 2 sizes or size up just in case!

links_reviews_title: Fun little black dress for a party.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a size 10 which is my normal dress size and the fit was definitely a bit snug. The dress was short as is and just kept riding up even more. I was not looking forward to having to fix my dress every 5 minutes. Thank goodness for the the free backup because the size 12 fit perfectly. The ruffles around the shoulders for sure made it hard to lift my arms as its very tight all the way around, not made for raising your hands so don't try it unless you want your dress to go all the way up. At the end of the day I was satisfied but probably wouldn't wear it again.
Fits true to size.

Loved this dress. It's well made and a great design. It does run short so if that's a concern for you...beware. I'm 5'4" and it was super mini length. I threw on a pair of over-the-knee boots and went with it.
Very cute. My only complaint was that it's rather short and kept pulling up. Looked great with black tights and knee-high boots.

I wore this for a walking drinks and appetizer tour of my city. It added a nice layer of warmth, as it was in the 50s that night. The dress was comfortable, and didn't hike up when walking around or seated. The shoulder area is not lace, but more of a crocheted-esque make up. I don't think I'd wear it again, as it cloaked my curves instead of contouring them, but I'm happy I gave this lovely take on a LBD a shot.

The only downside of this is that it is a little short, but otherwise it is so cute and comfortable. I got a ton of compliments on this at the wedding I went to. I have a pretty curvy shape and this was flattering and hit me in all the right places.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this gorgeous dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress is simple, yet totally gorgeous. The material is extremely high quality and it shows! The only downside to the dress was the sleeves were a bit hard to get on, but once they were on it was super comfortable. It fit perfectly and wasn't too tight or too loose anywhere. Would definitely recommend for any petite ladies who are looking for a cute dress. It wont let me add the about you info so-- Height: 5'3" Weight: 105 Body Type: Petite Bust Size: 32B
Perfect for cocktail party, fits great and the lace is a perfect flair to spice this dress up. Doesn't hug any curves, hangs perfectly.
Ordered the 4 and 6 and ended up wearing the 6 due to the sleeve area. I would not have been able to fully lift my arms in the 4. Great option for a winter holiday party!
This dress was a hit. The lace is amazing and very good quality. The ONLY con is that the band that goes around your shoulders isn't elastic so makes it a bit hard to move in.

Absolutely loved this dress and received many compliments. The top runs a little small. I am usually a size 6 and it fit me, but I opted to wear the 8 as it felt a little bit more comfortable. Would definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: I received lots of complimente dress, both at the event and on social
links_reviews_text: The sleeve was a smidge short for my long arms, the back of the dress was a little short but if worn with stockings it’s not a huge deal. I was originally concerned with the fit around the bust, based on other reviews but it wasn’t an issue at all. You can’t lift your arms too much in this dress, so if you’ll be dancing a lot it may not be the best choice. And have your husband on hand to help you get your coat on. Lol
True to size through hips but design of too makes it tichr on arms and chest. Woukd rent again!

links_reviews_title: Such a cute dress. I received so many compliments and wish it was in my closet rotation
links_reviews_text: Hard to lift your arms up but it's so cute it didn't matter.

links_reviews_title: This dress was stunning and fit beautifully!! Highly recommend.
links_reviews_text: Perfect!

Loved this dress Received compliments throughout the night. I Wore this dress to my husband's award banquet. I rented a size 8 & 6 they both fit fine but i chose to wear the 8 because it had a little more room and I knew I would be sitting most of the night. The sleeves are tight and you can't raise your arms very high but overall the dress was fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: Would rent it again for sure!
links_reviews_text: Runs a little small so was happy i rented size 8. Very classy dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress was AMAZING. So beautiful. I received SO many compliments on this dress. Would rent again
links_reviews_text: I went with the size 8 just because the arms were a little bit restrictive and I did not want to tear anything. I am about 135-140 lbs, 5'5.

links_reviews_title: this dress runs true to size but a bit short.
links_reviews_text: I just had a baby 4 months prior so I ordered up. I'm usually a 6 through my hips and a 2-4 in my waist. The 6 fit me, but as stated, is a bit short, and snug through the shoulder detail. I wore the 8 so I could dance around without the dress riding up, and to be more comfortable in my new-mom body. I felt great in this dress and would order it again.

This dress was cute and different which was nice but it was a little restricting at the arms/shoulders. When you lift up your arms, the whole dress will follow and it's already pretty short which makes it a little challenging to do anything in it. The material on the arms is also a little itchy. I️ would definitely size up. I️ normally wear a size 2, I️ rented a 4 and it just fit. Overall, it was a very cute dress, just not my favorite.
Fun for a Fall date night in Vegas. I got several compliments from strangers throughout the night. Loved the detailed sleeves.

Super adorable dress. I felt like Tinsley the whole night. The arms are not restricting or super tight but the length is very short. Couldn't bend over at all. I'm 5'6". Hips and chest were very true to size.

I loved this dress for a fall wedding. It fit great and was in perfect condition. It was my first rental and I was super happy with it! Only downside - the arms a little restrictive, they weren't tight but couldn't raise my arms up much!
Loved the sleeves and neck line. This dress was fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: So cute, unique, stand out LBD! Wore to a SYTYCD meet and greet. Compliment all night.
links_reviews_text: The fit definitely runs small and it's tight in the shoulders but still an amazing dress. I usually wear a 2 or a 4. I wore the 4 and it worked but if it were any shorter, it wouldn't be appropriate. Size up and you will consider buying the dress. #Adorable #unique #veryflattering

links_reviews_title: Cute spin on the little black dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was super cute. I wore it to an engagement party end of September. The fabric was thick and the top was more crochet than lace. It fit great and was comfortable to move around it but don't expect to raise up your arms above your head! I'd rent again for sure!
Received lots of compliments and very classy dress that fits comfy! Will rent again picked a size 10 probably could have gotten a size smaller but it didn't look bad at all. Usually a size 8

links_reviews_title: It was very comfortable yet stylish
links_reviews_text: I received many compliments on this dress!
I received so many compliments on this dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a bachelorette weekend in Chicago, I ended up renting a few but loved this one
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little snug but I feel it's probably because (I assume) they dry clean the dresses afterwards. I am usually a 10 and had to wear the 12 due to this problem. Otherwise, I would say it usually fits TTS? I received a lot of compliments on the dress that night, everyone loved the lace top. It's a little hard to lift your arms because of the ruffle band across the shoulders, but it wasn't that big of an issue. Overall, the dress was a success and was the perfect lbd dress for a bachelorette weekend.

links_reviews_title: The dress made me a stand-out!
links_reviews_text: The dress was shorter than I'd prefer, but the lace was so busy (in a good way) that I didn't mind. I felt like a stand-out at the party and received tons of compliments.
I wore this to a fundraising gala and was very happy with it. I wore a sticky bra with it.

links_reviews_title: Pretty blue dress perfect for MOH at a bridal shower
links_reviews_text: The dress is a gorgeous blue. It is low cut in front but remains demure with the overlay. I was completely secure without a bra. The hemline hit right at the knee and I felt comfortable sitting, bending over for gifts etc. The only reason for 4 stars is the ribbon waistband hit my long torso at the ribs and felt a little constricting after a long bridal shower.

I rented this for a wedding last minute because another style was out of stock. I loved it more than the 2 other dresses I ordered! Got so many compliments on the style and color. Was perfect for a summer wedding by the lake.

links_reviews_title: Very cute color, stood out for sure.
links_reviews_text: Ran small so I was a medium, not a small (5‘7“ and 137 lbs). I was able to wear a deep v bra and was super comfortable all night. Loved it!
Rented this dress for a wedding rehearsal dinner! Everybody LOVED the color and style! So many people kept complimenting me! Casual yet elegant!
Absolutely loved this dress. If it wasn't such a bold and memorable color I would totally buy!! The ribbon detail did look slightly worn.

links_reviews_title: Perfect pop of color! Sexy and classy
links_reviews_text: So cute! I received tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, got compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: Snug around the rib cage, a little more cleavage than I anticipated so be prepared for that, but I loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and great fit! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This was my backup dress but I loved it so much that I chose to wear this instead of my original choice! This dress fit perfectly true to size. It was so flattering and accentuated all of the right places. The top fit well - I didn't even need to wear a bra because the fabric was thick enough and supportive (for a 34B). The color is beautiful and eye catching. I would definitely recommend this for a spring/summer wedding!
Such a fun dress! The color was even prettier in person, and it fit perfectly. I rented it for a wedding and got so many compliments!!!

links_reviews_title: Multiple compliments, fun dress, beautiful color
links_reviews_text: This dress is fabulous! It was fun to wear and strangers complimented me on the dress all day. The color looked different to me in person, but it was a much more bright, vibrant blue. The band around the middle has no give so might want to order a back up, larger size just in case. The low cut on top was sexy but tasteful. Overall, the dress is unique and has quality fabric. I wore it to a matinee musical.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. I like to wear clothes that hide my tummy, and that make me look good too.
links_reviews_text: Great fit
The cut and color are so flattering. The blue is even brighter in person! The neckline was slightly too much for my taste (as a DD) but it still looked great!

I ordered the dress in a medium and a large but chose to wear the large because it was more comfortable. I had to add a belt because the grosgrain ribbon at the waist didn't accentuate my waist enough to make it flattering. It had a nice amount of room at the hips. I got a lot of compliments. I liked it but it wasn't my favorite.
The dress fit pretty spot on. Just had a used feel, the lace fabric just wasn't right.
The dress fit perfectly and was so comfortable! I got so many compliments on the dress and the color all night. Would definitely recommend to anyone who is considering this option!
The color was fantastic, very classy I really absolutely loved it. For me, RTR never disappoints!
Fit like a glove. This is my first RTR purchase and I am very pleased! Great for smaller chested girls with wider hips.

This dress was bright and I definitely stood out in a good way! I got so many compliments on this dress. It was very comfortable and flowy. The only two things that were bad is that I got caught on anyone's jewelry when I hugged them and you have to be careful about the bra you wear since the front is low cut.

Kind of an awkward picture but. I did not like anything about his dress other than the color. The shoulders were tight and restricting to move. The lining under the knit material didn't hang the same so it would bunch in odd places. The v neck is a little deeper than I expected so I couldn't wear a bra, however it's lined nicely that it was no concern.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color! Was just what I wanted!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the large and the extra large, the large didn't have a chance of fitting. It did take two people to zip me in, not because of fit but the zipper had a hard time going past the ribbon band. It was comfortably snug everywhere, a little tighter on my arms but they are somewhat muscular. The color was really pretty and looked great on me.

links_reviews_title: Able to dance the night away!!!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to a wedding in Florida. It was the perfect for a semi formal wedding in the hot summer. The color was great, comfortable enough to dance in and I received so many compliments. Only thing I didn’t care for was the ribbon on the waist line. It looked a little “worn” but nonetheless it was a nice dress for a great price!!

links_reviews_title: This dress is so comfortable. Loved It!
links_reviews_text: I am a size size 6 and the medium fit perfectly. I have brand shoulders and it did not feel tight across the shoulders at all. I am also smaller chested and wore a nave front closure racerback bra. It was not noticeable. I wish I had thought to take a better picture. You put this dress on and don't have to think about it or worry about anything.

Worn to an upscale engagement party. Got lots of compliments on the color and fit. I sized yo for a little extra room in the hips and bust. I wore a regular bra, but the straps don't stay in line. To avoid having my chest on display all night, I wore a nude bandeau underneath without issue. Great dress and I recommend it.

This dress was beautiful! Such a great color and really flattering. However it ran small, so I definitely suggest sizing up. Also, the zipper didn't really work well; it kept getting stuck, which was super annoying.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a bright, summery wedding
links_reviews_text: The fit, fabric, and color were all great. I absolutely loved it.

Fit pretty true to size! I went with the M to tighten up the top so I could go braless. Wore for husbands Work cocktail party. There's a little cleavage but with the higher lace neckline, it made it very classy and Work party appropriate. The dress was perfect for the occasion! Also, it is a beautiful shade of blue!

links_reviews_title: Fun, light dress perfect for an outdoor summer day wedding
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and great length. Don't have a big chest so was a little big in this area but still fit well and would rent again

Love the color of this dress. The XS fit me the best in the natural waist but I couldn't move my arms so I ended up going with the Small. No bra needed in my case and still felt comfortable even though it is pretty low cut.

I had a friend wear this same dress to an event and I fell in love. She said she ordered the Large. I figured she is bustier than me but I have a bigger mid section the Large or Xl would work. I wore the xl and my boobs were on display! That was my only issue with the dress. Definitely need a nude strapless bra or go bra less

links_reviews_title: This is a gorgeous dress! I received so many compliments about the cut and color. Would rent again!
links_reviews_text: Fit: perhaps runs small. I’m an 8/10 and decided to wear the large to have a little breathing room. Pros: Beautiful, rich blue color, draped well over my curves, knee length for me at 5’5”, comfortable for an indoor event, just enough cleavage - being small chested Cons: Fabric might be a little heavy for a hot, outdoor event. I live in FL so I’m always running hot. No cons really.

links_reviews_title: Even with a big butt like mine, I was able to dance the night away and feel beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Great for A- lined shaped figures #springsoiree
I rented this for Easter. The color was far brighter (electric) than anticipated. The lace material was also uncomfortable. My husband was very complimentary, but I wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great dress with plunging neckline but element of modesty with lace-like overlay
links_reviews_text: The dress was great! My husband loved it. It does not have any give/stretch, so definitely need to be aware of that, I would order up a size for back-up. I wore a nude racer back bra with this and it was perfect. I'm 5' 4'' and about 145 lbs. I wore a medium but it was a little snug - spanx did the trick :). Zipper was a little difficult, but I would definitely rent this again for a daytime event.

links_reviews_title: This was a hit for an outdoor, backyard wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove! This was actually my "back-up" dress but I loved it so much that I ended up wearing it instead. It runs true to size and the color is absolutely stunning. I would highly recommend!
I loved this dress so much! The blue was vibrant, the overall fit was comfortable and the look was classic. Such a simple and beautiful dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress was a beautiful color and earned me many compliments
links_reviews_text: I ordered this as my backup dress, but I ended up wearing it as the main event! Bra-wise, I wore some pasties, but a really low-cut bra my work here also. The arm movement was a little limited, but nothing I couldn't work with on the dance floor. When I told people it was a rental, they told me I should keep it! I'm a very big fan of this style, and I highly recommend it.

Great length, which is nice as I'm always concerned dresses will be too short. Loved the color and got lots of compliments, as the majority of the women wore black. The top was a bit loose, but I am small-chested. A racerback bra with a deep plunge worked well.

No bra needed. Wore the smaller size because it made my boobs look less saggy. Nice length for a daytime party. The color is a bright blueish teal. I had a hard time with shoes because i wanted to be able to set up decoratins and focus on hosting. I ended up wearing dark camel colored ballet flats.

links_reviews_title: Great dress- but tight in the shoulders for me.
links_reviews_text: Get the back up size if you have broad shoulders! Pretty color and beautiful quality!
The dress was very feminine, but the waistband area protruded in a way that made me look like I had a major roll in my stomach area. I should have sized up.
The fit on this dress was true to size. It was Floweli and pretty. Perfect for work or a after work party.
The layering of fabric created a light and airy feel, while the red pattern bounced it up a bit. Compliments!

I was a little skeptical due to reviews, but I loved this dress. Lovely fit, and I loved the back cape. Also made a delightful swoosh feel when you walk when your hands catch the light fabric. Beautiful.

This is a stunning dress--good for work but could also be dressed up for a shower or even casual wedding. the print is beautiful, the drape is lovely. I'm generally a size 12, pear shaped but sized down to an 8 since it is flowy on bottom. A little snug on the waist but looked and felt great.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a daywear dresscode auction. It looked great.
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little tight. I required help getting it zipped and unzipped. I normally wear a size 10 but the 12 just barely fit.

I really loved the idea of this dress. It has a cool cape-like back and the print and color are fabulous. I did not wear this dress though because the bodice has to different sets of seams that were really unflattering on me. It was like an empire waist and then another seam at my natural waist. The fabric between the two bunched up and didn't looks great. If you have a long torso this dress would probably be a home run.
The XS was way too small and I ended up wearing the backup S size. Even then, it was still a pain trying to get it on because the chest area is tight. But once it was on, it flowed beautifully.
This top is sexy yet covers imperfections well. Loved it!!
Ended up wearing the Medium because the Small was too tight around my chest (32DD). Comfy and cute for a casual outfit or a night out!
Absolutely loved the way it looked and it fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Fun trendy red top but very tight on chest
links_reviews_text: I'm a 34d and found this top to be tight in the chest area
I went with XS since it was strapless and thought it fit great. Never had to mess with tugging or pulling it up, flowy easy fit and great color - Will probably end up buying, definitely recommend!

I love this shirt from Amanda Uprichard! Running true to size with a little stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this shirt so you should wear nubra or no bra since it is strapless. Pair with nude or black heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

I love this feminine top by Amanda Uprichard! Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose going down. It works best for A-C cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this top so you should wear a strapless bra since it is a strapless style top. I loved the unique asymmetrical cut of this top. Pair with simple bottoms and a necklace to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: Lovely top but slides down so get a smaller size. I wore a T underneath to keep it PG
links_reviews_text: Adding pics
East top to wear out for a casual do or dress it up for a date night or girls night.
Very tight on the chest, I would size up

links_reviews_title: cute but too small in the chest
links_reviews_text: too small in the chest

I rented this for the 4th and I love it! It can be dressed up or down. It's simple but a beautiful red(red shades can be iffy). I am so surprised by how much I love this blouse. I considered buying it but it's red and definitely noticeable so I wouldn't be able to wear it often.
Not your typical red top, much cuter! Very flattering and is more of a statement top the back of the shirt longer than the front. I wore this with black leather jeans, black heels, and gold jewelry.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on the fit and color!
links_reviews_text: Slightly small in the chest! Probably could have sized up.

links_reviews_title: It didn't fit. I couldn't wear it
links_reviews_text: To small
I didn't wear it because it draped a little big in the back and side, even though the top fit well. I think with a side zipper, it would fit better and be easier to get on and off.

links_reviews_title: Sad! Could not wear, had to purchase another outfit!
links_reviews_text: Very small! I'm usually a med-lrg too, this fit around breast's like a small. Beautiful top for somebody with smaller breasts.

links_reviews_title: Could have been super cute. TOOO small
links_reviews_text: i had planned to wear with jeans. It looked like it would fit, but when I went to pull it down, it got stuck and I actually had to cut it to get it off. My suggestion- order two sizes up from your size and if you are regular-larger boobs maybe more.
Runs very small. I wear a size 6, but I could not pull it up.

links_reviews_title: Runs too small, couldn't even get it on.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful top but it runs SUPER small. Size up two sizes at least. I'm typically a Medium and I couldn't even get the Medium on because it was too small.
very tight in the bust
So sad I really wanted to love this top. The band that holds it up is too snug to be flattering. Really unfortunate and couldn't wear
I didn't wear it because it didn't fit right. Cute but too small

I loved this dress; very flattering! I did find myself upsizing by one size… And the sleeves were then too long, so I simply rolled them up. It was a little too low-cut for my taste, but otherwise was really beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Stunning fit and fabric, perfect in every way!
links_reviews_text: Every review promised a form fitting yet comfy dress and this is an incredibly accurate fact! It's amazing how well this dress accentuates you're curves white puffing out from your stomach and hips to create a flattering profile that doesn't feel restricting . I was mildly surprised by how tight the boob area was and enjoyed the look that much more so . My only complaint is perhaps wear a slip if you're conscious of underwear lines showing
Many compliments. Beautiful dress. However, the ruching likes to get sideways... I felt I was straightening all evening.
I loved this dress! It was stunning and elegant. I received compliments all night. It fits true to size and is comfortable.
Fantastic fit. Loved it so much. Was a perfect fit!
Rented this for a Christmas formal, I'm 5'6", 125lbs. I normally wear a 2, but sized up to accommodate D cup. Very comfortable dress!

This dress was stunning and surprisingly so comfortable. It was like a silky robe. The only thing is that the sleeves are really long (a few inches past my wrists) and the shoulder ruffle is MUCH more pronounced than in the stock photo. I would have worn this if the sleeves were less aggressive!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect. Fit like a glove. True to size.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a date night with my husband to a nice restaurant and Broadway show. Lots of compliments and was super comfy too. I highly recommend. :)

I rented this for my husband's work holiday party. I wanted to stand out without looking over done and this dress was perfect. I am between a 4 and a 6 and sized up because of my D cup, dress skimmed beautifully. Extremely comfortable. Only negative is that the lining kept showing and in certain areas the fabric was already pilling.

links_reviews_title: Too much fabric, did not wear
links_reviews_text: Fabric is beautiful and fit pretty well, however it was as if there was too much fabric and was slightly large in the top. Normally I think gathers can be very flattering however in this case I felt it made me look extra bulky. Did not wear.

links_reviews_title: Perfect summer romper if sized right
links_reviews_text: This was a very comfortable romper but I wish I would have had a backless bra or rented a smaller size. I went large because rompers often don't fit me well in the torso, but the low cut front hung just a little too low and a tighter fit would have been more flattering on me. Also beware of tan lines.
I wish that I could have worn this! It was so comfortable, and I felt the top was very flattering. However, at 4'11", I was too short, even in heels.

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit is super cute - got tons of compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: I have a long torso and small waist, so while the large was a better length and more comfortable on my stomach and chest, I went with the medium because it was tighter on my waist/more flattering. The medium was a bit short in the torso, but with spanx it worked OK. Only problem with spanx is the back is very low, so I had to roll them down. Overall super happy with this rental, though!
Wore this to an adults only party and successfully showed off the girls. Had to pin it in the back so I could wear a bra without my bra strap showing. Fun to wear for the night.
Just loved this jumpsuit. It was flattering & comfortable.
So comfortable, could have worn with flats or heals, flattering and fun. I got SO MANY compliments, even days later. Need a little fashion tape in the front but that's easy!
#MerrieMonarchDatsWhy2019

links_reviews_title: This was very cute and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This was very cute and comfortable. It was low cut but was flattering!
Super cute, vet flattering. I am 5'3" and this was fine with a 3" wedge sandal. Definitely will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Super cute and relaxed with a bit of flare!
links_reviews_text: A LITTLE bit short in the torso for me at 5'10" but not enough to not wear. Relaxed and light, comfortable. Cute print and love the open back! Wore with some flat, strappy neutral sandals. You could easily wear with Birkenstock's or sneakers.
Pattern isn't my favorite but I love the cut so much that I'm excited to wear it - fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and fit the short girl
links_reviews_text: This was my first jumpsuit and I adored it!!! Until i had to go to the bathroom.... lol!!! It fit perfectly and was super comfortable. I am jumpsuit addicted now. If only they would make them with snaps in the crotch.

I love this feminine jumpsuit by Cleobella! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted at the natural waist and fitted at the hips. Curvier women should consider going up a size. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a strapless bra with this jumpsuit. At 5’3, the length hits floor length on me. The fabric is very cool and would be great for Spring and Summer.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Exactly what I wanted or a chilly Fall Wedding.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5' 7" and 140, and a small fit me like a glove. Easy on and off, and lots of cleavage if you don't rock a tank underneath. I went to a family wedding, so I decided to cover up slightly with a tank, however I would've been happy to rock open front/back with some fashion tape for any other occasion. Light fabric but it was nice to have my legs covered in 50 degree weather. I'm not sure how someone would wear a bra, so being a DD woman, be considerate of this.
Needed spanx for my tummy and a bandeau bra since so low cut. Felt cute, got compliments.
This was nice but was constantly worried about the girls popping out.
I am too short for it.
The straps are held up by a strap that ties around the back. Due to this this and the need for fashion tape, it is inconvenient to take off to use the restroom.
Fits true to size

links_reviews_title: Wore for a night out at the beach
links_reviews_text: The small was only a bit long on me and I really loved the cut of this jumpsuit! Super comfortable.
A little big and wish it came shorter but looks great.
Needed a special bra or the back of your bra shows
This is so cute and comfortable. I love the back detail but it runs large so size down
Runs large.

I liked it and actually wore it twice because I packed for a 2 week vacation, but the fit didn't feel particularly flattering. The waist wasn't fitted at all so it just kind of hung on me. It worked for dinners out but I wouldn't rent for a special event.
This jumpsuit is so cute but it was way too big. I'm normally a small, and the small was hanging off of me. Sadly it didn't work out

I went into ordering this jumper with low expectations due to my experience with jumpers as a hit or miss. It can be hard finding one depending on the location of the waste and the structure of your body (longer on the legs and shorter on the torso). However, this fit perfectly with more room to spare over my post-baby belly. I highly recommend and suggest a backless bra.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a Summer Kick off party! Was really cute and got tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: This was super comfy and perfect for a casual summer party! I got tons of compliments.
It was overall too large for me and I think the XS would still be too long for me at 5'2" - Neckline also way too low. If proportions are right, this is a really cute choice, just not for me.

links_reviews_title: Loved this. The low front and back helped keep the big floral print feeling modern
links_reviews_text: Really loved this, got so many compliments on it all night. The low cut front and back don't allow for a bra, but the ruffles along the front help keep it feeling not quite so revealing. I would definitely wear this again!

links_reviews_title: Wore to a bridal shower. Was comfortable and fun
links_reviews_text: Was too long and I was tripping over it a bit. I belted it and hiked up, which helped
I love this jumpsuit. I wore it on my vacation to New Orleans and not only got tons of compliments, but also it is great in hot weather. I would totally consider buying this!

links_reviews_title: It was SO comfortable, breathable and versatile!
links_reviews_text: Very easy and lightweight piece. Very versatile through day and night!

links_reviews_title: Not the best fit or fabric
links_reviews_text: Fit was a little odd, the waist gapped too much so there was very little defined shape. The fabric was okay, nothing special. Definitely can't wear a bra with this style with the plunging back and front.

links_reviews_title: Runs pretty big, but very beautiful
links_reviews_text: This was just too big on me. Very pretty jumpsuit. Will return for a medium.
Rented this for a party. The fit was perfect and the style fun (both back & front) but I just thought the pattern on the fabric made it look cheap. I didn't wear it.

Great light fabric -- doesn't show wrinkles. The tie at the top allows you to adjust the neckline a bit and for smaller chests (like me) can allow for a better fit. The fabric skims the curve of your back so beautifully and the ruffles accentuate your neckline and back. I did need to use a little bit of fashion tape to keep the neckline from opening too much and showing my nubra. Worn with 3+ inch wedges and the fabric was slightly off the ground.
Was disappointed in the fit of this jumpsuit. Was extremely short on me (I'm 5'7") and wasn't very flattering. I still wore it with sandals but wasn't feeling my best in it!

links_reviews_title: Bold print will stand out at any party!
links_reviews_text: This dress is more than meets the eye. The shine is subtle but the print is bold enough to make a statement!

First things first, this beautiful, comfy dress has pockets! A cute dress with pockets is like true love for me. This dress was so comfy and light. I wore it to a birthday dinner at Nobu in Beverly Hills. The front is designed so you don't have to wear a bra. The back doesn't really allow for one. The dress may look better with a belt around the waist. That area could have been a bit more fitted. My dress had the tags still on it. I'm contemplating keeping this dress. I got tons of compliments.

I rented this for everyday. The fit was great and flattering. The neck is cowl neck but you will not be able to see anything if you bend over because of the piece of material going across the chest. You may need help zipping this dress up. I am 5'3" and it was very long. I had to wear 5 inch heels to prevent the dress from dragging.

I'm 5'5'', ~38B and about 190 lbs, with most of it in my hips and this dress fit like a dream. The length was perfect to wear with flats, and it was unbelievably comfortable. I was shocked to realize it has POCKETS too! The fabric looks very silky in person. It was a very different style for me but I absolutely will rent again.
Fits great. Very comfortable
The cut of the dress and materials are amazing. I wish the discount was better on this dress to buy it. I loved it!!
Really liked this dress! Super comfortable and the ribbons below the collar was a cute touch!
Fit well but maybe not my style. Fun for something different at work

Super cute dress! I'd say it runs true to size but was a little forgiving for my holiday weight gain. Super chic but be careful w your shoes. Originally I planned to wear black booties but it seemed a little too mortishia Adams so I paired w a red heel. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: So nice, I rented it twice!
