links_reviews_text: This is an extremely flattering dress that is surprisingly comfortable. It is elegant without being stuffy. I received a ton of compliments the first time I rented it, so when I had an event come up the following weekend, I decided to rent it again, knowing I had a winner!
Tight on the top
Great!

links_reviews_title: The collar and "tie" detail plus the patterned fabric was great for a formal event.
links_reviews_text: I have an athletic build and the sleeveless dress fit my shoulders and arms perfectly. The waist gave me a great, elongated shape. Overall, this is a great dress if you need a comfortable, well fitting, formal dress for an (tall) athletic body.

links_reviews_title: It was really comfortable and modern with a twist. I loved it!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and easy to wear - could also work during the day but perfect for a cocktail party too. Fabric was very comfortable.
Runs TTS and is perfect for tall girls!

Loved this dress! Wore it to work and got lots of compliments. The textured fabric was beautiful and the high neck with a bow gave it a chic Wednesday Adams vibe (which might be my new daily inspo). I was worried it would be too fancy for work, but it was easy to dress down with some black boots.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but long and runs small in the chest
links_reviews_text: Pros: Pretty design Cute how Cons: Large bust size 2 up Length is long for midi

links_reviews_title: Tea length black dress for formal event
links_reviews_text: Fit was spot on. Dress was too somber for event so decided against wearing it.
Much more chic in person! Very slimming and the perfect dress for a cocktail winter event!!

links_reviews_title: I rented this as my backup for a black tie event, wore it when my 1st choice didn't work out.
links_reviews_text: This was my backup, and liked it way more than I expected. It was comfortable and just quirky enough that I didn't feel like I wear wearing the same thing as everyone else in the place. I was a bit worried about this fabric as someone with hips, but it was quite forgiving and flattering.

I rented this dress for a work option, and I wore it once. The collar and the waist made it almost feel uniform-y. Overall, it fit true to size and was a fun work option if you're in the mood to be a little experimental in the office.

links_reviews_title: fun dress for holiday weekend event
links_reviews_text: great fit..
Perfect for my student's music performances. Easy to run around with and looks great.
I liked the heavy fabric and preppy top. The dress worked for me.
Top area was too large on me, but I have a very small bust. Material felt rubbery and uncomfortable. Not for me.

links_reviews_title: Great dress with a lot of flow
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress for a photoshoot and loved how the flowing dress photographed. My bust is smaller than my lower half so the top was a little larger around my shoulder area (more loose fabric) but the wrap feature was great to hug the curves.
This dress made me feel so confident! I should have ordered a size down, but I pinned it in the back to make it fit better in the bust area. LOVED this dress!

OBSESSED with this dress! I was hesitant to rent a wrap dress, since they usually don't work for me, but I got so many compliments! This is very forgiving and "stayed put" lol I would highly recommend!
Good for someone a bit more top heavy. Nice fit. Comfortable. Dress up or down

This dress was extremely flattering, and I got compliments on it all night. It has a very whimsical feel, almost like a goddess dress, or something from lord of the Rings. I have a very large bust, and was concerned about this, but it has a small fasten which keeps it appropriate. Perfect for the holidays!

Since this is a wrap dress I was able to adjust it perfectly for me. I loved that it was flowy while still being sexy. The front clasp is worthless so make sure you have fashion tape if you don't want to show a ton of cleavage. Tons of compliments and the color is beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Attended a 007 James Bond themed party. Was going for Solitaire from Live and Let Die.
links_reviews_text: I went too big I ordered the 12 and 14 - I wore the 12 and had to do major pinning to keep the bodice together. Wish I had a petite- the dress was a little long from waist to the shoulder. I am 5’1”. The dress still worked I was going for a floaty 70’s look and I think it worked. I received lots of compliments even with my bouffant hair.

I loved this dress! It was flowy and forgiving so I could eat extra Christmas cookies. It cinches as the waist too!! It had a clasp over the décolletage so you can make it sexy or more coveted up!! Highly recommend, y'all.

I received multiple compliments thought the night while wearing this dress, and even son after I posted pics in it! Only reason why it didn't get 5 stars is due to the fact the top is hooked only by a thread and often opens throughout the night if you are moving too much and have a larger chest size. Overall great fit!

links_reviews_title: This dress is EVERYTHING! Glamorous Comfortable, Perfect!
links_reviews_text: The dress runs large size down. It was a little big on me in the chest but the wrap style with the really long belt will let you adjust to fit your body. Bathroom visits are tricky, because of all of the material and the lovely flowing sleeves. Honestly I just removed the dress to avoid any accidents. I wore a short bodysuit shaper( but you may not need it) . Perfect for summer, fall and spring, may be awkward because of the sleeves with a jacket or coat. It's so fantastic you don't want to cover it up anyway. Enjoy! Oh yes, so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for an engagement shoot and it’s a hardcore stunner.
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing my backup size, which is one size larger than my usual 12. I have a large bust and I felt there wasn’t enough coverage. Otherwise, it’s true to size. Several people told me I needed to own this dress. Wear a statement earring and, boom, you’ll definitely turn heads.
Fits very well. If you are busty, the clasp does come undone. Fits pretty true to size. A lot of fabric and a beautiful flow! Would totally rent this dress again if I needed to!!!

links_reviews_title: This is a GORGEOUS dress, really comfortable but super glam - got so many complements!
links_reviews_text: Fit as described, I'm busty so you could see the hook keeping the top together and I used a pin to make sure it didn't come open. Sleeves are pretty long, and length was not exactly floor length, kind of midi. More of a blue-red than an orange- red.

I have 34G breasts and this dress could not hold them. The clasp was very loose and showed. I had a minor crisis before our event and I ended up having to safety pin the dress. Nice for winter event. Lots of fabric. Paired it with an Ariana Grande half pony, gold shoes and glitter bag for a black tie award show. It was fine for event minus the malfunction. Would not wear again. The 8R fit me well otherwise. I'm 5'9" 160lbs.
Fit wonderfully but I would have liked to try a size down. It's a wrap dress and I tied it pretty tight to have the top fit better. Beautiful dress and received tons of compliments!
Ordered size 8 and great fit. Way low cut and a bit long

Love love love this dress, just rent it already. It's flowy and the material is stunning. It's a wrap dress and is incredibly flattering for anyone with curves. Or anyone really- it's that great. Non stop compliments! It was a little long, but fine with heels. I rented it for my holiday party, but I could see this being a fabulous dress year round.

If you are worried about ordering the wrong size in a dress, this one is very forgiving. It is a true wrap dress so can be pulled tighter or loosened up if needed. It was very flowy and comfortable and I received many compliments!! I am on the shorter side (5’3”) so heels were a must!
I Definitely stood out from all the black at the wedding I attended last nite, and received tons of compliments. I'm not full busted (32A) and the size 4R fit me perfectly.

Rented this for a murder mystery party i was hosting and it did not disappoint! The clasp across the chest left a small keyhole between the wrap but other than that, it was a perfect fit. Wish i needed a reason to keep this one!

links_reviews_title: So many complements on this dress!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress to wear to my husband’s work Christmas party. It was very comfortable to wear. The material was cool on my skin. I’m 5’3” so I had to wear it with heels and even then it was close to dragging the ground so I was careful to “carry it” while walking. Stylish and elegant with a flirty split.
This dress is just stunning. The low cut and slit are subtly sexy and this dress moves. I felt so glamorous. It's one of my favorite rentals ever!
The dress was absolutely perfect for a night at the ballet! It is beautiful and flowy and very comfortable. I would rent this again in a heartbeat!

I rented this for a fall wedding and couldn't be happier, the dress is very flowy and still very covered (witch it was great for the 60 degree weather), I've got tons of compliments. I'm very petite and usually wear small or extra small, the 0R fits perfectly, a little tight on the breast (I'm a 34C) but nothing to be worried about. Overall very satisfied with the looks and the fit of the dress, would highly recommend!
Loved it, so many compliments!
The flowy , long and comfortable . The bust area was a little tight but overall it still fit .

This is a bold red wrap dress with a lot of material. Long sleeves and length is also long - ok when I wore with heels. I wore with a tank top underneath as it was revealing. Good for a dramatic entrance!

I think I might have to buy it. 😍 I absolutely love it. Hubs and I have a fancy date night and I was kind of dreading how confined I sometimes feel wearing an evening dress. Not so much in this beauty. Flowy and downright perfect! Because it's a true wrap dress, I feel sure one size down would still fit great. I had it tightened all the way. Love, love, love.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Very good quality. Gorgeous color red. Loved how flowy and feminine it was.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. The pop of red mixed with the flowiness of the fabric made me feel beautiful. I received so many lovely compliments that evening. It was also very comfortable. The pictures online make it look shorter than it was. I’m 5’8” and it was floor length with my 2 or 2 1/2” heels. I would definitely recommend this dress.
Beautiful dress, but too much fabric for a petite frame in my opinion. Length was perfect! Received lots of compliments.

I rented this through Unlimited for a date night. I usually wearing a 4 but rented a 6R because I've gone up a bra size and was worried about it being too tight. I definitely should have rented the 4. It's long but would have been great with heels. (Im 5'3) I loved it, especially the sleeves, but it was a bit too much for the look I was going for. Would be perfect for a Christmas wedding or formal.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a James Bond themed party.
links_reviews_text: Material wasn't great and clasp wouldn't stay. The sleeves were too long and I felt a little foolish in it, but it did make for a great costume.

links_reviews_title: Took this to Vegas with me!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely ADORE this dress. You feel like a Goddess wearing it! The color and fit are so flattering and it's silky soft and flowy and pretty! I like how you can adjust the chest area for a more conservative neckline or a sexier plunging neckline. Truly a magnificent piece and I hope to wear it again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this fro my daughters debutante ball - it was comfortable,fun & sophisticated.
links_reviews_text: fit true to size.
Not for larger bust girls. Too much fabric everywhere and not enough room in the bust. Never worn sent right back.

links_reviews_title: This dress is a stunner and comfortable to wear if you have a smallish chest. It was too low ...
links_reviews_text: This dress is a stunner and comfortable to wear if you have a smallish chest. It was too low without a cami under it but still was beautiful.

links_reviews_title: If I could buy this dress, I would!
links_reviews_text: I have rented many dresses and outfits from RTR over the years, however this dress was my absolute favorite. While the 8 fit really well, it was smaller in the bust area, so I ended up wearing the 10 and cinching it tightly. I received numerous compliments on this dress and felt that it flattered my figure. I would definitely rent this again!!!

links_reviews_title: I've never received this many compliments on a dress before...ever!
links_reviews_text: A little low cut, but not terrible. The wrap style is extremely flattering!
This dress was so much fun to wear - flowy and very pretty! I had to pin the neck closed, because it otherwise was cut too low. The wrap makes it fit almost every body.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Elegant and flowy. Voted best dress of the evening by many!
links_reviews_text: Skipped the closure by the chest, seemed to be placed too high and created a funny gap. Used dress tape and secured it to bra, much better!
Loved this dress! Got so many compliments on it all night! It was really comfortable and fitted in all the right places! Would totally wear this again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Bond girl dress for a 007 NYE party
links_reviews_text: This dress was an absolute hit! Everyone absolutely loved it, and it fit like a glove. I felt gorgeous. It was very slimming. A little too long (I’m 5’4”) but was okay with some big heels. It’s unique and perfect. The only problem was the neck. I was sitting and standing a lot during the party, and the neck would slip up and start choking me. I had to adjust it frequently.
The front and side looked great but the back is very open and your back fat will show. I'm 5'9, 190lbs, size 12/14 pant, size L shirt, small boobs, big butt.

This was my first time getting from RTR and I'm so happy. The dress fit me like a glove and I got so many compliments. I got the long because the regular length wasn't available. It was a little long for me, but with heels worked fine.

First, the back of this dress is so sexy, and the slit is tasteful yet beautiful. I had strangers approach me and compliment it. But here's the kicker: It was incredible comfortable! Thick fabric fell perfectly over my body. Can't recommend enough.
I wish I could own this dress. It was amazing and I got so many compliments from people of all ages. It was gorgeous. I would definitely rent it again

links_reviews_title: I received a ton of compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress for really well over all. The back was a little loose and the fabric around the waist was also a little looser than I would have liked. I wore this dress for a murder mystery party.

links_reviews_title: I'm a returning customer because it doesn't get any easier than this!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so comfortable! The fabric has some stretch so its not cumbersome at all. I just love the back of the dress. I received many compliments!
Lots of compliments, esp on the back of the dress. Somewhat stretchy material allows you to move. I am 5'5" and it hit right at the ground with heels.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. Tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It was a little snug around the hips, but I was still able to move around and dance. You have to hike the skirt up a bit when you sit, or that high neckline pulls on your neck a bit, but it wasn't too much of an inconvenience. The material is thick which is really flattering, but it got VERY toasty outside for a June wedding. The way the slit appears in the photo, I was a little concerned it would show a lot of skin, but it really didn't. It was gorgeous and I would definitely rent it again!

This was very form fitting but comfortable & stretchy. The petite was a great length for me. Back bunched a bit but still looked good! Front slits are pretty high so make sure your shoes are a good match.
Ordered a size larger which was a good call!

I ordered the 0 and 2... Wore the 2. Best RTR dress ever! Wore this for a formal work event. It's sexy but appropriate and fit like a glove. I felt like a million bucks. I've rented many times and this is by far my favorite.
great fit! loved the dress

links_reviews_title: I wore this gown for a Mardi Gras ball
links_reviews_text: very comfortable, stretchy fabric, fit very well no need for alterations or hemming, beautiful gown, a little tight on the neck when I would sit down but not too bad. the length was great. I'm 5'3'' and weigh about 115, my bust is 32B, I'm an hourglass figure.

I rented this dress for my husband's black tie work gala. This dress was tight in all the right areas. I loved the back cut outs and because of straight across panel in the back I was able to wear a regular strapless bra. The neck was slightly snug while sitting but not too bad. I feel sexy and like a million bucks all night. I would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: The black material hugged all the right places!
links_reviews_text: The strappy back was the icing on the cake! I wore 4 in heels which top off the look and was perfect for the length of the dress. Despite the hugging nature of the dress it was very comfortable! Would def recommend!!

links_reviews_title: I felt amazing in this dress and walking down the street in Philly I caught A LOT of attention
links_reviews_text: A little snug but amazing

This was by far my favorite dress I've ever worn. I was so nervous it wouldn't work because it would show my back fat. Yes, it did show a little, but the dress itself was so stunning, that it was very easy to ignore. It fit like a glove. And it was so comfortable! It was the perfect length with my 2-3 inch heels. I could've worn higher heels, but chose not to. Best part was, I didn't need to wear a bra!

Wore this for a gala and received compliments the whole night! Have worn this designer before and he knows curves on a woman!! So comfortable too. I'm 5'6 & 145 lbs and wore the 6R with about 3 in heels. #galadress #blackdress

links_reviews_title: This dress is classy and fun. I received compliments all night. It was also great for dancing!
links_reviews_text: Great material and fits really well.

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful in this dress and received multiple complements on it.
links_reviews_text: The fit was almost perfect. I think my torso needed to be just a little longer to make it just right. The fabric along the back zipper didn't lay completely flat but it wasn't exaggerated. It is a beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous concept, poorly fit back straps
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous concept, poor fit on the straps being too big. The Back gaped so much I couldn't wear this. I love the gown but these straps were entirely too long they buckled up. I sized up from the reviews. Maybe that was the mistake.

I'm tall. 5'10". I wore a size 10. It was too short, but still looked fab. It was also a bit big around the waist. Stretchy fabric. Comfy. Also rented the earrings and cuff bracelet in photo. Was awesome!

I rented this for my husband's company party. It was so pretty! I weigh about 120 and I normally wear a 2, which is what I rented. It was comfortable to wear, though it was a little tight on the thighs so I had to keep pulling it down to adjust. The material was thick so it was nice in Chicago winter. I've had this dress on my wish list for ages and I'm glad I finally rented it. I'm 5'1"ish and it was long - there were no other sizes available - but I wore heels & it was good to go. Definitely recommend.
I absolutely LOVED this dress! I have never felt more sexy in my life! I fluctuate between a 10/12 but this was a tight 12. I would wear this dress again in a heartbeat!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my company's awards ceremony. Lots of compliments! Very elegant!
links_reviews_text: This was actually my back up dress and I loved it! I got so many compliments on it! I normally wear a 2P, so the 0 was just a little tighter than I wanted, but I made it work. The size 2 dress I had was just a little bit too long for the amount of walking that I had to do, which is why I went with this one. The back was beautiful and the slit helped make it easier to walk in. Would definitely use again!

Perfect dress for an evening gala for work. The fabric is amazing with just enough stretch. It was true to size, but I am 5'6" and ordered the long to wear with 3 inch heels - it was the perfect length. The back and neckline are the coolest things about this dress, but every part of it is amazing. Didn't want to take it off!

I rented this dress specifically for an NYC black tie wedding. I wanted something that was elegant but modern. I ended up getting the long because I'm on the taller side (5'7") and was going to wear 4" heels. I'm so glad I did! I think the regular or petite would have been too short for me. This dress could not have fit any better! I LOVED the side slit. It made walking in this dress that much easier and more comfortable. I received so many compliments on this dress from strangers (hello NYC) and wedding guests alike! The cage like detailing on the front and back was sublime and so modern. I would definitely rent this dress again! I am 5'7", 110 lbs., 32A cup, and have a slender frame. I wore 4" heels with the long option.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a 007 Black Tie party!
links_reviews_text: Curve hugging, and a bit unforgiving in the lower ab area, but I got compliments all night, and even the next week! Sexy, but classy!

links_reviews_title: FIYAH! This dress makes you look amazing!!! Days later, I'm still getting compliments on the dress.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 6 but the 4R was great! It is tight enough that I didn't have to wear a bra. Great length. It made me feel so beautiful. Highly recommend this dress for a formal affair.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an award gala in the city. Fit like a glove. Material is amazing and had a little
links_reviews_text: Length was just right, a little on the long side. No problems walking in the dress with heels. I didn't even bother trying the 8. The 6 fit like it was made for me. Very comfortable, great material, had some stretch.
I couldn't believe how comfy this dress was! I got so many compliments!

This was a replacement dress that RTR really impressed me with! The length was a little long, but my backup (10R), was too short...not too small, though. Either size was very comfortable. No issues that others had with the back going too low. I chose to wear a sticky bra, but it wasn't a requirement. Great Dress!
I rented this dress for one of my best friend's wedding and it did not disappoint. It hugged me in all the right places and made me feel so beautiful.
Perfect snug fit with just the right amount of stretch. Comfy dress and although the material is thicker it isn't heavy. I felt sexy and beautiful all night. It hugs you in all the right places.

links_reviews_title: Wore for a night at the Opera and dinner at a fancy restaurant
links_reviews_text: Slim fitting and fully lined. Can’t wear a bra with this but you don’t really need to. Hem hit right at the ground with my heels. At first felt a little tight but then adjusted beautifully. I was comfortable throughout the the night. The back and the slit give it just the right amount of sexy. Reminiscent of 90s Versace :)
Could have been a little tighter but looked great!

links_reviews_title: Very flattering fit, the material is very soft and flexible so you can actually move in it!
links_reviews_text: 5'10", 135lbs, size 2, perfect fit!
This dress was really fun! The only issue I had was at the end of the night the sequins got uncomfortable under the arm but besides that it was great!

Loved this dress! Material was stretchy and a lot thinner than I thought. It made this dress super movable so perfect for dancing! I'm 5' and the length was perfect, so I would not recommend for tall people.

I wore this for an 80s-themed gala. I'm 5foot2 and found it runs a bit short. Was just long enough for me, but maybe not for someone taller. The top part was a bit long for me, and had I worn it as designed, the shoulder-less part would not have covered my bra. Thankfully the material is not hemmed on that side, so I could arrange it to cover my bra.

Loved this dress. It's very short and fitted so I was a little concerned about wearing it, but the material is so soft and comfortable. The sequins give it a little sparkle but they are small and soft so they do not scratch you. Would def wear again.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but not fitted properly
links_reviews_text: Very stretchy fabric. Not sure the top fit properly and was a little loose.

links_reviews_title: Literally turned heads in this dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is a winner. A sexy LBD for a night out! So well made.

Great cocktail party/rehearsal dinner dress. I don't have a great photo wearing it at the party but this will do! I rented a 2 and a 4, both fit perfectly probably couldn't tell the difference except the 4 was a bit longer and didn't scratch under my arms as much. But both worked! Super cute and slight sparkles not too much in your face.
Gorgeous dress. Hundreds of compliments. I am 5'4" and I thought the length was perfect. This dress is amazing.

I loved this dress on me. It is thinner than I expected, but I still liked it. I am almost always a 6, but the 6 was very big on me and the 4 worked perfectly. The sequins are so pretty- not too shiny but they show up well in pictures. The only reason I gave it 4/5 stars was that the sequins started to scratch me pretty badly under my arms and my legs by the end of the night. Worth it to me- but something to note.

I am 5'10", 145 and normally wear a 6 or medium. The 8 fit perfect for my purposes. If I was going for tighter, shorter, sexier then I probably would have ordered my normal size 6. It was perfect for a bachelorette party, got lots of compliments

This was my backup style and I did not end up wearing it, but the material was very itchy and uncomfortable on me. The dress in person did not have as much of a wow factor as it did online taking the sequin and shine into consideration. I am typically a size 8 but for this style a size 4 fit me the best. It does accentuate the curves nicely and it was very much so on the shorter side but still classy enough for certain events. It fell abt 5-6 nches above my knee.
Great basic sequin cocktail dress, ultra light and true to size.
didnt wear it

RTR sent me a backup style because my original dress was not available. I panicked when I first saw this, but RTR came to the rescue. This dress is classic, sleek, and was perfect for my formal affair. The regular felt a little short in the back, but I feel pretty certain the long would not have worked.
Loved this dress. Very forgiving and flattering fabric. Very stretchy and comfortable to sit and dance in.

I loved the fit of this dress! I usually wear a 10 and this dress fit true to size. The only reason I gave it 4 stars was because of the length. I got a long (I'm 6' tall), but with heels it was still an inch too short. I still wore it and got tons of compliments!

Rented this for a black tie Holiday party. It was perfect! I am 5'6" and I wore 3.75" heels and the length was great. Sexy and sophisticated. The neckline is very flattering and the fit through the body was loose and comfortable.
This dress was comfortable, fit well and was entirely appropriate for a black tie event. I got a lot of compliments which felt good too.

links_reviews_title: Wore for a black tie wedding and received lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Typically wear a size 12, but wore the 10R for a better fit on the top. The cut in the front is a little awkward and I kept tugging at it. The regular is shorter which was fine for me because I am not big on heels. If you are taller than 5'7 or want to wear heels, I would recommend the long.

The length on this dress was great! I received many compliments and it was comfortable to wear. I was not expecting the top to cut in as far so I had to search for a strapless bra that wouldn’t show and then use fashion tape for extra security. Overall, this is a great dress and I would rent it again.
The length was perfect for me with heels, and even once I was in flip flops didn't drag! I'm busty but the top was still a bit baggy and made for someone taller or with a longer torso.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! I felt fantastic, and All night long, people told me I looked beautiful.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit true to size. I am 5’7” and got the long, which was perfect with 3-4” heels. The cut accentuated my shoulders, and I really liked the ruffled collar, it hid my “extra lines” on my neck. I truly felt amazing all night long in this dress.
Beautiful dress. Great heavy material. Definitely runs large so size down. I'm 5'6" and wore with 3-4in heels and the length was perfect. I will absolutely rent this one again!!

I loved this dress! It fit perfectly to size, was a bit more fitted than it looks on the model, but hugged my curves in all the right ways. I wore Spanx for extra confidence and a normal strapless bra. I would definitely rent this again. Super comfortable and made me feel pretty.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a black tie wedding. At first I was afraid it was too boring, but I ended up loving the neck detail and the cut. Fits true to size, but I decided to wear Spanx underneath due to the material. Length was fine with 4 inch heels.

Loved this dress. I felt like the top was a little loose, so I had to tape it so my bra wouldn't show, but otherwise it was comfortable and I felt great wearing it. Definitely recommend for a formal event!

Loved the fit of this dress and ruffled neckline made it more than just a basic black dress. Very comfortable to wear all night and material had some stretch. Definitely recommend and will rent again!

I rented this dress for a Black Tie attire winter wedding in Napa Valley. The dress was simple but gorgeous! The only down side was that it ran a little large and was gapped at the underarm area. I should have ordered a size 8.

I'm 5'2", 135lbs, and wore 6R. At first, I was worried the gown would be too long but after I got comfortable walking in it, the length turned out to be perfect. Some previous renters said they needed sticky tape for the sides to hide a bra, but I didn't have that problem. The dress was super comfortable and easy to wear, especially considering I wore it for 8+ hours! My back-up size was an 8R, because the dress is basically a column so I wanted to be prepared for minimal give since I'm hippy; but the 8R fit the same as the 6R (true to size) so I don't know if that was an error on one of the tags. Overall, great dress to wear - would definitely recommend!
it fit perfectly and I loved the collar detail! i'm 5'5" and expected the regular to still be a little long, because that's usually the case, but I actually could have worn flats and been okay
Exactly what I was looking for. Great material. Great shape.

links_reviews_title: Great Dress for a Black Tie Event!
links_reviews_text: This was actually my back-up dress but I ended up wearing it to my event instead of the original one I had chosen. Dress fits great (and was a bit loose) so I would recommend renting your size and a size down but overall very comfy and got lots of compliments! Would recommend for sure!

links_reviews_title: Very elegant black dress worn for a black-tie gala. I felt very glamorous!
links_reviews_text: Ran a little large but the fabric and cut of this dress is just beautiful. I not only felt great all night but the dress was incredibly comfortable. Thanks for another great rental, RTR!

Does run large. Normally wear a 8, but knew this dress ran large so I got the 6L fit perfect! Very comfortable, and such an elegant gorgeous dress. Had non stop compliments. I wore 3" heels, and it was perfect! Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: This dress was gorgeous and fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for the formal wedding I attended. I felt amazing in it. Lovely thick fabric... perfect for fall in NY. I was able to wear a strapless bra with it and didn't need to purchase anything new which was nice. The slit was a fun detail, but not too high on the leg. The LONG was perfect for me at 5'7''. I would rent this again! SO stunning.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress that arrived brand new with tags still on!
links_reviews_text: Overall, this fit large. I had to pin it on either side as there was extra fabric mostly in the bust. I wore 4in heels and it was slightly longer than I would have preferred. If there was a petite version it would have been perfect!

links_reviews_title: Dress was in great condition! Very elegant!
links_reviews_text: I sized up for my back up and I wish I would have sized down. It was a little big for me under the arms and around the waist but any smaller may have been tight through the hips, but it was no problem and no one could tell except for me.

This is a beautiful dress, but i thought it was more form fitting than it appeared online. I had to wear the 6 instead of the 4 because i felt it ran slightly small. I love the neckline of this dress though!

I LOVED wearing this dress. It was so comfortable and was the perfect length for me, even with 4 inch heels. I purchased fashion tape to use with the dress based on other reviews, but didn't even need it. It was a classic dress with fun detail. I would absolutely rent it again!
Was a gorgeous dress and fit well even though there was no defined waist. Didn't feel bulky at all. Only complaint was the armpits went very low and had to sticky tape it up so my bra didn't show.

This dress was so cute! I'm normally an 8/10 in dresses, and was worried about the 10 being too small, based off Trina Turk's sizing. This dress runs large, in my opinion. I wore the 8, and it was a tad roomy in the bust area, I could've worn a 6! Perfect for a black tie wedding!
I ordered the 4 and 6 but wore the 4 because it fits true to size. Nice material and clean lines. It's simple but very classic.
I'm 5'2 and 129lbs the dress fit well a little loose on the top part. I wore a 2R and definitely needed over 3 inch heels. It does cut in on the top but overall a great dress.

I probably could have worn one size smaller, but this also fit well. It is generally loose fitting, so there is some leeway there. Was incredibly comfortable. One of the easiest yet still chic dresses I have rented!

links_reviews_title: The dress… uh… finds a way
links_reviews_text: On an elevator at a posh Manhattan hotel, Friday night. I was wearing this dress, a last-minute replacement from RTR that seemed fine — nothing special, but good enough for government work (or, given that this was a fundraising gala, non-government work). We were hungry. We'd been in formal dresses and heels for hours, and the BTS staff didn't get enough to eat. So we ordered pizza. I went down to get it, in this dress and heels. The elevator doors were about to close; an arm comes out of nowhere. A gentleman gets on the elevator. He looks at me, in this dress, with heels and three boxes of pizza. It's a long ride, even in a fast elevator — 35 flights. He can't contain his curiosity. "Okay," he says, gesturing to my dress and the pizza boxes. "I have to know the story here." The dress may have seemed like nothing special when I tried it on in a fit of fashion-induced exhaustion and the remains of a Thanksgiving food coma. But in that moment, on that elevator, it compelled Jeff Goldblum to speak to me. And for that alone, it warrants 5 stars. For what is fashion, if not another means of connecting with our fellow humans? If not another means of helping life find a way? It was pretty comfortable, too.
This dress was really flattering and comfortable, but just a little big on top. A perfect dress if you're wearing your hair up

Loved this dress for a black tie affair. Elegant and classy. The high neck line with cute finish made me feel like a fashionista. FYI there is a slit up the left leg, just high enough where my Spanx almost showed!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Super comfortable and fit well with the event
links_reviews_text: Fit well, not too tight around the hips and great neckline. Slit wasnt too high. Very classy and elegant, neckline added enough to keep it interesting/different
Perfect dress for a black tie masquerade gala. I paired it with some statement earrings and it was super comfortable all night.

Beautiful classic black gown. Traditional yet sexy. Very comfortable, perfect gown for a black tie event or wedding. You won't be disappointed. I am 5'2" and with decent size heels it was still a tad long. The slit in the front allows more ease of movement when walking and or dancing. Overall great dress, I was very happy!
Beautifully looking dress, but unfortunately fit as though it were 2 sizes larger.
Runs extremely small, I usually wear a 4 and went with the 10.

Wow this dress was completely stunning on. The material is great for making you feel like everything is nice and snug while accentuating all the right areas. The color is beautiful and I received compliments all night. The reviews are all true about the sizing being a bit small. I am usually a 2 or 4 and ended up going with a 6 which fit perfectly. The sleeves were a little restrictive but that was easy to deal with. I would definitely order this again or even buy it.

It's snug, but the size I normally wear (the next size up) wasn't available. It's really flattering and was sexy while still being classy. Wish I could buy it, I loved it. I'm 5'7", 138 pounds and I think I got the six.

links_reviews_title: My husband loves this dress! Very dramatic!
links_reviews_text: I love how the dress holds you in and the dramatic off the shoulder is a head-turner. This us my second time renting this dress. I could have worn the 8 but I chose the 10 because the sleeves are a bit tight. I couldnt get a jacket over the little sleeves but I managed. I felt very confident and My husband asked me if I could keep the dress!

links_reviews_title: head-turner!i got so many compliments. I recommend sizing up if in between sizes. stunning dress!
links_reviews_text: Dress is a thicker fabric and very forgiving. Surprisingly comfortable and fitted through bust to bottom hem.
This is a bombshell dress for sure, but definitely runs tight. I didn't size up and wore my usual 6 and just managed to zip it up with the help of a friend. Wore for a work holiday party.
Rented for Vegas and honestly felt like 5 gazillion dollars. A bold, fun dress!!!

links_reviews_title: Stands Out in a Sea of Dark Dresses
links_reviews_text: For those who went before me and marked this dress as running small, THANK YOU. You were correct. I usually wear a solid 4, and I rented the 8. It was definitely the right size choice for me. The only thing "off" with it is that I felt like it slipped down and showed the top of my strapless bra if I wasn't careful. So that part could have been a tiny bit smaller. But the rest fit so perfectly. I was the only person at my event in a red dress, and it showed beautifully both in person and in pictures. I felt like a princess. Such a pretty neckline and sleeve detail. So many compliments. Highly recommend as long as you size up about 2 sizes from your normal.

I usually wear a 0/2. The 0 was way too small, but the 2 worked out. Could have probably done a 4. It was very fitted so I found myself pulling it down often. One arm hole was slightly looser than the other, but it didn't mess up the look. Overall it was perfect for the occasion and I got some amazing photos to remember it.
This dress runs a little small so beware but looks awesome on! I received tons of compliments and my husband loved it. Will definitely be renting a likely dress again
This dress is a little tight in the chest but it fits like a glove! It's the perfect amount of cute but sexy.

links_reviews_title: Hot date night dress to celebrate Anniversary
links_reviews_text: I felt so sexy! I'm 5'9, 135 pounds and a true size 4. ALL the reviews said order a size up but it was huge in the bust (I wear a size 34B) and hips. If It fit perfect I for sure would have bought. But as a rental, it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a formal cocktail wedding
links_reviews_text: Great short sexy red dress - the arm bands are very tight though and runs a little small I'm usually a 4 or 6 and I wore an 8

There's just enough stretch in this dress to fit even if you're two different sizes from top to bottom. (Raises hand!) Anyway, I had read complaints the arms were tight and while I generally have bigger arms, they were not tight at all. Many compliments!
Fit perfectly. Let my arms move well. #sorority #function

I rented this for a party and got compliments all night long. I read the reviews and sized up (I can wear 2-4 and went with a 6). The fit was perfect. Yes the arm loops are strange and you can't raise your arms up high but for a get-together with friends it was perfect. I ended buying this dress I loved it so much. This would be a perfect date night dress!!

An absolute eye catcher, if you want to stand out and make a statement and look perfect doing so get this dress! Great condition, beautifully made, the arm sleeves are restricting. No sudden arm movements allowed lol

After reading the reviews I ordered my normal size a 6 and the 8 as a back up. There wasn't that big of a difference in the body part of the dress between the 6 and the 8, however I could not fit my arms into the armholes of the size 6. The arms on the 8 were tight, but doable. Now keep in mind this will restrict your arm movements. So if you want to have your hands in the air like you just don't care, this is not the dress for you. The body of the dress has a little stretch in it but not a ton. I did end up wearing spanks underneath because without them you see a lot of lines. The color of the dress is amazing, and you will stand out and turn heads. My plan was to buy this dress after I had worn it, however that's no longer an option with rent the runway. This was disappointing to learn. Just be smart when you are ordering your size, and keep the arm restriction issues in your mind. You will love this dress!

I ordered this dress as my backup for a school formal and didn’t end up wearing it but still loved it. I found it to be a little tighter than I would’ve liked and it would’ve been hard to dance in. I will say it does have extremely small arm holes and once the dress is on, you can’t really move you’re arms much. But overall very pretty and classy looking. Loved the color, shape, and fabric, it was also extremely comfortable. Would definitely recommend.

I rented this dress after seeing it had some spandex. I need stratchy dresses because I'm pear shape. To fit my chest, I need a small dress that gives in the hips. This did not stretch at all. It was so small and the sleeves were so tight. Im and 8 and would need a 12 to be able to wear this. But the top would be too loose. I think the sleeve would be uncomfortable even at the right size. I'm so grateful for rtr's customer service.they got me a replacement dress the next day.

links_reviews_title: Flattering dress, but had to tuck in sleeves
links_reviews_text: I run between 6-8 and I got the 8 and it fit like a glove, so if you're in between sizes, is size up. It was so flattering and I felt great, but ultimately decided on another option because it was a little constricting at the bottom and I wanted to dance at my event. I did have to tuck in the sleeves because they were too small for my arms to be comfortable.

links_reviews_title: It was my birthday party and I stood out
links_reviews_text: Sexy, classy. Beautiful bright red color.

I wore this dress to my husband's Air Force holiday party this past December. It certainly got a lot of looks! The dress is sexy without being too much and still classy. It's the perfect holiday/ Valentine's Day red. It fits a tad snug, so I would order up a size just in case. Love this off-the-shoulder piece!

This was a lovely number in a luscious, holiday-ready vibrant red. The fit was decent, if not slightly wide in the hips. If you have a narrow frame, beware that Likely sizing trends towards smaller bust with roomier hips. Difficult to raise your arms much given the sleeves, so not ideal for energetic dancing. For my occasion, this was not an issue.

I loved this dress but it was a bit too casual for a black tie optional event. I will definitely rent this dress again but will size up. The arm sleeves were squeezing my arms and I couldn't fully zip up the dress.
I didn't have a problem dancing. A little restrictive with the arms but it didn't bother me at all. Wouldn't be good if you have bigger arms

links_reviews_title: It looked great on my body & figure
links_reviews_text: The arms were a bit annoying to move around in it wasn't very comfortable. It did run a bit small both times.
Loved the fit on this for my petite frame. Worked well since the dress is strapless so no need to worry about it sliding down. Great color and cute arm sleeves!

links_reviews_title: I felt confident and amazing in this dress
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great. I could move around easily. The red color was fire engine red and beautiful.
So many compliments all night! Fit like a glove. The shoulder straps did come off but the dress was still killer without them! Great color too.
Very nice dress eye catching nice length especially for tall girls not too short no raising the roof in this dress but the overall look is worth it.

Looooove this dress. Wore it for my birthday party. It was the second dress for the day. Between the color and the body hugging construction of the dress is a winner!!! About the sleeves, yes there was a small tear on one of the sleeves ( if you are wearing this dress to do everyday mundane things, then don't rent. Otherwise you'll b fine) I danced my butt off at a Bruno Mars concert n I was fine! Also wore no underwear *nothing* fabric is heavy enough.

links_reviews_title: Incredible day with friends and family and a great looking dress
links_reviews_text: Best dress I've ever worn. Fit me in all the right places this will now be my go to dress. The only downfall was the arms were a little snug but I knew that going in.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my homecoming and loved it.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect

links_reviews_title: Sexy yet classy red dress with a tight fit!
links_reviews_text: This dress was actually one of my backups that I ended up wearing by popular demand from my sister and boyfriend. The red color is bold and pops out. It's a very sexy yet elegant dress because of the length. At times I felt restricted in it because of how tight it hugged my body. I have larger legs and thighs and felt I couldn't take as big of strides when walking because of the tightness. I have a smaller chest and I did not wear a bra. Love the cuffs although they do feel tight and I thought I'd rip them off from dancing. I couldn't raise my arms high for hugs and dancing, and it became a funny joke throughout the night lol. It was difficult to even tie my hair up also. Not the most comfortable dress but you'll feel sexy in it for sure!

Wore this to a show. Loved the fit. Appropriate length. But now we have to talk about RTR as a whole. Over the past three months, the decline has been extremely palpable. I have received wrong items numerous times. Outside the New York area, my packages miss their delivery dates 100% of the time. The wait time for customer service has been well over 30 minutes- or even better- a recorded message saying their phone lines are tied up, instructing the caller to email, and hanging up. Unlimited items go quickly so when I am choosing a replacement item for RTR's screw up, I am choosing from what is available at that moment and it needs to be processed quickly. Instead, email responses take 24 hours, items I chose are no longer available, and I have to spend more time choosing items. This really defeats the purpose of a RTR subscription. I was told the reason for the poor customer support is they are over stretched for the holidays. It's early October and this has been going on for at least two weeks- if they are overstretched in September and October, can you imagine what it will be like in November and December- when the holidays are actually relevant? Recently I have also noticed that many of the items RTR advertises- that I wait and wait to come available on the app (you guys ever thought of adding a notification bell feature?), don't actually exist. If you go to the 4day rental calendar, it is greyed out through as far as you can go- and that's not bc the item is that popular- no one decided in October to rent a romper for a Tuesday through Friday in February. And finally customer service did confirm that they don't actually have the item in my size anymore. A quick search (10 min long) of some other items I was excited to wear showed me 4 more items that don't exist. This is false advertising- your customers want to know what the actual size of your stock is. It's a consumer protection issue- you are advertising a much larger stock than you actually have and misleading customers about the value of your service. I feel the value delivered has only decreased over the past few months and that the price of unlimited should drop at least $40 to represent that until RTR gets their customer service and supply chain in order. I'm strongly considering leaving the RTR family after the sharp decline in service I have experienced since July - in August, I received a whopping four items on time the entire month that were not damaged or the wrong item. I ordered a Tanya Taylor dress and received - I kid you not - dirty sweatpants. Cmon. It's such a good idea- stop messing it up!

links_reviews_title: This dress was a knock-out! I felt like a million bucks
links_reviews_text: The dress is definitely form fitting, and I felt better wearing Spanx. But, given the off-the-shoulder look and that the bust is tighter I was able to go without a bra (32C). The arms were a little tight and restricted mobility, but as long as you aren't planning on crazy dancing you should be good.
Tight dress but loved it

Runs true to size! It was my backup dress and I only ordered one size. Maybe slightly big through the waist/hips (I am narrow), but not enough to matter. Super comfortable, and I didn't have any issues lifting my arms while dancing. I didn't have to wear a bra and it stayed up just fine. The arm bands make it cute and different! The fabric is nice and thick but stretchy. Would highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun night in general!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like a glove. I got compliments all night on the bright color and the way it hugged my curves. To echo prior reviews, I will say the arm bands are reeeeeally tight and a little constricting, but overall was completely satisfied with the dress itself.
